सवर्जेषे भर आप्रस्य वक्मन्युषर्बुधः सवस्मिन्नञ्जसिक्राणस्य सवस्मिन्नञ्जसि|	in war which wins the light at the freegivers call at due oblation of the earlyrising one oblation of the active one.
अहन्निन्द्रो यथा विदे शीर्ष्णाशीर्ष्णोपवाच्यः|	indra slew even as we knowwhom each bowed head must reverence.
अस्मत्रा ते सध्र्यक सन्तु रातयो भद्रा भद्रस्य रातयः|	may all thy bounteous gifts be gathered up for us yea the good gifts of thee the good.
तत तु परयः परत्नथा ते शुशुक्वनं यस्मिन यज्ञे वारमक्र्ण्वत कषयं रतस्य वारसि कषयम|	this food glows for thee as of old at sacrifice wherein they made thee chooser of the place for thou choosest the place of sacrifice.
वि तद वोचेरध दवितान्तः पश्यन्ति रश्मिभिः|	speak thou and make it known to us they see within with beams of light.
स घा विदे अन्विन्द्रो गवेषणो बन्धुक्षिद्भ्यो गवेषणः|	indra indeed is found a seeker after spoil spoilseeker for his own allies.
नू इत्था ते पूर्वथा च परवाच्यं यदङगिरोभ्योअव्र्णोरप वरजमिन्द्र शिक्षन्नप वरजम|	so now must thy great deed be lauded as of old when for the aṅgirases thou openedst the stall openedst giving aid the stall.
ऐभ्यः समान्या दिशास्मभ्यं जेषि योत्सि च|	in the same manner for us here fight thou and be victorious.
सुन्वद्भ्यो रन्धया कं चिदव्रतं हर्णायन्तं चिदव्रतम|	to him who pours the juice give up the lawless man the lawless who is wroth with us.
सं यज्जनान करतुभिः शूर ईक्षयद धने हिते तरुषन्त शरवस्यवः पर यक्षन्त शरवस्यवः|	when with wise plan the hero leads the people forth they conquer in the ordered battle seeking fame press eager onward seeking fame.
तस्मा आयुः परजावदिद बाधे अर्चन्त्योजसा|	to him in time of need they sing for life with offspring and with strength.
इन्द्र ओक्यं दिधिषन्त धीतयो देवानछा न धीतयः|	their hymns with indra find a welcome place of rest the hymns go forward to the gods.
युवं तमिन्द्रापर्वता पुरोयुधा यो नः पर्तन्यादप तंतमिद धतं वज्रेअ तंतमिद धतम|	indra and parvata our champions in the fight drive ye away each man who fain would war with us drive him far from us with the bolt.
दूरे चत्ताय छन्त्सद गहनं यदिनक्षत|	welcome to him concealed afar shall he the lair that he hath found.
अस्माकं शत्रून परि शूर विश्वतो दर्मा दर्षीष्ट विश्वतः|	so may the render rend our foes on every side rend them o hero everywhere.
अश्वं न तवा वारवन्तं वन्दध्या अग्निं नमोभिः|	with worship will i glorify thee agni like a longtailed steed.
सम्राजन्तमध्वराणाम|	imperial lord of sacred rites.
स घा नः सूनुः शवसा पर्थुप्रगामा सुशेवः|	may the farstriding son of strength bringer of great felicity.
मीढ्वानस्माकं बभूयात|	who pours his gifts like rain be ours.
स नो दूराच्चासाच्च नि मर्त्यादघायोः|	lord of all life from near from far do thou o agni evermore.
पाहि सदमिद विश्वायुः|	protect us from the sinful man.
इममू षु तवमस्माकं सनिं गायत्रं नव्यांसम|	o agni graciously announce this our oblation to the gods.
अग्ने देवेषु पर वोचः|	and this our newest song of praise.
आ नो भज परमेष्वा वाजेषु मध्यमेषु|	give us a share of strength most high a share of strength that is below.
शिक्षा वस्वोन्तमस्य|	a share of strength that is between.
विभक्तासि चित्रभानो सिन्धोरूर्मा उपाक आ|	thou dealest gifts resplendent one nigh as with waves of sindhu thou.
सद्यो दाशुषे कषरसि|	swift streamest to the worshipper.
यमग्ने पर्त्सु मर्त्यमवा वाजेषु यं जुनाः|	that man is lord of endless strength whom thou protectest in the fight.
स यन्ताशश्वतीरिषः|	agni or urgest to the fray.
नकिरस्य सहन्त्य पर्येता कयस्य चित|	him whosoever he may be no man may vanquish mighty one.
वाजो अस्ति शरवाय्यः|	nay very glorious power is his.
स वाजं विश्वचर्षणिरर्वद्भिरस्तु तरुता|	may he who dwells with all mankind bear us with warsteeds through the fight.
विप्रेभिरस्तु सनिता|	and with the singers win the spoil.
जराबोध तद विविड्ढि विशेविशे यज्ञियाय|	help thou who knowest lauds this work this eulogy to rudra him.
सतोमं रुद्राय दर्शीकम|	adorable in every house.
स नो महाननिमानो धूमकेतुः पुरुश्चन्द्रः|	may this our god great limitless smokebannered excellently bright.
धिये वाजाय हिन्वतु|	urge us to strength and holy thought.
स रेवानिव विश्पतिर्दैव्यः केतुः शर्णोतु नः|	like some rich lord of men may he agni the banner of the gods.
उक्थैरग्निर्ब्र्हद्भानुः|	refulgent hear us through our lauds.
नमो महद्भ्यो नमो अर्भकेभ्यो नमो युवभ्यो नम आशिनेभ्यः|	glory to gods the mighty and the lesser glory to gods the younger and the elder.
यजाम देवान यदि शक्नवाम मा जयायसः शंसमा वर्क्षि देवाः|	let us if we have power pay the god worship no better prayer than this ye gods acknowledge.
मत्स्यपायि ते महः पात्रस्येव हरिवो मत्सरो मदः|	glad thee thy glory hath been quaffed lord of bay steeds as twere the bowls enlivening mead.
वर्षा ते वर्ष्ण इन्दुर्वाजी सहस्रसातमः|	for thee the strong there is strong drink mighty omnipotent to win.
आ नस्ते गन्तु मत्सरो वर्षा मदो वरेण्यः|	let our strong drink most excellent exhilarating come to thee.
सहावानिन्द्रसानसिः पर्तनाषाळ अमर्त्यः|	victorious indra bringing gain immortal conquering in fight.
तवं हि शूरः सनिता चोदयो मनुषो रथम|	thou hero winner of the spoil urgest to speed the car of man.
सहावान दस्युमव्रतमोषः पात्रं न शोचिषा|	burn like a vessel with the flame the lawless dasyu conqueror.
मुषाय सुर्यं कवे चक्रमीशान ओजसा|	empowered by thine own might o sage thou stolest sūryas chariot wheel.
वह शुष्णायवधं कुत्सं वातस्याश्वैः|	thou barest kutsa with the steeds of wind to Śuṣṇa as his death.
शुष्मिन्तमो हि ते मदो दयुम्निन्तम उत करतुः|	most mighty is thy rapturous joy most splendid is thine active power.
वर्त्रघ्ना वरिवोविदा मंसीष्ठा अश्वसातमः|	wherewith foeslaying sending bliss thou art supreme in gaining steeds.
यथा पुर्वेभ्यो जरित्र्भ्य इन्द्र मय इवापो न तर्ष्यते बभूथ|	as thou o indra to the ancient singers wast ever joy as water to the thirsty.
तामनु तवा निविदं जोहवीमि वि|	so unto thee i sing this invocation may we find strengthening food in full abundance.
न नूनमस्ति नो शवः कस्तद वेद यदद्भुतम|	naught is today tomorrow naught who comprehends the mystery.
अन्यस्यचित्तमभि संचरेण्यमुताधीतं वि नश्यति|	we must address ourselves unto anothers thought and lost is then the hope we formed.
किं न इन्द्र जिघांससि भरातरो मरुतस्तव|	the maruts are thy brothers why o indra wouldst thou take our lives.
तेभिः कल्पस्व साधुया मा नः समरणे वधीः|	agree with them in friendly wise and do not slay us in the fight.
किं नो भरातरगस्त्य सखा सन्नति मन्यसे|	agastya brother why dost thou neglect us thou who art our friend.
विद्मा हि तेयथा मनोअस्मभ्यमिन न दित्ससि|	we know the nature of thy mind verity thou wilt give us naught.
अरं कर्ण्वन्तु वेदिं समग्निमिन्धतां पुरः|	let them prepare the altar let them kindle fire in front we two.
तत्राम्र्तस्य चेतनं यज्ञं ते तनवावहै|	here will spread sacrifice for thee that the immortal may observe.
तवमीशिषे वसुपते वसूनां तवं मित्राणां मित्रपते धेष्ठः|	thou lord of wealth art master of all treasures thou lord of friends art thy friends best supporter.
इन्द्र तवं मरुद्भिः सं वदस्वाध पराशान रतुथा हवींषि|	o indra speak thou kindly with the maruts and taste oblations in their proper season.
वया इदग्ने अग्नयस्ते अन्ये तवे विश्वे अम्र्ता मादयन्ते|	the other fires are verily thy branches the immortals all rejoice in thee o agni.
वैश्वानर नाभिरसि कषितीनां सथूणेव जनानुपमिद ययन्थ|	centre art thou vaiśvānara of the people sustaining men like a deepfounded pillar.
मूर्धा दिवो नाभिरग्निः पर्थिव्या अथाभवदरती रोदस्योः|	the forehead of the sky earths centre agni became the messenger of earth and heaven.
तं तवा देवासोअजनयन्त देवं वैश्वानर जयोतिरिदार्याय|	vaiśvānara the deities produced thee a god to be a light unto the Ārya.
आ सूर्ये न रश्मयो धरुवासो वैश्वानरे दधिरेअग्ना वसूनि|	as in the sun firm rays are set for ever treasures are in vaiśvānara in agni.
या पर्वतेष्वोषधीष्वप्सु या मानुषेष्वसि तस्य राजा|	of all the riches in the hills the waters the herbs among mankind thou art the sovran.
बर्हती इव सूनवे रोदसी गिरो होता मनुष्यो न दक्षः|	as the great worldhalves so are their sons praises skilled as a man to act is he the herald.
सवर्वते सत्यशुष्माय पूर्वीर्वैश्वानराय नर्तमाय यह्वीः|	vaiśvānara celestial truly mighty most manly one hath many a youthful consort.
दिवश्चित ते बर्हतो जातवेदो वैश्वानर पर रिरिचे महित्वम|	even the lofty heaven o jātavedas vaiśvānara hath not attained thy greatness.
राजा कर्ष्टीनामसि मानुषीणां युधा देवेभ्यो वरिवश्चकर्थ|	thou art the king of lands where men are settled thou hast brought comfort to the gods in battle.
पर नू महित्वं वर्षभस्य वोचं यं पूरवो वर्त्रहणं सचन्ते|	now will i tell the greatness of the hero whom pūrus sons follow as vṛtras slayer.
वैश्वानरो दस्युमग्निर्जघन्वानधूनोत काष्ठा अव शम्बरं भेत|	agni vaiśvānara struck down the dasyu cleave Śambara through and shattered down his fences.
वैश्वानरो महिम्ना विश्वक्र्ष्टिर्भरद्वाजेषु यजतो विभावा|	vaiśvānara dwelling by his might with all men farshining holy mid the bharadvājas.
शातवनेये शतिनीभिरग्निः पुरुणीथे जरते सून्र्तावान|	is lauded excellent with hundred praises by purūṇītha son of Śatavani.
आ तवा जुवो रारहाणा अभि परयो वायो वहन्त्विह पूर्वपीतये सोमस्य पूर्वपीतये|	vĀyu let fleetfoot coursers bring thee speedily to this our feast to drink first of the juice we pour to the first draught of soma juice.
ऊर्ध्वा ते अनु सून्र्ता मनस्तिष्ठतु जानती|	may our glad hymn discerning well uplifted gratify thy mind.
नियुत्वता रथेना याहि दावने वायो मखस्य दावने|	come with thy teamdrawn car o vāyu to the gift come to the sacrificers gift.
मन्दन्तु तवा मन्दिनो वायविन्दवोअस्मत कराणासः सुक्र्ता अभिद्यवो गोभिः कराणा अभिद्यवः|	may the joygiving drops o vāyu gladden thee effectual well prepared directed to the heavens strong blent with milk and seeking heaven.
यद ध कराणा इरध्यै दक्षं सचन्त ऊतयः|	that aids effectual to fulfil may wait upon our skilful power.
सध्रीचीना नियुतो दावने धिय उप बरुवत ईं धियः|	associate teams come hitherward to grant our prayers they shall address the hymns we sing.
वायुर्युङकते रोहिता वायुररुणा वायू रथे अजिरा धुरि वोळ्हवे वहिष्ठा धुरि वोळ्हवे|	two red steeds vāyu yokes vāyu two purple steeds swiftfooted to the chariot to the pole to draw most able at the pole to draw.
पर बोधया पुरन्धिंजार आ ससतीमिव|	wake up intelligence as when a lover wakes his sleeping love.
पर चक्षय रोदसी वासयोषसः शरवसे वासयोषसः|	illumine heaven and earth make thou the dawns to shine for glory make the dawns to shine.
तुभ्यमुषासः शुचयः परावति भद्रा वस्त्रा तन्वते दंसु रश्मिषु चित्रा नव्येषु रश्मिषु|	for thee the radiant dawns in the fardistant sky broaden their lovely garments forth in wondrous beams brightcoloured in their newborn beams.
तुभ्यं धेनुः सबर्दुघा विश्वा वसूनि दोहते|	for thee the nectaryielding cow pours all rich treasures forth as milk.
अजनयो मरुतो वक्षणाभ्योदिव आ वक्षणाभ्यः|	the marut host hast thou engendered from the womb the maruts from the womb of heaven.
तुभ्यं शुक्रासः शुचयस्तुरण्यवो मदेषूग्रा इषणन्तभुर्वण्यपामिषन्त भुर्वणि|	for thee the pure bright quicklyflowing somadrops strong in their heightening power hasten to mix themselves hasten to the water to be mixed.
तवां तसारी दसमानो भगमीट्टे तक्ववीये|	to thee the weary coward prays for luck that he may speed away.
तवां विश्वस्माद भुवनात पासि धर्मणासुर्यात पासि धर्मण|	thou by thy law protectest us from every world yea from the world of highest gods.
तवं नो वायवेषामपूर्व्यः सोमानां परथमः पीतिमर्हसि सुतानां पीतिमर्हसि|	thou vāyu who hast none before thee first of all hast right to drink these offerings of soma juice hast right to drink the juice outpoured.
उतो विहुत्मतीनां विशां ववर्जुषीणाम|	yea poured by all invoking tribes who free themselves from taint of sin.
विश्वा इत ते धेनवो दुह्र आशिरं घर्तं दुह्रत आशिरम|	for thee all cows are milked to yield the somamilk to yield the butter and the milk.
अग्ने विवस्वदुषसश्चित्रं राधो अमर्त्य|	immortal jātavedas thou manyhued fulgent gift of dawn.
आ दाशुषे जातवेदो वहा तवमद्या देवानुषर्बुधः|	agni this day to him who pays oblations bring the gods who waken with the morn.
जुष्टो हि दूतो असि हव्यवाहनोअग्ने रथीरध्वराणाम|	for thou art offeringbearer and loved messenger the charioteer of sacrifice.
सजूरश्विभ्यामुषसा सुवीर्यमस्मे धेहि शरवो बर्हत|	accordant with the aśvins and with dawn grant us heroic strength and lofty fame.
अद्या दूतं वर्णीमहे वसुमग्निं पुरुप्रियम|	as messenger we choose today agni the good whom many love.
धूमकेतुं भार्जीकं वयुष्टिषु यज्ञानामध्वरश्रियम|	smokebannered spreader of the light at break of day glory of sacrificial rites.
शरेष्ठं यविष्ठमतिथिं सवाहुतं जुष्टं जनाय दाशुषे|	him noblest and most youthful richly worshipped guest dear to the men who offer gifts.
देवानछा यातवे जातवेदसमग्निमीळे वयुष्टिषु|	him agni jātavedas i beseech at dawn that he may bring the gods to us.
सतविष्यामि तवामहं विश्वस्याम्र्त भोजन|	thee agni will i glorify deathless nourisher of the world.
अग्ने तरातारमम्र्तं मियेध्य यजिष्ठं हव्यवाहन|	immortal offeringbearer meet for sacred food preserver best at sacrifice.
सुशंसो बोधि गर्णते यविष्ठ्य मधुजिह्वः सवाहुतः|	tell good things to thy praiser o most youthful god as richly worshipped honeytongued.
परस्कण्वस्य परतिरन्नायुर्जीवसे नमस्या दैव्यं जनम|	and granting to praskaṇva lengthened days of life show honour to the heavenly host.
होतारं विश्ववेदसं सं हि तवा विश इन्धते|	for the men agni kindle thee as all possessor and as priest.
स आ वह पुरुहूत परचेतसोअग्ने देवानिह दरवत|	so agni muchinvoked bring hither with all speed the gods the excellently wise.
सवितारमुषसमश्विना भगमग्निं वयुष्टिषु कषपः|	at dawn of day at night uṣas and savitar the aśvins bhaga agnis self.
कण्वासस्त्वा सुतसोमास इन्धते हव्यवाहं सवध्वर|	skilled in fair rites with soma poured the kaṇvas light thee the oblationwafting god.
पतिर हि अध्वराणाम अग्ने दूतो विशाम असि|	for agni lord of sacrifice and messenger of men art thou.
उषर्बुध आवह सोमपीतये देवानद्य सवर्द्र्शः|	bring thou the gods who wake at dawn who see the light this day to drink the soma juice.
अग्ने पूर्वा अनूषसो विभावसो दीदेथ विश्वदर्षतः|	thou shonest forth o agni after former dawns all visible o rich in light.
असि गरामेष्वविता पुरोहितोअसि यज्ञेषु मानुषः|	thou art our help in battlestrife the friend of man the great high priest in sacrifice.
नि तवा यज्ञस्य साधनमग्ने होतारं रत्विजम|	like manu we will stablish thee agni performer of the rite.
मनुष्वद देव धीमहि परचेतसं जीरं दूतममर्त्यम|	invoker ministering priest exceeding wise the swift immortal messenger.
यद देवानां मित्रमहः पुरोहितोअन्तरो यासि दूत्यम|	when as the gods high priest by many loved thou dost their mission as their nearest friend.
सिन्धोरिव परस्वनितास ऊर्मयोअग्नेर्भ्राजन्ते अर्चयः|	then like the farresounding billows of the flood thy flames o agni roar aloud.
शरुधि शरुत्कर्ण वह्निभिर्देवैरग्ने सयावभिः|	hear agni who hast ears to hear with all thy train of escort gods.
आ सीदन्तु बर्हिषि मित्रो अर्यमा परातर्यावाणो अध्वरम|	let mitra aryaman seeking betimes our rite seat them upon the sacred grass.
शर्ण्वन्तु सतोमं मरुतः सुदानवोअग्निजिह्वा रताव्र्धः|	let those who strengthen law who bountifully give the lifetongued maruts hear our praise.
पिबतु सोमं वरुणो धर्तव्रतोअश्विभ्यामुषसा सजूः|	may lawsupporting varuṇa with the aśvins twain and uṣas drink the soma juice.
गायन्ति तवा गायत्रिणोअर्चन्त्यर्कमर्किणः|	the chanters hymn thee they who say the word of praise magnify thee.
बरह्माणस्त्वा शतक्रत उद वंशमिव येमिरे|	the priests have raised thee up on high o Śatakratu like a pole.
यत सानोः सानुमारुहद भूर्यस्पष्ट कर्त्वम|	as up he clomb from ridge to ridge and looked upon the toilsome task.
तदिन्द्रो अर्थं चेतति यूथेन वर्ष्णिरेजति|	indra observes this wish of his and the rain hastens with his troop.
युक्ष्वा हि केशिना हरी वर्षणा कक्ष्यप्रा|	harness thy pair of strong bay steeds longmaned whose bodies fill the girths.
अथा न इन्द्र सोमपा गिरामुपश्रुतिं चर|	and indra somadrinker come to listen to our songs of praise.
एहि सतोमानभि सवराभि गर्णीह्या रुव|	come hither answer thou the song sing in approval cry aloud.
बरह्म च नो वसोसचेन्द्र यज्ञं च वर्धय|	good indra make our prayer succeed and prosper this our sacrifice.
उक्थमिन्द्राय शंस्यं वर्धनं पुरुनिष्षिधे|	to indra must a laud be said to strengthen him who freely gives.
शक्रो यथा सुतेषु णो रारणत सख्येषु च|	that Śakra may take pleasure in our friendship and drinkofferings.
तमित सखित्व ईमहे तं राये तं सुवीर्ये|	him him we seek for friendship him for riches and heroic might.
स शक्र उत नः शकदिन्द्रो वसु दयमानः|	for indra he is Śakra he shall aid us while he gives us wealth.
सुविव्र्तं सुनिरजमिन्द्र तवादातमिद यशः|	easy to turn and drive away indra is spoil bestowed by thee.
गवामपव्रजं वर्धि कर्णुष्व राधो अद्रिवः|	unclose the stable of the kine and give us wealth o thunderarmed.
नहि तवा रोदसी उभे रघायमाणमिन्वतः|	the heaven and earth contain thee not together in thy wrathful mood.
जेषः सवर्वतीरपः सं गा अस्मभ्यं धूनुहि|	win us the waters of the sky and send us kine abundantly.
आश्रुत्कर्ण शरुधी हवं नू चिद दधिष्व मे गिरः|	hear thou whose ear is quick my call take to thee readily my songs.
इन्द्र सतोममिमं मम कर्ष्वा युजश्चिदन्तरम|	o indra let this laud of mine come nearer even than thy friend.
विद्मा हि तवा वर्षन्तमं वाजेषु हवनश्रुतम|	we know thee mightiest of all in battles hearer of our cry.
वर्षन्तमस्य हूमह ऊतिं सहस्रसातमाम|	of thee most mighty we invoke the aid that giveth thousandfold.
आ तू न इन्द्र कौशिक मन्दसानः सुतं पिब|	o indra son of kuśika drink our libation with delight.
नव्यमायुःप्र सू तिर कर्धी सहस्रसां रषिम|	prolong our life anew and cause the seer to win a thousand gifts.
परि तवा गिर्वणो गिर इमा भवन्तु विश्वतः|	lover of song may these our songs on every side encompass thee.
वर्द्धायुमनु वर्द्धयो जुष्टा भवन्तु जुष्टयः|	strengthening thee of lengthened life may they be dear delights to thee.
मरुतो यस्य हि कषये पाथा दिवो विमहसः|	the best of guardians hath that man within whose dwelling place ye drink.
स सुगोपातमो जनः|	o maruts giants of the sky.
यज्ञैर्वा यज्ञवाहसो विप्रस्य वा मतीनाम|	honoured with sacrifice or with the worship of the sages hymns.
मरुतः शर्णुता हवम|	o maruts listen to the call.
उत वा यस्य वाजिनोअनु विप्रमतक्षत|	yea the strong man to whom ye have vouchsafed to give a sage shall move.
स गन्ता गोमतिव्रजे|	into a stable rich in kine.
अस्य वीरस्य बर्हिषि सुतः सोमो दिविष्टिषु|	upon this heros sacred grass soma is poured in daily rites.
उक्थं मदश्च शस्यते|	praise and delight are sung aloud.
अस्य शरोषन्त्वा भुवो विश्वा यश्चर्षणीरभि|	let the strong maruts hear him him surpassing all men strength be his.
सूरं चित सस्रुषीरिषः|	that reaches even to the sun.
पूर्वीभिर्हि ददाशिम शरद्भिर्मरुतो वयम|	for through the swift gods loving help in many an autumn maruts we.
अवोभिश्चर्षणीनाम|	have offered up our sacrifice.
सुभगः स परयज्यवो मरुतो अस्तु मर्त्यः|	fortunate shall that mortal be o maruts most adorable.
यस्य परयांसिपर्षथ|	whose offerings ye bear away.
शशमानस्य वा नरः सवेदस्य सत्यशवसः|	o heroes truly strong ye know the toil of him who sings your praise.
विदा कामस्यवेनतः|	the hearts desire of him who loves.
यूयं तत सत्यशवस आविष कर्त महित्वना|	o ye of true strength make this thing manifest by your greatness strike.
विध्यता विद्युता रक्षः|	the demon with your thunderbolt.
गूहता गुह्यं तमो वि यात विश्वमत्रिणम|	conceal the horrid darkness drive far from us each devouring fiend.
जयोतिष कर्ता यदुश्मसि|	create the light for which we long.
इदं शरेष्ठं जयोतिषां जयोतिरागाच्चित्रः परकेतो अजनिष्ट विभ्वा|	this light is come amid all lights the fairest born is the brilliant farextending brightness.
यथा परसूता सवितुः सवयमेवा रात्र्युषसे योनिमारैक|	night sent away for savitars uprising hath yielded up a birthplace for the morning.
रुशद्वत्सा रुशती शवेत्यागादारैगु कर्ष्णा सदनान्यस्याः|	the fair the bright is come with her white offspring to her the dark one hath resigned her dwelling.
समानबन्धू अम्र्ते अनुची दयावा वर्णं चरत आमिनाने|	akin immortal following each other changing their colours both the heavens move onward.
समानो अध्वा सवस्रोरनन्तस्तमन्यान्या चरतो देवशिष्टे|	common unending is the sisters pathway taught by the gods alternately they travel.
न मेथेते न तस्थतुः सुमेके नक्तोषासा समनसा विरूपे|	fairformed of different hues and yet oneminded night and dawn clash not neither do they travel.
भास्वती नेत्री सून्र्तानामचेति चित्रा वि दुरो न आवः|	bright leader of glad sounds our eyes behold her splendid in hue she hath unclosed the portals.
परार्प्या जगद वयु नो रायो अख्यदुषा अजीगर्भुवनानि विश्वा|	she stirring up the world hath shown us riches dawn hath awakened every living creature.
जिह्मश्ये चरितवे मघोन्याभोगय इष्टये राय उ तवम|	rich dawn she sets afoot the coiledup sleeper one for enjoyment one for wealth or worship.
दभ्रं पश्यद्भ्य उर्विया विचक्ष उषा|	those who saw little for extended vision all living creatures hath the dawn awakened.
कषत्राय तवं शरवसे तवं महीया इष्टये तवमर्थमिवत्वमित्यै|	one to high sway one to exalted glory one to pursue his gain and one his labour.
विसद्र्शा जीविताभिप्रचक्ष उषा|	all to regard their different vocations all moving creatures hath the dawn awakened.
एषा दिवो दुहिता परत्यदर्शि वयुछन्ती युवतिः शुक्रवासाः|	we see her there the child of heaven apparent the young maid flushing in her shining raiment.
विश्वस्येशाना पार्थिवस्य वस्व उषो अद्येह सुभगेव्युछ|	thou sovran lady of all earthly treasure flush on us here auspicious dawn this morning.
परायतीनामन्वेति पाथ आयतीनां परथमा शश्वतीनाम|	she first of endless morns to come hereafter follows the path of morns that have departed.
वयुछन्ती जीवमुदीरयन्त्युषा मर्तं कं चन बोधयन्ती|	dawn at her rising urges forth the living him who is dead she wakes not from his slumber.
उषो यदग्निं समिधे चकर्थ वि यदावश्चक्षसा सूर्यस्य|	as thou dawn hast caused agni to be kindled and with the suns eye hast revealed creation.
यन मानुषान यक्ष्यमाणानजीगस्तद देवेषु चक्र्षे भद्रमप्नः|	and hast awakened men to offer worship thou hast performed for gods a noble service.
कियात्या यत समया भवाति या वयूषुर्याश्च नूनंव्युछान|	how long a time and they shall be togetherdawns that have shone and dawns to shine hereafter.
अनु पूर्वाः कर्पते वावशाना परदीध्याना जोषमन्याभिरेति|	she yearns for former dawns with eager longing and goes forth gladly shining with the others.
ईयुष टे ये पूर्वतरामपश्यन वयुछन्तीमुषसं मर्त्यासः|	gone are the men who in the days before us looked on the rising of the earlier morning.
अस्माभिरू नु परतिचक्ष्याभूदो ते यन्ति ये अपरीषु पश्यान|	we we the living now behold her brightness and they come nigh who shall hereafter see her.
यावयद्द्वेषा रतपा रतेजाः सुम्नावरी सून्र्ता ईरयन्ती|	foechaser born of law the laws protectress joygiver waker of all pleasant voices.
सुमङगलीर्बिभ्रती देववीतिमिहाद्योषः शरेष्ठतमाव्युछ|	auspicious bringing food for gods enjoyment shine on us here most bright o dawn this morning.
शश्वत पुरोषा वयुवास देव्यथो अद्येदं वयावो मघोनी|	from days eternal hath dawn shone the goddess and shows this light today endowed with riches.
अथो वयुछादुत्तराननु दयूनजराम्र्ता चरति सवधाभिः|	so will she shine on days to come immortal she moves on in her own strength undecaying.
वयञ्जिभिर्दिव आतास्वद्यौदप कर्ष्णां निर्णिजं देव्यावः|	in the skys borders hath she shone in splendour the goddess hath thrown off the veil of darkness.
परबोधयन्त्यरुणेभिरश्वैरोषा याति सुयुजा रथेन|	awakening the world with purple horses on her wellharnessed chariot dawn approaches.
आवहन्ती पोष्या वार्याणि चित्रं केतुं कर्णुते चेकिताना|	bringing all lifesustaining blessings with her showing herself she sends forth brilliant lustre.
ईयुषीणामुपमा शश्वतीनां विभातीनां परथमोषा वयश्वैत|	last of the countless mornings that have vanished first of bright morns to come hath dawn arisen.
उदीर्ध्वं जीवो असुर्न आगादप परागात तम आ जयोतिरेति|	arise the breath the life again hath reached us darkness hath passed away and light approacheth.
आरैक पन्थां यातवे सूर्यायागन्म यत्र परतिरन्त आयुः|	she for the sun hath left a path to travel we have arrived where men prolong existence.
सयूमना वाच उदियर्ति वह्नि सतवानो रेभ उषसो विभातीः|	singing the praises of refulgent mornings with his hymns web the priest the poet rises.
अद्या तदुछ गर्णते मघोन्यस्मे आयुर्नि दिदीहि परजावत|	shine then today rich maid on him who lauds thee shine down on us the gift of life and offspring.
या गोमतीरुषसः सर्ववीरा वयुछन्ति दाशुषे मर्त्याय|	dawns giving sons all heroes kine and horses shining upon the man who brings oblations.
वायोरिव सून्र्तानामुदर्के ता अश्वदा अश्नवत सोमसुत्वा|	these let the somapresser gain when ending his glad songs louder than the voice of vāyu.
माता देवानामदितेरनीकं यज्ञस्य केतुर्ब्र्हती वि भाहि|	mother of gods aditis form of glory ensign of sacrifice shine forth exalted.
परशस्तिक्र्द बरह्मणे नो वयुछा नो जने जनय विश्ववारे|	rise up bestowing praise on our devotion allbounteous make us chief among the people.
यच्चित्रमप्न उषसो वहन्तीजानाय शशमानाय भद्रम|	whatever splendid wealth the dawns bring with them to bless the man who offers praise and worship.
तन नो|	even that may mitra varuṇa vouchsafe us and aditi and sindhu earth and heaven.
चित्रं देवानामुदगादनीकं चक्षुर्मित्रस्य वरुणस्याग्नेः|	the brilliant presence of the gods hath risen the eye of mitra varuṇa and agni.
आप्रा दयावाप्र्थिवी अन्तरिक्षं सूर्य आत्मा जगतस्तस्थुषश्च|	the soul of all that moveth not or moveth the sun hath filled the air and earth and heaven.
सूर्यो देवीमुषसं रोचमानां मर्यो न योषामभ्येति पश्चात|	like as a young man followeth a maiden so doth the sun the dawn refulgent goddess.
यत्रा नरो देवयन्तो युगानि वितन्वते परति भद्राय भद्रम|	where pious men extend their generations before the auspicious one for happy fortune.
भद्रा अश्वा हरितः सूर्यस्य चित्रा एतग्वा अनुमाद्यासः|	auspicious are the suns baycoloured horses bright changing hues meet for our shouts of triumph.
नमस्यन्तो दिव आ पर्ष्ठमस्थुः परि दयावाप्र्थिवी यन्ति सद्यः|	bearing our prayers the skys ridge have they mounted and in a moment speed round earth and heaven.
तत सूर्यस्य देवत्वं तन महित्वं मध्या कर्तोर्विततं सं जभार|	this is the godhead this might of sūrya he hath withdrawn what spread oer work unfinished.
यदेदयुक्त हरितः सधस्थादाद रात्री वासस्तनुते सिमस्मै|	when he hath loosed his horses from their station straight over all night spreadeth out her garment.
तन मित्रस्य वरुणस्याभिचक्षे सूर्यो रूपं कर्णुते दयोरुपस्थे|	in the skys lap the sun this form assumeth that varuṇa and mitra may behold it.
अनन्तमन्यद रुशदस्य पाजः कर्ष्णमन्यद धरितः सं भरन्ति|	his bay steeds well maintain his power eternal at one time bright and darksome at another.
अद्या देवा उदिता सूर्यस्य निरंहसः पिप्र्ता नरवद्यात|	this day o gods while sūrya is ascending deliver us from trouble and dishonour.
तन नो|	this prayer of ours may varuṇa grant and mitra and aditi and sindhu earth and heaven.
वि हयख्यं मनसा वस्य इछन्निन्द्राग्नी जञास उत वा सजातान|	longing for weal i looked around in spirit for kinsmen indraagni or for brothers.
नान्या युवत परमतिरस्ति मह्यं स वां धियं वाजयन्तीमतक्षम|	no providence but yours alone is with me so have i wrought for you this hymn for succour.
अश्रवं हि भूरिदावत्तरा वां विजामातुरुत वा घा सयालात|	for i have heard that ye give wealth more freely than worthless soninlaw or spouses brother.
अथा सोमस्य परयती युवभ्यामिन्द्राग्नी सतोमं जनयामि नव्यम|	so offering to you this draught of soma i make you this new hymn indra and agni.
मा छेद्म रश्मीन्रिति नाधमानाः पितॄणां शक्तीरनुयछमानाः|	let us not break the cords with this petition we strive to gain the powers of our forefathers.
इन्द्राग्निभ्यां कं वर्षणो मदन्ति ता हयद्री धिषणाया उपस्थे|	for indraagni the strong drops are joyful for here in the bowls lap are both the pressstones.
युवाभ्यां देवी धिषणा मदायेन्द्राग्नी सोममुशती सुनोति|	for you the bowl divine indra and agni presses the soma gladly to delight you.
तावश्विना भद्रहस्ता सुपाणी आ धावतं मधुना पर्ङकतमप्सु|	with hands auspicious and fair arms ye aśvins haste sprinkle it with sweetness in the waters.
युवामिन्द्राग्नी वसुनो विभागे तवस्तमा शुश्रव वर्त्रहत्ये|	you i have heard were mightiest indraagni when vṛtra fell and when the spoil was parted.
तावासद्या बर्हिषि यज्ञे अस्मिन पर चर्षणी मादयेथां सुतस्य|	sit at this sacrifice ye ever active on the strewn grass and with the juice delight you.
पर चर्षणिभ्यः पर्तनाहवेषु पर पर्थिव्या रिरिचाथे दिवश्च|	surpassing all men where they shout for battle ye twain exceed the earth and heaven in greatness.
पर सिन्धुभ्यः पर गिरिभ्यो महित्वा परेन्द्राग्नी विश्वा भुवनात्यन्या|	greater are ye than rivers and than mountains o indraagni and all things beside them.
आ भरतं शिक्षतं वज्रबाहू अस्मानिन्द्राग्नी अवतं शचीभिः|	bring wealth and give it ye whose arms wield thunder indra and agni with your powers protect us.
इमे नु ते रश्मयः सूर्यस्य येभिः सपित्वं पितरो न आसन|	now of a truth these be the very sunbeams wherewith our fathers were of old united.
पुरन्दरा शिक्षतं वज्रहस्तास्मानिन्द्राग्नी अवतं भरेषु|	give ye who shatter forts whose hands wield thunder indra and agni save us in our battles.
तन नो|	this prayer of ours may varuṇa grant and mitra and aditi and sindhu earth and heaven.
परति तयं चारुमध्वरं गोपीथाय पर हूयसे|	to this fair sacrifice to drink the milky draught thou art invoked.
मरुद्भिरग्न आ गहि|	o agni with the maruts come.
नहि देवो न मर्त्यो महस्तव करतुं परः|	no mortal man no god exceeds thy mental power o mighty one.
म|	o agni with the maruts come.
ये महो रजसो विदुर्विश्वे देवासो अद्रुहः|	all gods devoid of guile who know the mighty region of midair.
म|	o agni with those maruts come.
य उग्रा अर्कमान्र्चुरनाध्र्ष्टास ओजसा|	the terrible who sing their song not to be overcome by might.
म|	o agni with those maruts come.
ये शुभ्रा घोरवर्पसः सुक्षत्रासो रिशादसः|	brilliant and awful in their form mighty devourers of their foes.
म|	o agni with those maruts come.
ये नाकस्याधि रोचने दिवि देवास आसते|	who sit as deities in heaven above the skyvaults luminous sphere.
म|	o agni with those maruts come.
य ईङखयन्ति पर्वतान तिरः समुद्रमर्णवम|	who scatter clouds about the sky away over the billowy sea.
म|	o agni with those maruts come.
आ ये तन्वन्ति रश्मिभिस्तिरः समुद्रमोजसा|	who with their bright beams spread them forth over the ocean in their might.
म|	o agni with those maruts come.
अभि तवा पूर्वपीतये सर्जामि सोम्यं मधु|	for thee to be thine early draught i pour the somamingled meath.
म|	o agni with the maruts come.
जुषस्व सप्रथस्तमं वचो देवप्सरस्तमम|	accept our loudestsounding hymn food most delightful to the gods.
हव्या जुह्वानासनि|	pouring our offerings in thy mouth.
अथा ते अङगिरस्तमाग्ने वेधस्तम परियम|	now agni will we say to thee o wisest and best aṅgiras.
वोचेम बरह्म सानसि|	our precious muchavailing prayer.
कस्ते जामिर्जनानामग्ने को दाश्वध्वरः|	who agni is thy kin of men who is thy worthy worshipper.
को ह कस्मिन्नसि शरितः|	on whom dependent who art thou.
तवं जामिर्जनानामग्ने मित्रो असि परियः|	the kinsman agni of mankind their well beloved friend art thou.
सखा सखिभ्य ईड्यः|	a friend whom friends may supplicate.
यजा नो मित्रावरुणा यजा देवान रतं बर्हत|	bring to us mitra varuṇa bring the gods to mighty sacrifice.
अग्ने यक्षिस्वं दमम|	bring them o agni to thine home.
विष्णोर्नु कं वीर्याणि पर वोचं यः पार्थिवानि विममेरजांसि|	i will declare the mighty deeds of viṣṇu of him who measured out the earthly regions.
यो अस्कभायदुत्तरं सधस्थं विचक्रमाणस्त्रेधोरुगायः|	who propped the highest place of congregation thrice setting down his footstep widely striding.
पर तद विष्णु सतवते वीर्येण मर्गो न भीमः कुचरो गिरिष्ठाः|	for this his mighty deed is viṣṇu lauded like some wild beast dread prowling mountainroaming.
यस्योरुषु तरिषु विक्रमणेष्वधिक्षियन्ति भुवनानि विश्वा|	he within whose three wideextended paces all living creatures have their habitation.
पर विष्णवे शूषमेतु मन्म गिरिक्षित उरुगायाय वर्ष्णे|	let the hymn lift itself as strength to viṣṇu the bull farstriding dwelling on the mountains.
य इदं दीर्घं परयतं सधस्थमेको विममे तरिभिरित पदेभिः|	him who alone with triple step hath measured this common dwellingplace long far extended.
यस्य तरी पूर्णा मधुना पदान्यक्षीयमाणा सवधयामदन्ति|	him whose three places that are filled with sweetness imperishable joy as it may list them.
य उ तरिधातु पर्तिवीमुत दयामेको दाधार भुवनानि विश्वा|	who verily alone upholds the threefold the earth the heaven and all living creatures.
तदस्य परियमभि पाथो अश्यां नरो यत्र देवयवो मदन्ति|	may i attain to that his wellloved mansion where men devoted to the gods are happy.
उरुक्रमस्य स हि बन्धुरित्था विष्णोः पदे परमे मध्व उत्सः|	for there springs close akin to the widestrider the well of meath in viṣṇus highest footstep.
ता वं वास्तून्युश्मसि गमध्यै यत्र गावो भूरिश्र्ङगायासः|	fain would we go unto your dwellingplaces where there are manyhorned and nimble oxen.
अत्राह तदुरुगायस्य वर्ष्णः परमं पदमव भाति भूरि|	for mightily there shineth down upon us the widelystriding bulls sublimest mansion.
यच्चिद धि ते विशो यथा पर देव वरुण वरतम|	whatever law of thine o god o varuṇa as we are men.
मिनीमसिद्यविदयवि|	day after day we violate.
मा नो वधाय हत्नवे जिहीळानस्य रीरधः|	give us not as a prey to death to be destroyed by thee in wrath.
मा हर्णानस्य मन्यवे|	to thy fierce anger when displeased.
वि मर्ळीकाय ते मनो रथीरश्वं न सन्दितम|	to gain thy mercy varuṇa with hymns we bind thy heart as binds.
गीर्भिर्वरुण सीमहि|	the charioteer his tethered horse.
परा हि मे विमन्यवः पतन्ति वस्यैष्टये|	they flee from me dispirited bent only on obtaining wealth.
वयो न वसतीरुप|	as to their nests the birds of air.
कदा कषत्रश्रियं नरमा वरुणं करामहे|	when shall we bring to be appeased the hero lord of warrior might.
मर्ळीकायोरुचक्षसम|	him the farseeing varuṇa.
तदित समानमाशाते वेनन्ता न पर युछतः|	this this with joy they both accept in common never do they fail.
धर्तव्रताय दाशुषे|	the everfaithful worshipper.
वेदा यो वीनां पदमन्तरिक्षेण पतताम|	he knows the path of birds that fly through heaven and sovran of the sea.
वेद नावः समुद्रियः|	he knows the ships that are thereon.
वेद मासो धर्तव्रतो दवादश परजावतः|	true to his holy law he knows the twelve moons with their progeny.
वेदा य उपजायते|	he knows the moon of later birth.
वेद वातस्य वर्तनिमुरोर्र्ष्वस्य बर्हतः|	he knows the pathway of the wind the spreading high and mighty wind.
वेदा ये अध्यासते|	he knows the gods who dwell above.
नि षसाद धर्तव्रतो वरुणः पस्त्यास्वा|	varuṇa true to holy law sits down among his people he.
साम्राज्याय सुक्रतुः|	most wise sits there to govern all.
अतो विश्वान्यद्भुता चिकित्वानभि पश्यति|	from thence perceiving he beholds all wondrous things both what hath been.
कर्तानि या चकर्त्वा|	and what hereafter will be done.
स नो विश्वाहा सुक्रतुरादित्यः सुपथा करत|	may that Āditya very wise make fair paths for us all our days.
पर ण आयूंषि तारिषत|	may he prolong our lives for us.
बिभ्रद दरापिं हिरण्ययं वरुणो वस्त निर्णिजम|	varuṇa wearing golden mail hath clad him in a shining robe.
परि सपशो नि षेदिरे|	his spies are seated found about.
न यं दिप्सन्ति दिप्सवो न दरुह्वाणो जनानाम|	the god whom enemies threaten not nor those who tyrannize oer men.
न देवमभिमातयः|	nor those whose minds are bent on wrong.
उत यो मानुषेष्वा यशश्चक्रे असाम्या|	he who gives glory to mankind not glory that is incomplete.
अस्माकमुदरेष्वा|	to our own bodies giving it.
परा मे यन्ति धीतयो गावो न गव्यूतीरनु|	yearning for the wideseeing one my thoughts move onward unto him.
इछन्तीरुरुचक्षसम|	as kine unto their pastures move.
सं नु वोचावहै पुनर्यतो मे मध्वाभ्र्तम|	once more together let us speak because my meath is brought priestlike.
होतेव कषदसे परियम|	thou eatest what is dear to thee.
दर्शं नु विश्वदर्षतं दर्शं रथमधि कषमि|	now saw i him whom all may see i saw his car above the earth.
एता जुषत मे गिरः|	he hath accepted these my songs.
इमं मे वरुण शरुधी हवमद्या च मर्ळय|	varuṇa hear this call of mine be gracious unto us this day.
तवामवस्युरा चके|	longing for help i cried to thee.
तवं विश्वस्य मेधिर दिवश्च गमश्च राजसि|	thou o wise god art lord of all thou art the king of earth and heaven.
स यामनिप्रति शरुधि|	hear as thou goest on thy way.
उदुत्तमं मुमुग्धि नो वि पाशं मध्यमं चर्त|	release us from the upper bond untie the bond between and loose.
अवाधमानि जीवसे|	the bonds below that i may live.
हवयाम्य अग्निम परथमं सवस्तये हवयामि मित्रावरुणाव इहावसे|	agni i first invoke for our prosperity i call on mitra varuṇa to aid us here.
हवयामि रात्रीं जगतो निवेशनीं हवयामि देवं सवितारम ऊतये|	i call on night who gives rest to all moving life i call on savitar the god to lend us help.
आ कर्ष्णेन रजसा वर्तमानो निवेशयन्न अम्र्तम मर्त्यं च|	throughout the dusky firmament advancing laying to rest the immortal and the mortal.
हिरण्ययेन सविता रथेना देवो याति भुवनानि पश्यन|	borne in his golden chariot he cometh savitar god who looks on every creature.
याति देवः परवता यात्य उद्वता याति शुभ्राभ्यां यजतो हरिभ्याम|	the god moves by the upward path the downward with two bright bays adorable he journeys.
आ देवो याति सविता परावतो ऽप विश्वा दुरिता बाधमानः|	savitar comes the god from the far distance and chases from us all distress and sorrow.
अभीव्र्तं कर्शनैर विश्वरूपं हिरण्यशम्यं यजतो बर्हन्तम|	his chariot decked with pearl of various colours lofty with golden pole the god hath mounted.
आस्थाद रथं सविता चित्रभानुः कर्ष्णा रजांसि तविषीं दधानः|	the manyrayed one savitar the holy bound bearing power and might for darksome regions.
वि जनाञ्छ्यावाः शितिपादो अख्यन रथं हिरण्यप्ररौगं वहन्तः|	drawing the goldyoked car his bays whitefooted have manifested light to all the peoples.
शश्वद विशः सवितुर दैव्यस्योपस्थे विश्वा भुवनानि तस्थुः|	held in the lap of savitar divine one all men all beings have their place for ever.
तिस्रो दयावः सवितुर दवा उपस्थां एका यमस्य भुवने विराषाट|	three heavens there are two savitars adjacent in yamas world is one the home of heroes.
आणिं न रथ्यम अम्र्ताधि तस्थुर इह बरवीतु य उ तच चिकेतत|	as on a linchpin firm rest things immortal he who hath known it let him here declare it.
वि सुपर्णो अन्तरिक्षाण्य अख्यद गभीरवेपा असुरः सुनीथः|	he strong of wing hath lightened up the regions deepquivering asura the gentle leader.
कवेदानीं सूर्यः कश चिकेत कतमां दयां रश्मिर अस्या ततान|	where now is sūrya where is one to tell us to what celestial sphere his ray hath wandered.
अष्टौ वय अख्यत ककुभः पर्थिव्यास तरी धन्व योजना सप्त सिन्धून|	the earths eight points his brightness hath illumined three desert regions and the seven rivers.
हिरण्याक्षः सविता देव आगाद दधद रत्ना दाशुषे वार्याणि|	god savitar the goldeyed hath come hither giving choice treasures unto him who worships.
हिरण्यपाणिः सविता विचर्षणिर उभे दयावाप्र्थिवी अन्तर ईयते|	the goldenhanded savitar farseeing goes on his way between the earth and heaven.
अपामीवाम बाधते वेति सूर्यम अभि कर्ष्णेन रजसा दयाम रणोति|	drives away sickness bids the sun approach us and spreads the bright sky through the darksome region.
हिरण्यहस्तो असुरः सुनीथः सुम्र्ळीकः सववान यात्वर्वां|	may he goldhanded asura kind leader come hither to us with his help and favour.
अपसेधन रक्षसो यातुधानानस्थाद देवः परतिदोषं गर्णानः|	driving off rākṣasas and yātudhānas the god is present praised in hymns at evening.
ये ते पन्थाः सवितः पूर्व्यासोअरेणवः सुक्र्ता अन्तरिक्षे|	o savitar thine ancient dustless pathways are well established in the airs midregion.
तेभिर्नो अद्य पथिभिः सुगेभी रक्षा च नो अधि च बरूहि देव|	o god come by those paths so fair to travel preserve thou us from harm this day and bless us.
कद रुद्राय परचेतसे मीळ्हुष्टमाय तव्यसे|	what shall we sing to rudra strong most bounteous excellently wise.
वोचेम शन्तमं हर्दे|	that shall be dearest to his heart.
यथा नो अदितिः करत पश्वे नर्भ्यो यथा गवे|	that aditi may grant the grace of rudra to our folk our kine.
यथा तोकाय रुद्रियम|	our cattle and our progeny.
यथा नो मित्रो वरुणो यथा रुद्रश्चिकेतति|	that mitra and that varuṇa that rudra may remember us.
यथा विश्वे सजोषसः|	yea all the gods with one accord.
गाथपतिं मेधपतिं रुद्रं जलाषभेषजम|	to rudra lord of sacrifice of hymns and balmy medicines.
तच्छंयोः सुम्नमीमहे|	we pray for joy and health and strength.
यः शुक्र इव सूर्यो हिरण्यमिव रोचते|	he shines in splendour like the sun refulgent as bright gold is he.
शरेष्ठो देवानां वसुः|	the good the best among the gods.
शं नः करत्यर्वते सुगं मेषाय मेष्ये|	may he grant health into our steeds wellbeing to our rams and ewes.
नर्भ्यो नारिभ्यो गवे|	to men to women and to kine.
अस्मे सोम शरियमधि नि धेहि शतस्य नर्णाम|	o soma set thou upon us the glory of a hundred men.
महि शरवस्तुविन्र्म्णम|	the great renown of mighty chiefs.
मा नः सोमपरिबाधो मारातयो जुहुरन्त|	let not malignities nor those who trouble soma hinder us.
आ न इन्दो वाजे भज|	indu give us a share of strength.
यास्ते परजा अम्र्तस्य परस्मिन धामन्न्र्तस्य|	soma head central point love these soma know these as serving thee.
मूर्धा नाभा सोम वेन आभूषन्तीः सोम वेदः|	children of thee immortal at the highest place of holy law.
भवा मित्रो न शेव्यो घर्तासुतिर्विभूतद्युम्न एवया उ सप्रथाः|	farshining widely famed going thy wonted way fed with the oil be helpful mitralike to us.
अधा ते विष्णो विदुषा चिदर्ध्य सतोमो यज्ञश्चराध्यो हविष्मता|	so viṣṇu een the wise must swell thy song of praise and he who hath oblations pay thee solemn rites.
यः पूर्व्याय वेधसे नवीयसे सुमज्जानये विष्णवे ददाशति|	he who brings gifts to him the ancient and the last to viṣṇu who ordains together with his spouse.
यो जातमस्य महतो महि बरवत सेदु शरवोभिर्युज्यं चिदभ्यसत|	who tells the lofty birth of him the lofty one shall verily surpass in glory een his peer.
तमु सतोतारः पूर्व्यं यथा विद रतस्य गर्भं जनुषापिपर्तन|	him have ye satisfied singers as well as ye know primeval germ of order even from his birth.
आस्य जानन्तो नाम चिद विवक्तन महस्ते विष्णो सुमतिं भजामहे|	ye knowing een his name have told it forth may we viṣṇu enjoy the grace of thee the mighty one.
तमस्य राजा वरुणस्तमश्विना करतुं सचन्त मारुतस्य वेधसः|	the sovran varuṇa and both the aśvins wait on this the will of him who guides the marut host.
दाधार दक्षमुत्तममहर्विदं वरजं च विष्णुः सखिवानपोर्णुते|	viṣṇu hath power supreme and might that finds the day and with his friend unbars the stable of the kine.
आ यो विवाय सचथाय दैव्य इन्द्राय विष्णुः सुक्र्ते सुक्र्त्तरः|	even he the heavenly one who came for fellowship viṣṇu to indra godly to the godlier.
वेधा अजिन्वत तरिषधस्थ आर्यं रतस्य भागे यजमानमाभजत|	who maker throned in three worlds helps the Āryan man and gives the worshipper his share of holy law.
इन्द्रावरुणयोरहं सम्राजोरव आ वर्णे|	i crave help from the imperial lords from indravaruṇa may they.
ता नो मर्ळातीद्र्शे|	both favour one of us like me.
गन्तारा हि सथोअवसे हवं विप्रस्य मावतः|	guardians of men ye ever come with ready succour at the call.
धर्ताराचर्षणीनाम|	of every singer such as i.
अनुकामं तर्पयेथामिन्द्रावरुण राय आ|	sate you according to your wish o indravaruṇa with wealth.
ता वां नेदिष्ठमीमहे|	fain would we have you nearest us.
युवाकु हि शचीनां युवाकु सुमतीनाम|	may we be sharers of the powers sharers of the benevolence.
भूयाम वाजदाव्नाम|	of you who give strength bounteously.
इन्द्रः सहस्रदाव्नां वरुणः शंस्यानाम|	indra and varuṇa among givers of thousands meet for praise.
करतुर्भवत्युक्थ्यः|	are powers who merit highest laud.
तयोरिदवसा वयं सनेम नि च धीमहि|	through their protection may we gain great store of wealth and heap it up.
सयादुत पररेचनम|	enough and still to spare be ours.
इन्द्रावरुण वामहं हुवे चित्राय राधसे|	o indravaruṇa on you for wealth in many a form i call.
अस्मान सु जिग्युषस कर्तम|	still keep ye us victorious.
इन्द्रावरुण नू नु वां सिषासन्तीषु धीष्वा|	o indravaruṇa through our songs that seek to win you to ourselves.
अस्मभ्यं शर्म यछतम|	give us at once your sheltering help.
पर वामश्नोतु सुष्टुतिरिन्द्रावरुण यां हुवे|	o indravaruṇa to you may fair praise which i offer come.
यां रधाथे सधस्तुतिम|	joint eulogy which ye dignify.
इमं सतोममर्हते जातवेदसे रथमिव सं महेमा मनीषया|	for jātavedas worthy of our praise will we frame with our mind this eulogy as twere a car.
भद्रा हि नः परमतिरस्य संसद्यग्ने सख्ये मा रिषामा वयं तव|	for good in his assembly is this care of ours let us not in thy friendship agni suffer harm.
यस्मै तवमायजसे स साधत्यनर्वा कषेति दधते सुवीर्यम|	the man for whom thou sacrificest prospereth dwelleth without a foe gaineth heroic might.
स तूताव नैनमश्नोत्यंहतिरग्ने|	he waxeth strong distress never approacheth him let us not in thy friendship agni suffer harm.
शकेम तवा समिधं साधया धियस्त्वे देवा हविरदन्त्याहुतम|	may we have power to kindle thee fulfil our thoughts in thee the gods eat the presented offering.
तवमादित्याना वह तान हयुश्मस्यग्ने|	bring hither the Ādityas for we long for them let us not in thy friendship agni suffer harm.
भरामेध्मं कर्णवामा हवींषि ते चितयन्तः पर्वणापर्वणा वयम|	we will bring fuel and prepare burnt offerings reminding thee at each successive festival.
जीवातवे परतरं साधया धियोअग्ने|	fulfil our thought that so we may prolong our lives let us not in thy friendship agni suffer harm.
विशां गोपा अस्य चरन्ति जन्तवो दविपच्च यदुत चतुष्पदक्तुभिः|	his ministers move forth the guardians of the folk protecting quadruped and biped with their rays.
चित्रः परकेत उषसो महानस्य अग्ने|	mighty art thou the wondrous herald of the dawn let us not in thy friendship agni suffer harm.
तवमध्वर्युरुत होतासि पूर्व्यः परशास्ता पोता जनुषा पुरोहितः|	thou art presenter and the chief invoker thou director purifier great high priest by birth.
विश्वा विद्वानार्त्विज्या धीर पुष्यस्यग्ने|	knowing all priestly work thou perfectest it sage let us not in thy friendship agni suffer harm.
यो विश्वतः सुप्रतीकः सद्रंं असि दूरे चित सन तळिदिवाति रोचसे|	lovely of form art thou alike on every side though far thou shinest brightly as if close at hand.
रात्र्याश्चिदन्धो अति देव पश्यस्यग्ने|	o god thou seest through even the dark of night let us not in thy friendship agni suffer harm.
पूर्वो देवा भवतु सुन्वतो रथोअस्माकं शंसो अभ्यस्तु दूढ्यः|	gods foremost be his car who pours libations out and let our hymn prevail oer evilhearted men.
तदा जानीतोत पुष्यता वचोअग्ने|	attend to this our speech and make it prosper well let us not in thy friendship agni suffer harm.
वधैर्दुःशंसानप दूढ्यो जहि दूरे वा ये अन्ति वा के चिदत्रिणः|	smite with thy weapons those of evil speech and thought devouring demons whether near or tar away.
अथा यज्ञाय गर्णते सुगं कर्ध्यग्ने|	then to the singer give free way for sacrifice let us not in thy friendship agni suffer harm.
यदयुक्था अरुषा रोहिता रथे वातजूता वर्षभस्येव तेरवः|	when to thy chariot thou hadst yoked two red steeds and two ruddy steeds windsped thy roar was like a bulls.
आदिन्वसि वनिनो धूमकेतुनाग्ने|	thou with smokebannered flame attackest forest trees let us not in thy friendship agni suffer harm.
अध सवनादुत बिभ्युः पतत्रिणो दरप्सा यत ते यवसादो वयस्थिरन|	then at thy roar the very birds are terrified when eatingup the grass thy sparks fly forth abroad.
सुगं तत ते तावकेभ्यो रथेभ्योअग्ने|	then is it easy for thee and thy car to pass let us not in thy friendship agni suffer harm.
अयं मित्रस्य वरुणस्य धायसेअवयातां मरुतां हेळो अद्भुतः|	he hath the power to soothe mitra and varuṇa wonderful is the maruts wrath when they descend.
मर्ळा सु नो भूत्वेषां मनः पुनरग्ने|	be gracious let their hearts he turned to us again let us not in thy friendship agni suffer harm.
देवो देवानामसि मित्रो अद्भुतो वसुर्वसूनामसि चारुरध्वरे|	thou art a god thou art the wondrous friend of gods the vasu of the vasus fair in sacrifice.
शर्मन सयाम तव सप्रथस्तमेअग्ने|	under thine own most wide protection may we dwell let us not in thy friendship agni suffer harm.
तत ते भद्रं यत समिद्धः सवे दमे सोमाहुतो जरसे मर्ळयत्तमः|	this is thy grace that kindled in thine own abode invoked with soma thou soundest forth most benign.
दधासि रत्नं दरविणं च दाशुषेअग्ने|	thou givest wealth and treasure to the worshipper let us not in thy friendship agni suffer harm.
यस्मै तवं सुद्रविणो ददाशोअनागास्त्वमदिते सर्वताता|	to whom thou lord of goodly riches grantest freedom from every sin with perfect wholeness.
यं भद्रेण शवसा चोदयासि परजावता राधसा ते सयाम|	whom with good strength thou quickenest with children and wealthmay we be they eternal being.
स तवमग्ने सौभगत्वस्य विद्वानस्माकमायुः पर तिरेहदेव|	such agni thou who knowest all good fortune god lengthen here the days of our existence.
तन नो मित्रो वरुणो मामहन्तामदितिः सिन्धुः पर्थिवी उत दयौः|	this prayer of ours may varuṇa grant and mitra and aditi and sindhu earth and heaven.
पर्थू रथो दक्षिणाया अयोज्यैनं देवासो अम्र्तासो अस्थुः|	the dakṣiṇās broad chariot hath been harnessed this car the gods immortal have ascended.
कर्ष्णादुदस्थादर्या विहायाश्चिकित्सन्ती मानुषायक्षयाय|	fain to bring light to homes of men the noble and active goddess hath emerged from darkness.
पूर्वा विश्वस्माद भुवनादबोधि जयन्ती वाजं बर्हती सनुत्री|	she before all the living world hath wakened the lofty one who wins and gathers treasure.
उच्चा वयख्यद युवतिः पुनर्भूरोषा अगन परथमा पूर्वहूतौ|	revived and ever young on high she glances dawn hath come first unto our morning worship.
यदद्य भागं विभजासि नर्भ्य उषो देवि मर्त्यत्रा सुजाते|	if dawn thou goddess nobly born thou dealest fortune this day to all the race of mortals.
देवो नो अत्र सविता दमूना अनागसो वोचति सूर्याय|	may savitar the god friend of the homestead declare before the sun that we are sinless.
गर्हंगर्हमहना यात्यछा दिवेदिवे अधि नामा दधाना|	showing her wonted form each day that passeth spreading the light she visiteth each dwelling.
सिषासन्ती दयोतना शश्वदागादग्रमअग्रमिद भजतेवसूनाम|	eager for conquest with bright sheen she cometh her portion is the best of goodly treasures.
भगस्य सवसा वरुणस्य जामिरुषः सून्र्ते परथमा जरस्व|	sister of varuṇa sister of bhaga first among all sing forth o joyous morning.
पश्चा स दघ्या यो अघस्य धाता जयेम तं दक्षिणया रथेन|	weak be the strength of him who worketh evil may we subdue him with our car the guerdon.
उदीरतां सून्र्ता उत पुरन्धीरुदग्नयः शुशुचानासोस्थुः|	let our glad hymns and holy thoughts rise upward for the flames brightly burning have ascended.
सपार्हा वसूनि तमसापगूळ्हाविष कर्ण्वन्त्युषसो विभातीः|	the farrefulgent mornings make apparent the lovely treasures which the darkness covered.
अपान्यदेत्यभ्यन्यदेति विषुरूपे अहनी सं चरेते|	the one departeth and the other cometh unlike in hue days halves march on successive.
परिक्षितोस्तमो अन्या गुहाकरद्यौदुषाः शोशुचता रथेन|	one hides the gloom of the surrounding parents dawn on her shining chariot is resplendent.
सद्र्शीरद्य सद्र्शीरिदु शवो दीर्घं सचन्ते वरुणस्यधाम|	the same in form today the same tomorrow they still keep varuṇas eternal statute.
अनवद्यास्त्रिंशतं योजनान्येकैका करतुं परियन्ति सद्यः|	blameless in turn they traverse thirty regions and dart across the spirit in a moment.
जानत्यह्नः परथमस्य नाम शुक्रा कर्ष्णादजनिष्ट शवितीची|	she who hath knowledge of the first days nature is born refulgent white from out the darkness.
रतस्य योषा न मिनाति धामाहर अहर्निष्क्र्तमाचरन्ती|	the maiden breaketh not the law of order day by day coming to the place appointed.
कन्येव तन्वा शाशदानानेषि देवि देवमियक्षमाणम|	in pride of beauty like a maid thou goest o goddess to the god who longs to win thee.
संस्मयमाना युवतिः पुरस्तादाविर्वक्षांसि कर्णुषे विभाती|	and smiling youthful as thou shinest brightly before him thou discoverest thy bosom.
सुसंकाशा मात्र्म्र्ष्टेव योषाविस्तन्वं कर्णुषे दर्शे कम|	fair as a bride embellished by her mother thou showest forth thy form that all may see it.
भद्रा तवमुषो वितरं वयुछ न तत ते अन्या उषसोनशन्त|	blessed art thou o dawn shine yet more widely no other dawns have reached what thou attainest.
अश्वावतीर्गोमतीर्विश्ववारा यतमाना रश्मिभिः सूर्यस्य|	rich in kine horses and all goodly treasures in constant operation with the sunbeams.
परा च यन्ति पुनरा च यन्ति भद्रा नाम वहमानाुषासः|	the dawns depart and come again assuming their wonted forms that promise happy fortune.
रतस्य रश्मिमनुयछमाना भद्रमभद्रं करतुमस्मासु धेहि|	obedient to the rein of law eternal give us each thought that more and more shall bless us.
उषो नो अद्य सुहवा वयुछास्मासु रायो मघवत्सु च सयुः|	shine thou on us today dawn swift to listen with us be riches and with chiefs who worship.
कथा दाशेमाग्नये कास्मै देवजुष्टोच्यते भामिने गीः|	how shall we pay oblation unto agni what hymn godloved is said to him refulgent.
यो मर्त्येष्वम्र्त रतावा होता यजिष्ठ इत कर्णोति देवान|	who deathless true to law mid men a herald bringeth the gods as best of sacrificers.
यो अध्वरेषु शन्तम रतावा होता तमू नमोभिरा कर्णुध्वम|	bring him with reverence hither most propitious in sacrifices true to law the herald.
अग्निर्यद वेर्मर्ताय देवान स चा बोधाति मनसायजाति|	for agni when he seeks the gods for mortals knows them full well and worships them in spirit.
स हि करतुः स मर्यः स साधुर्मित्रो न भूदद्भुतस्य रथीः|	for he is mental power a man and perfect he is the bringer friendlike of the wondrous.
तं मेधेषु परथमं देवयन्तीर्विश उप बरुवते दस्ममारीः|	the pious Āryan tribes at sacrifices address them first to him who doeth marvels.
स नो नर्णां नर्तमो रिशाद अग्निर्गिरोअवसा वेतु धीतिम|	may agni foedestroyer manliest hero accept with love our hymns and our devotion.
तना च ये मघवानः शविष्ठ वाजप्रसूता इषयन्तमन्म|	so may the liberal lords whose strength is strongest urged by their riches stir our thoughts with vigour.
एवाग्निर्गोतमेभिर्र्तावा विप्रेभिरस्तोष्ट जातवेदाः|	thus agni jātavedas true to order hath by the priestly gotamas been lauded.
स एषु दयुम्नं पीपयत स वाजं स पुष्टिं याति जोषमा चिकित्वान|	may he augment in them splendour and vigour observant as he lists he gathers increase.
आ तवा वहन्तु हरयो वर्षणं सोमपीतये|	let thy bay steeds bring thee the strong hither to drink the soma draught.
इन्द्र तवा सूरचक्षसः|	those indra who are bright as suns.
इमा धाना घर्तस्नुवो हरी इहोप वक्षतः|	here are the grains bedewed with oil hither let the bay coursers bring.
इन्द्रं सुखतमे रथे|	indra upon his easiest car.
इन्द्रं परातर्हवामह इन्द्रं परयत्यध्वरे|	indra at early morn we call indra in course of sacrifice.
इन्द्रं सोमस्य पीतये|	indra to drink the soma juice.
उप नः सुतमा गहि हरिभिरिन्द्र केशिभिः|	come hither with thy longmaned steeds o indra to he draught we pour.
सुते हि तवाहवामहे|	we call thee when the juice is shed.
सेमं न सतोमं आ गह्युपेदं सवनं सुतम|	come thou to this our song of praise to the libation poured for thee.
गौरो नत्र्षितः पिब|	drink of it like a stag athirst.
इमे सोमास इन्दवः सुतासो अधि बर्हिषि|	here are the drops of soma juice expressed on sacred grass thereof.
तानिन्द्र सहसेपिब|	drink indra to increase thy might.
अयं ते सतोमो अग्रियो हर्दिस्प्र्गस्तु शन्तमः|	welcome to thee be this our hymn reaching thy heart most excellent.
अथा सोमंसुतं पिब|	then drink the soma juice expressed.
विश्वमित सवनं सुतमिन्द्रो मदाय गछति|	to every draught of pressedout juice indra the vṛtraslayer comes.
वर्त्रहा सोमपीतये|	to drink the soma for delight.
सेमं नः काममा पर्ण गोभिरश्वैः शतक्रतो|	fulfil o Śatakratu all our wish with horses and with kine.
सतवाम तवा सवाध्यः|	with holy thoughts we sing thy praise.
सुषुमा यातमद्रिभिर्गोश्रीता मत्सरा इमे सोमासो मत्सरा इमे|	with stones have we pressed out o come these gladdening drops are blent with milk these somadrops which gladden you.
आ राजाना दिविस्प्र्शास्मत्रा गन्तमुप नः|	come to us kings who reach to heaven approach us coming hitherward.
इमे वां मित्रावरुणा गवाशिरः सोमाः शुक्रा गवाशिरः|	these milky drops are yours mitra and varuṇa bright soma juices blent with milk.
इम आ यातम इन्दवः सोमासो दध्याशिरः सुतासो दध्याशिरः|	here are the droppings come ye nigh the somadroppings blent with curd juices expressed and blent with curd.
उत वाम उषसो बुधि साकं सूर्यस्य रश्मिभिः|	now for the wakening of your dawn together with the sungods rays.
सुतो मित्राय वरुणाय पीतये चारुर रताय पीतये|	juice waits for mitra and for varuṇa to drink fair juice for drink for sacrifice.
तां वां धेनुं न वासरीम अंशुं दुहन्त्य अद्रिभिः सोमं दुहन्त्य अद्रिभिः|	as twere a radiantcoloured cow they milk with stones the stalk for you with stones they milk the somaplant.
अस्मत्रा गन्तम उप नो ऽरवाञ्चा सोमपीतये|	may ye come nigh us may ye turn hither to drink the soma juice.
अयं वाम मित्रावरुणा नर्भिः सुतः सोम आ पीतये सुतः|	the men pressed out this juice mitra and varuṇa pressed out this soma for your drink.
परातर्युजा वि बोधयाश्विनावेह गछताम|	waken the aśvin pair who yoke their car at early morn may they.
अस्य सोमस्य पीतये|	approach to drink this soma juice.
या सुरथा रथीतमोभा देवा दिविस्प्र्शा|	we call the aśvins twain the gods borne in a noble car the best.
अश्विना ता हवामहे|	of charioteers who reach the heavens.
या वां कशा मधुमत्यश्विना सून्र्तावती|	dropping with honey is your whip aśvins and full of pleasantness.
तया यज्ञं मिमिक्षतम|	sprinkle therewith the sacrifice.
नहि वामस्ति दूरके यत्रा रथेन गछथः|	as ye go thither in your car not far o aśvins is the home.
अश्विना सोमिनो गर्हम|	of him who offers soma juice.
हिरण्यपाणिमूतये सवितारमुप हवये|	for my protection i invoke the goldenhanded savitar.
स चेत्ता देवतापदम|	he knoweth as a god the place.
अपां नपातमवसे सवितारमुप सतुहि|	that he may send us succour praise the waters offspring savitar.
तस्य वरतान्युश्मसि|	fain are we for his holy ways.
विभक्तारं हवामहे वसोश्चित्रस्य राधसः|	we call on him distributer of wondrous bounty and of wealth.
सवितारंन्र्चक्षसम|	on savitar who looks on men.
सखाय आ नि षीदत सविता सतोम्यो नु नः|	come hither friends and seat yourselves savitar to be praised by us.
दाता राधांसि शुम्भति|	giving good gifts is beautiful.
अग्ने पत्नीरिहा वह देवानामुशतीरुप|	o agni hither bring to us the willing spouses of the gods.
तवष्टारं सोमपीतये|	and tvaṣṭar to the soma draught.
आ गना अग्न इहावसे होत्रां यविष्ठ भारतीम|	most youthful agni hither bring their spouses hotrā bhāratī.
वरूत्रीं धिषणां वह|	varūtrī dhiṣaṇā for aid.
अभी नो देवीरवसा महः शर्मणा नर्पत्नीः|	spouses of heroes goddesses with whole wings may they come to us.
अछिन्नपत्राः सचन्ताम|	with great protection and with aid.
इहेन्द्राणीमुप हवये वरुणानीं सवस्तये|	indrāṇī varuṇānī and agnāyī hither i invite.
अग्नायीं सोमपीतये|	for weal to drink the soma juice.
मही दयौः पर्थिवी च न इमं यज्ञं मिमिक्षताम|	may heaven and earth the mighty pair bedew for us our sacrifice.
पिप्र्तां नो भरीमभिः|	and feed us full with nourishments.
तयोरिद घर्तवत पयो विप्रा रिहन्ति धीतिभिः|	their water rich with fatness there in the gandharvas steadfast place.
गन्धर्वस्य धरुवे पदे|	the singers taste through sacred songs.
सयोना पर्थिवि भवान्र्क्षरा निवेशनी|	thornless be thou o earth spread wide before us for a dwellingplace.
यछा नः शर्म सप्रथः|	vouchsafe us shelter broad and sure.
अतो देवा अवन्तु नो यतो विष्णुर्विचक्रमे|	the gods be gracious unto us even from the place whence viṣṇu strode.
पर्थिव्याः सप्तधामभिः|	through the seven regions of the earth.
इदं विष्णुर्वि चक्रमे तरेधा नि दधे पदम|	through all this world strode viṣṇu thrice his foot he planted and the whole.
समूळ्हमस्य पांसुरे|	was gathered in his footsteps dust.
तरीणि पदा वि चक्रमे विष्णुर्गोपा अदाभ्यः|	viṣṇu the guardian he whom none deceiveth made three steps thenceforth.
अतो धर्माणि धारयन|	establishing his high decrees.
विष्णोः कर्माणि पश्यत यतो वरतानि पस्पशे|	look ye on viṣṇus works whereby the friend of indra closeallied.
इन्द्रस्य युज्यः सखा|	hath let his holy ways be seen.
तद विष्णोः परमं पदं सदा पश्यन्ति सूरयः|	the princes evermore behold that loftiest place where viṣṇu is.
दिवीव चक्षुराततम|	laid as it were an eye in heaven.
तद विप्रासो विपन्यवो जाग्र्वांसः समिन्धते|	this viṣṇus station most sublime the singers ever vigilant.
विष्णोर्यत परमं पदम|	lovers of holy song light up.
युवं वस्त्रणि पुवसा वसाथे युवोरछिद्रा मन्तवो ह सर्गाः|	the robes which ye put on abound with fatness uninterrupted courses are your counsels.
अवातिरतमन्र्तानि विश्व रतेन मित्रावरुणा सचेथे|	all falsehood mitravaruṇa ye conquer and closely cleave unto the law eternal.
एतच्चन तवो वि चिकेतदेषां सत्यो मन्त्रः कविशस्त रघावान|	this might of theirs hath no one comprehended true is the crushing word the sage hath uttered.
तरिरश्रिं हन्ति चतुरश्रिरुग्रो देवनिदो ह परथमाजूर्यन|	the fearful fouredged bolt smites down the threeedged and those who hate the gods first fall and perish.
अपादेति परथमा पद्वतीनां कस्तद वां मित्रावरुणा चिकेत|	the footless maid precedeth footed creatures who marketh mitravaruṇa this your doing.
गर्भो भारं भरत्या चिदस्य रतं पिपर्त्यन्र्तं नि तारीत|	the babe unborn supporteth this worlds burthen fulfilleth law and overcometh falsehood.
परयन्तमित परि जारं कनीनां पश्यामसि नोपनिपद्यमानम|	we look on him the darling of the maidens always advancing never falling downward.
अनवप्र्ग्णा वितता वसानं परियं मित्रस्य वरुणस्य धाम|	wearing inseparable widespread raiment mitras and varuṇas delightful glory.
अनश्वो जातो अनभीशुरर्वा कनिक्रदत पतयदूर्ध्वसानुः|	unbridled courser born but not of horses neighing he flieth on with back uplifted.
अचित्तं बरह्म जुजुषुर्युवानः पर मित्रे धाम वरुणेग्र्णन्तः|	the youthful love mystery thoughtsurpassing praising in mitravaruṇa its glory.
आ धेनवो मामतेयमवन्तीर्ब्रह्मप्रियं पीपयन सस्मिन्नूधन|	may the milchkine who favour māmateya prosper in this world him who loves devotion.
पित्वो भिक्षेत वयुनानि विद्वानासाविवासन्नदितिमुरुष्येत|	may he well skilled in rites be food and calling aditi with his lips give us assistance.
आ वां मित्रावरुणा हव्यजुष्टिं नमसा देवाववसा वव्र्त्याम|	gods mitravaruṇa with love and worship let me make you delight in this oblation.
अस्माकं बरह्म पर्तनासु सह्या अस्माकं वर्ष्टिर्दिव्यासुपारा|	may our prayer be victorious in battles may we have rain from heaven to make us prosper.
इहेन्द्राग्नी उप हवये तयोरित सतोममुश्मसि|	indra and agni i invoke fain are we for their song of praise.
ता सोमं सोमपातमा|	chief somadrinkers are they both.
ता यज्ञेषु पर शंसतेन्द्राग्नी शुम्भता नरः|	praise ye o men and glorify indraagni in the holy rites.
ता गायत्रेषु गायत|	sing praise to them in sacred songs.
ता मित्रस्य परशस्तय इन्द्राग्नी ता हवामहे|	indra and agni we invite the somadrinkers for the fame.
सोमपा सोमपीतये|	of mitra to the somadraught.
उग्रा सन्ता हवामह उपेदं सवनं सुतम|	strong gods we bid them come to this libation that stands ready here.
इन्द्राग्नी एह गछताम|	indra and agni come to us.
ता महान्ता सदस्पती इन्द्राग्नी रक्ष उब्जतम|	indra and agni mighty lords of our assembly crush the fiends.
अप्रजाःसन्त्वत्रिणः|	childless be the devouring ones.
तेन सत्येन जाग्र्तमधि परचेतुने पदे|	watch ye through this your truthfulness there in the place of spacious view.
इन्द्राग्नी शर्म यछतम|	indra and agni send us bliss.
ईळे दयावाप्र्थिवी पूर्वचित्तयेअग्निं घर्मं सुरुचं यामन्निष्टये|	to give first thought to them i worship heaven and earth and agni fair bright glow to hasten their approach.
याभिर्भरे कारमंशाय जिन्वथस्ताभिरू षु ऊतिभिरश्विना गतम|	come hither unto us o aśvins with those aids wherewith in fight ye speed the warcry to the spoil.
युवोर्दानाय सुभरा असश्चतो रथमा तस्थुर्वचसं न मन्तवे|	ample unfailing they have mounted as it were an eloquent car that ye may think of us and give.
याभिर्धियोअवथःकर्मन्निष्टये ताभिर|	come hither unto us o aśvins with those aids wherewith ye help our thoughts to further holy acts.
युवं तासां दिव्यस्य परशासने विशां कषयथो अम्र्तस्यमज्मना|	ye by the might which heavenly nectar giveth you are in supreme dominion lords of all these folk.
याभिर्धेनुमस्वं पिन्वथो नरा ताभिर|	come hither unto us o aśvins with those aids wherewith ye heroes made the barren cow give milk.
याभिः परिज्मा तनयस्य मज्मना दविमाता तूर्षु तरणिर्विभूषति|	the aids wherewith the wanderer through his offsprings might or the twomothered son shows swiftest mid the swift.
याभिस्त्रिमन्तुरभवद विचक्षणस्ताभिर|	wherewith the sapient one acquired his triple lorecome hither unto us o aśvins with those aids.
याभी रेभं निव्र्तं सितमद्भ्य उद वन्दनमैरयतं सवर्द्र्शे|	wherewith ye raised from waters prisoned and fast bound rebha and vandana to look upon the light.
याभिः कण्वं पर सिषासन्तमावतं ताभिर|	wherewith ye succoured kaṇva as he strove to wincome hither unto us o aśvins with those aids.
याभिरन्तकं जसमानमारणे भुज्यं याभिरव्यथिभिर्जिजिन्वथुः|	wherewith ye rescued antaka when languishing deep in the pit and bhujyu with unfailing help.
याभिः कर्कन्धुं वय्यं च जिन्वथस्ताभिर|	and comforted karkandhu vayya in their woecome hither unto us o aśvins with those aids.
याभिः शुचन्तिं धनसां सुषंसदं तप्तं घर्ममोम्यावन्तमत्रये|	wherewith ye gave Śucanti wealth and happy home and made the fiery pit friendly for atris sake.
याभिः पर्ष्निगुं पुरुकुत्समावतं ताभिर|	wherewith ye guarded purukutsa pṛśnigucome hither unto us o aśvin with those aids.
याभिः शचीभिर्व्र्षणा पराव्र्जं परान्धं शरोणं चक्षस एतवे कर्थः|	mighty ones with what powers ye gave parāvṛj aid what time ye made the blind and lame to see and walk.
याभिर्वर्तिकां गरसिताममुञ्चतन्ताभिर|	wherewith ye set at liberty the swallowed quailcome hither unto us o aśvins with those aids.
याभिः सिन्धुं मधुमन्तमसश्चतं वसिष्ठं याभिरजरावजिन्वतम|	wherewith ye quickened the most sweet exhaustless flood and comforted vasiṣṭha ye who neer decay.
याभिः कुत्सं शरुतर्यं नर्यमावतं ताभिर|	and to Śrutarya kutsa narya gave your helpcome hither unto us o aśvins with those aids.
याभिर्विश्पलां धनसामथर्व्यं सहस्रमीळ्ह आजावजिन्वतम|	wherewith ye helped in battle of a thousand spoils viśpalā seeking booty powerless to move.
याभिर्वशमश्व्यं परेणिमावतं ताभिर|	wherewith ye guarded friendly vaśa aśvas soncome hither unto us o aśvins with those aids.
याभिः सुदानू औशिजाय वणिजे दीर्घश्रवसे मधु कोशोक्षरत|	whereby the cloud ye bounteous givers shed sweet rain for dīrghaśravas for the merchant auśija.
कक्षीवन्तं सतोतारं याभिरावतं ताभिर|	wherewith ye helped kakṣīvān singer of your praisecome hither unto us o aśvins with those aids.
याभी रसां कषोदसोद्नः पिपिन्वथुरनश्वं याभी रथमावतं जिषे|	wherewith ye made rasā swell full with waterfloods and urged to victory the car without a horse.
याभिस्त्रिशोक उस्रिया उदाजत ताभिर|	wherewith triśoka drove forth his recovered cowscome hither unto us o aśvins with those aids.
याभिः सूर्यं परियाथः परावति मन्धातारं कषैत्रपत्येष्वावतम|	wherewith ye compass round the sun when far away strengthened mandhātar in his tasks as lord of lands.
याभिर्विप्रं पर भरद्वाजमावतं ताभिर|	and to sage bharadvāja gave protecting helpcome hither unto us o aśvins with those aids.
याभिर्महामतिथिग्वं कशोजुवं दिवोदासं शम्बरहत्यावतम|	wherewith when Śambara was slain ye guarded well great atithigva divodāsa kaśoju.
याभिः पूर्भिद्ये तरसदस्युमावतं ताभिर|	and trasadasyu when the forts were shattered downcome hither unto us o aśvins with those aids.
याभिर्वम्रं विपिपानमुपस्तुतं कलिं याभिर्वित्तजानिं दुवस्यथः|	wherewith ye honoured the great drinker vamra and upastuta and kali when he gained his wife.
याभिर्व्यश्वमुत पर्थिमावतं ताभिर|	and lent to vyaśva and to pṛthi favouring helpcome hither unto us o aśvins with those aids.
याभिर्नरा शयवे याभिरत्रये याभिः पुरा मनवे गातुमीषथुः|	wherewith o heroes ye vouchsafed deliverance to Śayu atri and to manu long ago.
याभिः शारीराजतं सयूमरश्मये ताभिर|	wherewith ye shot your shafts in syūmaraśmis causecome hither unto us o aśvins with those aids.
याभिः पठर्वा जठरस्य मज्मनाग्निर्नादीदेच्चित इद्धो अज्मन्ना|	wherewith paṭharvā in his majesty of form shone in his course like to a gathered kindled fire.
याभिः शर्यातमवथो महाधने ताभिर|	wherewith ye helped Śāryāta in the mighty fraycome hither unto us o aśvins with those aids.
याभिरङगिरो मनसा निरण्यथोअग्रं गछथो विवरे गोर्णसः|	wherewith aṅgirases ye triumphed in your heart and onward went to liberate the flood of milk.
याभिर्मनुं शूरमिषा समावतं ताभिर|	wherewith ye helped the hero manu with new strengthcome hither unto us o aśvins with those aids.
याभिः पत्नीर्विमदाय नयूहथुरा घ वा याभिररुणीरशिक्षतम|	wherewith ye brought a wife for vimada to wed wherewith ye freely gave the ruddy cows away.
याभिः सुदास ऊहथुः सुदेव्यं ताभिर|	wherewith ye brought the host of kind gods to sudāscome hither unto us o aśvins with those aids.
याभिः शन्ताती भवथो ददाशुषे भुज्युं याभिरवथो याभिरध्रिगुम|	wherewith ye bring great bliss to him who offers gifts wherewith ye have protected bhujyu adhrigu.
ओम्यावतीं सुभरां रतस्तुभं ताभिर|	and good and gracious subharā and Ṛtastupcome hither unto us o aśvins with those aids.
याभिः कर्शानुमसने दुवस्यथो जवे याभिर्यूनो अर्वन्तमावतम|	wherewith ye served kṛśānu where the shafts were shot and helped the young mans horse to swiftness in the race.
मधु परियं भरथो यत सरड्भ्यस्ताभिर|	wherewith ye bring delicious honey to the beescome hither unto us o aśvins with those aids.
याभिर्नरं गोषुयुधं नर्षाह्ये कषेत्रस्य साता तनयस्य जिन्वथः|	wherewith ye speed the hero as he fights for kine in hero battle in the strife for land and sons.
याभी रथानवथो याभिरर्वतस्ताभिर|	wherewith ye safely guard his horses and his carcome hither unto us o aśvins with those aids.
याभिः कुत्समार्जुनेयं शतक्रतू पर तुर्वीतिं पर च दभीतिमावतम|	wherewith ye lords of hundred powers helped kutsa son of Ārjuni gave turvīti and dabhīti strength.
याभिर्ध्वसन्तिं पुरुषन्तिमावतं ताभिर|	favoured dhvasanti and lent puruṣanti helpcome hither unto us o aśvins with those aids.
अप्नस्वतीमश्विना वाचमस्मे कर्तं नो दस्रा वर्षणा मनीषाम|	make ye our speech effectual o ye aśvins and this our hymn ye mighty wonderworkers.
अद्यूत्येअवसे नि हवये वां वर्धे च नो भवतं वाजसातौ|	in luckless game i call on you for succour strengthen us also on the field of battle.
दयुभिरक्तुभिः परि पातमस्मानरिष्टेभिरश्विना सौभगेभिः|	with undiminished blessings o ye aśvins for evermore both night and day protect us.
तन नो|	this prayer of ours may varuṇa grant and mitra and aditi and sindhu earth and heaven.
वनेषु जायुर्मर्तेषु मित्रो वर्णीते शरुष्टिं राजेवाजुर्यम|	victorious in the wood friend among men ever he claims obedience as a king.
कषेमो न साधुः करतुर्न भद्रो भुवत सवाधिर्होता हव्यवाट|	gracious like peace blessing like mental power priest was he offeringbearer full of thought.
हस्ते दधानो नर्म्णा विश्वान्यमे देवान धाद गुहा निषीदन|	he bearing in his hand all manly might crouched in the cavern struck the gods with fear.
विदन्तीमत्र नरो धियन्धा हर्दा यत तष्टान मन्त्रानशंसन|	men filled with understanding find him there when they have sting prayers formed within their heart.
अजो न कषां दाधार पर्थिवीं तस्तम्भ दयां मन्त्रेभिः सत्यैः|	he like the unborn holds the broad earth up and with effective utterance fixed the sky.
परिया पदानि पश्वो नि पाहि विश्वायुरग्ने गुहा गुहं गाः|	o agni guard the spots which cattle love thou life of all hast gone from lair to lair.
य ईं चिकेत गुहा भवन्तमा यः ससाद धारां रतस्य|	whoso hath known him dwelling in his lair and hath approached the stream of holy law.
वि ये चर्तन्त्य रता सपन्त आदिद वसूनि पर ववाचास्मै|	they who release him paying sacred ritestruly to such doth he announce great wealth.
वि यो वीरुत्सु रोधन महित्वोत परजा उत परसूष्वन्तः|	he who grows mightily in herbs within each fruitful mother and each babe she bears.
चित्तिरपां दमे विश्वायुः सद्मेव धीराः सम्माय चक्रुः|	wise life of all men in the waters homefor him have sages built as twere a seat.
पर वः पान्तं रघुमन्यवोअन्धो यज्ञं रुद्राय मीळ्हुषे भरद्वम|	say bringing sacrifice to bounteous rudra this juice for drink to you whose wrath is fleeting.
दिवो अस्तोष्यसुरस्य वीरैरिषुध्येव मरुतो रोदस्योः|	with dyaus the asuras heroes i have lauded the maruts as with prayer to earth and heaven.
पत्नीव पूर्वहूतिं वाव्र्धध्या उषासानक्ता पुरुधा विदाने|	strong to exalt the early invocation are night and dawn who show with varied aspect.
सतरीर नात्कं वयुतं वसाना सूर्यस्य शरिया सुद्र्शी हिरण्यैः|	the barren clothes her in widewoven raiment and fair morn shines with sūryas golden splendour.
ममत्तु नः परिज्मा वसर्हा ममत्तु वातो अपां वर्षण्वान|	cheer us the roamer round who strikes at morning the wind delight us pourer forth of waters.
शिशीतमिन्द्रापर्वता युवं नस्तन नो विश्वे वरिवस्यन्तुदेवाः|	sharpen our wits o parvata and indra may all the gods vouchsafe to us this favour.
उत तया मे यशसा शवेतनायै वयन्ता पान्तौशिजो हुवध्यै|	and auśija shall call for me that famous pair who enjoy and drink who come to brighten.
पर वो नपातमपां कर्णुध्वं पर मातरा रास्पिनस्यायोः|	set ye the offspring of the floods before you both mothers of the living one who beameth.
आ वो रुवण्युमौशिजो हुवध्यै घोषेव शंसमर्जुनस्य नंशे|	for you shall auśija call him who thunders as to win arjunas assent cried ghoṣā.
पर वः पूष्णे दावन आनछा वोचेय वसुतातिमग्नेः|	i will invoke that pūṣan may be bounteous to you the rich munificence of agni.
शरुतं मे मित्रावरुणा हवेमोत शरुतं सदने विश्वतः सीम|	hear mitravaruṇa these mine invocations hear them from all men in the hall of worship.
शरोतु नः शरोतुरातिः सुश्रोतुः सुक्षेत्रा सिन्धुरद्भिः|	giver of famous gifts kind hearer sindhu who gives fair fields listen with all his waters.
सतुषे सा वां वरुण मित्र रातिर्गवां शता पर्क्षयामेषु पज्रे|	praised mitra varuṇa is your gift a hundred cows to the pṛkṣayāmas and the pajra.
शरुतरथे परियरथे दधानाः सद्यः पुष्टिंनिरुन्धानासो अग्मन|	presented by carfamous priyaratha supplying nourishment they came directly.
अस्य सतुषे महिमघस्य राधः सचा सनेम नहुषः सुवीराः|	praised is the gift of him the very wealthy may we enjoy it men with hero children.
जनो यः पज्रेभ्यो वाजिनीवानश्वावतो रथिनो मह्यं सूरिः|	his who hath many gifts to give the pajras a chief who makes me rich in cars and horses.
जनो यो मित्रावरुणावभिध्रुगपो न वां सुनोत्यक्ष्णयाध्रुक|	the folk o mitravaruṇa who hate you who sinfully hating pour you no libations.
सवयं स यक्ष्मं हर्दये नि धत्त आप यदीं होत्राभिर्र्तावा|	lay in their hearts themselves a wasting sickness whereas the righteous gaineth all by worship.
स वराधतो नहुषो दंसुजूतः शर्धस्तरो नरां गूर्तश्रवाः|	that man most puissant wondrously urged onward famed among heroes liberal in giving.
विस्र्ष्टरातिर्याति बाळ्हस्र्त्वा विश्वासु पर्त्सु सदमिच्छूरः|	moveth a warrior evermore undaunted in all encounters even with the mighty.
अध गमन्ता नहुषो हवं सूरेः शरोता राजानो अम्र्तस्य मन्द्राः|	come to the mans the sacrificers calling hear kings of immortality joygivers.
नभोजुवो यन निरवस्य राधः परशस्तये महिनारथवते|	while ye who speed through clouds decree your bounty largely for fame to him the chariot rider.
एतं शर्धं धाम यस्य सूरेरित्यवोचन दशतयस्य नंशे|	vigour will we bestow on that adorer whose tenfold draught we come to taste so spake they.
दयुम्नानि येषु वसुताती रारन विश्वे सन्वन्तु परभ्र्थेषु वाजम|	may all in whom rest splendour and great riches obtain refreshment in these sacrifices.
मन्दामहे दशतयस्य धासेर्द्विर्यत पञ्च बिभ्रतो यन्त्यन्ना|	we will rejoice to drink the tenfold present when the twicefive come bearing sacred viands.
किमिष्टाश्व इष्टरश्मिरेत ईशानासस्तरुषर्ञ्जते नॄन|	what can he do whose steeds and reins are choicest these the allpotent urge brave men to conquest.
हिरण्यकर्णं मणिग्रीवमर्णस्तन नो विश्वे वरिवस्यन्तु देवाः|	the sea and all the deities shall give us him with the golden ear and neck bejewelled.
अर्यो गिरः सद्य आ जग्मुषीरोस्राश्चाकन्तूभयेष्वस्मे|	dawns hasting to the praises of the pious be pleased with us both offerers and singers.
चत्वारो मा मशर्शारस्य शिश्वस्त्रयो राज्ञ आयवसस्यजिष्णोः|	four youthful sons of maśarśāra vex me three of the king the conquering ayavasa.
रथो वां मित्रावरुणा दीर्घापसाः सयूमगभस्तिः सूरो नाद्यौत|	now like the sun o varuṇa and mitra your car hath shone longshaped and reined with splendour.
एतायामोप गव्यन्त इन्द्रमस्माकं सु परमतिं वाव्र्धाति|	come fain for booty let us seek to indra yet more shall he increase his care that guides us.
अनाम्र्णः कुविदादस्य रायो गवां केतं परमावर्जते नः|	will not the indestructible endow us with perfect knowledge of this wealth of cattle.
उपेदहं धनदामप्रतीतं जुष्टं न शयेनो वसतिम्पतामि|	i fly to him invisible wealthgiver as flies the falcon to his cherished eyrie.
इन्द्रं नमस्यन्नुपमेभिरर्कैर्यः सतोत्र्भ्यो हव्यो अस्ति यामन|	with fairest hymns of praise adoring indra whom those who laud him must invoke in battle.
नि सर्वसेन इषुधीन्रसक्त समर्यो गा अजति यस्य वष्टि|	mid all his host he bindeth on the quiver he driveth cattle from what foe he pleaseth.
चोष्कूयमाण इन्द्र भूरि वामं मा पणिर्भूरस्मदधि परव्र्द्ध|	gathering up great store of riches indra be thou no trafficker with us most mighty.
वधीर्हि दस्युं धनिनं घनेननेकश्चरन्नुपशाकेभिरिन्द्र|	thou slewest with thy bolt the wealthy dasyu alone yet going with thy helpers indra.
धनोरधि विषुणक ते वयायन्नयज्वनः सनकाः परेतिमीयुः|	far from the floor of heaven in all directions the ancient riteless ones fled to destruction.
परा चिच्छीर्षा वव्र्जुस्त इन्द्रायज्वानो यज्वभिः सपर्धमानाः|	fighting with pious worshippers the riteless turned and fled indra with averted faces.
पर यद दिवो हरिव सथातरुग्र निरव्रतानधमोरोदस्योः|	when thou fierce lord of the bay steeds the stayer blewest from earth and heaven and sky the godless.
अयुयुत्सन्ननवद्यस्य सेनामयातयन्त कषितयो नवग्वाः|	they met in fight the army of the blameless then the navagvas put forth all their power.
वर्षायुधो न वध्रयो निरष्टाः परवद्भिरिन्द्राच्चितयन्त आयन|	they like emasculates with men contending fled conscious by steep paths from indra scattered.
तवमेतान रुदतो जक्षतश्चायोधयो रजस इन्द्र पारे|	whether they weep or laugh thou hast oerthrown them o indra on the skys extremest limit.
अवादहो दिव आ दस्युमुच्चा पर सुन्वतः सतुवतः शंसमावः|	the dasyu thou hast burned from heaven and welcomed the prayer of him who pours the juice and lauds thee.
चक्राणासः परीणहं पर्थिव्या हिरण्येन मणिना शुम्भमानाः|	adorned with their array of gold and jewels they oer the earth a covering veil extended.
न हिन्वानासस्तितिरुस्त इन्द्रं परि सपशो अदधात सूर्येण|	although they hastened they oercame not indra their spies he compassed with the sun of morning.
परि यदिन्द्र रोदसी उभे अबुभोजीर्महिना विश्वतः सीम|	as thou enjoyest heaven and earth o indra on every side surrounded with thy greatness.
अमन्यमानानभि मन्यमानैर्निर्ब्रह्मभिरधमो दस्युमिन्द्र|	so thou with priests hast blown away the dasyu and those who worship not with those who worship.
न ये दिवः पर्थिव्या अन्तमापुर्न मायाभिर्धनदां पर्यभूवन|	they who pervaded earths extremest limit subdued not with their charms the wealthbestower.
युजं वज्रं वर्षभश्चक्र इन्द्रो निर्ज्योतिषा तमसो गा अदुक्षत|	indra the bull made his ally the thunder and with its light milked cows from out the darkness.
अनु सवधामक्षरन्नापो अस्यावर्धत मध्य आ नाव्यानाम|	the waters flowed according to their nature he raid the navigable streams waxed mighty.
सध्रीचीनेन मनसा तमिन्द्र ओजिष्ठेन हन्मनाहन्नभि दयून|	then indra with his spirit concentrated smote him for ever with his strongest weapon.
नयाविध्यदिलीबिशस्य दर्ल्हा वि शर्ङगिणमभिनच्छुष्णमिन्द्रः|	indra broke through ilībiśas strong castles and Śuṣṇa with his horn he cut to pieces.
यावत तरो मघवन यावदोजो वज्रेण शत्रुमवधीः पर्तन्युम|	thou maghavan for all his might and swiftness slewest thy fighting foeman with thy thunder.
अभि सिध्मो अजिगादस्य शत्रून वि तिग्मेन वर्षभेण पुरोअभेत|	fierce on his enemies fell indras weapon with his sharp bull he rent their forts in pieces.
सं वज्रेणास्र्जद वर्त्रमिन्द्रः पर सवां मतिमतिरच्छाशदानः|	he with his thunderbolt dealt blows on vṛtra and conquered executing all his purpose.
आवः कुत्सम इन्द्र यस्मि चाकन परावो युध्यन्तं वर्षभं दशद्युम|	indra thou helpest kutsa whom thou lovedst and guardedst brave daśadyu when he battled.
शफच्युतो रेणुर नक्षत दयाम उच छवैत्रेयो नर्षाह्याय तस्थौ|	the dust of trampling horses rose to heaven and Śvitrās son stood up again for conquest.
आवः शमं वर्षभं तुग्र्यासु कषेत्रजेषे मघवञ्छ्वित्र्यं गाम|	Śvitrās mild steer o maghavan thou helpest in combat for the land mid tugras houses.
जयोक चिद अत्र तस्थिवांसो अक्रञ्छत्रूयताम अधरा वेदनाकः|	long stood they there before the task was ended thou wast the master of the foemens treasure.
इन्द्र सोमं पिब रतुना तवा विशन्त्विन्दवः|	o indra drink the soma juice with Ṛtu let the cheering drops.
मत्सरासस्तदोकसः|	sink deep within which settle there.
मरुतः पिबत रतुना पोत्राद यज्ञं पुनीतन|	drink from the purifiers cup maruts with Ṛtu sanctify.
यूयं हि षठा सुदानवः|	the rite for ye give precious gifts.
अभि यज्ञं गर्णीहि नो गनावो नेष्टः पिब रतुना|	o neṣṭar with thy dame accept our sacrifice with Ṛtu drink.
तवंहि रत्नधा असि|	for thou art he who giveth wealth.
अग्ने देवानिहा वह सादया योनिषु तरिषु|	bring the gods agni in the three appointed places set them down.
परि भूष पिब रतुना|	surround them and with Ṛtu drink.
बराह्मणादिन्द्र राधसः पिबा सोमं रतून्रनु|	drink soma after the Ṛtus from the brāhmaṇas bounty undissolved.
तवेद धि सख्यमस्त्र्तम|	o indra is thy friendships bond.
युवं दक्षं धर्तव्रत मित्रावरुण दूळभम|	mitra varuṇa ye whose ways are firma power that none deceives.
रतुना यज्ञमाशाथे|	with Ṛtu ye have reached the rite.
दरविणोदा दरविणसो गरावहस्तासो अध्वरे|	the somapressers fain for wealth praise the wealthgiver in the rite.
यज्ञेषु देवमीळते|	in sacrifices praise the god.
दरविणोदा ददातु नो वसूनि यानि शर्ण्विरे|	may the wealthgiver grant to us riches that shall be far renowned.
देवेषु ता वनामहे|	these things we gain among the gods.
दरविणोदाः पिपीषति जुहोत पर च तिष्ठत|	he with the Ṛtu fain would drink wealthgiver from the neṣṭars bowl.
नेष्ट्राद रतुभिरिष्यत|	haste give your offering and depart.
यत तवा तुरीयं रतुभिर्द्रविणोदो यजामहे|	as we this fourth time wealthgiver honour thee with the Ṛtus be.
