अध समा नो ददिर्भव|	a giver bountiful to us.
अश्विना पिबतं मधु दीद्यग्नी शुचिव्रत|	drink ye the meath o aśvins bright with flames whose acts are pure who with.
रतुना यज्ञवाहसा|	Ṛtus accept the sacrifice.
गार्हपत्येन सन्त्य रतुना यज्ञनीरसि|	with Ṛtu through the housefire thou kind giver guidest sacrifice.
देवान देवयते यज|	worship the gods for the pious man.
पराता रत्नं परातरित्वा दधाति तं चिकित्वान परतिग्र्ह्यानि धत्ते|	coming at early morn he gives his treasure the prudent one receives and entertains him.
तेन परजां वर्धयमान आयू रायस पोषेण सचते सुवीरः|	thereby increasing still his life and offspring he comes with brave sons to abundant riches.
सुगुरसत सुहिरण्यः सवश्वो बर्हदस्मै वय इन्द्रो दधाति|	rich shall he be in gold and kine and horses indra bestows on him great vital power.
यस्त्वायन्तं वसुना परातरित्वो मुक्षीजयेव पदिमुत्सिनाति|	who stays thee as thou comest with his treasure like game caught in the net o early comer.
आयमद्य सुक्र्तं परातरिछन्निष्टेः पुत्रं वसुमता रथेन|	longing i came this morning to the pious the son of sacrifice with car wealthladen.
अंशोः सुतं पायय मत्सरस्य कषयद्वीरं वर्धय सून्र्ताभिः|	give him to drink juice of the stalk that gladdens prosper with pleasant hymns the lord of heroes.
उप कषरन्ति सिन्धवो मयोभुव ईजानं च यक्ष्यमाणं चधेनवः|	healthbringing streams as milchcows flow to profit him who hath worshipped him who now will worship.
पर्णन्तं च पपुरिं च शरवस्यवो घर्तस्य धारा उप यन्ति विश्वतः|	to him who freely gives and fills on all sides full streams of fatness flow and make him famous.
नाकस्य पर्ष्ठे अधि तिष्ठति शरितो यः पर्णाति स ह देवेषु गछति|	on the high ridge of heaven he stands exalted yea to the gods he goes the liberal giver.
तस्मा आपो घर्तमर्षन्ति सिन्धवस्तस्मा इयं दक्षिणा पिन्वते सदा|	the streams the waters flow for him with fatness to him this guerdon ever yields abundance.
दक्षिणावतामिदिमानि चित्रा दक्षिणावतां दिवि सूर्यासः|	for those who give rich meeds are all these splendours for those who give rich meeds suns shine in heaven.
दक्षिणावन्तो अम्र्तं भजन्ते दक्षिणावन्तः पर तिरन्त आयुः|	the givers of rich meeds are made immortal the givers of rich fees prolong their lifetime.
मा पर्णन्तो दुरितमेन आरन मा जारिषुः सूरयः सुव्रतासः|	let not the liberal sink to sin and sorrow never decay the pious chiefs who worship.
अन्यस्तेषां परिधिरस्तु कश्चिदप्र्णन्तमभि सं यन्तु शोकाः|	let every man besides be their protection and let affliction fall upon the niggard.
परपर पूष्णस तुविजातस्य शस्यते महित्वम अस्य तवसो न तन्दते सतोत्रम अस्य न तन्दते|	strong pūṣans majesty is lauded evermore the glory of his lordly might is never faint his song of praise is never faint.
अर्चामि सुम्नयन्न अहम अन्त्यूतिम मयोभुवम|	seeking felicity i laud him nigh to help the source of bliss.
विश्वस्य यो मन आयुयुवे मखो देव आयुयुवे मखः|	who vigorous one hath drawn to him the hearts of all drawn them the vigorous one the god.
पर हि तवा पूषन्न अजिरं न यामनि सतोमेभिः कर्ण्व रणवो यथा मर्ध उष्ट्रो न पीपरो मर्धः|	thee then o pūṣan like a swift one on his way i urge with lauds that thou mayst make the foemen flee drive camellike our foes afar.
हुवे यत तवा मयोभुवं देवं सख्याय मर्त्यः|	as i a man call thee a god giver of bliss to be my friend.
अस्माकम आङगूषान दयुम्निनस कर्धि वाजेषु दयुम्निनस कर्धि|	so make our loudlychanted praises glorious in battles make them glorious.
यस्य ते पूषन सख्ये विपन्यवः करत्वा चित सन्तो ऽवसा बुभुज्रिर इति करत्वा बुभुज्रिरे|	thou pūṣan in whose friendship they who sing forth praise enjoy advantage even in wisdom through thy grace in wisdom even they are advanced.
ताम अनु तवा नवीयसीं नियुतं राय ईमहे|	so after this most recent course we come to thee with prayers for wealth.
अहेळमान उरुशंस सरी भव वाजेवाजे सरी भव|	not stirred to anger o wideruler come to us come thou to us in every fight.
अस्या ऊ षु ण उप सातये भुवो ऽहेळमानो ररिवां अजाश्व शरवस्यताम अजाश्व|	not stirred to anger come freegiver nigh to us to take this gift of ours thou who hast goats for steeds goatborne their gift who long for fame.
ओ षु तवा वव्र्तीमहि सतोमेभिर दस्म साधुभिः|	so wonderworker may we turn thee hither with effectual lauds.
नहि तवा पूषन्न अतिमन्य आघ्र्णे न ते सख्यम अपह्नुवे|	i slight thee not o pūṣan thou resplendent one thy friendship may not be despised.
अस्मा इदु पर तवसे तुराय परयो न हर्मि सतोमं माहिनाय|	even to him swift strong and high exalted i bring my song of praise as dainty viands.
रचीषमायाध्रिगव ओहमिन्द्राय बरह्माणि राततमा|	my thought to him resistless praisedeserving prayers offered most especially to indra.
अस्मा इदु परय इव पर यंसि भराम्याङगूषं बाधे सुव्र्क्ति|	praise like oblation i present and utter aloud my song my fair hymn to the victor.
इन्द्राय हर्दा मनसा मनीषा परत्नाय पत्ये धियोमर्जयन्त|	for indra who is lord of old the singers have decked their lauds with heart and mind and spirit.
अस्मा इदु तयमुपमं सवर्षां भराम्याङगूषमास्येन|	to him then with my lips mine adoration winning heavens light most excellent i offer.
मंहिष्ठमछोक्तिभिर्मतीनां सुव्र्क्तिभिः सूरिं वाव्र्धध्यै|	to magnify with songs of invocation and with fair hymns the lord most bounteous giver.
अस्मा इदु सतोमं सं हिनोमि रथं न तष्टेव तत्सिनाय|	even for him i frame a laud as fashions the wright a chariot for the man who needs it.
गिरश्च गिर्वाहसे सुव्र्क्तीन्द्राय विश्वमिन्वं मेधिराय|	praises to him who gladly hears our praises a hymn wellformed allmoving to wise indra.
अस्मा इदु सप्तिमिव शरवस्येन्द्रायार्कं जुह्वा समञ्जे|	so with my tongue i deck to please that indra my hymn as twere a horse through love of glory.
वीरं दानौकसं वन्दध्यै पुरां गूर्तश्रवसं दर्माणम|	to reverence the hero bounteous giver famed far and wide destroyer of the castles.
अस्मा इदु तवष्टा तक्षद वज्रं सवपस्तमं सवर्यं रणाय|	even for him hath tvaṣṭar forged the thunder most deftly wrought celestial for the battle.
वर्त्रस्य चिद विदद येन मर्म तुजन्नीशानस्तुजता कियेधाः|	wherewith he reached the vital parts of vṛtra strikingthe vast the mighty with the striker.
अस्येदु मातुः सवनेषु सद्यो महः पितुं पपिवाञ्चार्वन्ना|	as soon as at libations of his mother great viṣṇu had drunk up the draught he plundered.
मुषायद विष्णुः पचतं सहीयान विध्यद वराहन्तिरो अद्रिमस्ता|	the dainty cates the cooked mess but one stronger transfixed the wild boar shooting through the mountain.
अस्मा इदु गनाश्चिद देवपत्नीरिन्द्रायार्कमहिहत्य ऊवुः|	to him to indra when he slew the dragon the dames too consorts of the gods wove praises.
परि दयावाप्र्थिवी जभ्र उर्वी नास्य ते महिमानं परिष्टः|	the mighty heaven and earth hath he encompassed thy greatness heaven and earth combined exceed not.
अस्येदेव पर रिरिचे महित्वं दिवस पर्थिव्याः पर्यन्तरिक्षात|	yea of a truth his magnitude surpasseth the magnitude of earth midair and heaven.
सवराळ इन्द्रो दम आ विश्वगूर्तः सवरिरमत्रो ववक्षे रणाय|	indra approved by all men selfresplendent waxed in his home loudvoiced and strong for battle.
अस्येदेव शवसा शुषन्तं वि वर्श्चद वज्रेण वर्त्रमिन्द्रः|	through his own strength indra with bolt of thunder cut piecemeal vṛtra drier up of waters.
गा न वराणा अवनीरमुञ्चदभि शरवो दावने सचेताः|	he let the floods go free like cows imprisoned for glory with a heart inclined to bounty.
अस्येदु तवेषसा रन्त सिन्धवः परि यद वज्रेण सीमयछत|	the rivers played through his impetuous splendour since with his bolt he compassed them on all sides.
ईशानक्र्द दाशुषे दशस्यन तुर्वीतये गाधं तुर्वणिः कः|	using his might and favouring him who worshipped he made a ford victorious for turvīti.
अस्मा इदु पर भरा तूतुजानो वर्त्राय वज्रमीशानः कियेधाः|	vast with thine ample power with eager movement against this vṛtra cast thy bolt of thunder.
गोर्न पर्व वि रदा तिरश्चेष्यन्नर्णांस्यपां चरध्यै|	rend thou his joints as of an ox dissevered with bolt oblique that floods of rain may follow.
अस्येदु पर बरूहि पूर्व्याणि तुरस्य कर्माणि नव्य उक्थैः|	sing with new lauds his exploits wrought aforetime the deeds of him yea him who moveth swiftly.
युधे यदिष्णान आयुधान्य रघायमाणो निरिणाति शत्रून|	when hurling forth his weapons in the battle he with impetuous wrath lays low the foemen.
अस्येदु भिया गिरयश्च दर्ळ्हा दयावा च भूमा जनुषस्तुजेते|	when he yea he comes forth the firm set mountains and the whole heaven and earth tremble for terror.
उपो वेनस्य जोगुवान ओणिं सद्यो भुवद वीर्याय नोधाः|	may nodhas ever praising the protection of that dear friend gain quickly strength heroic.
अस्मा इदु तयदनु दाय्येषामेको यद वव्ने भूरेरीशानः|	now unto him of these things hath been given what he who rules alone oer much electeth.
परैतशं सूर्ये पस्प्र्धानं सौवश्व्ये सुष्विमावदिन्द्रः|	indra hath helped etaśa somapresser contending in the race of steeds with sūrya.
एवा ते हारियोजना सुव्र्क्तीन्द्र बरह्माणि गोतमासो अक्रन|	thus to thee indra yoker of bay coursers the gotamas have brought their prayers to please thee.
ऐषु विश्वपेशसं धियं धाः परातर मक्षू धियावसुर जगम्यात|	bestow upon them thought decked with all beauty may he enriched with prayer come soon and early.
बळ इत्था तद वपुषे धायि दर्शतं देवस्य भर्गः सहसो यतो जनि|	yea verily the fair effulgence of the god for glory was established since he sprang from strength.
यदीमुप हवरते साधते मतिर्र्तस्य धेन अनयन्त सस्रुतः|	when he inclines thereto successful is the hymn the songs of sacrifice have brought him as they flow.
पर्क्षो वपुः पितुमान नित्य आ शये दवितीयमा सप्तशिवासु मात्र्षु|	wonderful rich in nourishment he dwells in food next in the seven auspicious mothers is his home.
तर्तीयमस्य वर्षभस्य दोहसे दशप्रमतिं जनयन्त योषणः|	thirdly that they might drain the treasures of the bull the maidens brought forth him for whom the ten provide.
निर्यदीं बुध्नान महिषस्य वर्पस ईशानासः शवसाक्रन्त सूरयः|	what time from out the deep from the steers wondrous form the chiefs who had the power produced him with their strength.
यदीमनु परदिवो मध्व आधवे गुहा सन्तं मातरिश्वा मथायति|	when mātariśvan rubbed forth him who lay concealed for mixture of the sweet drink in the days of old.
पर यत पितुः परमान नीयते पर्या पर्क्षुधो वीरुधो दंसु रोहति|	when from the highest father he is brought to us amid the plants he rises hungry wondrously.
उभा यदस्य जनुषं यदिन्वत आदिद यविष्ठो अभवद घर्णा शुचिः|	as both together join to expedite his birth most youthful he is born resplendent in his light.
आदिन मातॄराविशद यास्वा शुचिरहिंस्यमान उर्वियावि वाव्र्धे|	then also entered he the mothers and in them pure and uninjured he increased in magnitude.
अनु यत पूर्वा अरुहत सनाजुवो नि नव्यसीष्ववरासु धावते|	as to the first he rose the vigorous from of old so now he runs among the younger lowest ones.
आदिद धोतारं वर्णते दिविष्टिषु भगमिव पप्र्चानास रञ्जते|	therefore they choose him herald at the morning rites pressing to him as unto bhaga pouring gifts.
देवान यत करत्वा मज्मना पुरुष्टुतो मर्तं संसं विश्वधा वेति धायसे|	when muchpraised by the power and will of gods he goes at all times to his mortal worshipper to drink.
वि यदस्थाद यजतो वातचोदितो हवारो न वक्वा जरणा अनाक्र्तः|	what time the holy one windurged hath risen up serpentlike winding through the dry grass unrestrained.
तस्य पत्मन दक्षुषः कर्ष्णजंहसः शुचिजन्मनो रज आ वयध्वनः|	dust lies upon the way of him who burneth all blackwinged and pure of birth who follows sundry paths.
रथो न यातः शिक्वभिः कर्तो दयामङगेभिररुषेभिरीयते|	like a swift chariot made by men who know their art he with his red limbs lifts himself aloft to heaven.
आदस्य ते कर्ष्णासो दक्षि सूरयः शूरस्येव तवेषथादीषते वयः|	thy worshippers become by burning black of hue their strength flies as before a heros violence.
तवया हयग्ने वरुणो धर्तव्रतो मित्रः शाशद्रे अर्यमा सुदानवः|	by thee o agni varuṇa who guards the law mitra and aryaman the bounteous are made strong.
यत सीमनु करतुना विश्वथा विभुररान न नेमिः परिभूरजायथाः|	for as the felly holds the spokes thou with thy might pervading hast been born encompassing them round.
तवमग्ने शशमानाय सुन्वते रत्नं यविष्ठ देवतातिमिन्वसि|	agni to him who toils and pours libations thou most youthful sendest wealth and all the host of gods.
तं तवा नु नव्यं सहसो युवन वयं भगं न कारेमहिरत्न धीमहि|	thee therefore even as bhaga will we set anew young child of strength most wealthy in our battlesong.
अस्मे रयिं न सवर्थं दमूनसं भगं दक्षं न पप्र्चासि धर्णसिम|	vouchsafe us riches turned to worthy ends good luck abiding in the house and strong capacity.
रश्मीन्रिव यो यमति जन्मनी उभे देवानां शंसं रत आ च सुक्रतुः|	wealth that directs both worlds as they were guidingreins and very wise the gods assent in sacrifice.
उत नः सुद्योत्मा जीराश्वो होता मन्द्रः शर्णवच्चन्द्ररथः|	may he the priest resplendent joyful hear us he with the radiant car and rapid horses.
स नो नेषन नेषतमैरमूरोअग्निर्वामं सुवितं वस्यो अछ|	may agni ever wise with best directions to bliss and highest happiness conduct us.
अस्ताव्यग्निः शिमीवद्भिरर्कैः साम्राज्याय परतरं दधानः|	with hymns of might hath agni now been lauded advanced to height of universal kingship.
अमी च ये मघवानो वयं च मिहं न सूरो अतिनिष टतन्युः|	now may these wealthy chiefs and we together spread forth as spreads the sun above the rainclouds.
उदु तयं जातवेदसं देवं वहन्ति केतवः|	his bright rays bear him up aloft the god who knoweth all that lives.
दर्शे विश्वाय सूर्यम|	sūrya that all may look on him.
अप तये तायवो यथा नक्षत्रा यन्त्यक्तुभिः|	the constellations pass away like thieves together with their beams.
सूराय विश्वचक्षसे|	before the allbeholding sun.
अद्र्श्रमस्य केतवो वि रश्मयो जनाननु|	his herald rays are seen afar refulgent oer the world of men.
भराजन्तो अग्नयो यथा|	like flames of fire that burn and blaze.
तरणिर्विश्वदर्शतो जयोतिष्क्र्दसि सूर्य|	swift and all beautiful art thou o sūrya maker of the light.
विश्वमा भासिरोचनम|	illuming all the radiant realm.
परत्यं देवानां विशः परत्यङङ उदेषि मानुषान|	thou goest to the hosts of gods thou comest hither to mankind.
परत्यं विश्वं सवर्द्र्शे|	hither all light to be beheld.
येना पावक चक्षसा भुरण्यन्तं जनाननु|	with that same eye of thine wherewith thou lookest brilliant varuṇa.
तवं वरुण पश्यसि|	upon the busy race of men.
वि दयामेषि रजस पर्थ्वहा मिमानो अक्तुभिः|	traversing sky and wide midair thou metest with thy beams our days.
पश्यञ जन्मानि सूर्य|	sun seeing all things that have birth.
सप्त तवा हरितो रथे वहन्ति देव सूर्य|	seven bay steeds harnessed to thy car bear thee o thou farseeing one.
शोचिष्केशं विचक्षण|	god sūrya with the radiant hair.
अयुक्त सप्त शुन्ध्युवः सूरो रथस्य नप्त्यः|	sūrya hath yoked the pure bright seven the daughters of the car with these.
ताभिर्याति सवयुक्तिभिः|	his own dear team he goeth forth.
उद वयं तमसस परि जयोतिष पश्यन्त उत्तरम|	looking upon the loftier light above the darkness we have come.
देवं देवत्रा सूर्यमगन्म जयोतिरुत्तमम|	to sūrya god among the gods the light that is most excellent.
उद्यन्नद्य मित्रमह आरोहन्नुत्तरां दिवम|	rising this day o rich in friends ascending to the loftier heaven.
हर्द्रोगं ममसूर्य हरिमाणं च नाशय|	sūrya remove my hearts disease take from me this my yellow hue.
शुकेषु मे हरिमाणं रोपणाकासु दध्मसि|	to parrots and to starlings let us give away my yellowness.
अथो हारिद्रवेषु मे हरिमाणं नि दध्मसि|	or this my yellowness let us transfer to haritāla trees.
उदगादयमादित्यो विश्वेन सहसा सह|	with all his conquering vigour this Āditya hath gone up on high.
दविषन्तं मह्यं रन्धयन मो अहम दविषते रधम|	giving my foe into mine hand let me not be my foemans prey.
इत्था हि सोम इन मदे बरह्मा चकार वर्धनम|	thus in the soma in wild joy the brahman hath exalted thee.
शविष्ठ वज्रिन्नोजसा पर्थिव्या निः शशा अहिमर्चन्ननु सवराज्यम|	thou mightiest thunderarmed hast driven by force the dragon from the earth lauding thine own imperial sway.
स तवामदद वर्षा मदः सोमः शयेनाभ्र्तः सुतः|	the mighty flowing somadraught brought by the hawk hath gladdened thee.
येनाव्र्त्रं निरद्भ्यो जघन्थ वज्रिन्नोजसार्चन्न|	that in thy strength o thunderer thou hast struck down vṛtra from the floods lauding thine own imperial sway.
परेह्यभीहि धर्ष्णुहि न ते वज्रो नि यंसते|	go forward meet the foe be bold thy bolt of thunder is not checked.
इन्द्र नर्म्णं हि ते शवो हनो वर्त्रं जया अपोअर्चन्न|	manliness indra is thy might stay vṛtra make the waters thine lauding thine own imperial sway.
निरिन्द्र भूम्या अधि वर्त्रं जघन्थ निर्दिवः|	thou smotest vṛtra from the earth smotest him indra from the sky.
सर्जा मरुत्वतीरव जीवधन्या इमा अपोअर्चन्न|	let these lifefostering waters flow attended by the marut host lauding thine own imperial sway.
इन्द्रो वर्त्रस्य दोधतः सानुं वज्रेण हीळितः|	the wrathful indra with his bolt of thunder rushing on the foe.
अभिक्रम्याव जिघ्नतेअपः सर्माय चोदयन्नर्चन्न|	smote fierce on trembling vṛtras back and loosed the waters free to run lauding his own imperial sway.
अधि सानौ नि जिघ्नते वज्रेण शतपर्वणा|	with hundredjointed thunderbolt indra hath struck him on the back.
मन्दान इन्द्रो अन्धसः सखिभ्यो गातुमिछत्यर्चन्न|	and while rejoicing in the juice seeketh prosperity for friends lauding his own imperial sway.
इन्द्र तुभ्यमिदद्रिवोअनुत्तं वज्रिन वीर्यम|	indra unconquered might is thine thunderer caster of the stone.
यद ध तयम्मायिनं मर्गं तमु तवं माययावधीरर्चन्न|	for thou with thy surpassing power smotest to death the guileful beast lauding thine own imperial sway.
वि ते वज्रासो अस्थिरन नवतिं नाव्या अनु|	far over ninety spacious floods thy thunderbolts were cast abroad.
महत त इन्द्र वीर्यं बाह्वोस्ते बलं हितमर्चन्न|	great indra is thy hero might and strength is seated in thine arms lauding thine own imperial sway.
सहस्रं साकमर्चत परि षटोभत विंशतिः|	laud him a thousand all at once shout twenty forth the hymn of praise.
शतैनमन्वनोनवुरिन्द्राय बरह्मोद्यतमर्चन्न|	hundreds have sung aloud to him to indra hath the prayer been raised lauding his own imperial sway.
इन्द्रो वर्त्रस्य तविषीं निरहन सहसा सहः|	indra hath smitten down the power of vṛtramight with stronger might.
महत तदस्य पौंस्यं वर्त्रं जघन्वानस्र्जदर्चन्न|	this was his manly exploit he slew vṛtra and let loose the floods lauding his own imperial sway.
इमे चित तव मन्यवे वेपेते भियसा मही|	yea even this great pair of worlds trembled in terror at thy wrath.
यदिन्द्र वज्रिन्नोजसा वर्त्रं मरुत्वानवधीरर्चन्न|	when indra thunderer marutgirt thou slewest vṛtra in thy strength lauding thine own imperial sway.
न वेपसा न तन्यतेन्द्रं वर्त्रो वि बीभयत|	but vṛtra scared not indra with his shaking or his thunder roar.
अभ्येनं वज्र आयसः सहस्रभ्र्ष्टिरायतार्चन्न|	on him that iron thunderbolt fell fiercely with its thousand points lauding his own imperial sway.
यद वर्त्रं तव चशनिं वज्रेण समयोधयः|	when with the thunder thou didst make thy dart and vṛtra meet in war.
अहिमिन्द्रजिघांसतो दिवि ते बद्बधे शवोअर्चन्न|	thy might o indra fain to slay the dragon was set firm in heaven lauding thine own imperial sway.
अभिष्टने ते अद्रिवो यत सथा जगच्च रेजते|	when at thy shout o thunderarmed each thing both fixed and moving shook.
तवष्टा चित तव मन्यव इन्द्र वेविज्यते भियार्चन्न|	een tvaṣṭar trembled at thy wrath and quaked with fear because of thee lauding thine own imperial sway.
नहि नु यादधीमसीन्द्रं को वीर्या परः|	there is not in our knowledge one who passeth indra in his strength.
तस्मिन नर्म्णमुत करतुं देवा ओजांसि सं दधुरर्चन्न|	in him the deities have stored manliness insight power and might lauding his own imperial sway.
यमथर्व मनुष पिता दध्यं धियमत्नत|	still as of old whatever rite atharvan manus sire of all.
तस्मिन बरह्माणि पुर्वथेन्द्र उक्था समग्मतार्चन्न|	dadhyach performed their prayer and praise united in that indra meet lauding his own imperial sway.
अग्ने नय सुपथा राये अस्मान विश्वानि देव वयुनानि विद्वान|	by goodly paths lead us to riches agni god who knowest every sacred duty.
युयोध्यस्मज्जुहुराणमेनो भूयिष्ठां ते नमौक्तिंविधेम|	remove the sin that makes us stray and wander most ample adoration will we bring thee.
अग्ने तवं पारया नव्यो अस्मान सवस्तिभिरति दुर्गाणि विश्वा|	lead us anew to happiness o agni lead us beyond all danger and affliction.
पुश्च पर्थ्वी बहुला न उर्वि भवा तोकाय तनयाय शं योः|	be unto us a wide broad ample castle bless prosper on their way our sons and offspring.
अग्ने तवमस्मद युयोध्यमीवा अनग्नित्रा अभ्यमन्त कर्ष्टीः|	far from us agni put thou all diseases let them strike lauds that have no saving agni.
पुनरस्मभ्यं सुविताय देव कषां विश्वेभिरम्र्तेभिर्यजत्र|	god make our home again to be a blessing with all the immortal deities o holy.
पाहि नो अग्ने पायुभिरजस्रैरुत परिये सदन आ शुशुक्वान|	preserve us agni with perpetual succour refulgent in the dwelling which thou lovest.
मा ते भयं जरितारं यविष्ठ नूनं विदन मापरं सहस्वः|	o conqueror most youthful let no danger touch him who praises thee today or after.
मा नो अग्नेअव सर्जो अघायाविष्यवे रिपवे दुछुनायै|	give not us up a prey to sin o agni the greedy enemy that brings us trouble.
मादत्वते दशते मादते नो मा रीषते सहसावन परा दाः|	not to the fanged that bites not to the toothless give not us up thou conqueror to the spoiler.
वि घ तवावान रतजात यंसद गर्णानो अग्ने तन्वे वरूथम|	such as thou art born after law o agni when lauded give protection to our bodies.
विश्वाद रिरिक्षोरुत वा निनित्सोरभिह्रुतामसि हि देव विष्पट|	from whosoever would reproach or injure for thou god rescuest from all oppression.
तवं तानग्न उभयानिव विद्वान वेषि परपित्वे मनुषो यजत्र|	thou well discerning both these classes comest to men at early morn o holy agni.
अभिपित्वे मनवे शास्यो भूर्मर्म्र्जेन्य उशिग्भिर्नाक्रः|	be thou obedient unto man at evening to be adorned as keen by eager suitors.
अवोचाम निवचनान्यस्मिन मानस्य सूनुः सहसाने अग्नौ|	to him have we addressed our pious speeches i mānas son to him victorious agni.
वयं सहस्रं रषिभिः सनेम वि|	may we gain countless riches with the sages may we find strengthening food in full abundance.
शरीणन्नुप सथाद दिवं भुरण्यु सथातुश्चरथमक्तून्व्यूर्णोत|	commingling restless he ascends the sky unveiling nights and all that stands or moves.
परि यदेषामेको विश्वेषां भुवद देवो देवानां महित्वा|	as he the sole god is preeminent in greatness among all these other gods.
आदित ते विश्वे करतुं जुषन्त शुष्काद यद देव जीवो जनिष्ठाः|	all men are joyful in thy power o god that living from the dry wood thou art born.
भजन्त विश्वे देवत्वं नाम रतं सपन्तो अम्र्तमेवैः|	all truly share thy godhead while they keep in their accustomed ways eternal law.
रतस्य परेषा रतस्य धीतिर्विश्वायुर्विश्वे अपांसि चक्रुः|	strong is the thought of law the laws behest all works have they performed he quickens all.
यस्तुभ्यं दाशाद यो वा ते शिक्षात तस्मै चिकित्वान्रयिं दयस्व|	whoso will bring oblation gifts to thee to him bethinking thee vouchsafe thou wealth.
होता निषत्तो मनोरपत्ये स चिन नवासां पती रयीणाम|	seated as priest with manus progeny of all these treasures he alone is lord.
इछन्त रेतो मिथस्तनूषु सं जानत सवैर्दक्षैरमूराः|	men yearn for children to prolong their line and are not disappointed in their hope.
पितुर्न पुत्राः करतुं जुषन्त शरोषन ये अस्य शासं तुरासः|	eagerly they who hear his word fulfil his wish as sons obey their sires behest.
वि राय और्णोद दुरः पुरुक्षुः पिपेश नाकं सत्र्भिर्दमूनाः|	he rich in food unbars his wealth like doors he the housefriend hath decked heavens vault with stars.
मथीद यदीं विष्टो मातरिश्वा होतारं विश्वाप्सुं विश्वदेव्यम|	what mātariśvan piercing formed by friction herald of all the gods in varied figure.
नि यं दधुर्मनुष्यासु विक्षु सवर्ण चित्रं वपुषे विभावम|	is he whom they have set mid human houses gayhued as light and shining forth for beauty.
ददानमिन न ददभन्त मन्माग्निर्वरूथं मम तस्य चाकन|	they shall not harm the man who brings thee praises such as i am agni my help approves me.
जुषन्त विश्वन्यस्य कर्मोपस्तुतिं भरमाणस्य कारोः|	all acts of mine shall they accept with pleasure laudation from the singer who presents it.
नित्ये चिन नु यं सदने जग्र्भ्रे परशस्तिभिर्दधिरे यज्ञियसः|	him in his constant seat men skilled in worship have taken and with praises have established.
पर सू नयन्त गर्भयन्त इष्टावश्वासो न रथ्योररहणाः|	as harnessed to a chariot fleetfoot horses at his command let bearers lead him forward.
पुरूणि दस्मो नि रिणाति जम्भैराद रोचते वन आ विभावा|	wondrous full many a thing he chews and crunches he shines amid the wood with spreading brightness.
आदस्य वातो अनु वाति शोचिरस्तुर्न शर्यामसनामनु दयून|	upon his glowing flames the wind blows daily driving them like the keen shaft of an archer.
न यं रिपवो न रिषण्यवो गर्भे सन्तं रेषणा रेषयन्ति|	him whom while yet in embryo the hostile both skilled and fain to harm may never injure.
अन्धा अपश्या न दभन्नभिख्या नित्यास ईं परेतारो अरक्षन|	men blind and sightless through his splendour hurt not his neverfailing lovers have preserved him.
यं रक्षन्ति परचेतसो वरुणो मित्रो अर्यमा|	neer is he injured whom the gods varuṇa mitra aryaman.
नू चित स दभ्यते जनः|	the excellently wise protect.
यं बाहुतेव पिप्रति पान्ति मर्त्यं रिषः|	he prospers ever free from scathe whom they as with full hands enrich.
अरिष्टः सर्व एधते|	whom they preserve from every foe.
वि दुर्गा वि दविषः पुरो घनन्ति राजान एषाम|	the kings drive far away from him his troubles and his enemies.
नयन्ति दुरिता तिरः|	and lead him safely oer distress.
सुगः पन्था अन्र्क्षर आदित्यास रतं यते|	thornless Ādityas is the path easy for him who seeks the law.
नात्रावखादो अस्ति वः|	with him is naught to anger you.
यं यज्ञं नयथा नर आदित्या रजुना पथा|	what sacrifice Ādityas ye heroes guide by the path direct.
पर वः स धीतये नशत|	may that come nigh unto your thought.
स रत्नं मर्त्यो वसु विश्वं तोकमुत तमना|	that mortal ever unsubdued gains wealth and every precious thing.
अछा गछत्यस्त्र्तः|	and children also of his own.
कथा राधाम सखायः सतोमं मित्रस्यार्यम्णः|	how my friends shall we prepare aryamans and mitras laud.
महि पसरो वरुणस्य|	glorious food of varuṇa.
मा वो घनन्तं मा शपन्तं परति वोचे देवयन्तम|	i point not out to you a man who strikes the pious or reviles.
सुम्नैरिद व आ विवासे|	only with hymns i call you nigh.
चतुरश्चिद ददमानाद बिभीयादा निधातोः|	let him not love to speak ill words but fear the one who holds all four.
न दुरुक्ताय सप्र्हयेत|	within his hand until they fall.
अयं देवाय जन्मने सतोमो विप्रेभिरासया|	for the celestial race this song of praise which gives wealth lavishly.
अकारि रत्नधातमः|	was made by singers with their lips.
य इन्द्राय वचोयुजा ततक्षुर्मनसा हरी|	they who for indra with their mind formed horses harnessed by a word.
शमीभिर्यज्ञमाशत|	attained by works to sacrifice.
तक्षन नासत्याभ्यां परिज्मानं सुखं रथम|	they for the two nāsatyas wrought a light car moving every way.
तक्षन धेनुं सबर्दुघाम|	they formed a nectaryielding cow.
युवाना पितरा पुनः सत्यमन्त्रा रजूयवः|	the Ṛbhus with effectual prayers honest with constant labour made.
रभवो विष्ट्यक्रत|	their sire and mother young again.
सं वो मदासो अग्मतेन्द्रेण च मरुत्वता|	together came your gladdening drops with indra by the maruts girt.
आदित्येभिश्च राजभिः|	with the Ādityas with the kings.
उत तयं चमसं नवं तवष्टुर्देवस्य निष्क्र्तम|	the sacrificial ladle wrought newly by the god tvaṣṭars hand.
अकर्तचतुरः पुनः|	four ladles have ye made thereof.
ते नो रत्नानि धत्तन तरिरा साप्तानि सुन्वते|	vouchsafe us wealth to him who pours thrice seven libations yea to each.
एकमएकंसुशस्तिभिः|	give wealth pleased with our eulogies.
अधारयन्त वह्नयोअभजन्त सुक्र्त्यया|	as ministering priests they held by pious acts they won themselves.
भागं देवेषु यज्ञियम|	a share in sacrifice with gods.
उप पर जिन्वन्नुशतीरुशन्तं पतिं न नित्यं जनयः सनीळाः|	loving the loving one as wives their husband the sisters of one home have urged him forward.
सवसारः शयावीमरुषीमजुष्रञ्चित्रमुछन्तीमुषसं न गावः|	brightcoloured even as the cows love morning dark breaking forth to view and redly beaming.
वीळु चिद दर्ळ्हा पितरो न उक्थैरद्रिं रुजन्नङगिरसो रवेण|	our sires with lauds burst een the firmset fortress yea the aṅgirases with roar the mountain.
चक्रुर्दिवो बर्हतो गातुमस्मे अहः सवर्विविदुः केतुमुस्राः|	they made for us a way to reach high heaven they found us day light days sign beams of morning.
दधन्न्र्तं धनयन्नस्य धीतिमादिदर्यो दिधिष्वो विभ्र्त्राः|	they stablished order made his service fruitful then parting them among the longing faithful.
अत्र्ष्यन्तीरपसो यन्त्यछा देवाञ जन्म परयसा वर्धयन्तीः|	not thirsting after aught they come most active while with sweet food the race of gods they strengthen.
मथीद यदीं विभ्र्तो मातरिश्वा गर्हेगर्हे शयेतो जेन्यो भूत|	since mātariśvan fardiffused hath stirred him and he in every house grown bright and noble.
आदीं राज्ञे न सहीयसे सचा सन्ना दूत्यं भर्गवाणो विवाय|	he bhṛgulike i hath gone as his companion as on commission to a greater sovran.
महे यत पित्र ईं रसं दिवे करव तसरत पर्शन्यश्चिकित्वान|	when man poured juice to heaven the mighty father he knew and freed himself from close embracement.
सर्जदस्ता धर्षता दिद्युमस्मै सवायां देवो दुहितरि तविषिं धात|	the archer boldly shot at him his arrow and the god threw his splendour on his daughter.
सव आ यस्तुभ्यं दम आ विभाति नमो वा दाशादुशतो अनु दयून|	whoso hath flames for thee within his dwelling or brings the worship which thou lovest daily.
वर्धो अग्ने वयो अस्य दविबर्हा यासद राया सरथं यं जुनासि|	do thou of double might increase his substance may he whom thou incitest meet with riches.
अग्निं विश्वा अभि पर्क्षः सचन्ते समुद्रं न सरवतः सप्त यह्वीः|	all sacrificial viands wait on agni as the seven mighty rivers seek the ocean.
न जामिभिर्वि चिकिते वयो नो विदा देवेषु परमतिं चिकित्वान|	not by our brethren was our food discovered find with the gods care for us thou who knowest.
आ यदिषे नर्पतिं तेज आनट छुचि रेतो निषिक्तं दयौरभीके|	when light hath filled the lord of men for increase straight from the heaven descends the limpid moisture.
अग्निः शर्धमनवद्यं युवानं सवाध्यं जनयत सूदयच्च|	agni hath brought to light and filled with spirit the youthful host blameless and well providing.
मनो न योअध्वनः सद्य एत्येकः सत्रा सूरो वस्व ईशे|	he who like thought goes swiftly on his journey the sun alone is ever lord of riches.
राजाना मित्रावरुणा सुपाणी गोषु परियमम्र्तं रक्षमाणा|	the kings with fair hands varuṇa and mitra protect the precious nectar in our cattle.
मा नो अग्ने सख्या पित्र्याणि पर मर्षिष्ठा अभि विदुष कविः सन|	o agni break not our ancestral friendship sage as thou art endowed with deepest knowledge.
नभो न रूपं जरिमा मिनाति पुरा तस्या अभिशस्तेरधीहि|	old age like gathering cloud impairs the body before that evil be come nigh protect me.
परत्वक्षसः परतवसो विरप्शिनोअनानता अविथुरा रजीषिणः|	loud singers never humbled active full of strength immovable impetuous manliest bestbeloved.
जुष्टतमासो नर्तमासो अञ्जिभिर्व्यानज्रे के चिदुस्रा इव सत्र्भिः|	they have displayed themselves with glittering ornaments a few in number only like the heavens with stars.
उपह्वरेषु यदचिध्वं ययिं वय इव मरुतः केन चित पथा|	when maruts on the steeps ye pile the moving cloud ye are like birds on whatsoever path it be.
शचोतन्ति कोशा उप वो रथेष्वा घर्तमुक्षता मधुवर्णमर्चते|	clouds everywhere shed forth the rain upon your cars drop fatness honeyhued for him who sings your praise.
परैषामज्मेषु विथुरेव रेजते भूमिर्यामेषु यद ध युञ्जते शुभे|	earth at their racings trembles as if weak and worn when on their ways they yoke their cars for victory.
ते करीळयो धुनयो भराजद्र्ष्टयः सवयं महित्वं पनयन्त धूतयः|	they sportive loudly roaring armed with glittering spears shakers of all themselves admire their mightiness.
स हि सवस्र्त पर्षदश्वो युवा गणोअया ईशानस्तविषीभिराव्र्तः|	selfmoving is that youthful band with spotted steeds thus it hath lordly sway endued with power and might.
असि सत्य रणयावानेद्योअस्या धियः पराविताथा वर्षा गणः|	truthful art thou and blameless searcher out of sin so thou strong host wilt be protector of this prayer.
पितुः परत्नस्य जन्मना वदामसि सोमस्य जिह्वा पर जिगाति चक्षसा|	we speak by our descent from our primeval sire our tongue when we behold the soma stirs itself.
यदीमिन्द्रं शम्य रक्वाण आशतादिन नामानि यज्ञियानि दधिरे|	when shouting they had joined indra in toil of fight then only they obtained their sacrificial names.
शरियसे कं भानुभिः सं मिमिक्षिरे ते रश्मिभिस्त रक्वभिः सुखादयः|	splendours they gained for glory they who wear bright rings rays they obtained and men to celebrate their praise.
ते वाशीमन्त इष्मिणो अभीरवो विद्रे परियस्य मारुतस्य धाम्नः|	armed with their swords impetuous and fearing naught they have possessed the maruts own beloved home.
महः स राय एषते पतिर्दन्निन इनस्य वसुनः पद आ|	hither he hastens to give lord of great riches king of the mighty to the place of treasure.
उप धरजन्तमद्रयो विधन्नित|	the pressingstones shall serve him speeding near us.
स यो वर्षा नरां न रोदस्योः शरवोभिरस्ति जीवपीतसर्गः|	as steer of men so steer of earth and heaven by glory he whose streams all life hath drunken.
पर यः सस्राणः शिश्रीत योनौ|	who hasting forward rests upon the altar.
आ यः पुरं नार्मिणीमदीदेदत्यः कविर्नभन्यो नार्व|	he who hath lighted up the joyous castle wise courser like the steed of cloudy heaven.
सूरो न रुरुक्वाञ्छतात्मा|	bright like the sun with hundredfold existence.
अभि दविजन्मा तरी रोचनानि विश्व रजांसि शुशुचनो अस्थात|	he doubly born hath spread in his effulgence through the three luminous realms through all the regions.
होता यजिष्ठो अपां सधस्थे|	best sacrificing priest where waters gather.
अयं स होत यो दविजन्मा विश्वा दधे वार्याणि शरवस्या|	priest doubly born he through his love of glory hath in his keeping all things worth the choosing.
मर्तो यो अस्मै सुतुको ददाश|	the man who brings him gifts hath noble offspring.
रजुनीती नो वरुणो मित्रो नयतु विद्वान|	may varuṇa with guidance straight and mitra lead us he who knows.
अर्यमा देवैः सजोषाः|	and aryaman in accord with gods.
ते हि वस्वो वसवानास्ते अप्रमूरा महोभिः|	for they are dealers forth of wealth and not deluded with their might.
वरता रक्षन्ते विश्वाहा|	guard evermore the holy laws.
ते अस्मभ्यं शर्म यंसन्नम्र्ता मर्त्येभ्यः|	shelter may they vouchsafe to us immortal gods to mortal men.
बाधमानाप दविषः|	chasing our enemies away.
वि नः पथः सुविताय चियन्त्विन्द्रो मरुतः|	may they mark out our paths to bliss indra the maruts pūṣan.
पूषा भगो वन्द्यासः|	and bhaga the gods to be adored.
उत नो धियो गोग्राः पूषन विष्णवेवयावः|	yea pūṣan viṣṇu ye who run your course enrich our hymns with kine.
कर्ता नः सवस्तिमतः|	bless us with all prosperity.
मधु वाता रतायते मधु कषरन्ति सिन्धवः|	the winds waft sweets the rivers pour sweets for the man who keeps the law.
माध्वीर्नः सन्त्वोषधीः|	so may the plants be sweet for us.
मधु नक्तमुतोषसो मधुमत पार्थिवं रजः|	sweet be the night and sweet the dawns sweet the terrestrial atmosphere.
मधु दयौरस्तु नः पिता|	sweet be our father heaven to us.
मधुमान नो वनस्पतिर्मधुमानस्तु सूर्यः|	may the tall tree be full of sweets for us and full of sweets the sun.
माध्वीर्गावो भवन्तु नः|	may our milchkine be sweet for us.
शं नो मित्रः शं वरुणः शं नो भवत्वर्यमा|	be mitra gracious unto us and varuṇa and aryaman.
शं न इन्द्रो बर्हस्पतिः शं नो विष्णुरुरुक्रमः|	indra bṛhaspati be kind and viṣṇu of the mighty stride.
ततं मे अपस्तदु तायते पुनः सवादिष्ठा धीतिरुचथाय शस्यते|	the holy work i wrought before is wrought again my sweetest hymn is sung to celebrate your praise.
अयं समुद्र इह विश्वदेव्यः सवाहाक्र्तस्य समु तर्प्णुत रभवः|	here o ye Ṛbhus is this sea for all the gods sate you with soma offered with the hallowing word.
आभोगयं पर यदिछन्त ऐतनापाकाः पराञ्चो मम के चिदापयः|	when seeking your enjoyment onward from afar ye certain of my kinsmen wandered on your way.
सौधन्वनासश्चरितस्य भूमनागछत सवितुर्दाशुषो गर्हम|	sons of sudhanvan after your long journeying ye came unto the home of liberal savitar.
तत सविता वोअम्र्तत्वामासुवदगोह्यं यच्छ्रवयन्त ऐतन|	savitar therefore gave you immortality because ye came proclaiming him whom naught can hide.
तयं चिच्चमसमसुरस्य भक्षणमेकं सन्तमक्र्णुता चतुर्वयम|	and this the drinkingchalice of the asura which till that time was one ye made to be fourfold.
विष्ट्वी शमी तरणित्वेन वाघतो मर्तासः सन्तो अम्र्तत्वमानशुः|	when they had served with zeal at sacrifice as priests they mortal as they were gained immortality.
सौधन्वना रभवः सूरचक्षसः संवत्सरे समप्र्च्यन्त धीतिभिः|	the Ṛbhus children of sudhanvan bright as suns were in a years course made associate with prayers.
कषेत्रमिव वि ममुस्तेजनेनमेकं पात्रं रभवो जेहमानम|	the Ṛbhus with a rod measured as twere a field the single sacrificial chalice wide of mouth.
उपस्तुता उपमं नाधमाना अमर्त्येषु शरव इछमानाः|	lauded of all who saw praying for what is best desiring glorious fame among immortal gods.
आ मनीषामन्तरिक्षस्य नर्भ्यः सरुचेव घर्तं जुहवाम विद्मना|	as oil in ladles we through knowledge will present unto the heroes of the firmament our hymn.
तरणित्वा ये पितुरस्य सश्चिर रभवो वाजमरुहन दिवो रजः|	the Ṛbhus who came near with this great fathers speed and rose to heavens high sphere to eat the strengthening food.
रभुर्न इन्द्रः शवसा नवीयान रभुर्वाजेभिर्वसुभिर्वसुर्ददिः|	Ṛbhu to us is indra freshest in his might Ṛbhu with powers and wealth is giver of rich gifts.
युष्माकं देवा अवसाहनि परियेअभि तिष्ठेमप्र्त्सुतीरसुन्वताम|	gods through your favour may we on the happy day quell the attacks of those who pour no offerings forth.
निश्चर्मण रभवो गामपिंशत सं वत्सेनास्र्जता मातरं पुनः|	out of a skin o Ṛbhus once ye formed a cow and brought the mother close unto her calf again.
सौधन्वनासः सवपस्यया नरो जिव्री युवाना पितराक्र्णोतन|	sons of sudhanvan heroes with surpassing skill ye made your aged parents youthful as before.
वाजेभिर्नो वाजसातावविड्ढ्य रभुमानिन्द्र चित्रमा दर्षि राधः|	help us with strength where spoil is won o indra joined with the Ṛbhus give us varied bounty.
तन नो|	this prayer of ours may varuṇa grant and mitra and aditi and sindhu earth and heaven.
युञ्जन्ति बरध्नमरुषं चरन्तं परि तस्थुषः|	they who stand round him as he moves harness the bright the ruddy steed.
रोचन्तेरोचना दिवि|	the lights are shining in the sky.
युञ्जन्त्यस्य काम्या हरी विपक्षसा रथे|	on both sides to the car they yoke the two bay coursers dear to him.
शोणा धर्ष्णू नर्वाहसा|	bold tawny bearers of the chief.
केतुं कर्ण्वन्नकेतवे पेशो मर्या अपेशसे|	thou making light where no light was and form o men where form was not.
समुषद्भिरजायथाः|	wast born together with the dawns.
आदह सवधामनु पुनर्गर्भत्वमेरिरे|	thereafter they as is their wont threw off the state of babes unborn.
दधाना नामयज्ञियम|	assuming sacrificial names.
वीळु चिदारुजत्नुभिर्गुहा चिदिन्द्र वह्निभिः|	thou indra with the tempestgods the breakers down of what is firm.
अविन्द उस्रिया अनु|	foundest the kine even in the cave.
देवयन्तो यथा मतिमछा विदद्वसुं गिरः|	worshipping even as they list singers laud him who findeth wealth.
महामनूषत शरुतम|	the farrenowned the mighty one.
इन्द्रेण सं हि दर्क्षसे संजग्मानो अबिभ्युषा|	mayest thou verily be seen coming by fearless indras side.
मन्दू समानवर्चसा|	both joyous equal in your sheen.
अनवद्यैरभिद्युभिर्मखः सहस्वदर्चति|	with indras well beloved hosts the blameless hastening to heaven.
गणैरिन्द्रस्य काम्यैः|	the sacrificer cries aloud.
अतः परिज्मन्ना गहि दिवो वा रोचनादधि|	come from this place o wanderer or downward from the light of heaven.
समस्मिन्न्र्ञ्जते गिरः|	our songs of praise all yearn for this.
इतो वा सातिमीमहे दिवो वा पार्थिवादधि|	indra we seek to give us help from here from heaven above the earth.
इन्द्रं महोवा रजसः|	or from the spacious firmament.
तीव्राः सोमास आ गह्याशीर्वन्तः सुता इमे|	strong are the somas come thou nigh these juices have been mixt with milk.
वायो तान परस्थितान पिब|	drink vāyu the presented draughts.
उभा देवा दिविस्प्र्शेन्द्रवायू हवामहे|	both deities who touch the heaven indra and vāyu we invoke.
अस्य सोमस्य पीतये|	to drink of this our soma juice.
इन्द्रवायू मनोजुवा विप्रा हवन्त ऊतये|	the singers for their aid invoke indra and vāyu swift as mind.
सहस्राक्षा धियस पती|	the thousandeyed the lords of thought.
मित्रं वयं हवामहे वरुणं सोमपीतये|	mitra and varuṇa renowned as gods of consecrated might.
जज्ञाना पूतदक्षसा|	we call to drink the soma juice.
रतेन याव रताव्र्धाव रतस्य जयोतिषस पती|	those who by law uphold the law lords of the shining light of law.
ता मित्रावरुणा हुवे|	mitra i call and varuṇa.
वरुणः पराविता भुवन मित्रो विश्वाभिरूतिभिः|	let varuṇa be our chief defence let mitra guard us with all aids.
करतां नः सुराधसः|	both make us rich exceedingly.
मरुत्वन्तं हवामह इन्द्रमा सोमपीतये|	indra by maruts girt we call to drink the soma juice may he.
सजूर्गणेन तरिम्पतु|	sate him in union with his troop.
इन्द्रज्येष्ठा मरुद्गणा देवासः पूषरातयः|	gods marut hosts whom indra leads distributers of pūṣans gifts.
विश्वे मम शरुता हवम|	hearken ye all unto my cry.
हत वर्त्रं सुदानव इन्द्रेण सहसा युजा|	with conquering indra for ally strike vṛtra down ye bounteous gods.
मा नो दुःशंस ईशत|	let not the wicked master us.
विश्वान देवान हवामहे मरुतः सोमपीतये|	we call the universal gods and maruts to the soma draught.
उग्रा हि पर्श्निमातरः|	for passing strong are pṛśnis sons.
जयतामिव तन्यतुर्मरुतामेति धर्ष्णुया|	fierce comes the maruts thundering voice like that of conquerors when ye go.
यच्छुभं याथना नरः|	forward to victory o men.
हस्काराद विद्युतस पर्यतो जाता अवन्तु नः|	born of the laughing lightning may the maruts guard us everywhere.
मरुतो मर्ळयन्तु नः|	may they be gracious unto us.
आ पूषञ्चित्रबर्हिषमाघ्र्णे धरुणं दिवः|	like some lost animal drive to us bright pūṣan him who bears up heaven.
आजा नष्टं यथा पशुम|	resting on manycoloured grass.
पूषा राजानमाघ्र्णिरपगूळ्हं गुहा हितम|	pūṣan the bright has found the king concealed and hidden in a cave.
अविन्दच्चित्रबर्हिषम|	who rests on grass of many hues.
उतो स मह्यमिन्दुभिः षड युक्ताननुसेषिधत|	and may he duly bring to me the six bound closely through these drops.
गोभिर्यवं न चर्क्र्षत|	as one who ploughs with steers brings corn.
अम्बयो यन्त्यध्वभिर्जामयो अध्वरीयताम|	along their paths the mothers go sisters of priestly ministrants.
पर्ञ्चतीर्मधुना पयः|	mingling their sweetness with the milk.
अमूर्या उप सूर्ये याभिर्वा सूर्यः सह|	may waters gathered near the sun and those wherewith the sun is joined.
ता नो हिन्वन्त्वध्वरम|	speed forth this sacrifice of ours.
अपो देवीरुप हवये यत्र गावः पिबन्ति नः|	i call the waters goddesses wherein our cattle quench their thirst.
सिन्दुभ्यः कर्त्वं हविः|	oblations to the streams be given.
अप्स्वन्तरम्र्तमप्सु भेषजमपामुत परशस्तये|	amrit is in the waters in the waters there is healing balm.
देवाभवत वाजिनः|	be swift ye gods to give them praise.
अप्सु मे सोमो अब्रवीदन्तर्विश्वानि भेषजा|	within the waterssoma thus hath told medwell all balms that heal.
अग्निं च विश्वशम्भुवमापश्च विश्वभेषजीः|	and agni he who blesseth all the waters hold all medicines.
आपः पर्णीत भेषजं वरूथं तन्वे मम|	o waters teem with medicine to keep my body safe from harm.
जयोक च सूर्यं दर्शे|	so that i long may see the sun.
इदमापः पर वहत यत किं च दुरितं मयि|	whatever sin is found in me whatever evil i have wrought.
यद वाहमभिदुद्रोह यद वा शेप उतान्र्तम|	if i have lied or falsely sworn waters remove it far from me.
आपो अद्यान्वचारिषं रसेन समगस्महि|	the waters i this day have sought and to their moisture have we come.
पयस्वानग्न आगहि तं मा सं सर्ज वर्चसा|	o agni rich in milk come thou and with thy splendour cover me.
सं माग्ने वर्चसा सर्ज सं परजया समायुषा|	fill me with splendour agni give offspring and length of days the gods.
विद्युर्मेस्य देवा इन्द्रो विद्यात सह रषिभिः|	shall know me even as i am and indra with the Ṛṣis know.
वर्ष्णे शर्धाय सुमखाय वेधसे नोधः सुव्र्क्तिं पर भरा मरुद्भ्यः|	bring for the manly host wise and majestical o nodhas for the maruts bring thou a pure gift.
अपो न धीरो मनसा सुहस्त्यो गिरः समञ्जे विदथेष्वाभुवः|	i deck my songs as one defthanded wise in mind prepares the water that hath power in solemn rites.
ते जज्ञिरे दिव रष्वास उक्षणो रुद्रस्य मर्या असुरा अरेपसः|	they spring to birth the lofty ones the bulls of heaven divine the youths of rudra free from spot and stain.
पावकासः शुचयः सूर्या इव सत्वानो न दरप्सिनोघोरवर्पसः|	the purifiers shining brightly even as suns awful of form like giants scattering raindrops down.
युवानो रुद्रा अजरा अभोग्घनो ववक्षुरध्रिगावः पर्वता इव|	young rudras demonslayers never growing old they have waxed even as mountains irresistible.
दर्ळ्हा चिद विश्वा भुवनानि पार्थिवा पर चयावयन्तिदिव्यानि मज्मना|	they make all beings tremble with their mighty strength even the very strongest both of earth and heaven.
चित्रैरञ्जिभिर्वपुषे वयञ्जते वक्षस्सु रुक्मानधि येतिरे शुभे|	with glittering ornaments they deck them forth for show for beauty on their breasts they bind their chains of gold.
अंसेष्वेषां नि मिम्र्क्षुर रष्टयः साकं जज्ञिरे सवधया दिवो नरः|	the lances on their shoulders pound to pieces they were born together of themselves the men of heaven.
ईशानक्र्तो धुनयो रिशादसो वातान विद्युतस्तविषीभिरक्रत|	loud roarers giving strength devourers of the foe they make the winds they make the lightnings with their powers.
दुहन्त्यूधर्दिव्यानि धूतयो भूमिं पिन्वन्ति पयसापरिज्रयः|	the restless shakers drain the udders of the sky and ever wandering round fill the earth full with milk.
पिन्वन्त्यपो मरुतः सुदानवः पयो घर्तवद विदथेष्वाभुवः|	the bounteous maruts with the fatness dropping milk fill full the waters which avail in solemn rites.
अत्यं न मिहे वि नयन्ति वाजिनमुत्सं दुहन्ति सतनयन्तमक्षितम|	they lead as twere the strong horse forth that it may rain they milk the thundering the neverfailing spring.
महिषासो मायिनश्चित्रभानवो गिरयो न सवतवसो रघुष्यदः|	mighty with wondrous power and marvellously bright selfstrong like mountains ye glide swiftly on your way.
मर्गा इव हस्तिनः खादथा वना यदारुणीषु तविषीरयुग्ध्वम|	like the wild elephants ye eat the forests up when ye assume your strength among the bright red flames.
सिंहा इव नानदति परचेतसः पिशा इव सुपिशो विश्ववेदसः|	exceeding wise they roar like lions mightily they allpossessing are beauteous as antelopes.
कषपो जिन्वन्तः पर्षतीभिर रष्टिभिः समित सबाधः शवसाहिमन्यवः|	stirring the darkness with lances and spotted deer combined as priests with serpents fury through their might.
रोदसी आ वदता गणश्रियो नर्षाचः शूराः शवसाहिमन्यवः|	heroes who march in companies befriending man with serpents ire through strength ye greet the earth and heaven.
आ वन्धुरेष्वमतिर्न दर्शता विद्युन न तस्थौ मरुतो रथेषु वः|	upon the seats o maruts of your chariots upon the cars stands lightning visible as light.
विश्ववेदसो रयिभिः समोकसः सम्मिश्लासस्तविषीभिर्विरप्शिनः|	lords of all riches dwelling in the home of wealth endowed with mighty vigour singers loud of voice.
अस्तार इषुं दधिरे गभस्त्योरनन्तशुष्मा वर्षखादयो नरः|	heroes of powers infinite armed with strong mens rings the archers they have laid the arrow on their arms.
हिरण्ययेभिः पविभिः पयोव्र्ध उज्जिघ्नन्त आपथ्यो न पर्वतान|	they who with golden fellies make the rain increase drive forward the big clouds like wanderers on the way.
मखा अयासः सवस्र्तो धरुवच्युतो दुध्रक्र्तो मरुतो भराजद्र्ष्टयः|	selfmoving brisk unwearied they oerthrow the firm the maruts with bright lances make all things to reel.
घर्षुं पावकं वनिनं विचर्षणिं रुद्रस्य सूनुं हवसा गर्णीमसि|	the progeny of rudra we invoke with prayer the brisk the bright the worshipful the active ones.
रजस्तुरं तवसं मारुतं गणं रजीषिणंव्र्षणं सश्चत शरिये|	to the strong band of maruts cleave for happiness the chasers of the sky impetuous vigorous.
पर नू स मर्तः शवसा जनानति तस्थौ व ऊती मरुतो यमावत|	maruts the man whom ye have guarded with your help he verily in strength surpasseth all mankind.
अर्वद्भिर्वजं भरते धना नर्भिराप्र्छ्यंक्रतुमा कषेति पुष्यति|	spoil with his steeds he gaineth treasure with his men he winneth honourable strength and prospereth.
चर्क्र्त्यं मरुतः पर्त्सु दुष्टरं दयुमन्तं शुष्मं मघवत्सु धत्तन|	o maruts to the worshippers give glorious strength invincible in battle brilliant bringing wealth.
धनस्प्र्तमुक्थ्यं विश्वचर्षणिं तोकं पुष्येम तनयं शतं हिमः|	praiseworthy known to all men may we foster well during a hundred winters son and progeny.
नू षठिरं मरुतो वीरवन्तं रतीषाहं रयिमस्मासु धत्त|	will ye then o ye maruts grant us riches durable rich in men defying onslaught.
सहस्रिणं शतिनं शूशुवांसं परातर मक्षू धियावसुर जगम्यात|	a hundred thousandfold ever increasing may he enriched with prayer come soon and early.
कतरा पूर्वा कतरापरायोः कथा जाते कवयः को वि वेद|	whether of these is elder whether later how were they born who knoweth it ye sages.
विश्वं तमना बिभ्र्तो यद ध नाम वि वर्तेते अहनी चक्रियेव|	these of themselves support all things existing as on a car the day and night roll onward.
भूरिं दवे अचरन्ती चरन्तं पद्वन्तं गर्भमपदी दधाते|	the twain uphold though motionless and footless a widespread offspring having feet and moving.
नित्यं न सूनुं पित्रोरुपस्थे दयावा रक्षतं पर्थिवी नो अभ्वात|	like your own son upon his parents bosom protect us heaven and earth from fearful danger.
अनेहो दात्रमदितेरनर्वं हुवे सवर्वदवधं नमस्वत|	i call for aditis unrivalled bounty perfect celestial deathless meet for worship.
तद रोदसी जनयतं जरित्रे दयावा|	produce this ye twain worlds for him who lauds you protect us heaven and earth from fearful danger.
अतप्यमाने अवसावन्ती अनु षयाम रोदसी देवपुत्रे|	may we be close to both the worlds who suffer no pain parents of gods who aid with favour.
उभे देवानामुभयेभिरह्नां दयावा|	both mid the gods with day and night alternate protect us heaven and earth from fearful danger.
संगछमाने युवती समन्ते सवसारा जामी पित्रोरुपस्थे|	faring together young with meeting limits twin sisters lying in their parents bosom.
अभिजिघ्रन्ती भुवनस्य नाभिं दयावा|	kissing the centre of the world together protect us heaven and earth from fearful danger.
उर्वी सद्मनी बर्हती रतेन हुवे देवानामवसा जनित्री|	duly i call the two wide seats the mighty the general parents with the gods protection.
दधाते ये अम्र्तं सुप्रतीके दयावा|	who beautiful to look on make the nectar protect us heaven and earth from fearful danger.
उर्वी पर्थ्वी बहुले दूरेन्ते उप बरुवे नमसा यज्ञे अस्मिन|	wide vast and manifold whose bounds are distantthese reverent i address at this our worship.
दधाते ये सुभगे सुप्रतूर्ती दयावा|	the blessed pair victorious allsustaining protect us heaven and earth from fearful danger.
देवान वा यच्चक्र्मा कच्चिदागः सखायं वा सदमिज्जास्पतिं वा|	what sin we have at any time committed against the gods our friend our houses chieftain.
इयं धीर्भूया अवयानमेषां दयावा|	thereof may this our hymn be expiation protect us heaven and earth from fearful danger.
उभा शंसा नर्या मामविष्टामुभे मामूती अवसा सचेताम|	may both these friends of man who bless preserve me may they attend me with their help and favour.
भूरि चिदर्यः सुदास्तरायेषा मदन्त इषयेम देवाः|	enrich the man more liberal than the godless may we ye gods be strong with food rejoicing.
रतं दिवे तदवोचं पर्थिव्या अभिश्रावाय परथमं सुमेधाः|	endowed with understanding i have uttered this truth for all to hear to earth and heaven.
पातामवद्याद दुरितादभीके पिता माता च रक्षतामवोभिः|	be near us keep us from reproach and trouble father and mother with your help preserve us.
इदं दयावाप्र्थिवी सत्यमस्तु पितर्मातर्यदिहोपब्रुवे वाम|	be this my prayer fulfilled o earth and heaven wherewith father and mother i address you.
भूतं देवानामवमे अवोभिर्विद्या|	nearest of gods be ye with your protection may we find strengthening food in full abundance.
तरिमूर्धानं सप्तरश्मिं गर्णीषेअनूनमग्निं पित्रोरुपस्थे|	i laud the sevenrayed the tripleheaded agni allperfect in his parents bosom.
निषत्तमस्य चरतो धरुवस्य विश्वा दिवो रोचनापप्रिवांसम|	sunk in the lap of all that moves and moves not him who hath filled all luminous realms of heaven.
उक्षा महानभि ववक्ष एने अजरस्तस्थावितूतिर्र्ष्वः|	as a great steer he grew to these his parents sublime he stands untouched by eld farreaching.
उर्व्याः पदो नि दधाति सानौ रिहन्त्यूधो अरुषासो अस्य|	he plants his footsteps on the lofty ridges of the broad earth his red flames lick the udder.
समानं वत्समभि संचरन्ती विष्वग धेनू वि चरतः सुमेके|	coming together to their common youngling both cows fairshaped spread forth in all directions.
अनपव्र्ज्यानध्वनो मिमाने विश्वान केतानधि महोदधाने|	measuring out the paths that must be travelled entrusting all desires to him the mighty.
धीरासः पदं कवयो नयन्ति नाना हर्दा रक्षमाणा अजुर्यम|	the prudent sages lead him to his dwelling guarding with varied skill the everyouthful.
सिषासन्तः पर्यपश्यन्त सिन्धुमाविरेभ्यो अभवत्सूर्यो नॄन|	longing they turned their eyes unto the river to these the sun of men was manifested.
दिद्र्क्षेण्यः परि काष्ठासु जेन्य ईळेन्यो महो अर्भाय जीवसे|	born noble in the regions aim of all mens eyes to be implored for life by great and small alike.
पुरुत्रा यदभवत सूरहैभ्यो गर्भेभ्यो मघवा विश्वदर्शतः|	far as the wealthy one hath spread himself abroad he is the sire allvisible of this progeny.
पर मंहिष्ठाय बर्हते बर्हद्रये सत्यशुष्माय तवसे मतिं भरे|	to him most liberal lofty lord of lofty wealth verily powerful and strong i bring my hymn.
अपामिव परवणे यस्य दुर्धरं राधो विश्वायुशवसे अपाव्र्तम|	whose checkless bounty as of waters down a slope is spread abroad for all that live to give them strength.
अध ते विश्वमनु हासदिष्टय आपो निम्नेव सवना हविष्मतः|	now all this world for worship shall come after theethe offerers libations like floods to the depth.
यत पर्वते न समशीत हर्यत इन्द्रस्य वज्रः शनथिता हिरण्ययः|	when the wellloved one seems to rest upon the hill the thunderbolt of indra shatterer wrought of gold.
अस्मै भीमाय नमसा समध्वर उषो न शुभ्र आ भरापनीयसे|	to him the terrible most meet for lofty praise like bright dawn now bring gifts with reverence in this rite.
यस्य धाम शरवसे नामेन्द्रियं जयोतिरकारिहरितो नायसे|	whose being for renown yea indrapower and light have been created like bay steeds to move with speed.
इमे त इन्द्र ते वयं पुरुष्टुत ये तवारभ्य चरामसि परभूवसो|	thine indra praised by many excellently rich are we who trusting in thy help draw near to thee.
नहि तवदन्यो गिर्वणो गिरः सघत कषोणीरिव परति नो हर्य तद वचः|	lover of praise none else but thou receives our laud as earth loves all her creatures love thou this our hymn.
भूरि त इन्द्र वीर्यं तव समस्यस्य सतोतुर्मघवन काममा पर्ण|	great is thy power o indra we are thine fulfil o maghavan the wish of this thy worshipper.
अनु ते दयौर्ब्र्हती वीर्यं मम इयं च ते पर्थिवी नेम ओजसे|	after thee lofty heaven hath measured out its strength to thee and to thy power this earth hath bowed itself.
तवं तमिन्द्र पर्वतं महामुरुं वज्रेण वज्रिन पर्वशश्चकर्तिथ|	thou who hast thunder for thy weapon with thy bolt hast shattered into pieces this broad massive cloud.
अवास्र्जो निव्र्ताः सर्तवा अपः सत्रा विश्वं दधिषे केवलं सहः|	thou hast sent down the obstructed floods that they may flow thou hast thine own for ever all victorious might.
य इन्द्राग्नी चित्रतमो रथो वामभि विश्वानि भुवनानि चष्टे|	on that most wondrous car of yours o indra and agni which looks round on all things living.
तेना यातं सरथं तस्थिवांसाथा सोमस्य पिबतं सुतस्य|	take ye your stand and come to us together and drink libations of the flowing soma.
यावदिदं भुवनं विश्वमस्त्युरुव्यचा वरिमता गभीरम|	as vast as all this world is in its compass deep as it is with its farstretching surface.
तावानयं पातवे सोमो अस्त्वरमिन्द्राग्नी मनसे युवभ्याम|	so let this soma be indra and agni made for your drinking till your soul be sated.
चक्राथे हि सध्र्यं नाम भद्रं सध्रीचीना वर्त्रहणाुत सथः|	for ye have won a blessed name together yea with one aim ye strove o vṛtraslayers.
ताविन्द्राग्नी सध्र्यञ्चा निषद्या वर्ष्णः सोमस्य वर्षणा वर्षेथाम|	so indraagni seated here together pour in ye mighty ones the mighty soma.
समिद्धेष्वग्निष्वानजाना यतस्रुचा बर्हिरु तिस्तिराणा|	both stand adorned when fires are duly kindled spreading the sacred grass with lifted ladles.
तीव्रैः सोमैः परिषिक्तेभिरर्वागेन्द्राग्नी सौमनसाय यातम|	drawn by strong soma juice poured forth around us come indraagni and display your favour.
यानीन्द्राग्नी चक्रथुर्वीर्याणि यानि रूपाण्युत वर्ष्ण्यानि|	the brave deeds ye have done indra and agni the forms ye have displayed and mighty exploits.
या वां परत्नानि सख्या शिवानि तेभिः सोमस्य पिबतं सुतस्य|	the ancient and auspicious bonds of friendshipfor sake of these drink of the flowing soma.
यदब्रवं परथमं वां वर्णानोअयं सोमो असुरैर्नो विहव्यः|	as first i said when choosing you in battle we must contend with asuras for this soma.
तां सत्यां शरद्धामभ्या हि यातमथा सोमस्य पिबतं सुतस्य|	so came ye unto this my true conviction and drank libations of the flowing soma.
यदिन्द्राग्नी मदथः सवे दुरोणे यद बरह्मणि राजनि वायजत्रा|	if in your dwelling or with prince or brahman ye indraagni holy ones rejoice you.
अतः परि वर्षणावा हि यातमथा सोमस्य पिबतं सुतस्य|	even from thence ye mighty lords come hither and drink libation of the flowing soma.
यदिन्द्राग्नी यदुषु तुर्वशेषु यद दरुह्युष्वनुषु पूरुषु सथः|	if with the yadus turvaśas ye sojourn with druhyus anus pūrus indraagni.
अतः|	even from thence ye mighty lords come hither and drink libations of the flowing soma.
यदिन्द्राग्नी अवमस्यां पर्थिव्यां मध्यमस्यां परमस्यामुत सथः|	whether o indraagni ye be dwelling in lowest earth in central or in highest.
अतः|	even from thence ye mighty lords come hither and drink libations of the flowing soma.
यदिन्द्राग्नी परमस्यां पर्थिव्यां मध्यमस्यामवमस्यामुत सथः|	whether o indraagni ye be dwelling in highest earth in central or in lowest.
अतः|	even from thence ye mighty lords come hither and drink libations of the flowing soma.
यदिन्द्राग्नी दिवि षठो यत पर्थिव्यां यत पर्वतेष्वोषधीष्वप्सु|	whether ye be in heaven o indraagni on earth on mountains in the herbs or waters.
अतः|	even from thence ye mighty lords come hither and drink libations of the flowing soma.
यदिन्द्राग्नी उदिता सूर्यस्य मध्ये दिवः सवधया मादयेथे|	if when the sun to the midheaven hath mounted ye take delight in food o indraagni.
अतः|	even from thence ye mighty lords come hither and drink libations of the flowing soma.
एवेन्द्राग्नी पपिवांसा सुतस्य विश्वास्मभ्यं सं जयतन्धनानि|	thus having drunk your fill of our libation win us all kinds of wealth indra and agni.
तन नो|	this prayer of ours may varuṇa grant and mitra and aditi and sindhu earth and heaven.
यजामहे वां महः सजोषा हव्येभिर्मित्रावरुणा नमोभिः|	we worship with our reverence and oblations you mitra varuṇa accordant mighty.
घर्तैर्घ्र्तस्नू अध यद वामस्मे अध्वर्यवो न धीतिभिर्भरन्ति|	so that with us ye twain whose backs are sprinkled with oil the priests with oil and hymns support you.
परस्तुतिर्वां धाम न परयुक्तिरयामि मित्रावरुणा सुव्र्क्तिः|	your praise is like a mighty power an impulse to you twain gods a wellformed hymn is offered.
अनक्ति यद वां विदथेषु होता सुम्नं वां सूरिर्व्र्षणावियक्षन|	as the priest decks yon strong ones in assemblies and the prince fain to worship you for blessings.
पीपाय धेनुरदितिर्र्ताय जनाय मित्रावरुणा हविर्दे|	o mitravaruṇa aditi the milchcow streams for the rite for folk who bring oblation.
हिनोति यद वां विदथे सपर्यन स रातहव्यो मानुषो न होता|	when in the assembly he who worships moves you like to a human priest with gifts presented.
उत वां विक्षु मद्यास्वन्धो गाव आपश्च पीपयन्त देवीः|	so may the kine and heavenly waters pour you sweet drink in families that make you joyful.
उतो नो अस्य पूर्व्यः पतिर्दन वीतं पातं पयस उस्रियायाः|	of this may he the ancient houselord give us enjoy drink of the milk the cow provideth.
अनर्वाणं वर्षभं मन्द्रजिह्वं बर्हस्पतिं वर्धया नव्यमर्कैः|	glorify thou bṛhaspati the scatheless who must be praised with hymns sweettongued and mighty.
गाथान्यः सुरुचो यस्य देवा आश्र्ण्वन्ति नवमानस्य मर्ताः|	to whom as leader of the song resplendent worthy of lauds both gods and mortals listen.
तं रत्विया उप वाचः सचन्ते सर्गो न यो देवयतामसर्जि|	on him wait songs according to the season even as a stream of pious men set moving.
बर्हस्पतिः स हयञ्जो वरांसि विभ्वाभवत सं रते मातरिश्वा|	bṛhaspatifor he laid out the expanseswas at the sacrifice vast mātariśvan.
उपस्तुतिं नमस उद्यतिं च शलोकं यंसत सवितेव पर बाहू|	the praise the verse that offers adoration may he bring forth as the sun sends his arms out.
अस्य करत्वाहन्यो यो अस्ति मर्गो न भीमो अरक्षसस्तुविष्मान|	he who gives daily light through this gods wisdom strong as a dread wild beast and inoffensive.
अस्य शलोको दिवीयते पर्थिव्यामत्यो न यंसद यक्षभ्र्द विचेताः|	his song of praise pervades the earth and heaven let the wise worshipper draw it like a courser.
मर्गाणां न हेतयो यन्ति चेमा बर्हस्पतेरहिमायानभि दयून|	these of bṛhaspati like hunters arrows go to the skies that change their hue like serpents.
ये तवा देवोस्रिकं मन्यमानाः पापा भद्रमुपजीवन्ति पज्राः|	those god who count thee as a worthless bullock and wealthy sinners live on thee the bounteous.
न दूढ्ये अनु ददासि वामं बर्हस्पते चयस इत पियारुम|	on fools like these no blessing thou bestowest bṛhaspati thou punishest the spiteful.
सुप्रैतुः सूयवसो न पन्था दुर्नियन्तुः परिप्रीतो न मित्रः|	like a fair path is he where grass is pleasant though hard to win a friend beloved most early.
अनर्वाणो अभि ये चक्षते नोअपीव्र्ता अपोर्णुवन्तो अस्थुः|	those who unharmed by enemies behold us while they would make them bare stood closely compassed.
सं यं सतुभोअवनयो न यन्ति समुद्रं न सरवतो रोधचक्राः|	he to whom songs of praise go forth like torrents as rivers eddying under banks flow seaward.
स विद्वानुभयं चष्टे अन्तर्ब्र्हस्पतिस्तर आपश्च गर्ध्रः|	bṛhaspati the wise the eager closely looks upon both the waters and the vessel.
एवा महस्तुविजातस्तुविष्मान बर्हस्पतिर्व्र्षभो धायि देवः|	so hath bṛhaspati great strong and mighty the god exceeding powerful been brought hither.
स न सतुतो वीरवद धातु गोमद वि|	may he thus lauded give us kine and horses may we find strengthening food in full abundance.
अबोध्यग्निर्ज्म उदेति सूर्यो वयुषाश्चन्द्रा मह्यावो अर्चिषा|	agni is wakened sūrya riseth from the earth mighty refulgent dawn hath shone with all her light.
आयुक्षातामश्विना यातवे रथं परासावीद देवः सविता जगत पर्थक|	the aśvins have equipped their chariot for the course god savitar hath moved the folk in sundry ways.
यद युञ्जाथे वर्षणमश्विना रथं घर्तेन नो मधुना कषत्रमुक्षतम|	when aśvins ye equip your very mighty car bedew ye twain our power with honey and with oil.
अस्माकं बरह्म पर्तनासु जिन्वतं वयं धना शूरसाता भजेमहि|	to our devotion give victorious strength in war may we win riches in the heroes strife for spoil.
अर्वां तरिचक्रो मधुवाहनो रथो जीराश्वो अश्विनोर्यातु सुष्टुतः|	nigh to us come the aśvins lauded threewheeled car the car laden with meath and drawn by fleetfoot steeds.
तरिवन्धुरो मघवा विश्वसौभगः शं न आ वक्षद दविपदे चतुष्पदे|	threeseated opulent bestowing all delight may it bring weal to us to cattle and to men.
आ न ऊर्जं वहतमश्विना युवं मधुमत्या नः कशया मिमिक्षतम|	bring hither nourishment for us ye aśvins twain sprinkle us with your whip that drops with honeydew.
परायुस्तारिष्टं नी रपांसि मर्क्षतं सेधतं दवेषो भवतं सचाभुवा|	prolong our days of life wipe out our trespasses destroy our foes be our companions and our friends.
युवं ह गर्भं जगतीषु धत्थो युवं विश्वेषु भुवनेष्वन्तः|	ye store the germ of life in female creatures ye lay it up within all living beings.
युवमग्निं च वर्षणावपश्च वनस्पतीन्रश्विनावैरयेथाम|	ye have sent forth o aśvins passing mighty the fire the sovrans of the wood the waters.
युवं ह सथो भिषजा भेषजेभिरथो ह सथो रथ्या राथ्येभिः|	leeches are ye with medicines to heal us and charioteers are ye with skill in driving.
अथो ह कषत्रमधि धत्थ उग्रा यो वां हविष्मान्मनसा ददाश|	ye strong give sway to him who brings oblation and with his heart pours out his gift before you.
इमा रुद्राय तवसे कपर्दिने कषयद्वीराय पर भरामहे मतीः|	to the strong rudra bring we these our songs of praise to him the lord of heroes with the braided hair.
यथा शमसद दविपदे चतुष्पदे विश्वं पुष्टंग्रामे अस्मिन्ननातुरम|	that it be well with all our cattle and our men that in this village all be healthy and wellfed.
मर्ळा नो रुद्रोत नो मयस कर्धि कषयद्वीराय नमसा विधेमते|	be gracious unto us o rudra bring us joy thee lord of heroes thee with reverence will we serve.
यच्छं च योश्च मनुरायेजे पिता तदश्याम तवरुद्र परणीतिषु|	whatever health and strength our father manu won by sacrifice may we under thy guidance gain.
अश्याम ते सुमतिं देवयज्यया कषयद्वीरस्य तव रुद्र मीढ्वः|	by worship of the gods may we o bounteous one o rudra gain thy grace ruler of valiant men.
सुम्नायन्निद विशो अस्माकमा चरारिष्टवीरा जुहवाम ते हविः|	come to our families bringing them bliss may we whose heroes are uninjured bring thee sacred gifts.
तवेषं वयं रुद्रं यज्ञसाधं वङकुं कविमवसे निह्वयामहे|	hither we call for aid the wise the wanderer impetuous rudra perfecter of sacrifice.
आरे अस्मद दैव्यं हेळो अस्यतु सुमतिमिद वयमस्या वर्णीमहे|	may he repel from us the anger of the gods verily we desire his favourable grace.
दिवो वराहमरुषं कपर्दिनं तवेषं रूपं नमसा निह्वयामहे|	him with the braided hair we call with reverence down the wildboar of the sky the red the dazzling shape.
हस्ते बिभ्रद भेषजा वार्याणि शर्म वर्म छर्दिरस्मभ्यं यंसत|	may he his hand filled full of sovran medicines grant us protection shelter and a home secure.
इदं पित्रे मरुतामुच्यते वचः सवादोः सवादीयो रुद्राय वर्धनम|	to him the maruts father is this hymn addressed to strengthen rudras might a song more sweet than sweet.
रास्वा च नो अम्र्त मर्तभोजनं तमने तोकाय तनयाय मर्ळ|	grant us immortal one the food which mortals eat be gracious unto me my seed my progeny.
मा नो महान्तमुत मा नो अर्भकं मा न उक्षन्तमुत मान उक्षितम|	o rudra harm not either great or small of us harm not the growing boy harm not the fullgrown man.
मा नो वधीः पितरं मोत मातरं मा नः परियास्तन्वो रुद्र रीरिषः|	slay not a sire among us slay no mother here and to our own dear bodies rudra do not harm.
मा नस्तोके तनये मा न आयौ मा नो गोषु मा नो अश्वेषुरीरिषः|	harm us not rudra in our seed and progeny harm us not in the living nor in cows or steeds.
वीरान मा नो रुद्र भामितो वधीर्हविष्मन्तःसदमित तवा हवामहे|	slay not our heroes in the fury of thy wrath bringing oblations evermore we call to thee.
उप ते सतोमान पशुपा इवाकरं रास्वा पितर्मरुतां सुम्नमस्मे|	even as a herdsman i have brought thee hymns of praise o father of the maruts give us happiness.
भद्रा हि ते सुमतिर्म्र्ळयत्तमाथा वयमव इत्ते वर्णीमहे|	blessed is thy most favouring benevolence so verily do we desire thy saving help.
आरे ते गोघ्नमुत पूरुषघ्नं कषयद्वीर सुम्नमस्मे तेस्तु|	far be thy dart that killeth men or cattle thy bliss be with us o thou lord of heroes.
मर्ळा च नो अधि च बरूहि देवाधा च नः शर्म यछद्विबर्हाः|	be gracious unto us o god and bless us and then vouchsafe us doublystrong protection.
अवोचाम नमो अस्मा अवस्यवः शर्णोतु नो हवं रुद्रो मरुत्वान|	we seeking help have spoken and adored him may rudra girt by maruts hear our calling.
तन नो|	this prayer of ours may varuṇa grant and mitra and aditi and sindhu earth and heaven.
का त उपेतिर्मनसो वराय भुवदग्ने शन्तमा का मनीषा|	how may the mind draw nigh to please thee agni what hymn of praise shall bring us greatest blessing.
को वा यज्ञैः परि दक्षं त आप केन वा ते मनसादाशेम|	or who hath gained thy power by sacrifices or with what mind shall we bring thee oblations.
एह्यग्न इह होता नि षीदादब्धः सु पुरेता भवा नः|	come hither agni sit thee down as hotar be thou who never wast deceived our leader.
अवतां तवा रोदसी विश्वमिन्वे यजा महे सौमनसाय देवान|	may heaven and earth the allpervading love thee worship the gods to win for us their favour.
पर सु विश्वान रक्षसो धक्ष्यग्ने भवा यज्ञानामभिशस्तिपावा|	burn thou up all the rākṣasas o agni ward thou off curses from our sacrifices.
अथा वह सोमपतिं हरिभ्यामातिथ्यमस्मै चक्र्मा सुदाव्ने|	bring hither with his bays the lord of soma here is glad welcome for the bounteous giver.
परजावता वचसा वह्निरासा च हुवे नि च सत्सीह देवैः|	thou priest with lip and voice that bring us children hast been invoked here with the gods be seated.
वेषि होत्रमुत पोत्रं यजत्र बोधि परयन्तर्जनितर्वसूनाम|	thine is the task of cleanser and presenter waken us wealthbestower and producer.
यथा विप्रस्य मनुषो हविर्भिर्देवानयजः कविभिः कविः सन|	as with oblations of the priestly manus thou worshippedst the gods a sage with sages.
एवा होतः सत्यतर तवमद्याग्ने मन्द्रया जुह्वा यजस्व|	so now o truthfullest invoker agni worship this day with joybestowing ladle.
वसिष्वा हि मियेध्य वस्त्राण्यूर्जां पते|	o worthy of oblation lord of prospering powers assume thy robes.
सेमं नो अध्वरं यज|	and offer this our sacrifice.
नि नो होता वरेण्यः सदा यविष्ठ मन्मभिः|	sit ever to be chosen as our priest most youthful through our hymns.
अग्ने दिवित्मता वचः|	o agni through our heavenly word.
आ नि षमा सूनवे पितापिर्यजत्यापये|	for here a father for his son kinsman for kinsman worshippeth.
सखा सख्ये वरेण्यः|	and friend choiceworthy for his friend.
आ नो बर्ही रिशादसो वरुणो मित्रो अर्यमा|	here let the foedestroyers sit varuṇa mitra aryaman.
सीदन्तु मनुषो यथा|	like men upon our sacred grass.
पूर्व्य होतरस्य नो मन्दस्व सख्यस्य च|	o ancient herald be thou glad in this our rite and fellowship.
इमा उ षु शरुधी गिरः|	hearken thou well to these our songs.
यच्चिद धि शश्वता तना देवंदेवं यजामहे|	whateer in this perpetual course we sacrifice to god and god.
तवे इद्धूयते हविः|	that gift is offered up in thee.
परियो नो अस्तु विश्पतिर्होता मन्द्रो वरेण्यः|	may he be our dear household lord priest pleasant and choiceworthy may.
परियाः सवग्नयो वयम|	we with bright fires be dear to him.
सवग्नयो हि वार्यं देवासो दधिरे च नः|	the gods adored with brilliant fires have granted precious wealth to us.
सवग्नयो मनामहे|	so with bright fires we pray to thee.
अथा न उभयेषामम्र्त मर्त्यानाम|	and o immortal one so may the eulogies of mortal men.
मिथः सन्तु परशस्तयः|	belong to us and thee alike.
विश्वेभिरग्ने अग्निभिरिमं यज्ञमिदं वचः|	with all thy fires o agni find pleasure in this our sacrifice.
चनो धाः सहसो यहो|	and this our speech o son of strength.
रयिर्न चित्रा सूरो न सन्द्र्गायुर्न पराणो नित्यो नसूनुः|	like the suns glance like wealth of varied sort like breath which is the life like ones own son.
तक्वा न भूर्णिर्वना सिषक्ति पयो न धेनुः शुचिर्विभावा|	like a swift bird a cow who yields her milk pure and refulgent to the wood he speeds.
दाधार कषेममोको न रण्वो यवो न पक्वो जेता जनानाम|	he offers safety like a pleasant home like ripened corn the conqueror of men.
रषिर्न सतुभ्वा विक्षु परशस्तो वाजी न परीतो वयोदधति|	like a seer lauding famed among the folk like a steed friendly he vouchsafes us power.
दुरोकशोचिः करतुर्न नित्यो जायेव योनावरं विश्वस्मै|	with flame insatiate like eternal might caring for each one like a dame at home.
चित्रो यदभ्राट छवेतो न विक्षु रथो न रुक्मी तवेषः समत्सु|	bright when he shines forth whitish mid the folk like a car golddecked thundering to the fight.
सेनेव सर्ष्टामं दधात्यस्तुर्न दिद्युत तवेषप्रतीका|	he strikes with terror like a dart shot forth een like an archers arrow tipped with flame.
यमो ह जातो यमो जनित्वं जारः कनीनां पतिर्जनीनाम|	master of present and of future life the maidens lover and the matrons lord.
तं वश्चराथा वयं वसत्यास्तं न गावो नक्षन्त इद्धम|	to him lead all your ways may we attain the kindled god as cows their home at eve.
सिन्धुर्न कषोदः पर नीचीरैनोन नवन्त गावः सवर्द्र्शीके|	he drives the flames below as floods their swell the rays rise up to the fair place of heaven.
महश्चित तवमिन्द्र यत एतान महश्चिदसि तयजसो वरूता|	as indra from great treason thou protectest yea from great treachery these who approach us.
स नो वेधो मरुतां चिकित्वान सुम्ना वनुष्व तव हि परेष्ठा|	so marking well controller of the maruts grant us their blessings for they are thy dearest.
अयुज्रन त इन्द्र विश्वक्र्ष्टीर्विदानासो निष्षिधो मर्त्यत्रा|	the various doings of all mortal people by thee are ordered in thy wisdom indra.
मरुतां पर्त्सुतिर्हासमाना सवर्मीळ्हस्य परधनस्य सातौ|	the host of maruts goeth forth exulting to win the lightbestowing spoil of battle.
अम्यक सा त इन्द्र रष्टिरस्मे सनेम्यभ्वं मरुतो जुनन्ति|	that spear of thine sat firm for us o indra the maruts set their whole dread power in motion.
अग्निश्चिद धि षमातसे शुशुक्वानापो न दवीपं दधतिप्रयांसि|	een agni shines resplendent in the brushwood the viands hold him as floods hold an island.
तवं तू न इन्द्र तं रयिं दा ओजिष्ठया दक्षिणयेव रातिम|	vouchsafe us now that opulence o indra as guerdon won by mightiest donation.
सतुतश्च यास्ते चकनन्त वायो सतनं न मध्वःपीपयन्त वाजैः|	may hymns that please thee cause the breast of vāyu to swell as with the meads refreshing sweetness.
तवे राय इन्द्र तोशतमाः परणेतारः कस्य चिद रतायोः|	with thee o indra are most bounteous riches that further every one who lives uprightly.
ते षु णो मरुतो मर्ळयन्तु ये समा पुरा गातूयन्तीव देवाः|	now may these maruts show us lovingkindness gods who of old were ever prompt to help us.
परति पर याहीन्द्र मीळ्हुषो नॄन महः पार्थिवे सदने यतस्व|	bring forth the men who rain down boons o indra exert thee in the great terrestrial region.
अध यदेषां पर्थुबुध्नास एतास्तीर्थे नार्यः पौंस्यानि तस्थुः|	for their broadchested speckled deer are standing like a kings armies on the field of battle.
परति घोराणामेतानामयासां मरुतां शर्ण्व आयतामुपब्दिः|	heard is the roar of the advancing maruts terrific glittering and swiftly moving.
ये मर्त्यं पर्तनायन्तमूमैर्र्णावानं न पतयन्त सर्गैः|	who with their rush oerthrow as twere a sinner the mortal who would fight with those who love him.
तवं मानेभ्य इन्द्र विश्वजन्या रदा मरुद्भिः शुरुधो गोग्राः|	give to the mānas indra with maruts gifts universal gifts of cattle foremost.
सतवानेभि सतवसे देव देवैर्विद्यामेषं वर्जनं जीरदानुम|	thou god art praised with gods who must be lauded may we find strengthening food in full abundance.
नयू षु वाचं पर महे भरामहे गिर इन्द्राय सदने विवस्वतः|	we will present fair praise unto the mighty one our hymns to indra in vivasvāns dwellingplace.
नू चिद धि रत्नं ससतामिवाविदन न दुष्टुतिर्द्रविणोदेषु शस्यते|	for he hath neer found wealth in those who seem to sleep those who give wealth to men accept no paltry praise.
दुरो अश्वस्य दुर इन्द्र गोरसि दुरो यवस्य वसुन इनस पतिः|	giver of horses indra giver thou of kine giver of barley thou art lord and guard of wealth.
शिक्षानरः परदिवो अकामकर्शनः सखा सखिभ्यस्तमिदं गर्णीमसि|	mans helper from of old not disappointing hope friend of our friends to thee as such we sing this praise.
शचीव इन्द्र पुरुक्र्द दयुमत्तम तवेदिदमभितश्चेकिते वसु|	indra most splendid powerful rich in mighty deeds this treasure spread around is known to be thine own.
अतः संग्र्भ्याभिभूत आ भर मा तवायतो जरितुः काममूनयीः|	gather therefrom o conqueror and bring to us fail not the hope of him who loves and sings to thee.
एभिर्द्युभिः सुमना एभिरिन्दुभिर्निरुन्धानो अमतिं गोभिरश्विना|	well pleased with these bright flames and with these soma drops take thou away our poverty with seeds and kine.
इन्द्रेण दस्युं दरयन्त इन्दुभिर्युतद्वेषसःसमिषा रभेमहि|	with indra scattering the dasyu through these drops freed from their hate may we obtain abundant food.
समिन्द्र राया समिषा रभेमहि सं वाजेभिः पुरुश्चन्द्रैरभिद्युभिः|	let us obtain o indra plenteous wealth and food with strength exceeding glorious shining to the sky.
सं देव्या परमत्या वीरशुष्मया गोग्रयाश्वावत्या रभेमहि|	may we obtain the goddess providence the strength of heroes special source of cattle rich in steeds.
ते तवा मदा अमदन तानि वर्ष्ण्या ते सोमासो वर्त्रहत्येषु सत्पते|	these our libations strengthinspiring soma draughts gladdened thee in the fight with vṛtra hero lord.
यत कारवे दश वर्त्राण्यप्रति बर्हिष्मते नि सहस्राणि बर्हयः|	what time thou slewest for the singer with trimmed grass ten thousand vṛtras thou resistless in thy might.
युधा युधमुप घेदेषि धर्ष्णुया पुरा पुरं समिदं हंस्योजसा|	thou goest on from fight to fight intrepidly destroying castle after castle here with strength.
नम्या यदिन्द्र सख्या परावति निबर्हयो नमुचिं नाम मायिनम|	thou indra with thy friend who makes the foe bow down slewest from far away the guileful namuci.
तवं करञ्जमुत पर्णयं वधीस्तेजिष्ठयातिथिग्वस्यवर्तनी|	thou hast struck down in death karañja parṇaya in atithigvas very glorious going forth.
तवं शता वङगर्दस्याभिनत पुरोअनानुदः परिषूता रजिश्वना|	unyielding when Ṛjiśvan compassed them with siege thou hast destroyed the hundred forts of vaṅgṛida.
तवमेताञ जनराज्ञो दविर्दशाबन्धुना सुश्रवसोपजग्मुषः|	with alloutstripping chariotwheel o indra thou farfamed hast overthrown the twice ten kings of men.
षष्टिं सहस्रा नवतिं नव शरुतो नि चक्रेण रथ्या दुष्पदाव्र्णक|	with sixty thousand nineandninety followers who came in arms to fight with friendless suśravas.
तवमाविथ सुश्रवसं तवोतिभिस्तव तरामभिरिन्द्र तूर्वयाणम|	thou hast protected suśravas with succour and tūrvayāṇa with thine aid o indra.
तवमस्मै कुत्समतिथिग्वमायुं महे राज्ञे यूने अरन्धनायः|	thou madest kutsa atithigva Āyu subject unto this king the young the mighty.
य उद्र्चीन्द्र देवगोपाः सखायस्ते शिवतमा असाम|	may we protected by the gods hereafter remain thy very prosperous friends o indra.
तवां सतोषाम तवया सुवीरा दराघीय आयुः परतरं दधानाः|	thee we extol enjoying through thy favour life long and joyful and with store of heroes.
आ नो भद्राः करतवो कष्यन्तु विश्वतोअदब्धासो अपरीतास उद्भिदः|	may powers auspicious come to us from every side never deceived unhindered and victorious.
देवा नो यथा सदमिद वर्धे असन्नप्रायुवो रक्षितारो दिवेदिवे|	that the gods ever may be with us for our gain our guardians day by day unceasing in their care.
देवानां भद्रा सुमतिर्र्जूयतां देवानां रातिरभि नोनि वर्तताम|	may the auspicious favour of the gods be ours on us descend the bounty of the righteous gods.
देवानां सख्यमुप सेदिमा वयं देवा न आयुः पर तिरन्तु जीवसे|	the friendship of the gods have we devoutly sought so may the gods extend our life that we may live.
तान पूर्वया निविदा हूमहे वयं भगं मित्रमदितिं दक्षमस्रिधम|	we call them hither with a hymn of olden time bhaga the friendly dakṣa mitra aditi.
अर्यमणं वरुणं सोममश्विना सरस्वतीनः सुभगा मयस करत|	aryaman varuṇa soma the aśvins may sarasvatī auspicious grant felicity.
तन नो वातो मयोभु वातु भेषजं तन माता पर्थिवी तत्पिता दयौः|	may the wind waft to us that pleasant medicine may earth our mother give it and our father heaven.
तद गरावाणः सोमसुतो मयोभुवस्तदश्विना शर्णुतं धिष्ण्या युवम|	and the joygiving stones that press the somas juice aśvins may ye for whom our spirits long hear this.
तमीशानं जगतस्तस्थुषस पतिं धियंजिन्वमवसे हूमहे वयम|	him we invoke for aid who reigns supreme the lord of all that stands or moves inspirer of the soul.
पूषा नो यथा वेदसामसद वर्धे रक्षिता पायुरदब्धः सवस्तये|	that pūṣan may promote the increase of our wealth our keeper and our guard infallible for our good.
सवस्ति न इन्द्रो वर्द्धश्रवाः सवस्ति नः पुषा विश्ववेदाः|	illustrious far and wide may indra prosper us may pūṣan prosper us the master of all wealth.
सवस्ति नस्तार्क्ष्यो अरिष्टनेमिः सवस्ति नो बर्हस्पतिर्दधातु|	may tārkṣya with uninjured fellies prosper us bṛhaspati vouchsafe to us prosperity.
पर्षदश्वा मरुतः पर्श्निमातरः शुभंयावानो विदथेषुजग्मयः|	the maruts sons of pṛśni borne by spotted steeds moving in glory oft visiting holy rites.
अग्निजिह्वा मनवः सूरचक्षसो विश्वे नो देवा अवसा गमन्निह|	sages whose tongue is agni brilliant as the sunhither let all the gods for our protection come.
भद्रं कर्णेभिः शर्णुयाम देवा भद्रं पश्येमाक्षभिर्यजत्राः|	gods may we with our ears listen to what is good and with our eyes see what is good ye holy ones.
सथिरैरङगैस्तुष्टुवांसस्तनूभिर्व्यशेमदेवहितं यदायुः|	with limbs and bodies firm may we extolling you attain the term of life appointed by the gods.
शतमिन नु शरदो अन्ति देवा यत्रा नश्चक्रा जरसं तनूनाम|	a hundred autumns stand before us o ye gods within whose space ye bring our bodies to decay.
पुत्रासो यत्र पितरो भवन्ति मा नो मध्या रीरिषतायुर्गन्तोः|	within whose space our sons become fathers in turn break ye not in the midst our course of fleeting life.
अदितिर्द्यौरदितिरन्तरिक्षमदितिर्माता स पिता स पुत्रः|	aditi is the heaven aditi is midair aditi is the mother and the sire and son.
विश्वे देवा अदितिः पञ्च जना अदितिर्जातमदितिर्जनित्वम|	aditi is all gods aditi fiveclassed men aditi all that hath been born and shall be born.
योनिष ट इन्द्र निषदे अकारि तमा नि षीद सवानो नार्वा|	the altar hath been made for thee to rest on come like a panting courser and be seated.
विमुच्य वयोअवसायाश्वान दोषा वस्तोर्वहीयसः परपित्वे|	loosen thy flying steeds set free thy horses who bear thee swiftly nigh at eve and morning.
ओ तये नर इन्द्रमूतये गुर्नू चित तान सद्यो अध्वनो जगम्यात|	these men have come to indra for assistance shall he not quickly come upon these pathways.
देवासो मन्युं दासस्य शचम्नन ते न आ वक्षन सुविताय वर्णम|	may the gods quell the fury of the dāsa and may they lead our folk to happy fortune.
अव तमन भरते केतवेदा अव तमना भरते फेनमुदन|	he who hath only wish as his possession casts on himself casts foam amid the waters.
कषीरेण सनातः कुयवस्य योषे हते ते सयातां परवणे शिफायाः|	both wives of kuyava in milk have bathed them may they be drowned within the depth of Śiphā.
युयोप नाभिरुपरस्यायोः पर पूर्वाभिस्तिरते राष्टि शूरः|	this hath his kinship checked who lives beside us with ancient streams forth speeds and rules the hero.
अञ्जसी कुलिशी वीरपत्नी पयो हिन्वाना उदभिर्भरन्ते|	añjasī kuliśī and virapatnī delighting him bear milk upon their waters.
परति यत सया नीथादर्शि दस्योरोको नाछा सदनं जानती गात|	soon as this dasyus traces were discovered as she who knows her home he sought the dwelling.
अध समा नो मघवञ्चर्क्र्तादिन मा नो मघेव निष्षपी परा दाः|	now think thou of us maghavan nor cast us away as doth a profligate his treasure.
