कषपो राजन्नुत तमनाग्ने वस्तोरुतोषसः|	o agni shining of thyself by night and when the morning breaks.
स तिग्मजम्भ रक्षसो दह परति|	burn thou whose teeth are sharp against the rākṣasas.
अवा नो अग्न ऊतिभिर्गायत्रस्य परभर्मणि|	adorable in all our rites favour us agni with thine aid.
विश्वासु धीषु वन्द्य|	when the great hymn is chanted forth.
आ नो अग्ने रयिं भर सत्रासाहं वरेण्यम|	bring to us everconquering wealth wealth agni worthy of our choice.
विश्वासु पर्त्सुदुष्टरम|	in all our frays invincible.
आ नो अग्ने सुचेतुना रयिं विश्वायुपोषसम|	give us o agni through thy grace wealth that supporteth all our life.
मार्डीकं धेहि जीवसे|	thy favour so that we may live.
पर पूतास्तिग्मशोचिषे वाचो गोतमाग्नये|	o gotama desiring bliss present thy songs composed with care.
भरस्व सुम्नयुर्गिरः|	to agni of the pointed flames.
यो नो अग्नेअभिदासत्यन्ति दूरे पदीष्ट सः|	may the man fall o agni who near or afar assaileth us.
अस्माकमिद वर्धे भव|	do thou increase and prosper us.
सहस्राक्षो विचर्षणिरग्नी रक्षांसि सेधति|	keen and swift agni thousandeyed chaseth the rākṣasas afar.
होता गर्णीत उक्थ्यः|	he singeth herald meet for lauds.
तवं राजेन्द्र ये च देवा रक्षा नॄन पाह्यसुर तवमस्मान|	thou art the king of all the gods o indra protect the men o asura preserve us.
तवं सत्पतिर्मघवा नस्तरुत्रस्त्वं सत्यो वसवानः सहोदाः|	thou lord of heroes maghavan our saver art faithful very rich the victorygiver.
दनो विश इन्द्र मर्ध्रवाचः सप्त यत पुरः शर्म शारदीर्दर्त|	indra thou humbledst tribes that spake with insult by breaking down seven autumn forts their refuge.
रणोरपो अनवद्यार्णा यूने वर्त्रं पुरुकुत्साय रन्धीः|	thou stirredst blameless billowy floods and gavest his foe a prey to youthful purukutsa.
अजा वर्त इन्द्र शूरपत्नीर्द्यां च येभिः पुरुहूत नूनम|	with whom thou drivest troops whose lords are heroes and bringest daylight now much worshipped indra.
रक्षो अग्निमशुषं तूर्वयाणं सिंहो न दमे अपांसि वस्तोः|	with them guard lionlike wasting active agni to dwell in our tilled fields and in our homestead.
शेषन नु त इन्द्र सस्मिन योनौ परशस्तये पवीरवस्य मह्ना|	they through the greatness of thy spear o indra shall to thy praise rest in this earthly station.
सर्जदर्णांस्यव यद युधा गास्तिष्ठद धरी धर्षता मर्ष्ट वाजान|	to loose the floods to seek for kine the battle his bays he mounted boldly seized the booty.
वह कुत्समिन्द्र यस्मिञ्चाकन सयूमन्यू रज्रा वातस्याश्वा|	indra bear kutsa him in whom thou joyest the darkred horses of the wind are docile.
पर सूरश्चक्रं वर्हतादभीकेअभि सप्र्धो यासिषद्वज्रबाहुः|	let the sun roll his chariot wheel anear us and let the thunderer go to meet the foemen.
जघन्वानिन्द्र मित्रेरूञ्चोदप्रव्र्द्धो हरिवो अदाशून|	thou indra lord of bays made strong by impulse hast slain the vexers of thy friends who give not.
परये पश्यन्नर्यमणं सचायोस्त्वया शूर्ता वहमाना अपत्यम|	they who beheld the friend beside the living were cast aside by thee as they rode onward.
रपत कविरिन्द्रार्कसातौ कषां दासायोपबर्हणीं कः|	indra the bard sang forth in inspiration thou madest earth a covering for the dāsa.
करत तिस्रो मघवा दानुचित्रा नि दुर्योणे कुयवाचं मर्धिश्रेत|	maghavan made the three that gleam with moisture and to his home brought kuyavāc to slay him.
सना ता त इन्द्र नव्या आगुः सहो नभोअविरणाय पूर्वीः|	these thine old deeds new bards have sung o indra thou conqueredst boundest many tribes for ever.
भिनत पुरो न भिदो अदेवीर्ननमो वधरदेवस्य पीयोः|	like castles thou hast crushed the godless races and bowed the godless scorners deadly weapon.
तवं धुनिरिन्द्र धुनिमतीर्र्णोरपः सीरा न सरवन्तीः|	a stormer thou hast made the stormy waters flow down o indra like the running rivers.
पर यत समुद्रमति शूर पर्षि पारया तुर्वशं यदुं सवस्ति|	when oer the flood thou broughtest them o hero thou keptest turvaśa and yadu safely.
तवमस्माकमिन्द्र विश्वध सय अव्र्कतमो नरां नर्पाता|	indra mayst thou be ours in all occasions protector of the men most gentlehearted.
स नो विश्वासां सप्र्धां सहोदा वि|	giving us victory over all our rivals may we find strengthening food in full abundance.
शुक्रः शुशुक्वानुषो न जारः पप्रा समीची दिवो नज्योतिः|	bright splendid like dawns lover he hath filled the two joined worlds as with the light of heaven.
परि परजातः करत्वा बभूथ भुवो देवानां पिता पुत्रः सन|	when born with might thou hast encompassed them father of gods and yet their son wast thou.
वेधा अद्र्प्तो अग्निर्विजानन्नूधर्न गोनां सवाद्मा पितूनाम|	agni the sage the humble who discerns like the cows udder the sweet taste of food.
जने न शेव आहूर्यः सन मध्ये निषत्तो रण्वो दुरोणे|	like a blissgiver to be drawn to men sits gracious in the middle of the house.
पुत्रो न जातो रण्वो दुरोणे वाजी न परीतो विशो वि तारीत|	born in the dwelling like a lovely son pleased like a strong steed he bears on the folk.
विशो यदह्वे नर्भिः सनीळा अग्निर्देवत्वा विश्वान्यश्याः|	what time the men and i with heroes call may agni then gain all through godlike power.
नकिष ट एता वरता मिनन्ति नर्भ्यो यदेभ्यः शरुष्टिं चकर्थ|	none breaks these holy laws of thine when thou hast granted audience to these chieftains here.
तत तु ते दंसो यदहन समानैर्न्र्भिर्यद युक्तो विवे रपांसि|	this is thy boast thou smotest with thy peers and joined with heroes dravest off disgrace.
उषो न जारो विभावोस्रः संज्ञातरूपश्चिकेतदस्मै|	like the dawns lover spreading light wellknown as hued like morn may he remember me.
तमना वहन्तो दुरो वय रण्वन नवन्त विश्वे सवर्द्र्शीके|	they bearing of themselves unbar the doors they all ascend to the fair place of heaven.
अभूदिदं वयुनमो षु भूषता रथो वर्षण्वान मदता मनीषिणः|	this was the task appear promptly ye prudent ones here is the chariot drawn by strong steeds be ye glad.
धियंजिन्वा धिष्ण्या विश्पलावसू दिवो नपात सुक्र्ते शुचिव्रता|	heartstirring longed for succourers of viśpalā here are heavens sons whose sway blesses the pious man.
इन्द्रतमा हि धिष्ण्या मरुत्तमा दस्रा दंसिष्ठा रथ्या रथीतमा|	longed for most indralike mighty most marutlike most wonderful in deed carborne best charioteers.
पूर्णं रथं वहेथे मध्व आचितं तेन दाश्वांसमुप याथो अश्विना|	bring your full chariot hither heaped with liquid sweet thereon ye aśvins come to him who offers gifts.
किमत्र दस्रा कर्णुथः किमासाथे जनो यः कश्चिदहविर्महीयते|	what make ye there ye mighty wherefore linger ye with folk who offering not are held in high esteem.
अति करमिष्टं जुरतं पणेरसुं जयोतिर्विप्राय कर्णुतं वचस्यवे|	pass over them make ye the niggards life decay give light unto the singer eloquent in praise.
जम्भयतमभितो रायतः शुनो हतं मर्धो विदथुस्तान्यश्विना|	crunch up on every side the dogs who bark at us slay ye our foes o aśvins this ye understand.
वाचंवाचं जरितू रत्निनीं कर्तमुभा शंसं नासत्यावतं मम|	make wealthy every word of him who praises you accept with favour both nāsatyas this my laud.
युवमेतं चक्रथुः सिन्धुषु पलवमात्मन्वन्तं पक्षिणन्तौग्र्याय कम|	ye made for tugras son amid the waterfloods that animated ship with wings to fly withal.
येन देवत्रा मनसा निरूहथुः सुपप्तनीपेतथुः कषोदसो महः|	whereon with goddevoted mind ye brought him forth and fled with easy flight from out the mighty surge.
अवविद्धं तौग्र्यमप्स्वन्तरनारम्भणे तमसि परविद्धम|	four ships most welcome in the midst of ocean urged by the aśvins save the son of tugra.
चतस्रो नावो जठलस्य जुष्टा उदश्विभ्यामिषिताः पारयन्ति|	him who was cast down headlong in the waters plunged in the thick inevitable darkness.
कः सविद वर्क्षो निष्ठितो मध्ये अर्णसो यं तौग्र्यो नाधितः पर्यषस्वजत|	what tree was that which stood fixed in surrounding sea to which the son of tugra supplicating clung.
पर्णा मर्गस्य पतरोरिवारभ उदश्विना ऊहथुः शरोमताय कम|	like twigs of which some winged creature may take hold ye aśvins bore him off safely to your renown.
तद वां नरा नासत्यावनु षयाद यद वां मानास उचथमवोचन|	welcome to you be this the hymn of praises uttered by mānas o nāsatyas heroes.
अस्मादद्य सदसः सोम्यादा वि|	from this our gathering where we offer soma may we find strengthening food in full abundance.
सं पूषन्नध्वनस्तिर वयंहो विमुचो नपात|	shorten our ways o pūṣan move aside obstruction in the path.
सक्ष्वा देवप्र णस पुरः|	go close before us cloudborn god.
यो नः पूषन्नघो वर्को दुःशेव आदिदेशति|	drive pūṣan from our road the wolf the wicked inauspicious wolf.
अप सम तम्पथो जहि|	who lies in wait to injure us.
अप तयं परिपन्थिनं मुषीवाणं हुरश्चितम|	who lurks about the path we take the robber with a guileful heart.
दूरमधिस्रुतेरज|	far from the road chase him away.
तवं तस्य दवयाविनोअघशंसस्य कस्य चित|	tread with thy foot and trample out the firebrand of the wicked one.
पदाभि तिष्ठ तपुषिम|	the doubletongued whoeer he be.
आ तत ते दस्र मन्तुमः पूषन्नवो वर्णीमहे|	wise pūṣan wonderworker we claim of thee now the aid wherewith.
येन पितॄनचोदयः|	thou furtheredst our sires of old.
अधा नो विश्वसौभग हिरण्यवाशीमत्तम|	so lord of all prosperity best wielder of the golden sword.
धनानि सुषणा कर्धि|	make riches easy to be won.
अति नः सश्चतो नय सुगा नः सुपथा कर्णु|	past all pursuers lead us make pleasant our path and fair to tread.
पूषन्निहक्रतुं विदः|	o pūṣan find thou power for this.
अभि सूयवसं नय न नवज्वारो अध्वने|	lead us to meadows rich in grass send on our way no early heat.
पू|	o pūṣan find thou power for this.
शग्धि पूर्धि पर यंसि च शिशीहि परास्युदरम|	be gracious to us fill us full give feed us and invigorate.
पू|	o pūṣan find thou power for this.
न पूषणं मेथामसि सूक्तैरभि गर्णीमसि|	no blame have we for pūṣan him we magnify with songs of praise.
वसूनि दस्ममीमहे|	we seek the mighty one for wealth.
अग्निं होतारं मन्ये दास्वन्तं वसुं सूनुं सहसो जातवेदसं विप्रं न जातवेदसम|	agni i hold as herald the munificent the gracious son of strength who knoweth all that live as holy singer knowing all.
य ऊर्ध्वया सवध्वरो देवो देवाच्या कर्पा|	lord of fair rites a god with form erected turning to the gods.
घर्तस्य विभ्राष्टिमनु वष्टि शोचिषाजुह्वानस्य सर्पिषः|	he when the flame hath sprung forth from the holy oil the offered fatness longeth for it with his glow.
यजिष्ठं तवा यजमाना हुवेम जयेष्ठमङगिरसां विप्रमन्मभिर्विप्रेभिः शुक्र मन्मभिः|	we sacrificing call on thee best worshipper the eldest of aṅgirases singer with hymns thee brilliant one with singers hymns.
परिज्मानमिव दयां होतारं चर्षणीनाम|	thee wandering round as t were the sky who art the invoking priest of men.
शोचिष्केशं वर्षणं यमिमा विशः परावन्तु जूतये विशः|	whom bull with hair of flame the people must observe the people that he speed them on.
स हि पुरू चिदोजसा विरुक्मता दीद्यानो भवति दरुहन्तरः परशुर्न दरुहन्तरः|	he with his shining glory blazing far and wide he verily it is who slayeth demon foes slayeth the demons like an axe.
वीळु चिद यस्य सम्र्तौ शरुवद वनेव यत सथिरम|	at whose close touch things solid shake and what is stable yields like trees.
निःषहमाणो यमते नायते धन्वासहा नायते|	subduing all he keeps his ground and flinches not from the skilled archer flinches not.
दर्लःा चिदस्मा अनु दुर्यथा विदे तेजिष्ठाभिररणिभिर्दाष्ट्यवसेअग्नये दाष्ट्यवसे|	to him as one who knows even things solid yield unrough firesticks heated hot he gives his gifts to aid men offer agni gifts for aid.
पर यः पुरूणि गाहते तक्षद वनेव शोचिषा|	he deeply piercing many a thing hews it like wood with fervent glow.
सथिरा चिदन्ना नि रिणात्योजसा नि सथिराणि चिदोजसा|	even hard and solid food he crunches with his might yea hard and solid food with might.
तमस्य पर्क्षमुपरासु धीमहि नक्तं यः सुदर्शतरो दिवातरादप्रायुषे दिवातरात|	here near we place the sacrificial food for him who shines forth fairer in the night than in the day with life then stronger than by day.
आदस्यायुर्ग्रभणवद वीळु शर्म न सूनवे|	his life gives sure and firm defence as that one giveth to a son.
भक्तमभक्तमवो वयन्तो अजरा अग्नयो वयन्तो अजराः|	the during fires enjoy things given and things not given the during fires enjoy as food.
स हि शर्धो न मारुतं तुविष्वणिरप्नस्वतीषूर्वरास्विष्टनिरार्तनास्विष्टनिः|	he roaring very loudly like the maruts host in fertile cultivated fields adorable in desert spots adorable.
आदद धव्यान्याददिर्यज्ञस्य केतुरर्हणा|	accepts and eats our offered gifts ensign of sacrifice by desert.
अध समास्य हर्षतो हर्षीवतो विश्वे जुषन्त पन्थां नरः शुभे न पन्थाम|	so let all joying love his path when he is glad as men pursue a path for bliss.
दविता यदीं कीस्तासो अभिद्यवो नमस्यन्त उपवोचन्त भर्गवो मथ्नन्तो दासा भर्गवः|	even as they who sang forth hymns addressed to heaven the bhṛgus with their prayer and praise invited him the bhṛgus rubbing offering gifts.
अग्निरीशे वसूनां शुचिर्यो धर्णिरेषाम|	for radiant agni lord of all these treasures is exceeding strong.
परियानपिधीन्र्वनिषीष्ट मेधिर आ वनिषीष्ट मेधिरह|	may he the wise accept the grateful coverings the wise accept the coverings.
विश्वासां तवा विशां पतिं हवामहे सर्वासां समानन्दम्पतिं भुजे सत्यगिर्वाहसं भुजे|	thee we invoke the lord of all our settled homes common to all the households guardian to enjoy bearer of true hymns to enjoy.
अतिथिं मानुषाणां पितुर्न यस्यासया|	thee we invoke the guest of men by whose mouth even as a sires.
अमी च विश्वे अम्र्तास आ वयो हव्यादेवेष्वा वयः|	all these immortals come to gain their food of life oblations come to gods as food.
तवमग्ने सहसा सहन्तमः शुष्मिन्तमो जायसे देवतातये रयिर्न देवतातये|	thou agni most victorious with thy conquering strength most mighty one art born for service of the gods like wealth for service of the gods.
शुष्मिन्तमो हि ते मदो दयुम्निन्तम उत करतुः|	most mighty is thine ecstasy most splendid is thy mental power.
अध समा ते परि चरन्त्यजर शरुष्टीवानो नाजर|	therefore men wait upon thee undecaying one like vassals undecaying one.
पर वो महे सहसा सहस्वत उषर्बुधे पशुषे नाग्नये सतोमो बभूत्वग्नये|	to him the mighty conquering with victorious strength to agni walking with the dawn who sendeth kine be sung your laud to agni sung.
परति यदीं हविष्मान विश्वासु कषासु जोगुवे|	as he who with oblation comes calls him aloud in every place.
अग्रे रेभो न जरत रषूणां जूर्णिर्होत रषूणाम|	before the brands of fire he shouteth singerlike the herald kindler of the brands.
स नो नेदिष्ठं दद्र्शान आ भराग्ने देवेभिः सचनाःसुचेतुना महो रायाः सुचेतुना|	agni beheld by us in nearest neighbourhood accordant with the gods bring us with gracious love great riches with thy gracious love.
महि शविष्ठ नस कर्धि संचक्षे भुजे अस्यै|	give us o mightiest what is great to see and to enjoy the earth.
महि सतोत्र्भ्यो मघवन सुवीर्यं मथीरुग्रो न शवसा|	as one of awful power stir up heroic might for those who praise thee bounteous lord.
सुसमिद्धो न आ वह देवानग्ने हविष्मते|	agni wellkindled bring the gods for him who offers holy gifts.
होतः पावक यक्षि च|	worship them purifier priest.
मधुमन्तं तनूनपाद यज्ञं देवेषु नः कवे|	son of thyself present o sage our sacrifice to the gods today.
अद्या कर्णुहि वीतये|	sweet to the taste that they may feast.
नराशंसमिह परियमस्मिन यज्ञ उप हवये|	dear narāśaṁsa sweet of tongue the giver of oblations i.
मधुजिह्वंहविष्क्र्तम|	invoke to this our sacrifice.
अग्ने सुखतमे रथे देवानीळित आ वह|	agni on thy most easy car glorified hither bring the gods.
असि होता मनुर्हितः|	manu appointed thee as priest.
सत्र्णीत बर्हिरानुषग घर्तप्र्ष्ठं मनीषिणः|	strew o ye wise the sacred grass that drips with oil in order due.
यत्राम्र्तस्य चक्षणम|	where the immortal is beheld.
वि शरयन्तां रताव्र्धो दवारो देवीरसश्चतः|	thrown open be the doors divine unfailing that assist the rite.
अद्या नूनं च यष्टवे|	for sacrifice this day and now.
नक्तोषासा सुपेशसास्मिन यज्ञ उप हवये|	i call the lovely night and dawn to seat them on the holy grass.
इदं नो बर्हिरासदे|	at this our solemn sacrifice.
ता सुजिह्वा उप हवये होतारा दैव्या कवी|	the two invokers i invite the wise divine and sweet of tongue.
यज्ञं नो यक्षतामिमम|	to celebrate this our sacrifice.
इळा सरस्वती मही तिस्रो देवीर्मयोभुवः|	iḷā sarasvatī mahī three goddesses who bring delight.
बर्हिः सीदन्त्वस्रिधः|	be seated peaceful on the grass.
इह तवष्टारमग्रियं विश्वरूपमुप हवये|	tvaṣṭar i call the earliest born the wearer of all forms at will.
अस्माकमस्तुकेवलः|	may he be ours and ours alone.
अव सर्जा वनस्पते देव देवेभ्यो हविः|	god sovran of the wood present this our oblation to the gods.
पर दातुरस्तु चेतनम|	and let the giver be renowned.
सवाहा यज्ञं कर्णोतनेन्द्राय यज्वनो गर्हे|	with svāhā pay the sacrifice to indra in the offerers house.
तत्र देवानुप हवये|	thither i call the deities.
एति पर होता वरतमस्य माययोर्ध्वां दधानः शुचिपेशसं धियम|	the priest goes forth to sacrifice with wondrous power sending aloft the hymn of glorious brilliancy.
अभि सरुचः करमते दक्षिणाव्र्तो या अस्य धाम परथमं ह निंसते|	he moves to meet the ladles turning to the right which are the first to kiss the place where he abides.
अभीं रतस्य दोहना अनूषत योनौ देवस्य सदने परीव्र्ताः|	to him sang forth the flowing streams of holy law encompassed in the home and birthplace of the god.
अपामुपस्थे विभ्र्तो यदावसदध सवधा अधयद याभिरीयते|	he when he dwelt extended in the waters lap absorbed those godlike powers for which he is adored.
युयूषतः सवयसा तदिद वपुः समानमर्थं वितरित्रता मिथः|	seeking in course altern to reach the selfsame end the two copartners strive to win this beauteous form.
आदीं भगो न हव्यः समस्मदा वोळ्हुर्न रश्मीन समयंस्त सारथिः|	like bhaga must he be duly invoked by us as he who drives the car holds fast the horses reins.
यमीं दवा सवयसा सपर्यतः समाने योना मिथुना समोकसा|	he whom the two copartners with observance tend the pair who dwell together in the same abode.
दिवा न नक्तं पलितो युवाजनि पुरू चरन्नजरो मानुषा युगा|	by night as in the day the grey one was born young passing untouched by eld through many an age of man.
तमीं हिन्वन्ति धीतयो दश वरिशो देवं मर्तास ऊतये हवामहे|	him the ten fingers the devotions animate we mortals call on him a god to give us help.
धनोरधि परवत आ स रण्वत्यभिव्रजद्भिर्वयुना नवाधित|	he speeds over the sloping surface of the land new deeds hath he performed with those who gird him round.
तवं हयग्ने दिव्यस्य राजसि तवं पार्थिवस्य पशुपा इव तमना|	for agni like a herdsman thou by thine own might rulest oer all that is in heaven and on the earth.
एनी त एते बर्हती अभिश्रिया हिरण्ययी वक्वरी बर्हिराशाते|	and these two mighty ones bright golden closely joined rolling them round are come unto thy sacred grass.
अग्ने जुषस्व परति हर्य तद वचो मन्द्र सवधाव रतजात सुक्रतो|	agni accept with joy be glad in this our prayer joygiver selfsustained strong born of holy law.
यो विश्वतः पर्त्यंं असि दर्शतो रण्वः सन्द्र्ष्टौ पितुमानिव कषयः|	for fair to see art thou turning to every side pleasant to look on as a dwelling filled with food.
परति व एना नमसाहमेमि सूक्तेन भिक्षे सुमतिं तुराणाम|	to you i come with this mine adoration and with a hymn i crave the strong ones favour.
रराणता मरुतो वेद्याभिर्नि हेळो धत्त वि मुचध्वमश्वान|	a hymn that truly makes you joyful maruts suppress your anger and unyoke your horses.
एष व सतोमो मरुतो नमस्वान हर्दा तष्टो मनसा धायि देवाः|	maruts to you this laud with prayer and worship formed in the mind and heart ye gods is offered.
उपेमा यात मनसा जुषाणा यूयं हि षठा नमस इद वर्धासः|	come ye to us rejoicing in your spirit for ye are they who make our prayer effective.
सतुतासो नो मरुतो मर्ळयन्तूत सतुतो मघवा शमभविष्ठः|	the maruts praised by us shall show us favour maghavan lauded shall be most propitious.
ऊर्ध्वा नः सन्तु कोम्या वनान्यहानि विश्वा मरुतो जिगीषा|	maruts may all our days that are to follow be very pleasant lovely and triumphant.
अस्मादहं तविषादीषमाण इन्द्राद भिया मरुतो रेजमानः|	i fled in terror from this mighty indra my body trembling in alarm o maruts.
युष्मभ्यं हव्या निशितान्यासन तान्यारे चक्र्मा मर्ळत नः|	oblations meant for you had been made ready these have we set aside for this forgive us.
येन मानासश्चितयन्त उस्रा वयुष्टिषु शवसा शश्वतीनाम|	by whom the mānas recognize the daysprings by whose strength at the dawn of endless mornings.
स नो मरुद्भिर्व्र्षभ शरवो धा उग्र उग्रेभि सथविरः सहोदाः|	give us thou mighty glory with maruts fierce with the fierce the strong who givest triumph.
तवं पाहीन्द्र सहीयसो नॄन भवा मरुद्भिरवयातहेळाः|	do thou o indra guard the conquering heroes and rid thee of thy wrath against the maruts.
सुप्रकेतेभिः सासहिर्दधानो विद्यामेषं व ज|	with them the wise victorious and bestowing may we find strengthening food in full abundance.
तं पर्छता स जगामा स वेद स चिकित्वानीयते सा नवीयते|	ask ye of him for he is come he knoweth it he full of wisdom is implored is now implored.
तस्मिन सन्ति परशिषस्तस्मिन्निष्टयः स वाजस्य शवसः शुष्मिणस पतिः|	with him are admonitions and with him commands he is the lord of strength the lord of power and might.
तमित पर्छन्ति न सिमो वि पर्छति सवेनेव धीरो मनसा यदग्रभीत|	they ask of him not all learn by their questioning what he the sage hath grasped as twere with his own mind.
न मर्ष्यते परथमं नापरं वचोअस्य करत्वसचते अप्रद्र्पितः|	forgetting not the former nor the later word he goeth on not careless in his mental power.
तमिद गछन्ति जुह्वस्तमर्वतीर्विश्वान्येकः शर्णवद वचांसि मे|	to him these ladles go to him these racing mares he only will give ear to all the words i speak.
पुरुप्रैषस्ततुरिर्यज्ञसाधनोअछिद्रोतिः शिशुरादत्त सं रभः|	allspeeding victor perfecter of sacrifice the babe with flawless help hath mustered vigorous might.
उपस्थायं चरति यत समारत सद्यो जातस्तत्सार युज्येभिः|	whateer he meets he grasps and then runs farther on and straightway newly born creeps forward with his kin.
अभि शवान्तं मर्शते नान्द्ये मुदे यदीं गछन्त्युशतीरपिष्ठितम|	he stirs the wearied man to pleasure and great joy what time the longing gifts approach him as he comes.
स ईं मर्गो अप्यो वनर्गुरुप तवच्युपमस्यां नि धायि|	he is a wild thing of the flood and forest he hath been laid upon the highest surface.
वयब्रवीद वयुना मर्त्येभ्योअग्निर्विद्वान रतचिद धि सत्यः|	he hath declared the lore of works to mortals agni the wise for he knows law the truthful.
पश्वा न तायुं गुहा चतन्तं नमो युजानं नमो वहन्तम|	oneminded wise they tracked thee like a thief lurking in dark cave with a stolen cow.
सजोषा धीराः पदैरनु गमन्नुप तवा सीदन विश्वेयजत्राः|	thee claiming worship bearing it to gods there nigh to thee sate all the holy ones.
रतस्य देवा अनु वरता गुर्भुवत परिष्टिर्द्यौर्न भूम|	the gods approached the ways of holy law there was a gathering vast as heaven itself.
वर्धन्तीमापः पन्वा सुशिश्विं रतस्य योना गर्भे सुजातम|	the waters feed with praise the growing babe born nobly in the womb the seat of law.
पुष्टिर्न रण्वा कषितिर्न पर्थिवी गिरिर्न भुज्म कषोदो न शम्भु|	like grateful food like some wide dwelling place like a fruitbearing hill a wholesome stream.
अत्यो नाज्मन सर्गप्रतक्तः सिन्धुर्न कषोदः क ईं वराते|	like a steed urged to run in swift career rushing like sindhu who may check his course.
जामिः सिन्धूनां भरातेव सवस्रामिभ्यान न राजा वनान्यत्ति|	kin as a brother to his sister floods he eats the woods as a king eats the rich.
यद वातजूतो वना वयस्थादग्निर्ह दाति रोमा पर्थिव्याः|	when through the forest urged by wind he spreads verily agni shears the hair of earth.
शवसित्यप्सु हंसो न सीदन करत्वा चेतिष्ठो विशामुषर्भुत|	like a swan sitting in the floods he pants wisest in mind mid men he wakes at morn.
सोमो न वेधा रतप्रजातः पशुर्न शिश्वा विभुर्दूरेभाः|	a sage like soma sprung from law he grew like some young creature mighty shining far.
युवो रजांसि सुयमासो अश्वा रथो यद वां पर्यर्णांसिदियत|	lightly your coursers travel through the regions when round the sea of air your car is flying.
हिरण्यया वां पवयह परुषायन मध्वः पिबन्ता उषसः सचेथे|	your golden fellies scatter drops of moisture drinking the sweetness ye attend the mornings.
युवमत्यस्याव नक्षथो यद विपत्मनो नर्यस्य परयज्योः|	ye as ye travel overtake the courser who flies apart the friend of man most holy.
सवसा यद वां विश्वगूर्ती भराति वाजायेट्टे मधुपाविषे च|	the prayer is that the sister may convey you all praised meathdrinkers to support and strengthen.
युवं पय उस्रियायामधत्तं पक्वमामायामव पूर्व्यंगोः|	ye have deposited matured within her in the raw cow the first milk of the milchcow.
अन्तर्यद वनिनो वां रतप्सू हवारो न शुचिर्यजते हविष्मान|	which the bright offerer shining like a serpent mid trees presents to you whose form is perfect.
युवं ह घर्मं मधुमन्तमत्रयेअपो न कषोदोअव्र्णीतमेषे|	ye made the fierce heat to be full of sweetness for atri at his wish like streaming water.
तद वां नरावश्विना पश्वैष्टी रथ्येव चक्रा परति यन्ति मध्वः|	fireoffering thence is yours o aśvins heroes your carwheels speed to us like springs of honey.
आ वां दानाय वव्र्तीय दस्रा गोरोहेण तौग्र्यो न जिव्रिः|	like tugras ancient son may i ye mighty bring you to give your gifts with milkoblations.
अपः कषोणी सचते माहिना वां जूर्णो वामक्षुरंहसो यजत्रा|	your greatness compasseth earth heaven and waters decayed for you is sorrows net ye holy.
नि यद युवेथे नियुतः सुदानू उप सवधाभिः सर्जथः पुरन्धिम|	when bounteous ones ye drive your yoked team downward ye send by your own natures understanding.
परेषद वेषद वातो न सूरिरा महे ददे सुव्रतोन वाजम|	swift as the wind let the prince please and feast you he like a pious man gains strength for increase.
वयं चिद धि वां जरितारः सत्या विपन्यामहे वि पणिर्हितावान|	for verily we truthful singers praise you the niggard trafficker is here excluded.
अधा चिद धि षमाश्विनावनिन्द्या पाथो हि षमाव्र्षणावन्तिदेवम|	now even now do ye o blameless aśvins ye mighty guard the man whose god is near him.
युवं चिद धि षमाश्विनावनु दयून विरुद्रस्य परस्रवणस्यसातौ|	you of a truth day after day o aśvins that he might win the very plenteous torrent.
अगस्त्यो नरां नर्षु परशस्तः काराधुनीव चितयत सहस्रैः|	agastya famous among mortal heroes roused with a thousand lauds like sounds of music.
पर यद वहेथे महिना रथस्य पर सयन्द्रा याथो मनुषो न होता|	when with the glory of your car ye travel when we go speeding like the priest of mortals.
धत्तं सूरिभ्य उत व सवश्व्यं नासत्य रयिषाचः सयाम|	and give good horses to sacrificers may we nāsatyas gain our share of riches.
तं वां रथं वयमद्या हुवेम सतोमैरश्विना सुवितायनव्यम|	with songs of praise we call today o aśvins that your new chariot for our own wellbeing.
अरिष्टनेमिं परि दयामियानं वि|	that circles heaven with neverinjured fellies may we find strengthening food in full abundance.
चित्रो वोअस्तु यामश्चित्र ऊती सुदानवः|	wonderful let your coming be wondrous with help ye bounteous ones.
मरुतो अहिभानवः|	maruts who gleam as serpents gleam.
आरे सा वः सुदानवो मरुत रञ्जती शरुः|	far be from us o maruts ye free givers your impetuous shaft.
आरे अश्मा यमस्यथ|	far from us be the stone ye hurl.
तर्णस्कन्दस्य नु विशः परि वर्ङकत सुदानवः|	o bounteous givers touch ye not o maruts tṛṇskandas folk.
ऊर्ध्वान नः कर्त जीवसे|	lift ye us up that we may live.
तत त इन्द्रियं परमं पराचैरधारयन्त कवयः पुरेदम|	that highest indrapower of thine is distant that which is here sages possessed aforetime.
कषमेदमन्यद दिव्यन्यदस्य समी पर्च्यते समनेव केतुः|	this one is on the earth in heaven the other and both unite as flag with flag in battle.
स धारयत पर्थिवीं पप्रथच्च वज्रेण हत्वा निरपः ससर्ज|	he spread the wide earth out and firmly fixed it smote with his thunderbolt and loosed the waters.
अहन्नहिमभिनद रौहिणं वयहन वयंसं मघवा शचीभिः|	maghavan with his puissance struck down ahi rent rauhiṇa to death and slaughtered vyaṁsa.
स जातूभर्मा शरद्दधान ओजः पुरो विभिन्दन्नचरद विदासीः|	armed with his bolt and trusting in his prowess he wandered shattering the forts of dāsas.
विद्वान वज्रिन दस्यवे हेतिमस्यार्यं सहो वर्धया दयुम्नमिन्द्र|	cast thy dart knowing thunderer at the dasyu increase the Āryas might and glory indra.
तदूचुषे मानुषेमा युगानि कीर्तेन्यं मघवा नाम बिभ्रत|	for him who thus hath taught these human races maghavan bearing a fameworthy title.
उपप्रयन दस्युहत्याय वज्री यद ध सूनुः शरवसे नाम दधे|	thunderer drawing nigh to slay the dasyus hath given himself the name of son for glory.
तदस्येदं पश्यता भूरि पुष्टं शरदिन्द्रस्य धत्तन वीर्याय|	see this abundant wealth that he possesses and put your trust in indras hero vigour.
स गा अविन्दत सो अविन्ददश्वान स ओषधीः सोपः स वनानि|	he found the cattle and he found the horses he found the plants the forests and the waters.
भुरिकर्मणे वर्षभाय वर्ष्णे सत्यशुष्माय सुनवाम सोमम|	to him the truly strong whose deeds are many to him the strong bull let us pour the soma.
य आद्र्त्या परिपन्थीव शूरोअयज्वनो विभजन्नेति वेदः|	the hero watching like a thief in ambush goes parting the possessions of the godless.
तदिन्द्र परेव वीर्यं चकर्थ यत ससन्तं वज्रेणाबोधयोअहिम|	well didst thou do that hero deed o indra in waking with thy bolt the slumbering ahi.
अनु तवा पत्नीर्ह्र्षितं वयश्च विश्वे देवासो अमदन्ननु तवा|	in thee delighted dames divine rejoiced them the flying maruts and all gods were joyful.
शुष्णं पिप्रुं कुयवं वर्त्रमिन्द्र यदावधीर्वि पुरःशम्बरस्य|	as thou hast smitten Śuṣṇa pipru vṛtra and kuyava and Śambaras forts o indra.
तन नो|	this prayer of ours may varuṇa grant and mitra and aditi and sindhu earth and heaven.
अग्नीषोमाविमं सु मे शर्णुतं वर्षणा हवम|	agni and soma mighty pair graciously hearken to my call.
परति सूक्तानि हर्यतं भवतं दाशुषे मयः|	accept in friendly wise my hymn and prosper him who offers gifts.
अग्नीषोमा यो अद्य वामिदं वचः सपर्यति|	the man who honours you today agni and soma with this hymn.
तस्मै धत्तं सुवीर्यं गवां पोषं सवश्व्यम|	bestow on him heroic strength increase of kine and noble steeds.
अग्नीषोमा य आहुतिं यो वां दाशाद धविष्क्र्तिम|	the man who offers holy oil and burnt oblations unto you.
स परजया सुवीर्यं विश्वमायुर्व्यश्नवत|	agni and soma shall enjoy great strength with offspring all his life.
अग्नीषोमा चेति तद वीर्यं वां यदमुष्णीतमवसं पणिं गाः|	agni and soma famed is that your prowess wherewith ye stole the kine his food from paṇi.
अवातिरतं बर्सयस्य शेषोअविन्दतं जयोतिरेकं बहुभ्यः|	ye caused the brood of bṛsaya to perish ye found the light the single light for many.
युवमेतानि दिवि रोचनान्यग्निश्च सोम सक्रतू अधत्तम|	agni and soma joined in operation ye have set up the shining lights in heaven.
युवं सिन्धून्रभिशस्तेरवद्यादग्नीषोमावमुञ्चतं गर्भीतान|	from curse and from reproach agni and soma ye freed the rivers that were bound in fetters.
आन्यं दिवो मातरिश्वा जभारामथ्नादन्यं परि शयेनोद्रेः|	one of you mātariśvan brought from heaven the falcon rent the other from the mountain.
अग्नीषोमा बरह्मणा वाव्र्धानोरुं यज्ञाय चक्रथुरु लोकम|	strengthened by holy prayer agni and soma have made us ample room for sacrificing.
अग्नीषोमा हविषः परस्थितस्य वीतं हर्यतं वर्षणा जुषेथाम|	taste agni soma this prepared oblation accept it mighty ones and let it please you.
सुशर्माणा सववसा हि भूतमथा धत्तं यजमानाय शं योः|	vouchsafe us good protection and kind favour grant to the sacrificer health and riches.
यो अग्नीषोमा हविषा सपर्याद देवद्रीचा मनसा यो घर्तेन|	whoso with oil and poured oblation honours with goddevoted heart agni and soma.
तस्य वरतं रक्षतं पातमंहसो विशे जनाय महिशर्म यछतम|	protect his sacrifice preserve him from distress grant to the sacrificer great felicity.
अग्नीषोमा सवेदसा सहूती वनतं गिरः|	invoked together mates in wealth agnisoma accept our hymns.
सं देवत्रा बभूवथुः|	together be among the gods.
अग्नीषोमावनेन वां यो वां घर्तेन दाशति|	agni and soma unto him who worships you with holy oil.
तस्मै दीदयतं बर्हत|	shine forth an ample recompense.
अग्नीषोमाविमानि नो युवं हव्या जुजोषतम|	agni and soma be ye pleased with these oblations brought to you.
आ यातमुपनः सचा|	and come together nigh to us.
अग्नीषोमा पिप्र्तमर्वतो न आ पयायन्तामुस्रिया हव्यसूदः|	agni and soma cherish well our horses and let our cows be fat who yield oblations.
अस्मे बलानि मघवत्सु धत्तं कर्णुतं नो अध्वरं शरुष्टिमन्तम|	grant power to us and to our wealthy patrons and cause our holy rites to be successful.
जातवेदसे सुनवाम सोममरातीयतो नि दहाति वेदः|	for jātavedas let us press the soma may he consume the wealth of the malignant.
स नः पर्षदति दुर्गाणि विश्वा नावेव सिन्धुं दुरितात्यग्निः|	may agni carry us through all our troubles through grief as in a boat across the river.
एन्द्र सानसिं रयिं सजित्वानं सदासहम|	indra bring wealth that gives delight the victors everconquering wealth.
वर्षिष्ठमूतये भर|	most excellent to be our aid.
नि येन मुष्टिहत्यया नि वर्त्रा रुणधामहै|	by means of which we may repel our foes in battle hand to hand.
तवोतासो नयर्वता|	by thee assisted with the car.
इन्द्र तवोतास आ वयं वज्रं घना ददीमहि|	aided by thee the thunderarmed indra may we lift up the bolt.
जयेम सं युधि सप्र्धः|	and conquer all our foes in fight.
वयं शूरेभिरस्त्र्भिरिन्द्र तवया युजा वयम|	with thee o india for ally with missiledarting heroes may.
सासह्याम पर्तन्यतः|	we conquer our embattled foes.
महानिन्द्रः परश्च नु महित्वमस्तु वज्रिणे|	mighty is indra yea supreme greatness be his the thunderer.
दयौर्नप्रथिना शवः|	wide as the heaven extends his power.
समोहे वा य आशत नरस्तोकस्य सनितौ|	which aideth those to win them sons who come as heroes to the fight.
विप्रासो वा धियायवः|	or singers loving holy thoughts.
यः कुक्षिः सोमपातमः समुद्र इव पिन्वते|	his belly drinking deepest draughts of soma like an ocean swells.
उर्वीरापो न काकुदः|	like wide streams from the cope of heaven.
एवा हयस्य सून्र्ता विरप्शी गोमती मही|	so also is his excellence great vigorous rich in cattle like.
पक्वा शाखा न दाशुषे|	a ripe branch to the worshipper.
एवा हि ते विभूतय ऊतय इन्द्र मावते|	for verily thy mighty powers indra are saving helps at once.
सद्यश्चित सन्तिदाशुषे|	unto a worshipper like me.
एवा हयस्य काम्या सतोम उक्थं च शंस्या|	so are his lovely gifts let lauds and praises be to indra sung.
इन्द्राय सोमपीतये|	that he may drink the soma juice.
रयिर्न यः पित्र्वित्तो वयोधाः सुप्रणीतिश्चिकितुषो नशासुः|	he who gives food like patrimonial riches and guides aright like some wise mans instruction.
सयोनाशीरतिथिर्न परीणानो होतेव सद्म विधतो वि तारीत|	loved like a guest who lies in pleasant lodgingmay he as priest prosper his servants dwelling.
देवो न यः सविता सत्यमन्मा करत्वा निपाति वर्जनानि विश्वा|	he who like savitar the god trueminded protecteth with his power all acts of vigour.
पुरुप्रशस्तो अमतिर्न सत्य आत्मेव शेवो दिधिषाय्यो भूत|	truthful like splendour glorified by many like breath joygivingall must strive to win him.
देवो न यः पर्थिवीं विश्वधाया उपक्षेति हितमित्रो न राजा|	he who on earth dwells like a king surrounded by faithful friends like a god allsustaining.
पुरःसदः शर्मसदो न वीरा अनवद्या पतिजुष्टेव नारी|	like heroes who preside who sit in safety like as a blameless dame dear to her husband.
तं तवा नरो दम आ नित्यमिद्धमग्ने सचन्त कषितिषु धरुवासु|	thee such in settlements secure o agni our men serve ever kindled in each dwelling.
अधि दयुम्नं नि दधुर्भूर्यस्मिन भवा विश्वायुर्धरुणो रयीणाम|	on him have they laid splendour in abundance dear to all men bearer be he of riches.
वि पर्क्षो अग्ने मघवानो अश्युर्वि सूरयो ददतो विश्वमायुः|	may thy rich worshippers win food o agni and princes gain long life who bring oblation.
सनेम वाजं समिथेष्वर्यो भागं देवेषु शरवसेदधानाः|	may we get booty from our foe in battle presenting to the gods their share for glory.
रतस्य हि धेनवो वावशानाः समदूध्नीः पीपयन्त दयुभक्ताः|	the cows of holy law sent us by heaven have swelled with laden udders loudly lowing.
परावतः सुमतिं भिक्षमाणा वि सिन्धवः समया सस्रुरद्रिम|	soliciting his favour from a distance the rivers to the rock have flowed together.
तवे अग्ने सुमतिं भिक्षमाणा दिवि शरवो दधिरे यज्ञियासः|	agni with thee soliciting thy favour the holy ones have gained glory in heaven.
नक्ता च चक्रुरुषसा विरूपे कर्ष्णं च वर्णमरुणं च सं धुः|	they made the night and dawn of different colours and set the black and purple hues together.
यान राये मर्तान सुषूदो अग्ने ते सयाम मघवानो वयं च|	may we and those who worship be the mortals whom thou o agni leadest on to riches.
छायेव विश्वं भुवनं सिसक्ष्यापप्रिवान रोदसी अन्तरिक्षम|	thou hast filled earth and heaven and airs midregion and followest the whole world like a shadow.
अर्वद्भिरग्ने अर्वतो नर्भिर्नॄन वीरैर्वीरान वनुयामा तवोताः|	aided by thee o agni may we conquer steeds with steeds men with men heroes with heroes.
ईशानासः पित्र्वित्तस्य रायो वि सूरयः शतहिमा नो अश्युः|	lords of the wealth transmitted by our fathers and may our princes live a hundred winters.
एता ते अग्न उचथानि वेधो जुष्टानि सन्तु मनसे हर्दे च|	may these our hymns of praise agni ordainer be pleasant to thee in thy heart and spirit.
शकेम रायः सुधुरो यमं तेअधि शरवो देवभक्तं दधानाः|	may we have power to hold thy steeds of riches laying on thee the godsent gift of glory.
पुरो वो मन्द्रं दिव्यं सुव्र्क्तिं परयति यज्ञे अग्निमध्वरेदधिध्वम|	install at sacrifice while the rite advances your pleasant heavenly agni meet for praises.
पुर उक्थेभिः स हि नो विभावा सवध्वरा करति जातवेदाः|	with hymnsfor he illumines usinstall him he jātavedas makes our rites successful.
तमु दयुमः पुर्वणीक होतरग्ने अग्निभिर्मनुष इधानः|	hear this laud radiant priest of many aspects o agni with the fires of man enkindled.
सतोमं यमस्मै ममतेव शूषं घर्तं न शुचि मतयः पवन्ते|	laud which bards send forth pure as sacred butter strength to this man as twere for selfadvantage.
पीपाय स शरवसा मर्त्येषु यो अग्नये ददाश विप्र उक्थैः|	mid mortal men that singer thrives in glory who offers gifts with hymns of praise to agni.
चित्राभिस्तमूतिभिश्चित्रशोचिर्व्रजस्य साता गोमतो दधाति|	and the god wondrous bright with wondrous succours helps him to win a stable filled with cattle.
आ यः पप्रौ जायमान उर्वी दूरेद्र्शा भासा कर्ष्णाध्वा|	he at his birth whose path is black behind him filled heaven and earth with farapparent splendour.
अध बहु चित तम ऊर्म्यायास्तिरः शोचिषा दद्र्शे पावकः|	and he himself hath been through nights thick darkness made manifest by light the purifier.
नू नश्चित्रं पुरुवाजाभिरूती अग्ने रयिं मघवद्भ्यश्च धेहि|	with thy most mighty aid confer o agni wonderful wealth on us and on our princes.
ये राधसा शरवसा चात्यन्यान सुवीर्येभिश्चाभि सन्ति जनान|	who stand preeminent surpassing others in liberal gifts in fame and hero virtues.
इमं यज्ञं चनो धा अग्न उशन यं त आसानो जुहुते हविष्मान|	agni accept this sacrifice with gladness which seated here the worshipper presenteth.
भरद्वाजेषु दधिषे सुव्र्क्तिमवीर्वाजस्य गध्यस्य सातौ|	fair hymns hadst thou among the bharadvājas and holpest them to gain abundant vigour.
वि दवेषांसीनुहि वर्धयेळां मदेम शतहिमाः सुवीराः|	scatter our foes increase our store may we he glad a hundred winters with brave sons.
इन्द्र पिब तुभ्यं सुतो मदायाव सय हरी वि मुचा सखाया|	drink indra juice is shed to make thee joyful loose thy bay steeds and give thy friends their freedom.
उत पर गाय गण आ निषद्याथा यज्ञाय गर्णते वयो धाः|	begin the song seated in our assembly give strength for sacrifice to him who singeth.
अस्य पिब यस्य जज्ञान इन्द्र मदाय करत्वे अपिबो विरप्शिन|	drink thou of this whereof at birth o indra thou drankest mighty one for power and rapture.
तमु ते गावो नर आपो अद्रिरिन्दुं समह्यन पीतये समस्मै|	the men the pressingstones the cows the waters have made this soma ready for thy drinking.
समिद्धे अग्नौ सुत इन्द्र सोम आ तवा वहन्तु हरयो वहिष्ठाः|	the fire is kindled soma pressed o indra let thy bays best to draw convey thee hither.
तवायता मनसा जोहवीमीन्द्रा याहि सुविताय महे नः|	with mind devoted indra i invoke thee come for our great prosperity approach us.
आ याहि शश्वदुशता ययाथेन्द्र महा मनसा सोमपेयम|	indra come hither evermore thou camest through our great strong desire to drink the soma.
उप बरह्माणि शर्णव इमा नोअथा ते यज्ञस्तन्वे वयो धात|	listen and hear the prayers which now we offer and let this sacrifice increase thy vigour.
यदिन्द्र दिवि पार्ये यद रधग यद वा सवे सदने यत्र वासि|	mayst thou o indra on the day of trial present or absent wheresoe’er thou dwellest.
अतो नो यज्ञमवसे नियुत्वान सजोषाः पाहि गिर्वणो मरुद्भिः|	thence with thy team accordant with the maruts songlover guard our sacrifice to help us.
अभूरेको रयिपते रयीणामा हस्तयोरधिथा इन्द्र कर्ष्टीः|	sole lord of wealth art thou o lord of riches thou in thine hands hast held the people indra.
वि तोके अप्सु तनये च सूरेअवोचन्त चर्षणयो विवाचः|	men have invoked thee with contending voices for seed and waters progeny and sunlight.
तवद भियेन्द्र पार्थिवानि विश्वाच्युता चिच्च्यावयन्ते रजांसि|	through fear of thee o indra all the regions of earth though naught may move them shake and tremble.
दयावाक्षामा पर्वतासो वनानि विश्वं दर्ळ्हं भयते अज्मन्ना ते|	all that is firm is frightened at thy coming the earth the heaven the mountain and the forest.
तवं कुत्सेनाभि शुष्णमिन्द्राशुषं युध्य कुयवं गविष्टौ|	with kutsa indra thou didst conquer Śuṣṇa voracious bane of crops in fight for cattle.
दश परपित्वे अध सूर्यस्य मुषायश्चक्रमविवेरपांसि|	in the close fray thou rentest him thou stolest the suns wheel and didst drive away misfortunes.
तवं शतान्यव शम्बरस्य पुरो जघन्थाप्रतीनि सस्योः|	thou smotest to the ground the hundred castles impregnable of Śambara the dasyu.
अशिक्षो यत्र शच्या शचीवो दिवोदासाय सुन्वते सुतक्रे भरद्वाजाय गर्णते वसूनि|	when strong with might thou holpest divodāsa who poured libations out o somabuyer and madest bharadvāja rich who praised thee.
स सत्यसत्वन महते रणाय रथमा तिष्ठ तुविन्र्म्ण भीमम|	as such true hero for great joy of battle mount thy terrific car o brave and manly.
याहि परपथिन्नवसोप मद्रिक पर च शरुत शरावय चर्षणिभ्यः|	come with thine help to me thou distant roamer and glorious god spread among men my glory.
पर नव्यसा सहसः सूनुमछा यज्ञेन गातुमव इछमानः|	he who seeks furtherance and grace to help him goes to the son of strength with newest worship.
वर्श्चद्वनं कर्ष्णयामं रुशन्तं वीती होतारन्दिव्यं जिगाति|	calling the heavenly priest to share the banquet who rends the wood bright with his blackened pathway.
स शवितानस्तन्यतू रोचनस्था अजरेभिर्नानदद्भिर्यविष्ठः|	whitehued and thundering he dwells in splendour most youthful with the loudvoiced and eternal.
यः पावकः पुरुतमः पुरूणि पर्थून्यग्निरनुयाति भर्वन|	agni most variform the purifier who follows crunching many ample forests.
वि ते विष्वग वातजूतासो अग्ने भामासः शुचे शुचयश्चरन्ति|	incited by the wind thy flames o agni move onward pure one pure in all directions.
तुविम्रक्षासो दिव्या नवग्वा वना वनन्ति धर्षता रुजन्तः|	thy most destructive heavenly navagvas break the woods down and devastate them boldly.
ये ते शुक्रासः शुचयः शुचिष्मः कषां वपन्ति विषितासो अश्वाः|	thy pure white horses from their bonds are loosened o radiant one they shear the ground beneath them.
अध भरमस्त उर्विया वि भाति यातयमानो अधि सानु पर्श्नेः|	and far and wide shines out thy flame and flickers rapidly moving over earths high ridges.
अध जिह्वा पापतीति पर वर्ष्णो गोषुयुधो नाशनिः सर्जाना|	forth darts the bulls tongue like the sharp stone weapon discharged by him who fights to win the cattle.
शूरस्येव परसितिः कषातिरग्नेर्दुर्वर्तुर्भीमो दयते वनानि|	agnis fierce flame is like a heros onset dread and resistless he destroys the forests.
आ भानुना पार्थिवानि जरयांसि महस्तोदस्य धर्षता ततन्थ|	thou with the sunlight of the great impeller hast boldly overspread the earths expanses.
स बाधस्वाप भया सहोभि सप्र्धो वनुष्यन वनुषो नि जूर्व|	so drive away with conquering might all perils fighting out foemen burn up those who harm us.
स चित्र चित्रं चितयन्तमस्मे चित्रक्षत्र चित्रतमं वयोधाम|	wondrous of wondrous power give to the singer wealth wondrous marked most wonderful lifegiving.
चन्द्रं रयिं पुरुवीरं बर्हन्तं चन्द्र चन्द्राभिर्ग्र्णते युवस्व|	wealth bright o bright one vast with many heroes give with thy bright flames to the man who lauds thee.
अग्ने स कषेषद रतपा रतेजा उरु जयोतिर्नशते देवयुष टे|	true guardian of the law thy faithful servant wins ample light and dwells in peace o agni.
यं तवं मित्रेण वरुणः सजोषा देव पासि तयजसा मर्तमंहः|	whom thou as varuṇa in accord with mitra guardest o god by banishing his trouble.
ईजे यज्ञेभिह शशमे शमीभिर्र्धद्वारायाग्नये ददाश|	he hath paid sacrifices toiled in worship and offered gifts to wealthincreasing agni.
एवा चन तं यशसामजुष्टिर्नांहो मर्तं नशते न परद्र्प्तिः|	him the displeasure of the famous moves not outrage and scorn affect not such a mortal.
सूरो न यस्य दर्शतिररेपा भीमा यदेति शुचतस्त आ धीः|	bright god whose look is free from stain like sūryas thou swift what time thou earnestly desirest.
हेषस्वतः शुरुधो नायमक्तोः कुत्रा चिद रण्वो वसतिर्वनेजाः|	hast gear to give us come with joy at evening where child of wood thou mayest also tarry.
तिग्मं चिदेम महि वर्पो अस्य भसदश्वो न यमसान आसा|	fierce is his gait and vast his wondrous body he champeth like a horse with bit and bridle.
विजेहमानः परशुर्न जिह्वां दरविर्न दरावयति दारु धक्षत|	and darting forth his tongue as twere a hatchet burning the woods smelteth them like a smelter.
स इदस्तेव परति धादसिष्यञ्छिशीत तेजोअयसो न धाराम|	archerlike fain toshoot he sets his arrow and whets his splendour like the edge of iron.
चित्रध्रजतिररतिर्यो अक्तोर्वेर्न दरुषद्वा रघुपत्मजंहाः|	the messenger of night with brilliant pathway like a treeroosting bird of rapid pinion.
स ईं रेभो न परति वस्त उस्राः शोचिषा रारपीति मित्रमहाः|	in beams of morn he clothes him like the singer and bright as mitra with his splendour crackles.
नक्तं य ईमरुषो यो दिवा नॄनमर्त्यो अरुषो यो दिवा नॄन|	red in the night by day the mens possession red he belongs to men by day immortal.
दिवो न यस्य विधतो नवीनोद वर्षा रुक्ष ओषधीषु नूनोत|	like heavens when scattering beams his voice was uttered among the plants the radiant hero shouted.
घर्णा न यो धरजसा पत्मना यन्ना रोदसी वसुनादं सुपत्नी|	who with his glow in rapid course came hither to fill both worlds wellwedded dames with treasure.
धायोभिर्वा यो युज्येभिरर्कैर्विद्युन न दविद्योत सवेभिःशुष्मैह|	who with supporting streams and rays that suit him hath flashed like lightning with his native vigour.
शर्धो वा यो मरुतां ततक्ष रभुर्न तवेषोरभसानो अद्यौत|	like the deft maker of the band of maruts the bright impetuous one hath shone refulgent.
घर्तवती भुवनानामभिश्रियोर्वी पर्थ्वी मधुदुघे सुपेशसा|	filled full of fatness compassing all things that be wide spacious dropping meath beautiful in their form.
दयावाप्र्थिवी वरुणस्य धर्मणा विष्कभिते अजरेभूरिरेतसा|	the heaven and the earth by varuṇas decree unwasting rich in germs stand parted each from each.
असश्चन्ती भूरिधारे पयस्वती घर्तं दुहाते सुक्र्ते शुचिव्रते|	the everlasting pair with full streams rich in milk in their pure rule pour fatness for the pious man.
राजन्ती अस्य भुवनस्य रोदसी अस्मे रेतः सिञ्चतंयन मनुर्हितम|	ye who are regents of this world o earth and heaven pour into us the genial flow that prospers meit.
यो वां रजवे करमणाय रोदसी मर्तो ददाश धिषणे स साधति|	whoso for righteous life pours offerings to you o heaven and earth ye hemispheres that man succeeds.
पर परजाभिर्जायते धर्मणस परि युवोः सिक्ता विषुरूपाणि सव्रता|	he in his seed is born again and spreads by law from you flow things diverse in form but ruled alike.
घर्तेन दयावाप्र्थिवी अभीव्र्ते घर्तश्रिया घर्तप्र्चा घर्ताव्र्धा|	enclosed in fatness heaven and earth are bright therewith they mingle with the fatness which they still increase.
उर्वी पर्थ्वी होत्र्वूर्ये पुरोहिते ते इद विप्रा ईळते सुम्नमिष्टये|	wide broad set foremost at election of the priest to them the singers pray for bliss to further them.
मधु नो दयावाप्र्थिवी मिमिक्षतां मधुश्चुता मधुदुघे मधुव्रते|	may heaven and earth pour down the balmy rain for us balmdropping yielding balm with balm upon your path.
दधाने यज्ञं दरविणं च देवता महि शरवो वाजमस्मे सुवीर्यम|	bestowing by your godhead sacrifice and wealth great fame and strength for us and good heroic might.
ऊर्जं नो दयौश्च पर्थिवी च पिन्वतां पिता माता विश्वविदा सुदंससा|	may heaven and earth make food swell plenteously for us allknowing father jother wondrous in their works.
संरराणे रोदसी विश्वशम्भुवा सनिं वाजं रयिमस्मे समिन्वताम|	pouring out bounties may in union both the worlds all beneficial send us gain and power and wealth.
या त ऊतिरवमा या परमा या मध्यमेन्द्र शुष्मिन्नस्ति|	with thine assistance o thou mighty indra be it the least the midmost or the highest.
ताभिरू षु वर्त्रहत्येअवीर्न एभिश्च वाजैर्महान्न उग्र|	great with those aids and by these powers support us strong god in battle that subdues our foemen.
आभि सप्र्धो मिथतीररिषण्यन्नमित्रस्य वयथया मन्युमिन्द्र|	with these discomfit hosts that fight against us and check the opponents wrath thyself uninjured.
आभिर्विश्वा अभियुजो विषूचीरार्याय विशोअव तारीर्दासीः|	with these chase all our foes to every quarter subdue the tribes of dāsas to the Ārya.
इन्द्र जामय उत येअजामयोअर्वाचीनासो वनुषो युयुज्रे|	those who array themselves as foes to smite us o indra be they kin or be they strangers.
तवमेषां विथुरा शवांसि जहि वर्ष्ण्यानि कर्णुही पराचः|	strike thou their manly strength that it be feeble and drive in headlong flight our foemen backward.
शूरो वा शूरं वनते शरीरैस्तनूरुचा तरुषि यत कर्ण्वैते|	with strength of limb the hero slays the hero when bright in arms they range them for the combat.
तोके वा गोषु तनये यदप्सु वि करन्दसी उर्वरासु बरवैते|	when two opposing hosts contend in battle for seed and offspring waters kine or cornlands.
नहि तवा शूरो न तुरो न धर्ष्णुर्न तवा योधो मन्यमानो युयोध|	yet no strong man hath conquered thee no hero no brave no warrior trusting in his valour.
इन्द्र नकिष टवा परत्यस्त्येषां विश्वा जातान्यभ्यसि तानि|	not one of these is match for thee o indra thou far surpassest all these living creatures.
स पत्यत उभयोर्न्र्म्णमयोर्यदी वेधसः समिथे हवन्ते|	he is the lord of both these armies valour when the commanders call them to the conflict.
वर्त्रे वा महो नर्वति कषये वा वयचस्वन्ता यदि वितन्तसैते|	when with their ranks expanded they are fighting with a great foe or for a home with heroes.
अध समा ते चर्षणयो यदेजानिन्द्र तरातोत भवा वरूता|	and when the people stir themselves for battle be thou their saviour indra and protector.
अस्माकासो ये नर्तमासो अर्य इन्द्र सूरयो दधिरे पुरोनः|	and theirs thy manliest of our friends the pious the chiefs who have installed us priests o indra.
अनु ते दायि मह इन्द्रियाय सत्रा ते विष्वमनु वर्त्रहत्ये|	to thee for high dominion hath been for evermore for slaughtering the vṛtras.
अनु कषत्रमनु सहो यजत्रेन्द्र देवेभिरनु ते नर्षह्ये|	all lordly power and might o holy indra given by gods for victory in battle.
एवा न सप्र्धः समजा समत्स्विन्द्र रारन्धि मिथतीरदेवीः|	so urge our hosts together in the combats yield up the godless bands that fight against us.
विद्याम वस्तोरवसा गर्णन्तो भरद्वाजा उत त इन्द्र नूनम|	singing at morn may we find thee with favour yea indra and een now we bharadvājas.
इन्द्रासोमा महि तद वां महित्वं युवं महानि परथमानि चक्रथुः|	great is this might of yours indra and soma the first high exploits were your own achievements.
युवं सूर्यं विविदथुर्युवं सवर्विश्वा तमांस्यहतं निदश्च|	ye found the sun ye found the light of heaven ye killed all darkness and the gods blasphemers.
इन्द्रासोमा वासयथ उषासमुत सूर्यं नयथो जयोतिषा सह|	ye indrasoma gave her light to morning and led the sun on high with all his splendour.
उप दयां सकम्भथुः सकम्भनेनाप्रथतं पर्थिवीं मातरं वि|	ye stayed the heaven with a supporting pillar and spread abroad apart the earth the mother.
इन्द्रासोमावहिमपः परिष्ठां हथो वर्त्रमनु वां दयौरमन्यत|	ye slew the flood obstructing serpent vṛtra indra and soma heaven approved your exploit.
परार्णांस्यैरयतं नदीनामा समुद्राणिपप्रथुः पुरूणि|	ye urged to speed the currents of the rivers and many seas have ye filled full with waters.
इन्द्रासोमा पक्वमामास्वन्तर्नि गवामिद दधथुर्वक्षणासु|	ye in the unripe udders of the milchkine have set the ripe milk indra thou and soma.
जग्र्भथुरनपिनद्धमासु रुशच्चित्रासु जगतीष्वन्तः|	ye have held fast the unimpeded whiteness within these manycoloured moving creatures.
इन्द्रासोमा युवमङग तरुत्रमपत्यसाचं शरुत्यं रराथे|	verily ye bestow indra and soma wealth famed victorious passing to our children.
युवं शुष्मं नर्यं चर्षणिभ्यः सं विव्यथुः पर्तनाषाहमुग्रा|	ye have invested men ye mighty beings with manly strength that conquers in the battle.
सतुषे जनं सुव्रतं नव्यसीभिर्गीर्भिर्मित्रावरुणा सुम्नयन्ता|	i laud with newest songs the righteous people mitra and varuṇa who make us happy.
त आ गमन्तु त इह शरुवन्तु सुक्षत्रासो वरुणोमित्रो अग्निः|	let them approach here let them listenagni varuṇa mitra lords of fair dominion.
विशोविश ईड्यमध्वरेष्वद्र्प्तक्रतुमरतिं युवत्योः|	him to be praised at each tribes sacrifices the two young matrons soberminded herald.
दिवः शिशुं सहसः सूनुमग्निं यज्ञस्य केतुमरुषं यजध्यै|	the son of strength the child of heaven the signal of sacrifice red agni will i worship.
अरुषस्य दुहितरा विरूपे सत्र्भिरन्या पिपिशे सूरो अन्या|	unlike in form are the red gods two daughters one is the suns and stars bedeck the other.
मिथस्तुरा विचरन्ती पावके मन्म शरुतं नक्षत रच्यमाने|	apart the sanctifiers in succession come to the famed hymn praised in holy verses.
पर वायुमछा बर्हती मनीषा बर्हद्रयिं विश्ववारं रथप्राम|	i with a lofty song call hither vāyu allbounteous filler of his car most wealthy.
दयुतद्यामा नियुतः पत्यमानः कविः कविमियक्षसि परयज्यो|	thou sage with bright path lord of harnessed horses impetuous promptly honourest the prudent.
स मे वपुश्छदयदश्विनोर्यो रथो विरुक्मान मनसा युजानः|	that chariot of the aśvins fair to look on pleaseth me well yoked with a thought refulgent.
येन नरा नासत्येषयध्यै वर्तिर्याथस्तनयाय तमने च|	wherewith nāsatyas chiefs ye seek our dwelling to give new strength to us and to our children.
पर्जन्यवाता वर्षभा पर्थिव्याः पुरीषाणि जिन्वतमप्यानि|	bulls of the earth o vāta and parjanya stir up for us the regions of the water.
सत्यश्रुतः कवयो यस्य गीर्भिर्जगत सथातर्जगदाक्र्णुध्वम|	hearers of truth ye sages worldsupporters increase his living wealth whose songs delight you.
पावीरवी कन्या चित्रायुः सरस्वती वीरपत्नी धियं धात|	so may sarasvatī the heros consort brisk with rare life the lightnings child inspire us.
गनाभिरछिद्रं शरणं सजोषा दुराधर्षं गर्णते शर्म यंसत|	and with the dames accordant give the singer a refuge unassailable and flawless.
पथसपथः परिपतिं वचस्या कामेन कर्तो अभ्यानळ अर्कम|	i praise with eloquence him who guards all pathways he when his love impelled him went to arka.
स नो रासच्छुरुधश्चन्द्राग्रा धियंधियं सीषधाति पर पूषा|	may he vouchsafe us gear with gold to grace it may pūṣan make each prayer of ours efective.
परथमभाजं यशसं वयोधां सुपाणिं देवं सुगभस्तिं रभ्वम|	may herald agni fulgent bring for worship tvaṣṭar adored in homes and swift to listen.
होता यक्षद यजतं पस्त्यानामग्निस्त्वष्टारं सुहवं विभावा|	glorious first to share the lifebestower the ever active god fairarmed fairhanded.
भुवनस्य पितरं गीर्भिराभी रुद्रं दिवा वर्धया रुद्रमक्तौ|	rudra by day rudra at night we honour with these our songs the universes father.
बर्हन्तं रष्वमजरं सुषुम्नं रधग घुवेम कविनेषितासः|	him great and lofty blissful undecaying let us call specially as the sage impels us.
आ युवानः कवयो यज्ञियासो मरुतो गन्त गर्णतो वरस्याम|	ye who are youthful wise and meet for worship come martits to the longing of the singer.
अचित्रं चिद धि जिन्वथा वर्धन्त इत्था नक्षन्तो नरो अङगिरस्वत|	coming as erst to aṅgiras o heroes ye animate and quicken een the desert.
पर वीराय पर तवसे तुरायाजा यूथेव पशुरक्षिरस्तम|	even as the herdsman driveth home his cattle i urge my songs to him the strong swift hero.
स पिस्प्र्शति तन्वि शरुतस्य सत्र्भिर्न नाकं वचनस्यविपः|	may he the glorious lay upon his body the singers hymns as stars bedeck the heaven.
यो रजांसि विममे पार्थिवानि तरिश्चिद विष्णुर्मनवे बाधिताय|	he who for mans behoof in his afiliction thrice measured out the earthly regions viṣṇu.
तस्य ते शर्मन्नुपदद्यमाने राया मदेम तन्वा तना च|	when one so great as thou affordeth shelter may we with wealth and with ourselves be happy.
तन नोअहिर्बुध्न्यो अब्धिरर्कैस्तत पर्वतस्तत सविता चनो धात|	sweet be this song of mine to ahibudhnya parvata savitar with floods and lightnings.
तदोषधीभिरभि रातिषाचो भगः पुरन्धिर्जिन्वतु पर राये|	sweet with the plants to gods who seek oblations may liberal bhaga speed us on to riches.
नु नो रयिं रथ्यं चर्षणिप्रां पुरुवीरं मह रतस्य गोपाम|	give riches borne on cars with many heroes contenting men the guard of mighty order.
कषयं दाताजरं येन जनान सप्र्धो अदेवीरभि चक्रमाम विश आदेवीरभ्यश्नवाम|	give us a lasting home that we may battle with godless bands of men who fight against us and meet with tribes to whom the gods are gracious.
यो रयिवो रयिन्तमो यो दयुम्नैर्द्युम्नवत्तमः|	that which is wealthiest wealthy god in splendoursmost illustrious.
सोमः सुतः स इन्द्र तेअस्ति सवधापते मदः|	soma is pressed thy gladdening draught indra libations lord is this.
यः शग्मस्तुविशग्म ते रायो दामा मतीनाम|	effectual most effectual one thine as bestowing wealth of hymns.
सोमः सुतः|	soma is pressed thy gladdening draught indra libations lord is this.
येन वर्द्धो न शवसा तुरो न सवाभिरूतिभिः|	wherewith thou art increased in strength and conquerest with thy proper aids.
सोमः सुतः|	soma is pressed thy gladdening draught indra libations lord is this.
तयमु वो अप्रहणं गर्णीषे शवसस पतिम|	him for your sake i glorify as lord of strength who wrongeth none.
इन्द्रं विश्वासाहं नरं मंहिष्ठं विश्वचर्षणिम|	the hero indra conquering all most bounteous god of all the tribes.
यं वर्धयन्तीद गिरः पतिं तुरस्य राधसः|	those goddesses both heaven and earth revere the power and might of him.
तमिन्न्वस्य रोदसी देवी शुष्मं सपर्यतः|	him whom our songs increase in strength the lord of bounty swift to come.
तद व उक्थस्य बर्हणेन्द्रायोपस्त्र्णीषणि|	to seat your indra i will spread abroad with power this song of praise.
विपो न यस्योतयो वि यद रोहन्ति सक्षितः|	the saving succours that abide in him like songs extend and grow.
अविदद दक्षं मित्रो नवीयान पपानो देवेभ्यो वस्यो अचैत|	a recent friend he found the skilful priest he drank and showed forth treasure from the gods.
ससवान सतौलाभिर्धौतरीभिरुरुष्या पायुरभवत सखिभ्यः|	he conquered borne by strong allshaking mares and was with farspread power his friends protector.
रतस्य पथि वेधा अपायि शरिये मनांसि देवासो अक्रन|	in course of law the sapient juice was quaffed the deities to glory turned their mind.
दधानो नाम महो वचोभिर्वपुर्द्र्शये वेन्यो वयावः|	winning through hymns a lofty title he the lovely made his beauteous form apparent.
दयुमत्तमं दक्षं धेह्यस्मे सेधा जनानां पूर्वीररातीः|	bestow on us the most illustrious strength ward off mens manifold malignities.
वर्षीयो वयः कर्णुहि शचीभिर्धनस्य सातावस्मानविड्ढि|	give with thy might abundant vital force and aid us graciously in gaining riches.
इन्द्र तुभ्यमिन मघवन्नभूम वयं दात्रे हरिवो मा विवेनः|	we turn to thee as giver liberal indra lord of the bay steeds be not thou ungracious.
नकिरापिर्दद्र्शे मर्त्यत्रा किमङग रध्रचोदनन्त्वाहुः|	no friend among mankind have we to lookto why have men called thee him who spurs the niggard.
मा जस्वने वर्षभ नो ररीथा मा ते रेवतः सख्ये रिषाम|	give us not up strong hero to the hungry unharmed be we whom thou so rich befriendest.
पूर्वीष ट इन्द्र निष्षिधो जनेषु जह्यसुष्वीन पर वर्हाप्र्णतः|	full many a boon hast thou for men demolish those who present no gifts nor pour oblations.
उदभ्राणीव सतनयन्नियर्तीन्द्रो राधांस्यश्व्यानि गव्या|	as indra thundering impels the rainclouds so doth he send us store of kine and horses.
तवमसि परदिवः कारुधाया मा तवादामान आ दभन्मघोनः|	thou art of old the cherisher of singers let not the rich who bring no gifts deceive thee.
अध्वर्यो वीर पर महे सुतानामिन्द्राय भर स हयस्य राजा|	adbyaryu hero bring to mighty indrafor he is king thereofthe pressedout juices.
यः पूर्व्याभिरुत नूतनाभिर्गीर्भिर्वाव्र्धे गर्णतां रषीणाम|	to him exalted by the hymns and praises ancient and modern of the singing Ṛṣis.
अस्य मदे पुरु वर्पांसि विद्वानिन्द्रो वर्त्राण्यप्रती जघान|	in the wild joy of this hath indra knowing full many a form struck down resistless vṛtras.
तमु पर होषि मधुमन्तमस्मै सोमं वीराय शिप्रिणे पिबध्यै|	proclaim aloud to him the savoury soma so that the hero strong of jaw may drink it.
पाता सुतमिन्द्रो अस्तु सोमं हन्ता वर्त्रं वज्रेण मन्दसानः|	may indra drink this soma poured to please him and cheered therewith slay vṛtra with his thunder.
गन्ता यज्ञं परावतश्चिदछा वसुर्धीनामविता कारुधायाः|	come to our sacrifice even from a distance good lover of our songs the bards supporter.
इदं तयत पात्रमिन्द्रपानमिन्द्रस्य परियमम्र्तमपायि|	the cup whence indra drinks the draught is present the amṛta dear to indra hath been drunken.
मत्सद यथा सौमनसाय देवं वयस्मद दवेषो युयवद वयंहः|	that it may cheer the god to gracious favour and keep far from us hatred and affliction.
एना मन्दानो जहि शूर शत्रूञ जामिमजामिं मघवन्नमित्रान|	therewith enraptured hero slay our foemen the unfriendly maghavan be they kin or strangers.
अभिषेणानभ्यादेदिशानान पराच इन्द्र पर मर्णाजही च|	those who still aim their hostile darts to smite us turn them to flight o indra crush and kill them.
आसु षमा णो मघवन्निन्द्र पर्त्स्वस्मभ्यं महि वरिवः सुगं कः|	o indra maghavan in these our battles win easy paths for us and ample freedom.
अपां तोकस्य तनयस्य जेष इन्द्र सूरीन कर्णुहिस्मा नो अर्धम|	that we may gain waters and seed and offspring set thou our princes on thy side o indra.
आ तवा हरयो वर्षणो युजाना वर्षरथासो वर्षरश्मयोअत्याः|	let thy bay stallions harnessed bring thee hither steeds with strong chariot and strong reins to hold them.
अस्मत्राञ्चो वर्षणो वज्रवाहो वर्ष्णे मदाय सुयुजोवहन्तु|	strong horses speeding hither bearing thunder wellharnessed for the strong exciting potion.
आ ते वर्षन वर्षणो दरोणमस्थुर्घ्र्तप्रुषो नोर्मयो मदन्तः|	beside the vat strong god stand thy strong horses shining with holy oil like waves exulting.
इन्द्र पर तुभ्यं वर्षभिः सुतानां वर्ष्णे भरन्तिव्र्षभाय सोमम|	indra they bring to thee the strong and mighty soma of juices shed by mighty pressstones.
वर्षासि दिवो वर्षभः पर्थिव्या वर्षा सिन्धूनां वर्षभस्तियानाम|	thou art the bull of earth the bull of heaven bull of the rivers bull of standing waters.
वर्ष्णे त इन्दुर्व्र्षभ पीपाय सवादू रसो मधुपेयो वराय|	for thee the strong o bull hath indu swollen juice pleasant sweet to drink for thine election.
अयं देवः सहसा जायमान इन्द्रेण युजा पणिमस्तभायत|	this god with might when first he had his being with indra for ally held fast the paṇi.
अयं सवस्य पितुरायुधानीन्दुरमुष्णादशिवस्य मायाः|	this indu stole away the warlike weapons and foiled the arts of his malignant father.
अयमक्र्णोदुषसः सुपत्नीरयं सूर्ये अदधाज्ज्योतिरन्तः|	the dawns he wedded to a glorious consort and set within the sun the light that lights him.
अयं तरिधातु दिवि रोचनेषु तरितेषु विन्ददम्र्तं निगूळ्हम|	he found in heaven in the third lucid regions the threefold amṛta in its close concealment.
अयं दयावाप्र्थिवी वि षकभायदयं रथमयुनक सप्तरश्मिम|	he stayed and held the heaven and earth asunder the chariot with the sevenfold reins he harnessed.
अयं गोषु शच्या पक्वमन्तः सोमो दाधार दशयन्त्रमुत्सम|	this soma set with power within the milchkine a spring whose ripe contents ten fingers empty.
अपूर्व्या पुरुतमान्यस्मै महे वीराय तवसे तुराय|	i with my lips have fashioned for this hero words never matched most plentiful and auspicious.
विरप्शिने वज्रिणे शन्तमानि वचांस्यासा सथविराय तक्षम|	for him the ancient great strong energetic the very mighty wielder of the thunder.
स मातरा सूर्येणा कवीनामवासयद रुजदद्रिं गर्णानः|	amid the sages with the sun he brightened the parents glorified he burst the mountain.
सवाधीभिर्र्क्वभिर्वावशान उदुस्रियाणामस्र्जन निदानम|	and roaring with the holythoughted singers he loosed the bond that held the beams of morning.
स वह्निभिर्र्क्वभिर्गोषु शश्वन मितज्ञुभिः पुरुक्र्त्वा जिगाय|	famed for great deeds with priests who kneel and laud him he still hath conquered in the frays for cattle.
पुरः पुरोहा सखिभिः सखीयन दर्ळ्हा रुरोज कविभिः कविः सन|	and broken down the forts the fortdestroyer a friend with friends a sage among the sages.
स नीव्याभिर्जरितारमछा महो वाजेभिर्महद्भिश्च शुष्मैः|	come with thy girthed mares with abundant vigour and plenteous strength to him who sings thy praises.
पुरुवीराभिर्व्र्षभ कषितीनामा गिर्वणः सुविताय पर याहि|	come hither borne by mares with many heroes lover of song steer for the peoples welfare.
स सर्गेण शवसा तक्तो अत्यैरप इन्द्रो दक्षिणतस्तुराषाट|	indra with rush and might sped by his coursers hath swiftly won the waters from the southward.
इत्था सर्जाना अनपाव्र्दर्थं दिवेदिवे विविषुरप्रम्र्ष्यम|	thus set at liberty the rivers daily flow to their goal incessant and exhaustless.
विश्वेषां वः सतां जयेष्ठतमा गीर्भिर्मित्रावरुणावाव्र्धध्यै|	now mitravaruṇa shall be exalted high by your songs noblest of all existing.
सं या रश्मेव यमतुर्यमिष्ठा दवा जनानसमा बाहुभिः सवैः|	they who as twere with reins are best controllers unequalled with their arms to check the people.
इयं मद वां पर सत्र्णीते मनीषोप परिया नमसा बर्हिरछ|	to you two gods is this my thought extended turned to the sacred grass with loving homage.
यन्तं नो मित्रावरुणावध्र्ष्टं छर्दिर्यद वां वरूथ्यं सुदानू|	give us o mitravaruṇa a dwelling safe from attack which ye shall guard boongivers.
आ यातं मित्रावरुणा सुशस्त्युप परिया नमसा हूयमाना|	come hither mitravaruṇa invited with eulogies and loving adoration.
सं यावप्नः सथो अपसेव जनाञ्छ्रुधीयतश्चिद यतथो महित्वा|	ye who with your might as workcontrollers urge even men who quickly hear to labour.
अश्वा न या वाजिना पूतबन्धू रता यद गर्भमदितिर्भरध्यै|	whom of pure origin like two strong horses aditi bore as babes in proper season.
पर या महि महान्ता जायमाना घोरा मर्तायरिपवे नि दीधः|	whom mighty at your birth the mighty goddess brought forth as terrors to the mortal foeman.
विश्वे यद वां मंहना मन्दमानाः कषत्रं देवासो अदधुः सजोषाः|	as all the gods in their great joy and gladness gave you with one accord your high dominion.
परि यद भूथो रोदसी चिदुर्वी सन्ति सपशो अदब्धासो अमूराः|	as ye surround both worlds though wide and spacious your spies are ever true and never bewildered.
ता हि कषत्रं धारयेथे अनु दयून दरंहेथे सानुमुपमादिव दयोः|	so through the days maintaining princely power ye prop the height as twere from loftiest heaven.
दर्ळ्हो नक्षत्र उत विश्वदेवो भूमिमातान दयां धासिनायोः|	the star of all the gods established filleth the heaven and earth with food of man who liveth.
ता विग्रं धैथे जठरं पर्णध्या आ यत सद्म सभ्र्तयः पर्णन्ति|	take the strong drink to quaff till ye are sated when he and his attendants fill the chamber.
न मर्ष्यन्ते युवतयोअवाता वि यत पयो विश्वजिन्वा भरन्ते|	the young maids brook not that none seeks to win them when quickeners of all they scatter moisture.
ता जिह्वया सदमेदं सुमेधा आ यद वां सत्यो अरतिरते भूत|	so with your tongue come ever when your envoy faithful and very wise attends our worship.
तद वां महित्वं घर्तान्नावस्तु युवं दाशुषेवि चयिष्टमंहः|	nourished by holy oil he this ygur glory annihilate the sacrificers trouble.
पर यद वां मित्रावरुणा सपूर्धन परिया धाम युवधिता मिनन्ति|	when mitravaruṇa they strive against you and break tlie friendly laws ye have established.
न ये देवास ओहसा न मर्ता अयज्ञसाचो अप्यो नपुत्राः|	they neither gods nor men in estimation like apis sons have godless sacrifices.
वि यद वाचं कीस्तासो भरन्ते शंसन्ति के चिन निविदो मनानाः|	when singers in their song uplift their voices some chant the nivid texts with steady purpose.
आद वां बरवाम सत्यान्युक्था नकिर्देवेभिर्यतथो महित्वा|	then may we sing you lauds that shall be fruitful dp ye not rival all the gods in greatness.
अवोरित्था वां छर्दिषो अभिष्टौ युवोर्मित्रावरुणावस्क्र्धोयु|	o mitravaruṇa may your large bounty come to us hither near to this our dwelling.
अनु यद गाव सफुरान रजिप्यं धर्ष्णुं यद रणेव्र्षणं युनजन|	when the kine haste to us and when they harness the fleetfoot mettled stallion for the battle.
य एक इद धव्यश्चर्षणीनामिन्द्रं तं गीर्भिरभ्यर्च आभिः|	with these my hymns i glorify that indra who is alone to be invoked by mortals.
यः पत्यते वर्षभो वर्ष्ण्यावान सत्यः सत्वा पुरुमायः सहस्वान|	the lord the mighty one of manly vigour victorious hero true and full of wisdom.
तमु नः पूर्वे पितरो नवग्वाः सप्त विप्रासो अभि वाजयन्तः|	our sires of old navagvas sages seven while urging him to show his might extolled him.
नक्षद्दाभं ततुरिं पर्वतेष्ठामद्रोघवाचं मतिभिः शविष्ठम|	dwelling on heights swift smiting down opponents guileless in word and in his thoughts most mighty.
तमीमह इन्द्रमस्य रायः पुरुवीरस्य नर्वतः पुरुक्षोः|	we seek that indra to obtain his riches that bring much food and men and store of heroes.
यो अस्क्र्धोयुरजरः सवर्वान तमा भर हरिवो मादयध्यै|	bring us lord of bay steeds to make us joyful celestial wealth abundant undecaying.
तन नो वि वोचो यदि ते पुरा चिज्जरितार आनशुः सुम्नमिन्द्र|	tell thou us this if at thy hand aforetime the earlier singers have obtained good fortune.
कस्ते भागः किं वयो दुध्र खिद्वः पुरुहूत पुरूवसोअसुरघ्नः|	what is thy share and portion strong subduer asuraslayer rich invoked of many.
तं पर्छन्ती वज्रहस्तं रथेष्ठामिन्द्रं वेपी वक्वरीयस्य नू गीः|	he who for carborne indra armed with thunder hath a hymn craving deeplypiercing fluent.
तुविग्राभं तुविकूर्मिं रभोदां गातुमिषे नक्षते तुम्रमछ|	who sends a song effectual firmlygrasping and strengthbestowing he comes near the mighty.
अया ह तयं मायया वाव्र्धानं मनोजुवा सवतवः पर्वतेन|	strong of thyself thou by this art hast shattered with thoughtswift parvata him who waxed against thee.
अच्युता चिद वीळिता सवोजो रुजो वि दर्ळ्हा धर्षता विरप्शिन|	and mightiest roaring boldly rent in pieces things that were firmly fixed and never shaken.
तं वो धिया नव्यस्या शविष्ठं परत्नं परत्नवत परितंसयध्यै|	him will we fit for you with new devotion the strongest ancient one in ancient manner.
स नो वक्षदनिमानः सुवह्मेन्द्रो विश्वान्यतिदुर्गहाणि|	so may that indra boundless faithful leader conduct us oer all places hard to traverse.
आ जनाय दरुह्वणे पार्थिवानि दिव्यानि दीपयोअन्तरिक्षा|	thou for the people who oppress hast kindled the earthly firmament and that of heaven.
तपा वर्षन विश्वतः शोचिषा तान बरह्मद्विषे शोचय कषामपश्च|	with heat o bull on every side consume them heat earth and flood for him who hates devotion.
भुवो जनस्य दिव्यस्य राजा पार्थिवस्य जगतस्त्वेषसन्द्र्क|	of all the heavenly folk of earthly creatures thou art the king o god of splendid aspect.
धिष्व वज्रं दक्षिण इन्द्र हस्ते विश्वा अजुर्य दयसे वि मायाः|	in thy right hand o indra grasp die thunder eternal thou destroyest all enchantments.
आ संयतमिन्द्र णः सवस्तिं शत्रुतूर्याय बर्हतीमम्र्ध्राम|	give us confirmed prosperity o indra vast and exhaustless for the foes subduing.
यया दासान्यार्याणि वर्त्रा करो वज्रिन सुतुका नाहुषाणि|	strengthen therewith the Āryas hate and dāsas and let the arms of nahusas be mighty.
स नो नियुद्भिः पुरुहूत वेधो विश्ववाराभिरा गहि परयज्यो|	come with thy team which brings all blessings hither disposer muchinvoked exceeding holy.
न या अदेवो वरते न देव आभिर्याहि तूयमा मद्र्यद्रिक|	thou whom no fiend no god can stay or hinder come swittly with these steeds in my direction.
भूय इद वाव्र्धे वीर्यायनेको अजुर्यो दयते वसूनि|	indra hath waxed yet more for hero prowess alone eternal he bestoweth treasures.
पर रिरिचे दिव इन्द्रः पर्थिव्या अर्धमिदस्य परति रोदसी उभे|	indra transcendeth both the worlds in greatness one half of him equalleth earth and heaven.
अधा मन्ये बर्हदसुर्यमस्य यानि दाधार नकिरा मिनाति|	yea mighty i esteem his godlike nature none hindereth what he hath once determined.
दिवेदिवे सूर्यो दर्शतो भूद वि सद्मान्युर्विया सुक्रतुर्धात|	near and afar he spread and set the regions and every day the sun became apparent.
अद्या चिन नू चित तदपो नदीनां यदाभ्यो अरदो गातुमिन्द्र|	een now endures thine exploit of the rivers when indra for their floods thou clavest passage.
नि पर्वता अद्मसदो न सेदुस्त्वया दर्ळ्हानि सुक्रतो रजांसि|	like men who sit at meat the mountains settled by thee most wise the regions were made steadfast.
सत्यमित तन न तवावानन्यो अस्तीन्द्र देवो न मर्त्यो जयायान|	this is the truth none else is like thee indra no god superior to thee no mortal.
अहन्नहिं परिशयानमर्णोअवास्र्जो अपो अछा समुद्रम|	thou slewest ahi who besieged the waters and lettest loose the streams to hurry seaward.
तवमपो वि दुरो विषूचीरिन्द्र दर्ळ्हमरुजः पर्वतस्य|	indra thou breakest up the floods and portals on all sides and the firmness of the mountain.
राजाभवो जगतश्चर्षणीनां साकं सूर्यं जनयन दयामुषासम|	thou art the king of men of all that liveth engendering at once sun heaven and morning.
अहश्च कर्ष्णमहरर्जुनं च वि वर्तेते रजसी वेद्याभिः|	one half of day is dark and bright the other both atmospheres move on by sage devices.
वैश्वानरो जायमानो न राजावातिरज्ज्योतिषाग्निस्तमांसि|	agni vaiśvānara when born as sovran hath with his lustre overcome the darkness.
नाहं तन्तुं न वि जानाम्योतुं न यं वयन्ति समरेऽतमानाः|	i know not either warp or woof i know not the web they weave when moving to the contest.
कस्य सवित पुत्र इह वक्त्वानि परो वदात्यवरेण पित्रा|	whose son shall here speak words that must be spoken without assistance from the father near him.
स इत तन्तुं स वि जानात्योतुं स वक्त्वान्य रतुथा वदाति|	for both the warp and woof he understandeth and in due time shall speak what should be spoken.
य ईं चिकेतदम्र्तस्य गोपा अवश्चरन परो अन्येन पश्यन|	who knoweth as the immortal worlds protector descending seeing with no aid from other.
अयं होता परथमः पश्यतेममिदं जयोतिरम्र्तं मर्त्येषु|	he is the priest the first of all behold him mid mortal men he is the light immortal.
अयं स जज्ञे धरुव आ निषत्तोअमर्त्यस्तन्वा वर्धमानः|	here was he born firmseated in his station immortal ever waxing in his body.
धरुवं जयोतिर्निहितं दर्शये कं मनो जविष्ठं पतयत्स्वन्तः|	a firm light hath been set for men to look on among all things that fly the mind is swiftest.
विश्वे देवाः समनसः सकेता एकं करतुमभिवि यन्ति साधु|	all gods of one accord with one intention move unobstructed to a single purpose.
वि मे कर्णा पतयतो वि चक्षुर्वीदं जयोतिर्ह्र्दय आहितं यत|	mine ears unclose to hear mine eye to see him the light that harbours in my spirit broadens.
वि मे मनश्चरति दूराधीः किं सविद वक्ष्यामिकिमु नू मनिष्ये|	far roams my mind whose thoughts are in the distance what shall i speak what shall i now imagine.
विश्वे देवा अनमस्यन भियानास्त्वामग्ने तमसि तस्थिवांसम|	all the gods bowed them down in fear before thee agni when thou wast dwelling in the darkness.
वैश्वानरोअवतूतये नोअमर्त्योअवतूतये नः|	vaiśvānara be gracious to assist us may the immortal favour us and help us.
सतुषे नरा दिवो अस्य परसन्ताश्विना हुवे जरमाणो अर्कैः|	i laud the heroes twain this heavens controllers singing with songs of praise i call the aśvins.
या सद्य उस्रा वयुषि जमो अन्तान युयूषतः पर्युरूवरांसि|	fain in a moment when the morns are breaking to part the earths ends and the spacious regions.
ता यज्ञमा शुचिभिश्चक्रमाणा रथस्य भानुं रुरुचूरजोभिः|	moving to sacrifice through realms of lustre they light the radiance of the car that bears them.
पुरू वरांस्यमिता मिमानापो धन्वान्यति याथो अज्रान|	traversing many wide unmeasured spaces over the wastes ye pass and fields and waters.
ता ह तयद वर्तिर्यदरध्रमुग्रेत्था धिय ऊहथुः शश्वदश्वैः|	ye to that bounteous path of yours ye mighty have ever borne away our thoughts with horses.
मनोजवेभिरिषिरैः शयध्यै परि वयथिर्दाशुषो मर्त्यस्य|	mindswift and full of vigour that the trouble of man who offers gifts might cease and slumber.
ता नव्यसो जरमाणस्य मन्मोप भूषतो युयुजानसप्ती|	so ye when ye have yoked your chariothorses come to the hymn of the most recent singer.
शुभं पर्क्षमिषमूर्जं वहन्ता होता यक्षत परत्नो अध्रुग युवाना|	our true and ancient herald priest shall bring you the youthful bearing splendour food and vigour.
ता वल्गू दस्रा पुरुशाकतमा परत्ना नव्यसा वचसा विवासे|	with newest hymn i call those wonderworkers ancient and brilliant and exceeding mighty.
या शंसते सतुवते शम्भविष्ठा बभूवतुर्ग्र्णते चित्रराती|	bringers of bliss to him who lauds and praises bestowing varied bounties on the singer.
ता भुज्युं विभिरद्भ्यः समुद्रात तुग्रस्य सूनुमूहथूरजोभिः|	so ye with birds out of the sea and waters bore bhujyu son of tugra through the regions.
अरेणुभिर्योजनेभिर्भुजन्ता पतत्रिभिरर्णसोनिरुपस्थात|	speeding with winged steeds through dustless spaces out of the bosom of the flood they bore him.
वि जयुषा रथ्या यातमद्रिं शरुतं हवं वर्षणा वध्रिमत्याः|	victors carborne ye rent the rock asunder bulls heard the calling of the eunuchs consort.
दशस्यन्ता शयवे पिप्यथुर्गामिति चयवाना सुमतिं भुरण्यू|	bounteous ye filled the cow with milk for Śayu thus swift and zealous ones ye showed your favour.
यद रोदसी परदिवो अस्ति भूमा हेळो देवानामुत मर्त्यत्रा|	whateer from olden time heaven earth existeth great object of the wrath of gods and mortals.
तदादित्या वसवो रुद्रियासो रक्षोयुजे तपुरघं दधात|	make that Ādityas vasus sons of rudra an evil brand to one allied with demons.
य ईं राजानाव रतुथा विदधद रजसो मित्रो वरुणश्चिकेतत|	may he who knows as varuṇa and mitra airs realm appointing both the kings in season.
गम्भीराय रक्षसे हेतिमस्य दरोघाय चिद वचस आनवाय|	against the secret fiend cast forth his weapon against the lying words that strangers utter.
अन्तरैश्चक्रैस्तनयाय वर्तिर्द्युमता यातं नर्वता रथेन|	come to our home with friendly wheels for offipring come on your radiant chariot rich in heroes.
सनुत्येन तयजसा मर्त्यस्य वनुष्यतामपि शीर्षावव्र्क्तम|	strike off ye twain the heads of our assailants who with mans treacherous attack approach us.
आ परमाभिरुत मध्यमाभिर्नियुद्भिर्यातमवमाभिरर्वाक|	come hitherward to us with teams of horses the highest and the midmost and the lowest.
दर्ळ्हस्य चिद गोमतो वि वरजस्य दुरो वर्तं गर्णते चित्रराती|	bountiful lords throw open to the singer doors een of the firmclosed stall of cattle.
उदु तयच्चक्षुर्महि मित्रयोरानेति परियं वरुणयोरदब्धम|	that mighty eye of varuṇa and mitra infallible and dear is moving upward.
रतस्य शुचि दर्शतमनीकं रुक्मो न दिव उदिताव्यद्यौत|	the pure and lovely face of holy order hath shone like gold of heaven in its arising.
वेद यस्त्रीणि विदथान्येषां देवानां जन्म सनुतरा च विप्रः|	the sage who knows these gods three ranks and orders and all their generations near and distant.
रजु मर्तेषु वर्जिना च पश्यन्नभि चष्टे सूरो अर्य एवान|	beholding good and evil acts of mortals sūra marks well the doing of the pious.
सतुष उ वो मह रतस्य गोपानदितिं मित्रं वरुणं सुजातान|	i praise you guards of mighty law eternal aditi mitra varuṇa the noble.
अर्यमणं भगमदब्धधीतीनछा वोचे सधन्यः पावकान|	aryaman bhaga all whose thoughts are faithful hither i call the bright who share in common.
रिशादसः सत्पतीन्रदब्धान महो राज्ञः सुवसनस्य दातॄन|	lords of the brave infallible foedestroyers great kings bestowers of fair homes to dwell in.
यूनः सुक्षत्रान कषयतो दिवो नॄनादित्यान याम्यदितिं दुवोयु|	young heroes ruling heaven with strong dominion Ādityas aditi i seek with worship.
दयौष पितः पर्थिवि मातरध्रुगग्ने भरातर्वसवो मर्ळता नः|	o heaven our father earth our guileless mother o brother agni and ye vasus bless us.
विश्व आदित्या अदिते सजोषा अस्मभ्यं शर्म बहुलं वि यन्त|	grant us o aditi and ye Ādityas all of one mind your manifold protection.
मा नो वर्काय वर्क्ये समस्मा अघायते रीरधता यजत्राः|	give us not up to any evil creature as spoil to wolf or shewolf o ye holy.
यूयं हि षठा रथ्यो नस्तनूनां यूयं दक्षस्य वचसो बभूव|	for ye are they who guide aright our bodies ye are the rulers of our speech and vigour.
मा व एनो अन्यक्र्तं भुजेम मा तत कर्म वसवो यच्चयध्वे|	let us not suffer for the sin of others nor do the deed which ye o vasus punish.
विश्वस्य हि कषयथ विश्वदेवाः सवयं रिपुस्तन्वं रीरिषीष्ट|	ye universal gods are allcontrollers may he do harm unto himself who hates me.
नम इदुग्रं नम आ विवासे नमो दाधार पर्थिवीमुत दयाम|	mighty is homage i adopt and use it homage hath held in place the earth and heaven.
नमो देवेभ्यो नम ईश एषां कर्तं चिदेनो नमसाविवासे|	homage to gods homage commands and rules them i banish even committed sin by homage.
रतस्य वो रथ्यः पूतदक्षान रतस्य पस्त्यसदो अदब्धान|	you furtherers of law pure in your spirit infallible dwellers in the home of order.
ताना नमोभिरुरुचक्षसो नॄन विश्वान व आ नमे महो यजत्राः|	to you all heroes mighty and farseeing i bow me down o holy ones with homage.
ते हि शरेष्ठवर्चसस्त उ नस्तिरो विश्वानि दुरिता नयन्ति|	for these are they who shine with noblest splendour through all our troubles these conduct us safely.
सुक्षत्रासो वरुणो मित्रो अग्निरतधीतयो वक्मराजसत्याः|	varuṇa mitra agni mighty rulers trueminded faithful to the hymns controllers.
ते न इन्द्रः पर्थिवी कषाम वर्धन पूषा भगो अदितिः पञ्च जनाः|	may they earth aditi indra bhaga pūṣan increase our laud increase the fivefold people.
सुशर्माणः सववसः सुनीथा भवन्तु नःसुत्रात्रासः सुगोपाः|	giving good help good refuge goodly guidance be they our good deliverers good protectors.
नू सद्मानं दिव्यं नंशि देवा भारद्वाजः सुमतिं याति होता|	come now o gods to your celestial station the bharadvājas priest entreats your favour.
आसानेभिर्यजमानो मियेधैर्देवानां जन्म वसूयुर्ववन्द|	he sacrificing fain for wealth hath honoured the gods vath those who sit and share oblations.
अप तयं वर्जिनं रिपुं सतेनमग्ने दुराध्यम|	agni drive thou the wicked foe the evilhearted thief away.
दविष्ठमस्य सत्पते कर्धी सुगम|	far far lord of the brave i and give us easy paths.
गरावाणः सोम नो हि कं सखित्वनाय वावशुः|	soma these pressingstones have called aloud to win thee for our friend.
जही नयत्रिणं पणिं वर्को हि षः|	destroy the greedy paṇi for a wolf is he.
यूयं हि षठा सुदानव इन्द्रज्येष्ठा अभिद्यवः|	ye o most bountiful are they who led by indra seek the sky.
कर्ता नो अध्वन्ना सुगं गोपा अमा|	give us good paths for travel guard us ivell at home.
अपि पन्थामगन्महि सवस्तिगामनेहसम|	now have we entered on the road that leads to bliss without a foe.
येन विश्वाः परिद्विषो वर्णक्ति विन्दते वसु|	the road whereon a man escapes all enemies and gathers wealth.
