शरुधी न इन्द्र हवयामसि तवा महो वाजस्य सातौ वाव्र्षाणाः|	o indra hear us raining down the soma we call on thee to win us mighty valour.
सं यद विशोअयन्त शूरसाता उग्रं नोअवः पार्ये अहन दाः|	give us strong succour on the day of trial when the tribes gather on the field of battle.
तवां वाजी हवते वाजिनेयो महो वाजस्य गध्यस्य सातौ|	the warrior son of warrior sire invokes thee to gain great strength that may be won as booty.
तवां वर्त्रेष्विन्द्र सत्पतिं तरुत्रं तवां चष्टे मुष्टिहा गोषु युध्यन|	to thee the brave mans lord the fiends subduer he looks when fighting hand to hand for cattle.
तवं कविं चोदयोअर्कसातौ तवं कुत्साय शुष्णं दाशुषे वर्क|	thou didst impel the sage to win the daylight didst ruin Śuṣṇa for the pious kutsa.
तवं शिरो अमर्मणः पराहन्नतिथिग्वाय शंस्यं करिष्यन|	the invulnerable demons head thou clavest when thou wouldst win the praise of atithigva.
तवं रथं पर भरो योधं रष्वमावो युध्यन्तं वर्षभं दशद्युम|	the lofty battlecar thou broughtest forward thou holpest dasadyu the strong when fighting.
तवं तुग्रं वेतसवे सचाहन तवं तुजिं गर्णन्तमिन्द्र तूतोः|	along with vetasu thou slewest tugra and madest tuji strong who praised thee indra.
तवं तदुक्थमिन्द्र बर्हणा कः पर यच्छता सहस्राशूर दर्षि|	thou madest good the laud what time thou rentest a hundred thousand fighting foes o hero.
अव गिरेर्दासं शम्बरं हन परावो दिवोदासं चित्राभिरूती|	slewest the dāsa Śambara of the mountain and with strange aids didst succour divodāsa.
तवं शरद्धाभिर्मन्दसानः सोमैर्दभीतये चुमुरिमिन्द्रसिष्वप|	made glad with somadraughts and faith thou sentest cumuri to his sleep to please dabhīti.
तवं रजिं पिठीनसे दशस्यन षष्टिं सहस्राशच्या सचाहन|	thou kindly giving raji to pithinas slewest with might at once the sixty thousand.
अहं चन तत सूरिभिरानश्यां तव जयाय इन्द्र सुम्नमोजः|	may i too with the liberal chiefs o indra acquire thy blin supreme and domination.
तवया यत सतवन्ते सधवीर वीरास्त्रिवरूथेन नहुषा शविष्ठ|	when mightiest herogirt nahuṣa heroes boast them in thee the triplystrong defender.
वयं ते अस्यामिन्द्र दयुम्नहूतौ सखायः सयाम महिन परेष्ठाः|	so may we he thy friends thy best beloved o indra at this holy invocation.
परातर्दनिः कषत्रश्रीरस्तु शरेष्ठो घने वर्त्राणां सनये धनानाम|	best be pratardani illustrious ruler in slaying foemen and in gaining riches.
य ओजिष्ठ इन्द्र तं सु नो दा मदो वर्षन सवभिष्टिर्दास्वान|	give us the rapture that is mightiest indra prompt to bestow and swift to aid o hero.
सौवश्व्यं यो वनवत सवश्वो वर्त्रा समत्सु सासहदमित्रान|	that wins with brave steeds where brave steeds encounter and quells the vṛtras and the foes in battle.
तवां हीन्द्रावसे विवाचो हवन्ते चर्षणयः शूरसातौ|	for with loud voice the tribes invoke thee indra to aid them in the battlefield of heroes.
तवं विप्रेभिर्वि पणीन्रशायस्त्वोत इत सनिता वाजमर्वा|	thou with the singers hast pierced through the paṇis the charger whom thou aidest wins the booty.
तवं तानिन्द्रोभयानमित्रान दासा वर्त्राण्यार्या च शूर|	both races indra of opposing foemen o hero both the Ārya and the dāsa.
वधीर्वनेव सुधितेभिरत्कैरा पर्त्सु दर्षि नर्णां नर्तम|	hast thou struck down like woods with wellshot lightnings thou rentest them in fight most manly chieftain.
स तवं न इन्द्राकवाभिरूती सखा विश्वायुरविता वर्धे भूः|	indra befriend us with no scanty succour prosper and aid us loved of all that liveth.
सवर्षाता यद धवयामसि तवा युध्यन्तो नेमधिताप्र्त्सु शूर|	when fighting for the sunlight we invoke thee o hero in the fray in wars division.
नूनं न इन्द्रापराय च सया भवा मर्ळीक उत नो अभिष्टौ|	be ours o indra now and for the future be graciously inclined and near to help us.
इत्था गर्णन्तो महिनस्य शर्मन दिवि षयाम पार्ये गोषतमाः|	thus may we singing sheltered by the mighty win many cattle on the day of trial.
किमस्य मदे किं वस्य पीताविन्द्रः किमस्य सख्ये चकार|	what deed hath indra done in the wild transport in quaffing or in friendship with the soma.
रणा वा ये निषदि किं ते अस्य पुर विविद्रे किमु नूतनासः|	what joys have men of ancient times or recent obtained within the chamber of libation.
सदस्य मदे सद वस्य पितविन्द्रः सदस्य सख्ये चकार|	in its wild joy indra hath proved him faithful faithful in quaffing faithful in its friendship.
रणा वा ये निषदि सत ते अस्य पुर विविद्रे सदु नूतनासः|	his truth is the delight that in this chamber the men of old and recent times have tasted.
नहि नु ते महिमनः समस्य न मघवन मघवत्त्वस्य विद्म|	all thy vast power o maghavan we know not know not the riches of thy full abundance.
न राधसोराधसो नूतनस्येन्द्र नकिर्दद्र्श इन्द्रियं ते|	no one hath seen that might of thine productive of bounty every day renewed o indra.
एतत तयत त इन्द्रियमचेति येनावधीर्वरशिखस्य शेषः|	this one great power of thine our eyes have witnessed wherewith thou slewest varasikhas children.
वज्रस्य यत ते निहतस्य शुष्मात सवनाच्चिदिन्द्र परमोददार|	when by the force of thy descending thunder at the mere solund their boldest was demolished.
वधीदिन्द्रो वरशिखस्य शेषोअभ्यावर्तिने चायमानाय शिक्षन|	in aid of abhyavartin cayamana indra destroyed the seed of varasikha.
वर्चीवतो यद धरियूपीयायां हन पूर्वे अर्धे भियसापरो दर्त|	at hariyupiya he smote the vanguard of the vrcivans and the rear fled frighted.
तरिंशच्छतं वर्मिण इन्द्र साकं यव्यावत्यां पुरुहूत शरवस्या|	three thousand mailed in quest of fame together on the yavyavati o muchsought indra.
वर्चीवन्तः शरवे पत्यमानाः पात्रा भिन्दानन्यर्थान्यायन|	vrcivans sons falling before the arrow like bursting vessels went to their destruction.
यस्य गावावरुषा सूयवस्यू अन्तरू षु चरतो रेरिहाणा|	he whose two red steers seeking goodly pasture plying their tongues move on twixt earth and heaven.
स सर्ञ्जयाय तुर्वशं परादाद वर्चीवतो दैववातायशिक्षन|	gave turvaśa to sṛñjaya and to aid him gave the vrcivans up to daivavata.
दवयानग्ने रथिनो विंशतिं गा वधूमतो मघवा मह्यं सम्राट|	two wagonteams with damsels twenty oxen o agni abhydvartin cayamdna.
अभ्यावर्ती चायमानो ददाति दूणाशेयं दक्षिणा पार्थवानाम|	the liberal sovran giveth me this guerdon of prthus seed is hard to win from others.
यज्ञायज्ञा वो अग्नये गिरागिरा च दक्षसे|	sing to your agni with each song at every sacrifice for strength.
परपर वयमम्र्तं जातवेदसं परियं मित्रं न शंसिषम|	come let us praise the wise and everlasting god even as a wellbeloved friend.
ऊर्जो नपातं स हिनायमस्मयुर्दाशेम हव्यदातये|	the son of strength for is he not our gracious lord let us serve him who bears our gifts.
भुवद वाजेष्वविता भुवद वर्ध उत तराता तनूनाम|	in battle may he be our help and strengthener yea be the saviour of our lives.
वर्षा हयग्ने अजरो महान विभास्यर्चिषा|	agni thou beamest forth with light great hero never changed by time.
अजस्रेण शोचिषा शोशुचच्छुचे सुदीतिभिः सु दीदिहि|	shining pure agni with a light that never fades beam with thy fair beams brilliantly.
महो देवान यजसि यक्ष्यानुषक तव करत्वोत दंसना|	thou worshippest great gods bring them without delay by wisdom and thy wondrous power.
अर्वाचः सीं कर्णुह्यग्नेअवसे रास्व वाजोत वंस्व|	o agni make them turn hither to succour us give strength and win it for thyself.
यमापो अद्रयो वना गर्भं रतस्य पिप्रति|	he whom floods stones and trees support the offspring of eternal law.
सहसा यो मथितो जायते नर्भिः पर्थिव्या अधि सानवि|	he who when rubbed with force is brought to life by men upon the lofty height of earth.
आ यः पप्रौ भानुना रोदसी उभे धूमेन धावते दिवि|	he who hath filled both worlds fult with his brilliant shine who hastens with his smoke to heaven.
तिरस्तमो दद्र्श ऊर्म्यास्वा शयावास्वरुषो वर्षा शयावा अरुषो वर्षा|	he made himself apparent through the gloom by night the red bull in the darksome nights the red bull in the darksome nights.
बर्हद्भिरग्ने अर्चिभिः शुक्रेण देव शोचिषा|	o agni with thy lofty beams with thy pure brilliancy o god.
भरद्वाजे समिधानो यविष्ठ्य रेवन नः शुक्र दीदिहि दयुमत पावक दीदिहि|	kindled most youthful one by bharadvājas hand shine on us o pure god with wealth shine purifier splendidly.
विश्वासां गर्हपतिर्विशामसि तवमग्ने मानुषीणाम|	thou art the lord of house and home of all the tribes o agni of all tribes of men.
शतं पूर्भिर्यविष्ठ पाह्यंहसः समेद्धारं शतं हिमा सतोत्र्भ्यो ये च ददति|	guard with a hundred forts thy kindler from distress through hundred winters youngest god and those who make thy singers rich.
तवं नश्चित्र ऊत्या वसो राधांसि चोदय|	wonderful with thy favouring help send us thy bounties gracious lord.
अस्य रायस्त्वमग्ने रथीरसि विदा गाधं तुचे तु नः|	thou art the charioteer agni of earthly wealth find rest and safety for our seed.
पर्षि तोकं तनयं पर्त्र्भिष टवमदब्धैरप्रयुत्वभिः|	with guards unfailing never negligent speed thou our children and our progeny.
अग्ने हेळांसि दैव्या युयोधि नोअदेवानि हवरांसि च|	keep far from us o agni all celestial wrath and wickedness of godless men.
आ सखायः सबर्दुघां धेनुमजध्वमुप नव्यसा वचः|	hither o friends with newest song drive her who freely pours her milk.
सर्जध्वमनपस्फुराम|	loose her who never turns away.
या शर्धाय मारुताय सवभानवे शरवोअम्र्त्यु धुक्षत|	who for the host of maruts bright with native sheen hath shed immortal fame like milk.
या मर्ळीके मरुतां तुराणां या सुम्नैरेवयावरी|	whom the impetuous maruts look upon with love who moves in splendour on their ways.
भरद्वाजायाव धुक्षत दविता|	for bharadvāja she poured down in days of old.
धेनुं च विश्वदोहसमिषं च विश्वभोजसम|	the milchcow yielding milk for all and food that gives all nourishment.
तं व इन्द्रं न सुक्रतुं वरुणमिव मायिनम|	your friend like indra passing wise with magic power like varuṇa.
अर्यमणं न मन्द्रं सर्प्रभोजसं विष्णुं न सतुष आदिशे|	like aryaman joygiving bringing plenteous food like visnxu for my wish i praise.
तवेषं शर्धो न मारुतं तुविष्वण्यनर्वाणं पूषणं सं यथा शता|	bright as the host of maruts mighty in their roar may they bring pūṣan free from foes.
सं सहस्रा कारिषच्चर्षणिभ्य आनाविर्गूळ्हा वसू करत सुवेदा नो वसू करत|	may they bring hither hundreds thousands for our men may they bring hidden stores to light and make wealth easy to be found.
आ मा पूषन्नुप दरव शंसिषं नु ते अपिकर्ण आघ्र्णे|	haste to me pūṣan in thine car bright deity i fain would speak.
अघा अर्यो अरातयः|	most sinful is our foemans hate.
मा काकम्बीरमुद वर्हो वनस्पतिमशस्तीर्वि हि नीनशः|	tear not up by the roots the kakambira tree destroy thou all malignity.
मोत सूरो अह एवा चन गरीवा आदधते वेः|	let them not snare by day the neck of that celestial bird the sun.
दर्तेरिव तेअव्र्कमस्तु सख्यम|	uninjured let thy friendship be like the smooth surface of a skin.
अछिद्रस्य दधन्वतः सुपूर्णस्य दधन्वतः|	a flawless skin containing curds full to the mouth containing curds.
परो हि मर्त्यैरसि समो देवैरुत शरिया|	for thou art high above mankind in glory equal to the gods.
अभि खयः पूषन पर्तनासु नस्त्वमवा नूनं यथा पुरा|	therefore o pūṣan look upon us in the fight now help us as in days of old.
वामी वामस्य धूतयः परणीतिरस्तु सून्र्ता|	may the kind excellence of him the kind loud roarers be our guide.
देवस्य वामरुतो मर्त्यस्य वेजानस्य परयज्यवः|	be it the gods o maruts or a mortal mans who worships ye impetuous ones.
सद्यश्चिद यस्य चर्क्र्तिः परि दयां देवो नैति सूर्यः|	they whose high glory in a moment like the god the sun goes round the space of heaven.
तवेषं शवो दधिरे नाम यज्ञियं मरुतो वर्त्रहं शवो जयेष्ठं वर्त्रहं शवः|	the maruts have obtained bright strength a sacred name strength that destroys the vṛtras strength vṛtradestroying excellent.
सक्र्द ध दयौरजायत सक्र्द भूमिरजायत|	once only once the heaven was made once only once the earth was formed.
पर्श्न्या दुग्धं सक्र्त पयस्तदन्यो नानु जायते|	once only pṛśnis milk was shed no second after this is born.
मध्ये होता दुरोणे बर्हिषो राळ अग्निस्तोदस्य रोदसी यजध्यै|	king of trimmed grass herald within the dwelling may agni worship the impellers worldhalves.
अयं स सूनुः सहस रतावा दूरात सूर्यो न शोचिषा ततान|	he son of strength the holy from a distance hath spread himself abroad with light like sūrya.
आ यस्मिन तवे सवपाके यजत्र यक्षद राजन सर्वतातेव नुद्यौः|	in thee most wise shall dyaus for full perfection king holy one pronounce the call to worship.
तरिषधस्थस्ततरुषो न जंहो हव्या मघानि मानुषा यजध्यै|	found in three places like the speeders footstep come to present mens riches as oblations.
तेजिष्ठा यस्यारतिर्वनेराट तोदो अध्वन न वर्धसानो अद्यौत|	whose blaze most splendid sovran in the forest shines waxing on his way like the  impeller.
अद्रोघो न दरविता चेतति तमन्नमर्त्योअवर्त्र ओषधीषु|	he knows himself like as a guileless smelter not to be stayed among the plants immortal.
सास्माकेभिरेतरी न शूषैरग्नि षटवे दम आ जातवेदाः|	our friends extol him like a steed for vigour even agni in the dwelling jataveas.
दर्वन्नो वन्वन करत्वा नार्वोस्रः पितेव जारयायि यज्ञैः|	trcefed he fights with power as doth a champion like dawns sire to be praised with sacrifices.
अध समास्य पनयन्ति भासो वर्था यत तक्षदनुयाति पर्थ्वीम|	men wonder at his shining glows when paring the woods with case oer the broad earth he goeth.
सद्यो यः सयन्द्रो विषितो धवीयान रणो न तायुरति धन्वा राट|	and like a rushing flood loosed quickly burneth swift as a guilty thief oer desert places.
स तवं नो अर्वन निदाया विश्वेभिरग्ने अग्निभिरिधानः|	so mighty thou protectest us from slander o champion agni with all fires enkindled.
वेषि रायो वि यासि दुछुना मदेम शतहिमाः सुवीराः|	bring opulence and drive away affliction may brave sons gladden us through a hundred winters.
इमा उ तवा पुरुतमस्य कारोर्हव्यं वीर हव्या हवन्ते|	these the most constant singers invocations call thee who art to be invoked o hero.
धियो रथेष्ठामजरं नवीयो रयिर्विभूतिरीयते वचस्या|	hymns call anew the chariotborne eternal by eloquence men gain abundant riches.
तमु सतुष इन्द्रं यो विदानो गिर्वाहसं गीर्भीर्यज्ञव्र्द्धम|	i praise that indra known to all men honoured with songs extolled with hymns at sacrifices.
यस्य दिवमति मह्ना पर्थिव्याः पुरुमायस्य रिरिचेमहित्वम|	whose majesty rich in wondrous arts surpasseth the magnitude of earth and heaven in greatness.
स इत तमोअवयुनं ततन्वत सूर्येण वयुनवच्चकार|	he hath made pathways with the sun to aid him throughout the darkness that extended pathless.
कदा ते मर्ता अम्र्तस्य धामेयक्षन्तो न मिनन्ति सवधावः|	mortals who yearn to worship neer dishonour o mighty god thy law who art immortal.
यस्ता चकार स कुह सविदिन्द्रः कमा जनं चरति कासु विक्षु|	and he who did these things where is that indra among what tribes what people doth he visit.
कस्ते यज्ञो मनसे शं वराय को अर्क इन्द्रकतमः स होता|	what sacrifice contents thy mind  and wishes what priest among them all what hymn o indra.
इदा हि ते वेविषतः पुराजाः परत्नास आसुः पुरुक्र्त सखायः|	yea here were they who born of old have served thee thy friends of ancient time thou active worker.
ये मध्यमास उत नूतनास उतावमस्य पुरुहूत बोधि|	bethink thee now of these invoked of many the midmost and the recent and the youngest.
तं पर्छन्तोअवरासः पराणि परत्ना त इन्द्र शरुत्यानु येमुः|	inquiring after him thy later servants indra have gained thy former old traditions.
अर्चामसि वीर बरह्मवाहो यादेव विद्म तात तवा महान्तम|	hero to whom the prayer is brought we praise thee as great for that wherein we know thee mighty.
अभि तवा पाजो रक्षसो वि तस्थे महि जज्ञानमभि तत सु तिष्ठ|	the demons strength is gathered fast against thee great as that strength hath grown go forth to meet it.
तव परत्नेन युज्येन सख्या वज्रेण धर्ष्णो अपता नुदस्व|	with thine own ancient friend and companion the thunderbolt brave champion drive it backward.
स तु शरुधीन्द्र नूतनस्य बरह्मण्यतो वीर कारुधायः|	hear too the prayer of this thy present beadsman o indra hero cherishing the singer.
तवं हयापिः परदिवि पितॄणां शश्वद बभूथ सुहव एष्टौ|	for thou wast aye our fathers friend aforetime still swift to listen to their supplication.
परोतये वरुणं मित्रमिन्द्रं मरुतः कर्ष्वावसे नो अद्य|	bring to our help this day for our protection varuṇa mitra  indra and the maruts.
पर पूषणं विष्णुमग्निं पुरन्धिं सवितारमोषधीः पर्वतांश्च|	pūṣan and viṣṇu agni and purandhi savitar also and the plants and mountains.
इम उ तवा पुरुशाक परयज्यो जरितारो अभ्यर्चन्त्यर्कैः|	the singers here exalt with hymns and praises thee who art very mighty and most holy.
शरुधी हवमा हुवतो हुवानो न तवावानन्यो अम्र्त तवदस्ति|	hear when invoked the invokers invocation beside thee there is nonelike thee immortal.
नू म आ वाचमुप याहि विद्वान विश्वेभिः सूनो सहसो यजत्रैः|	now to my words come quickly thou who knowest o son of strength with all who claim our worship.
ये अग्निजिह्वा रतसाप आसुर्ये मनुं चक्रुरुपरं दसाय|	who visit sacred rites whose tongue is agni gods who made manu stronger than the dasyu.
स नो बोधि पुरेता सुगेषूत दुर्गेषु पथिक्र्द विदानः|	on good and evil ways be thou our leader thou who art known to all as pathpreparer.
ये अश्रमास उरवो वहिष्ठास्तेभिर्न इन्द्राभि वक्षि वाजम|	bring power to us o indra with thy horses steeds that are best to draw broadbacked unwearied.
इन्द्रं वो नरः सख्याय सेपुर्महो यन्तः सुमतये चकानाः|	your men have followed indra for his friendship and for his lovingkindness glorified him.
महो हि दाता वज्रहस्तो अस्ति महामु रण्वमवसे यजध्वम|	for he bestows great wealth the thunderwielder worship him great and kind to win his favour.
आ यस्मिन हस्ते नर्या मिमिक्षुरा रथे हिरण्यये रथेष्ठाः|	him to whose hand men closely cling and drivers stand on his golden chariot firmly stationed.
आ रश्मयो गभस्त्यो सथूरयोराध्वन्नश्वासो वर्षणो युजानाः|	with his firm arms he holds the reins his horses the stallions are yoked ready for the journey.
शरिये ते पादा दुव आ मिमिक्षुर्ध्र्ष्णुर्वज्री शवसा दक्षिणावान|	thy devotees embrace thy feet for glory bold thunderarmed rich through thy strength in guerdon.
वसानो अत्कं सुरभिं दर्शे कं सवर्ण नर्तविषिरो बभूथ|	robed in a garment fair as heaven to look on thou hast displayed thee like an active dancer.
स सोम आमिश्लतमः सुतो भूद यस्मिन पक्तिः पच्यते सन्तिधानाः|	that soma when effused hath best consistence for which the food is dressed and grain is mingled.
इन्द्रं नर सतुवन्तो बरह्मकारा उक्था शंसन्तो देववाततमाः|	by which the men who pray extolling indra chief favourites of gods recite their praises.
न ते अन्तः शवसो धाय्यस्य वि तु बाबधे रोदसी महित्वा|	no limit of thy might hath been appointed which by its greatness sundered earth and heaven.
आ ता सूरिः पर्णति तूतुजानो यूथेवाप्सु समीजमान ऊती|	these the prince filleth full with strong endeavour driving as twere with help his flocks to waters.
एवेदिन्द्रः सुहव रष्वो अस्तूती अनूती हिरिशिप्रः सत्वा|	so be the lofty indra prompt to listen helper unaided goldenvisored hero.
एवा हि जातो असमात्योजाः पुरू च वर्त्रा हनति नि दस्यून|	yea so may he shown forth in might unequalled smite down the many vṛtras and the dasyus.
उदु षय देवः सविता हिरण्यया बाहू अयंस्त सवनायसुक्रतुः|	full of effectual wisdom savitar the god hath stretched out golden arms that he may bring forth life.
घर्तेन पाणी अभि परुष्णुते मखो युवा सुदक्षो रजसो विधर्मणि|	young and most skilful while he holds the region up the warrior sprinkles fatness over both his hands.
देवस्य वयं सवितुः सवीमनि शरेष्ठे सयाम वसुनश्चदावने|	may we enjoy the noblest vivifying force of savitar the god that he may give us wealth.
यो विश्वस्य दविपदो यश्चतुष्पदो निवेशने परसवे चासि भूमनः|	for thou art mighty to produce and lull to rest the world of life that moves on two feet and on four.
अदब्धेभिः सवितः पायुभिष टवं शिवेभिरद्य परि पाहि नो गयम|	protect our habitation savitar this day with guardian aids around auspicious firm and true.
हिरण्यजिह्वः सुविताय नव्यसे रक्षा माकिर्नोघशंस ईशत|	god of the golden tongue keep us for newest bliss let not the evilwisher have us in his power.
उदु षय देवः सविता दमूना हिरण्यपाणिः परतिदोषमस्थात|	this savitar the god the goldenhanded friend of the home hath risen to meet the twilight.
अयोहनुर्यजतो मन्द्रजिह्व आ दाशुषे सुवति भूरिवामम|	with cheeks of brass with pleasant tongue the holy he sends the worshipper rich gifts in plenty.
उदू अयानुपवक्तेव बाहू हिरण्यया सविता सुप्रतीका|	like a director savitar hath extended his golden arms exceeding fair to look on.
दिवो रोहांस्यरुहत पर्थिव्या अरीरमत पतयत कच्चिदभ्वम|	he hath gone up the heights of earth and heaven and made each monster fall and cease from troubling.
वाममद्य सवितर्वाममु शवो दिवेदिवे वाममस्मभ्यं सावीः|	fair wealth o savitar today tomorrow fair wealth produce for us each day that passes.
वामस्य हि कषयस्य देव भूरेरया धिया वामभाजः सयाम|	may we through this our song be happy gainers god of a fair and spacious habitation.
इममू षु वो अतिथिमुषर्बुधं विश्वासां विशां पतिम्र्ञ्जसे गिरा|	with this my song i strive to reach this guest of yours who wakes at early morn the lord of all the tribes.
वेतीद दिवो जनुषा कच्चिदा शुचिर्ज्योक चिदत्ति गर्भो यदच्युतम|	each time he comes from heaven the pure one from of old from ancient days the child cats everlasting food.
मित्रं न यं सुधितं भर्गवो दधुर्वनस्पतावीड्यमूर्ध्वशोचिषम|	whom welldis sed the blirgus stablished as a rriend whom men must glorify highflaming in the wood.
स तवं सुप्रीतो वीतहव्ये अद्भुत परशस्तिभिर्महयसे दिवे दिवे|	as such most friendly thou art every day extolled in lauds by vitahavya o thou wondrous god.
स तवं दक्षस्याव्र्को वर्धो भूरर्यः परस्यान्तरस्य तरुषः|	be thou the foeless helper of the skilful man subduer of the enemy near or far away.
रायः सूनो सहसो मर्त्येष्वा छर्दिर्यछ वीतहव्याय सप्रथो भरद्वाजाय सप्रथः|	bestow a wealthy home on men o son of strength give vitahavya riches spreading far and wide give bharadvāja widespread wealth.
दयुतानं वो अतिथिं सवर्णरमग्निं होतारं मनुषः सवध्वरम|	him your refulgent guest agni who comes from heaven the herald of mankind wellskilled in sacred rites.
विप्रं न दयुक्षवचसं सुव्र्क्तिभिर्हव्यवाहमरतिं देवं रञ्जसे|	who like a holy singer utters heavenly words oblationbearer envoy god i seek with hymns.
पावकया यश्चितयन्त्या कर्पा कषामन रुरुच उषसो न भानुना|	who with his purifying eyeattracting form hath shone upon the earth as with the light of dawn.
तूर्वन न यामन्नेतशस्य नू रण आ यो घर्णे न तत्र्षाणो अजरः|	who speeding on as in the fight of etaia cometh untouched by age as one athirst in heat.
अग्निमअग्निं वः समिधा दुवस्यत परियमपरियं वो अतिथिं गर्णीषणि|	worship ye agni agni with your log of wood praise your beloved your beloved guest with songs.
उप वो गीर्भिरम्र्तं विवासत देवो देवेषु वनते हि वार्यं देवो देवेषु वनते हि नो दुवः|	invite ye the immortal hither with your hymns a god among the gods he loveth what is choice loveth our service god mid gods.
समिद्धमग्निं समिधा गिरा गर्णे शुचिं पावकं पुरो अध्वरे धरुवम|	agni inflamed with fuel in my song i sing pure cleanser steadlast set in tront at sacrifice.
विप्रं होतारं पुरुवारमद्रुहं कविं सुम्नैरीमहे जातवेदसम|	wise jātavedas we implore with prayers for bliss the priest the holy singer bounteous void of guile.
तवां दूतमग्ने अम्र्तं युगेयुगे हव्यवाहं दधिरे पायुमीड्यम|	men agni in each age have made thee deathiess one their envoy offeringbearer guard adorable.
देवासश्च मर्तासश्च जाग्र्विं विभुं विश्पतिं नमसा नि षेदिरे|	with reverence gods and mortals have established thee the everwatchful omnipresent household lord.
विभूषन्नग्न उभयाननु वरता दूतो देवानां रजसी समीयसे|	thou agni ordering the works and ways of both as envoy of the gods traversest both the worlds.
यत ते धीतिं सुमतिमाव्र्णीमहेअध समा नस्त्रिवरूथः शिवो भव|	when we lay claim to thy regard and gracious fare be thou to us a thriceprotecting friendly guard.
तं सुप्रतीकं सुद्र्शं सवञ्चमविद्वांसो विदुष्टरं सपेम|	him fair of face rapid and fair to look on him very wise may we who know not follow.
स यक्षद विश्वा वयुनानि विद्वान पर हव्यमग्निरम्र्तेषु वोचत|	let him who knows all rules invite for worship agru announce our offering to the immortals.
तमग्ने पास्युत तं पिपर्षि यस्त आनट कवये शूर धीतिम|	him agni thou deliverest and savest who brings him prayer to thee the wise o hero.
यज्ञस्य वा निशितिं वोदितिं वा तमित पर्णक्षि शवसोत राया|	the end of sacrifice or its inception yea thou endowest him with power and riches.
तवमग्ने वनुष्यतो नि पाहि तवमु नः सहसावन्नवद्यात|	guard us from him who would assail us agni preserve us o thou victor from dishonour.
सं तवा धवस्मन्वदभ्येतु पाथः सं रयि सप्र्हयाय्यःसहस्री|	here let the place of darkening come upon thee may wealth be ours desirable in thousands.
अग्निर्होता गर्हपतिः स राजा विश्वा वेद जनिमा जातवेदः|	agni the priest is king lord of the homestead he jatayedas knows all generations.
देवानामुत यो मर्त्यानां यजिष्ठः स पर यजतां रतावा|	most skilful worshipper mid gods and mortals may he begin the sacrifice the holy.
अग्ने यदद्य विशो अध्वरस्य होतः पावकशोचे वेष टवं हि यज्वा|	whateer today thou brightflamed priest enjoyest from the mans ritefor thou art sacrificer.
रता यजासि महिना वि यद भूर्हव्या वह यविष्ठ या ते अद्य|	worship for duly dost thou spread in greatness bear off thine ofrerings of today most youthful.
अभि परयांसि सुधितानि हि खयो नि तवा दधीत रोदसी यजध्यै|	look thou upon the viands duly laid for thee fain would he set thee here to worship heaven andearth.
अवा नो मघवन वाजसातावग्ने विश्वानि दुरिता तरेम ता तरेम तवावसा तरेम|	help us o liberal agni in the strife for spoil so that we may oercome all things that trouble us oercome oercome them with thy help.
अग्ने विश्वेभिः सवनीक देवैरूर्णावन्तं परथमः सीद योनिम|	together with all gods o fairfaced agni be seated first upon the woollined altar.
कुलायिनं घर्तवन्तं सवित्रे यज्ञं नय यजमानाय साधु|	nestlike bedewed with oil bear this our worship to savitar who sacrifices rightly.
इममु तयमथर्ववदग्निं मन्थन्ति वेधसः|	here the arranging priests as did atharvan rub this agni forth.
यमङकूयन्तमानयन्नमूरं शयाव्याभ्यः|	whom not bewildered as he moved in winding ways they brought from gloom.
जनिष्वा देववीतये सर्वताता सवस्तये|	for the gods banquet be thou born for full perfection and for weal.
आ देवान वक्ष्यम्र्तान रताव्र्धो यज्ञं देवेषु पिस्प्र्शः|	bring the immortal gods who strengthen holy law so let our sacrifice reach the gods.
वयमु तवा गर्हपते जनानामग्ने अकर्म समिधा बर्हन्तम|	o agni lord and master of mens homesteads with kindled fuel we have made thee mighty.
अस्थूरि नो गार्हपत्यानि सन्तु तिग्मेन नस्तेजसा सं शिशाधि|	let not our household gear be found defective sharpen us with thy penetrating splendour.
पर नु वोचा सुतेषु वां वीर्या यानि चक्रथुः|	i will declare while juices flow the manly deeds that ye have done.
हतासो वां पितरो देवशत्रव इन्द्राग्नी जीवथो युवम|	your fathers enemies of gods were smitten down and indraagni ye survive.
बळ इत्था महिमा वामिन्द्राग्नी पनिष्ठ आ|	thus indraagnip verily your greatness merits loftiest praise.
समानो वां जनिता भरातरा युवं यमाविहेहमातरा|	sprung from one common father brothers twins are ye your mother is in every place.
ओकिवांसा सुते सचानश्वा सप्ती इवादने|	these who delight in flowing juice like fellow horses at their food.
इन्द्रा नवग्नी अवसेह वज्रिणा वयं देवा हवामहे|	indra and agni gods armed with the thunderbolt we call this day to come with help.
य इन्द्राग्नी सुतेषु वां सतवत तेष्व रताव्र्धा|	indra and agni friends of law served with rich gifts your speech is kind.
जोषवाकं वदतः पज्रहोषिणा न देवा भसथश्चन|	to him who praises you while these libations flow that man o gods ye neer consume.
इन्द्राग्नी को अस्य वां देवौ मर्तश्चिकेतति|	what mortal understands o gods indra and agni this your way.
विषूचो अश्वान युयुजान ईयत एकः समान आ रथे|	one of you yoking steeds that move to every side advances in your common car.
इन्द्राग्नी अपादियं पूर्वागात पद्वतीभ्यः|	first indraagni hath this maid come footless unto those with feet.
हित्वी शिरो जिह्वया वावदच्चरत तरिंशत पदा नयक्रमीत|	stretching her head and speaking loudly with her tongue she hath gone downward thirty steps.
इन्द्राग्नी आ हि तन्वते नरो धन्वानि बाह्वोः|	een now o indraagni men hold in their arms and stretch their bows.
मा नो अस्मिन महाधने परा वर्क्तं गविष्टिषु|	desert us not in this great fray in battles for the sake of kine.
इन्द्राग्नी तपन्ति माघा अर्यो अरातयः|	the foemans sinful enmities indra and agni vex me sore.
अप दवेषांस्या कर्तं युयुतं सूर्यादधि|	drive those who hate me far away and keep them distant from the sun.
इन्द्राग्नी युवोरपि वसु दिव्यानि पार्थिवा|	indra and agni yours are all the treasures of the heavens and earth.
आ न इह परयछतं रयिं विश्वायुपोषसम|	here give ye us the opulence that prospers every living man.
इन्द्राग्नी उक्थवाहसा सतोमेभिर्हवनश्रुता|	o indraagni who accept the laud and hear us for our praise.
विश्वाभिर्गीर्भिरा गतमस्य सोमस्य पीतये|	come near us drawn by all our songs to drink of this our soma juice.
शुक्रं ते अन्यद यजतं ते अन्यद विषुरूपे अहनी दयौरिवासि|	like heaven art thou one form is bright one holy like day and night dissimilar in colour.
विश्वा हि माया अवसि सवधावो भद्रा ते पूषन्निहरातिरस्तु|	all magic powers thou aidest selfdepen dent auspicious be thy bounty here o pūṣan.
अजाश्वः पशुपा वाजपस्त्यो धियंजिन्वो भुवने विश्वे अर्पितः|	goatborne the guard of cattle he whose home is strength inspirer of the hymn set over all the world.
अष्ट्रां पूषा शिथिरामुद्वरीव्र्जत संचक्षाणोभुवना देव ईयते|	brandishing here and there his lightly moving goad beholding every creature pūṣan god goes forth.
यास्ते पूषन नावो अन्तः समुद्रे हिरण्ययीरन्तरिक्षे चरन्ति|	o pūṣan with thy golden ships that travel across the ocean in the airs midregion.
ताभिर्यासि दूत्यां सूर्यस्य कामेन कर्त शरव इछमानः|	thou goest on an embassy to sūrya subdued by love desirous of the glory.
पूषा सुबन्धुर्दिव आ पर्थिव्या इळस पतिर्मघवा दस्मवर्चाः|	near kinsman of the heaven and earth is pūṣan liberal lord of food of wondrous iustre.
यं देवासो अददुः सूर्यायै कामेन कर्तं तवसं सवञ्चम|	whom strong and vigorous and swiftlymoving subdued by love the deities gave to sūrya.
सं वां कर्मणा समिषा हिनोमीन्द्राविष्णू अपसस परेस्य|	indra and viṣṇu at my tasks completion i urge you on with food and sacred service.
जुषेथां यज्ञं दरविणं च धत्तमरिष्टैर्नः पथिभिः पारयन्ता|	accept the sacrifice and grant us riches leading us on by unobstructed pathways.
या विश्वासां जनितरा मतीनामिन्द्राविष्णू कलशा सोमधाना|	ye who inspire all hymns indra and viṣṇu ye vessels who contain the soma juices.
पर वां गिरः शस्यमाना अवन्तु पर सतोमासो गीयमानासो अर्कैः|	may hymns of praise that now are sung address you the lauds that are recited by the singers.
इन्द्राविष्णू मदपती मदानामा सोमं यातं दरविणो दधाना|	lords of joygiving draughts indra and viṣṇu come giving gifts of treasure to the soma.
सं वामञ्जन्त्वक्तुभिर्मतीनां सं सतोमासः शस्यमानास उक्थैः|	with brilliant rays of hymns let chanted praises repeated with the lauds adorn and deck you.
आ वामश्वासो अभिमातिषाह इन्द्राविष्णू सधमादो वहन्तु|	may your foeconquering horses bring you hither indra and viṣṇu sharers of the banquet.
जुषेथां विश्वा हवना मतीनामुप बरह्माणि शर्णुतं गिरो मे|	of all our hymns accept the invocations list to my prayers and hear the songs i sing you.
इन्द्राविष्णू तत पनयाय्यं वां सोमस्य मद उरु चक्रमाथे|	this your deed indraviṣṇu must be lauded widely ye strode in the wild joy of soma.
अक्र्णुतमन्तरिक्षं वरीयोअप्रथतं जीवसे नो रजांसि|	ye made the firmament of larger compass and made the regions broad for our existence.
इन्द्राविष्णू हविषा वाव्र्धानाग्राद्वाना नमसा रातहव्या|	strengthened with sacred offerings indraviṣṇu first eaters served with worship ana oblation.
घर्तासुती दरविणं धत्तमस्मे समुद्रः सथः कलशः सोमधानः|	fed with the holy oil vouchsafe us riches ye are the lake the vat that holds the soma.
इन्द्राविष्णू पिबतं मध्वो अस्य सोमस्य दस्रा जठरं पर्णेथाम|	drink of this meath o indra thou and viṣṇu drink ye your fill of soma wonderworkers.
आ वामन्धांसि मदिराण्यग्मन्नुप बरह्माणि शर्णुतं हवं मे|	the sweet exhilarating juice hath reached you hear ye my prayers give ear unto my calling.
उभा जिग्यथुर्न परा जयेथे न परा जिग्ये कतरश्चनैनोः|	ye twain have conquered neer have yc been conquered never hath either of the twain been vanquished.
इन्द्रश्च विष्णो यदपस्प्र्धेथां तरेधा सहस्रं वि तदैरयेथाम|	ye indraviṣṇu when ye fought the battle produced this infinite with three divisions.
यो अद्रिभित परथमजा रतावा बर्हस्पतिराङगिरसो हविष्मान|	served with oblations firstborn mountainrender aṅgiras son bṛhaspati the holy.
दविबर्हज्मा पराघर्मसत पिता न आ रोदसी वर्षभो रोरवीति|	with twicefirm path dwelling in light our father roars loudly as a bull to earth and heaven.
जनाय चिद य ईवत उ लोकं बर्हस्पतिर्देवहूतौ चकार|	bṛhaspati who made for such a people wide room and verge when gods were invocated.
घनन वर्त्राणि वि पुरो दर्दरीति जयञ्छत्रून्रमित्रान पर्त्सु साहन|	slaying his enemies breaks down their castles quelling his foes and conquering those who hate him.
बर्हस्पतिः समजयद वसूनि महो वरजान गोमतो देव एषः|	bṛhaspati in war hath won rich treasures hath won this god the great stalls filled with cattle.
अपः सिषासन सवरप्रतीतो बर्हस्पतिर्हन्त्यमित्रमर्कैः|	striving to win waters and light resistless bṛhaspati with lightning smites the foeman.
वर्षा मद इन्द्रे शलोक उक्था सचा सोमेषु सुतपा रजीषी|	strong rapturous joy praise glory are with indra impetuous god he quaffs the juice of soma.
अर्चत्र्यो मघवा नर्भ्य उक्थैर्द्युक्षो राजा गिरामक्षितोतिः|	that maghavan whom men must laud with singing heavendweller king of songs whose help is lasting.
ततुरिर्वीरो नर्यो विचेताः शरोता हवं गर्णत उर्व्यूतिः|	he friend of man most wise victorious hero hears with farreaching aid the singer call him.
वसुः शंसो नरां कारुधाया वाजी सतुतो विदथे दाति वाजम|	excellent praise of men the bards supporter strong he gives strength extolled in holy synod.
अक्षो न चक्र्योः शूर बर्हन पर ते मह्ना रिरिचे रोदस्योः|	the lofty axle of thy wheels o hero is not surpassed by heaven and earth in greatness.
वर्क्षस्य नु ते पुरुहूत वया वयूतयो रुरुहुरिन्द्र पूर्वीः|	like branches of a tree invoked of many manifold aids spring forth from thee o indra.
शचीवतस्ते पुरुशाक शाका गवामिव सरुतयः संचरणीः|	strong lord thine energies endowed with vigour are like the paths of kine converging homeward.
वत्सानां न तन्तयस्त इन्द्र दामन्वन्तो अदामानः सुदामन|	like bonds of cord indra that bind the younglings no bonds are they o thou of boundless bounty.
अन्यदद्य कर्वरमन्यदु शवोअसच्च सन मुहुराचक्रिरिन्द्रः|	one act today another act tomorrow oft indra makes what is not yet existeni.
मित्रो नो अत्र वरुणश्च पूषार्यो वशस्य पर्येतास्ति|	here have we mitra varuṇa and pūṣan to overcome the foemans domination.
वि तवदापो न पर्वतस्य पर्ष्ठादुक्थेभिरिन्द्रानयन्त यज्ञैः|	by song and sacrifice men brought the waters from thee as from a mountains ridge o indra.
तं तवाभिः सुष्टुतिभिर्वाजयन्त आजिं न जग्मुर्गिर्वाहो अश्वाः|	urging thy might with these fair lauds they seek thee o theme of song as horses rush tobattle.
न यं जरन्ति शरदो न मासा न दयाव इन्द्रमवकर्शयन्ति|	that indra whom nor months nor autumn seasons wither with age nor fleeting days enfeeble.
वर्द्धस्य चिद वर्धतामस्य तनू सतोमेभिरुक्थैश्चशस्यमाना|	still may his body wax een now so mighty glorified by the lauds and hymns that praise him.
न वीळवे नमते न सथिराय न शर्धते दस्युजूताय सतवान|	extolled he bends not to the strong the steadfast nor to the bold incited by the dasyu.
अज्रा इन्द्रस्य गिरयश्चिद रष्वा गम्भीरे चिद भवतिगाधमस्मै|	high mountains are as level plains to indra even in the deep he finds firm ground to rest on.
गम्भीरेण न उरुणामत्रिन परेषो यन्धि सुतपावन वाजान|	impetuous speeder through all depth and distance give strengthening food thou drinker of the juices.
सथा ऊ षु ऊर्ध्व ऊती अरिषण्यन्नक्तोर्व्युष्टौ परितक्म्यायाम|	stand up erect to help us unreluctant what time the gloom of night brightens to morning.
सचस्व नायमवसे अभीक इतो वा तमिन्द्र पाहि रिषः|	hasting to help come hither and protect him keep him from harm when he is here o indra.
अमा चैनमरण्ये पाहि रिषो मदेम शतहिमाः सुवीराः|	at home abroad from injury preserve him may brave sons gladden us through a hundred winters.
न तद दिवा न पर्थिव्यानु मन्ये न यज्ञेन नोत शमीभिराभिः|	this i allow not in the earth or heaven at sacrifice or in these holy duties.
उब्जन्तु तं सुभ्वः पर्वतासो नि हीयतामतियाजस्य यष्टा|	may the huge mountains crush him down degraded be atiyajas sacrificing patron.
अति वा यो मरुतो मन्यते नो बरह्म वा यः करियमाणं निनित्सात|	or he who holds us in contempt o maruts or seeks to blame the prayer that we are making.
तपूंषि तस्मै वर्जिनानि सन्तु बरह्मद्विषमभि तं शोचतु दयौः|	may agonies of burning be his portion may the sky scorch the man who hates devotion.
किमङग तवा बरह्मणः सोम गोपां किमङग तवाहुरभिशस्तिपां नः|	why then o soma do they call thee keeper of prayer why then our guardian from reproaches.
किमङग नः पश्यसि निद्यमानान बरह्मद्विषे तपुषिं हेतिमस्य|	why then beholdest thou how men revile us cast thy hot dart at him who hates devotion.
अवन्तु मामुषसो जायमाना अवन्तु मा सिन्धवः पिन्वमानाः|	may mornings as they spring to life protect me and may the rivers as they swell preserve me.
अवन्तु मा पर्वतासो धरुवासोअवन्तु मा पितरो देवहूतौ|	my guardians be the firmlyseated mountains the fathers when i call on gods defend me.
विश्वदानीं सुमनसः सयाम पश्येम नु सूर्यमुच्चरन्तम|	through all our days may we be healthy minded and look upon the sun when he arises.
तथा करद वसुपतिर्वसूनां देवानोहानोअवसागमिष्ठः|	grant this the treasurelord of treasures coming observant oftenest of gods with succour.
इन्द्रो नेदिष्ठमवसागमिष्ठः सरस्वती सिन्धुभिः पिन्वमाना|	most near most oft comes indra with protection and she sarasvatī who swells with rivers.
पर्जन्यो न ओषधीभिर्मयोभुरग्निः सुशंसः सुहवः पितेव|	parjanya bringing health with herbs and agni well lauded swift to listen like a father.
विश्वे देवास आ गत शर्णुता म इमं हवम|	hear this mine invocation come hither o universal gods.
एदं बर्हिर्नि षीदत|	be seated on this holy grass.
यो वो देवा घर्तस्नुना हव्येन परतिभूषति|	to him who comes to meet you gods with offerings bathed in holy oil.
तं विश्व उप गछथ|	approach ye one and all to him.
उप नः सूनवो गिरः शर्ण्वन्त्वम्र्तस्य ये|	all sons of immortality shall listen to the songs we sing.
सुम्र्ळीका भवन्तु नः|	and be exceeding good to us.
विश्वे देवा रताव्र्ध रतुभिर्हवनश्रुतः|	may all the gods who strengthen law with Ṛtus listening to our call.
जुषन्तां युज्यं पयः|	be pleased with theit appropriate draught.
सतोत्रमिन्द्रो मरुद्गणस्त्वष्ट्र्मान मित्रो अर्यमा|	may indra with the marut host with tvaṣṭar mitra aryaman.
इमा हव्या जुषन्त नः|	accept the laud and these our gifts.
इमं नो अग्ने अध्वरं होतर्वयुनशो यज|	o agni priest as rules ordain offer this sacrifice of ours.
चिकित्वान दैव्यं जनम|	remembering the heavenly folk.
विश्वे देवाः शर्णुतेमं हवं मे ये अन्तरिक्षे य उप दयवि षठ|	listen allgods to this mine invocation ye who inhabit heaven and airs midregions.
ये अग्निजिह्वा उत वा यजत्रा आसद्यास्मिन बर्हिषि मादयध्वम|	all ye o holy ones whose tongue is agni seated upon this sacred grass be joyful.
विश्वे देवा मम शर्ण्वन्तु यज्ञिया उभे रोदसी अपां नपाच्च मन्म|	may the allgods who claim our worship hear my thought may the two worldhalves hear it and the waters child.
मा वो वचांसि परिचक्ष्याणि वोचं सुम्नेष्विद वो अन्तमा मदेम|	let me not utter words that ye may disregard closely allied with you may we rejoice in bliss.
ये के च जमा महिनो अहिमाया दिवो जज्ञिरे अपां सधस्थे|	and those who mighty with the wiles of serpents were born on earth in heaven where waters gather.
ते अस्मभ्यमिषये विश्वमायुः कषप उस्रा वरिवस्यन्तुदेवाः|	may they vouchsafe us life of full duration may the gods kindly give us nights and mornings.
अग्नीपर्जन्याववतं धियं मेअस्मिन हवे सुहवा सुष्टुतिंनः|	at this my call o agni and parjanya help swift to hear my thought and our laudation.
इळामन्यो जनयद गर्भमन्यः परजावतीरिष आ धत्तमस्मे|	one generates holy food the other offspring so grant us food enough with store of children.
सतीर्णे बर्हिषि समिधाने अग्नौ सूक्तेन महा नमसा विवासे|	when holy grass is strewn and fire enkindled with hymn and lowly homage i invite you.
अस्मिन नो अद्य विदथे यजत्रा विश्वे देवा हविषि मादयध्वम|	allgods to day in this our great assembly rejoice ye holy in the gifts we offer.
शनथद वर्त्रमुत सनोति वाजमिन्द्रा यो अग्नी सहुरी सपर्यात|	he slays the foe and wins the spoil who worships indra and agni strong and mighty heroes.
इरज्यन्ता वसव्यस्य भूरेः सहस्तमा सहसा वाजयन्ता|	who rule as sovrans over ample riches victorious showing forth their power in conquest.
ता योधिष्टमभि गा इन्द्र नूनमपः सवरुषसो अग्न ऊळ्हः|	so battle now o indra and thou agni for cows and waters sunlight stolen mornings.
दिशः सवरुषस इन्द्र चित्रा अपो गा अग्ने युवसे नियुत्वान|	teamborne thou makest kine thine own o agni thou indra light dawns regions wondrous waters.
आ वर्त्रहणा वर्त्रहभिः शुष्मैरिन्द्र यातं नमोभिरग्ने अर्वाक|	with vṛtraslaying might indra and agni come drawn by homage o ye vṛtraslayers.
युवं राधोभिरकवेभिरिन्द्राग्ने अस्मे भवतमुत्तमेभिः|	indra and agni show yourselves among us with your supreme and unrestricted bounties.
ता हुवे ययोरिदं पप्ने विश्वं पुरा कर्तम|	i call the twain whose deeds of old have all been famed in ancient days.
इन्द्राग्नी नमर्धतः|	o indraagni harm us not.
उग्रा विघनिना मर्ध इन्द्राग्नी हवामहे|	the strong the scatterers of the foe indra and agni we invoke.
ता नो मर्ळात ईद्र्शे|	may they be kind to one like me.
हतो वर्त्राण्यार्या हतो दासानि सत्पती|	they slay our Ārya foes these lords of heroes slay our dasyu foes.
हतो विश्वा अप दविषः|	and drive our enemies away.
इन्द्राग्नी युवामिमेअभि सतोमा अनूषत|	indra and agni these our songs of praise have sounded forth to you.
पिबतं शम्भुवा सुतम|	ye who bring blessings drink the juice.
या वां सन्ति पुरुस्प्र्हो नियुतो दाशुषे नरा|	come indraagni with those teams desired of many which ye have.
इन्द्राग्नी ताभिरा गतम|	o heroes for the worshipper.
ताभिरा गछतं नरोपेदं सवनं सुतम|	with those to this libation poured ye heroes indraagni come.
इन्द्राग्नी सोमपीतये|	come ye to drink the soma juice.
तमीळिष्व यो अर्चिषा वना विश्वा परिष्वजत|	glorify him who compasses all forests with his glowing flame.
कर्ष्णाक्र्णोति जिह्वया|	and leaves them blackened with his tongue.
य इद्ध आविवासति सुम्नमिन्द्रस्य मर्त्यः|	he who gains indras bliss with fire enkindled finds an easy way.
दयुम्नाय सुतरा अपः|	over the floods to happiness.
ता नो वाजवतीरिष आशून पिप्र्तमर्वतः|	give us fleet coursers to convey indra and agni and bestow.
इन्द्रमग्निं च वोळ्हवे|	abundant strengthening food on us.
उभा वामिन्द्राग्नी आहुवध्या उभा राधसः सह मादयध्यै|	indra and agni i will call you hither and make you joyful with the gifts i offer.
उभा दाताराविषां रयीणामुभा वाजस्य सातये हुवे वाम|	ye twain are givers both of food and riches to win me strength and vigour i invoke you.
आ नो गव्येभिरश्व्यैर्वसव्यैरुप गछतम|	come unto us with riches come with wealth in horses and in kine.
सखायौ देवौ सख्याय शम्भुवेन्द्राग्नी ता हवामहे|	indra and agni we invoke you both the gods as friends for friendship bringing bliss.
इन्द्राग्नी शर्णुतं हवं यजमानस्य सुन्वतः|	indra and agni hear his call who worships with libations poured.
वीतं हव्यान्या गतं पिबतं सोम्यं मधु|	come and enjoy the offerings drink the sweetlyflavoured soma juice.
तवं हि कषैतवद यशोअग्ने मित्रो न पत्यसे|	thou agni even as mitra hast a princely glory of thine own.
तवं विचर्षणे शरवो वसो पुष्टिं न पुष्यसि|	thou active vasu makest fame increase like full prosperity.
तवां हि षमा चर्षणयो यज्ञेभिर्गीर्भिरीळते|	for verily men pray to thee with sacrifices and with songs.
तवां वाजी यात्यव्र्को रजस्तूर्विश्वचर्षणिः|	to thee the friendly courser seen of all comes speeding through the air.
सजोषस्त्वा दिवो नरो यज्ञस्य केतुमिन्धते|	of one accord men kindle thee heavens signal of the sacrifice.
यद ध सय मानुषो जनः सुम्नायुर्जुह्वे अध्वरे|	when craving bliss this race of man invites thee to the solemn rite.
रधद यस्ते सुदानवे धिया मर्तः शशमते|	let the man thrive who travails sore in prayer far thee the bountiful.
ऊती ष बर्हतो दिवो दविषो अंहो न तरति|	he with the help of lofty dyaus comes safe through straits of enmity.
समिधा यस्त आहुतिं निशितिं मर्त्यो नशत|	the mortal who with fuel lights thy flame and offers unto thee.
वयावन्तंस पुष्यति कषयमग्ने शतायुषम|	supports a house with many a branch agni to live a hundred years.
तवेषस्ते धूम रण्वति दिवि षञ्छुक्र आततः|	thy bright smoke lifts itself aloft and farextended shines in heaven.
सूरो न हि दयुता तवं कर्पा पावक रोचसे|	for purifier like the sun thou beamest with thy radiant glow.
अधा हि विक्ष्वीड्योअसि परियो नो अतिथिः|	for in mens houses thou must be glorified as a wellloved guest.
रण्वः पुरीव जूर्यः सूनुर्न तरययाय्यः|	gay like an elder in a fort claiming protection like a son.
करत्वा हि दरोणे अज्यसेअग्ने वाजी न कर्त्व्यः|	thou agni like an able steed art urged by wisdom in the wood.
परिज्मेवस्वधा गयोअत्यो न हवार्यः शिशुः|	thou art like wind food home art thou like a young horse that runs astray.
तवं तया चिदच्युताग्ने पशुर्न यवसे|	een things imperishable thou o agni like a gazing ox.
धामा ह यत ते अजर वना वर्श्चन्ति शिक्वसः|	eatest when hosts eternal one of thee the mighty rend the woods.
वेषि हयध्वरीयतामग्ने होता दमे विशाम|	agni thou enterest as priest the home of men who sacrifice.
सम्र्धो विश्पते कर्णु जुषस्व हव्यमङगिरः|	lord of the people prosper them accept the ofrering aṅgiras.
अछा नो मित्रमहो देव देवानग्ने वोचः सुमतिं रोदस्योः|	o agni god with mitras might call hither the favour of the gods from earth and heaven.
वीहि सवस्तिं सुक्षितिं दिवो नॄन दविषो अंहांसि दुरितातरेम ता तरेम तवावसा तरेम|	bring weal from heaven that men may dwell securely may we oercome the foes malign oppressions may we oercome them through thy help oercome them.
हुवे वः सूनुं सहसो युवानमद्रोघवाचं मतिभिर्यविष्ठम|	i invocate your son of strength the youthful with hymns the youngest god whose speech is guileless.
य इन्वति दरविणानि परचेता विश्ववाराणि पुरुवारोध्रुक|	sage who sends wealth comprising every treasure bringer of many boons devoid of malice.
तवे वसूनि पुर्वणीक होतर्दोषा वस्तोरेरिरे यज्ञियासः|	at eve and morn thy pious servants bring thee their precious gifts o priest of many aspects.
कषामेव विश्वा भुवनानि यस्मिन सं सौभगानि दधिरेपावके|	on whom the purifier all things living as on firm ground their happiness have stablished.
तवं विक्षु परदिवः सीद आसु करत्वा रथीरभवो वार्याणाम|	thou from of old hast dwelt among these people by mental power the charioteer of blessings.
अत इनोषि विधते चिकित्वो वयानुषग जातवेदो वसूनि|	hence sendest thou o sapient jātavedas to him who serves thee treasures in succession.
यो नः सनुत्यो अभिदासदग्ने यो अन्तरो मित्रमहो वनुष्यात|	agni whoever secretly attacks us the neighbour thou with mitras might who harms us.
तमजरेभिर्व्र्षभिस्तव सवैस्तपा तपिष्ठ तपसा तपस्वान|	burn him with thine own steers for ever youthful burning with burning heat thou fiercest burner.
यस्ते यज्ञेन समिधा य उक्थैरर्केभिः सूनो सहसो ददाशत|	he who serves thee with sacrifice and fuel with hymn o son of strength and chanted praises.
स मर्त्येष्वम्र्त परचेता राया दयुम्नेन शरवसा वि भाति|	shines out immortal in the midst of mortals a sage with wealth with splendour and with glory.
स तत कर्धीषितस्तूयमग्ने सप्र्धो बाधस्व सहसा सहस्वान|	do this o agni when we urge thee quickly triumphant in thy might subdue our foemen.
यच्छस्यसे दयुभिरक्तो वचोभिस्तज्जुषस्व जरितुर्घोषि मन्म|	when thou art praised with words and decked with brightness accept this chanted hymn the singers worship.
अश्याम तं काममग्ने तवोती अश्याम रयिं रयिवः सुवीरम|	help us that we may gain this wish o agni gain riches wealthy one with store of heroes.
अश्याम वाजमभि वाजयन्तोअश्याम दयुम्नमजराजरं ते|	desiring strength from thee may we be strengthened and win eternal thine eternal glory.
इन्द्रा नु पूषणा वयं सख्याय सवस्तये|	indra and pūṣan will we call for friend ship and prosperity.
हुवेम वाजसातये|	and for the winning of the spoil.
सोममन्य उपासदत पातवे चम्वोः सुतम|	one by the soma sits to drink juice which the mortar hath expressed.
करम्भमन्य इछति|	the other longs for curd and meal.
अजा अन्यस्य वह्नयो हरी अन्यस्य सम्भ्र्ता|	goats are the team that draws the one the other hath bay steeds at hand.
ताभ्यां वर्त्राणि जिघ्नते|	with both of these he slays the fiends.
यदिन्द्रो अनयद रितो महीरपो वर्षन्तमः|	when indra wondrous strong brought down the streams the mighty waterfloods.
तत्र पूषाभवत सचा|	pūṣan was standing by his side.
तां पूष्णः सुमतिं वयं वर्क्षस्य पर वयामिव|	to this to pūṣans favouring love and indras may we closely cling.
इन्द्रस्य चा रभामहे|	as to a trees extended bough.
उत पूषणं युवामहेअभीशून्रिव सारथिः|	as one who drives a car draws in his reins may we draw pūṣan near.
मह्या इन्द्रं सवस्तये|	and indra for our great success.
सं च तवे जग्मुर्गिर इन्द्र पूर्वीर्वि च तवद यन्ति विभ्वोमनीषाः|	full many songs have met in thee o indra and many a noble thought from thee proceedeth.
पूरा नूनं च सतुतय रषीणां पस्प्र्ध्र इन्द्रे अध्युक्थार्का|	now and of old the eulogies of sages their holy hymns and lauds have yearned for indra.
पुरुहूतो यः पुरुगूर्त रभ्वानेकः पुरुप्रशस्तो अस्ति यज्ञैः|	he praised of many bold invoked of many alone is glorified at sacrifices.
रथो न महे शवसे युजानोअस्माभिरिन्द्रो अनुमाद्यो भूत|	like a car harnessed for some great achievement indra must be the cause of our rejoicing.
न यं हिंसन्ति धीतयो न वाणीरिन्द्रं नक्षन्तीदभि वर्धयन्तीः|	they make their way to indra and exalt him bim whom no prayers and no laudations trouble.
यदि सतोतारः शतं यत सहस्रं गर्णन्ति गिर्वणसं शं तदस्मै|	for when a hundred or a thousand singers laud him who loves the song their praise delights him.
अस्मा एतद दिव्यर्चेव मासा मिमिक्ष इन्द्रे नययामि सोमः|	as brightness mingles with the moon in heaven the offered soma yearns to mix with indra.
जनं न धन्वन्नभि सं यदापः सत्रा वाव्र्धुर्हवनानि यज्ञैः|	like water brought to men in desert places our gifts at sacrifice have still refreshed him.
अस्मा एतन मह्याङगूषमस्मा इन्द्राय सतोत्रं मतिभिरवाचि|	to him this mighty eulogy to indra hath this our laud been uttered by the poets.
असद यथा महति वर्त्रतूर्य इन्द्रो विश्वायुरविता वर्धश्च|	that in the great encounter with the foemen loved of all life indra may guard and help us.
यस्य तयच्छम्बरं मदे दिवोदासाय रन्धयः|	in whose wild joy thou madest once Śambara divodāsas prey.
अयं स सोम इन्द्र ते सुतः पिब|	this soma is pressed out for thee o indra drink.
यस्य तीव्रसुतं मदं मध्यमन्तं च रक्षसे|	whose gladdening draught shed from the points thou guardest in the midst and end.
अयं स|	this soma is pressed out for thee o indra drink.
यस्य गा अन्तरश्मनो मदे दर्ळ्हा अवास्र्जः|	in whose wild joy thou settest free the kine held fast within the rock.
अयं स|	this soma is pressed out for thee o indra drink.
यस्य मन्दानो अन्धसो माघोनं दधिषे शवः|	this in whose juice delighting thou gainest the might of maghavan.
अयं स|	this soma is pressed out for thee o indra drink.
एषा सया नो दुहिता दिवोजाः कषितीरुछन्ती मानुषीरजीगः|	shedding her light on human habitations this child of heaven hath called us from our slumber.
या भानुना रुशता राम्यास्वज्ञायि तिरस्तमसश्चिदक्तून|	she who at nighttime with her argent lustre hath shown herself een through the shades of darkness.
वि तद ययुररुणयुग्भिरश्वैश्चित्रं भान्त्युषसश्चन्द्ररथाः|	all this with redrayed steeds have they divided the dawns on bright cars shine in wondrous fashion.
अग्रं यज्ञस्य बर्हतो नयन्तीर्वि ता बाधन्तेतम ऊर्म्यायाः|	they bringing near the stately rites commencement drive far away the nights surrounding shadows.
शरवो वाजमिषमूर्जं वहन्तीर्नि दाशुष उषसो मर्त्याय|	dawns bringing hither to the man who worships glory and power and might and food and vigour.
मघोनीर्वीरवत पत्यमाना अवो धात विधते रत्नमद्य|	opulent with imperial sway like heroes favour your servant and this day enrich him.
इदा हि वो विधते रत्नमस्तीदा वीराय दाशुष उषासः|	now is there treasure for the man who serves you now for the hero dawns who brings oblation.
इदा विप्राय जरते यदुक्था नि षम मावते वहथ पुर चित|	now for the singer when he sings the praisesong even to one like me ye brought aforetime.
इदा हि त उषो अद्रिसानो गोत्रा गवामन्गिरसो गर्णन्ति|	o dawn who standest on the mountain ridges aṅgirases now praise thy stalls of cattle.
वयर्केण बिभिदुर्ब्रह्मणा च सत्या नर्णामभवद देवहूतिः|	with prayer and holy hymn they burst them open the heroes calling on the gods was fruitful.
उछा दिवो दुहितः परत्नवन नो भरद्वाजवद विधते मघोनि|	shine on us as of old thou child of heavenon him rich maid who serves like bharadvāja.
सुवीरं रयिं गर्णते रिरीह्युरुगायमधि धेहि शरवो नः|	give to the singer wealth with noble heroes and upon us bestow widespreading glory.
सुत इत तवं निमिश्ल इन्द्र सोमे सतोमे बरह्मणि शस्यमानौक्थे|	thou art attached to pressedout soma indra at laud at prayer and when the hymn is chanted.
यद वा युक्ताभ्यां मघवन हरिभ्यां बिभ्रद वज्रम्बाह्वोरिन्द्र यासि|	or when with yoked bays maghavan thou comest o indra bearing in thine arms the thunder.
यद वा दिवि पार्ये सुष्विमिन्द्र वर्त्रहत्येअवसि शूरसातौ|	or when on that decisive day thou holpest the presser of the juice at vṛtras slaughter.
यद वा दक्षस्य बिभ्युषो अबिभ्यदरन्धयः शर्धत इन्द्र दस्यून|	or when thou while the strong one feared undaunted gavest to death indra the daring dasyus.
पाता सुतमिन्द्रो अस्तु सोमं परणेनीरुग्रो जरितारमूती|	let indra drink the pressedout soma helper and mighty guide of him who sings his praises.
कर्ता वीराय सुष्वय उ लोकं दाता वसु सतुवते कीरये चित|	he gives the hero room who pours oblations and treasure even to the lowly singer.
गन्तेयान्ति सवना हरिभ्यां बभ्रिर्वज्रं पपिः सोमं ददिर्गाः|	een humble rites with his bay steeds he visits he wields the bolt drinks soma gives us cattle.
कर्ता वीरं नर्यं सर्ववीरं शरोता हवंग्र्णत सतोमवाहाः|	he makes the valiant rich in store of heroes accepts our praise and hears the singers calling.
अस्मै वयं यद वावान तद विविष्म इन्द्राय यो नः परदिवो अपस कः|	what he hath longed for we have brought to indra who from the days of old hath done us service.
सुते सोमे सतुमसि शंसदुक्थेन्द्राय बरह्म वर्धनं यथासत|	while soma flows we will sing hymn and laud him so that our prayer may streng then indras vigour.
बरह्माणि हि चक्र्षे वर्धनानि तावत त इन्द्र मतिभिर्विविष्मः|	thou hast made prayer the means of thine exalting therefore we wait on thee with hymns o indra.
सुते सोमे सुतपाः शन्तमानि रान्द्र्या करियास्म वक्षणानि यज्ञैः|	may we by the pressed soma somadrinker bring thee with sacrifice blissful sweet refreshment.
स नो बोधि पुरोळाशं रराणः पिबा तु सोमं गोर्जीकमिन्द्र|	mark well our sacrificial cake delighted indra drink soma and the milk commingled.
एदं बर्हिर्यजमानस्य सीदोरुं कर्धि तवायत उ लोकम|	here on the sacrificers grass be seated give ample room to thy devoted servant.
स मन्दस्वा हयनु जोषमुग्र पर तवा यज्ञास इमे अश्नुवन्तु|	o mighty one be joyful as thou willest let these our sacrifices reach and find thee.
परेमे हवासः पुरुहूतमस्मे आ तवेयं धीरवस इन्द्र यम्याः|	and may this hymn and these our invocations turn thee whom many men invoke to help us.
तं वः सखायः सं यथा सुतेषु सोमेभिरीं पर्णता भोजमिन्द्रम|	friends when thejuices flow replenish duly your own your bounteous indra with the soma.
कुवित तस्मा असति नो भराय न सुष्विमिन्द्रोअवसे मर्धाति|	will it not aid him to support us indra spares him who sheds the juice to win his favour.
एवेदिन्द्रः सुते अस्तावि सोमे भरद्वाजेषु कषयदिन मघोनः|	while soma flowed thus indra hath been lauded ruler of nobles mid the bharadvājas.
असद यथा जरित्र उत सूरिरिन्द्रो रायो विश्ववारस्य दाता|	that indra may become the singers patron and give him wealth in every kind of treasure.
मूर्धानं दिवो अरतिं पर्थिव्या वैश्वानरं रत आ जातमग्निम|	him messenger of earth and head of heaven agni vaiśvānara born in holy order.
कविं सम्राजमतिथिं जनानामासन्ना पात्रं जनयन्त देवाः|	the sage the king the guest of men a vessel fit for their mouths the gods have generated.
नाभिं यज्ञानां सदनं रयीणां महामाहावमभिसं नवन्त|	him have they praised midpoint of sacrifices great cistern of libations seat of riches.
वैश्वानरं रथ्यमध्वराणां यज्ञस्य केतुं जनयन्त देवाः|	vaiśvānara conveyer of oblations ensign of worship have the gods engendered.
तवद विप्रो जायते वाज्यग्ने तवद वीरासो अभिमातिषाहः|	from thee o agni springs the mighty singer from thee come heroes who subdue the foeman.
वैश्वानर तवमस्मासु धेहि वसूनि राजन सप्र्हयाय्याणि|	o king vaiśvānara bestow thou on us excellent treasures worthy to belonged fo r.
तवां विश्वे अम्र्त जायमानं शिशुं न देवा अभि सं नवन्ते|	to thee immortal when to life thou springest all the gods sing for joy as to their infant.
तव करतुभिरम्र्तत्वमायन वैश्वानर यत पित्रोरदीदेः|	they by thy mental powers were made immortal vaiśvānara when thou shonest from thy parents.
वैश्वानर तव तानि वरतानि महान्यग्ने नकिरा दधर्ष|	agni vaiśvānara no one hath ever resisted these thy mighty ordinances.
यज्जायमानः पित्रोरुपस्थेअविन्दः केतुं वयुनेष्वह्नाम|	when thou arising from thy parents bosom foundest the light for days appointed courses.
वैश्वानरस्य विमितानि चक्षसा सानूनि दिवो अम्र्तस्य केतुना|	the summits of the heaven are traversed through and through by the immortals light vaiśvānaras brilliancy.
तस्येदु विश्वा भुवनाधि मूर्धनि वया इव रुरुहुःसप्त विस्रुहः|	all creatures in existence rest upon his head the seven swiftflowing streams have grown like branches forth.
वि यो रजांस्यमिमीत सुक्रतुर्वैश्वानरो वि दिवो रोचना कविः|	vaiśvānara who measured out the realms of air sage very wise who made the lucid spheres of heaven.
परि यो विश्वा भुवनानि पप्रथेअदब्धो गोपा अम्र्तस्य रक्षिता|	the undeceivable who spread out all the worlds keeper is he and guard of immortality.
पिबा सोममभि यमुग्र तर्द ऊर्वं गव्यं महि गर्णानैन्द्र|	drink soma mighty one for which when lauded thou breakest through the cattlestall o indra.
वि यो धर्ष्णो वधिषो वज्रहस्त विश्वा वर्त्रममित्रिया शवोभिः|	thou who o bold one armed with thunder smotest vṛtra with might and every hostile being.
स ईं पाहि य रजीषी तरुत्रो यः शिप्रवान वर्षभो यो मतीनाम|	drink it thou god who art impetuous victor lord of our hymns with beauteousjaws the hero.
यो गोत्रभिद वज्रभ्र्द यो हरिष्ठाः स इन्द्र चित्रानभि तर्न्धि वाजान|	render of kinestalls carborne thunderwielding so pierce thy way to wondrous strength o indra.
एवा पाहि परत्नथा मन्दतु तवा शरुधि बरह्म वाव्र्धस्वोतगीर्भिः|	drink as of old and let the draught delight thee hear thou our prayer and let our songs exalt thee.
आविः सूर्यं कर्णुहि पीपिहीषो जहि शत्रून्रभि गा इन्द्र तर्न्धि|	make the sun visible make food abundant slaughter the foes pierce through and free the cattle.
ते तवा मदा बर्हदिन्द्र सवधाव इमे पीता उक्षयन्त दयुमन्तम|	these gladdening drops o indra selfsustainer quaffed shall augment thee in thy mighty splendour.
महामनूनं तवसं विभूतिं मत्सरासो जर्ह्र्षन्त परसाहम|	yea let the cheering drops delight thee greatly great perfect strong powerful allsubduing.
येभिः सूर्यमुषसं मन्दसानोअवासयोअप दर्ल्हानि दर्द्रत|	gladdened whereby bursting the firm enclosures thou gavest splendour to the sun and morning.
महामद्रिं परि गा इन्द्र सन्तं नुत्था अच्युतं सदसस परि सवात|	the mighty rock that compassed in the cattle neer moved thou shookest from its seat o indra.
तव करत्वा तव तद दंसनाभिरामासु पक्वं शच्या नि दीधः|	thou with thy wisdom power and works of wonder hast stored the ripe milk in the raw cows udders.
और्णोर्दुर उस्रियाभ्यो वि दर्ळ्होदूर्वाद गा अस्र्जो अङगिरस्वान|	unbarred the firm doors for the kine of morning and with the aṅgirases set free the cattle.
पप्राथ कषां महि दण्सो वयुर्वीमुप दयां रष्वो बर्हदिन्द्र सतभायः|	thou hast spread out wide earth a mighty marvel and high thyself propped lofty heaven o indra.
अधारयो रोदसी देवपुत्रे परत्ने मातरा यह्वी रतस्य|	both worlds whose sons are gods thou hast supported young mothers from old time ofholy order.
अध तवा विश्वे पुर इन्द्र देवा एकं तवसं दधिरे भराय|	yea indra all the deities installed thee their one strong champion in the van for battle.
अदेवो यदभ्यौहिष्ट देवान सवर्षाता वर्णत इन्द्रमत्र|	what time the godless was the gods assailant indra they chose to win the light of heaven.
अध दयौश्चित ते अप सा नु वज्राद दवितानमद भियसा सवस्य मन्योः|	yea een that heaven itself of old bent backward before thy bolt in terror of its anger.
अहिं यदिन्द्रो अभ्योहसानं नि चिद विश्वायुः शयथे जघान|	when indra life of every living creature smote down within his lair the assailing dragon.
अध तवष्टा ते मह उग्र वज्रं सहस्रभ्र्ष्टिं वव्र्तच्छताश्रिम|	yea strong one tvaṣṭar turned for thee the mighty the bolt with thousand spikes and hundred edges.
निकाममरमणसं येन नवन्तमहिं सं पिणग्र्जीषिन|	eager and prompt at will wherewith thou crushedst the boasting dragon o impetuous hero.
वर्धान यं विश्वे मरुतः सजोषाः पचच्छतं महिषानिन्द्र तुभ्यम|	he dressed a hundred buffaloes o indra for thee whom all accordant maruts strengthen.
पूषा विष्णुस्त्रीणि सरांसि धावन वर्त्रहणं मदिरमंशुमस्मै|	he pūṣan viṣṇu poured forth three great vessels to him the juice that cheers that slaughters vṛtra.
आ कषोदो महि वर्तं नदीनां परिष्ठितमस्र्ज ऊर्मिमपाम|	thou settest free the rushing wave of waters the floods great swell encompassed and obstructed.
तासामनु परवत इन्द्र पन्थां परार्दयो नीचीरपसः समुद्रम|	along steep slopes their course thou tumedst indra directed downward speeding to the ocean.
एवा ता विश्वा चक्र्वांसमिन्द्रं महामुग्रमजुर्यं सहोदाम|	so may our new prayer bring thee to protect us thee wellarmed hero with thy bolt of thunder.
सुवीरं तवा सवायुधं सुवज्रमा बरह्म नव्यमवसे वव्र्त्यात|	indra who made these worlds the strong the ty who never groweth old the victorygiver.
स नो वाजाय शरवस इषे च राये धेहि दयुमत इन्द्र विप्रान|	so indra form us brilliant holy singers for strength for glory and for food and riches.
भरद्वाजे नर्वत इन्द्र सूरीन दिवि च समैधि पार्ये न इन्द्र|	give bharadvāja hero patrons indra indra be ours upon the day of trial.
अया वाजं देवहितं सनेम मदेम शतहिमाः सुवीराः|	with this may we obtain strength godappointed and brave sons gladden us through a hundred winters.
कव तया वल्गू पुरुहूताद्य दूतो न सतोमोअविदन नमस्वान|	where hath the hymn with reverence like an envoy found both fair gods today invoked of many.
आ यो अर्वां नासत्या ववर्त परेष्ठा हयसथो अस्य मन्मन|	hymn that hath brought the two nāsatyas hither to this mans thought be ye both gods most friendly.
अरं मे गन्तं हवनायास्मै गर्णाना यथा पिबाथो अन्धः|	come readily to this mine invocation lauded with songs that ye may drink the juices.
परि ह तयद वर्तिर्याथो रिषो न यत परो नान्तरस्तुतुर्यात|	compass this house to keep it from the foeman that none may force it either near or distant.
अकारि वामन्धसो वरीमन्नस्तारि बर्हिः सुप्रायणतमम|	juice in wide room hath been prepared to feast you for you the grass is strewn most soft to tread on.
उत्तानहस्तो युवयुर्ववन्दा वां नक्षन्तो अद्रय आञ्जन|	with lifted hands your servant hath adored you yearningfor you the pressstones shed the liquid.
ऊर्ध्वो वामग्निरध्वरेष्वस्थात पर रातिरेति जूर्णिनीघ्र्ताची|	agni uplifts him at your sacrifices forth goes the oblation dropping oil and glowing.
पर होता गूर्तमना उराणोअयुक्त यो नासत्या हवीमन|	up stands the gratefulminded priest elected appointed to invoke the two nāsatyas.
अधि शरिये दुहिता सूर्यस्य रथं तस्थौ पुरुभुजा शतोतिम|	lords of great wealth for glory sūryas daughter mounted your car that brings a hundred succours.
पर मायाभिर्मायिना भूतमत्र नरा नर्तू जनिमन यज्ञियानाम|	famed for your magic arts were ye magicians amid the race of gods ye dancing heroes.
युवं शरीभिर्दर्शताभिराभिः शुभे पुष्टिमूहथुःसूर्यायाः|	ye twain with these your glories fair to look on brought to win victory rich gifts for sūrya.
पर वां वयो वपुषेअनु पप्तन नक्षद वाणी सुष्टुता धिष्ण्या वाम|	after you flew your birds marvels of beauty dear to our hearts the song well lauded reached you.
आ वां वयोअश्वासो वहिष्ठा अभि परयो नासत्या वहन्तु|	may your winged coursers best to draw nāsatyas convey you to the object of your wishes.
पर वां रथो मनोजवा असर्जीषः पर्क्ष इषिधो अनु पूर्वीः|	swift as the thought your car hath been sent onward to food of many a sort and dainty viands.
पुरु हि वां पुरुभुजा देष्णं धेनुं न इषं पिन्वतमसक्राम|	lords of great wealth manifold is your bounty ye filled our cow with food that never faileth.
सतुतश्च वां माध्वी सुष्टुतिश्च रसाश्च ये वामनु रातिमग्मन|	lovers of sweetness yours are praise and singers and poured libations which have sought your favour.
उत म रज्रे पुरयस्य रघ्वी सुमीळ्हे शतं पेरुके च पक्वा|	mine were two mares of puraya brown swiftfooted a hundred with sumidha food with peruk.
शाण्डो दाद धिरणिनः समद्दिष्टीन दश वशासो अभिषाच रष्वान|	sanda gave ten golddecked and welltrained horses tame and obedient and of lofty stature.
सं वां शता नासत्या सहस्राश्वानां पुरुपन्था गिरे दात|	nāsatyas purupanthas offered hundreds thousands of steeds to him who sang your praises.
भरद्वाजाय वीर नू गिरे दाद धता रक्षांसि पुरुदंससा सयुः|	gave heroes to the singer bharadvāja yewonderworkers let the fiends be slaughtered.
आ वां सुम्ने वरिमन सूरिभिः षयाम|	may i with princes share your bliss in freedom.
शरुष्टी वां यज्ञ उद्यतः सजोषा मनुष्वद वर्क्तबर्हिषो यजध्यै|	his honouring rite whose grass is trimmed is offered swiftly to you in manus wise accordant.
आ य इन्द्रावरुणाविषे अद्य महे सुम्नाय मह आववर्तत|	the rite which indravaruṇa shall carry this day to high success and glorious issue.
ता हि शरेष्ठा देवताता तुजा शूराणां शविष्ठाता हि भूतम|	for at gods worship they are best through vigour they have become the strongest of the heroes.
मघोनां मंहिष्ठा तुविशुष्म रतेन वर्त्रतुरा सर्वसेना|	with mighty strength most liberal of the princes chiefs of the host by law made vṛtras slayers.
ता गर्णीहि नमस्येभिः शूषैः सुम्नेभिरिन्द्रावरुणा चकाना|	praise those twain gods for powers that merit worship indra and varuṇa for bliss the joyous.
वज्रेणान्यः शवसा हन्ति वर्त्रं सिषक्त्यन्यो वर्जनेषु विप्रः|	one with his might and thunderbolt slays vṛtra the other as a sage stands near in troubles.
गनाश्च यन नरश्च वाव्र्धन्त विश्वे देवासो नरां सवगूर्ताः|	though dames and men have waxen strong and mighty and all the gods selfpraised among the heroes.
परैभ्य इन्द्रावरुणा महित्वा दयौश्च पर्थिवि भूतमुर्वी|	ye indravaruṇa have in might surpassed them and thus were ye spread wide o earth and heaven.
स इत सुदानुः सववान रतावेन्द्रा यो वां वरुण दाशतित्मन|	righteous is he and liberal and helpful who indravaruṇa brings you gifts with gladness.
इषा स दविषस्तरेद दास्वान वंसद रयिं रयिवतश्च जनान|	that bounteous man through food shall conquer faemen and win him opulence and wealthy people.
यं युवं दाश्वध्वराय देवा रयिं धत्थो वसुमन्तं पुरुक्षुम|	may wealth which ye bestow in food and treasure on him who brings you gifts and sacrifices.
अस्मे स इन्द्रावरुणावपि षयात पर यो भनक्ति वनुषामशस्तीः|	wealth gods which breaks the curse of those who vex us be indravaruṇa een our own possession.
उत नः सुत्रात्रो देवगोपाः सूरिभ्य इन्द्रावरुणा रयिः षयात|	so also indravaruṇa may our princes have riches swift to save with gods to guard them.
येषां शुष्मः पर्तनासु साह्वान पर सद्यो दयुम्नातिरते ततुरिः|	they whose great might gives victory in battles and their triumphant glory spreads with swiftness.
नू न इन्द्रावरुणा गर्णाना पर्ङकतं रयिं सौश्रवसाय देवा|	indra and varuṇa gods whom we are lauding mingle ye wealth with our heroic glory.
इत्था गर्णन्तो महिनस्य शर्धोअपो न नावा दुरितातरेम|	may we who praise the strength of what is mighty pass dangers as with boats we cross the waters.
पर सम्राजे बर्हते मन्म नु परियमर्च देवाय वरुणाय सप्रथः|	now will i sing a dear and farextending hymn to varuṇa the god sublime imperial lord.
अयं य उर्वी महिना महिव्रतः करत्वा विभात्यजरो न शोचिषा|	who mighty governor eternal as with flame illumines both wide worlds with majesty and power.
इन्द्रावरुणा सुतपाविमं सुतं सोमं पिबतं मद्यं धर्तव्रता|	true to law indravaruṇa drinkers of the juice drink this pressed soma which shall give you rapturous joy.
युवो रथो अध्वरं देववीतये परति सवसरमुप याति पीतये|	your chariot cometh to the banquet of the gods to sacrifice as it were home that ye may drink.
इन्द्रावरुणा मधुमत्तमस्य वर्ष्णः सोमस्य वर्षणा वर्षेथाम|	indra and varuṇa drink your fill ye heroes of this invigorating sweetest soma.
इदं वामन्धः परिषिक्तमस्मे आसद्यास्मिन बर्हिषि मादयेथाम|	this juice is shed by us that ye may quaff it on this trimmed grass be seated and rejoice you.
अर्वाग रथं विश्ववारं त उग्रेन्द्र युक्तासो हरयो वहन्तु|	let thy bay horses yoked o mighty indra bring thy car hither fraught with every blessing.
कीरिश्चिद धि तवा हवते सवर्वान रधीमहि सधमादस्तेद्य|	for thee the heavenly een the poor invoketh may we this day thy feastcompanions prosper.
परो दरोणे हरयः कर्माग्मन पुनानास रज्यन्तो अभूवन|	forth to the vat the brown drops flow for service and purified proceed directly forward.
इन्द्रो नो अस्य पूर्व्यः पपीयाद दयुक्षो मदस्य सोम्यस्य राजा|	may indra drink of this our guest aforetime celestial king of the strong draught of soma.
आसस्राणासः शवसानमछेन्द्रं सुचक्रे रथ्यासो अश्वाः|	bringing us hitherward allpotent indra on wellwheeled chariot may the steeds who bear him.
अभि शरव रज्यन्तो वहेयुर्नू चिन नु वायोरम्र्तं विदस्येत|	convey him on the road direct to glory and neer may vāyus amṛta cease and fail him.
वरिष्ठो अस्य दक्षिणामियर्तीन्द्रो मघोनां तुविकूर्मितमः|	supreme he stirs this man to give the guerdonindra most efficacious of the princes.
यया वज्रिवः परियास्यंहो मघा च धर्ष्णो दयसे वि सूरीन|	wherewith o thunderer thou removest sorrow and bold one partest wealth among the nobles.
इन्द्रो वाजस्य सथविरस्य दातेन्द्रो गीर्भिर्वर्धतां वर्द्धमहाः|	indra is hewho gives enduring vigour may our songs magnify the god most mighty.
इन्द्रो वर्त्रं हनिष्ठो अस्तु सत्वा ता सूरिः पर्णति तूतुजानः|	best vṛtraslayer be the hero indra these things he gives as prince with strong endeavour.
आ गावो अग्मन्नुत भद्रमक्रन सीदन्तु गोष्ठे रणयन्त्वस्मे|	the kine have come and brought good fortune let them rest in the cowpen and be happy near us.
परजावतीः पुरुरूपा इह सयुरिन्द्राय पूर्वीरुषसो दुहानाः|	here let them stay prolific manycoloured and yield through many morns their milk for indra.
इन्द्रो यज्वने पर्णते च शिक्षत्युपेद ददाति न सवं मुषायति|	indra aids him who offers sacrifice and gifts he takes not what is his and gives him more thereto.
भूयोभूयो रयिमिदस्य वर्धयन्नभिन्ने खिल्ये निदधाति देवयुम|	increasing ever more and ever more his wealth he makes the pious dwell within unbroken bounds.
न ता नशन्ति न दभाति तस्करो नासामामित्रो वयथिरादधर्षति|	these are neer lost no robber ever injures them no evilminded foe attempts to harass them.
देवांश्च याभिर्यजते ददाति च जयोगित ताभिः सचते गोपतिः सह|	the master of the kine lives many a year with these the cows whereby he pours his gifts and serves the gods.
न ता अर्वा रेणुककाटो अश्नुते न संस्क्र्तत्रमुप यन्ति ता अभि|	the charger with his dusty brow oertakes them not and never to the shambles do they take their way.
उरुगायमभयं तस्य ता अनु गावो मर्तस्य विचरन्ति यज्वनः|	these cows the cattle of the pious worshipper roam over widespread pasture where no danger is.
गावो भगो गाव इन्द्रो मे अछान गावः सोमस्य परथमस्य भक्षः|	to me the cows seem bhaga they seem indra they seem a portion of the firstpoured soma.
इमा या गावः स जनास इन्द्र इछामीद धर्दामनसा चिदिन्द्रम|	these present cows they o ye indra i long for indra with my heart and spirit.
यूयं गावो मेदयथा कर्शं चिदश्रीरं चित कर्णुथा सुप्रतीकम|	o cows ye fatten een the worn and wasted and make the unlovely beautiful tolook on.
भद्रं गर्हं कर्णुथ भद्रवाचो बर्हद वो वय उच्यते सभासु|	prosper my house ye with auspicious voices your power is glorified in our assemblies.
परजावतीः सूयवसं रिशन्तीः शुद्धा अपः सुप्रपाणेपिबन्तीः|	crop goodly pasturage and be prolific drink pure sweet water at good drinking places.
मा व सतेन ईशत माघशंसः परि वो हेती रुद्रस्य वर्ज्याः|	never be thief or sinful man your matter and may the dart of rudra still avoid you.
उपेदमुपपर्चनमासु गोषूप पर्च्यताम|	now let this close admixture be close intermigled with these cows.
उप रषभस्य रेतस्युपेन्द्र तव वीर्ये|	mixt with the steers prolific flow and indra with thy hero might.
अहेळमान उप याहि यज्ञं तुभ्यं पवन्त इन्दवः सुतासः|	come gracious to our sacrifice o indra pressed somadrops are purified to please thee.
गावो न वज्रिन सवमोको अछेन्द्रा गहि परथमो यज्ञियानाम|	as cattle seek their home so thunderwielder come indra first of those who claim our worship.
या ते काकुत सुक्र्ता या वरिष्ठा यया शश्वत पिबसि मध्व ऊर्मिम|	with that wellformed most wideextending palate wherewith thou ever drinkest streams of sweetness.
तया पाहि पर ते अध्वर्युरस्थात सं ते वज्रोवर्ततामिन्द्र गव्युः|	drink thou the adhvaryu standeth up before thee let thy spoilwinning thunderbolt attend thee.
एष दरप्सो वर्षभो विश्वरूप इन्द्राय वर्ष्णे समकारि सोमः|	this drop steerstrong and omniform the soma hath been made ready for the bull for india.
एतं पिब हरिव सथातरुग्र यस्येशिषे परदिवि यस्तेन्नम|	drink this lord of the bays thou strong supporter this that is thine of old thy food for ever.
सुतः सोमो असुतादिन्द्र वस्यानयं शरेयाञ्चिकितुषे रणाय|	soma when pressed excels the unpressed soma better for one who knows to give him pleasure.
एतं तितिर्व उप याहि यज्ञं तेन विश्वास्तविषीरा पर्णस्व|	come to this sacrifice of ours o victor replenish all thy powers with this libation.
हवयामसि तवेन्द्र याह्यर्वां अरं ते सोमस्तन्वे भवाति|	we call on thee o indra come thou hither sufficient be the soma for thy body.
शतक्रतो मादयस्वा सुतेषु परास्मानव पर्तनासु पर विक्षु|	rejoice thee Śatakratu in the juices guard us in wars guard us among our people.
हुवे वो देवीमदितिं नमोभिर्म्र्ळीकाय वरुणं मित्रमग्निम|	i call with prayers on aditi your goddess on agni mitra varuṇa for favour.
अभिक्षदामर्यमणं सुशेवं तरातॄन देवान सवितारं भगं च|	on aryaman who gives unasked the gracious on gods who save on savitar and bhaga.
सुज्योतिषः सूर्य दक्षपितॄननागास्त्वे सुमहो वीहि देवान|	visit to prove us free from sin o sūrya lord of great might the bright gods sprung from dakṣa.
दविजन्मानो य रतसापः सत्याः सवर्वन्तो यजता अग्निजिह्वाः|	twiceborn and true observing sacred duties holy and full of light whose tongue is agni.
उत दयावाप्र्थिवी कषत्रमुरु बर्हद रोदसी शरणं सुषुम्ने|	and o ye heaven and earth a wide dominion o ye most blissful worlds our lofty shelter.
महस करथो वरिवो यथा नोअस्मे कषयाय धिषणे अनेहः|	give ample room and freedom for our dwelling a home ye hemispheres which none may rival.
आ नो रुद्रस्य सूनवो नमन्तामद्या हूतासो वसवोअध्र्ष्टाः|	this day invited may the sons of rudra resistless excellent stoop down to meet us.
यदीमर्भे महति वा हितासो बाधे मरुतो अह्वाम देवान|	for when beset with slight or sore affliction we ever call upon the gods the maruts.
मिम्यक्ष येषु रोदसी नु देवी सिषक्ति पूषा अभ्यर्धयज्वा|	to whom the goddess rodasī clings closely whom pūṣan follows bringing ample bounty.
शरुत्वा हवं मरुतो यद ध याथ भूमा रेजन्ते अध्वनि परविक्ते|	what time ye hear our call and come o maruts upon your separate path all creatures tremble.
अभि तयं वीरं गिर्वणसमर्चेन्द्रं बरह्मणा जरितर्नवेन|	with a new hymn extol o thou who singest the lover of the song the hero indra.
शरवदिद धवमुप च सतवानो रासद वाजानुप महो गर्णानः|	may he exalted hear our invocation and grant us mighty wealth and strength when lauded.
ओमानमापो मानुषीरम्र्क्तं धात तोकाय तनयाय शंयोः|	give full protection friends of man ye waters in peace and trouble to our sons and grandsons.
यूयं हि षठा भिषजो मात्र्तमा विश्वस्य सथातुर्जगतो जनित्रीः|	for ye are our most motherly physicians parents of all that standeth all that moveth.
आ नो देवः सविता तरायमाणो हिरण्यपाणिर्यजतो जगम्यात|	may savitar come hither and approach us the god who rescues holy goldenhanded.
यो दत्रवानुषसो न परतीकं वयूर्णुते दाशुषे वार्याणि|	the god who bounteous as the face of morning discloses precious gifts for him who worships.
उत तवं सूनो सहसो नो अद्या देवानस्मिन्नध्वरे वव्र्त्याः|	and thou o son of strength do thou turn hither the gods today to this our holy service.
सयामहं ते सदमिद रातौ तव सयामग्नेअवसा सुवीरः|	may i for evermore enjoy thy bounty and agni by thy grace be rich in heroes.
उत तया मे हवमा जग्म्यातं नासत्या धीभिर्युवमङग विप्रा|	come also to my call o ye nāsatyas yea verily through my prayers ye holy sages.
अत्रिं न महस्तमसोअमुमुक्तं तूर्वतं नरा दुरितादभीके|	as from great darkness ye delivered atri protect us chiefs from danger in the conflict.
ते नो रायो दयुमतो वाजवतो दातारो भूत नर्वतः पुरुक्षोः|	o gods bestow upon us riches splendid with strength and heroes bringing food in plenty.
दशस्यन्तो दिव्याः पार्थिवासो गोजाता अप्या मर्लता चदेवाः|	be gracious helpful gods of earth of heaven born of the cow and dwellers in the waters.
ते नो रुद्रः सरस्वती सजोषा मीळ्हुष्मन्तो विष्णुर्म्र्ळन्तु वायुः|	may rudra and sarasvatī accordant viṣṇu and vāyu pour down gifts and bless us.
रभुक्षा वाजो दैव्यो विधाता पर्जन्यावाता पिप्यतामिषं नः|	Ṛbhukṣan vāja and divine vidhatar parjanya vāta make our food abundant.
उत सय देवः सविता भगो नोअपां नपादवतु दानु पप्रिः|	may this god savitar the lord the offspring of waters pouring down his dew be gracious.
तवष्टा देवेभिर्जनिभिः सजोषा दयौर्देवेभिः पर्थिवी समुद्रैः|	and with the gods and dames accordant tvaṣṭar dyaus with the gods and prthivi with oceans.
उत नोअहिर्बुध्न्यः शर्णोत्वज एकपात पर्थिवी समुद्रः|	may ajaekapād and ahibudhnya and earth and ocean hear our invocation.
विश्वे देवा रताव्र्धो हुवाना सतुता मन्त्राः कविशस्ता अवन्तु|	all gods who strengthen law invoked and lauded and holy texts uttered by sages help us.
एवा नपातो मम तस्य धीभिर्भरद्वाजा अभ्यर्चन्त्यर्कैः|	so with my thoughts and hymns of praise the children of bharadvāja sing aloud to please you.
गना हुतासो वसवोअध्र्ष्टा विश्वे सतुतासो भूता यजत्राः|	the dames invoked and the resistless vasus and all ye holy ones have been exalted.
तमु षटुहि यो अभिभूत्योजा वन्वन्नवातः पुरुहूत इन्द्रः|	glorify him whose might is allsurpassing indra the muchinvoked who fights uninjured.
अषाळ्हमुग्रं सहमानमाभिर्गीर्भिर्वर्ध वर्षभं चर्षणीनाम|	magnify with these songs the nevervanquished the strong the bull of men the mighty victor.
स युध्मः सत्वा खजक्र्त समद्वा तुविम्रक्षो नदनुमान रजीषी|	he champion hero warrior lord of battles impetuous loudly roaring great destroyer.
बर्हद्रेणुश्च्यवनो मानुषीणामेकः कर्ष्टीनामभवत सहावा|	who whirls the dust on high alone oerthrower hath made all races of mankind his subjects.
तवं ह नु तयददमायो दस्यून्रेकः कर्ष्टीरवनोरार्याय|	thou thou alone hast tamed the dasyus singly thou hast subdued the people for the Ārya.
अस्ति सविन नु वीर्यं तत त इन्द्र न सविदस्ति तद रतुथा वि वोचः|	in this or is it not thine hero exploit indra declare it at the proper season.
सदिद धि ते तुविजातस्य मन्ये सहः सहिष्ठ तुरतस्तुरस्य|	for true i deem thy strength is thine the mighty thine o most potent thine the conquering victor.
उग्रमुग्रस्य तवसस्तवीयोअरध्रस्य रध्रतुरो बभूव|	strong of the strong most mighty of the mighty thine driver of the churl to acts of bounty.
तन नः परत्नं सख्यमस्तु युष्मे इत्था वदद्भिर्वलमङगिरोभिः|	be this our ancient bond of friendship with you and with aṅgirases here who speak of vala.
हन्नच्युतच्युद दस्मेषयन्तं रणोः पुरो वि दुरोस्य विश्वाः|	thou wondrous shaker of things firm didst smite him in his fresh strength and force his doors and castles.
स हि धीभिर्हव्यो अस्त्युग्र ईशानक्र्न महति वर्त्रतूर्ये|	with holy thoughts must he be called the mighty showing his power in the great fight with vṛtra.
स तोकसाता तनये स वज्री वितन्तसाय्यो अभवत समत्सु|	he must be called to give us seed and offspring the thunderer must he moved and sped to battle.
स मज्मना जनिम मानुषाणाममर्त्येन नाम्नाति पर सर्स्रे|	he in his might with name that lives for ever hath far surpassed all human generations.
स दयुम्नेन स शवसोत राया स वीर्येण नर्तमः समोकाः|	he most heroic hath his home with splendour with glory and with riches and with valour.
स यो न मुहे न मिथू जनो भूत सुमन्तुनामा चुमुरिं धुनिं च|	stranger to guile who neer was false or faithless bearing a name that may be well remembered.
वर्णक पिप्रुं शम्बरं शुष्णमिन्द्रः पुरांच्यौत्नाय शयथाय नू चित|	indra crushed cumuri dhuni Śambara pipru and Śuṣṇa that their castles fell in ruin.
उदावता तवक्षसा पन्यसा च वर्त्रहत्याय रथमिन्द्र तिष्ठ|	with saving might that must be praised and lauded indra ascend thy car to smite down vṛtra.
धिष्व वज्रं हस्त आ दक्षिणत्राभि पर मन्द पुरुदत्र मायाः|	in thy right hand hold fast thy bolt of thunder and weaken bounteous lord his art and magic.
अग्निर्न शुष्कं वनमिन्द्र हेती रक्षो नि धक्ष्यशनिर्न भीमा|	as agni as the dart burns the dry forest like the dread shaft burn down the fiends o indra.
गम्भीरय रष्वया यो रुरोजाध्वानयद दुरिता दम्भयच्च|	thou who with high deepreaching spear hast broken hast covered over mischief and destroyed it.
आ सहस्रं पथिभिरिन्द्र राया तुविद्युम्न तुविवाजेभिरर्वाक|	with wealth by thousand paths come hither agni paths that bring ample strength o thou most splendid.
याहि सूनो सहसो यस्य नू चिददेव ईशे पुरुहूत योतोः|	come son of strength oer whom invoked of many the godless hath no power to keep thee distant.
पर तुविद्युम्नस्य सथविरस्य घर्ष्वेर्दिवो ररप्शे महिमा पर्थिव्याः|	from heaven from earth is bruited forth the greatness of him the firm the fiery the resplendent.
नास्य शत्रुर्न परतिमानमस्ति न परतिष्ठिःपुरुमायस्य सह्योः|	no foe hath he no counterpart no refuge is there from him the conqueror full of wisdom.
पर तत ते अद्या करणं कर्तं भूत कुत्सं यदायुमतिथिग्वमस्मै|	this day the deed that thou hast done is famous when thou for him with many thousand others.
पुरू सहस्रा नि शिशा अभि कषामुत तूर्वयाणं धर्षता निनेथ|	laidest low kutsa Āyu atithigva and boldly didst deliver tūrvayāṇa.
