अनु तवाहिघ्ने अध देव देवा मदन विश्वे कवितमं कवीनाम|	in thee o god the wisest of the sages all gods were joyful when thou slewest ahi.
करो यत्र वरिवो बाधिताय दिवे जनाय तन्वे गर्णानः|	when lauded for thyself thou gavest freedom to soreafflicted heaven and to the people.
अनु दयावाप्र्थिवी तत त ओजोअमर्त्या जिहत इन्द्र देवाः|	this power of thine both heaven and earth acknowledge the deathless gods acknowledge it o indra.
कर्ष्वा कर्त्नो अक्र्तं यत ते अस्त्युक्थं नवीयो जनयस्व यज्ञैः|	do what thou neer hast done o mighty worker beget a new hymn at thy sacrifices.
तवद विश्वा सुभग सौभगान्यग्ने वि यन्ति वनिनो न वयाः|	from thee as branches from a tree o agni from thee auspicious god spring all our blessings.
शरुष्टी रयिर्वाजो वर्त्रतूर्ये दिवो वर्ष्टिरीड्यो रीतिरपाम|	wealth swiftly strength in battle with our foemen the rain besought of heaven the flow of waters.
तवं भगो न आ हि रत्नमिषे परिज्मेव कषयसि दस्मवर्चाः|	thou art our bhaga to send wealth thou dwellest like circumambient air with wondrous splendour.
अग्ने मित्रो न बर्हत रतस्यासि कषत्ता वामस्य देव भूरेः|	friend art thou of the lofty law like mitra controller agni god of many a blessing.
स सत्पतिः शवसा हन्ति वर्त्रमग्ने विप्रो वि पणेर्भर्तिवाजम|	agni the hero slays with might his foeman the singer bears away the paṇis booty.
यं तवं परचेत रतजात राया सजोषा नप्त्रापां हिनोषि|	even he whom thou sage born in law incitest by wealth accordant with the child of waters.
यस्ते सूनो सहसो गीर्भिरुक्थैर्यज्ञैर्मर्तो निशितिं वेद्यानट|	the man who son of strength  with sacrifices hymns lauds attracts thy fervour to the altar.
विश्वं स देव परति वारमग्ने धत्ते धान्यं पत्यते वसव्यैः|	enjoys each precious thing o god o agni gains wealth of corn and is the lord of treasures.
ता नर्भ्य आ सौश्रवसा सुवीराग्ने सूनो सहसः पुष्यसेधाः|	grant son of strength to men for their subsistence such things as bring high fame and hero children.
कर्णोषि यच्छवसा भूरि पश्वो वयो वर्कायारयेजसुरये|	for thou with might givest much food in cattle even to the wicked wolf when he is hungry.
वद्मा सूनो सहसो नो विहाया अग्ने तोकं तनयं वाजि नो दाः|	eloquent son of strength most mighty agni vouchsafe us seed and offspring full of vigour.
विश्वाभिर्गीर्भिरभि पूर्तिमश्यां मदेम शतहिमाः सुवीराः|	may i by all my songs obtain abundance may brave sons gladden us through a hundred winters.
सोमारुद्रा धारयेथामसुर्यं पर वामिष्टयोअरमश्नुवन्तु|	hold fast your godlike sway o somarudra let these our sacrifices quickly reach you.
दमेदमे सप्त रत्ना दधाना शं नो भूतं दविपदेशं चतुष्पदे|	placing in every house your seven great treasures bring blessing to our quadrupeds and bipeds.
सोमारुद्रा वि वर्हतं विषूचीममीवा या नो गयमाविवेश|	soma and rudra chase to every quarter the sickness that hath visited our dwelling.
आरे बाधेथां निरतिं पराचैरस्मे भद्रा सौश्रवसानि सन्तु|	drive nirrti away into the distance and give us excellent and happy glories.
सोमारुद्रा युवमेतान्यस्मे विश्वा तनूषु भेषजानि धत्तम|	provide o somarudra for our bodies all needful medicines to heal and cure us.
अव सयतं मुञ्चतं यन नो अस्ति तनूषु बद्धं कर्तमेनो अस्मत|	set free and draw away the sin committed which we have still inherent in our persons.
तिग्मायुधौ तिग्महेती सुशेवौ सोमारुद्राविह सु मर्ळतं नः|	armed with keen shafts and weapons kind and loving be gracious unto us soma and rudra.
पर नो मुञ्चतं वरुणस्य पाशाद गोपायतं नः सुमनस्यमाना|	release us from the noose of varuṇa keep us from sorrow in your tender lovingkindness.
सत्रा मदासस्तव विश्वजन्याः सत्रा रायोअध ये पार्थिवासः|	thy raptures ever were for all mens profit so evermore have been thine earthly riches.
सत्रा वाजानामभवो विभक्ता यद देवेषु धारयथा असुर्यम|	thou still hast been the dealerforth of vigour since among gods thou hast had power and godhead.
अनु पर येजे जन ओजो अस्य सत्रा दधिरे अनु वीर्याय|	men have obtained his strength by sacrificing and ever urged him on to hero valour.
सयूमग्र्भे दुधयेअर्वते च करतुं वर्ञ्जन्त्यपि वर्त्रहत्ये|	for the reinseizing the impetuous charger they furnished power even for vṛtras slaughter.
तं सध्रीचीरूतयो वर्ष्ण्यानि पौंस्यानि नियुतः सश्चुरिन्द्रम|	associate with him as teams of horses help manly might and vigour follow indra.
समुद्रं न सिन्धव उक्थशुष्मा उरुव्यचसं गिरा विशन्ति|	as rivers reach the sea so strong with praises our holy songs reach him the comprehensive.
स रायस खामुप सर्जा गर्णानः पुरुश्चन्द्रस्य तवमिन्द्रवस्वः|	lauded by us let flow the spring o indra of excellent and brightlyshining riches.
पतिर्बभूथासमो जनानामेको विश्वस्य भुवनस्य राजा|	for thou art lord of men without an equal of all the world thou art the only sovran.
स तु शरुधि शरुत्या यो दुवोयुर्द्यौर्न भूमाभि रायोर्यः|	hear what thou mayst hear thou who fain for worship as heaven girds earth guardest thy servants treasure.
असो यथा नः शवसा चकानो युगेयुगे वयसा चेकितानः|	tlat thou mayst be our own joying in power famed through thy might in every generation.
य एनमादिदेशति करम्भादिति पूषणम|	whoso remembers pūṣan as cater of mingled curd and meal.
न तेन देव आदिशे|	need think no more upon the god.
उत घा स रथीतमः सख्या सत्पतिर्युजा|	and he is best of charioteers indra the heros lord allied.
इन्द्रो वर्त्राणि जिघ्नते|	with him as friend destroys the foes.
उतादः परुषे गवि सूरश्चक्रं हिरण्ययम|	and there the best of charioteers hath guided through the speckled cloud.
नयैरयद्रथीतमः|	the golden wheel of sūras car.
यदद्य तवा पुरुष्टुत बरवाम दस्र मन्तुमः|	whateer we speak this day to thee wise wondrous god whom many praise.
तत सु नो मन्म साधय|	give thou fulfilment of our thought.
इमं च नो गवेषणं सातये सीषधो गणम|	lead on this company of ours that longs for kine to win the spoil.
आरात पूषन्नसि शरुतः|	thou pūṣan art renowned afar.
आ ते सवस्तिमीमह आरेघामुपावसुम|	prosperity we crave from thee afar from sin and near to wealth.
अद्या च सर्वतातये शवश्च सर्वतातये|	tending to perfect happiness both for to morrow and today.
मन्द्रस्य कवेर्दिव्यस्य वह्नेर्विप्रमन्मनो वचनस्य मध्वः|	of this our charming our celestial soma eloquent wise priest with inspired devotion.
अपा नस्तस्य सचनस्य देवेषो युवस्व गर्णते गोग्राः|	of this thy close attendant hast thou drunken god send the singer food with milk to grace it.
अयमुशानः पर्यद्रिमुस्र रतधीतिभिर्र्तयुग युजानः|	craving the kine rushing against the mountain led on by law with holyminded comrades.
रुजदरुग्णं वि वलस्य सानुं पणीन्र्वचोभिरभि योधदिन्द्रः|	he broke the neverbroken ridge of vala with words of might indra subdued the paṇis.
अयं दयोतयदद्युतो वयक्तून दोषा वस्तोः शरद इन्दुरिन्द्र|	this indu lighted darksome nights o indra throughout the years at morning and at evening.
इमं केतुमदधुर्नू चिदह्नां शुचिजन्मन उषसश्चकार|	him have they stablished as the days bright ensign he made the mornings to be born in splendour.
अयं रोचयदरुचो रुचानोअयं वासयद वय रतेन पूर्वीः|	he shone and caused to shme the worlds that shone not by law he lighted up the host of mornings.
अयमीयत रतयुग्भिरश्वैः सवर्विदा नाभिना चर्षणिप्राः|	he moves with steeds yoked by eternal order contenting men with nave that finds the sunlight.
नू गर्णानो गर्णते परत्न राजन्निषः पिन्व वसुदेयाय पूर्वीः|	now praised o ancient king fill thou the singer with plenteous food that he may deal forth treasures.
अप ओषधीरविषा वनानि गा अर्वतो नॄन रचसे रिरीहि|	give waters herbs that have no poison forests and kine and steeds and men to him who lauds thee.
अपादित उदु नश्चित्रतमो महीं भर्षद दयुमतीमिन्द्रहूतिम|	he hath drunk hence most marvellous and carried away our great and splendid call on indra.
पन्यसीं धीतिं दैव्यस्य यामञ जनस्य रातिं वनते सुदानुः|	the bounteous when we serve the gods accepteth song yet more famous and the gifts we bring him.
दूराच्चिदा वसतो अस्य कर्णा घोषादिन्द्रस्य तन्यति बरुवाणः|	the speaker filleth with a cry to indra his ears who cometh nigh een from a distance.
एयमेनं देवहूतिर्वव्र्त्यान मद्र्यगिन्द्रमियं रच्यमाना|	may this my call bring indra to my presence this call to gods composed in sacred verses.
तं वो धिया परमया पुराजामजरमिन्द्रमभ्यनूष्यर्कैः|	him have i sung with my best song and praises indra of ancient birth and everlasting.
बरह्मा च गिरो दधिरे समस्मिन महांश्च सतोमो अधि वर्धदिन्द्रे|	for prayer and songs in him are concentrated let laud wax mighty when addressed to indra.
वर्धाद यं यज्ञ उत सोम इन्द्रं वर्धाद बरह्म गिर उक्था च मन्म|	indra whom sacrifice shall strengthen soma and song and hymn and praises and devotion.
वर्धाहैनमुषसो यामन्नक्तोर्वर्धान मासाः शरदो दयाव इन्द्रम|	whom dawns shall strengthen when the night departeth indra whom days shall strengthen months and autumns.
एवा जज्ञानं सहसे असामि वाव्र्धानं राधसे च शरुताय|	him born for conquering might in full perfection and waxen strongfor bounty and for glory.
महामुग्रमवसे विप्र नूनमा विवासेम वर्त्रतूर्येषु|	great powerful will we today o singer invite to aid us and to quell our foemen.
तवं हयग्ने परथमो मनोतास्या धियो अभवो दस्म होता|	thou first inventor of this prayer o agni worker of marvels hast become our herald.
तवं सीं वर्षन्नक्र्णोर्दुष्टरीतु सहो विश्वस्मै सहसे सहध्यै|	thou bull hast made us strength which none may conquer strength that shall overcome all other prowess.
अधा होता नयसीदो यजीयानिळस पद इषयन्नीड्यः सन|	as priest thou sattest at the seat of worship furthering us best offerer meet for honour.
तं तवा नरः परथमं देवयन्तो महो राये चितयन्तो अनु गमन|	so first to thee have pious men resorted turning thy mind to thoughts of ample riches.
वर्तेव यन्तं बहुभिर्वसव्यैस्त्वे रयिं जाग्र्वांसो अनु गमन|	in thee still watching they have followed riches who goest with much wealth as with an army.
रुशन्तमग्निं दर्शतं बर्हन्तं वपावन्तं विश्वहा दीदिवांसम|	the radiant agni lofty fair to look on worshipped with marrow evermore resplendent.
पदं देवस्य नमसा वयन्तः शरवस्यवः शरव आपन्नम्र्क्तम|	they who approached the gods abode with homage eager for glory won them perfect glory.
नामानि चिद दधिरे यज्ञियानि भद्रायां ते रणयन्तसन्द्र्ष्टौ|	yea they gained even sacrificial titles and found delight in thine auspicious aspect.
तवां वर्धन्ति कषितयः पर्थिव्यां तवां राय उभयासो जनानाम|	on earth the people magnify thee greatly thee their celestial and terrestrial riches.
तवं तराता तरणे चेत्यो भूः पिता माता सदमिन मानुषाणाम|	thou helper must be known as our preserver father and mother of mankind for ever.
सपर्येण्यः स परियो विक्ष्वग्निर्होता मन्द्रो नि षसादा यजीयान|	dear priest among mankind adorable agni hath seated him joygiver skilled in worship.
तं तवा वयं दम आ दीदिवांसमुप जञुबाधो नमसा सदेम|	let us approach thee shining in thy dwelling kneeling upon our knees with adoration.
तं तवा वयं सुध्यो नव्यमग्नेसुम्नायव ईमहे देवयन्तः|	longing for bliss pureminded goddevoted agni we seek thee such meet to be lauded.
तवं विशो अनयो दीद्यानो दिवो अग्ने बर्हता रोचनेन|	thou agni leddest forth our men to battle refulgent with the heavens exalted splendour.
विशां कविं विश्पतिं शश्वतीनां नितोशनं वर्षभं चर्षणीनाम|	sage of mankind all peoples lord and master the bull of men the sender down of blessings.
परेतीषणिमिषयन्तं पावकं राजन्तमग्निं यजतं रयीणाम|	still pressing on promoting purifying agni the holy one the lord of riches.
सो अग्न ईजे शशमे च मर्तो यस्त आनट समिधा हव्यदातिम|	agni the mortal who hath toiled and worshipped brought thee oblations with his kindled fuel.
य आहुतिं परि वेदा नमोभिर्विश्वेत स वामा दधतेत्वोतः|	and well knows sacrifice with adoration gains every joy with thee to guard and help him.
अस्मा उ ते महि महे विधेम नमोभिरग्ने समिधोत हव्यैः|	mightily let us worship thee the mighty with reverence agni fuel and oblations.
वेदी सूनो सहसो गीर्भिरुक्थैरा ते भद्रायां सुमतौयतेम|	with songs o son of strength with hymns with altar so may we strive for thine auspicious favour.
आ यस्ततन्थ रोदसी वि भासा शरवोभिश्च शरवस्यस्तरुत्रः|	thou who hast covered heaven and earth with splendour and with thy glories glorious and triumphant.
बर्हद्भिर्वाजै सथविरेभिरस्मे रेवद्भिरग्ने वितरं वि भाहि|	continue thou to shine on us o agni with strength abundant rich and long enduring.
नर्वद वसो सदमिद धेह्यस्मे भूरि तोकाय तनयाय पश्वः|	vouchsafe us ever as man needs o vasu abundant wealth of kine for son and offspring.
पूर्वीरिषो बर्हतीरारेघा अस्मे भद्रा सौश्रवसानि सन्तु|	food noble plenteous far from sin and evil he with us and fair fame to make us happy.
पुरूण्यग्ने पुरुधा तवाया वसूनि राजन वसुता ते अश्याम|	may i obtain much wealth in many places by love of thee and through thy grace king agni.
पुरूणि हि तवे पुरुवार सन्त्यग्ने वसु विधते राजनि तवे|	for in thee bounteous one in thee the sovran agni are many boons for him who serves thee.
यथा होतर्मनुषो देवताता यज्ञेभिः सूनो सहसो यजासि|	as at mans service of the gods invoker thou son of strength dost sacrifice and worship.
एवा नो अद्य समना समानानुशन्नग्न उशतो यक्षि देवान|	so bring for us today all gods together bring willingly the willing gods o agni.
स नो विभावा चक्षणिर्न वस्तोरग्निर्वन्दारु वेद्यश्चनो धात|	may agni radiant herald of the morning meet to be known accept our praise with favour.
विश्वायुर्यो अम्र्तो मर्त्येषूषर्भुद भूदतिथिर्जातवेदाः|	dear to all life mid mortal men immortal our guest awake at dawn is jātavedas.
दयावो न यस्य पनयन्त्यभ्वं भासांसि वस्ते सूर्यो न शुक्रः|	whose might the very heavens regard with wonder bright as the sun he clothes himself with lustre.
वि य इनोत्यजरः पावकोअश्नस्य चिच्छिश्नथत पूर्व्याणि|	he who sends forth eternal purifier hath shattered een the ancient works of aśna.
वद्मा हि सूनो अस्यद्मसद्वा चक्रे अग्निर्जनुषाज्मान्नम|	thou art a singer son our feastcompanion agni at birth prepared his food and pathway.
स तवं न ऊर्जसन ऊर्जं धा राजेव जेरव्र्के कषेष्यन्तः|	therefore vouchsafe us strength o strengthbestower win like a king foes trouble not thy dwelling.
नितिक्ति यो वारणमन्नमत्ति वायुर्न राष्ट्र्यत्येत्यक्तून|	even he who cats his firm hard food with swiftnessand overtakes the nights as vāyu kingdoms.
तुर्याम यस्त आदिशामरातीरत्यो न हरुतः पततः परिह्रुत|	may we oercome those who resist thine orders like a steed casting down the flying foemen.
आ सूर्यो न भानुमद्भिरर्कैरग्ने ततन्थ रोदसी वि भासा|	like sūrya with his fulgent rays o agni thou overspreadest both the worlds with splendour.
चित्रो नयत परि तमांस्यक्तः शोचिषा पत्मन्नौशिजो न दीयन|	decked with bright colour he dispels the darkness like auśija with clear flame swifily flying.
तवां हि मन्द्रतममर्कशोकैर्वव्र्महे महि नः शरोष्यग्ने|	we have elected thee as most delightful for thy beams glow hear our great laud o agni.
इन्द्रं न तवा शवसा देवता वायुं पर्णन्ति राधसान्र्तमाः|	the best men praise thee as the peer of indra in strength mid gods like viyu in thy bounty.
नू नो अग्नेअव्र्केभिः सवस्ति वेषि रायः पथिभिः पर्ष्यंहः|	now agni on the tranquil paths of riches come to us for our weal save us from sorrow.
ता सूरिभ्यो गर्णते रासि सुम्नं मदेम शतहिमाःसुवीराः|	grant chiefs and bard this boon may we live happy with hero children through a hundred winters.
य आनयत परावतः सुनीती तुर्वशं यदुम|	that indra is our youthful friend who with his trusty guidance led.
इन्द्रः सनो युवा सखा|	turvaśa yadu from afar.
अविप्रे चिद वयो दधदनाशुना चिदर्वता|	even to the dull and uninspired indra gives vital power and wins.
इन्द्रो जेता हितं धनम|	even with slow steed the offered prize.
महीरस्य परणीतयः पूर्वीरुत परशस्तयः|	great are his ways of guiding us andṅanilbld are ins eulogies.
नास्य कषीयन्त ऊतयः|	his kind protections never fail.
सखायो बरह्मवाहसेअर्चत पर च गायत|	friends sing your psalm and offer praise to him to whom the prayer is brought.
स हि नः परमतिर्मही|	for our great providence is he.
तवमेकस्य वर्त्रहन्नविता दवयोरसि|	thou slaughterer of vṛtra art guardian and friend of one and two.
उतेद्र्शे यथा वयम|	yea of a man like one of us.
नयसीद वति दविषः कर्णोष्युक्थशंसिनः|	beyond mens hate thou leadest us and givest cause to sing thy praise.
नर्भिः सुवीर उच्यसे|	good hero art thou called by men.
बरह्माणं बरह्मवाहसं गीर्भिः सखायं रग्मियम|	i call with hymns as twere a cow to milk the friend who merits praise.
गांन दोहसे हुवे|	the brahman who accepts the prayer.
यस्य विश्वानि हस्तयोरूचुर्वसूनि नि दविता|	him in whose hands they say are stored all treasures from the days of old.
वीरस्य पर्तनाषहः|	the hero conquering in the fight.
वि दर्ळ्हानि चिदद्रिवो जनानां शचीपते|	lord of strength caster of the stone destroy the firm forts built by men.
वर्ह माया अनानत|	and foil their arts unbending god.
तमु तवा सत्य सोमपा इन्द्र वाजानां पते|	thee thee as such o lord of power o indra somadrinker true.
अहूमहि शरवस्यवः|	we fain for glory have invoked.
तमु तवा यः पुरासिथ यो वा नूनं हिते धने|	such as thou wast of old and art now to be called on when the prize.
हव्यःस शरुधी हवम|	lies ready listen to our call.
धीभिरर्वद्भिरर्वतो वाजानिन्द्र शरवाय्यान|	with hymns and coursers we will gain indra through thee both steeds and spoil.
तवया जेष्म हितं धनम|	most glorious and the proffered prize.
अभूरु वीर गिर्वणो महानिन्द्र धने हिते|	thou indra lover of the song whom men must stir to help hast been.
भरे वितन्तसाय्यः|	great in the contest for the prize.
या त ऊतिरमित्रहन मक्षूजवस्तमासति|	slayer of foes whatever aid of thine imparts the swiftest course.
तया नो हिनुही रथम|	with that impel our car to speed.
स रथेन रथीतमोअस्माकेनाभियुग्वना|	as skilfullest of those who drive the chariot with our art and aim.
जेषि जिष्णो हितं धनम|	o conqueror win the proffered prize.
य एक इत तमु षटुहि कर्ष्टीनां विचर्षणिः|	praise him who matchless and alone was born the lord of living men.
पतिर्जज्ञे वर्षक्रतुः|	most active with heroic soul.
यो गर्णतामिदासिथापिरूती शिवः सखा|	thou who hast been the singers friend a friend auspicious with thine aid.
स तवंन इन्द्र मर्ळय|	as such o indra favour us.
धिष्व वज्रं गभस्त्यो रक्षोहत्याय वज्रिवः|	grasp in thine arms the thunderbolt o thunderarmed to slay the fiends.
सासहीष्ठा अभि सप्र्धः|	mayst thou subdue the foemens host.
परत्नं रयीणां युजं सखायं कीरिचोदनम|	i call the ancient friend allied with wealth who speeds the lowly man.
बरह्मवाहस्तमं हुवे|	him to whom chiefly prayer is brought.
स हि विश्वानि पार्थिवानेको वसूनि पत्यते|	for he alone is lord of all the treasures of the earth he speeds.
गिर्वणस्तमो अध्रिगुः|	hither chief lover of the song.
स नो नियुद्भिरा पर्ण कामं वाजेभिरश्विभिः|	so with thy yoked teams satisfy our wish with power and wealth in steeds.
गोमद्भिर्गोपते धर्षत|	and cattle boldly lord of kine.
तद वो गाय सुते सचा पुरुहूताय सत्वने|	sing this what time the  juice is pressed to him your hero muchinvoked.
शं यद गवे|	to please him as a mighty steer.
न शाकिने|	he excellent withholdeth not his gift of power and wealth in kine.
न घा वसुर्नि यमते दानं वाजस्य गोमतः|	when he hath listened to our songs.
यत सीमुप शरवद गिरः|	may he with might unclose for us the cows stall whosesoeer it be.
कुवित्सस्य पर हि वरजं गोमन्तं दस्युहा गमत|	to which the dasyuslayer goes.
शचीभिरप नो वरत|	o indra Śatakratu these our songs have called aloud to thee.
इमा उ तवा शतक्रतोअभि पर णोनुवुर्गिरः|	like mother cows to meet their calves.
इन्द्र वत्संन मातरः|	hard is thy love to win thou art a steer to him who longs for steers.
दूणाशं सख्यं तव गौरसि वीर गव्यते|	be to one craving steeds a steed.
अश्वो अश्वायते भव|	delight thee with the juice we pour for thine own great munificence.
स मन्दस्वा हयन्धसो|	yield not thy singer to reproach.
इमा उ तवा सुतेसुते नक्षन्ते गिर्वणो गिरः|	these songs with every draught we pour come lover of the song to thee.
वत्सं गावोन धेनवः|	as milchkine hasten to their young.
पुरूतमं पुरूणां सतोतॄणां विवाचि|	to thee most oft invoked amid the many singers rivalry.
वाजेभिर्वाजयताम|	who beg with all their might for wealth.
अस्माकमिन्द्र भूतु ते सतोमो वाहिष्ठो अन्तमः|	nearest and most attractive may our laud o indra come to thee.
अस्मान राये महे हिनु|	urge thou us on to ample wealth.
अधि बर्बुः पणीनां वर्षिष्ठे मूर्धन्नस्थात|	brbu hath set himself above the paṇis oer their highest head.
उरुः कक्षो न गाङगयः|	like the wide bush on gangās bank.
यस्य वायोरिव दरवद भद्रा रातिः सहस्रिणी|	he whose good bounty thousandfold swift as the rushing of the wind.
सद्यो दानाय मंहते|	suddenly offers as a gift.
तत सु नो विश्वे अर्य आ सदा गर्णन्ति कारवः|	so all our singers ever praise the pious brbus noble deed.
बर्बुं सहस्रदातमं सूरिं सहस्रसातमम|	chief best to give his thousands best to give a thousand liberal gifts.
परत्यस्मै पिपीषते विश्वानि विदुषे भर|	bring sacrificial gifts to him omniscient for he longs to drink.
अरंगमाय जग्मयेअपश्चाद्दघ्वने नरे|	the wanderer who comes with speed the hero ever in the van.
एमेनं परत्येतन सोमेभिः सोमपातमम|	with soma go ye nigh to him chief drinker of the somas juice.
अमत्रेभिर्र्जीषिणमिन्द्रं सुतेभिरिन्दुभिः|	with beakers to the impetuous god to indra with the drops effused.
यदी सुतेभिरिन्दुभिः सोमेभिः परतिभूषथ|	what time with soma with the juice effused ye come before the god.
वेदा विश्वस्य मेधिरो धर्षत तंतमिदेषते|	full wise he knows the hope of each and bold one strikes this foe and that.
अस्माअस्मा इदन्धसोअध्वर्यो पर भरा सुतम|	to him adhvaryu yea to him give offerings of the juice expressed.
कुवित समस्य जेन्यस्य शर्धतोअभिशस्तेरवस्परत|	will he not keep us safely from the spiteful curse of each presumptuous highborn foe.
सं पूषन विदुषा नय यो अञ्जसानुशासति|	o pusan bring us to the man who knows who shall direct us straight.
य एवेदमिति बरवत|	and say unto us it is here.
समु पूष्णा गमेमहि यो गर्हानभिशासति|	may we go forth with pūṣan who shall point the houses out to us.
इम एवेति चब्रवत|	and say to us these same are they.
पूष्णश्चक्रं न रिष्यति न कोशोअव पद्यते|	unharmed is pūṣans chariot wheel the box neer falleth to the ground.
नो अस्य वयथते पविः|	nor doth the loosened feliy shake.
यो अस्मै हविषाविधन न तं पूषापि मर्ष्यते|	pūṣan forgetteth not the man who serveth him with offered gift.
परथमो विदते वसु|	that man is first to gather wealth.
पूषा गा अन्वेतु नः पुषा रक्षत्वर्वतः|	may pūṣan follow near our kine may pūṣan keep our horses safe.
पूषा वाजं सनोतु नः|	may pūṣan gather gear for us.
पूषन्ननु पर गा इहि यजमानस्य सुन्वतः|	follow the kine of him who pours libations out and worships thee.
अस्माकं सतुवतामुत|	and ours who sing thee songs of praise.
माकिर्नेशन माकीं रिषन माकीं सं शारि केवटे|	let none be lost none injured none sink in a pit and break a limb.
अथारिष्टाभिरा गहि|	return with these all safe and sound.
शर्ण्वन्तं पूषणं वयमिर्यमनष्टवेदसम|	pūṣan who listens to our prayers the strong whose wealth is never lost.
ईशानंराय ईमहे|	the lord of riches we implore.
पूषन तव वरते वयं न रिष्येम कदा चन|	secure in thy protecting care o pūṣan never may we fail.
सतोतारस्त इह समसि|	we here are they who sing thy praise.
परि पूषा परस्ताद धस्तं दधातु दक्षिणम|	from out the distance far and wide may pūṣan stretch his right hand forth.
पुनर्नो नष्टमाजतु|	and drive our lost again to us.
कदा भुवन रथक्षयाणि बरह्म कदा सतोत्रे सहस्रपोष्यन्दाः|	when shall our prayers rest in thy car beside thee when dost thou give the singer food for thousands.
कदा सतोमं वासयोअस्य राया कदा धियः करसि वाजरत्नाः|	when wilt thou clothe this poets laud with plenty and when wilt thou enrich our hymns with booty.
कर्हि सवित तदिन्द्र यन नर्भिर्नॄन वीरैर्वीरान नीळयासे जयाजीन|	when wilt thou gatber men with men o indra heroes with heroes and prevail in combat.
तरिधातु गा अधि जयासि गोष्विन्द्र दयुम्नंस्वर्वद धेह्यस्मे|	thou shalt win triply kine in frays for cattle so indra give thou us celestial glory.
कर्हि सवित तदिन्द्र यज्जरित्रे विष्वप्सु बरह्म कर्णवः शविष्ठ|	yea when wilt thou o indra thou most mighty make the prayer allsustaining for the singer.
कदा धियो न नियुतो युवासे कदा गोमघा हवनानि गछाः|	when wilt thou yoke as we yoke songs thy horses and come to offerings that bring wealth in cattle.
स गोमघा जरित्रे अश्वश्चन्द्रा वाजश्रवसो अधि धेहि पर्क्षः|	grant to the singer food with store of cattle splendid with horses and the fame of riches.
पीपिहीषः सुदुघामिन्द्र धेनुं भरद्वाजेषु सुरुचो रुरुच्याः|	send food to swell the milchcow good at milking bright be its shine among the bharadvājas.
तमा नूनं वर्जनमन्यथा चिच्छूरो यच्छक्र वि दुरोग्र्णीषे|	lead otherwise this present foeman Śakra hence art thou praised as hero foe destroyer.
मा निररं शुक्रदुघस्य धेनोराङगिरसान बरह्मणा विप्र जिन्व|	him who gives pure gifts may i praise unceasing sage quicken the aṅgirases by devotion.
सवादुष किलायं मधुमानुतायं तीव्रः किलायं रसवानुतायम|	yea this is good to taste and full of sweetness verily it is strong and rich in flavour.
उतो नवस्य पपिवांसमिन्द्रं न कश्चनसहत आहवेषु|	no one may conquer indra in the battle when he hath drunken of the draught we offer.
अयं सवादुरिह मदिष्ठ आस यस्येन्द्रो वर्त्रहत्ये ममाद|	this sweet juice here had mightiest power to gladden it boldened indra when he siaughtered vṛtra.
पुरूणि यश्च्यौत्ना शम्बरस्य वि नवतिं नव च देह्यो हन|	when he defeated Śambaras many onslaughts and battered down his nineand ninety ramparts.
अयं मे पीत उदियर्ति वचमयं मनीषामुशतीमजीगः|	this stirreth up my voice when i have drunk it this hath aroused from sleep my yearning spirit.
अयं षळ उर्वीरमिमीत धीरो न याभ्यो भुवनं कच्चनारे|	this sage hath measured out the six expanses from which no single creature is excluded.
अयं स यो वरिमाणं पर्थिव्या वर्ष्माणं दिवो अक्र्णोदयं सः|	this even this is he who hath created the breadth of earth the lofty height of heaven.
अयं पीयूषं तिस्र्षु परवत्सु सोमो दाधारोर्वन्तरिक्षम|	he formed the nectar in three headlong rivers soma supports the wide midair above us.
अयं विदच्चित्रद्र्शीकमर्णः शुक्रसद्मनामुषसामनीके|	he found the wavy sea of brilliant colours in forefront of the dawns who dwell in brightness.
अयं महान महता सकम्भनेनोद दयामस्तभ्नाद वर्षभोमरुत्वान|	this mighty one the steer begirt by maruts hath propped the heavens up with a mighty pillar.
धर्षत पिब कलशे सोममिन्द्र वर्त्रहा शूर समरे वसूनाम|	drink soma boldly from the beaker indra in war for treasures hero vṛtraslayer.
माध्यन्दिने सवन आ वर्षस्व रयिस्थानो रयिमस्मासु धेहि|	fill thyself full at the midday libation and give us wealth thou treasury of riches.
इन्द्र पर णः पुरेतेव पश्य पर नो नय परतरं वस्यो अछ|	look out for us o indra as our leader and guide us on to gain yet goodlier treasure.
भवा सुपारो अतिपारयो नो भवा सुनीतिरुत वामनीतिः|	excellent guardian bear us well through peril and lead us on to wealth with careful guidance.
उरुं नो लोकमनु नेषि विद्वान सवर्वज्ज्योतिरभयं सवस्ति|	lead us to ample room o thou who knowest to happiness security and sunlight.
रष्वा त इन्द्र सथविरस्य बाहू उप सथेयाम शरणा बर्हन्ता|	high indra are the arms of thee the mighty may we betake us to their lofty shelter.
वरिष्ठे न इन्द्र वन्धुरे धा वहिष्ठयोः शतावन्नश्वयोरा|	set us on widest chariotseat o indra with two steeds best to draw o lord of hundreds.
इषमा वक्षीषां वर्षिष्ठां मा नस्तारीन मघवन रायो अर्यः|	bring us the best among all sorts of viands let not the foes wealth maghavan subdue us.
इन्द्र मर्ळ मह्यं जीवातुमिछ चोदय धियमयसो न धाराम|	be gracious indra let my days be lengthened sharpen my thought as twere a blade of iron.
यत किं चाहं तवायुरिदं वदामि तज्जुषस्व कर्धि मा देववन्तम|	approve whatever words i speak dependent on thee and grant me thy divine protection.
तरातारमिन्द्रमवितारमिन्द्रं हवेहवे सुहवं शूरमिन्द्रम|	indra the rescuer indra the helper hero who listens at each invocation.
हवयामि शक्रं पुरुहूतमिन्द्रं सवस्ति नो मघवाधात्विन्द्रः|	Śakra i call indra invoked of many may indra maghavan prosper and bless us.
इन्द्रः सुत्रामा सववानवोभिः सुम्र्ळीको भवतु विश्ववेदाः|	may helpful indra as our good protector lord of all treasures favour us with succour.
बाधतां दवेषो अभयं कर्णोतु सुवीर्यस्य पतयः सयाम|	baffle our foes and give us rest and safety and may we be the lords of hero vigour.
तस्य वयं सुमतौ यज्ञियस्यापि भद्रे सौमनसे सयाम|	may we enjoy the grace of him the holy yea may we dwell in his auspicious favour.
स सुत्रामा सववानिन्द्रो अस्मे आराच्चिद दवेषः सनुतर्युयोतु|	may helpful indra as our good preserver drive from us even from afar our foemen.
अव तवे इन्द्र परवतो नोर्मिर्गिरो बरह्माणि नियुतो धवन्ते|	like rivers rushing down a slope o indra to thee haste songs and prayers and linked verses.
उरू न राधः सवना पुरूण्यपो गा वज्रिन युवसे समिन्दून|	thou gatherest thunderer like widespread bounty kine water drops and manifold libations.
क ईं सतवत कः पर्णात को यजाते यदुग्रमिन मघवा विश्वहावेत|	who lauds him satisfies him pays him worship een the rich noble still hath found him mighty.
पादाविव परहरन्नन्यमअन्यं कर्णोति पूर्वमपरं शचीभिः|	with power as when one moves his feet alternate he makes the last precede the foremost follow.
शर्ण्वे वीर उग्रमउग्रं दमायन्नन्यम अन्यमतिनेनीयमानः|	famed is the hero as each strong mans tamer ever advancing one and then another.
एधमानद्विळ उभयस्य राजा चोष्कूयते विश इन्द्रो मनुष्यान|	king of both worlds hating the high and haughty indra protects the men who are his people.
परा पूर्वेषां सख्या वर्णक्ति वितर्तुराणो अपरेभिरेति|	he loves no more the men he loved aforetime he turns and moves away allied with others.
अनानुभूतीरवधून्वानः पूर्वीरिन्द्रः शरदस्तर्तरीति|	rejecting those who disregard his worship indra victorious lives through many autumns.
रूपंरूपं परतिरूपो बभूव तदस्य रूपं परतिचक्षणाय|	in every figure he hath been the mode this is his only form for us to look on.
इन्द्रो मायाभिः पुरुरूप ईयते युक्ता हयस्य हरयःशता दश|	indra moves multiform by his illusions for his bay steeds are yoked ten times a hundred.
युजानो हरिता रथे भूरि तवष्टेह राजति|	here tvaṣṭar yoking to the car the bay steeds hath extended sway.
को विश्वाहा दविषतः पक्ष आसत उतासीनेषु सूरिषु|	who will for ever stand upon the foemans side even when our princes sit at ease.
अगव्यूति कषेत्रमागम्न देवा उर्वी सती भूमिरंहूरणाभूत|	gods we have reached a country void of pasture the land though spacious was too small to hold us.
बर्हस्पते पर चिकित्सा गविष्टावित्था सते जरित्रैन्द्र पन्थाम|	bṛhaspati provide in war for cattle find a path indra for this faithful singer.
दिवेदिवे सद्र्शीरन्यमर्धं कर्ष्णा असेधतप सद्मनोजाः|	day after day far from their seat he drove them alike from place to place those darksome creatures.
अहन दासा वर्षभो वस्नयन्तोदव्रजे वर्चिनं शम्बरं च|	the hero slew the meanlyhuckstering dāsas varcin and Śambara where the waters gather.
परस्तोक इन नु राधसस्त इन्द्र दश कोशयीर्दश वाजिनोअदात|	out of thy bounty indra hath prastoka bestowed ten coffers and ten mettled horses.
दिवोदासादतिथिग्वस्य राधः शाम्बरं वसु परत्यग्रभीष्म|	we have received in turn from divodāsa Śambaras wealth the gift of atithigva.
दशाश्वान दश कोशान दश वस्त्राधिभोजना|	ten horses and ten treasurechests ten garments as an added gift.
दशो हिरण्यपिण्डान दिवोदासादसानिषम|	these and ten lumps of gold have i received from divodāsas hand.
दश रथान परष्टिमतः शतं गा अथर्वभ्यः|	ten cars with extra steed to each for the atharvans hundred cows.
अश्वथः पायवेअदात|	hath asvatha to payu given.
महि राधो विश्वजन्यं दधानान भरद्वाजान सार्ञ्जयो अभ्ययष्ट|	thus sṛñjayas son honoured the bharadvājas recipients of all noble gifts and bounty.
वनस्पते वीड्वङगो हि भूया अस्मत्सखा परतरणः सुवीरः|	lord of the wood be firm and strong in body be bearing us a brave victorious hero.
गोभिः संनद्धो असि वीळयस्वास्थाता ते जयतु जेत्वानि|	show forth thy strength compact with straps of leather and let thy rider win all spoils of battle.
दिवस पर्थिव्याः पर्योज उद्भ्र्तं वनस्पतिभ्यः पर्याभ्र्तं सहः|	its mighty strength was borrowed from the heaven and earth its conquering force was brought from sovrans of the wood.
अपामोज्मानं परि गोभिराव्र्तमिन्द्रस्य वज्रं हविषा रथं यज|	honour with holy gifts the car like indras bolt the car bound round with straps the vigour of the floods.
इन्द्रस्य वज्रो मरुतामनीकं मित्रस्य गर्भो वरुणस्य नाभिः|	thou bolt of indra vanguard of the maruts close knit to varuṇa and child of mitra.
सेमां नो हव्यदातिं जुषाणो देव रथ परति हव्या गर्भाय|	as such accepting gifts which here we offer receive o godlike chariot these oblations.
उप शवासय पर्थिवीमुत दयां पुरुत्रा ते मनुतां विष्ठितं जगत|	send forth thy voice aloud through earth and heaven and let the world in all its breadth regard thee.
स दुन्दुभे सजूरिन्द्रेण देवैर्दूराद दवीयोप सेध शत्रून|	o drum accordant with the gods and indra drive thou afar yea very far our foemen.
आ करन्दय बलमोजो न आ धा नि षटनिहि दुरिता बाधमानः|	thunder out strength and fill us full of vigour yea thunder forth and drive away all dangers.
अप परोथ दुन्दुभे दुछुना इत इन्द्रस्य मुष्टिरसि वीळयस्व|	drive hence o wardrum drive away misfortune thou art the fist of indra show thy firmness.
आमूरज परत्यावर्तयेमाः केतुमद दुन्दुभिर्वावदीति|	drive hither those and these again bring hither the wardrum speaks aloud as battles signal.
समश्वपर्णाश्चरन्ति नो नरोअस्माकमिन्द्र रथिनो जयन्तु|	our heroes winged with horses come together let our carwarriors indra be triumphant.
तवामिद धि हवामहे साता वाजस्य कारवः|	that we may win us wealth and power we poets verily call on thee.
तवां वर्त्रेष्विन्द्र सत्पतिं नरस्त्वां काष्ठास्वर्वतः|	in war men call on thee indra the heros lord in the steeds racecourse call on thee.
स तवं नश्चित्र वज्रहस्त धर्ष्णुया मह सतवानो अद्रिवः|	as such o wonderful whose hand holds thunder praised as mighty caster of the stone.
गामश्वं रथ्यमिन्द्र सं किर सत्रा वाजं न जिग्युषे|	pour on us boldly indra kine and chariotsteeds ever to be the conquerors strength.
यः सत्राहा विचर्षणिरिन्द्रं तं हूमहे वयम|	we call upon that indra who most active ever slays the foe.
सहस्रमुष्क तुविन्र्म्ण सत्पते भवा समत्सु नो वर्धे|	lord of the brave most manly with a thousand powers help thou and prosper us in fight.
बाधसे जनान वर्षभेव मन्युना घर्षौ मीळ्ह रचीषम|	rcisama thou forcest men as with a bull with anger in the furious fray.
अस्माकं बोध्यविता महाधने तनूष्वप्सु सूर्ये|	be thou our helper in the mighty battle fought for sunlight water and for life.
इन्द्र जयेष्ठं न आ भरनोजिष्ठं पपुरि शरवः|	o indra bring us name and fame enriching mightiest excellent.
येनेमे चित्र वज्रहस्त रोदसी ओभे सुशिप्र पराः|	wherewith o wondrous god fairvisored thunderarmed thou hast filled full this earth and heaven.
तवामुग्रमवसे चर्षणीसहं राजन देवेषु हूमहे|	we call on thee o king mighty amid the gods ruler of men to succour us.
विश्वा सु नो विथुरा पिब्दना वसोअमित्रान सुषहान कर्धि|	all that is weak in us excellent god make firm make our foes easy to subdue.
यदिन्द्र नाहुषीष्वानोजो नर्म्णं च कर्ष्टिषु|	all strength and valour that is found indra in tribes of nahusas and all the splendid fame that the five tribes enjoy.
यद वापञ्च कषितीनां दयुम्नमा भर सत्रा विश्वानि पौंस्या|	bring yea all manly powers at once.
यद वा तर्क्षौ मघवन दरुह्यावा जने यत पूरौ कच्च वर्ष्ण्यम|	or maghavan what vigorous strength in trksi lay in druhyus or in parus folk.
अस्मभ्यं तद रिरीहि सं नर्षाह्येअमित्रान पर्त्सुतुर्वणे|	fully bestow on us that in the conquering fray we may subdue our foes in fight.
इन्द्र तरिधातु शरणं तरिवरूथं सवस्तिमत|	o indra grant a happy home a triple refuge triply strong.
छर्दिर्यछ मघवद्भ्यश्च मह्यं च यावया दिद्युमेभ्यः|	bestow a dwellingplace on the rich lords and me and keep thy dart afar from these.
ये गव्यता मनसा शत्रुमादभुरभिप्रघ्नन्ति धर्ष्णुया|	they who with minds intent on spoil subdue the foe boldly attack and smite him down.
अध समा नो मघवन्निन्द्र गिर्वणस्तनूपा अन्तमो भव|	from these o indra maghavan who lovest song be closest guardian of our lives.
अध समा नो वर्धे भवेन्द्र नायमवा युधि|	and now o indra strengthen us come near and aid us in the fight.
यदन्तरिक्षेपतयन्ति पर्णिनो दिद्यवस्तिग्ममूर्धानः|	what time the feathered shafts are flying in the air the arrows with their sharpened points.
यत्र शूरासस्तन्वो वितन्वते परिया शर्म पितॄणाम|	give us where heroes strain their bodies in the fight the shelter that our fathers loved.
अध समा यछ तन्वे तने च छर्दिरचित्तं यावय दवेषः|	to us and to our sons give refuge keep afar all unobserved hostility.
यदिन्द्र सर्गे अर्वतश्चोदयासे महाधने|	when indra in the mighty fray thou urgest chargers to their speed.
असमने अध्वनिव्र्जिने पथि शयेनानिव शरवस्यतह|	on the uneven road and on a toilsome path like falcons eager for renown.
सिन्धून्रिव परवण आशुया यतो यदि कलोशमनु षवणि|	speeding like rivers rushing down a steep descent responsive to the urging call.
आ ये वयो न वर्व्र्तत्यामिषि गर्भीता बाह्वोर्गवि|	that come like birds attracted to the bait held in by reins in both the drivers hands.
एहि वां विमुचो नपादाघ्र्णे सं सचावहै|	son of deliverance come bright god.
रथीरतस्य नो भव|	let us twain go together be our charioteer of sacrifice.
रथीतमं कपर्दिनमीशानं राधसो महः|	we pray for wealth to thee most skilled of charioteers with braided hair.
रायः सखायमीमहे|	lord of great riches and our friend.
रायो धारास्याघ्र्णे वसो राशिरजाश्व|	bright god whose steeds are goats thou art a stream of wealth a treasureheap.
धीवतोधीवतः सखा|	the friend of every pious man.
पूषणं नवजाश्वमुप सतोषाम वाजिनम|	pūṣan who driveth goats for steeds the strong and mighty who is called.
सवसुर्यो जार उच्यते|	his sisters lover will we laud.
मातुर्दिधिषुमब्रवं सवसुर्जारः शर्णोतु नः|	his mothers suitor i address may he who loves his sister hear.
भरातेन्द्रस्य सखा मम|	brother of indra and my friend.
आजासः पूषणं रथे निश्र्म्भास्ते जनश्रियम|	may the surefooted goats come nigh conveying pūṣan on his car.
देवं वहन्तु बिभ्रतः|	the god who visiteth mankind.
वपुर्नु तच्चिकितुषे चिदस्तु समानं नाम धेनु पत्यमानम|	een to the wise let that be still a wonder to which the general name of cow is given.
मर्तेष्वन्यद दोहसे पीपाय सक्र्च्छुक्रं दुदुहे पर्श्निरूधः|	the one hath swelled among mankind for milking pṛśni hath drained but once her fair bright udder.
ये अग्नयो न शोशुचन्निधाना दविर्यत तरिर्मरुतो वाव्र्धन्त|	they who like kindled flames of fire are glowing the maruts twice and thrice have waxen mighty.
अरेञवो हिरण्ययास एषां साकं नर्म्णैः पौंस्येभिश्च भूवन|	golden and dustless were their cars invested with their great strength and their heroic vigour.
रुद्रस्य ये मीळ्हुषः सन्ति पुत्रा यांश्चो नु दाध्र्विर्भरध्यै|	they who are sons of the rainpouring rudra whom the longlasting one had power to foster.
विदे हि माता महो मही षा सेत पर्श्निः सुभ्वे गर्भमाधात|	the mighty ones whose germ great mother pṛśni is known to have received for mans advantage.
न य इषन्ते जनुषोअया नवन्तः सन्तोअवद्यानि पुनानाः|	they shrink not from the birth in this same manner still resting there they purge away reproaches.
निर्यद दुह्रे शुचयोअनु जोषमनु शरिया तन्वमुक्षमाणाः|	when they have streamed forth brilliant at their pleasure with their own splendour they bedew their bodies.
मक्षू न येषु दोहसे चिदया आ नाम धर्ष्णु मारुतन्दधानाः|	even those who bear the brave bold name of maruts whom not the active quickly wins for milking.
न ये सतौना अयासो मह्ना नू चित सुदानुरव वासदुग्रान|	even the liberal wards not off those fierce ones those who are light and agile in their greatness.
त इदुग्राः शवसा धर्ष्णुषेणा उभे युजन्त रोदसी सुमेके|	when strong in strength and armed with potent weapons they had united wellformed earth and heaven.
अध समैषु रोदसी सवशोचिरामवत्सु तस्थौ न रोकः|	rodasl stood among these furious heroes like splendour shining with her native brightness.
अनेनो वो मरुतो यामो अस्त्वनश्वश्चिद यमजत्यरथीः|	no team of goats shall draw your car o maruts no horse no charioteer be he who drives it.
अनवसो अनभीशू रजस्तूर्वि रोदसी पथ्या याति साधन|	halting not reinless through the air it travels speeding alone its paths through earth and heaven.
नास्य वर्ता न तरुता नवस्ति मरुतो यमवथ वजसातौ|	none may obstruct none overtake o maruts him whom ye succour in the strife of battle.
तोके वा गोषु तनये यमप्सु स वरजं दर्ता पार्ये अध दयोः|	for sons and progeny for kine and waters he bursts the cowstall on the day of trial.
पर चित्रमर्कं गर्णते तुराय मारुताय सवतवसे भरध्वम|	bring a bright hymn to praise the band of maruts the singers rapid strong in native vigour.
ये सहांसि सहसा सहन्ते रेजते अग्ने पर्थिवी मखेभ्यः|	who conquer mighty strength with strength more mighty earth shakes in terror at their wars o agni.
तविषीमन्तो अध्वरस्येव दिद्युत तर्षुच्यवसो जुह्वो नाग्नेः|	bright like the flashing flames of sacrifices like tongues of fire impetuous in their onset.
अर्चत्रयो धुनयो न वीरा भराजज्जन्मानो मरुतो अध्र्ष्टाः|	chanting their psalm singing aloud like heroes splendid from birth invincible the maruts.
तं वर्धन्तं मारुतं भराजद्र्ष्टिं रुद्रस्य सूनुं हवसा विवासे|	that swelling band i call with invocation the brood of rudra armed with glittering lances.
दिवः शर्धाय शुचयो मनीषा गिरयो नाप उग्रा अस्प्र्ध्रन|	pure hymns are meet for that celestial army like floods and mountains have the strong ones battled.
मन्दस्व होत्रादनु जोषमन्धसोअध्वर्यवः स पूर्णांवष्ट्यासिचम|	enjoy thy fill of meath out of the hotars cup adhvaryus he desires a full draught poured for him.
तस्मा एतं भरत तद्वशो ददिर्होत्राद सोमं दरविणोदः पिब रतुभिः|	bring it him seeking this he gives granter of wealth drink soma with the Ṛtus from the hotars cup.
यमु पूर्वमहुवे तमिदं हुवे सेदु हव्यो ददिर्यो नाम पत्यते|	he whom of old i called on him i call on now he is to be invoked his name is he who gives.
अध्वर्युभिः परस्थितं सोम्यं मधु पोत्रात सोमं द प र|	here brought by priests is soma meath granter of wealth drink soma with the Ṛtus from the potars cup.
मेद्यन्तु ते वह्नयो येभिरीयसेअरिषण्यन वीळयस्वा वनस्पते|	fat may the horses be wherewith thou speedest on lord of the wood unharming strengthen thou thyself.
आयूया धर्ष्णो अभिगूर्या तवं नेष्ट्रात सोमं|	drawing and seizing bold one thou who grantest wealth drink soma with the Ṛtus from the neṣṭars cup.
अपाद धोत्रादुत पोत्रादमत्तोत नेष्ट्रादजुषत परयो हितम|	from hotars cup and potars he hath drunk and joyed the proffered food hath pleased him from the neṣṭars bowl.
तुरीयं पात्रमम्र्क्तममर्त्यं दरविणोदाः पिबतु दराविणोदसः|	the fourth cup undisturbed immortal let him drink who giveth wealth the cup of the wealthgiving god.
अर्वाञ्चमद्य यय्यं नर्वाहणं रथं युञ्जाथामिह वां विमोचनम|	yoke o ye twain today your herobearing car swiftmoving hitherward your loosingplace is here.
पर्ङकतं हवींषि मधुना हि कं गतमथा सोमं पिबतं वाजिनीवसू|	mix the oblations then come hither with the meath and drink the soma ye rich in abundant strength.
जोष्यग्ने समिधं जोष्याहुतिं जोषि बरह्म जन्यं जोषिसुष्टुतिम|	agni accept the fuel and our offered gift accept the prayer of man accept our eulogy.
विश्वेभिर्विश्वान रतुना वसो मह उशन देवानुशतः पायया हविः|	do thou with all with Ṛtu o thou excellent fain make the great gods all fain taste the gift we bring.
समिद्धो अग्निर्निहितः पर्थिव्यां परत्यं विश्वानि भुवनान्यस्थात|	agni is set upon the earth well kindled he standeth in the presence of all beings.
होता पावकः परदिवः सुमेधा देवो देवान यजत्वग्निरर्हन|	wise ancient god the priest and purifier let agni serve the gods for he is worthy.
नराशंसः परति धामान्यञ्जन तिस्रो दिवः परति मह्ना सवर्चिः|	may narāśaṁsa lighting up the chambers bright in his majesty through threefold heaven.
घर्तप्रुषा मनसा हव्यमुन्दन मूर्धन यज्ञस्य समनक्तु देवान|	steeping the gift with oil diffusing purpose bedew the gods at chiefest time of worship.
ईळितो अग्ने मनसा नो अर्हन देवान यक्षि मानुषात पूर्वो अद्य|	adored in heart as is thy right o agni serve the gods first today before the mortal.
स आ वह मरुतां शर्धो अच्युतमिन्द्रं नरो बर्हिषदं यजध्वम|	bring thou the marut host ye men do worship to indra seated on the grass eternal.
देव बर्हिर्वर्धमानं सुवीरं सतीर्णं राये सुभरं वेद्यस्याम|	o grass divine increasing rich in heroes strewn for wealths sake well laid upon this altar.
घर्तेनाक्तं वसवः सीदतेदं विश्वे देवा आदित्या यज्ञियासः|	on this bedewed with oil sit ye o vasus sit all ye gods ye holy ye Ādityas.
वि शरयन्तामुर्विया हूयमाना दवारो देवीः सुप्रायणा नमोभिः|	wide be the doors the goddesses thrown open easy to pass invoked through adorations.
वयचस्वतीर्वि परथन्तामजुर्या वर्णं पुनानायशसं सुवीरम|	let them unfold expansive everlasting that sanctify the class famed rich in heroes.
साध्वपांसि सनता न उक्षिते उषासानक्ता वय्येव रण्विते|	good work for us the glorious night and morning like female weavers waxen from aforetime.
तन्तुं ततं संवयन्ती समीची यज्ञस्य पेशः सुदुघे पयस्वती|	yielders of rich milk interweave in concert the longextended thread the web of worship.
दैव्या होतारा परथमा विदुष्टर रजु यक्षतः सं रचावपुष्टरा|	let the two heavenly heralds first most wise most fair present oblation duly with the sacred verse.
देवान यजन्ताव रतुथा समञ्जतो नाभा पर्थिव्या अधि सानुषु तरिषु|	worshipping god at ordered seasons decking them at three high places at the centre of the earth.
सरस्वती साधयन्ती धियं न इळा देवी भारती विश्वतूर्तिः|	sarasvatī who perfects our devotion iḷā divine bhāratī all surpassing.
तिस्रो देवीः सवधया बर्हिरेदमछिद्रं पान्तुशरणं निषद्य|	three goddesses with power inherent seated protect this holy grass our flawless refuge.
पिशङगरूपः सुभरो वयोधाः शरुष्टी वीरो जायते देवकामः|	born is the pious hero swift of hearing like gold in hue well formed and full of vigour.
परजां तवष्टा वि षयतु नाभिमस्मे अथा देवानामप्येतु पाथः|	may tvaṣṭar lengthen our line and kindred and may they reach the place which gods inhabit.
वनस्पतिरवस्र्जन्नुप सथादग्निर्हविः सूदयाति पर धीभिः|	vanaspati shall stand anear and start us and agni with his arts prepare oblation.
तरिधा समक्तं नयतु परजानन देवेभ्यो दैव्यः शमितोप हव्यम|	let the skilled heavenly immolator forward unto the gods the offering thrice anointed.
घर्तं मिमिक्षे घर्तमस्य योनिर्घ्र्ते शरितो घर्तं वस्य धाम|	oil has been mixt oil is his habitation in oil he rests oil is his proper province.
अनुष्वधमा वह मादयस्व सवाहाक्र्तं वर्षभ वक्षि हव्यम|	come as thy wont is o thou steer rejoice thee bear off the oblation duly consecrated.
शरेष्ठं यविष्ठ भारताग्ने दयुमन्तमा भर|	vasu thou most youthful god bhārata agni bring us wealth.
वसो पुरुस्प्र्हं रयिम|	excellent splendid muchdesired.
मा नो अरातिरीशत देवस्य मर्त्यस्य च|	let no malignity prevail against us either gods or mans.
पर्षि तस्या उतद्विषः|	save us from this and enmity.
विश्वा उत तवया वयं धारा उदन्या इव|	so through thy favour may we force through all our enemies a way.
अति गाहेमहि दविषः|	as twere through streaming waterfloods.
शुचिः पावक वन्द्योअग्ने बर्हद वि रोचसे|	thou purifier agni high shinest forth bright adorable.
तवं घर्तेभिराहुतः|	when worshipped with the sacred oil.
तवं नो असि भारताग्ने वशाभिरुक्षभिः|	ours art thou agni bhārata honoured by us with barren cows.
अष्टापदीभिराहुतः|	with bullocks and with kine in calf.
दर्वन्नः सर्पिरासुतिः परत्नो होता वरेण्यः|	woodfed bedewed with sacred oil ancient invoker excellent.
सहसस पुत्रो अद्भुतः|	the son of strength the wonderful.
तवमग्ने दयुभिस्त्वमाशुशुक्षणिस्त्वमद्भ्यस्त्वमश्मनस परि|	thou agni shining in thy glory through the days art brought to life from out the waters from the stone.
तवं वनेभ्यस्त्वमोषधीभ्यस्त्वं नर्णां नर्पते जायसे शुचिः|	from out the forest trees and herbs that grow on ground thou sovran lord of men art generated pure.
तवाग्ने होत्रं तव पोत्रं रत्वियं तव नेष्ट्रं तवमग्निद रतायतः|	thine is the heralds task and cleansers duly timed leader art thou and kindler for the pious man.
तव परशास्त्रं तवमध्वरीयसि बरह्मा चासि गर्हपतिश्च नो दमे|	thou art director thou the ministering priest thou art the brahman lord and master in our home.
तवमग्न इन्द्रो वर्षभः सतामसि तवं विष्णुरुरुगायो नमस्यः|	hero of heroes agni thou art indra thou art viṣṇu of the mighty stride adorable.
तवं बरह्मा रयिविद बरह्मणस पते तवं विधर्तःसचसे पुरन्ध्या|	thou brahmaṇaspati the brahman finding wealth thou o sustainer with thy wisdom tendest us.
तवमग्ने राजा वरुणो धर्तव्रतस्त्वं मित्रो भवसि दस्म ईड्यः|	agni thou art king varuṇa whose laws stand fast as mitra wonderworker thou must be implored.
तवमर्यमा सत्पतिर्यस्य सम्भुजं तवमंशो विदथे देव भाजयुः|	aryaman heroes lord art thou enriching all and liberal aṁśa in the synod o thou god.
तवमग्ने तवष्टा विधते सुवीर्यं तव गनावो मित्रमहः सजात्यम|	thou givest strength as tvaṣṭar to the worshipper thou wielding mitras power hast kinship with the dames.
तवमाशुहेमा ररिषे सवश्व्यं तवं नरां शर्धो असि पुरूवसुः|	thou urging thy fleet coursers givest noble steeds a host of heroes art thou with great store of wealth.
तवमग्ने रुद्रो असुरो महो दिवस्त्वं शर्धो मारुतं पर्क्ष ईशिषे|	rudra art thou the asura of mighty heaven thou art the maruts host thou art the lord of food.
तवं वातैररुणैर्यासि शंगयस्त्वं पूषा विधतः पासि नु तमना|	thou goest with red winds bliss hast thou in thine home as pūṣan thou thyself protectest worshippers.
तवमग्ने दरविणोदा अरंक्र्ते तवं देवः सविता रत्नधासि|	giver of wealth art thou to him who honours thee thou art god savitar granter of precious things.
तवं भगो नर्पते वस्व ईशिषे तवं पायुर्दमे यस्तेऽविधत|	as bhaga lord of men thou rulest over wealth and guardest in his house him who hath served thee well.
तवमग्ने दम आ विश्पतिं विशस्त्वां राजानं सुविदत्रं रञ्जते|	to thee the peoples lord within the house the folk press forward to their king most graciously inclined.
तवं विश्वानि सवनीक पत्यसे तवं सहस्राणि शता दश परति|	lord of the lovely look all things belong to thee ten hundred yea a thousand are outweighed by thee.
तवामग्ने पितरमिष्टिभिर्नरस्त्वां भरात्राय शम्या तनूरुचम|	agni men seek thee as a father with their prayers win thee brightformed to brotherhood with holy act.
तवं पुत्रो भवसि यस्तेअविधत तवं सखा सुशेवः पास्याध्र्षः|	thou art a son to him who duly worships thee and as a trusty friend thou guardest from attack.
तवमग्न रभुराके नमस्यस्त्वं वाजस्य कषुमतो राय ईशिषे|	a Ṛbhu art thou agni near to be adored thou art the sovran lord of foodful spoil and wealth.
तवं वि भास्यनु दक्षि दावने तवं विशिक्षुरसियज्ञमातनिः|	thou shinest brightly forth thou burnest to bestow pervading sacrifice thou lendest us thine help.
तवमग्ने अदितिर्देव दाशुषे तवं होत्रा भारती वर्धसेगिरा|	thou god art aditi to him who offers gifts thou hotrā bhāratī art strengthened by the song.
तवमिळा षतहिमासि दक्षसे तवं वर्त्रहा वसुपते सरस्वती|	thou art the hundredwintered iḷā to give strength lord of wealth vṛtraslayer and sarasvatī.
तवमग्ने सुभ्र्त उत्तमं वयस्तव सपार्हे वर्ण आ सन्द्र्शि शरियः|	thou agni cherished well art highest vital power in thy delightful hue are glories visible.
तवं वाजः परतरणो बर्हन्नसि तवं रयिर्बहुलो विश्वतस पर्थुः|	thou art the lofty might that furthers each design thou art wealth manifold diffused on every side.
तवामग्न आदित्यास आस्यं तवां जिह्वां शुचयश्चक्रिरेकवे|	thee agni have the Ādityas taken as their mouth the bright ones have made thee o sage to be their tongue.
तवां रातिषाचो अध्वरेषु सश्चिरे तवे देवा हविरदन्त्याहुतम|	they who love offerings cling to thee at solemn rites by thee the gods devour the duly offered food.
तवे अग्ने विश्वे अन्र्तासो अद्रुह आसा देवा हविरदन्त्याहुतम|	by thee o agni all the immortal guileless gods cat with thy mouth the oblation that is offered them.
तवया मर्तासः सवदन्त आसुतिं तवं गर्भो वीरुधां जज्ञिषे शुचिः|	by thee do mortal men give sweetness to their drink bright art thou born the embryo of the plants of earth.
तवं तान सं च परति चासि मज्मनाग्ने सुजात पर च देवरिच्यसे|	with these thou art united agni yea thou god of noble birth surpassest them in majesty.
पर्क्षो यदत्र महिना वि ते भुवदनु दयावाप्र्थिवी रोदसी उभे|	which through the power of good here spreads abroad from thee diffused through both the worlds throughout the earth and heaven.
ये सतोत्र्भ्यो गोग्रामश्वपेशसमग्ने रातिमुपस्र्जन्ति सूरयः|	the princely worshippers who send to those who sing thy praise o agni guerdon graced with kine and steeds.
अस्माञ्च तांश्च पर हि नेषि वस्य आ बर्हद वदेम विदथे सुवीराः|	lead thou both these and us forward to higher bliss with brave men in the assembly may we speak aloud.
इमा गिर आदित्येभ्यो घर्तस्नूः सनाद राजभ्यो जुह्वा जुहोमि|	these hymns that drop down fatness with the ladle i ever offer to the kings Ādityas.
शर्णोतु मित्रो अर्यमा भगो नस्तुविजातो वरुणो दक्षो अंशः|	may mitra aryaman and bhaga hear us the mighty varuṇa dakṣa and aṁśa.
इमं सतोमं सक्रतवो मे अद्य मित्रो अर्यमा वरुणो जुषन्त|	with one accord may aryaman and mitra and varuṇa this day accept this praisesong.
आदित्यासः शुचयो धारपूता अव्र्जिना अनवद्या अरिष्टाः|	Ādityas bright and pure as streams of water free from all guile and falsehood blameless perfect.
त आदित्यास उरवो गभीरा अदब्धासो दिप्सन्तो भूर्यक्षाः|	these gods Ādityas vast profound and faithful with many eyes fain to deceive the wicked.
अन्तः पश्यन्ति वर्जिनोत साधु सर्वं राजभ्यः परमा चिदन्ति|	looking within behold the good and evil near to the kings is even the thing most distant.
धारयन्त आदित्यासो जगत सथा देवा विश्वस्य भुवनस्य गोपाः|	upholding that which moves and that which moves not Ādityas gods protectors of all being.
दीर्घाधियो रक्षमाणा असुर्यं रतावानश्चयमाना रणानि|	provident guarding well the world of spirits true to eternal law the debtexactors.
विद्यामादित्या अवसो वो अस्य यदर्यमन भय आ चिन मयोभु|	may i Ādityas share m this your favour which aryaman brings profit een in danger.
युष्माकं मित्रावरुणा परणीतौ परि शवभ्रेव दुरितानिव्र्ज्याम|	under your guidance varuṇa and mitra round troubles may i pass like rugged places.
सुगो हि वो अर्यमन मित्र पन्था अन्र्क्षरो वरुण साधुरस्ति|	smooth is your path o aryaman and mitra excellent is it varuṇa and thornless.
तेनादित्या अधि वोचता नो यछता नो दुष्परिहन्तु शर्म|	thereon Ādityas send us down your blessing grant us a shelter hard to be demolished.
पिपर्तु नो अदिती राजपुत्राति दवेषांस्यर्यमा सुगेभिः|	mother of kings may aditi transport us by fair paths aryaman beyond all hatred.
बर्हन मित्रस्य वरुणस्य शर्मोप सयाम पुरुवीरा अरिष्टाः|	may we uninjured girt by many heroes win varuṇas and mitras high protection.
तिस्रो भूमीर्धारयन तरीन्रुत दयून तरीणि वरता विदथे अन्तरेषाम|	with their support they stay three earths three heavens three are their functions in the gods assembly.
रतेनादित्या महि वो महित्वं तदर्यमन वरुण मित्र चारु|	mighty through law Ādityas is your greatness fair is it aryaman varuṇa and mitra.
तरी रोचना दिव्या धारयन्त हिरण्ययाः शुचयो धारपूताः|	golden and splendid pure like streams of water they hold aloft the three bright heavenly regions.
अस्वप्नजो अनिमिषा अदब्धा उरुशंसा रजवे मर्त्याय|	neer do they slumber never close their eyelids faithful farruling for the righteous mortal.
तवं विश्वेषां वरुणासि राजा ये च देवा असुर ये च मर्ताः|	thou over all o varuṇa art sovran be they gods asura or be they mortals.
शतं नो रास्व शरदो विचक्षेअच्यामायूंषि सुधितानि पूर्वा|	grant unto us to see a hundred autumns ours be the blest long lives of our forefathers.
न दक्षिणा वि चिकिते न सव्या न पराचीनमादित्या नोतपश्चा|	neither the right nor left do i distinguish neither the cast nor yet the west Ādityas.
पाक्या चिद वसवो धीर्या चिद युष्मानीतो अभयंज्योतिरश्याम|	simple and guided by your wisdom vasus may i attain the light that brings no danger.
यो राजभ्य रतनिभ्यो ददाश यं वर्धयन्ति पुष्टयश्चनित्याः|	he who bears gifts unto the kings true leaders he whom their everlasting blessings prosper.
स रेवान याति परथमो रथेन वसुदावा विदथेषु परशस्तः|	moves with his chariot first in rank and wealthy munificent and lauded in assemblies.
शुचिरपः सूयवसा अदब्ध उप कषेति वर्द्धवयाः सुवीरः|	pure faithful very strong with heroes round him he dwells beside the waters rich with pasture.
नकिष टं घनन्त्यन्तितो न दूराद य आदित्यानां भवति परणीतौ|	none slays from near at hand or from a distance him who is under the Ādityas guidance.
अदिते मित्र वरुणोत मर्ळ यद वो वयं चक्र्मा कच्चिदागः|	aditi mitra varuṇa forgive us however we have erred and sinned against you.
उर्वश्यामभयं जयोतिरिन्द्र मा नो दीर्घा अभि नशन तमिस्राः|	may i obtain the broad light free from peril o indra let not during darkness seize us.
उभे अस्मै पीपयतः समीची दिवो वर्ष्टिं सुभगो नाम पुष्यन|	for him the twain united pour their fulness the rain from heaven he thrives most highly favoured.
उभा कषयावाजयन याति पर्त्सूभावर्धौ भवतः साधू अस्मै|	he goes to war mastering both the mansions to him both portions of the world are gracious.
या वो माया अभिद्रुहे यजत्राः पाशा आदित्या रिपवे विच्र्त्ताः|	your guiles ye holy ones to quell oppressors your snares spread out against the foe Ādityas.
अश्वीव तानति येषं रथेनारिष्टा उरावा शर्मन सयाम|	may i carborne pass like a skilful horseman uninjured may we dwell in spacious shelter.
माहं मघोनो वरुण परियस्य भूरिदाव्न आ विदं शूनमापेः|	may i not live o varuṇa to witness my wealthy liberal dear friends destitution.
मा रायो राजन सुयमादव सथां बर्हद वदेम|	king may o never lack wellordered riches loud may we speak with heroes in assembly.
रतुर्जनित्री तस्या अपस परि मक्षू जात आविशद यासु वर्धते|	the season was the parent and when born therefrom it entered rapidly the floods wherein it grows.
तदाहना अभवत पिप्युषी पयोअंशोः पीयूषं परथमं तदुक्थ्यम|	thence was it full of sap streaming with milky juice the milk of the plants stalk is chief and meet for lauds.
सध्रीमा यन्ति परि बिभ्रतीः पयो विश्वप्स्न्याय पर भरन्त भोजनम|	they come trooping together bearing milk to him and bring him sustenance who gives support to all.
समानो अध्वा परवतामनुष्यदे यस्ताक्र्णोः परथमं सास्युक्थ्यः|	the way is common for the downward streams to flow thou who didst these things first art worthy of our lauds.
अन्वेको वदति यद ददाति तद रूपा मिनन तदपा एक ईयते|	one priest announces what the institutor gives one altering the forms zealously plies his task.
विश्वा एकस्य विनुदस्तितिक्षते यस्ताक्र|	the third corrects the imperfections left by each thou who didst these things first art worthy of our lauds.
परजाभ्यः पुष्टिं विभजन्त आसते रयिमिव पर्ष्ठं परभवन्तमायते|	dealing out food unto their people there they sit like wealth to him who comes more than the back can bear.
असिन्वन दंष्ट्रैः पितुरत्ति भोजनं यस्ताक्र|	greedily with his teeth he eats the masters food thou who didst these things first art worthy of our lauds.
अधाक्र्णोः पर्थिवीं सन्द्र्शे दिवे यो धौतीनामहिहन्नारिणक पथः|	thou hast created earth to look upon the sky thou slaying ahi settest free the rivers paths.
तं तवा सतोमेभिरुदभिर्न वाजिनं देवं देवा अजनन सास्युक्थ्यः|	thee such a god the gods have quickened with their lauds even as a steed with waters meet for praise art thou.
यो भोजनं च दयसे च वर्धनमार्द्रादा शुष्कं मधुमद दुदोहिथ|	thou givest increase thou dealest to us our food thou milkest from the moist the dry the rich in sweets.
स शेवधिं नि दधिषे विवस्वति विश्वस्यैक ईशिषे सास्यु|	thou by the worshipper layest thy precious store thou art sole lord of all meet for our praise art thou.
यः पुष्पिणीश्च परस्वश्च धर्मणाधि दाने वयवनीरधारयः|	thou who hast spread abroad the streams by stablished law and in the field the plants that blossom and bear seed.
यश्चासमा अजनो दिद्युतो दिव उरुरूर्वानभितः स उ|	thou who hast made the matchless lightnings of the skyvast compassing vast realms meet for our praise art thou.
यो नार्मरं सहवसुं निहन्तवे पर्क्षाय च दासवेशाय चावहः|	who broughtest nārmara with all his wealth for sake of food to slay him that the fiends might be destroyed.
ऊर्जयन्त्या अपरिविष्टमास्यमुतैवाद्य पुरुक्र्त्स उ|	broughtest the face unclouded of the strengthening one performing much even now worthy art thou of praise.
शतं वा यस्य दश साकमाद्य एकस्य शरुष्टौ यद धचोदमाविथ|	thou boundest up the dāsas hundred friends and ten when at ones hearing thou helpest thy worshipper.
अरज्जौ दस्यून समुनब दभीतये सुप्राव्योभवः स उ|	thou for dabhīti boundest dasyus not with cords thou wast a mighty help worthy of lauds art thou.
विश्वेदनु रोधना अस्य पौंस्यं ददुरस्मै दधिरे कर्त्नवे धनम|	all banks of rivers yielded to his manly might to him they gave to him the strong gave up their wealth.
षळ अस्तभ्ना विष्टिरः पञ्च सन्द्र्शः परिपरो अभवः स उ|	the six directions hast thou fixed a fivefold view thy victories reached afar worthy of lauds art thou.
सुप्रवाचनं तव वीर वीर्यं यदेकेन करतुना विन्दसे वसु|	meet for high praise o hero is thy power that with thy single wisdom thou obtainest wealth.
जातूष्ठिरस्य पर वयः सहस्वतो या चकर्थ सेन्द्र विश्वास्युक्थ्यः|	the lifesupport of conquering jātūṣṭhira indra for all thy deeds worthy of lauds art thou.
अरमयः सरपसस्तराय कं तुर्वीतये च वय्याय च सरुतिम|	thou for turvīti heldest still the flowing floods the riverstream for vayya easily to pass.
नीचा सन्तमुदनयः पराव्र्जं परान्धं शरोणं शरवयन स उ|	didst raise the outcast from the depths and gavest fame unto the halt and blind worthy of lauds art thou.
अस्मभ्यं तद वसो दानाय राधः समर्थयस्व बहु ते वसव्यम|	prepare thyself to grant us that great bounty o vasu for abundant is thy treasure.
इन्द्र यच्चित्रं शरवस्या अनु दयून बर्हद वदेम व स|	snatch up the wonderful o indra daily loud may we speak with heroes in assembly.
इन्धानो अग्निं वनवद वनुष्यतः कर्तब्रह्मा शूशुवद रातहव्य इत|	he lighting up the flame shall conquer enemies strong shall he be who offers prayer and brings his gift.
जातेन जातमति स पर सर्स्र्ते यंयं युजंक्र्णुते बरह्मणस पतिः|	he with his seed spreads forth beyond anothers seed whomever brahmaṇaspati takes for his friend.
वीरेभिर्वीरान वनवद वनुष्यतो गोभी रयिं पप्रथद बोधति तमना|	with heroes he shall overcome his hero foes and spread his wealth by kine wise by himself is be.
तोकं च तस्य तनयं च वर्धते यंयं|	his children and his childrens children grow in strength whomever brahmaṇaspati takes for his friend.
सिन्धुर्न कषोदः शिमीवान रघायतो वर्षेव वध्रीन्रभि वष्ट्योजसा|	he mighty like a raving rivers billowy flood as a bull conquers oxen overcomes with strength.
अग्नेरिव परसितिर्नाह वर्तवे यंयं|	like agnis blazing rush he may not be restrained whomever brahmaṇaspati takes for his friend.
तस्मा अर्षन्ति दिव्या असश्चतः स सत्वभिः परथमो गोषुगछति|	for him the floods of heaven flow never failing down first with the heroes he goes forth to war for kine.
अनिभ्र्ष्टतविषिर्हन्त्योजसा यंयं|	he slays in unabated vigour with great might whomever brahmaṇaspati takes for his friend.
तस्मा इद विश्वे धुनयन्त सिन्धवोअछिद्रा शर्म दधिरे पुरूणि|	all roaring rivers pour their waters down for him and many a flawless shelter hath been granted him.
देवानां सुम्ने सुभगः स एधते यंयं|	blest with the happiness of gods he prospers well whomever brahmaṇaspati takes for his friend.
गणानां तवा गणपतिं हवामहे कविं कवीनामुपमश्रवस्तमम|	we call thee lord and leader of the heavenly hosts the wise among the wise the famousest of all.
जयेष्ठराजं बरह्मणां बरह्मणस पत आ नः षर्ण्वन्नूतिभिः सीद सादनम|	the king supreme of prayers o brahmaṇaspati hear us with help sit down in place of sacrifice.
देवाश्चित ते असुर्य परचेतसो बर्हस्पते यज्ञियं भागमानशुः|	bṛhaspati god immortal verily the gods have gained from thee the wise a share in holy rites.
उस्रा इव सूर्यो जयोतिषा महो विश्वेषामिज्जनिता बरह्मणामसि|	as with great light the sun brings forth the rays of morn so thou alone art father of all sacred prayer.
आ विबाध्या परिरापस्तमांसि च जयोतिष्मन्तं रथं रतस्य तिष्ठसि|	when thou hast chased away revilers and the gloom thou mountest the refulgent car of sacrifice.
बर्हस्पते भीमममित्रदम्भनं रक्षोहणंगोत्रभिदं सवर्विदम|	the awful car bṛhaspati that quells the foe slays demons cleaves the stall of kine and finds the light.
सुनीतिभिर्नयसि तरायसे जनं यस्तुभ्यं दाशान न तमंहो अश्नवत|	thou leadest with good guidance and preservest men distress oertakes not him who offers gifts to thee.
बरह्मद्विषस्तपनो मन्युमीरसि बर्हस्पते महि तत ते महित्वनम|	him who hates prayer thou punishest bṛhaspati quelling his wrath herein is thy great mightiness.
न तमंहो न दुरितं कुतश्चन नारातयस्तितिरुर्न दवयाविनः|	no sorrow no distress from any side no foes no creatures doubletongued have overcome the man.
विश्वा इदस्माद धवरसो वि बाधसे यं सुगोपा रक्षसि बरह्मणस पते|	thou drivest all seductive fiends away from him whom careful guard thou keepest brahmaṇaspati.
तवं नो गोपाः पथिक्र्द विचक्षणस्तव वरताय मतिभिर्जरामहे|	thou art our keeper wise preparer of our paths we for thy service sing to thee with hymns of praise.
बर्हस्पते यो नो अभि हवरो दधे सवा तं मर्मर्तु दुछुना हरस्वती|	bṛhaspati whoever lays a snare for us him may his evil fate precipitate destroy.
उत वा यो नो मर्चयादनागसोअरातीवा मर्तः सानुको वर्कः|	him too who threatens us without offence of ours the evilminded arrogant rapacious man.
बर्हस्पते अप तं वर्तया पथः सुगं नो अस्यै देववीतये कर्धि|	him turn thou from our path away bṛhaspati give us fair access to this banquet of the gods.
तरातारं तवा तनूनां हवामहेअवस्पर्तरधिवक्तारमस्मयुम|	thee as protector of our bodies we invoke thee saviour as the comforter who loveth us.
बर्हस्पते देवनिदो नि बर्हय मा दुरेवा उत्तरं सुम्नमुन नशन|	strike o bṛhaspati the gods revilers down and let not the unrighteous come to highest bliss.
तवया वयं सुव्र्धा बरह्मणस पते सपार्हा वसु मनुष्या ददीमहि|	through thee kind prosperer o brahmaṇaspati may we obtain the wealth of men which all desire.
या नो दूरे तळितो या अरातयोअभि सन्ति जम्भया ता अनप्नसः|	and all our enemies who near or far away prevail against us crush and leave them destitute.
तवया वयमुत्तमं धीमहे वयो बर्हस्पते पप्रिणा सस्निना युजा|	with thee as our own rich and liberal ally may we bṛhaspati gain highest power of life.
मा नो दुःशंसो अभिदिप्सुरीशत पर सुशंसा मतिभिस्तारिषीमहि|	let not the guileful wicked man be lord of usstill may we prosper singing goodly hymns of praise.
अनानुदो वर्षभो जग्मिराहवं निष्टप्ता शत्रुं पर्तनासुसासहिः|	strong never yielding hastening to the battlecry consumer of the foe victorious in the strife.
असि सत्य रणया बरह्मणस पत उग्रस्य चिद दमिता वीळुहर्षिणः|	thou art sins true avenger brahmaṇaspati who tamest een the fierce the wildly passionate.
अदेवेन मनसा यो रिशण्यति शासामुग्रो मन्यमानो जिघांसति|	whoso with mind ungodly seeks to do us harm who deeming him a man of might mid lords would slay.
बर्हस्पते म परणक तस्य नो वधो नि कर्म मन्युं दुरेवस्य शर्धतः|	let not his deadly blow reach us bṛhaspati may we humiliate the strong illdoers wrath.
भरेषु हव्यो नमसोपसद्यो गन्ता वाजेषु सनिता धनं धनम|	the mover mid the spoil the winner of all wealth to be invoked in fight and reverently adored.
विश्वा इदर्यो अभिदिप्स्वो मर्धो बर्हस्पतिर्वि ववर्हा रथां इव|	bṛhaspati hath overthrown like cars of war all wicked enemies who fain would injure us.
तेजिष्थया तपनि रक्षसस्तप ये तवा निदे दधिरे दर्ष्टवीर्यम|	burn up the demons with thy fiercest flaming brand those who have scorned thee in thy manifested might.
आविस्तत कर्ष्व यदसत त उक्थ्यं बर्हस्पते वि परिरापो अर्दय|	show forth that power that shall deserve the hymn of praise destroy the evil speakers o bṛhaspati.
बर्हस्पते अति यदर्यो अर्हाद दयुमद विभाति करतुमज्जनेषु|	bṛhaspati that which the foe deserves not which shines among the folk effectual splendid.
यद दीदयच्छवस रतप्रजात तदस्मसु दरविणं धेहिचित्रम|	that son of law i which is with might refulgentthat treasure wonderful bestow thou on us.
मा न सतेनेभ्यो ये अभि दरुहस पदे निरामिणो रिपवोअन्नेषु जाग्र्धुः|	give us not up to those who foes in ambuscade are greedy for the wealth of him who sits at ease.
आ देवानामोहते वि वरयो हर्दि बर्हस्पते नपरः साम्नो विदुः|	who cherish in their heart abandonment of gods bṛhaspati no further rest shall they obtain.
विश्वेभ्यो हि तवा भुवनेभ्यस परि तवष्टाजनत साम्नः साम्नः कविः|	for tvaṣṭar he who knows each sacred song brought thee to life preeminent oer all the things that be.
स रणचिद रणया बरह्मणस पतिर्द्रुहो हन्ता मह रतस्य धर्तरि|	guiltscourger guiltavenger is bṛhaspati who slays the spoiler and upholds the mighty law.
तव शरिये वयजिहीत पर्वतो गवां गोत्रमुदस्र्जो यदङगिरः|	the mountain for thy glory cleft itself apart when aṅgiras thou openedst the stall of kine.
इन्द्रेण युजा तमसा परीव्र्तं बर्हस्पते निरपामौब्जो अर्णवम|	thou o bṛhaspati with indra for ally didst hurl down waterfloods which gloom had compassed round.
बरह्मणस पते तवमस्य यन्ता सूक्तस्य बोधि तनयं च जिन्व|	o brahmaṇaspati be thou controller of this our hymn and prosper thou our children.
विश्वं तद भद्रं यदवन्ति देवा बर्हद वदेम|	all that the gods regard with love is blessed loud may we speak with heroes in assembly.
कनिक्रदज्जनुषं परब्रुवाण इयर्ति वाचमरितेव नावम|	telling his race aloud with cries repeated he sends his voice out as his boat a steersman.
सुमङगलश्च शकुने भवासि मा तवा का चिदभिभा विश्व्या विदत|	o bird be ominous of happy fortune from no side may calamity befall thee.
मा तवा शयेन उद वधीन मा सुपर्णो मा तवा विददिषुमान्वीरो अस्ता|	let not the falcon kill thee nor the eagle let not the arrowbearing archer reach thee.
पित्र्यामनु परदिशं कनिक्रदत सुमङगलो भद्रवादी वदेह|	still crying in the region of the fathers speak here auspicious bearing joyful tidings.
अव करन्द दक्षिणतो गर्हाणां सुमङगलो भद्रवादी शकुन्ते|	bringing good tidings bird of happy omen call thou out loudly southward of our dwellings.
मा न सतेन ईशत माघशंसो बर्हद|	so that no thief no sinner may oppress us loud may we speak with heroes in assembly.
यो जात एव परथमो मनस्वान देवो देवान करतुना पर्यभूषत|	he who just born chief god of lofty spirit by power and might became the gods protector.
यस्य शुष्माद रोदसी अभ्यसेतां नर्म्णस्य मह्ना स जनास इन्द्रः|	before whose breath through greatness of his valour the two worlds trembled he o men is indra.
यः पर्थिवीं वयथमानामद्रंहद यः पर्वतान परकुपितानरम्णात|	he who fixed fast and firm the earth that staggered and set at rest the agitated mountains.
यो अन्तरिक्षं विममे वरीयो यो दयामस्तभ्नात स जनास इन्द्रः|	who measured out the airs wide middle region and gave the heaven support he men is indra.
यो हत्वाहिमरिणात सप्त सिन्धून यो गा उदाजदपधा वलस्य|	who slew the dragon freed the seven rivers and drove the kine forth from the cave of vala.
यो अश्मनोरन्तरग्निं जजान संव्र्क समत्सु स ज इ|	begat the fire between two stones the spoiler in warriors battle he o men is indra.
येनेमा विश्वा चयवना कर्तानि यो दासं वर्णमधरंगुहाकः|	by whom this universe was made to tremble who chased away the humbled brood of demons.
शवघ्नीव यो जिगीवान लक्षमाददर्यः पुष्टानि स ज इ|	who like a gambler gathering his winnings seized the foes riches he o men is indra.
यं समा पर्छन्ति कुह सेति घोरमुतेमाहुर्नैषो अस्तीत्येनम|	of whom the terrible they ask where is he or verily they say of him he is not.
सो अर्यः पुष्तीर्विज इवा मिनाति शरदस्मै धत्तस ज इ|	he sweeps away like birds the foes possessions have faith in him for he o men is indra.
यो रध्रस्य चोदिता यः कर्शस्य यो बरह्मणो नाधमानस्यकीरेः|	stirrer to action of the poor and lowly of priest of suppliant who sings his praises.
युक्तग्राव्णो योअविता सुशिप्रः सुतसोमस्य स ज इ|	who fairfaced favours him who presses soma with stones made ready he o men is indra.
यस्याश्वासः परदिशि यस्य गावो यस्य गरामा यस्य विश्वे रथासः|	he under whose supreme control are horses all chariots and the villages and cattle.
यः सूर्यं य उषसं जजान यो अपां नेता स ज इ|	he who gave being to the sun and morning who leads the waters he o men is indra.
यं करन्दसी संयती विह्वयेते परेअवर उभया अमित्राः|	to whom two armies cry in close encounter both enemies the stronger and the weaker.
समानं चिद रथमातस्थिवांसा नाना हवेते स ज इ|	whom two invoke upon one chariot mounted each for himself he o ye men is indra.
यस्मान न रते विजयन्ते जनासो यं युध्यमाना अवसे हवन्ते|	without whose help our people never conquer whom battling they invoke to give them succour.
यो विश्वस्य परतिमानं बभूव यो अच्युतच्युत स ज इ|	he of whom all this world is but the copy who shakes things moveless he o men is indra.
यः शश्वतो मह्येनो दधानानमन्यमानाञ्छर्वा जघान|	he who hath smitten ere they knew their danger with his hurled weapon many grievous sinners.
यः शर्धते नानुददाति शर्ध्यां यो दस्योर्हन्तास ज इ|	who pardons not his boldness who provokes him who slays the dasyu he o men is indra.
यः शम्बरं पर्वतेषु कषियन्तं चत्वारिंश्यां शरद्यन्वविन्दत|	he who discovered in the fortieth autumn Śambara as he dwelt among the mountains.
ओजायमानं यो अहिं जघान दानुं शयानंस ज इ|	who slew the dragon putting forth his vigour the demon lying there he men is indra.
यः सप्तरश्मिर्व्र्षभस्तुविष्मानवास्र्जत सर्तवे सप्तसिन्धून|	who with seven guiding reins the bull the mighty set free the seven great floods to flow at pleasure.
यो रौहिणमस्फुरद वज्रबाहुर्द्यामारोहन्तंस ज इ|	who thunderarmed rent rauhiṇa in pieces when scaling heaven he o ye men is indra.
दयावा चिदस्मै पर्थिवी नमेते शुष्माच्चिदस्य पर्वता भयन्ते|	even the heaven and earth bow down before him before his very breath the mountains tremble.
यः सोमपा निचितो वज्रबाहुर्यो वज्रहस्तः स ज इ|	known as the somadrinker armed with thunder who wields the bolt he o ye men is indra.
यः सुन्वन्तमवति यः पचन्तं यः शंसन्तं यः शशमानमूती|	who aids with favour him who pours the soma and him who brews it sacrificer singer.
यस्य बरह्म वर्धनं यस्य सोमो यस्येदं राधः स ज इ|	whom prayer exalts and pouring forth of soma and this our gift he o ye men is indra.
यः सुन्वते पचते दुध्र आ चिद वाजं दर्दर्षि स किलासि सत्यः|	thou verily art fierce and true who sendest strength to the man who brews and pours libation.
वयं त इन्द्र विश्वह परियासः सुवीरासो विदथमा वदेम|	so may we evermore thy friends o indra speak loudly to the synod with our heroes.
धारावरा मरुतो धर्ष्ण्वोजसो मर्गा न भीमास्तविषीभिरर्चिनः|	the maruts of resistless might who love the rain resplendent terrible like wild beasts in their strength.
अग्नयो न शुशुचाना रजीषिणो भर्मिं धमन्तोप गा अव्र्ण्वत|	glowing like flames of fire impetuous in career blowing the wandering raincloud have disclosed the kine.
दयावो न सत्र्भिश्चितयन्त खादिनो वयभ्रिया न दयुतयन्तव्र्ष्टयः|	they gleam with armlets as the heavens are decked with stars like cloudborn lightnings shine the torrents of their rain.
रुद्रो यद वो मरुतो रुक्मवक्षसो वर्षाजनि पर्श्न्याः शुक्र ऊधनि|	since the strong rudra o maruts with brilliant chests sprang into life for you in pṛśnis radiant lap.
उक्षन्ते अश्वानत्यानिवाजिषु नदस्य कर्णैस्तुरयन्त आशुभिः|	they drip like horses in the racings of swift steeds with the streams rapid cars they hasten on their way.
हिरण्यशिप्रा मरुतो दविध्वतः पर्क्षं याथ पर्षतीभिः समन्यवः|	maruts with helms of gold ye who make all things shake come with your spotted deer oneminded to our food.
पर्क्षे ता विश्वा भुवना ववक्षिरे मित्राय वा सदमा जीरदानवः|	they have bestowed of mitra all that live to feed they who for evermore cause their swift drops to flow.
पर्षदश्वासो अनवभ्रराधस रजिप्यासो न वयुनेषु धूर्षदः|	whose steeds are spotted deer whose riches never fail like horses in full speed bound to the pole in work.
इन्धन्वभिर्धेनुभी रप्शदूधभिरध्वस्मभिः पथिभिर्भ्राजद्र्ष्टयः|	with brightlyflaming kine whose udders swell with milk with glittering lances on your unobstructed paths.
आ हंसासो न सवसराणि गन्तन मधोर्मदाय मरुतः समन्यवः|	o maruts of one mind like swans who seek their nests come to the rapturous enjoyment of the meath.
आ नो बरह्माणि मरुतः समन्यवो नरां न शंसः सवनानि गन्तन|	to these our prayers o maruts come unanimous come ye to our libations like the praise of men.
अश्वामिव पिप्यत धेनुमूधनि कर्ता धियं जरित्रे वाजपेशसम|	make it swell like a mare in udder like a cow and for the singer grace the song with plenteous strength.
तं नो दात मरुतो वाजिनं रथ आपानं बरह्म चितयद दिवेदिवे|	give us a steed o maruts mighty in the car prevailing prayer that brings remembrance day by day.
इषं सतोत्र्भ्यो वर्जनेषु कारवे सनिं मेधामरिष्टं दुष्टरं सहः|	food to your praisers to your bard in deeds of might give winning wisdom power uninjured unsurpassed.
यद युञ्जते मरुतो रुक्मवक्षसोअश्वान रथेषु भग आ सुदानवः|	when the brightchested maruts lavish of their gifts bind at the time bliss their horses to the cars.
धेनुर्न शिश्वे सवसरेषु पिन्वते जनाय रातहविषे महीमिषम|	then as the milchcow feeds her calf within the stalls they pour forth food for all oblationbringing men.
यो नो मरुतो वर्कताति मर्त्यो रिपुर्दधे वसवो रक्षता रिषः|	save us o maruts vasus from the injurer the mortal foe who makes us looked upon as wolves.
वर्तयत तपुषा चक्रियाभि तमव रुद्रा अशसो हन्तना वधः|	with chariot all aflame compass him round about o rudras cast away the foemans deadly bolt.
चित्रं तद वो मरुतो याम चेकिते पर्श्न्या यदूधरप्यापयो दुहुः|	wellknown ye maruts is that wondrous course of yours when they milked pṛśnis udder close akin to her.
यद वा निदे नवमानस्य रुद्रियास्त्रितं जरायजुरतामदाभ्याः|	or when to shame the bard who lauded rudras sons ye o infallible brought trita to decay.
तान वो महो मरुत एवयाव्नो विष्णोरेषस्य परभ्र्थे हवामहे|	we call you such great maruts following wonted ways to the oblation paid to viṣṇu speederon.
हिरण्यवर्णान ककुहान यतस्रुचो बरह्मण्यन्तः शंस्यं राध ईमहे|	with ladles lifted up with prayer we seek of them preeminent goldenhued the wealth which all extol.
ते दशग्वाः परथमा यज्ञमूहिरे ते नो हिन्वन्तूषसो वयुष्टिषु|	they the daśagvas first of all brought sacrifice they at the break of mornings shall inspirit us.
उषा न रामीररुणैरपोर्णुते महो जयोतिषाशुचता गोर्णसा|	dawn with her purple beams uncovereth the nights with great light glowing like a billowy sea of milk.
ते कषोणीभिररुणेभिर्नाञ्जिभी रुद्रा रतस्य सदनेषुवाव्र्धुः|	the rudras have rejoiced them in the gathered bands at seats of worship as in purple ornaments.
निमेघमाना अत्येन पाजसा सुश्चन्द्रं वर्णन्दधिरे सुपेशसम|	they with impetuous vigour sending down the rain have taken to themselves a bright and lovely hue.
तानियानो महि वरूथमूतय उप घेदेना नमसा गर्णीमसि|	soliciting their high protection for our help with this our adoration we sing praise to them.
तरितो न यान पञ्च होतॄनभिष्टय आववर्तदवराञ्चक्रियावसे|	whom for assistance like the five terrestrial priests trita hath brought to aid us hither on his car.
यया रध्रं पारयथात्यंहो यया निदो मुञ्चथ वन्दितारम|	so may your favouring help be turned to usward your kindness like a lowing cow approach us.
अर्वाची सा मरुतो या व ऊतिरो षु वाश्रेव सुमतिर्जिगातु|	wherewith ye bear your servant over trouble and free your worshipper from scoff and scorning.
आ ते पितर्मरुतां सुम्नमेतु मा नः सूर्यस्य सन्द्र्षो युयोथाः|	father of maruts let thy bliss approach us exclude us not from looking on the sunlight.
अभि नो वीरो अर्वति कषमेत पर जायेमहि रुद्र परजाभिः|	gracious to our fleet courser be the hero may we transplant us rudra in our children.
तवादत्तेभी रुद्र शन्तमेभिः शतं हिमा अशीय भेषजेभिः|	with the most saving medicines which thou givest rudra may i attain a hundred winters.
वयस्मद दवेषो वितरं वयंहो वयमीवाश्चातयस्वा विषूचीः|	far from us banish enmity and hatred and to all quarters maladies and trouble.
शरेष्ठो जातस्य रुद्र शरियासि तवस्तमस्तवसां वज्रबाहो|	chief of all born art thou in glory rudra armed with the thunder mightiest of the mighty.
पर्षि णः पारमंहसः सवस्ति विश्वा अभीती रपसो युयोधि|	transport us over trouble to wellbeing repel thou from us all assaults of mischief.
मा तवा रुद्र चुक्रुधामा नमोभिर्मा दुष्टुती वर्षभ मासहूती|	let us not anger thee with worship rudra ill praise strong god or mingled invocation.
उन नो वीरानर्पय भेषजेभिर्भिषक्तमं तवा भिषजां शर्णोमि|	do thou with strengthening balms incite our heroes i hear thee famed as best of all physicians.
हवीमभिर्हवते यो हविर्भिरव सतोमेभी रुद्रं दिषीय|	may i with praisesongs win that rudras favour who is adored with gifts and invocations.
रदूदरः सुहवो मा नो अस्यै बभ्रुः सुशिप्रो रीरधन मनायै|	neer may the tawny god fairchecked and gracious swifthearing yield us to this evil purpose.
उन मा ममन्द वर्षभो मरुत्वान तवक्षीयसा वयसा नाधमानम|	the strong begirt by maruts hath refreshed me with most invigorating food imploring.
घर्णीव छायामरपा अशीया विवासेयं रुद्रस्य सुम्नम|	as he who finds a shade in fervent sunlight may i uninjured win the bliss of rudra.
कव सय ते रुद्र मर्ळयाकुर्हस्तो यो अस्ति भेषजो जलाषः|	where is that gracious hand of thine o rudra the hand that giveth health and bringeth comfort.
अपभर्ता रपसो दैव्यस्याभी नु मा वर्षभ चक्षमीथाः|	remover of the woe that gods have sent us o strong one look thou on me with compassion.
पर बभ्रवे वर्षभाय शवितीचे महो महीं सुष्टुतिमीरयामि|	to him the strong great tawny faircomplexioned i utter forth a mighty hymn of praises.
नमस्या कल्मलीकिनं नमोभिर्ग्र्णीमसि तवेषं रुद्रस्य नाम|	we serve the brilliant god with adorations we glorify the splendid name of rudra.
सथिरेभिरङगैः पुरुरूप उग्रो बभ्रुः शुक्रेभिः पिपिशेहिरण्यैः|	with firm limbs multiform the strong the tawny adorns himself with bright gold decorations.
ईशानादस्य भुवनस्य भूरेर्न वा उ योषद रुद्रादसुर्यम|	the strength of godhead neer departs from rudra him who is sovran of this world the mighty.
अर्हन बिभर्षि सायकानि धन्वार्हन निष्कं यजतं विश्वरूपम|	worthy thou carriest thy bow and arrows worthy thy manyhued and honoured necklace.
अर्हन्निदं दयसे विश्वमभ्वं न वा ओजीयो रुद्र तवदस्ति|	worthy thou cuttest here each fiend to pieces a mightier than thou there is not rudra.
सतुहि शरुतं गर्तसदं युवानं मर्गं न भीममुपहत्नुमुग्रम|	praise him the chariotborne the young the famous fierce slaying like a dread beast of the forest.
मर्ला जरित्रे रुद्र सतवानोअन्यं ते अस्मन नि वपन्तु सेनाः|	o rudra praised be gracious to the singer let thy hosts spare us and smite down another.
कुमारश्चित पितरं वन्दमानं परति नानाम रुद्रोपयन्तम|	i bend to thee as thou approachest rudra even as a boy before the sire who greets him.
भूरेर्दातारं सत्पतिं गर्णीषे सतुतस्त्वं भेषजा रास्यस्मे|	i praise thee bounteous giver lord of heroes give medicines to us as thou art lauded.
या वो भेषजा मरुतः शुचीनि या शन्तमा वर्षणो या मयोभु|	of your pure medicines o potent maruts those that are wholesomest and healthbestowing.
