पर्जन्याय पर गायत दिवस पुत्राय मीळ्हुषे|	sing forth and laud parjanya son of heaven who sends the gift of rain.
स नो यवसमिछतु|	may he provide our pasturage.
यो गर्भमोषधीनां गवां कर्णोत्यर्वताम|	parjanya is the god who forms in kine in mares in plants of earth.
पर्जन्यःपुरुषीणाम|	and womankind the germ of life.
तस्मा इदास्ये हविर्जुहोता मधुमत्तमम|	offer and pour into his mouth oblation rich in savoury juice.
इळां नः संयतं करत|	may he for ever give us food.
शं न इन्द्राग्नी भवतामवोभिः शं न इन्द्रावरुणा रातहव्या|	befriend us with their aids indra and agni indra and varuṇa who receive oblations.
शमिन्द्रासोमा सुविताय शं योः शं न इन्द्रापूषणा वाजसातौ|	indra and soma give health strength and comfort indra and pūṣan be our help in battle.
शं नो भगः शमु नः शंसो अस्तु शं नः पुरन्धिःशमु सन्तु रायः|	auspicious friends to us be bhaga sathsa auspicious be purandhi aid all riches.
शं नः सत्यस्य सुयमस्य शंसःशं नो अर्यमा पुरुजातो अस्तु|	the blessing of the true and wellconducted and aryaman in many forms apparent.
शं नो धाता शमु धर्ता नो अस्तु शं न उरूची भवतुस्वधाभिः|	kind unto us he maker and sustainer and the farreaching pair with godlike natures.
शं रोदसी बर्हती शं नो अद्रिः शं नोदेवानां सुहवानि सन्तु|	auspicious unto us be earth and heaven the mountain and the gods fair invocations.
शं नो अग्निर्ज्योतिरनीको अस्तु शं नो मित्रावरुणावश्विना शम|	favour us agni with his face of splendour and varuva and mitra and the aśvins.
शं नः सुक्र्तां सुक्र्तानि सन्तु शं न इषिरोभि वातु वातः|	favour us noble actions of the pious impetuous vita blow on us with favour.
शं नो दयावाप्र्थिवी पूर्वहूतौ शमन्तरिक्षं दर्शयेनो अस्तु|	early invoked may heaven and earth be friendly and airs midregion good for us to look on.
शं न ओषधीर्वनिनो भवन्तु शं नो रजसस पतिरस्तु जिष्णुः|	to us may herbs and foresttrees be gracious gracious the lord victorious of the region.
शं न इन्द्रो वसुभिर्देवो अस्तु शमादित्येभिर्वरुणः सुशंसः|	be the god indra with the vasus friendly and with Ādityas varuṇa who blesseth.
शं नो रुद्रो रुद्रेभिर्जलाषः शं नस्त्वष्टा गनाभिरिह शर्णोतु|	kind with the rudras be the healer rudra and with the dames may tvaṣṭar kindly listen.
शं नः सोमो भवतु बरह्म शं नः शं नो गरावाणःशमु सन्तु यज्ञाः|	blest unto us be soma and devotions blest be the sacrifice the stones for pressing.
शं नः सवरूणां मितयो भवन्तु शं नः परस्वः शं वस्तु वेदिः|	blest be the fixing of the sacred pillars blest be the tender grass and blest the altar.
शं नः सूर्य उरुचक्षा उदेतु शं नश्चतस्रः परदिशो भवन्तु|	may the farseeing sun rise up to bless us be the four quarters of the sky auspicious.
शं नः पर्वता धरुवयो भवन्तु शं नः सिन्धवः शमु सन्त्वापः|	auspicious be the firmlyseated mountains auspicious be the rivers and the waters.
शं नो अदितिर्भवतु वरतेभिः शं नो भवन्तु मरुतः सवर्काः|	may adid through holy works be gracioas and may the maruts loud in song be friendly.
शं नो विष्णुः शं उ पूषा नो अस्तु शं नो भवित्रं शं वस्तु वायुः|	may viṣṇu give felicity and pūṣan the air that cherisheth our life and vāyu.
शं नो देवः सविता तरायमाणः शं नो भवन्तूषसो विभातीः|	prosper us savitar the god who rescues and let the radiant mornings be propitious.
शं नः पर्जन्यो भवतु परजाभ्यः शं नःक्षेत्रस्य पतिरस्तु शम्भुः|	auspicious to all creatures be parjanya auspicious be the fields benign protector.
शं नो देवा विश्वदेवा भवन्तु शं सरस्वती सह धीभिरस्तु|	may all the fellowship of gods befriend us sarasvatī with holy thoughts be gracious.
शमभिषाचः शमु रातिषाचः शं नो दिव्याः पार्थिवाः शं नो अप्याः|	friendly be they the liberal ones who seek us yea those who dwell in heaven on earth in waters.
शं नः सत्यस्य पतयो भवन्तु शं नो अर्वन्तः शमु सन्तु गावः|	may the great lords of truth protect and aid us blest to us be our horses and our cattle.
शं न रभवः सुक्र्तः सुहस्ताः शं नो भवन्तु पितरो हवेषु|	kind be the pious skilfulhanded Ṛbhus kind be the fathers at our invocations.
शं नो अज एकपाद देवो अस्तु शं नोअहिर्बुध्न्यः शं समुद्रः|	may ajaekapād the god be gracious gracious the dragon of the deep and ocean.
शं नो अपां नपात पेरुरस्तु शं नः पर्श्निर्भवतु देवगोपा|	gracious be he the swelling child of waters gracious be pṛśni who hath gods to guard her.
आदित्या रुद्रा वसवो जुषन्तेदं बरह्म करियमाणं नवीयः|	so may the rudras vasus and Ādityas accept the new hymn which we now are making.
शर्ण्वन्तु नि दिव्याः पार्थिवासो गोजाता उत ये यज्ञियासः|	may all the holy ones of earth and heaven and the cows offipring hear our invocation.
ये देवानां यज्ञिया यज्ञियानां मनोर्यजत्रा अम्र्ता रतज्ञाः|	they who of holy gods are very holy immortal knowing law whom man must worship.
ते नो रासन्तामुरुगायमद्य यूयं पात|	may these today give us broad paths to travel preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
आ वां राजानावध्वरे वव्र्त्यां हव्येभिरिन्द्रावरुणा नमोभिः|	kings indravaruṇa i would turn you hither to this our sacrifice with gifts and homage.
पर वां घर्ताची बाह्वोर्दधाना परि तमना विषुरूपा जिगाति|	held in both arms the ladle dropping fatness goes of itself to you whose forms are varied.
युवो राष्ट्रं बर्हदिन्वति दयौर्यौ सेत्र्भिररज्जुभिः सिनीथः|	dyaus quickens and promotes your high dominion who bind with bonds not wrought of rope or cordage.
परि नो हेळो वरुणस्य वर्ज्या उरुं न इन्द्रः कर्णवदु लोकम|	far from us still be varuṇas displeasure may indra give us spacious room to dwell in.
कर्तं नो यज्ञं विदथेषु चारुं कर्तं बरह्माणि सूरिषुप्रशस्ता|	make ye our sacrifice fair amid the assemblies make ye our prayers approved among our princes.
उपो रयिर्देवजूतो न एतु पर णः सपार्हाभिरूतिभिस्तिरेतम|	may godsent riches come for our possession further ye us with your delightful succours.
अस्मे इन्द्रावरुणा विश्ववारं रयिं धत्तं वसुमन्तं पुरुक्षुम|	o indravaruṇa vouchsafe us riches with store of treasure food and every blessing.
पर य आदित्यो अन्र्ता मिनात्यमिता शूरो दयते वसूनि|	for the Āditya banisher of falsehood the hero dealeth wealth in boundless plenty.
इयमिन्द्रं वरुणमष्ट मे गीः परावत तोके तनये तूतुजाना|	may this my song reach varuṇa and indra and strongly urging win me sons and offspring.
सुरत्नासो देववीतिं गमेम यूयं पात|	to the gods banquet may we go with riches preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
उदु जयोतिरम्र्तं विश्वजन्यं विश्वानरः सविता देवो अश्रेत|	savitar god of all men hath sent upward his light designed for all mankind immortal.
करत्वा देवानामजनिष्ट चक्षुराविरकर्भुवनंविश्वमुषाः|	through the gods power that eye was first created dawn hath made all the universe apparent.
पर मे पन्था देवयाना अद्र्श्रन्नमर्धन्तो वसुभिरिष्क्र्तासः|	i see the paths which gods are wont to travel innocuous paths made ready by the vasus.
अभूदु केतुरुषसः पुरस्तात परतीच्यागादधि हर्म्येभ्यः|	eastward the flag of dawn hath been uplifted she hath come hither oer the tops of houses.
तानीदहानि बहुलान्यासन या पराचीनमुदिता सूर्यस्य|	great is in truth the number of the mornings which were aforetime at the suns uprising.
यतः परि जार इवाचरन्त्युषो दद्र्क्षे न पुनर्यतीव|	since thou o dawn hast been beheld repairing as to thy love as one no more to leave him.
त इद देवानां सधमाद आसन्न्र्तावानः कवयः पूर्व्यासः|	they were the gods companions at the banquet the ancient sages true to law eternal.
गूळ्हं जयोतिः पितरो अन्वविन्दन सत्यमन्त्रा अजनयन्नुषासम|	the fathers found the light that lay in darkness and with effectual words begat the morning.
समान ऊर्वे अधि संगतासः सं जानते न यतन्ते मिथस्ते|	meeting together in the same enclosure they strive not ofone mind one with another.
ते देवानां न मिनन्ति वरतान्यमर्धन्तो वसुभिर्यादमानाः|	they never break the gods eternal statutes and injure none in rivalry with vasus.
परति तवा सतोमैरीळते वसिष्ठा उषर्बुधः सुभगे तुष्टुवांसः|	extolling thee blest goddess the vasisthas awake at early mom with lauds implore thee.
गवां नेत्री वाजपत्नी न उछोषः सुजाते परथमा जरस्व|	leader of kine and queen of all that strengthens shine come as first to us o highborn morning.
एषा नेत्री राधसः सून्र्तानामुषा उछन्ती रिभ्यते वसिष्ठैः|	she bringeth bounty and sweet charm of voices the flushing dawn is sung by the vasisthas.
दीर्घश्रुतं रयिमस्मे दधाना यूयं पात|	giving us riches famed to distant places preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
उपो रुरुचे युवतिर्न योषा विश्वं जीवं परसुवन्ती चरायै|	she hath shone brightly like a youthful woman stirring to motion every living creature.
अभूदग्निः समिधे मानुषाणामकर्ज्योतिर्बाधमाना तमांसि|	agni hath come to feed on mortal fuel she hath made light and chased away the darkness.
विश्वं परतीची सप्रथा उदस्थाद रुशद वासो बिभ्रतीशुक्रमश्वैत|	turned to this all farspreading she hath risen and shone in brightness with white robes about her.
हिरण्यवर्णा सुद्र्शीकसन्द्र्ग गवां मातानेत्र्यह्नामरोचि|	she hath beamed forth lovely with golden colours mother of kine guide of the days she bringeth.
देवानां चक्षुः सुभगा वहन्ती शवेतं नयन्ती सुद्र्शीकमश्वम|	bearing the gods own eye auspicious lady leading her courser white and fair to look on.
उषा अदर्शि रश्मिभिर्व्यक्ता चित्रामघा विश्वमनु परभूता|	distinguished by her beanis dawn shines apparent come forth to all the world with wondrous treasure.
अन्तिवामा दूरे अमित्रमुछोर्वीं गव्यूतिमभयं कर्धी नः|	draw nigh with wealth and dawn away the foeman prepare for us wide pasture free from danger.
यावय दवेष आ भरा वसूनि चोदय राधो गर्णते मघोनि|	drive away those who hate us bring us riches pour bounty opulent lady on the singer.
अस्मे शरेष्ठेभिर्भानुभिर्वि भाह्युषो देवि परतिरन्ती न आयुः|	send thy most excellent beams to shine and light us giving us lengthened days o dawn o goddess.
इषं च नो दधती विश्ववारे गोमदश्वावद रथवच्च राधः|	granting us food thou who hast all things precious and bounty rich in chariots kine and horses.
यां तवा दिवो दुहितर्वर्धयन्त्युषः सुजाते मतिभिर्वसिष्ठाः|	o uṣas noblyborn daughter of heaven whom the vasisthas with their hymns make mighty.
सास्मासु धा रयिं रष्वं बर्हन्तं यूयं पात|	bestow thou on us vast and glorious riches preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
उपसद्याय मीळ्हुष आस्ये जुहुता हविः|	offer oblations in his mouth the bounteous gods whom we must serve.
यो नो नेदिष्ठमाप्यम|	his who is nearest kin to us.
यः पञ्च चर्षणीरभि निषसाद दमेदमे|	who for the fivefold peoples take hath seated him in every home.
कविर्ग्र्हपतिर्युवा|	wise youthful master of the house.
स नो वेदो अमात्यमग्नी रक्षतु विश्वतः|	on all sides may that agni guard our household folk and property.
उतास्मान पात्वंहसः|	may he deliver us from woe.
नवं नु सतोममग्नये दिवः शयेनाय जीजनम|	i have begotten this new hymn for agni falcon of the sky.
वस्वः कुविद वनाति नः|	will he not give us of his wealth.
सपार्हा यस्य शरियो दर्शे रयिर्वीरवतो यथा|	whose lories when he glows in front of sacrite are fair to see.
अग्रे यज्ञस्य शोचतः|	like wealth of one with hero sons.
सेमां वेतु वषट्क्र्तिमग्निर्जुषत नो गिरः|	may he enjoy this hallowed gift agni accept our songs who bears.
यजिष्ठो हव्यवाहनः|	oblations best of worshippers.
नि तवा नक्ष्य विश्पते दयुमन्तं देव धीमहि|	lord of the house whom men must seek we set thee down o worshipped onel.
सुवीरमग्न आहुत|	bright rich in heroes agni god.
कषप उस्रश्च दीदिहि सवग्नयस्त्वया वयम|	shine forth at night and morn through thee with fires are we provided well.
सुवीरस्त्वमस्मयुः|	thou rich in heroes art our friend.
उप तवा सातये नरो विप्रासो यन्ति धीतिभिः|	the men come near thee for their gain the singers with their songs of praise.
उपाक्षरासहस्रिणी|	speech thousandfold comes near to thee.
अग्नी रक्षांसि सेधति शुक्रशोचिरमर्त्यः|	bright purifier meet for praise immortal with refulgent glow.
शुचिः पावक ईड्यः|	agni drives rākṣasas away.
स नो राधांस्या भरेशानः सहसो यहो|	as such bring us abundant wealth young child of strength for this thou canst.
भगश्च दातुवार्यम|	may bhaga give us what is choice.
तवमग्ने वीरवद यशो देवश्च सविता भगः|	thou agni givest hero fame bhaga and savitar the god.
दितिश्चदाति वार्यम|	and did give us what is good.
अग्ने रक्षा णो अंहसः परति षम देव रीषतः|	agni preserve us from distress consume our enemies o god.
तपिष्ठैरजरो दह|	eternal with the hottest flames.
अधा मही न आयस्यनाध्र्ष्टो नर्पीतये|	and irresistible be thou a mighty iron fort to us.
पूर्भवा शतभुजिः|	with hundred walls for mans defence.
तवं नः पाह्यंहसो दोषावस्तरघायतः|	do thou preserve us eve and morn from sorrow from the wicked men.
दिवा नक्तमदाभ्य|	infallible by day and night.
अग्ने भव सुषमिधा समिद्ध उत बर्हिरुर्विया वि सत्र्णीताम|	agni be kindled well with proper fuel and let the grass be scattered wide about thee.
उत दवार उशतीर्वि शरयन्तामुत देवानुशत आ वहेह|	let the impatient portals be thrown open bring thou the gods impatient to come hither.
अग्ने वीहि हविषा वक्षि देवान सवध्वरा कर्णुहि जातवेदः|	taste agni serve the gods with our oblation offer good sacrifices jātavedas.
सवध्वरा करति जातवेदा यक्षद देवानम्र्तान पिप्रयच्च|	let jātavedas pay fair sacrifices worship andgratify the gods immortal.
वंस्व विश्वा वार्याणि परचेतः सत्या भवन्त्वाशिषो नोद्य|	wise god win for us things that are allgoodly and let the prayers we pray today be fruitful.
तवामु ते दधिरे हव्यवाहं देवासो अग्न ऊर्ज आ नपातम|	thee even thee the son of strength o agni those gods have made the bearer of oblations.
ते ते देवाय दाशतः सयाम महो नो रत्ना वि दध इयानः|	to thee the god may we perform our worship do thou besought grant us abundant riches.
एना वो अग्निं नमसोर्जो नपातमा हुवे|	with this my reverent hymn i call agni for you the son of strength.
परियं चेतिष्ठमरतिं सवध्वरं विश्वस्य दूतमम्र्तम|	dear wisest envoy served with noble sacrifice immortal messenger of all.
स योजते अरुषा विश्वभोजसा स दुद्रवत सवाहुतः|	his two red horses allsupporting let him yoke let him wellworshipped urge them fast.
सुब्रह्मा यज्ञः सुशमी वसूनां देवं राधो जनानाम|	then hath the sacrifice good prayers and happy end and heavenly gift of wealth to men.
उदस्य शोचिरस्थादाजुह्वानस्य मीळ्हुषः|	the flame of him the bountiful the muchinvoked hath mounted up.
उद धूमासोरुषासो दिविस्प्र्शः समग्निमिन्धते नरः|	and his redcoloured smokeclouds reach and touch the sky the men are kindling agni well.
तं तवा दूतं कर्ण्महे यशस्तमं देवाना वीतये वह|	thee thee most glorious one we make our messenger bring the gods hither to the feast.
विश्वा सूनो सहसो मर्तभोजना रास्व तद यत तवेमहे|	give us o son of strength all food that fcedeth man give that for which we pray to thee.
तवमग्ने गर्हपतिस्त्वं होता नो अध्वरे|	thou agni art the homesteads lord our herald at the sacrifice.
तवं पोता विश्ववार परचेता यक्षि वेषि च वार्यम|	lord of all boons thou art the cleanser and a sage pay worship and enjoy the good.
कर्धि रत्नं यजमानाय सुक्रतो तवं हि रत्नधा असि|	give riches to the sacrificer o most wise for thou art he who granteth wealth.
आन रते शिशीहि विश्वं रत्विजं सुशंसो यश्च दक्षते|	inspire with zeal each priest at this our solemn rite all who are skilled in singing praise.
तवे अग्ने सवाहुत परियासः सन्तु सूरयः|	o agni who art worshipped well dear let our princes he to thee.
यन्तारो ये मघवानो जनानामूर्वान दयन्त गोनाम|	our wealthy patrons who are governors of men who part as gifts their stalls of kine.
येषामिळा घर्तहस्ता दुरोण आनपि पराता निषीदति|	they in whose home her hand bearing the sacred oil iḷā sits down wellsatisfied.
तांस्त्रायस्व सहस्य दरुहो निदो यछा नः शर्म दीर्घश्रुत|	guard them victorious god from slander and from harm give us a refuge famed afar.
स मन्द्रया च जिह्वया वह्निरासा विदुष्टरः|	do thou a priest with pleasant tongue most wise and very near to us.
अग्ने रयिं मघवद्भ्यो न आ वह हव्यदातिं च सूदय|	agni bring riches hither to our liberal chiefs and speed the oflering of our gifts.
ये राधांसि ददत्यश्व्या मघा कामेन शरवसो महः|	they who bestow as bounty plenteous wealth of steeds moved by desire of great renown.
तानंहसः पिप्र्हि पर्त्र्भिष टवं शतं पूर्भिर्यविष्ठ्य|	do thou with saving help preserve them from distress most youthful with a hundred forts.
देवो वो दरविणोदाः पूर्णां विवष्ट्यासिचम|	the god who gives your wealth demands a full libation poured to him.
उद वा सिञ्चध्वमुप वा पर्णध्वमादिद वो देव ओहते|	pour ye it forth then fill the vessel full again then doth the god pay heed to you.
तं होतारमध्वरस्य परचेतसं वह्निं देवा अक्र्ण्वत|	him have the gods appointed priest of sacrifice oblationbearer passing wise.
दधाति रत्नं विधते सुवीर्यमग्निर्जनाय दाशुषे|	agni gives wealth and valour to the worshipper to folk who offer up their gifts.
न सोम इन्द्रमसुतो ममाद नाब्रह्माणो मघवानं सुतासः|	soma unpressed neer gladdened liberal indra no juices pressed without a prayer have pleased him.
तस्मा उक्थं जनये यज्जुजोषन नर्वन नवीयः शर्णवद यथा नः|	i generate a laud that shall delight him new and heroic so that he may hear us.
उक्थउक्थे सोम इन्द्रं ममाद नीथेनीथे मघवानं सुतासः|	at every laud the soma gladdens indra pressed juices please him as each psalm is chanted.
यदीं सबाधः पितरं न पुत्राः समानदक्षा अवसे हवन्ते|	what time the priests with one united effort call him to aid as sons invoke their father.
चकार ता कर्णवन नूनमन्या यानि बरुवन्ति वेधसः सुतेषु|	these deeds he did let him achieve new exploits such as the priests declare at their libations.
जनीरिव पतिरेकः समानो नि माम्र्जे पुर इन्द्रःसु सर्वाः|	indra hath taken and possessed all castles like as one common husband doth his spouses.
एवा तमाहुरुत शर्ण्व इन्द्र एको विभक्ता तरणिर्मघानाम|	even thus have they declared him famed is indra as conqueror sole distributer of treasures.
मिथस्तुर ऊतयो यस्य पूर्वीरस्मे भद्राणि सश्चतप्रियाणि|	whose many succours come in close succession may dear delightful benefits attend us.
एवा वसिष्ठ इन्द्रमूतये नॄन कर्ष्टीनां वर्षभं सुते गर्णाति|	thus to bring help to men vasiṣṭha laudeth indra the peoples hero at libation.
सहस्रिण उप नो माहि वाजान यूयं पात|	bestow upon us strength and wealth in thousands preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
उदु षय देवः सविता ययाम हिरण्ययीममतिं यामशिश्रेत|	on high hath savitar this god extended the golden lustre which he spreads around him.
नूनं भगो हव्यो मानुषेभिर्वि यो रत्ना पुरूवसुर्दधाति|	now now must bhaga be invoked by mortals lord of great riches who distributes treasures.
उदु तिष्ठ सवितः शरुध्यस्य हिरण्यपाणे परभ्र्ताव रतस्य|	rise up o savitar whose hands are golden and hear this man while sacrifice is offered.
वयुर्वीं पर्थ्वीममतिं सर्जान आ नर्भ्यो मर्तभोजनं सुवानः|	spreading afar thy broad and wide effulgence and bringing mortal men the food that feeds them.
अपि षटुतः सविता देवो अस्तु यमा चिद विश्वे वसवो गर्णन्ति|	let savitar the god he hymned with praises to whom the vasus even all sing glory.
स न सतोमान नमस्यश्चनो धाद विश्वेभिः पातु पायुभिर्नि सूरीन|	sweet be our lauds to him whose due is worship may he with all protection guard our princes.
अभि यं देव्यदितिर्ग्र्णाति सवं देवस्य सवितुर्जुषाणा|	even he whom aditi the goddess praises rejoicing in god savitars incitement.
अभि सम्राजो वरुणो गर्णन्त्यभि मित्रासो अर्यमा सजोषाः|	even he who praise the high imperial rulers varuṇa mitra aryaman sing in concert.
अभि ये मिथो वनुषः सपन्ते रातिं दिवो रातिषाचः पर्थिव्याः|	they who come emulous to our oblation dispensing bounty from the earth and heaven.
अहिर्बुध्न्य उत नः शर्णोतु वरूत्र्येकधेनुभिर्नि पातु|	may they and ahibudhnya hear our calling guard us varūtrī with the ekadhenus.
अनु तन नो जास्पतिर्मंसीष्ट रत्नं देवस्य सवितुरियानः|	this may the lord of life entreated grant usthe wealth which savitar the god possesses.
भगमुग्रोअवसे जोहवीति भगमनुग्रो अध याति रत्नम|	the mighty calls on bhaga for protection on bhaga calls the weak to give him riches.
शं नो भवन्तु वाजिनो हवेषु देवताता मितद्रवः सवर्काः|	bless us the vajins when we call while slowly they move strong singers to the gods assembly.
जम्भयन्तोअहिं वर्कं रक्षांसि सनेम्यस्मद युयवन्नमीवाः|	crushing the wolf the serpent and the demons may they completely banish all affliction.
वाजेवाजेअवत वाजिनो नो धनेषु विप्रा अम्र्ता रतज्ञाः|	deepskilled in law eternal deathless singers o vajins help us in each fray for booty.
अस्य मध्वः पिबत मादयध्वं तर्प्ता यात पथिभिर्देवयानैः|	drink of this meath he satisfied be joyful then go on paths which gods are wont to travel.
पर कषोदसा धायसा सस्र एषा सरस्वती धरुणमायसी पूः|	this stream sarasvatī with fostering current comes forth our sure defence our fort of iron.
परबाबधाना रथ्येव याति विश्वा अपो महिना सिन्धुरन्याः|	as on a car the flood flows on surpassing in majesty and might all other waters.
एकाचेतत सरस्वती नदीनां शुचिर्यती गिरिभ्य आ समुद्रात|	pure in her course from mountains to the ocean alone of streams sarasvatī hath listened.
रायश्चेतन्ती भुवनस्य भूरेर्घ्र्तं पयो दुदुहे नाहुषाय|	thinking of wealth and the great world of creatures she poured for nahuṣa her milk and fatness.
स वाव्र्धे नर्यो योषणासु वर्षा शिशुर्व्र्षभो यज्ञियासु|	friendly to man he grew among the women a strong young steer amid the holy ladies.
स वाजिनं मघवद्भ्यो दधाति वि सातये तन्वं माम्र्जीत|	he gives the fleet steed to our wealthy princes and decks their bodies for success in battle.
उत सया नः सरस्वती जुषाणोप शरवत सुभगा यज्णे अस्मिन|	may this sarasvatī be pleased and listen at this our sacrifice auspicious lady.
मितज्ञुभिर्नमस्यैरियाना राया युजा चिदुत्तरा सखिभ्यः|	when we with reverence on our knees implore her closeknit to wealth most kind to those she loveth.
इमा जुह्वाना युष्मदा नमोभिः परति सतोमं सरस्वति जुषस्व|	these offerings have ye made with adoration say this sarasvatī and accept our praises.
तव शर्मन परियतमे दधाना उप सथेयाम शरणं न वर्क्षम|	and placing us under thy dear protection may we approach thee as a tree for shelter.
अयमु ते सरस्वति वसिष्ठो दवाराव रतस्य सुभगे वयावः|	for thee o blest sarasvatī vasiṣṭha hath here unbarred the doors d sacred order.
वर्ध शुभ्रे सतुवते रासि वाजान यूयं पात|	wax bright one and give strength to him who lauds thee preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
रभुक्षणो वाजा मादयध्वमस्मे नरो मघवानः सुतस्य|	ye liberal heroes vājas and Ṛbhukṣans come and delight you with our flowing soma.
आ वोअर्वाचः करतवो न यातां विभ्वो रथं नर्यं वर्तयन्तु|	may your strength vibhus as ye come to meet us turn hitherward your car that brings men profit.
रभुरभुभिरभि वः सयाम विभ्वो विभुभिः शवसा शवांसि|	may we as Ṛbhu with your Ṛbhus conquer strength with our strength as vibhus with the vibhus.
वाजो अस्मानवतु वाजसाताविन्द्रेण युजा तरुषेमव्र्त्रम|	may vāja aid us in the fight for booty and helped by indra may we quell the foeman.
ते चिद धि पूर्वीरभि सन्ति शासा विश्वानर्य उपरताति वन्वन|	for they rule many tribes with high dominion and conquer all their foes in close encounter.
इन्द्रो विभ्वान रभुक्षा वाजो अर्यः शत्रोर्मिथत्या कर्णवन वि नर्म्णम|	may indra vibhvan vāja and Ṛbhukṣan destroy by turns the wicked foemans valour.
नू देवासो वरिवः कर्तना नो भूत नो विश्वेअवसे सजोषाः|	now deities give us ample room and freedom be all of you oneminded our protection.
समस्मे इषं वसवो ददीरन यूयं पात|	so let the vasus grant us strength and vigour preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
पराग्नये तवसे भरध्वं गिरं दिवो अरतये पर्थिव्याः|	bring forth your song of praise to mighty agni the speedy messenger of earth and heaven.
यो विश्वेषामम्र्तानामुपस्थे वैश्वानरो वाव्र्धे जाग्र्वद्भिः|	vaiśvānara who with those who wake hath waxen great in the lap of all the gods immortal.
पर्ष्टो दिवि धाय्यग्निः पर्थिव्यां नेता सिन्धूनां वर्षभ सतियानाम|	sought in the heavens on earth is agni stablished leader of rivers bull of standing waters.
स मानुषीरभि विशो वि भाति वैश्वानरो वाव्र्धानो वरेण|	vaiśvānara when he hath grown in glory shines on the tribes of men with light and treasure.
तवद भिया विश आयन्नसिक्नीरसमना जहतीर्भोजनानि|	for fear of thee forth fled the darkhued races scattered abroad deserting their possessions.
वैश्वानर पूरवे शोशुचानः पुरो यदग्ने दरयन्नदीदेः|	when glowing o vaiśvānara for pūru thou agni didst light up and rend their castles.
तव तरिधातु पर्थिवी उत दयौर्वैश्वानर वरतमग्ने सचन्त|	agni vaiśvānara both earth and heaven submit them to thy threefold jurisdiction.
तवं भासा रोदसी आ ततन्थाजस्रेण शोचिषा शोशुचानः|	refulgent in thine undecaying lustre thou hast invested both the worlds with splendour.
तवामग्ने हरितो वावशाना गिरः सचन्ते धुनयो घर्ताचीः|	agni the tawny horses loudly neighing our resonant hymns that drop with oil attend thee.
पतिं कर्ष्टीनां रथ्यं रयीणां वैश्वानरमुषसां केतुमह्नाम|	lord of the tribes our charioteer of riches ensign of days vaiśvānara of mornings.
तवे असुर्यं वसवो नय रण्वन करतुं हि ते मित्रमहो जुषन्त|	in thee o bright as mitra vasus seated the might of aduras for they loved thy spirit.
तवं दस्यून्रोकसो अग्न आज उरु जयोतिर्जनयन्नार्याय|	thou dravest dasyus from their home o agni and broughtest forth broad light to light the Ārya.
स जायमानः परमे वयोमन वायुर्न पाथः परि पासि सद्यः|	born in the loftiest heaven thou in a moment reachest like wind the place where gods inhabit.
तवं भुवना जनयन्नभि करन्नपत्याय जातवेदो दशस्यन|	thou favouring thine offspring roaredst loudly when giving life to creatures jātavedas.
तामग्ने अस्मे इषमेरयस्व वैश्वानर दयुमतीं जातवेदः|	send us that strength vaiśvānara send it agni that strength o jātavedas full of splendour.
यया राधः पिन्वसि विश्ववार पर्थु शरवो दाशुषे मर्त्याय|	wherewith allbounteous god thou pourest riches as fame widespreading on the man who offers.
तं नो अग्ने मघवद्भ्यः पुरुक्षुं रयिं नि वाजं शरुत्यं युवस्व|	agni bestow upon our chiefs and nobles that famous power that wealth which feedeth many.
वैश्वानर महि नः शर्म यछ रुद्रेभिरग्ने वसुभिः सजोषाः|	accordant with the vasus and the rudras agni vaiśvānara give us sure protection.
यं तरायध्व इदमइदं देवासो यं च नयथ|	whomso ye rescue here and there whomso ye guide o deities.
तस्मा अग्ने वरुण मित्रार्यमन मरुतः शर्म यछत|	to him give shelter agni mitra varuṇa ye maruts and thou aryaman.
युष्माकं देवा अवसाहनि परिय ईजानस्तरति दविषः|	through your kind favour gods on some auspicious day the worshipper subdues his foes.
पर स कषयं तिरते वि महीरिषो यो वो वराय दाशति|	that man increases home and strengthening ample food who brings you offerings as ye list.
नहि वश्चरमं चन वसिष्ठः परिमंसते|	vasiṣṭha will not overlook the lowliest one among you all.
अस्माकमद्य मरुतः सुते सचा विश्वे पिबत कामिनः|	o maruts of our soma juice effused today drink all of you with eager haste.
नहि व ऊतिः पर्तनासु मर्धति यस्मा अराध्वं नरः|	your succour in the battle injures not the man to whom ye heroes grant your gifts.
अभि व आवर्त सुमतिर्नवीयसी तूयं यात पिपीषवः|	may your most recent favour turn to us again come quickly ye who fain would drink.
ओ षु घर्ष्विराधसो यातनान्धांसि पीतये|	come hitherward to drink the juice o ye whose bounties give you joy.
इमा वो हव्या मरुतो ररे हि कं मो षवन्यत्र गन्तन|	these offerings are for you these maruts i present go not to any place but this.
आ च नो बर्हिः सदताविता च न सपार्हाणि दातवे वसु|	sit on our sacred grass be graciously inclined to give the wealth for which we long.
अस्रेधन्तो मरुतः सोम्ये मधौ सवाहेह मादयाध्वै|	to take delight ye maruts friends of all with svāhā in sweet soma juice.
सस्वश्चिद धि तन्वः शुम्भमाना आ हंसासो नीलप्र्ष्ठा अपप्तन|	decking the beauty of their forms in secret the swans with purple backs have flown down hither.
विश्वं शर्धो अभितो मा नि षेद नरो न रण्वाः सवने मदन्तः|	around me all the company hath settled like joyous heroes glad in our libation.
यो नो मरुतो अभि दुर्ह्र्णायुस्तिरश्चित्तानि वसवो जिघांसति|	maruts the man whose wrath is hard to master he who would slay us ere we think o vasus.
दरुहः पाशान परति स मुचीष्ट तपिष्ठेन हन्मनाहन्तना तम|	may he be tangled in the toils of mischief smite ye him down with your most flaming weapon.
सान्तपना इदं हविर्मरुतस्तज्जुजुष्टन|	o maruts ye consuming gods enjoy this offering brought for you.
युष्माकोतीरिशादसः|	to help us ye who slay the foe.
गर्हमेधास आ गत मरुतो माप भूतन|	sharers of household sacrifice come maruts stay not far away.
युष्माकोती सुदानवः|	that ye may help us bounteous ones.
इहेह वः सवतवसः कवयः सूर्यत्वचः|	here selfstrong maruts yea even here ye sages with your sunbright skins.
यज्ञं मरुत आव्र्णे|	i dedicate your sacrifice.
तर्यम्बकं यजामहे सुगन्धिं पुष्टिवर्धनम|	tryambaka we worship sweet augmenter of prosperity.
उर्वारुकमिवबन्धनान मर्त्योर्मुक्षीय माम्र्तात|	as from its stem the cucumber so may i be released from death not reft of immortality.
पर शुन्ध्युवं वरुणाय परेष्ठां मतिं वसिष्ठ मीळ्हुषे भरस्व|	present to varuṇa thine hymn vasiṣṭha bright most delightful to the bounteous giver.
य ईमर्वाञ्चं करते यजत्रं सहस्रामघं वर्षणं बर्हन्तम|	who bringeth on to us the bull the lofty the holy laden with a thousand treasures.
अधा नवस्य सन्द्र्शं जगन्वानग्नेरनीकं वरुणस्य मंसि|	and now as i am come before his presence i take the face of varuṇa for agnis.
सवर्यदश्मन्नधिपा उ अन्धोअभि मा वपुर्द्र्शये निनीयात|	so might he bringlord also of the darknessthe light in heaven that i may see its beauty.
आ यद रुहाव वरुणश्च नावं पर यत समुद्रमीरयावमध्यम|	when varuṇa and i embark together and urge our boat into the midst of ocean.
अधि यदपां सनुभिश्चराव पर परेङख ईङखयावहै शुभे कम|	we when we ride oer ridges of the waters will swing within that swing and there be happy.
वसिष्ठं ह वरुणो नाव्याधाद रषिं चकार सवपा महोभिः|	varuṇa placed vasiṣṭha in the vessel and deftly with his niight made him a Ṛṣi.
सतोतारं विप्रः सुदिनत्वे अह्नां यान नु दयावस्ततनन यादुषासः|	when days shone bright the sage made him a singer while the heavens broadened and the dawns were lengthened.
कव तयानि नौ सख्या बभूवुः सचावहे यदव्र्कं पुरा चित|	what hath become of those our ancient friendships when without enmity we walked together.
बर्हन्तं मानं वरुण सवधावः सहस्रद्वारं जगमा गर्हं ते|	i varuṇa thou glorious lord have entered thy lofty home thine house with thousand portals.
य आपिर्नित्यो वरुण परियः सन तवामागांसि कर्णवत सखा ते|	if he thy true ally hath sinned against thee still varuṇa he is the friend thou lovedst.
मा त एनस्वन्तो यक्षिन भुजेम यन्धि षमा विप्र सतुवते वरूथम|	let us not living one as sinners i know thee give shelter as a sage to him who lauds thee.
धरुवासु तवासु कषितिषु कषियन्तो वयस्मत पाशं वरुणोमुमोचत|	while we abide in these fixed habitations and from the lap of aditi win favour.
अवो वन्वाना अदितेरुपस्थाद यूयं पात|	may varuṇa untie the bond that binds us preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
उषो न जारः पर्थु पाजो अश्रेद दविद्युतद दीद्यच्छोशुचानः|	he hath sent forth bright radiant and refulgent like the dawns lover his farspreading lustre.
वर्षा हरिः शुचिरा भाति भासा धियो हिन्वान उशतीरजीगः|	pure in his splendour shines the golden hero our longing thoughts hath he aroused and wakened.
सवर्ण वस्तोरुषसामरोचि यज्ञं तन्वाना उशिजो न मन्म|	he like the sun hath shone while morn is breaking and priests who weave the sacrifice sing praises.
अग्निर्जन्मानि देव आ वि विद्वान दरवद दूतो देवयावा वनिष्ठः|	agni the god who knows their generations and visits gods most bounteous rapid envoy.
अछा गिरो मतयो देवयन्तीरग्निं यन्ति दरविणं भिक्षमाणाः|	our songs and holy hymns go forth to agni seeking the god and asking him for riches.
सुसन्द्र्शं सुप्रतीकं सवञ्चं हव्यवाहमरतिम्मानुषाणाम|	him fair to see of goodly aspect mighty mens messenger who carries their oblations.
इन्द्रं नो अग्ने वसुभिः सजोषा रुद्रं रुद्रेभिरा वहा बर्हन्तम|	joined with the vasus agni bring thou indra bring hither mighty rudra with the rudras.
आदित्येभिरदितिं विश्वजन्यां बर्हस्पतिं रक्वभिर्विश्ववारम|	aditi good to all men with Ādityas bṛhaspati allbounteous with the singers.
मन्द्रं होतारमुशिजो यविष्ठमग्निं विश ईळते अध्वरेषु|	men eagerly implore at sacrifices agni most youthful god the joyous herald.
स हि कषपावानभवद रयीणामतन्द्रो दूतो यजथाय देवान|	for he is lord and ruler over riches and for gods worship an unwearied envoy.
पर बरह्माणो अङगिरसो नक्षन्त पर करन्दनुर्नभन्यस्य वेतु|	let brahmans and aṅgirases come forward and let the roar of cloudy heaven surround us.
पर धेनव उदप्रुतो नवन्त युज्यातामद्री अध्वरस्य पेशः|	loud low the milchkine swimming in the waters set be the stones that grace our holy service.
सुगस्ते अग्ने सनवित्तो अध्वा युक्ष्वा सुते हरितो रोहितश्च|	fair agni is thy longknown path to travel yoke for the juice tfiy bay thy ruddy horses.
ये वा सद्मन्नरुषा वीरवाहो हुवे देवानां जनिमानिसत्तः|	or red steeds herobearing for the chamber seated i call the deities generations.
समु वो यज्ञं महयन नमोभिः पर होता मन्द्रो रिरिच उपाके|	they glorify your sacrifice with worship yet the glad priest near them is left unequalled.
यजस्व सु पुर्वणीक देवाना यज्ञियामरमतिं वव्र्त्याः|	bring the gods hither thou of many aspects turn hitherward aramati the holy.
यदा वीरस्य रेवतो दुरोणे सयोनशीरतिथिराचिकेतत|	what time the guest hath made himself apparent at ease reclining in the rich mans dwelling.
सुप्रीतो अग्निः सुधितो दम आ स विशे दाति वार्यमियत्यै|	agni wellpleased wellplaced within the chamber gives to a house like this wealth worth the choosing.
इमं नो अग्ने अध्वरं जुषस्व मरुत्स्विन्द्रे यशसं कर्धी नः|	accept this sacrifice of ours o agni glorify it with indra and the maruts.
आ नक्ता बर्हिः सदतामुषासोशन्ता मित्रावरुणायजेह|	here on our grass let night and dawn be seated bring longing varuṇa and mitra hither.
एवाग्निं सहस्यं वसिष्ठो रायस्कामो विश्वप्स्न्यस्य सतौत|	thus hath vasiṣṭha praised victorious agni yearning for wealth that giveth all subsistence.
इषं रयिं पप्रथद वाजमस्मे यूयं पात|	may he bestow on us food strength and riches preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
महानस्यध्वरस्य परकेतो न रते तवदम्र्ता मादयन्ते|	great art thou agni sacrifices herald not without thee are deathless gods made joyful.
आ विश्वेभिः सरथं याहि देवैर्न्यग्ने होता परथमः सदेह|	come hither with all deities about thee here take thy seat the first as priest o agni.
तवामीळते अजिरं दूत्याय हविष्मन्तः सदमिन मानुषासः|	men with oblations evermore entreat thee the swift to undertake an envoys duty.
यस्य देवैरासदो बर्हिरग्नेअहान्यस्मै सुदिना भवन्ति|	he on whose sacred grass with gods thou sittest to him o agni are the days propitious.
तरिश्चिदक्तोः पर चिकितुर्वसूनि तवे अन्तर्दाशुषे मर्त्याय|	three times a day in thee are shown the treasures sent for the mortal who presents oblation.
मनुष्वदग्न इह यक्षि देवान भवा नो दूतो अधिशस्तिपावा|	bring the gods hither like a man o agni be thou our envoy guarding us from curses.
अग्निरीशे बर्हतो अध्वरस्याग्निर्विश्वस्य हविषः कर्तस्य|	lord of the lofty sacrifice is agni agni is lord of every gift presented.
करतुं हयस्य वसवो जुषन्ताथा देवा दधिरे हव्यवाहम|	the vasus were contented with his wisdom so the gods made him their oblationbearer.
आग्ने वह हविरद्याय देवानिन्द्रज्येष्ठास इह मादयन्ताम|	o agni bring the gods to taste our presents with indra leading here let them be joyful.
इमं यज्ञं दिवि देवेषु धेहि यूयं पात|	convey this sacrifice to gods in heaven ye gods preserve us evermore with blessings.
अध्वर्यवो ऽरुणं दुग्धम अंशुं जुहोतन वर्षभाय कषितीनाम|	priests offer to the lord of all the people the milkedout stalk of soma radiantcoloured.
गौराद वेदीयां अवपानम इन्द्रो विश्वाहेद याति सुतसोमम इछन|	no wildbull knows his drinkingplace like indra who ever seeks him who hath pressed the soma.
यद दधिषे परदिवि चार्व अन्नं दिवेदिवे पीतिम इद अस्य वक्षि|	thou dost desire to drink each day that passes the pleasant food which thou hast had aforetime.
उत हर्दोत मनसा जुषाण उशन्न इन्द्र परस्थितान पाहि सोमान|	o indra gratified in heart and spirit drink eagerly the soma set before thee.
जज्ञानः सोमं सहसे पपाथ पर ते माता महिमानम उवाच|	thou newlyborn for strength didst drink the soma the mother told thee of thy future greatness.
एन्द्र पप्राथोर्व अन्तरिक्षं युधा देवेभ्यो वरिवश चकर्थ|	o indra thou hast filled midairs wide region and given the gods by battle room and freedom.
यद योधया महतो मन्यमानान साक्षाम तान बाहुभिः शाशदानान|	when thou hast urged the arrocrant to combat proud in their strength of arm we will subdue them.
यद वा नर्भिर वर्त इन्द्राभियुध्यास तं तवयाजिं सौश्रवसं जयेम|	or indra when thou fightest girt by heroes we in the glorious fray with thee will conquer.
परेन्द्रस्य वोचम परथमा कर्तानि पर नूतना मघवा या चकार|	i will declare the earliest deeds of indra and recent acts which maghavan hath accomplished.
यदेद अदेवीर असहिष्ट माया अथाभवत केवलः सोमो अस्य|	when he had conquered godless wiles and magic soma became his own entire possession.
तवेदं विश्वम अभितः पशव्यं यत पश्यसि चक्षसा सूर्यस्य|	thine is this world of flocks and herds around thee which with the eye of sūrya thou beholdest.
गवाम असि गोपतिर एक इन्द्र भक्षीमहि ते परयतस्य वस्वः|	thou indra art alone the lord of cattle may we enjoy the treasure which thou givest.
बर्हस्पते युवम इन्द्रश च वस्वो दिव्यस्येशाथे उत पार्थिवस्य|	ye twain are lords of wealth in earth and heaven thou o bṛhaspati and thou o indra.
धत्तं रयिं सतुवते कीरये चिद यूयम पात सवस्तिभिः सदा नः|	mean though he be give wealth to him who lauds you preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
परातरग्निं परातरिन्द्रं हवामहे परातर्मित्रावरुणाप्रातरश्विना|	agni at dawn and indra we invoke at dawn and varuṇa and mitra and the aśvins twain.
परातर्भगं पूषणं बरह्मणस पतिं परातः सोममुत रुद्रं हुवेम|	bhaga at dawn pūṣan and brahmaṇaspati soma at dawn rudra we will invoke at dawn.
परातर्जितं भगमुग्रं हुवेम वयं पुत्रमदितेर्यो विधर्ता|	we will invoke strong earlyconquering bhaga the son of aditi the great supporter.
आध्रश्चिद यं मन्यमानस्तुरश्चिद राजा चिद यं भगं भक्षीत्याह|	thinking of whom the poor yea even the mighty even the king himself says give me bhaga.
भग परणेतर्भग सत्यराधो भगेमां धियमुदवा ददन नः|	bhaga our guide bhaga whose gifts are faithful favour this song and give us wealth o bhaga.
भग पर णो जनय गोभिरश्वैर्भग पर नर्भिर्न्र्वन्तः सयाम|	bhaga augment our store of kine and horses bhaga may we be rich in men and heroes.
उतेदानीं भगवन्तः सयामोत परपित्व उत मध्ये अह्नाम|	so may felicity be ours at present and when the day approaches and at noontide.
उतोदिता मघवन सूर्यस्य वयं देवानां सुमतौ सयाम|	and may we still o bounteous one at sunset be happy in the deities lovingkindness.
भग एव भगवानस्तु देवास्तेन वयं भगवन्तः सयाम|	may bhaga verily be blissbestower and through him gods may happiness attend us.
तं तवा भग सर्व इज्जोहवीति स नो भग पुरेता भवेह|	as such o bhaga all with might invoke thee as such be thou our champion here o bhaga.
समध्वरायोषसो नमन्त दधिक्रावेव शुचये पदाय|	to this our worship may all dawns incline them and come to the pure place like dadhikrāvan.
अर्वाचीनं वसुविदं भगं नो रथमिवाश्वा वाजिन आ वहन्तु|	as strong steeds draw a chariot may they bring us hitherward bhaga who discovers treasure.
अश्वावतीर्गोमतीर्न उषासो वीरवतीः सदमुछन्तु भद्राः|	may blessed mornings dawn on us for ever with wealth of kine of horses and of heroes.
घर्तं दुहाना विश्वतः परपीता यूयं पात|	streaming with all abundance pouring fatness preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
यज्ञे दिवो नर्षदने पर्थिव्या नरो यत्र देवयवो मदन्ति|	where heaven and earth combine in mens assembly and ttose who love the gods delight in worship.
इन्द्राय यत्र सवनानि सुन्वे गमन मदाय परथमं वयश च|	where the libations are effused for indra may he come first to drink and make him stronger.
आ दैव्या वर्णीमहे ऽवांसि बर्हस्पतिर नो मह आ सखायः|	we crave the heavenly grace of gods to guard usso may bṛhaspati o friends exalt us.
यथा भवेम मीळ्हुषे अनागा यो नो दाता परावतः पितेव|	that he the bounteous god may find us sintess who giveth from a distance like a father.
तम उ जयेष्ठं नमसा हविर्भिः सुशेवम बरह्मणस पतिं गर्णीषे|	that brahmaṇaspati most high and gracious i glorify with offerings and with homage.
इन्द्रं शलोको महि दैव्यः सिषक्तु यो बरह्मणो देवक्र्तस्य राजा|	may the great song of praise divine reach indra who is the king of prayer the gods creation.
स आ नो योनिं सदतु परेष्ठो बर्हस्पतिर विश्ववारो यो अस्ति|	may that bṛhaspati who brings all blessings most dearly loved be seated by our altar.
कामो रायः सुवीर्यस्य तं दात पर्षन नो अति सश्चतो अरिष्टान|	heroes and wealth we crave may he bestow them and bear us safe beyond the men who vex us.
तम आ नो अर्कम अम्र्ताय जुष्टम इमे धासुर अम्र्तासः पुराजाः|	to us these deathless ones erst born have granted this laud of ours which gives the immortal pleasure.
शुचिक्रन्दं यजतम पस्त्य्र्नाम बर्हस्पतिम अनर्वाणं हुवेम|	let us invoke bṛhaspati the foeless the clearvoiced god the holy one of households.
तं शग्मासो अरुषासो अश्वा बर्हस्पतिं सहवाहो वहन्ति|	him this bṛhaspati his redhued horses drawing together full of strength bring hither.
सहश चिद यस्य नीलवत सधस्थं नभो न रूपम अरुषं वसानाः|	robed in red colour like the cloud they carry the lord of might whose friendship gives a dwelling.
स हि शुचिः शतपत्रः स शुन्ध्युर हिरण्यवाशीर इषिरः सवर्षाः|	for he is pure with hundred wings refulgent with sword of gold impetuous winning sunlight.
बर्हस्पतिः स सवावेश रष्वः पुरू सखिभ्य आसुतिं करिष्ठः|	sublime bṛhaspati easy of access granteth his friends most bountiful refreshment.
देवी देवस्य रोदसी जनित्री बर्हस्पतिं वाव्र्धतुर महित्वा|	both heaven and earth divine the deitys parents have made bṛhaspati increase in grandeur.
दक्षाय्याय दक्षता सखायः करद बरह्मणे सुतरा सुगाधा|	glorify him o friends who merits glory may he give prayer fair way and easy passage.
इयं वाम बरह्मणस पते सुव्र्क्तिर बरह्मेन्द्राय वज्रिणे अकारि|	this brahmaṇaspati is your laudation prayer hath been made to thunderwielding indra.
अविष्टं धियो जिग्र्तम पुरंधीर जजस्तम अर्यो वनुषाम अरातीः|	favour our songs wake up our thought and spirit destroy the godless and our foemens malice.
बर्हस्पते युवम इन्द्रश च वस्वो दिव्यस्येशाथे उत पार्थिवस्य|	ye twain are lords of wealth in earth and heaven thou o bṛhaspati and thou o indra.
धत्तं रयिं सतुवते कीरये चिद यूयम पात सवस्तिभिः सदा नः|	mean though he be give wealth to him who lauds you preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
वयुषा आवः पथ्या जनानां पञ्च कषितीर्मानुषीर्बोधयन्ती|	rousing the lands where mens five tribes are settled dawn hath disclosed the pathways of the people.
सुसन्द्र्ग्भिरुक्षभिर्भानुमश्रेद वि सूर्यो रोदसी चक्षसावः|	she hath sent out her sheen with beauteous oxen the sun with light hath opened earth and heaven.
वयञ्जते दिवो अन्तेष्वक्तून विशो न युक्ता उषसो यतन्ते|	they paint their bright rays on the skys far limits the dawns come on like tribes arrayed for battle.
सं ते गावस्तम आ वर्तयन्ति जयोतिर्यछन्ति सवितेव बाहू|	thy cattle closely shutting up the darkness as savitar spreads his arms give forth their lustre.
अभूदुषा इन्द्रतमा मघोन्यजीजनत सुविताय शरवांसि|	wealthy most like to indra dawn hath risen and brought forth lauds that shall promote our welfare.
वि दिवो देवी दुहिता दधात्यङगिरस्तमा सुक्र्ते वसूनि|	daughter of heaven a goddess she distributes best of aṅgirases treasures to the pious.
तावदुषो राधो अस्मभ्यं रास्व यावत सतोत्र्भ्यो अरदो गर्णाना|	bestow on us o dawn that ample bounty which thou didst send to those who sang thy praises.
यां तवा जज्ञुर्व्र्षभस्या रवेण वि दर्ळ्हस्य दुरो अद्रेरौर्णोः|	thou whom with bellowings of a bull they quickened thou didst unbar the firmset mountains portals.
देवंदेवं राधसे चोदयन्त्यस्मद्र्यक सून्र्ता ईरयन्ती|	impelling every god to grant his bounty sending to us the charm of pleasant voices.
वयुछन्ती नः सनये धियो धा यूयं पात|	vouchsafe us thoughts for profit as thou breakest preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
परति केतवः परथमा अद्र्श्रन्नूर्ध्वा अस्या अञ्जयो वि शरयन्ते|	we have beheld her earliest lights approaching her many glories part on high asunder.
उषो अर्वाचा बर्हता रथेन जयोतिष्मता वाममस्मभ्यं वक्षि|	on car sublime refulgent wending hither o uṣas bring the wealth that makes us happy.
परति षीमग्निर्जरते समिद्धः परति विप्रासो मतिभिर्ग्र्णन्तः|	the fire wellkindied sings aloud to greet her and with their hymns the priests are chaming welcome.
उषा याति जयोतिषा बाधमाना विश्वा तमांसि दुरिताप देवी|	uṣas approaches in her splendour driving all evil darkness far away the goddess.
एता उ तयाः परत्यद्र्श्रन पुरस्ताज्ज्योतिर्यछन्तीरुषसोविभातीः|	apparent eastward are those lights of morning sending out lustre as they rise around them.
अजीजनन सूर्यं यज्ञमग्निमपाचीनं तमो अगादजुष्टम|	she hath brought forth sun sacrifice and agni and far away hath fled detested darkness.
अचेति दिवो दुहिता मघोनी विश्वे पश्यन्त्युषसं विभातीम|	rich daughter of the sky we all behold her yea all men look on dawn as she is breaking.
आस्थाद रथं सवधया युज्यमानमा यमश्वासः सुयुजो वहन्ति|	fler car that moves selfharnessed hath she mounted the car drawn onward by her wellyoked horses.
परति तवाद्य सुमनसो बुधन्तास्माकासो मघवानो वयं च|	inspired with loving thoughts this day to greet thee we and our wealthy nobles have awakened.
तिल्विलायध्वमुषसो विभातीर्यूयं पात|	show yourselves fruitful dawns as ye are rising preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
इमा उ वां दिविष्टय उस्रा हवन्ते अश्विना|	these morning sacrifices call you aśvins at the break of day.
अयं वामह्वेअवसे शचीवसू विशंविशं हि गछथः|	for help have i invoked you rich in power and might for house by house ye visit all.
युवं चित्रं ददथुर्भोजनं नरा चोदेथां सून्र्तावते|	o heroes ye bestow wonderful nourishment send it to him whose songs are sweet.
अर्वाग रथं समनसा नि यछतं पिबतं सोम्यं मधु|	accordant both of you drive your car down to us and drink the savoury soma juice.
आ यातमुप भूषतं मध्वः पिबतमश्विना|	approach ye and be near to us drink o ye aśvins of the meath.
दुग्धं पयोव्र्षणा जेन्यावसू मा नो मर्धिष्टमा गतम|	draw forth the milk ye mighty rich in genuine wealth injure us not and come to us.
अश्वासो ये वामुप दाशुषो गर्हं युवां दीयन्ति बिभ्रतः|	the horses that convey you in their rapid flight down to the worshippers abode.
मक्षूयुभिर्नरा हयेभिरश्विना देवा यातमस्मयू|	with these your speedy coursers heroes aśvins come ye gods come wellinclined to us.
अधा ह यन्तो अश्विना पर्क्षः सचन्त सूरयः|	yea verily our princes seek the aśvins in pursuit of food.
ता यंसतो मघवद्भ्यो धरुवं यशश्छर्दिरस्मभ्यं नासत्या|	these shall give lasting glory to our liberal lords and both nāsatyas shelter us.
पर ये ययुरव्र्कासो रथा इव नर्पातारो जनानाम|	those who have led the way like cars offending none those who are guardians of the men.
उत सवेन शवसा शूशुवुर्नर उत कषियन्ति सुक्षितिम|	also through their own might the heroes have grown strong and dwell in safe and happy homes.
आदित्यासो अदितयः सयाम पूर्देवत्रा वसवो मर्त्यत्रा|	may we be free from every bond Ādityas a castle among gods and men ye vasus.
सनेम मित्रावरुणा सनन्तो भवेम दयावाप्र्थिवी भवन्तः|	winning may we win varuṇa and mitra and being may we be o earth and heaven.
मित्रस्तन नो वरुणो मामहन्त शर्म तोकाय तनयाय गोपाः|	may varuṇa and mitra grant this blessing our guardians shelter to our seed and offspring.
मा वो भुजेमान्यजातमेनो मा तत कर्म वसवो यच्चयध्वे|	let us not suffer for anothers trespass nor do the thing that ye o vasus punish.
तुरण्यवोअङगिरसो नक्षन्त रत्नं देवस्य सवितुरियानाः|	the everprompt aṅgirases imploring riches from savitar the god obtained them.
पिता च तन नो महान यजत्रो विश्वे देवाः समनसो जुषन्त|	so may our father who is great and holy and all the gods accordant grant this favour.
पर मित्रयोर्वरुणयोः सतोमो न एतु शूष्यः|	let our strong hymn of praise go forth the laud of mitravaruṇa.
नमस्वान तुविजातयोः|	with homage to that highborn pair.
या धारयन्त देवाः सुदक्षा दक्षपितरा|	the two exceeding wise the sons of dakṣa whom the gods ordained.
असुर्याय परमहसा|	for lordship excellently great.
ता न सतिपा तनूपा वरुण जरितॄणाम|	such guardians of our homes and us o mitravaruṇa fulfil.
मित्र साधयतं धियः|	the thoughts of those who sing your praise.
यदद्य सूर उदितेअनागा मित्रो अर्यमा|	so when the sun hath risen today may sinless mitra aryaman.
सुवाति सविताभगः|	bhaga and savitar sendus forth.
सुप्रावीरस्तु स कषयः पर नु यामन सुदानवः|	may this our home be guarded well forward ye bounteous on the way.
ये नो अंहोअतिपिप्रति|	who bear us safely oer distress.
उत सवराजो अदितिरदब्धस्य वरतस्य ये|	and those selfreigning aditi whose statute is inviolate.
महो राजान ईशते|	the kings who rule a vast domain.
परति वां सूर उदिते मित्रं गर्णीषे वरुणम|	soon as the sun hath risen to you to mitravaruṇa i sing.
अर्यमणंरिशादसम|	and aryarnan who slays the foe.
राया हिरण्यया मतिरियमव्र्काय शवसे|	with wealth of gold may this my song bring unmolested power and might.
इयं विप्रामेधसातये|	and brahmans gain the sacrifice.
ते सयाम देव वरुण ते मित्र सूरिभिः सह|	may we be thine god varuṇa and with our princes mitra thine.
इषं सवश्च धीमहि|	food and heavens light will we obtain.
बहवः सूरचक्षसोअग्निजिह्वा रताव्र्धः|	many are they who strengthen law suneyed with agni for their tongue.
तरीणि ये येमुर्विदथानि धीतिभिर्विश्वानि परिभूतिभिः|	they who direct the three great gatherings with their thoughts yea all things with surpassing might.
वि ये दधुः शरदं मासमादहर्यज्ञमक्तुं चाद रचम|	they who have stablished year and month and then the day night sacrifice and holy verse.
अनाप्यं वरुणो मित्रो अर्यमा कषत्रं राजान आशत|	varuṇa mitra aryarnan the kings have won dominion which none else may gain.
तद वो अद्य मनामहे सूक्तैः सूर उदिते|	so at the rising of the sun we think of you with hymns today.
यदोहते वरुणो मित्रो अर्यमा यूयं रतस्य रथ्यः|	even as varuṇa mitra aryaman deserve ye are the charioteers of law.
रतावान रतजाता रताव्र्धो घोरासो अन्र्तद्विषः|	true to law born in law the strengtheners of law terrible haters of the false.
तेषांवः सुम्ने सुछर्दिष्टमे नरः सयाम ये च सूरयः|	in their felicity which gives the best defence may we men and our princes dwell.
उदु तयद दर्शतं वपुर्दिव एति परतिह्वरे|	uprises on the slope of heaven that marvel that attracts die sight.
यदीमाशुर्वहति देव एतशो विश्वस्मै चक्षसे अरम|	as swift celestial etaśa bears it away prepared for every eye to see.
शीर्ष्णःशीर्ष्णो जगतस्तस्थुषस पतिं समया विश्वमा रजः|	lord of each single head of fixt and moving things equally through the whole expanse.
सप्त सवसारः सुविताय सूर्यं वहन्ति हरितो रथे|	the seven sister bays bear sūrya on his car to bring us wealth and happiness.
तच्चक्षुर्देवहितं शुक्रमुच्चरत|	a hundred autumns may we see that bright eye godordained arise.
पश्येम शरदः शतं जीवेम शरदः शतम|	a hundred autumns may we live.
काव्येभिरदाभ्या यातं वरुण दयुमत|	infallible through your wisdom come hither resplendent varuṇa.
मित्रश्च सोमपीतये|	and mitra to the soma draught.
दिवो धामभिर्वरुण मित्रश्चा यातमद्रुहा|	come as the laws of heaven ordain varuṇa mitra void of guile.
पिबतं सोममातुजी|	press near and drink the soma juice.
आ यातं मित्रावरुणा जुषाणावाहुतिं नरा|	come mitra varuṇa accept heroes our sacrificial gift.
पातं सोमं रताव्र्धा|	drink soma ye who strengthen law.
मो षु वरुण मर्न्मयं गर्हं राजन्नहं गमम|	let me not yet king varuṇa enter into the house of clay.
मर्ळा सुक्षत्र मर्ळय|	have mercy spare me mighty lord.
यदेमि परस्फुरन्निव दर्तिर्न धमातो अद्रिवः|	when thunderer i move along tremulous like a windblown skin.
मर्ळा स म|	have mercy spare me mighty lord.
करत्वः समह दीनता परतीपं जगमा शुचे|	o bright and powerful god through want of strength i erred and went astray.
मर्ळा स म|	have mercy spare me mighty lord.
अपां मध्ये तस्थिवांसं तर्ष्णाविदज्जरितारम|	thirst found thy worshipper though he stood in the midst of waterfijods.
मर्ळा स म|	have mercy spare me mighty lord.
यत किं चेदं वरुण दैव्ये जनेअभिद्रोहं मनुष्याश्चरामसि|	o varuṇa whatever the offence may be which we as men commit against the heavenly host.
अचित्ती यत तव धर्मा युयोपिम मा नस्तस्मादेनसो देव रीरिषः|	when through our want of thought we violate thy laws punish us not o god for that iniquity.
आ देवो यातु सविता सुरत्नोअन्तरिक्षप्रा वहमानो अश्वैः|	may the god savitar rich in goodly treasures filling the region borne by steeds come hither.
हस्ते दधानो नर्या पुरूणि निवेशयञ्च परसुवञ्च भूम|	in his hand holding much that makes men happy lulling to slumber and arousing creatures.
उदस्य बाहू शिथिरा बर्हन्ता हिरण्यया दिवो अन्ताननष्टाम|	golden sublime and easy in their motion his arms extend unto the bounds of heaven.
नूनं सो अस्य महिमा पनिष्ट सूरश्चिदस्मा अनु दादपस्याम|	now shall that mightiness of his he lauded even sūrya yields to him in active vigour.
स घा नो देवः सविता सहावा साविषद वसुपतिर्वसूनि|	may this god savitar the strong and mighty the lord of precious wealth vouchsafe us treasures.
विश्रयमाणो अमतिमुरूचीं मर्तभोजनमध रासते नः|	may he advancing his farspreading lustre bestow on us the food that feedeth mortals.
इमा गिरः सवितारं सुजिह्वं पूर्णगभस्तिमीळते सुपाणिम|	these songs praise savitar whose tongue is pleasant praise him whose arms are full whose hands are lovely.
चित्रं वयो बर्हदस्मे दधातु यूयं पात|	high vital strength and manifold may he grant us preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
पर वीरया शुचयो दद्रिरे वामध्वर्युभिर्मधुमन्तः सुतासः|	to you pure juice rich in meath are offered by priest through longing for the pair of heroes.
वह वायो नियुतो याह्यछा पिबा सुतस्यान्धसो मदाय|	drive vāyu bring thine harnessed horses hither drink the pressed soma till it make thee joyful.
ईशानाय परहुतिं यस्त आनट छुचिं सोमं शुचिपास्तुभ्यं वायो|	whoso to thee the mighty brings oblation pure soma unto thee puredrinking vāyu.
कर्णोषि तं मर्त्येषु परशस्तं जातोजातो जायते वाज्यस्य|	that man thou makest famous among mortals to him strong sons are born in quick succession.
राये नु यं जज्ञतू रोदसीमे राये देवी धिषणा धाति देवम|	the god whom both these worlds brought forth for riches whom heavenly dhiṣaṇā for our wealth appointeth.
अध वायुं नियुतः सश्चत सवा उत शवेतं वसुधितिं निरेके|	his team of harnessed horses waits on vāyu and foremost on the radiant treasurebearer.
उछन्नुषसः सुदिना अरिप्रा उरु जयोतिर्विविदुर्दीध्यानाः|	the spotless dawns with fair bright days have broken they found the spacious light when they were shining.
गव्यं चिदूर्वमुशिजो वि वव्रुस्तेषामनु परदिवः सस्रुरापः|	eagerly they disclosed the stall of cattle floods streamed for them as in the days aforetime.
ते सत्येन मनसा दीध्यानाः सवेन युक्तासः करतुना वहन्ति|	these with their truthful spirit shining brightly move on provided with their natural insight.
इन्द्रवायू वीरवाहं रथं वामीशानयोरभि पर्क्षः सचन्ते|	viands attend the car that beareth heroes your car ye sovran pair indra and vāyu.
ईशानासो ये दधते सवर्णो गोभिरश्वेभिर्वसुभिर्हिरण्यैः|	may these who give us heavenly light these rulers with gifts of kine and horses gold and treasures.
इन्द्रवायू सूरयो विश्वमायुरर्वद्भिर्वीरैः पर्तनासु सह्युः|	these princes through full life indra and vāyu oercome in battle with their steeds and heroes.
अर्वन्तो न शरवसो भिक्षमाणा इन्द्रवायू सुष्टुतिभिर्वसिष्ठाः|	like coursers seeking fame will we vasisthas o indravāyu with our fair laudations.
वाजयन्तः सववसे हुवेम यूयं पात|	exerting all our power call you to aid us preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
बर्हदु गायिषे वचोअसुर्या नदीनाम|	i sing a lofty song for she is mightiest most divine of streams.
सरस्वतीमिन महयासुव्र्क्तिभिः सतोमैर्वसिष्ठ रोदसी|	sarasvatī will i exalt with hymns and lauds and o vasiṣṭha heaven and earth.
उभे यत ते महिना शुभ्रे अन्धसी अधिक्षियन्ति पूरवः|	when in the fulness of their strength the pūrus dwell beauteous one on thy two grassy banks.
सा नो बोध्यवित्री मरुत्सखा चोद राधो मघोनाम|	favour us thou who hast the maruts for thy friends stir up the bounty of our chiefs.
भद्रमिद भद्रा कर्णवत सरस्वत्यकवारी चेतति वाजिनीवती|	so may sarasvatī auspicious send good luck she rich in spoil is never niggardly in thought.
गर्णाना जमदग्निवत सतुवाना च वसिष्ठवत|	when praised in jamadagnis way and lauded as vasiṣṭha lauds.
जनीयन्तो नवग्रवः पुत्रीयन्तः सुदानवः|	we call upon sarasvān as unmarried men who long for wives.
सरस्वन्तं हवामहे|	as liberal men who yearn for sons.
ये ते सरस्व ऊर्मयो मधुमन्तो घर्तश्चुतः|	be thou our kind protector o sarasvān with those waves of thine.
तेभिर्नोअविता भव|	laden with sweets and dropping oil.
पीपिवांसं सरस्वत सतनं यो विश्वदर्षतः|	may we enjoy sarasvāns breast allbeautiful that swells with streams.
भक्षीमहि परजामिषम|	may we gain food and progeny.
धीरा तवस्य महिना जनूंषि वि यस्तस्तम्भ रोदसी चिदुर्वी|	wise verily are creatures through his greatness who stayed ever spacious heaven and earth asunder.
पर नाकं रष्वं नुनुदे बर्हन्तं दविता नक्षत्रम्पप्रथच्च भूम|	who urged the high and mighty sky to motion the star of old and spread the earth before him.
उत सवया तन्वा सं वदे तत कदा नवन्तर्वरुणे भुवानि|	with mine own heart i commune on the question how varuṇa and i may be united.
किं मे हव्यमह्र्णानो जुषेत कदा मर्ळीकं सुमना अभि खयम|	what gift of mine will he accept unangered when may i calmly look and find him gracious.
पर्छे तदेनो वरुण दिद्र्क्षूपो एमि चिकितुषो विप्र्छम|	fain to know this is my sin i question others i seek the wise o varuṇa and ask them.
समानमिन मे कवयश्चिदाहुरयं ह तुभ्यं वरुणो हर्णीते|	this one same answer even the sages gave me surely this varuṇa is angry with thee.
किमाग आस वरुण जयेष्ठं यत सतोतारं जिघांससि सखायम|	what varuṇa hath been my chief transgression that thou wouldst slay the friend who sings thy praises.
पर तन मे वोचो दूळभ सवधावोअव तवानेना नमसा तुर इयाम|	tell me unconquerable lord and quickly sinless will i approach thee with mine homage.
अव दरुग्धानि पित्र्या सर्जा नोअव या वयं चक्र्मा तनूभिः|	free us from sins committed by our fathers from those wherein we have ourselves offended.
अव राजन पशुत्र्पं न तायुं सर्जा वत्सं न दाम्नो वसिष्ठम|	o king loose like a thief who feeds the cattle as from the cord a calf set free vasiṣṭha.
न स सवो दक्षो वरुण धरुतिः सा सुरा मन्युर्विभीदकोचित्तिः|	not our own will betrayed us but seduction thoughtlessness varuṇa wine dice or anger.
अस्ति जयायान कनीयस उपारे सवप्नश्चनेदन्र्तस्य परयोता|	the old is near to lead astray the younger even sleep removeth not all evildoing.
अरं दासो न मीळ्हुषे कराण्यहं देवाय भूर्णयेअनागाः|	slavelike may i do service to the bounteous serve free from sin the god inclined to anger.
अचेतयदचितो देवो अर्यो गर्त्सं राये कवितरो जुनाति|	this gentle lord gives wisdom to the simple the wiser god leads on the wise to riches.
अयं सु तुभ्यं वरुण सवधावो हर्दि सतोम उपश्रितश्चिदस्तु|	o lord o varuṇa may this laudation come close to thee and lie within thy spirit.
शं नः कषेमे शमु योगे नो अस्तु यूयं पात|	may it be well with us in rest and labour preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
पिबा सोममिन्द्र मन्दतु तवा यं ते सुषाव हर्यश्वाद्रिः|	drink soma lord of bays and let it cheer thee indra the stone like a well guided courser.
सोतुर्बाहुभ्यां सुयतो नार्वा|	directed by the pressers arms hath pressed it.
यस्ते मदो युज्यश्चारुरस्ति येन वर्त्राणि हर्यश्व हंसि|	so let the draught of joy thy dear companion by which o lord of bays thou slayest foemen.
स तवामिन्द्र परभूवसो ममत्तु|	delight thee indra lord of princely treasures.
बोधा सु मे मघवन वाचमेमां यां ते वसिष्ठो अर्चतिप्रशस्तिम|	mark closely maghavan the words i utter this eulogy recited by vasiṣṭha.
इमा बरह्म सधमादे जुषस्व|	accept the prayers i offer at thy banquet.
शरुधी हवं विपिपानस्याद्रेर्बोधा विप्रस्यार्चतो मनीषाम|	hear thou the call of the juicedrinking pressstone hear thou the brahmans hymn who sings and lauds thee.
कर्ष्वा दुवांस्यन्तमा सचेमा|	take to thine inmost self these adorations.
न ते गिरो अपि मर्ष्ये तुरस्य न सुष्टुतिमसुर्यस्य विद्वान|	i know and neer forget the hymns and praises of thee the conqueror and thy strength immortal.
सदा ते नाम सवयशो विवक्मि|	thy name i ever utter selfrefulgent.
भूरि हि ते सवना मानुषेषु भूरि मनीषी हवते तवामित|	among mankind many are thy libations and many a time the pious sageinvokes thee.
मारे अस्मन मघवञ जयोक कः|	o maghavan be not long distant from us.
तुभ्येदिमा सवना शूर विश्वा तुभ्यं बरह्माणि वर्धना कर्णोमि|	all these libations are for thee o hero to thee i offer these my prayers that strengthen.
तवं नर्भिर्हव्यो विश्वधासि|	ever in every place must men invoke thee.
नू चिन नु ते मन्यमानस्य दस्मोदश्नुवन्ति महिमानमुग्र|	never do men attain o wonderworker thy greatness mighty one who must be lauded.
न वीर्यमिन्द्र ते न राधः|	nor indra thine heroic power and bounty.
ये च पूर्व रषयो ये च नूत्ना इन्द्र बरह्माणि जनयन्त विप्राः|	among all Ṛṣis indra old and recent who have engendered hymns as sacred singers.
अस्मे ते सन्तु सख्या शिवानि यूयं पात|	even with us be thine auspicious friendships ye gods preserve us evermore with blessings.
दधिक्रां वः परथममश्विनोषसमग्निं समिद्धं भगमूतये हुवे|	i call on dadhikrās the first to give you aid the aśvins bhaga dawn and agni kindled well.
इन्द्रं विष्णुं पूषणं बरह्मणस पतिमादित्यान दयावाप्र्थिवी अपः सवः|	indra and viṣṇu pūṣan brahmaṇaspati Ādityas heaven and earth the waters and the light.
दधिक्रामु नमसा बोधयन्त उदीराणा यज्ञमुपप्रयन्तः|	when rising to the sacrifice we hasten awaking dadhikrās with adorations.
इळां देवीं बर्हिषि सादयन्तोअश्विना विप्रा सुहवाहुवेम|	seating on sacred grass the goddess iḷā let us invoke the sage swifthearing aśvins.
दधिक्रावाणं बुबुधानो अग्निमुप बरुव उषसं सूर्यं गाम|	while i am thus arousing dadhikrāvan i speak to agni earth and dawn and sūrya.
बरध्नं मांश्चतोर्वरुणस्य बभ्रुं ते विश्वास्मद दुरिता यावयन्तु|	the red the brown of varuṇa ever mindful may they ward off from us all grief and trouble.
दधिक्रावा परथमो वाज्यर्वाग्रे रथानां भवति परजानन|	foremost is dadhikrāvan vigorous courser in forefront of the cars his way he knoweth.
संविदान उषसा सूर्येणादित्येभिर्वसुभिरङगिरोभिः|	closely allied with sūrya and with morning Ādityas and aṅgirases and vasus.
आ नो दधिक्राः पथ्यामनक्त्व रतस्य पन्थामन्वेतवा उ|	may dadhikrās prepare the way we travel that we may pass along the path of order.
शर्णोतु नो दैव्यं शर्धो अग्निः शर्ण्वन्तु विश्वे महिषामूराः|	may agni bear us and the heavenly army hear us all mighty ones whom none deceiveth.
इमा रुद्राय सथिरधन्वने गिरः कषिप्रेषवे देवाय सवधाव्ने|	to rudra bring these songs whose bow is firm and strong the selfdependent god with swiftlyflying shafts.
अषाळ्हाय सहमानाय वेधसे तिग्मायुधाय भरता शर्णोतु नः|	the wise the conqueror whom none may overcome armed with sharppointed weapons may he hear our call.
स हि कषयेण कषम्यस्य जन्मनः साम्राज्येन दिव्यस्य चेतति|	he through his lordship thinks on beings of the earth on heavenly beings through his high imperial sway.
अवन्नवन्तीरुप नो दुरश्चरानमीवो रुद्र जासु नो भव|	come willingly to our doors that gladly welcome thee and heal all sickness rudra in our families.
या ते दिद्युदवस्र्ष्टा दिवस परि कष्मया चरति परि साव्र्णक्तु नः|	may thy bright arrow which shot down by thee from heaven flieth upon the earth pass us uninjured by.
सहस्रं ते सवपिवात भेषजा मा नस्तोकेषुतनयेषु रीरिषह|	thou very gracious god hast thousand medicines inflict no evil on our sons or progeny.
मा नो वधी रुद्र मा परा दा मा ते भूम परसितौ हीळितस्य|	slay us not nor abandon us o rudra let not thy noose when thou art angry seize us.
आ नो भज बर्हिषि जीवशंसे यूयं पात|	give us trimmed grass and fame among the living preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
पर बरह्मैतु सदनाद रतस्य वि रश्मिभिः सस्र्जे सूर्यो गाः|	let the prayer issue from the seat of order for sūrya with his beams hath loosed the cattle.
वि सानुना पर्थिवी सस्र उर्वी पर्थु परतीकमध्येधे अग्निः|	with lofty ridges earth is far extended and agnis flame hath lit the spacious surface.
इमां वां मित्रावरुणा सुव्र्क्तिमिषं न कर्ण्वे असुरा नवीयः|	o asuras o varuṇa and mitra this hymn to you like food anew i offer.
इनो वामन्यः पदवीरदब्धो जनं च मित्रो यतति बरुवाणः|	one of you is a strong unerring leader and mitra speaking stirreth men to labour.
आ वातस्य धरजतो रन्त इत्या अपीपयन्त धेनवो न सूदाः|	the movements of the gliding wind come hither like cows the springs are filled to overflowing.
महो दिवः सदने जायमानोअचिक्रदद वर्षभः सस्मिन्नूधन|	born in the station een of lofty heaven the bull hath loudly bellowed in this region.
गिरा य एता युनजद धरी त इन्द्र परिया सुरथा शूर धायू|	may i bring hither with my song o indra wise aryaman who yokes thy dear bay horses.
पर यो मन्युं रिरिक्षतो मिनात्या सुक्रतुमर्यमणं वव्र्त्याम|	voracious with thy noble car o hero him who defeats the wrath of the malicious.
यजन्ते अस्य सख्यं वयश्च नमस्विनः सव रतस्य धामन|	in their own place of sacrifice adorers worship to gain long life and win his friendship.
वि पर्क्षो बाबधे नर्भि सतवान इदं नमो रुद्राय परेष्ठम|	he hath poured food on men when they have praised him be this the dearest reverence paid to rudra.
आ यत साकं यशसो वावशानाः सरस्वती सप्तथी सिन्धुमाता|	coming together glorious loudly roaring  sarasvatī mother of floods the seventh.
याः सुष्वयन्त सुदुघाः सुधारा अभि सवेन पयसा पीप्यानाः|	with copious milk with fair streams strongly flowing full swelling with the volume of their water.
उत तये नो मरुतो मन्दसाना धियं तोकं च वाजिनोअवन्तु|	and may the mighty maruts too rejoicing aid our devotion and protect our offspring.
मा नः परि खयदक्षरा चरन्त्यवीव्र्धन युज्यं ते रयिं नः|	let not swiftmoving aksara neglect us they have increased our own appropriate riches.
पर वो महीमरमतिं कर्णुध्वं पर पूषणं विदथ्यं न वीरम|	bring ye the great aramati before you and pūṣan as the hero of the synod.
भगं धियोअवितारं नो अस्याः सातौ वाजं रातिषाचं पुरन्धिम|	bhaga who looks upon this hymn with favour and as our strength the bountiful purandbi.
अछायं वो मरुतः शलोक एत्वछा विष्णुं निषिक्तपामवोभिः|	may this our song of praise reach you o maruts and viṣṇu guardian of the future infant.
उत परजायै गर्णते वयो धुर्यूयं पात|	may they vouchsafe the singer strength for offspring preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
पराग्नये विश्वशुचे धियन्धेअसुरघ्ने मन्म धीतिं भरध्वम|	bring song and hymn to agni asuraslayer enlightener of all and thoughtbestower.
भरे हविर्न बर्हिषि परीणानो वैश्वानराय यतये मतीनाम|	like an oblation on the grass to please him i bring this to vaiśvānara hymninspirer.
तवमग्ने शोचिषा शोशुचान आ रोदसी अप्र्णा जायमानः|	thou with thy flame o agni brightly glowing hast at thy birth filled full the earth and heaven.
तवं देवानभिशस्तेरमुञ्चो वैस्वानर जातवेदो महित्वा|	tiou with thy might vaiśvānara jātavedas settest the gods free frodi the curse that bound them.
जातो यदग्ने भुवना वयख्यः पशून न गोपा इर्यः परिज्मा|	agni when born thou lookedst on all creatures like a brisk herdsman moving round his cattle.
वैश्वानर बरह्मणे विन्द गातुं यूयं पात|	the path to prayer vaiśvānara thou foundest ye gods preserve us evermore with blessings.
पर शुक्रैतु देवी मनीषा अस्मत सुतष्टो रथो न वाजी|	may our divine and brilliant hymn go forth like a swift chariot wrought and fashioned well.
विदुः पर्थिव्या दिवो जनित्रं शर्ण्वन्त्यापो अध कषरन्तीः|	the waters listen as they flow along they know the origin of heaven and earth.
आपश्चिदस्मै पिन्वन्त पर्थ्वीर्व्र्त्रेषु शूरा मंसन्त उग्राः|	yea the broad waters swell their flood ior him of him strong heroes think amid their foes.
आ धूर्ष्वस्मै दधाताश्वानिन्द्रो न वज्री हिरण्यबाहुः|	set ye for him the coursers to the pole like indra thunderer is the goldenarmed.
अभि पर सथाताहेव यज्ञं यातेव पत्मन तमना हिनोत|	arouse you like the days to sacrifice speed gladly like a traveller on the way.
तमना समत्सु हिनोत यज्ञं दधात केतुं जनाय वीरम|	go swift to battles to the sacrifice set up a flag a hero for the folk.
उदस्य शुष्माद भानुर्नार्त बिभर्ति भारं पर्थिवी नभूम|	up from his strength hath risen as twere a light it bears the load as earth bears living things.
हवयामि देवानयातुरग्ने साधन्न्र्तेन धियं दधामि|	agni no demon i invoke the gods by law completing it i form a hymn.
अभि वो देवीं धियं दधिध्वं पर वो देवत्रा वाचं कर्णुध्वम|	closely albout you lay your heavenly song and send your voice to where the gods abide.
आ चष्ट आसां पाथो नदीनां वरुण उग्रः सहस्रचक्षाः|	varuṇa mighty with a thousand eyes beholds the paths wherein these rivers run.
राजा राष्ट्रानां पेशो नदीनामनुत्तमस्मै कषत्रं विश्वायु|	he king of kings the glory of the floods oer all that liveth hath resistless sway.
अविष्टो अस्मान विश्वासु विक्ष्वद्युं कर्णोत शंसं निनित्सोः|	may he assist us among all the tribes and make the enviers praise devoid of light.
वयेतु दिद्युद दविषामशेवा युयोत विष्वग रपस्तनूनाम|	may the foes threatening arrow pass us by may he put far from us our bodies sin.
अवीन नो अग्निर्हव्यान नमोभिः परेष्ठो अस्मा अधायि सतोमः|	agni oblationcater through our prayers aid us to him our dearest laud is brought.
सजूर्देवेभिरपां नपातं सखायं कर्ध्वं शिवो नो अस्तु|	accordant with the gods choose for our friend the waters child may he be good to us.
अब्जामुक्थैरहिं गर्णीषे बुध्ने नदीनां रजस्सु षीदन|	with lauds i sing the dragon born of floods he sits beneath the streams in middle air.
मा नोअहिर्बुध्न्यो रिषे धान मा यज्ञो अस्य सरिधद रतायोः|	neer may the dragon of the deep harm us neer fail this faithful servants sacrifice.
उत न एषु नर्षु शरवो धुः पर राये यन्तु शर्धन्तो अर्यः|	to these our heroes may they grant renown may pious men march boldly on to wealth.
तपन्ति शत्रुं सवर्ण भूमा महासेनासो अमेभिरेषाम|	leading great hosts with fierce attacks of these they burn their foes as the sun burns the earth.
आ यन नः पत्नीर्गमन्त्यछा तवष्टा सुपाणिर्दधातुवीरान|	what time our wives draw near to us may he lefthanded tvaṣṭar give us hero sons.
परति न सतोमं तवष्टा जुषेत सयादस्मे अरमतिर्वसूयुः|	may tvaṣṭar find our hymn acceptable and may aramati seeking wealth be ours.
ता नो रासन रातिषाचो वसून्या रोदसी वरुणानी शर्णोतु|	may they who lavish gifts bestow those treasures may rodasī and varuṇānī listen.
वरूत्रीभिः सुशरणो नो अस्तु तवष्टा सुदत्रो वि दधातु रायः|	may he with the varūtrīs be our refuge may bountiful tvaṣṭar give us store of riches.
तन नो रायः पर्वतास्तन न आपस्तद रातिषाच ओषधीरुत दयौः|	so may rich mountains and the liberal waters so may all herbs that grow on ground and heaven.
वनस्पतिभिः पर्थिवी सजोषा उभे रोदसी परि पासतो नः|	and earth accordant with the forestsovrans and both the worldhalves round about protect us.
अनु तदुर्वी रोदसी जिहातामनु दयुक्षो वरुण इन्द्रसखा|	to this may both the wide worlds lend approval and varuṇa in heaven whose friend is indra.
अनु विश्वे मरुतो ये सहासो रायः सयाम धरुणं धियध्यै|	may all the maruts give consent the victors that we may hold great wealth in firm possession.
तन न इन्द्रो वरुणो मित्रो अग्निराप ओषधीर्वनिनो जुषन्त|	may indra varuṇa mitra and agni waters herbs trees accept the praise we offer.
शर्मन सयाम मरुतामुपस्थे यूयं पात|	may we find refuge in the maruts bosom protect us evermore ye gods with blessings.
समुद्रज्येष्ठाः सलिलस्य मध्यात पुनाना यन्त्यनिविशमानाः|	forth from the middle of the flood the waterstheir chief the seaflow cleansing never sleeping.
इन्द्रो या वज्री वर्षभो रराद ता आपो देवीरिहमामवन्तु|	indra the bull the thunderer dug their channels here let those waters goddesses protect me.
या आपो दिव्या उत वा सरवन्ति खनित्रिमा उत वा याः सवयंजाः|	waters which come from heaven or those that wander dug from the earth or flowing free by nature.
समुद्रार्था याः शुचयः पावकास्ता आपो|	bright purifying speeding to the ocean here let those waters goddesses protect me.
यासां राजा वरुणो याति मध्ये सत्यान्र्ते अवपश्यञ जनानाम|	those amid whom goes varuṇa the sovran he who discriminates mens truth and falsehood.
मधुश्चुतः शुचयो याः पावकास्ता आपो|	distilling meath the bright the purifying here let those waters goddesses protect me.
यासु राजा वरुणो यासु सोमो विश्वे देवा यासूर्जं मदन्ति|	they from whom varuṇa the king and soma and all the deities drink strength and vigour.
वैश्वानरो यास्वग्निः परविष्टस्ता आपो|	they into whom vaiśvānara agni entered here let those waters goddesses protect me.
ऊर्ध्वो अग्निः सुमतिं वस्वो अश्रेत परतीची जूर्णिर्देवतातिमेति|	agni erect hath shown enriching favour the flame goes forward to the gods assembly.
भेजाते अद्री रथ्येव पन्थां रतं होता न इषितो यजाति|	like carborne men the stones their path have chosen let the priest quickened celebrate our worship.
पर वाव्र्जे सुप्रया बर्हिरेषामा विश्पतीव बीरिट इयाते|	soft to the tread their sacred grass is scattered these go like kings amid the band around them.
विशामक्तोरुषसः पूर्वहूतौ वायुः पूषा सवस्तये नियुत्वान|	at the folks early call on night and morningvāyu and pūṣan with his team to bless us.
जमया अत्र वसवो रन्त देवा उरावन्तरिक्षे मर्जयन्त शुभ्राः|	here on their path the noble gods proceeded in the wide firmament the beauteous decked them.
अर्वाक पथ उरुज्रयः कर्णुध्वं शरोता दूतस्य जग्मुषो नो अस्य|	bend your way hither ye who travel widely hear this our envoy who hath gone to meet you.
ते हि यज्ञेषु यज्ञियास ऊमाः सधस्थं विश्वे अभि सन्ति देवाः|	for they are holy aids at sacrifices all gods approach the place of congregation.
तानध्वर उशतो यक्ष्यग्ने शरुष्टी भगं नासत्या पुरन्धिम|	bring these desirous to our worship agni swift the nisatyas bhaga and purandhi.
आग्ने गिरो दिव आ पर्थिव्या मित्रं वह वरुणमिन्द्रमग्निम|	agni to these mens hymns from earth from heaven bring mitra varuṇa indra and agni.
आर्यमणमदितिं विष्णुमेषां सरस्वती मरुतो मादयन्ताम|	and aryaman and aditi and viṣṇu sarasvatī be joyful and the maruts.
ररे हव्यं मतिभिर्यज्ञियानां नक्षत कामं मर्त्यानामसिन्वन|	even as the holy wish the gift is offered may he unsated come when men desire him.
धाता रयिमविदस्यं सदासां सक्षीमहि युज्येभिर्नु देवैः|	give neverfailing everconquering riches with gods for our allies may we be victors.
नू रोदसी अभिष्टुते वसिष्ठैरतावानो वरुणो मित्रो अग्निः|	now have both worlds been praised by the vasisthas and holy mitra varuṇa and agni.
यछन्तु चन्द्रा उपमं नो अर्कं यूयं पात|	may they bright deities make our song supremest preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
क ईं वयक्ता नरः सनीळा रुद्रस्य मर्या अध सवश्वाः|	wno are these radiant men in serried rank rudras young heroes borne by noble steeds.
नकिर्ह्येषां जनूंषि वेद ते अङग विद्रे मिथो जनित्रम|	verily no one knoweth whence they sprang they and they only know each others birth.
अभि सवपूभिर्मिथो वपन्त वातस्वनसः शयेना अस्प्र्ध्रन|	they strew each other with their blasts these hawks they strove together roaring like the wind.
एतानि धीरो निण्या चिकेत पर्श्निर्यदूधो मही जभार|	a sage was he who knew these mysteries what in her udder mighty pṛśni bore.
सा विट सुवीरा मरुद्भिरस्तु सनात सहन्ती पुष्यन्ती नर्म्णम|	ever victorious through the maruts be this band of heroes nursing manly strength.
यामं येष्ठाः शुभा शोभिष्ठाः शरिया सम्मिश्ला ओजोभिरुग्राः|	most bright in splendour flectest on their way closeknit to glory strong with varied power.
उग्रं व ओज सथिरा शवांस्यधा मरुद्भिर्गणस्तुविष्मान|	yea mighty is your power and firm your strength so potent with the maruts be the band.
शुभ्रो वः शुष्मः करुध्मी मनांसि धुनिर्मुनिरिव शर्धस्य धर्ष्णोः|	bright is your spirit wrathful are your minds your bold troops minstrel is like one inspired.
सनेम्यस्मद युयोत दिद्युं मा वो दुर्मतिरिह परणं नः|	ever avert your blazing shaft from us and let not your displeasure reach us here.
परिया वो नाम हुवे तुराणामा यत तर्पन मरुतो वावशानाः|	your dear names conquering maruts we invoke calling aloud till we are satisfied.
सवायुधास इष्मिणः सुनिष्का उत सवयं तन्वः शुम्भमानाः|	wellarmed impetuous in their haste they deck themselves their forms with oblations to you the pure ornaments made of gold.
शुची वो हव्या मरुतः शुचीनां शुचिं हिनोम्यध्वरं शुचिभ्यः|	pure maruts pure yourselves are your oblations to you the pure pure sacrifice i offer.
रतेन सत्यं रतसाप आयञ्छुचिजन्मानः शुचयः पावकाः|	by law they came to truth the laws observers bright by their birth and pure and sanctifying.
अंसेष्वा मरुतः खादयो वो वक्षस्सु रुक्मा उपशिश्रियाणाः|	your rings o maruts rest upon your shoulders and chains of gold are twined upon your bosoms.
वि विद्युतो न वर्ष्टिभी रुचाना अनु सवधामायुधैर्यछमानाः|	gleaming with drops of rain like lightningflashes after your wont ye whirl about your weapons.
पर बुध्न्या व ईरते महांसि पर नामानि परयज्यवस्तिरध्वम|	wide in the depth of air spread forth your glories far most adorable ye bear your titles.
सहस्रियं दम्यं भागमेतं गर्हमेधीयं मरुतो जुषध्वम|	maruts accept this thousandfold allotment of household sacrifice and household treasure.
यदि सतुतस्य मरुतो अधीथेत्था विप्रस्य वाजिनो हवीमन|	if maruts ye regard the praise recited here at this mighty singer invocation.
मक्षू रायः सुवीर्यस्य दात नू चिद यमन्य आदभदरावा|	vouchsafe us quickly wealth with noble heroes wealth which no man uho hateth us may injure.
अत्यासो न ये मरुतः सवञ्चो यक्षद्र्शो न शुभयन्त मर्याः|	the maruts fleet as coursers while they deck them like youths spectators of a festal meeting.
ते हर्म्येष्ठाः शिशवो न शुभ्रा वत्सासो न परक्रीळिनः पयोधाः|	linger like beauteous colts about the dwelling like frisking calves these who pour down the water.
दशस्यन्तो नो मरुतो मर्ळन्तु वरिवस्यन्तो रोदसी सुमेके|	so may the maruts help us and be gracious bringing free room to lovely earth and heaven.
आरे गोहा नर्हा वधो वो अस्तु सुम्नेभिरस्मे वसवो नमध्वम|	far be your bolt that slayeth men and cattle ye vasus turn yourselves to us with blessings.
आ वो होता जोहवीति सत्तः सत्राचीं रातिं मरुतो गर्णानः|	the priest when seated loudly calls you maruts praising in song your universal bounty.
य ईवतो वर्षणो अस्ति गोपाः सो अद्वयावी हवते व उक्थैः|	he bulls who hath so much in his possession free from duplicity with hymns invokes you.
इमे तुरं मरुतो रामयन्तीमे सहः सहस आ नमन्ति|	these maruts bring the swift man to a standstill and strength with mightier strength they break and humble.
इमेशंसं वनुष्यतो नि पान्ति गुरु दवेषो अररुषे दधन्ति|	these guard the singer from the man who hates him and lay their sore displeasure on the wicked.
इमे रध्रं चिन मरुतो जुनन्ति भर्मिं चिद यथा वसवो जुषन्त|	these maruts rouse even the poor and needy the vasus love him as an active champion.
अप बाधध्वं वर्षणस्तमांसि धत्त विश्वं तनय|	drive to a distance o ye bulls the darkness give us full store of children and descendants.
ं तोकमस्मे|	never o maruts may we lose your bounty nor carborne lords be hitidmost when ye deal it.
मा वो दात्रान मरुतो निरराम मा पश्चाद दघ्म रथ्यो विभागे|	give us a share in that delightful treasure the genuine wealth that bulls is your possession.
आ न सपार्हे भजतना वसव्ये यदीं सुजातं वर्षणो वो अस्ति|	what time the men in fury rush together for running streams for pastures and for houses.
सं यद धनन्त मन्युभिर्जनासः शूरा यह्वीष्वोषधीषु विक्षु|	then o ye maruts ye who spring from rudra be our protectors in the strife with foemen.
अध समा नो मरुतो रुद्रियासस्त्रातारो भूत पर्तनास्वर्यः|	full many a deed ye did for our forefathers worthy of lauds which even of old they sang you.
भूरि चक्र मरुतः पित्र्याण्युक्थानि या वः शस्यन्ते पुरा चित|	lle strong man with the maruts wins in battle the charger with the maruts gains the booty.
मरुद्भिरुग्रः पर्तनासु साळ्हा मरुद्भिरित सनिता वाजमर्वा|	ours o ye maruts be the vigorous hero the lord divine of men the strong sustainer.
अस्मे वीरो मरुतः शुष्म्यस्तु जनानां यो असुरो विधर्ता|	with whom to fair lands we may cross the waters and dwell in our own home with you beside us.
अपो येन सुक्षितये तरेमाध सवमोको अभि वः सयाम|	may indra mitra varuṇa and agni waters and plants and trees accept our praises.
तन न इन्द्रो वरुणो मित्रो अग्निर|	may we find shelter in the maruts bosom preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
इयं वामस्य मन्मन इन्द्राग्नी पूर्व्यस्तुतिः|	as rain from out the cloud for you indra and agni from my soul.
अभ्राद वर्ष्टिरिवाजनि|	this noblest praise hath been produced.
शर्णुतं जरितुर्हवमिन्द्राग्नी वनतं गिरः|	do ye o indraagni hear the singers call accept his songs.
ईशानापिप्यतं धियः|	ye rulers grant his hearts desire.
मा पापत्वाय नो नरेन्द्राग्नी माभिशस्तये|	give us not up to poverty ye heroes indraagni nor.
मा नो रीरधतं निदे|	to slander and reproach of men.
इन्द्रे अग्ना नमो बर्हत सुव्र्क्तिमेरयामहे|	to indra and to agni we bring reverence high and holy hymn.
धिया धेना अवस्यवः|	and craving help softwords with prayer.
ता हि शश्वन्त ईळत इत्था विप्रास ऊतये|	for all these holy singers here implore these twain to succour them.
सबाधो वाजसातये|	and priests that they may win them strength.
ता वां गीर्भिर्विपन्यवः परयस्वन्तो हवामहे|	eager to laudyou we with songs invoke you bearing sacred food.
मेधसाता सनिष्यवः|	fain for success in sacrifice.
इन्द्राग्नी अवसा गतमस्मभ्यं चर्षणीसहा|	indra and agni come to us with favour ye who conquer men.
मा नो दुःशंस ईशत|	let not the wicked master us.
मा कस्य नो अररुषो धूर्तिः परणं मर्त्यस्य|	at no time let the injurious blow of hostile mortal fall on us.
इन्द्राग्नीशर्म यछतम|	o indraagni shelter us.
गोमद धिरण्यवद वसु यद वामश्वावदीमहे|	whatever wealth we crave of you in gold in cattle or in steeds.
इन्द्राग्नीतद वनेमहि|	that indraagni let us gain.
यत सोम आ सुते नर इन्द्राग्नी अजोहवुः|	when heroes prompt in worship call indra and agni lords of steeds.
सप्तीवन्ता सपर्यवः|	beside the soma juice effused.
उक्थेभिर्व्र्त्रहन्तमा या मन्दाना चिदा गिरा|	call hither with the song and lauds those who best slay the foemen those.
आङगूषैराविवासतः|	who take delight in hymns of praise.
ताविद दुःशंसं मर्त्यं दुर्विद्वांसं रक्षस्विनम|	slay ye the wicked man whose thought is evil of the demon kind.
आभोगं हन्मना हतमुदधिं हन्मना हतम|	slay him who stays the waters slay the serpent with your deadly dart.
आदित्यानामवसा नूतनेन सक्षीमहि शर्मणा शन्तमेन|	through the Ādityas most auspicious shelter through their most recent succour may we conquer.
अनागास्त्वे अदितित्वे तुरास इमं यज्ञं दधतु शरोषमाणाः|	may they the mighty giving ear establish this sacrifice to make us free and sinless.
आदित्यासो अदितिर्मादयन्तां मित्रो अर्यमा वरुणो रजिष्ठाः|	let aditi rejoice and the Ādityas varuṇa mitra aryaman most righteous.
अस्माकं सन्तु भुवनस्य गोपाः पिबन्तु सोममवसे नो अद्य|	may they the guardians of the world protect us and to show favour drink this day our soma.
