अस्मे रयिं बहुलं सन्तरुत्रं सुवाचं भागं यशसं कर्धी नः|	grant us abundant wealth that saves from danger that brings a good repute a glorious portion.
एता ते अग्ने जनिमा सनानि पर पूर्व्याय नूतनानि वोचम|	to thee who art of old these songs o agni have i declared the ancient and the later.
महान्ति वर्ष्णे सवना कर्तेमा जन्मञजन्मन निहितो जातवेदाः|	these great libations to the strong are offiered in every birth is jātavedas stablished.
जन्मञजन्मन निहितो जातवेदा विश्वामित्रेभिरिध्यते अजस्रः|	stablished in every birth is jātavedas kindled perpetual by the viśvāmitras.
तस्य वयं सुमतौ यज्ञियस्यापि भद्रे सौमनसे सयाम|	may we rest ever in the lovingkindness in the auspicious grace of him the holy.
इमं यज्ञं सहसावन तवं नो देवत्रा धेहि सुक्रतो रराणः|	this sacrifice of ours do thou o mighty o truly wise bear to the gods rejoicing.
पर यंसि होतर्ब्र्हतीरिषो नोअग्ने महि दरविनमा यजस्व|	grant us abundant food thou priestly herald vouchsafe to give us ample wealth o agni.
इळामग्ने पुरुदंसं सनिं गोः शश्वत्तमं हवमानायसाध|	as holy food agni to thineinvoker give wealth in cattle lasting rich in marvels.
सयान नः सूनुस्तनयो विजावाग्ने सा ते सुमतिर्भुत्वस्मे|	to us he born a son and spreading offspring agni be this thy gracious will to usward.
अग्निर्होता पुरोहितोअध्वरस्य विचर्षणिः|	agni is priest the great high priest of sacrifice most swift in act.
स वेद यज्ञमानुषक|	he knows the rite in constant course.
स हव्यवाळ अमर्त्य उशिग दूतस चनोहितः|	oblationbearer deathless well inclined an eager messenger.
अग्निर्धिया सं रण्वति|	agni comes nigh us with the thought.
अग्निर्धिया स चेतति केतुर्यज्ञस्य पूर्व्यः|	ensign of sacrifice from of old agni well knoweth with his thought.
अर्थं हयस्य तरणि|	to prosper this mans aim and hope.
अग्निं सूनुं सनश्रुतं सहसो जातवेदसम|	agni illustrious from old time the son of strength who knows all life.
वह्निं देवाक्र्ण्वत|	the gods have made to their priest.
अदाभ्यः पुरेता विशामग्निर्मानुषीणाम|	infallible is agni he who goes before the tribes of men.
तूर्णी रथः सदा नवः|	a chariot swift and ever new.
साह्वान विश्वा अभियुजः करतुर्देवानामम्र्क्तः|	strength of the gods which none may harm subduing all his enemies.
अग्निस्तुविश्रवस्तमः|	agni is mightiest in fame.
अभि परयांसि वाहसा दाश्वानश्नोति मर्त्यः|	by offering sacred food to him the mortal worshipper obtains.
कषयं पावकशोचिषः|	a home from him whose light makes pure.
परि विश्वानि सुधिताग्नेरश्याम मन्मभिः|	from agni by our hymns may we gain all things that bring happiness.
विप्रासो जातवेदसः|	singers of him who knows all life.
अग्ने विश्वानि वार्या वाजेषु सनिषामहे|	o agni in our deeds of might may we obtain all precious things.
तवे देवास एरिरे|	tle gods are centred all in thee.
इमं नो यज्ञमम्र्तेषु धेहीमा हव्या जातवेदो जुषस्व|	set this our sacrifice among the immortals be pleased with these our presents jātavedas.
सतोकानामग्ने मेदसो घर्तस्य होतः पराशान परथमो निषद्य|	o priest o agni sit thee down before us and first enjoy the drops of oil and fatness.
घर्तवन्तः पावक ते सतोका शचोतन्ति मेदसः|	for thee o purifier flow the drops of fatness rich in oil.
सवधर्मन देववीतये शरेष्ठं नो धेहि वार्यम|	after thy wont vouchsafe to us the choicest boon that gods may feast.
तुभ्यं सतोका घर्तश्चुतोअग्ने विप्राय सन्त्य|	agni most excellent for thee the sage are drops that drip with oil.
रषिः शरेष्ठः समिध्यसे यज्ञस्य पराविता भव|	thou art enkindled as the best of seers help thou the sacrifice.
तुभ्यं शचोतन्त्यध्रिगो शचीव सतोकासो अग्ने मेदसो घर्तस्य|	to thee o agni mighty and resistless to thee stream forth the drops of oil and fatness.
कविशस्तो बर्हता भानुनागा हव्या जुषस्व मेधिर|	with great light art thou come o praised by poets accept our offering o thou sage.
ओजिष्ठं ते मध्यतो मेद उद्भ्र्तं पर ते वयं ददामहे|	fatness exceeding rich extracted from the midstthis as our gift we offer thee.
शचोतन्ति ते वसो सतोका अधि तवचि परति तान देवशो विहि|	excellent god the drops run down upon thy skin deal them to each among the gods.
आ होता मन्द्रो विदथान्यस्थात सत्यो यज्वा कवितमः सवेधाः|	the pleasant priest is come into the synod true skilled in sacrifice most wise ordainer.
विद्युद्रथः सहसस पुत्रो अग्निः शोचिष्केशः पर्थिव्यां पाजो अश्रेत|	agni the son of strength whose car is lightning whose hair is flame hath shown on earth his lustre.
अयामि ते नमौक्तिं जुषस्व रतावस्तुभ्यं चेतते सहस्वः|	to thee i offer reverent speech accept it to thee who markest it victorious faithful.
विद्वाना वक्षि विदुषो नि षत्सि मध्य आ बर्हिरूतये यजत्र|	bring thou who knowest those who know and seat thee amid the sacred grass for help o holy.
दरवतां त उषसा वाजयन्ती अग्ने वातस्य पथ्याभिरछ|	the two who show their vigour night and morning by the winds paths shall haste to thee o agni.
यत सीमञ्जन्ति पूर्व्यं हविर्भिरा वन्धुरेव तस्थतुर्दुरोणे|	when men adorn the ancient with oblations these seek as on two chariotseats the dwelling.
मित्रश्च तुभ्यं वरुणः सहस्वोअग्ने विश्वे मरुतः सुम्नमर्चन|	to thee strong agni varuṇa and mitra and all the maruts sang a song of triumph.
यच्छोचिषा सहसस पुत्र तिष्ठा अभि कषितीः परथयन सूर्यो नॄन|	what time unto the peoples lands thou camest spreading them as the sun of men with lustre.
वयं ते अद्य ररिमा हि काममुत्तानहस्ता नमसोपसद्य|	approaching with raised hands and adoration we have this day fulfilled for thee thy longing.
यजिष्ठेन मनसा यक्षि देवानस्रेधता मन्मना विप्रो अग्ने|	worship the gods with most devoted spirit a priest with no unfriendly thought o agni.
तवद धि पुत्र सहसो वि पूर्वीर्देवस्य यन्त्यूतयो वि वाजाः|	for son of strength from thee come many succours and powers abundant that a god possesses.
तवं देहि सहस्रिणं रयिं नोअद्रोघेण वचसा सत्यमग्ने|	agni to us with speech that hath no falsehood grant riches real to be told in thousands.
तुभ्यं दक्ष कविक्रतो यानीमा देव मर्तासो अध्वरे अकर्म|	whatever god in sacrifice we mortals have wrought is all for thee strong wise of purpose.
तवं विश्वस्य सुरथस्य बोधि सर्वं तदग्ने अम्र्त सवदेह|	be thou the friend of each good chariots master all this enjoy thou here immortal agni.
अञ्जन्ति तवामध्वरे देवयन्तो वनस्पते मधुना दैव्येन|	godserving men o sovran of the forest with heavenly meath at sacrifice anoint thee.
यदूर्ध्वस्तिष्ठा दरविणेह धत्ताद यद वा कषयो मातुरस्या उपस्थे|	grant wealth to us when thou art standing upright as when reposing on this mothers bosom.
समिद्धस्य शरयमाणः पुरस्ताद बरह्म वन्वानो अजरं सुवीरम|	set up to eastward of the fire enkindled accepting prayer that wastes not rich in hero.
आरे अस्मदमतिं बाधमान उच्छ्रयस्व महते सौभगाय|	driving far from us poverty and famine lift thyself up to bring us great good fortune.
उच्छ्रयस्व वनस्पते वर्ष्मन पर्थिव्या अधि|	lord of the forest raise thyself up on the loftiest spot of earth.
सुमिती मीयमानो वर्चो धा यज्ञवाहसे|	give splendour fixt and measured well to him who brings the sacrifice.
युवा सुवासाः परिवीत आगात स उ शरेयान भवति जायमानः|	wellrobed enveloped he is come the youthful springing to life his glory waxeth greater.
तं धीरासः कवय उन नयन्ति सवाध्यो मनसा देवयन्तः|	contemplative in mind and godadoring sages of high intelligence upraise him.
जातो जायते सुदिनत्वे अह्नां समर्य आ विदथे वर्धमानः|	sprung up he rises in the days fair weather increasing in the menfrequented synod.
पुनन्ति धीरा अपसो मनीषा देवया विप्र उदियर्ति वाचम|	with song the wise and skilful consecrate him his voice the godadoring singer utters.
यान वो नरो देवयन्तो निमिम्युर्वनस्पते सवधितिर्वा ततक्ष|	ye whom religious men have firmly planted thou forest sovran whom the axe hath fashioned.
ते देवासः सवरवस्तस्थिवांसः परजावदस्मे दिधिषन्तु रत्नम|	let those the stakes divine which here are standing be fain to grant us wealth with store of children.
ये वर्क्णासो अधि कषमि निमितासो यतस्रुचः|	o men who lift the ladles up these hewn and planted in the ground.
ते नो वयन्तु वार्यं देवत्रा कषेत्रसाधसः|	bringing a blessing to the field shall bear our precious gift to gods.
आदित्या रुद्रा वसवः सुनीथा दयावाक्षामा पर्थिवी अन्तरिक्षम|	Ādityas rudras vasus careful leaders earth heaven and prthivi and airs midregion.
सजोषसो यज्ञमवन्तु देवा ऊर्ध्वं कर्ण्वन्त्वध्वरस्य केतुम|	accordant deities shall bless our worship and make our sacrifices ensign lofty.
हंसा इव शरेणिशो यतानाः शुक्रा वसानाः सवरवो नागुः|	like swans that flee in lengthened line the pillars have come to us arrayed in brilliant coiour.
उन्नीयमानाः कविभिः पुरस्ताद देवा देवानामपि यन्ति पाथः|	they lifted up on high by sages eastward go forth as gods to the gods dwellingplaces.
शर्ङगाणीवेच्छ्र्ङगिणां सं दद्र्श्रे चषालवन्तः सवरवः पर्थिव्याम|	those stakes upon the earth with rings that deck them seem to the eye like horns of horned creatures.
वाघद्भिर्वा विहवे शरोषमाणा अस्मानवन्तु पर्तनाज्येषु|	or as upraised by priests in invocation let them assist us in the rush to battle.
वनस्पते शतवल्शो वि रोह सहस्रवल्शा वि वयं रुहेम|	lord of the wood rise with a hundred branches with thousand branches may we rise to greatness.
यं तवामयं सवधितिस्तेजमानः परणिनाय महते सौभगाय|	tlou whom this hatchct with an edge well whetted for great felicity hath brought before us.
इमं महे विदथ्याय शूषं शश्वत कर्त्व ईड्यय पर जभ्रुः|	to him adorable mighty meet for synods this strengthening hymn unceasing have they offered.
शर्णोतु नो दम्येभिरनीकैः शर्णोत्वग्निर्दिव्यैरजस्रः|	may agni hear us with his homely splendours hear us eternal one with heavenly lustre.
महि महे दिवे अर्चा पर्थिव्यै कामो म इछञ्चरति परजानन|	to mighty heaven and earth i sing forth loudly my wish goes out desirous and well knowing.
ययोर्ह सतोमे विदथेषु देवाः सपर्यवो मादयन्ते सचायोः|	both at whose laud in synods showing favour the gods rejoice them with the living mortal.
युवोर्र्तं रोदसी सत्यमस्तु महे षु णः सुविताय पर भूतम|	o heaven and earth may your great law he faithful he ye our leaders for our high advantage.
इदं दिवे नमो अग्ने पर्थिव्यै सपर्यामि परयसा यामि रत्नम|	to heaven and earth i offer this my homage with food o agni as i pray for riches.
उतो हि वां पूर्व्या आविविद्र रतावरी रोदसी सत्यवाचः|	yea holy heaven and earth the ancient sages whose word was ever true had power to find you.
नरश्चिद वां समिथे शूरसातौ ववन्दिरे पर्थिवि वेविदानाः|	and brave men in the fightwhere heroes conquer o earth have known you well and paid you honour.
को अद्धा वेद क इह पर वोचद देवानछा पथ्या का समेति|	what pathway leadeth to the gods who knoweth this of a truth and who will now declare it.
दद्र्श्र एषामवमा सदांसि परेषु या गुह्येषु वरतेषु|	seen are their lowest dwellingplaces only but they are in remote and secret regions.
कविर्न्र्चक्षा अभि षीमचष्ट रतस्य योना विघ्र्ते मदन्ती|	the sage who looketh on mankind hath viewed them bedewed rejoicing in the seat of order.
नाना चक्राते सदनं यथा वः समानेन करतुना संविदाने|	they make a home as for a bird though parted with one same will finding themselves together.
समान्या वियुते दूरेन्ते धरुवे पदे तस्थतुर्जागरूके|	partners though parted with fardistant limits on one firm place both stand for ever watchful.
उत सवसारा युवती भवन्ती आदु बरुवाते मिथुनानि नाम|	and being young for evermore as sisters speak to each other names that are united.
विश्वेदेते जनिमा सं विविक्तो महो देवान बिभ्रती न वयथेते|	all living things they part and keep asunder though bearing up the mighty gods they reel not.
एजद धरुवं पत्यते विश्वमेकं चरत पतत्रि विषुणं वि जातम|	one all is lord of what is fixed and moving that walks that flies this multiform creation.
सना पुराणमध्येम्यारान महः पितुर्जनितुर्जामि तन नः|	afar the ancient from of old i ponder our kinship with our mighty sire and father.
देवासो यत्र पनितार एवैरुरौ पथि वयुते तस्थुरन्तः|	singing the praise whereof the gods by custom stand on the spacious farextended pathway.
इमं सतोमं रोदसी पर बरवीम्य रदूदराः शर्णवन्नग्निजिह्वाः|	this laud o heaven and earth to you i utter let the kindhearted hear whose tongue is agni.
मित्रः सम्राजो वरुणो युवान आदित्यासः कवयः पप्रथानाः|	young sovran rulers varuṇa and mitra the wise and very glorious Ādityas.
हिरण्यपाणिः सविता सुजिह्वस्त्रिरा दिवो विदथे पत्यमानः|	the fairtongued savitar the goldenhanded comes thrice from heaven as lord in our assembly.
देवेषु च सवितः शलोकमश्रेरादस्मभ्यमा सुवसर्वतातिम|	bear to the gods this song of praise and send us then savitar complete and perfect safety.
सुक्र्त सुपाणिः सववान रतावा देवस्त्वष्टावसे तानि नोधात|	deft worker skifulhanded helpful holy may tvaṣṭar god give us these things to aid us.
पूषण्वन्त रभवो मादयध्वमूर्ध्वग्रावाणो अध्वरमतष्ट|	take your delight ye Ṛbhus joined with pūṣan ye have prepared the rite with stones adjusted.
विद्युद्रथा मरुत रष्टिमन्तो दिवो मर्या रतजाता अयासः|	borne on their flashing car the speararmed maruts the nimble youths of heaven the sons of order.
सरस्वती शर्णवन यज्ञियासो धाता रयिं सहवीरं तुरासः|	the holy and sarasvatī shall hear us ye mighty give us wealth with noble offspring.
विष्णुं सतोमासः पुरुदस्ममर्का भगस्येव कारिणो यामनि गमन|	to viṣṇu rich in marvels songs and praises shall go as singers on the road of bhaga.
उरुक्रमः ककुहो यस्य पूर्विर्न मर्धन्ति युवतयोजनित्रीः|	the chieftain of the mighty stride whose mothers the many young dames never disregard him.
इन्द्रो विश्वैर्वीर्यैः पत्यमान उभे आ पप्रौ रोदसी महित्वा|	indra who rules through all his powers heroic hath with his majesty filled earth and heaven.
पुरन्दरो वर्त्रहा धर्ष्णुषेणः संग्र्भ्या न आ भरा भूरि पश्वः|	lord of brave hosts fortcrusher vṛtraslayer gather thou up and bring us store of cattle.
नासत्या मे पितरा बन्धुप्र्छा सजात्यमश्विनोश्चारु नाम|	my sires are the nāsatyas kind tokinsmen the aśvins kinship is a glorious title.
युवं हि सथो रयिदौ नो रयीणां दात्रं रक्षेथे अकवैरदब्धा|	for ye are they who give us store of riches ye guard your gift uncheated by the bounteous.
महत तद वः कवयश्चारु नाम यद ध देव भवथ विश्व इन्द्रे|	this is ye wise your great and glorious title that all ye deities abide in indra.
सख रभुभिः पुरुहूत परियेभिरिमां धियं सातये तक्षता नः|	friend muchinvoked art thou with thy dear Ṛbhus fashion ye this our hymn for our advantage.
अर्यमा णो अदितिर्यज्ञियासोअदब्धानि वरुणस्य वरतानि|	aryaman aditi deserve our worship the laws of varuṇa remain unbroken.
युयोत नो अनपत्यानि गन्तोः परजावान नः पशुमानस्तु गातुः|	the lot of childlessness remove ye from us and let our course be rich in kine and offspring.
देवानां दूतः पुरुध परसूतोअनागान नो वोचतु सर्वताता|	may the gods envoy sent to many a quarter proclaim us sinless for our perfect safety.
शर्णोतु नः पर्थिवी दयौरुतापः सूर्यो नक्षत्रैरुर्वन्तरिक्षम|	may earth and heaven the sun the waters hear us and the wide firmament and constellations.
शर्ण्वन्तु नो वर्षणः पर्वतासो धरुवक्षेमास इळया मदन्तः|	hear us the mouatains which distil the raindrops and resting firm rejoice in freshening moisture.
आदित्यैर्नो अदितिः शर्णोतु यछन्तु नो मरुतः शर्मभद्रम|	may aditi with the Ādityas hear us and maruts grant us their auspicious shelter.
सदा सुगः पितुमानस्तु पन्था मध्व देवा ओषधीः सम्पिप्र्क्त|	soft be our path for ever wellprovisioned with pleasant meath o gods the herbs besprinkle.
भगो मे अग्ने सख्ये न मर्ध्या उद रायो अश्यां सदनं पुरुक्षोः|	safe be my bliss o agni in thy friendship may i attain the seat of foodful riches.
सवदस्व हव्या समिषो दिदीह्यस्मद्र्यक सं मिमीहि शरवांसि|	enjoy the offering beam thou strength upon us combine thou for our good all kinds of glory.
विश्वानग्ने पर्त्सु तञ जेषि शत्रूनहा विश्वा सुमना दीदिही नः|	conquer in battle agni all those foemen and light us every day with loving kindness.
अग्निं होतारं पर वर्णे मियेधे गर्त्सं कविं विश्वविदममूरम|	agni quick sage infallible allknowing i choose to be our priest at this oblation.
स नो यक्षद देवताता यजीयान राये वाजाय वनतेमघानि|	in our gods service he best skilled shall worship may he obtain us boons for strength and riches.
पर ते अग्ने हविष्मतीमियर्म्यछा सुद्युम्नां रातिनीं घर्ताचीम|	agni to thee i lift the oilfed ladle bright with an offering bearing our oblation.
परदक्षिणिद देवतातिमुराणः सं रातिभिर्वसुभिर्यज्ञमश्रेत|	from the right hand choosing the gods attendance he with rich presents hath arranged the worship.
स तेजीयसा मनसा तवोत उत शिक्ष सवपत्यस्य शिक्षोः|	of keenest spirit is the man thou aidest give us good offspring thou who givest freely.
अग्ने रायो नर्तमस्य परभूतौ भूयाम ते सुष्टुतयश्च वस्वः|	in power of wealth most rich in men o agni of thee the good may we sing forth fair praises.
भूरीणि हि तवे दधिरे अनीकाग्ने देवस्य यज्यवो जनासः|	men as they worship thee the god o agni have set on thee full many a brilliant aspect.
स आ वह देवतातिं यविष्ठ शर्धो यदद्य दिव्यंयजासि|	so bring most youthful one the gods assembly the heavenly host which thou today shalt honour.
यत तवा होतारमनजन मियेधे निषादयन्तो यजथाय देवाः|	when gods anoint thee priest at their oblation and seat thee for thy task as sacrificer.
स तवं नो अग्नेअवितेह बोध्यधि शरवांसि धेहि नस्तनूषु|	o agni be thou here our kind defender and to ourselves vouchsafe the gift of glory.
अस्तीदमधिमन्थनमस्ति परजननं कर्तम|	here is the gear for friction here tinder made ready for the spark.
एतां विश्पत्नीमा भराग्निं मन्थाम पूर्वथा|	bring thou the matron we will rub agni in ancient fashion forth.
अरण्योर्निहितो जातवेदा गर्भ इव सुधितो गर्भिणीषु|	n the two firesticks jātavedas lieth even as the wellset germ in pregnant women.
दिवेदिव ईड्यो जाग्र्वद्भिर्हविष्मद्भिर्मनुष्येभिरग्निः|	agni who day by day must be exalted by men who watch and worship with oblations.
उत्तानायामव भरा चिकित्वान सद्यः परवीता वर्षणं जजान|	lay this with care on that which lies extended straight hath she borne the steer when made prolific.
अरुषस्तूपो रुशदस्य पाज इळायास पुत्रो वयुनेअजनिष्ट|	with his red pillarradiant is his splendourin our skilled task is born the son of iḷā.
इळायास्त्वा पदे वयं नाभा पर्थिव्या अधि|	in iḷās place we set thee down upon the central point of earth.
जातवेदो नि धीमह्यग्ने हव्याय वोळ्हवे|	that agni jātavedas thou mayst bear our offerings to the gods.
मन्थता नरः कविमद्वयन्तं परचेतसमम्र्तं सुप्रतीकम|	rub into life ye men the sage the guileless immortal very wise and fair to look on.
यज्ञस्य केतुं परथमं पुरस्तादग्निं नरो जनयता सुशेवम|	o men bring forth the most propitious agni first ensign of the sacrifice to eastward.
यदी मन्थन्ति बाहुभिर्वि रोचतेअश्वो न वाज्यरुषो वनेष्वा|	when with their arms they rub him straight he shineth forth like a strong courser red in colour in the wood.
चित्रो न यामन्नश्विनोरनिव्र्तः परि वर्णक्त्यश्मनस्त्र्णा दहन|	bright checkless as it were upon the aśvins path he passeth by the stones and burneth up the grass.
जातो अग्नी रोचते चेकितानो वाजी विप्रः कविशस्तः सुदानुः|	agni shines forth when born observant mighty the bountiful the singer praised by sages.
यं देवास ईड्यं विश्वविदं हव्यवाहमदधुरध्वरेषु|	whom as adorable and knowing all things gods set at solemn rites as offeringbearer.
सीद होतः सव उ लोके चिकित्वान सादया यज्ञं सुक्र्तस्य योनौ|	set thee o priest in thine own place observant lay down the sacrifice in the home of worship.
देवावीर्देवान हविषा यजास्यग्ने बर्हद यजमाने वयो धाः|	thou dear to gods shalt serve them with oblation agni give long life to the sacrificer.
कर्णोत धूमं वर्षणं सखायोअस्रेधन्त इतन वाजमछ|	raise ye a mighty smoke my fellowworkers ye shall attain to wealth without obstruction.
अयमग्निः पर्तनाषाट सुवीरो येन देवासो असहन्त दस्यून|	this agni is the battlewinning hero by whom the gods have overcome the dasyus.
अयं ते योनिर्र्त्वियो यतो जातो अरोचथाः|	this is thine ordered place of birth whence sprung to life thou shonest forth.
तं जानन्नग्न आ सीदाथा नो वर्धया गिरः|	knowing this agni sit thee down and prosper thou the songs we sing.
तनूनपादुच्यते गर्भ आसुरो नराशंसो भवति यद विजायते|	as germ celestial he is called tanūnapāt and narāśaṁsa born diffused in varied shape.
मातरिश्वा यदमिमीत मातरि वातस्य सर्गो अभवत्सरीमणि|	formed in his mother he is mātariśvan he hath in his course become the rapid flight of wind.
सुनिर्मथा निर्मथितः सुनिधा निहितः कविः|	with strong attrition rubbed to life laid down with careful hand a sage.
अग्ने सवध्वरा कर्णु देवान देवयते यज|	agni make sacrifices good and for the pious bring the gods.
अजीजनन्नम्र्तं मर्त्यासोअस्रेमाणं तरणिं वीळुजम्भम|	mortals have brought to life the god immortal the conqueror with mighty jaws unfailing.
दश सवसारो अग्रुवः समीचीः पुमांसं जातमभि सं रभन्ते|	the sisters ten unwedded and united together grasp the babe the newborn infant.
पर सप्तहोता सनकादरोचत मातुरुपस्थे यदशोचदूधनि|	served by the seven priests he shone forth from ancient time when in his mothers bosom in her lap he glowed.
न नि मिषति सुरणो दिवेदिवे यदसुरस्य जठरादजायत|	giving delight each day he closeth not his eye since from the asuras body hewas brought to life.
अमित्रायुधो मरुतामिव परयाः परथमजा बरह्मणो विश्वमिद विदुः|	even as the maruts onslaughts who attack the foe those born the first of all knew the full power of prayer.
दयुम्नवद बरह्म कुशिकास एरिर एकएको दमे अग्निं समीधिरे|	the kuśikas have made the glorious hymn ascend and each one singly in his home have kindled fire.
यदद्य तवा परयति यज्ञे अस्मिन होतश्चिकित्वोअव्र्णीमहीह|	as we o priest observant have elected thee this day what time the solemn sacrifice began.
धरुवमया धरुवमुताशमिष्ठाः परजानन विद्वानुप याहि सोमम|	so surely hast thou worshipped surely hast thou toiled come thou unto the soma wise and knowing all.
तवामग्ने मनीषिणः सम्राजं चर्षणीनाम|	thee agni god imperial lord of all mankind do mortal men.
देवं मर्तास इन्धते समध्वरे|	with understanding kindle at the sacrifice.
तवां यज्ञेष्व रत्विजमग्ने होतारमीळते|	they laud thee in their solemn rites agni as minister and priest.
गोपा रतस्य दीदिहि सवे दमे|	shine forth in thine own home as guardian of the law.
स घा यस्ते ददाशति समिधा जातवेदसे|	he verily who honours thee with fuel knower of all life.
सो अग्ने धत्तेसुवीर्यं स पुष्यति|	he agni wins heroic might he prospers well.
स केतुरध्वराणामग्निर्देवेभिरा गमत|	ensign of sacrifices he agni with gods is come to us.
अञ्जानः सप्त होत्र्भिर्हविष्मते|	decked by the seven priests to him who bringeth gifts.
पर होत्रे पूर्व्यं वचोअग्नये भरता बर्हत|	to agni the invoking priest offer your best your lofty speech.
विपां जयोतींषि बिभ्रते न वेधसे|	to him ordainerlike who brings the light of songs.
अग्निं वर्धन्तु नो गिरो यतो जायत उक्थ्यः|	let these our hymns make agni grow whence meet for laud he springs to life.
महे वाजायद्रविणाय दर्शतः|	to mighty strength and great possession fair to see.
अग्ने यजिष्ठो अध्वरे देवान देवयते यज|	best sacrificer bring the gods o agni to the pious man.
होता मन्द्रो विराजस्यति सरिधः|	a joyful priest thy splendour drive our foes afar.
स नः पावक दीदिहि दयुमदस्मे सुवीर्यम|	as such o purifier shine on us heroic glorious might.
भवा सतोत्र्भ्योन्तमः सवस्तये|	be nearest friend to those who laud thee for their weal.
तं तवा विप्रा विपन्यवो जाग्र्वांसः समिन्धते|	so wakeful versed in sacred hymns the holy singers kindly thee.
हव्यवाहममर्त्यं सहोव्र्धम|	oblationbearer deathless cherisher of strength.
इछन्ति तवा सोम्यासः सखायः सुन्वन्ति सोमं दधति परयांसि|	the friends who offer soma long to find thee they pour forth soma and present their viands.
तितिक्षन्ते अभिशस्तिं जनानामिन्द्र तवदा कश्चन हि परकेतः|	they bear unmoved the cursing of the people for all our wisdom comes from thee o indra.
न ते दूरे परमा चिद रजांस्या तु पर याहि हरिवो हरिभ्याम|	not far for thee are midairs loftiest regions start hither lord of bays with thy bay horses.
सथिराय वर्ष्णे सवना कर्तेमा युक्ता गरावाणः समिधाने अग्नौ|	made for the firm and strong are these libations the pressingstones are set and fire is kindled.
इन्द्रः सुशिप्रो मघवा तरुत्रो महाव्रातस्तुविकूर्मिर्र्घावान|	fair cheeks hath indra maghavan the victor lord of a great host stormer strong in action.
यदुग्रो धा बाधितो मर्त्येषु कव तया ते वर्षभ वीर्याणि|	what once thou didst in might when mortals vexed theewhere now o bull are those thy hero exploits.
तवं हि षमा चयावयन्नच्युतान्येको वर्त्रा चरसि जिघ्नमानः|	for overthrowing what hath neer been shaken thou goest forth alone destroying vṛtras.
तव दयावाप्र्थिवी पर्वतासोअनु वरताय निमितेव तस्थुः|	for him who followeth thy law the mountains and heaven and earth stand as if firmly stablished.
उताभये पुरुहूत शरवोभिरेको दर्ळ्हमवदो वर्त्रहा सन|	yea muchinvoked in safety through thy glories alone thou speakest truth as vṛtras slayer.
इमे चिदिन्द्र रोदसी अपारे यत संग्र्भ्णा मघवन काशिरित ते|	een these two boundless worlds to thee o indra what time thou graspest them are but a handful.
पर सू त इन्द्र परवता हरिभ्यां पर ते वज्रः परम्र्णन्नेतु शत्रून|	forthwith thy bay steeds down the steep o indra forth crushing foemen go thy bolt of thunder.
जहि परतीचो अनूचः पराचो विश्वं सत्यंक्र्णुहि विष्टमस्तु|	slay those who meet thee those who flee who follow make all thy promise true be all completed.
यस्मै धायुरदधा मर्त्यायाभक्तं चिद भजते गेह्यं सः|	the man to whom thou givest as provider enjoys domestic plenty undivided.
भद्रा त इन्द्र सुमतिर्घ्र्ताची सहस्रदाना पुरुहूत रातिः|	blest indra is thy favour dropping fatness thy worship muchinvoked brings gifts in thousands.
सहदानुं पुरुहूत कषियन्तमहस्तमिन्द्र सं पिणक कुणारुम|	thou indra muchinvoked didst crush to pieces kunaru handless fiend who dwelt with danu.
अभि वर्त्रं वर्धमानं पियारुमपादमिन्द्र तवसा जघन्थ|	thou with might indra smotest dead the scorner the footless vṛtra as he waxed in vigour.
नि सामनामिषिरामिन्द्र भूमिं महीमपारां सदने ससत्थ|	thou hast established in her seat o indra the level earth vast vigorous unbounded.
अस्तभ्नाद दयां वर्षभो अन्तरिक्षमर्षन्त्वापस्त्वयेह परसूताः|	the bull hath propped the heaven and airs midregion by thee sent onward let the floods flow hither.
अलात्र्णो वल इन्द्र वरजो गोः पुरा हन्तोर्भयमानो वयार|	he who withheld the kine in silence i yielded in fear before thy blow o indra.
सुगान पथो अक्र्णोन निरजे गाः परावन वाणीः पुरुहूतं धमन्तीः|	he made paths easy to drive forth the cattle loudbreathing praises helped the muchinvoked one.
एको दवे वसुमती समीची इन्द्र आ पप्रौ पर्थिवीमुत दयाम|	indra alone filled full the earth and heaven the pair who meet together rich in treasures.
उतान्तरिक्षादभि नः समीक इषो रथीः सयुजः शूर वाजान|	yea bring thou near us from the airs midregion strength on thy car and wholesome food o hero.
दिशः सूर्यो न मिनाति परदिष्टा दिवेदिवे हर्यश्वप्रसूताः|	sūrya transgresses not the ordered limits set daily by the lord of tawny coursers.
सं यदानळ अध्वन आदिदश्वैर्विमोचनं कर्णुते तत तवस्य|	when to the goal he comes his journey ended his steeds he looses this is indras doing.
दिद्र्क्षन्त उषसो यामन्नक्तोर्विवस्वत्या महि चित्रमनीकम|	men gladly in the course of night would look on the broad bright front of the refulgent morning.
विश्वे जानन्ति महिना यदागादिन्द्रस्य कर्म सुक्र्तापुरूणि|	and all acknowledge when she comes in glory the manifold and goodly works of indra.
महि जयोतिर्निहितं वक्षणास्वामा पक्वं चरति बिभ्रती गौः|	a mighty splendour rests upon her bosom bearing ripe milk the cow unripe advances.
विश्वं सवाद्म सम्भ्र्तमुस्रियायां यत सीमिन्द्रो अदधाद भोजनाय|	all sweetness is collected in the heifer sweetness which indra made for our enjoyment.
इन्द्र दर्ह्य यामकोशा अभूवन यज्ञाय शिक्ष गर्णते सखिभ्यः|	barring the way they come be firm o indra aid friends to sacrifice and him who singeth.
दुर्मायवो दुरेवा मर्त्यासो निषङगिणो रिपवो हन्त्वासः|	these must be slain by thee malignant mortals armed with ill arts our quiverbearing foemen.
सं घोषः शर्ण्वेअवमैरमित्रैर्जही नयेष्वशनिं तपिष्ठाम|	a cry is beard from enemies most near us against them send thy fiercestflaming weapon.
वर्श्चेमधस्ताद वि रुजा सहस्व जहि रक्षो मघवन रन्धयस्व|	rend them from under crush them and subdue them slay maghavan and make the fiends our booty.
उद वर्ह रक्षः सहमूलमिन्द्र वर्श्चा मध्यं परत्यग्रंश्र्णीहि|	root up the race of rākṣasas o indra rend it in front and crush it in the middle.
आ कीवतः सललूकं चकर्थ बरह्मद्विषे तपुषिं हेतिमस्य|	how long hast thou bebaved as one who wavers cast thy hot dart at him who hates devotion.
सवस्तये वाजिभिश्च परणेतः सं यन महीरिष आसत्सिपूर्वीः|	when borne by strong steeds for our weal o leader thou seatest thee at many noble viands.
रायो वन्तारो बर्हतः सयामास्मे अस्तु भग इन्द्रप्रजावान|	may we be winners of abundant riches may indra be our wealth with store of children.
आ नो भर भगमिन्द्र दयुमन्तं नि ते देष्णस्य धीमहि पररेके|	bestow on us resplendent wealth o indra let us enjoy thine overflow of bounty.
ऊर्व इव पप्रथे कामो अस्मे तमा पर्ण वसुपते वसूनाम|	wide as a sea our longing hath expanded fulfil it o thou treasurelord of treasures.
इमं कामं मन्दया गोभिरश्वैश्चन्द्रवता राधसा पप्रथश्च|	with kine and horses satisfy this longing with very splendid bounty skill extend it.
सवर्यवो मतिभिस्तुभ्यं विप्रा इन्द्राय वाहःकुशिकासो अक्रन|	seeking the light with hymns to thee o indra kuśikas have brought their gift the singers.
आ नो गोत्रा दर्द्र्हि गोपते गाः समस्मभ्यं सनयो यन्तु वाजाः|	lord of the kine burst the kines stable open cows shall be ours and strength that wins the booty.
दिवक्षा असि वर्षभ सत्यशुष्मोअस्मभ्यं सु मघवन बोधि गोदाः|	hero whose might is true thy home is heaven to us o maghavan grant gifts of cattle.
शुनं हुवेम मघवानमिन्द्रमस्मिन भरे नर्तमं वाजसातौ|	call we on maghavan auspicious indra best hero in this fight where spoil is gathered.
शर्ण्वन्तमुग्रमूतये समत्सु घनन्तं वर्त्राणि संजितं धनानाम|	the strong who listens who gives aid in battles who slays the vṛtras wins and gathers riches.
वैश्वानरं मनसाग्निं निचाय्या हविष्मन्तो अनुषत्यं सवर्विदम|	revering in our heart agni vaiśvānara the finder of the light whose promises are true.
सुदानुं देवं रथिरं वसूयवो गीर्भी रण्वंकुशिकासो हवामहे|	the liberal gladsome carborne god we kuśikas invoke him with oblation seeking wealth with songs.
तं शुभ्रमग्निमवसे हवामहे वैश्वानरं मातरिश्वानमुक्थ्यम|	that agni bright vaiśvānara we invoke for help and mātariśvan worthy of the song of praise.
बर्हस्पतिं मनुषो देवतातये विप्रं शरोतारमतिथिं रघुष्यदम|	bṛhaspati for mans observance of the gods the singer prompt to hear the swiftlymoving guest.
अश्वो न करन्दञ जनिभिः समिध्यते वैश्वानरः कुशिकेभिर्युगेयुगे|	age after age vaiśvānara neighing like a horse is kindled with the women by the kuśikas.
स नो अग्निः सुवीर्यं सवश्व्यं दधातु रत्नमम्र्तेषु जाग्र्विः|	may agni he who wakes among immortal gods grant us heroic strength and wealth in noble steeds.
पर यन्तु वाजास्तविषीभिरग्नयः शुभे सम्मिष्लाः पर्षतीरयुक्षत|	let them go forth the strong as flames of fire with might gathered for victory they have yoked their spotted deer.
बर्हदुक्षो मरुतो विश्ववेदसः पर वेपयन्तिपर्वतानदाभ्याः|	pourers of floods the maruts masters of all wealth they who can neer be conquered make the mountains shake.
अग्निश्रियो मरुतो विश्वक्र्ष्टय आ तवेषमुग्रमव ईमहे वयम|	the maruts friends of men are glorious as the fire their mighty and resplendent succour we implore.
ते सवानिनो रुद्रिया वर्षनिर्णिजः सिंहा न हेषक्रतवः सुदानवः|	those storming sons of rudra clothed in robes of rain boongivers of good gifts roar as the lions roar.
वरातंवरातं गणंगणं सुशस्तिभिरग्नेर्भामं मरुतामोज ईमहे|	we band on band and troop following troop entreat with fair lauds agnis splendour and the maruts might.
पर्षदश्वासो अनवभ्रराधसो गन्तारो यज्ञं विदथेषु धीराः|	with spotted deer for steeds with wealth that never fails they wise ones come to sacrifice at our gatherings.
अग्निरस्मि जन्मना जातवेदा घर्तं मे चक्षुरम्र्तं म आसन|	agni am i who know by birth all creatures mine eye is butter in my mouth is nectar.
अर्कस्त्रिधातू रजसो विमानोअजस्रो घर्मो हविरस्मि नाम|	i am light threefold measurer of the region exhaustless heat am i named burntoblation.
तरिभिः पवित्रैरपुपोद धयर्कं हर्दा मतिं जयोतिरनु परजानन|	bearing in mind a thought with light accordant he purified the sun with three refinings.
वर्षिष्ठं रत्नमक्र्त सवधाभिरादिद दयावाप्र्थिवी पर्यपश्यत|	by his own nature gained the highest treasure and looked abroad over the earth and heaven.
शतधारमुत्समक्षीयमाणं विपश्चितं पितरं वक्त्वानाम|	the spring that fails not with a hundred streamlets father inspired of prayers that men should utter.
मेळिं मदन्तं पित्रोरुपस्थे तं रोदसी पिप्र्तं सत्यवाचम|	the sparkler joyous in his parents bosorn him the truthspeaker sate ye earth and heaven.
अयं ते अस्तु हर्यतः सोम आ हरिभिः सुतः|	may this delightsome soma be expressed for thee by tawny stones.
जुषाण इन्द्र हरिभिर्न आ गह्या तिष्ठ हरितं रथम|	joying thereat o indra with thy bay steeds come ascend thy goldencoloured car.
हर्यन्नुषसमर्चयः सूर्यं हर्यन्नरोचयः|	in love thou madest uṣas glow in love thou madest sūrya shine.
विद्वांष्चिकित्वान हर्यश्व वर्धस इन्द्र विश्वा अभि शरियः|	thou indra knowing thinking lord of tawny steeds above all glories waxest great.
दयामिन्द्रो हरिधायसं पर्थिवीं हरिवर्पसम|	the heaven with streams of golden hue earth with her tints of green and gold.
अधारयद धरितोर्भूरि भोजनं ययोरन्तर्हरिश्चरत|	the golden pair yield indra plenteous nourishment between them moves the golden one.
जज्ञानो हरितो वर्षा विश्वमा भाति रोचनम|	when born to life the golden bull illumines all the realm of light.
हर्यश्वो हरितं धत्त आयुधमा वज्रं बाह्वोर्हरिम|	he takes his golden weapon lord of tawny steeds the golden thunder in his arms.
इन्द्रो हर्यन्तमर्जुनं वज्रं शुक्रैरभीव्र्तम|	the bright the wellloved thunderbolt girt with the bright indra disclosed.
अपाव्र्णोद धरिभिरद्रिभिः सुतमुद गा हरिभिराजत|	disclosed the soma juice pressed out by tawny stones with tawny steeds drave forth the kine.
इन्द्राग्नी आ गतं सुतं गीर्भिर्नभो वरेण्यम|	moved indraagni by our hymn come to the juice the precious dew.
अस्य पातं धियेषिता|	drink ye thereof impelled by song.
इन्द्राग्नी जरितुः सचा यज्ञो जिगाति चेतनः|	o indraagni with the man who lauds you comes the wakening rite.
अया पातमिमं सुतम|	so drink ye both this juice assured.
इन्द्रमग्निं कविछदा यज्ञस्य जूत्या वर्णे|	through force of sacrifice i choose indraagni who love the wise.
ता सोमस्येह तर्म्पताम|	with soma let these sate them here.
तोशा वर्त्रहणा हुवे सजित्वानापराजिता|	indra and agni i invoke jointvictors bounteous unsubdued.
इन्द्राग्नी वाजसातमा|	foeslayers best to win the spoil.
पर वामर्चन्त्युक्थिनो नीथाविदो जरितारः|	indra and agni singers skilled in melody hymn you bringing lauds.
इन्द्राग्नी इष आ वर्णे|	i choose you for the sacred food.
इन्द्राग्नी नवतिं पुरो दासपत्नीरधूनुतम|	indra and agni ye cast down the ninety forts which dāsas held.
साकमेकेन कर्मणा|	together with one mighty deed.
इन्द्राग्नी अपसस पर्युप पर यन्ति धीतयः|	to indraagni reverent thoughts go forward from the holy task.
रतस्य पथ्या अनु|	along the path of sacred law.
इन्द्राग्नी तविषाणि वां सधस्थानि परयांसि च|	o indraagni powers are yours and dwellings and delightful food.
युवोरप्तूर्यं हितम|	good is your readiness to act.
इन्द्राग्नी रोचना दिवः परि वाजेषु भूषथः|	indra and agni in your deeds of might ye deck heavens lucid realms.
तद वांचेति पर वीर्यम|	famed is that hero strength of yours.
मरुत्वानिन्द्र वर्षभो रणाय पिबा सोममनुष्वधं मदाय|	drink indra marutgirt as bull the soma for joy for rapture even as thou listest.
आ सिञ्चस्व जठरे मध्व ऊर्मिं तवं राजासि परदिवः सुतानाम|	pour down the flood of meath within thy belly thou from of old art king of soma juices.
सजोषा इन्द्र सगणो मरुद्भिः सोमं पिब वर्त्रहा शूर विद्वान|	indra accordant with the banded maruts drink soma hero as wise vṛtraslayer.
जहि शत्रून्रप मर्धो नुदस्वाथाभयं कर्णुहि विश्वतो नः|	slay thou our foemen drive away assailants and make us safe on every side from danger.
उत रतुभिर्र्तुपाः पाहि सोममिन्द्र देवेभिः सखिभिः सुतं नः|	and drinker at due seasons drink in season indra with friendly gods our pressedout soma.
यानाभजो मरुतो ये तवान्वहन वर्त्रमदधुस्तुभ्यमोजः|	the maruts following whom thou madest sharers gave thee the victory and thou slewest vṛtra.
ये तवाहिहत्ये मघवन्नवर्धन ये शाम्बरे हरिवो ये गविष्टौ|	drink soma indra banded with the maruts who maghavan strengthened thee at ahis slaughter.
ये तवा नूनमनुमदन्ति विप्राः पिबेन्द्र सोमं सगणो मरुद्भिः|	gainst Śambara lord of bays in winning cattle and now rejoice in thee the holy singers.
मरुत्वन्तं वर्षभं वाव्र्धानमकवारिं दिव्यं शासमिन्द्रम|	the bull whose strength hath waxed whom maruts follow freegiving indra the celestial ruler.
विश्वासाहमवसे नूतनायोग्रं सहोदामिह तंहुवेम|	mighty allconquering the victorygiver him let us call to grant us new protection.
समितसमित सुमना बोध्यस्मे शुचाशुचा सुमतिं रासि वस्वः|	be friendly with each kindled log of fuel with every flash bestow the boon of riches.
आ देव देवान यजथाय वक्षि सखा सखीन सुमना यक्ष्यग्ने|	bring thou the gods o god unto our worship serve wellinclined as friend thy friends o agni.
यं देवासस्त्रिरहन्नायजन्ते दिवेदिवे वरुणो मित्रो अग्निः|	agni whom daily varuṇa and mitra the gods bring thrice a day to this our worship.
सेमं यज्ञं मधुमन्तं कर्धी नस्तनूनपाद घर्तयोनिं विधन्तम|	tanūnapāt enrich with meath our service that dwells with holy oil that offers honour.
पर दीधितिर्विश्ववारा जिगाति होतारमिळः परथमं यजध्यै|	the thought that bringeth every boon proceedeth to worship first the priest of the libation.
अछा नमोभिर्व्र्षभं वन्दध्यै स देवान यक्षदिषितो यजीयान|	that we may greet the strong one with our homage urged may he bring the gods best sacrificer.
ऊर्ध्वो वां गातुरध्वरे अकार्यूर्ध्वा शोचींषि परस्थिता रजांसि|	on high your way to sacrifice was made ready the radiant flames went upward to the regions.
दिवो वा नाभा नयसादि होता सत्र्णीमहि देवव्यचा वि बर्हिः|	full in the midst of heaven the priest is seated sirew we the sacred grass where gods may rest them.
सप्त होत्राणि मनसा वर्णाना इन्वन्तो विश्वं परति यन्न्र्तेन|	claiming in mind the seven priests burntoblations inciting all they came in settled order.
नर्पेशसो विदथेषु पर जाता अभीमं यज्ञं वि चरन्त पूर्वीः|	to this our sacrifice approach the many who show in hero beauty at assemblies.
आ भन्दमाने उषसा उपाके उत समयेते तन्वा विरूपे|	night and dawn lauded hither come together both smiling different are their forms in colour.
यथा नो मित्रो वरुणो जुजोषदिन्द्रो मरुत्वानुत वा महोभिः|	that varuṇa and mitra may accept us and indra girt by maruts with his glories.
दैव्या होतारा परथमा नय रञ्जे सप्त पर्क्षासः सवधयामदन्ति|	i crave the grace of heavens two chief invokers the seven swift steeds joy in their wonted manner.
रतं शंसन्त रतमित त आहुरनु वरतं वरतपा दीध्यानाः|	these speak of truth praising the truth eternal thinking on order as the guards of order.
आ भारती भारतीभिः सजोषा इळा देवैर्मनुष्येभिरग्निः|	may bhāratī with all her sisters iḷā accordant with the gods with mortalls agni.
सरस्वती सारस्वतेभिरर्वाक तिस्रो देवीर्बर्हिरेदं सदन्तु|	sarasvatī with all her kindred rivers come to this grass three goddesses and seat them.
तन नस्तुरीपमध पोषयित्नु देव तवष्टर्वि रराणः सयस्व|	well pleased with us do thou o god o tvaṣṭar give ready issue to our procreant vigour.
यतो वीरः कर्मण्यः सुदक्षो युक्तग्रावा जायते देवकामः|	whence springs the hero powerful skilled in action lover of gods adjuster of the pressstones.
वनस्पतेअव सर्जोप देवानग्निर्हविः शमिता सूदयाति|	send to the gods the oblation lord of forests and let the immolator agni dress it.
सेदु होता सत्यतरो यजाति यथा देवानां जनिमानि वेद|	he as the truer priest shall offer worship for the gods generations well he knoweth.
आ याह्यग्ने समिधानो अर्वां इन्द्रेण देवैः सरथं तुरेभिः|	come thou to us o agni duly kindled together with the potent gods and indra.
बर्हिर्न आस्तामदितिः सुपुत्रा सवाहा देवा अम्र्तामादयन्ताम|	on this our grass sit aditi happy mother and let our hail delight the gods immortal.
उषसः पूर्वा अध यद वयूषुर्महद वि जज्ञे अक्षरं पदे गोः|	at the first shining of the earliest mornings in the cows home was born the great eternal.
वरता देवानामुप नु परभूषन महद देवानामसुरत्वमेकम|	now shall the statutes of the gods be valid great is the gods supreme and sole dominion.
मो षू णो अत्र जुहुरन्त देवा मा पूर्वे अग्ने पितरः पदज्ञाः|	let not the gods here injure us o agni nor fathers of old time who know the region.
पुराण्योः सद्मनोः केतुरन्तर्म|	nor the sign set between two ancient dwellings great is the gods supreme and sole dominion.
वि मे पुरुत्रा पतयन्ति कामाः शम्यछा दीद्ये पूर्व्याणि|	my wishes fly abroad to many places i glance back to the ancient sacrifices.
समिद्धे अग्नाव रतमिद वदेम म|	let us declare the truth when fire is kindled great is the gods supreme and sole dominion.
समानो राजा विभ्र्तः पुरुत्रा शये शयासु परयुतो वनानु|	king universal born to sundry quarters extended through the wood be lies on couches.
अन्या वत्सं भरति कषेति माता म|	one mother rests another feeds the infant great is the gods supreme and sole dominion.
आक्षित पूर्वास्वपरा अनूरुत सद्यो जातासु तरुणीष्वन्तः|	lodged in old plants he grows again in younger swiftly within the newlyborn and tender.
अन्तर्वतीः सुवते अप्रवीता म|	though they are unimpregned he makes them fruitful great is the gods supreme and sole dominion.
शयुः परस्तादध नु दविमाताबन्धनश्चरति वत्स एकः|	now lying far away child of two mothers he wanders unrestrained the single youngling.
मित्रस्य ता वरुणस्य वरतानि म|	these are the laws of varuṇa and mitra great is the gods supreme and sole dominion.
दविमाता होता विदथेषु सम्राळ अन्वग्रं चरति कषेति बुध्नः|	child of two mothers priest sole lord in synods he still precedes while resting as foundation.
पर रण्यानि रण्यवाचो भरन्ते म|	they who speak sweetly bring him sweet addresses great is the gods supreme and sole dominion.
शूरस्येव युध्यतो अन्तमस्य परतीचीनं दद्र्शे विश्वमायत|	as to a friendly warrior when he battles each thing that comes anear is seen to meet him.
अन्तर्मतिश्चरति निष्षिधं गोर्म|	the hymn commingles with the cows oblation great is the gods supreme and sole dominion.
नि वेवेति पलितो दूत आस्वन्तर्महांश्चरति रोचनेन|	deep within these the hoary envoy pierceth mighty he goeth to the realm of splendour.
वपूंषि बिभ्रदभि नो वि चष्टे म|	and looketh on us clad in wondrous beauty great is the gods supreme and sole dominion.
विष्णुर्गोपाः परमं पाति पाथः परिया धामान्यम्र्तादधानः|	viṣṇu the guardian keeps the loftiest station upholding dear immortal dwellingplaces.
अग्निष टा विश्वा भुवनानि वेद म|	agni knows well all these created beings great is the gods supreme and sole dominion.
नाना चक्राते यम्या वपूंषि तयोरन्यद रोचते कर्ष्णमन्यत|	ye variant pair have made yourselves twin beauties one of the twain is dark bright shines the other.
शयावी च यदरुषी च सवसारौ म|	and yet these two the dark the red are sisters great is the gods supreme and sole dominion.
माता च यत्र दुहिता च धेनू सबर्दुघे धापयेते समीची|	where the two cows the mother and the daughter meet and give suck yielding their lordly nectar.
रतस्य ते सदसीळे अन्तर्म|	i praise them at the seat of law eternal great is the gods supreme and sole dominion.
अन्यस्या वत्सं रिहती मिमाय कया भुवा नि दधे धेनुरूधः|	loud hath she lowed licking the others youngling on what world hath the milchcow laid her udder.
रतस्य सा पयसापिन्वतेळा म|	this iḷā streameth with the milk of order great is the gods supreme and sole dominion.
पद्या वस्ते पुरुरूपा वपूंष्यूर्ध्वा तस्थौ तर्यविं रेरिहाणा|	earth weareth beauties manifold uplifted licking her calf of eighteen months she standeth.
रतस्य सद्म वि चरामि विद्वान म|	wellskilled i seek the seat of law eternal great is the gods supreme and sole dominion.
पदे इव निहिते दस्मे अन्तस्तयोरन्यद गुह्यमाविरन्यत|	within a wondrous place the twain are treasured the one is manifest the other hidden.
सध्रीचीना पथ्या सा विषूची म|	one common pathway leads in two directions great is the gods supreme and sole dominion.
आ धेनवो धुनयन्तामशिश्वीः सबर्दुघाः शशया अप्रदुग्धाः|	let the milchkine that have no calves storm downward yielding rich nectar streaming unexhausted.
नव्यानव्या युवतयो भवन्तीर्म|	these who are ever new and fresh and youthful great is the gods supreme and sole dominion.
यदन्यासु वर्षभो रोरवीति सो अन्यस्मिन यूथे नि दधातिरेतः|	what time the bull bellows in other regions another herd receives the genial moisture.
स हि कषपावान स भगः स राजा म|	for he is bhaga king the earths protector great is the gods supreme and sole dominion.
वीरस्य नु सवश्व्यं जनासः पर नु वोचाम विदुरस्य देवाः|	let us declare the heros wealth in horses o all ye folk of this the gods have knowledge.
षोळ्हा युक्ताः पञ्चपञ्चा वहन्ति म|	sixfold they bear him or by fives are harnessed great is the gods supreme and sole dominion.
देवस्त्वष्टा सविता विश्वरूपः पुपोष परजाः पुरुधाजजान|	tvaṣṭar the god the omniform creator begets and feeds mankind in various manner.
इमा च विश्वा भुवनान्यस्य म|	his verily arc all these living creatures great is the gods supreme dominion.
मही समैरच्चम्वा समीची उभे ते अस्य वसुना नय्र्ष्टे|	the two great meeting bowls hath he united each of the pair is laden with histreasure.
शर्ण्वे वीरो विन्दमानो वसूनि म|	the hero is renowned for gathering riches great is the gods supreme and sole dominion.
इमां च नः पर्थिवीं विश्वधाया उप कषेति हितमित्रो नराजा|	yea and on this our earth the allsustainer dwells like a king with noble friends about him.
पुरःसदः शर्मसदो न वीरा म|	in his protection heroes rest in safety great is the cods supreme and sole dominion.
निष्षिध्वरीस्त ओषधीरुतापो रयिं त इन्द्र पर्थिवी बिभर्ति|	rich in their gifts for thee are herbs and waters and earth brings all her wealth for thee o indra.
सखायस्ते वामभाजः सयाम म|	may we as friends of thine share goodly treasures great is the gods supreme and sole dominion.
वैश्वानराय धिषणां रताव्र्धे घर्तं न पूतमग्नयेजनामसि|	to him vaiśvānara who strengthens holy law to agni we present our praise like oil made pure.
दविता होतारं मनुषश्च वाघतो धिया रथंन कुलिशः सं रण्वति|	with thoughtful insight human priests bring him anear our herald from of old as an axe forms a car.
स रोचयज्जनुषा रोदसी उभे स मात्रोरभवत पुत्र ईड्यः|	he made the heaven and earth resplendent by his birth child of two mothers he was meet to be implored.
हव्यवाळ अग्निरजरश्चनोहितो दूळभो विशामतिथिर्विभावसुः|	agni oblationbearer gracious everyoung infallible rich in radiant light the guest of men.
करत्वा दक्षस्य तरुषो विधर्मणि देवासो अग्निं जनयन्त चित्तिभिः|	within the range of their surpassinq power by might the gods created agni with inventive thought.
रुरुचानं भानुना जयोतिषा महामत्यं न वाजं सनिष्यन्नुप बरुवे|	i eager to win strength address him like a steed resplendent with his brilliance with his ample light.
आ मन्द्रस्य सनिष्यन्तो वरेण्यं वर्णीमहे अह्रयं वाजम्र्ग्मियम|	eager to gain we crave from him the friendly god strength confident choiceworthy meet to be extolled.
रातिं भर्गूणामुशिजं कविक्रतुमग्निं राजन्तं दिव्येन शोचिषा|	the bhṛgus bounty willing strong with sages lore even agni shining forth with light that comes from heaven.
अग्निं सुम्नाय दधिरे पुरो जना वाजश्रवसमिह वर्क्तबर्हिषः|	for happiness men having trimmed the sacred grass set agni glorious for his strength before them here.
यतस्रुचः सुरुचं विश्वदेव्यं रुद्रं यज्ञानांसाधदिष्टिमपसाम|	yea with raised ladles him bright dear to all the gods perfecting aims of works rudra of solemn rites.
पावकशोचे तव हि कषयं परि होतर्यज्ञेषु वर्क्तबर्हिषो नरः|	around thy dwellingplace o brightlyshining priest are men at sacrifice whose sacred grass is trimmed.
अग्ने दुव इछमानास आप्यमुपासते दरविणं धेहि तेभ्यः|	wishing to do thee service agni they are there desirous of thy friendship grant them store of wealth.
आ रोदसी अप्र्णदा सवर्महज्जातं यदेनमपसो अधारयन|	he hath filled heaven and earth and the great realm of light when at his birth the skilful held him in their hold.
सो अध्वराय परि णीयते कविरत्यो न वाजसातयेचनोहितः|	he like a horse is led forth to the sacrifice sage graciously inclined that he may win us strength.
नमस्यत हव्यदातिं सवध्वरं दुवस्यत दम्यं जातवेदसम|	honour the oblationbearer him who knows fair rites serve ye the household friend who knows all things that be.
रथीर्र्तस्य बर्हतो विचर्षणिरग्निर्देवानामभवत पुरोहितः|	he drives the chariot of the lofty ordinance agni most active is the great high priest of gods.
तिस्रो यह्वस्य समिधः परिज्मनोअग्नेरपुनन्नुशिजो अम्र्त्यवः|	they who are free from death fain for him purified three splendours of the mighty agni circling all.
तासामेकामदधुर्मर्त्ये भुजमु लोकमु दवे उप जामिमीयतुः|	to man for his enjoyment one of these they gave the other two have passed into the sister sphere.
विशां कविं विश्पतिं मानुषीरिषः सं सीमक्र्ण्वन सवधितिं न तेजसे|	mans sacrificial food hath sharpened like an axe for brightness him the sage of men the peoples lord.
स उद्वतो निवतो याति वेविषत स गर्भमेषु भुवनेषु दीधरत|	busied with sacred rites he mounts and he descends he hath laid down his vital germ within these worlds.
स जिन्वते जठरेषु परजज्ञिवान वर्षा चित्रेषु नानदन न सिंहः|	he stirs with life in wombs dissimilar in kind born as a lion or a loudlybellowing bull.
वैश्वानरः पर्थुपाजा अमर्त्यो वसु रत्ना दयमानो वि दाशुषे|	vaiśvānara immortal with widereaching might bestowing goods and wealth on him who offiers gifts.
वैश्वानरः परत्नथा नाकमारुहद दिवस पर्ष्ठं भन्दमानः सुमन्मभिः|	vaiśvānara as of old mounted the cope of heaven heavens ridge well greeted by those skilled in noble songs.
स पूर्ववज्जनयञ जन्तवे धनं समानमज्मं पर्येति जाग्र्विः|	he as of old producing riches for the folk still watchful traversesthe common way again.
रतावानं यज्ञियं विप्रमुक्थ्यमा यं दधे मातरिश्वा दिवि कषयम|	for new prosperity we seek to agni him whose course is splendid goldhaired excellently bright.
तं चित्रयामं हरिकेशमीमहे सुदीतिमग्निं सुविताय नव्यसे|	whom mātariśvan stablished dweller in the heaven meet for high praise and holy sage and true to law.
शुचिं न यामन्निषिरं सवर्द्र्शं केतुं दिवो रोचनस्थामुषर्बुधम|	as pure and swift of course beholder of the light who stands in heavens bright sphere a sign who wakes at dawn.
अग्निं मूर्धानं दिवो अप्रतिष्कुतं तमीमहे नमसा वाजिनं बर्हत|	agni the head of heaven whom none may turn asideto him the powerful with mighty prayer we seek.
मन्द्रं होतारं शुचिमद्वयाविनं दमूनसमुक्थ्यं विश्वचर्षणिम|	the cheerful priest the pure in whom no guile is found friend of the house praiseworthy dear to all mankind.
रथं न चित्रं वपुषाय दर्शतं मनुर्हितं सदमिद राय ईमहे|	fair to behold for beauty like a splendid caragni the friend of men we ever seek for wealth.
अयमग्निः सुवीर्यस्येशे महः सौभगस्य|	this agni is the lord of great felicity and hero strength.
राय ईशे सवपत्यस्य गोमत ईशे वर्त्रहथानाम|	lord of wealth in herds of kine lord of the battles with the foe.
इमं नरो मरुतः सश्चता वर्धं यस्मिन रायः शेव्र्धासः|	wait maruts heroes upon him the prosperer in whom is blissincreasing wealth.
अभि ये सन्ति पर्तनासु दूढ्यो विश्वाहा शत्रुमादभुः|	who in fights ever conquer evilhearted men who overcome the enemy.
स तवं नो रायः शिशीहि मीढ्वो अग्ने सुविर्यस्य|	as such o agni deal us wealth and hero might o bounteous one.
तुविद्युम्न वर्षिष्ठस्य परजावतोअनमीवस्य शुष्मिणः|	most lofty very glorious rich in progeny free from disease and full of power.
चक्रिर्यो विश्वा भुवनाभि सासहिश्चक्रिर्देवेष्वा दुवः|	he who made all that lives who passes all in might who orders service to the gods.
आ देवेषु यतत आ सुवीर्य आ शंस उत नर्णाम|	he works among the gods he works in hero strength yea also in the praise of men.
मा नो अग्नेअमतये मावीरतायै रीरधः|	give us not up to indigence agni nor want of hero sons.
मागोतायै सहसस पुत्र मा निदेअप दवेषांस्या कर्धि|	nor son of strength to lack of cattle nor to blame drive thou our enemies away.
शग्धि वाजस्य सुभग परजावतोअग्ने बर्हतो अध्वरे|	help us to strength blest agni rich in progeny abundant in our sacrifice.
संराया भूयसा सर्ज मयोभुना तुविद्युम्न यशस्वता|	flood us with riches yet more plenteous bringing weal with high renown most glorious one.
पुरोजिती वो अन्धसः सुताय मादयित्नवे|	for first possession of your juice for the exhilarating drink.
अप शवानं शनथिष्टन सखायो दीर्घजिह्व्यम|	drive ye away the dog my friends drive ye the longtongued dog away.
यो धारया पावकया परिप्रस्यन्दते सुतः|	he who with purifying stream effused comes flowing hitherward.
इन्दुरश्वो न कर्त्व्यः|	indu is like an able steed.
तं दुरोषमभी नरः सोमं विश्वाच्या धिया|	the men with allpervading song send unassailable soma forth.
यज्ञं हिन्वन्त्यद्रिभिः|	by pressingstones to sacrifice.
सुतासो मधुमत्तमाः सोमा इन्द्राय मन्दिनः|	the somas very rich in sweets for which the sieve is destined flow.
पवित्रवन्तोक्षरन देवान गछन्तु वो मदाः|	effused the source of indras joy may your strong juices reach the gods.
इन्दुरिन्द्राय पवत इति देवासो अब्रुवन|	indu flows on for indras sake thus have the deities declared.
वाचस पतिर्मखस्यते विश्वस्येशान ओजसा|	the lord of speech exerts himself ruler of all because of might.
सहस्रधारः पवते समुद्रो वाचमीङखयः|	inciter of the voice of song with thousand streams the ocean flows.
सोमः पती रयीणां सखेन्द्रस्य दिवेदिवे|	even soma lord of opulence the friend of indra day by day.
अयं पूषा रयिर्भगः सोमः पुनानो अर्षति|	as pūṣan fortune bhaga comes this soma while they make him pure.
पतिर्विश्वस्य भूमनो वयख्यद रोदसी उभे|	he lord of the multitude hath looked upon the earth and heaven.
समु परिया अनूषत गावो मदाय घर्ष्वयः|	the dear cows lowed in joyful mood together to the gladdening drink.
सोमासः कर्ण्वते पथः पवमानास इन्दवः|	the drops as they were purified the soma juices made then paths.
य ओजिष्ठस्तमा भर पवमन शरवाय्यम|	o pavamana bring the juice the mightiest worthy to be famed.
यः पञ्चचर्षणीरभि रयिं येन वनामहै|	which the five tribes have over them whereby we may win opulence.
सोमाः पवन्त इन्दवोअस्मभ्यं गातुवित्तमः|	for us the soma juices flow the drops best furtherers of our weal.
मित्राः सुवाना अरेपसः सवाध्यः सवर्विदः|	effused as friends without a spot benevolent finders of the light.
सुष्वाणासो वयद्रिभिश्चिताना गोरधि तवचि|	effused by means of pressingstones upon the oxhide visible.
इषमस्मभ्यमभितः समस्वरन वसुविदः|	they treasurefinders have announced food unto us from every side.
एते पूता विपश्चितः सोमासो दध्याशिरः|	tlese soma juices skilled in song purified blent with milk and curd.
सूर्यासो न दर्शतासो जिगत्नवो धरुवा घर्ते|	when moving and when firmly laid in oil resemble lovely suns.
पर सुन्वानस्यान्धसो मर्तो न वर्त तद वचः|	let not the power of men restrain the voice of the outpouring juice.
अप शवानमराधसं हता मखं न भर्गवः|	as bhṛgus sons chased makha so drive ye the greedy hound away.
आ जामिरत्के अव्यत भुजे न पुत्र ओण्योः|	the friend hath wrapped him in his robe as in his parents arms a son.
सरज्जारो न योषणां वरो न योनिमासदम|	he went as lover to a dame to take his station suitorlike.
स वीरो दक्षसाधनो वि यस्तस्तम्भ रोदसी|	that hero who produces strength he who hath propped both worlds apart.
हरिः पवित्रे अव्यत वेधा न योनिमासदम|	goldhued hath wrapped him in the sieve to settle priestlike in his place.
अव्यो वारेभिः पवते सोमो गव्ये अधि तवचि|	soma upon the oxs skin through the sheeps wool flows purified.
कनिक्रदद वर्षा हरिरिन्द्रस्याभ्येति निष्क्र्तम|	bellowing out the tawny steer goes on to indras special place.
हरिं मर्जन्त्यरुषो न युज्यते सं धेनुभिः कलशे सोमो अज्यते|	they cleanse the goldhued like a red steed is he yoked and soma in the jar is mingled with the milk.
उद वाचमीरयति हिन्वते मती पुरुष्टुतस्य कति चित्परिप्रियः|	he sendeth out his voice and many loving friends of him the highly lauded hasten with their songs.
साकं वदन्ति बहवो मनीषिण इन्द्रस्य सोमं जठरे यदादुहुः|	the many sages utter words in unison while into indras throat they pour the soma juice.
यदी मर्जन्ति सुगभस्तयो नरः सनीळाभिर्दशभिः काम्यं मधु|	when with the ten that dwell together closely joined the men whose hands are skilful cleanse the lovely meath.
अरममाणो अत्येति गा अभि सूर्यस्य परियं दुहितुस्तिरो रवम|	he goes upon his way unresting to the cows over the roaring sound which saryas daughter loves.
अन्वस्मै जोषमभरद विनंग्र्सः सं दवयीभिः सवस्र्भिः कषेति जामिभिः|	the falcon brought it to him for his own delight now with the twofold kindred sisters is his home.
नर्धूतो अद्रिषुतो बर्हिषि परियः पतिर्गवां परदिव इन्दुरतवियः|	washed by the men stonepressed dear on the holy grass faithful to seasons lord of cattle from of old.
पुरन्धिवान मनुषो यज्ञसाधनः शुचिर्धियापवते सोम इन्द्र ते|	most liberal completing sacrifice for men o indra pure bright soma indu flows for thee.
नर्बाहुभ्यां चोदितो धारया सुतोअनुष्वधं पवते सोम इन्द्र ते|	o indra urged by arms of men and poured in streams soma flows on for thee afterḥis godlike kind.
आप्राः करतून समजैरध्वरे मतीर्वेर्न दरुषच्चम्वोरासदद धरिः|	plans thou fulfillest gatherest thoughts for sacrifice in the bowls sits the goldhued like a roosting bird.
अंशुं दुहन्ति सतनयन्तमक्षितं कविं कवयोअपसो मनीषिणः|	sages wellskilled in work intelligent drain out the stalk that roars the sage the everlasting one.
समी गावो मतयो यन्ति संयत रतस्य योना सदने पुनर्भुवः|	the milk the hymns unite them with him in the place of sacrifice his seat who is produced anew.
नाभा पर्थिव्या धरुणो महो दिवोअपामूर्मौ सिन्धुष्वन्तरुक्षितः|	earths central point sustainer of the mighty heavens distilled into the streams into the waters wave.
इन्द्रस्य वज्रो वर्षभो विभूवसुः सोमो हर्देपवते चारु मत्सरः|	as indras thunderbolt steer with farspreading wealth soma is flowing on to make the heart rejoice.
स तू पवस्व परि पार्थिवं रज सतोत्रे शिक्षन्नाधून्वते च सुक्रतो|	over the earthly region flow thou on thy way helping the praiser and the pourer thou most wise.
मा नो निर्भाग वसुनः सादनस्प्र्शो रयिं पिशङगं बहुलं वसीमहि|	let us not lack rich treasure reaching to our home and may we clothe ourselves in manifold bright wealth.
आ तू न इन्दो शतदात्वश्व्यं सहस्रदातु पशुमद धिरण्यवत|	hither o indu unto us a hundred gifts of steeds a thousand gifts of cattle and of gold.
उप मास्व बर्हती रेवतीरिषोअधि सतोत्रस्य पवमान नो गहि|	measure thou forth yea splendid ample strengthening food do thou o pavamana heed this laud of ours.
अचोदसो नो धन्वन्त्विन्दवः पर सुवानासो बर्हद्दिवेषु हरयः|	spontaneous let our drops of soma juice flow on pressed goldenhued among the gods of lofty heaven.
वि च नशन न इषो अरातयोअर्यो नशन्त सनिषन्त नो धियः|	perish among us they who give no gifts of food perish the godless may our prayers obtain success.
पर णो धन्वन्त्विन्दवो मदच्युतो धना वा येभिरर्वतो जुनीमसि|	forward to us the drops distilling meath shall flow like riches for whose sake we urge the horses on.
तिरो मर्तस्य कस्य चित परिह्व्र्तिं वयं धनानि विश्वधा भरेमहि|	beyond the crafty hindering of all mortal men may we continually bear precious wealth away.
उत सवस्या अरात्या अरिर्हि ष उतान्यस्या अरात्या वर्को हि षः|	yea yerily foe of hate shown to himself is he yea verity destroyer too of other hate.
धन्वन न तर्ष्णा समरीत तानभि सोम जहिपवमान दुराध्यः|	as thirst subdueth in the desert conquer thou o soma pavarnana men of evil thoughts.
दिवि ते नाभा परमो य आददे पर्थिव्यास्ते रुरुहुः सानविक्षिपः|	near kin to thee is he raised loftiest in the heavens upon the earths high ridge thy scions have grown forth.
अद्रयस्त्वा बप्सति गोरधि तवच्यप्सु तवा हस्तैर्दुदुहुर्मनीषिणः|	the pressstones chew and crunch thee on the oxs hide sages have milked thee with their hands into the streams.
एवा त इन्दो सुभ्वं सुपेशसं रसं तुञ्जन्ति परथमा अभिश्रियः|	so do they hurry on thy strong and beauteous juice o indu as the first ingredient of the draught.
निदंनिदं पवमान नि तारिष आविस्ते शुष्मो भवतु परियो मदः|	bring low thou pavamana every single foe and be thy might shown forth as sweet and gladdening drink.
परि सोम रतं बर्हदाशुः पवित्रे अर्षति|	swift to the purifying sieve flows soma as exalted law.
विघ्नन रक्षांसि देवयुः|	slaying the fiends loving the gods.
यत सोमो वाजमर्षति शतं धारा अपस्युवः|	when soma pours the strengthening food a hundred everactive streams.
इन्द्रस्यसख्यमाविशन|	to indras friendship win theirway.
अभि तवा योषणो दश जारं न कन्यानूषत|	ten dames have sung to welcome thee even as a maiden greets her love.
मर्ज्यसे सोम सातये|	o soma thou art decked to win.
तवमिन्द्राय विष्णवे सवादुरिन्दो परि सरव|	flow hitherward o indu sweet to indra and to viṣṇu guard.
नॄन सतोतॄन्पाह्यंहसः|	the men the singers from distress.
पर कविर्देववीतयेअव्यो वारेभिरर्षति|	forth through the strainingcloth the sage flows to the banquet of the gods.
साह्वान विश्वाभि सप्र्धः|	subduing all our enemies.
स हि षमा जरित्र्भ्य आ वाजं गोमन्तमिन्वति|	for he as pavamana sends thousandfold treasure in the shape.
पवमानः सहस्रिणम|	of cattle to the singingmen.
परि विश्वानि चेतसा मर्शसे पवसे मती|	thou graspest all things with thy mind and purifiest thee with thoughts.
स नः सोम शरवो विदः|	as such o soma find us fame.
अभ्यर्ष बर्हद यशो मघवद्भ्यो धरुवं रयिम|	pour lofty glory on us send sure riches to our liberal lords.
इषं सतोत्र्भ्य आ भर|	bring food to those who sing thy praise.
तवं राजेव सुव्रतो गिरः सोमा विवेशिथ|	as thou art cleansed o wondrous steed o soma thou hast entered like.
पुनानो वह्ने अद्भुत|	a pious king into the songs.
स वह्निरप्सु दुष्टरो मर्ज्यमानो गभस्त्योः|	he soma like a courser in the floods invincible made clean.
सोमश्चमूषु सीदति|	with hands is resting in the jars.
करीळुर्मखो न मंहयुः पवित्रं सोम गछसि|	disporting like a liberal chief thou goest soma to the sieve.
दधत सतोत्रे सुवीर्यम|	lending the laud a heros strength.
स सुतः पीतये वर्षा सोमः पवित्रे अर्षति|	soma the steer effused for draught flows to the purifying sieve.
विघ्नन रक्षांसि देवयुः|	slaying the fiends loving the gods.
स पवित्रे विचक्षणो हरिरर्षति धर्णसिः|	farsighted tawnycoloured he flows to the sieve intelligent.
अभि योनिंकनिक्रदत|	bellowing to his place of rest.
स वाजी रोचना दिवः पवमानो वि धावति|	this vigorous pavamana runs forth to the luminous realm of heaven.
रक्षोहा वारमव्ययम|	fiendslayer through the fleecy sieve.
स तरितस्याधि सानवि पवमानो अरोचयत|	this payamana up above tritas high ridge hath made the sun.
जामिभिः सूर्यं सह|	together with the sisters shine.
स वर्त्रहा वर्षा सुतो वरिवोविददाभ्यः|	this vṛtraslaying steer effused soma roomgiver neer deceived.
सोमो वाजमिवासरत|	hath gone as twere to win the spoil.
स देवः कविनेषितोअभि दरोणानि धावति|	urged onward by the sage the god speeds forward to the casks of wood.
इन्दुरिन्द्रायमंहना|	indu to indra willingly.
परि सुवानो हरिरंशुः पवित्रे रथो न सर्जि सनये हियानः|	the goldhued juice poured out upon the filter is started like a car sent forth to conquer.
आपच्छ्लोकमिन्द्रियं पूयमानः परति देवानजुषत परयोभिः|	he hath gained song and vigour while they cleansed him and hath rejoiced the gods with entertainments.
अछा नर्चक्षा असरत पवित्रे नाम दधानः कविरस्य योनौ|	he who beholdeth man hath reached the filter bearing his name the sage hath sought his dwelling.
सीदन होतेव सदने चमूषूपेमग्मन्न्र्षयः सप्त विप्राः|	the Ṛṣis came to him seven holy singers when in the bowls he settled as invoker.
पर सुमेधा गातुविद विश्वदेवः सोमः पुनानः सद एति नित्यम|	shared by all gods mobt wise propitious soma goes while they cleanse him to his constant station.
भुवद विश्वेषु काव्येषु रन्तानु जनान यतते पञ्च धीरः|	let him rejoice in all his lofty wisdom to the five tribes the sage attains with labour.
तव तये सोम पवमान निण्ये विश्वे देवास्त्रय एकादशासः|	in thy mysterious place o pavamana soma are all the gods the thriceeleven.
दश सवधाभिरधि सानो अव्ये मर्जन्ति तवा नद्यः सप्त यह्वीः|	ten on the fleecy height themselves selfprompted and seven fresh rivers brighten and adorn thee.
तन नु सत्यं पवमानस्यास्तु यत्र विश्वे कारवः संनसन्त|	now let this be the truth of pavamana there where all singers gather them together.
जयोतिर्यदह्ने अक्र्णोदु लोकं परावन मनुं दस्यवे करभीकम|	that he hath given us room and made the daylight hath holpen manu and repelled the dasyu.
परि सद्मेव पशुमान्ति होता राजा न सत्यः समितीरियानः|	as the priest seeks the station rich in cattle like a true king who goes to great assemblies.
सोमः पुनानः कलशानयासीत सीदन मर्गो न महिषो वनेषु|	soma hath sought the beakers while they cleansed him and like a wild bull in the wood hath settled.
पर धारा अस्य शुष्मिणो वर्था पवित्रे अक्षरन|	streams of this potent one have flowed easily to the strainingcloth.
पुनानो वाचमिष्यति|	while he is cleansed he lifts his voice.
इन्दुर्हियानः सोत्र्भिर्म्र्ज्यमानः कनिक्रदत|	indu by pressers urged to speed bellowing out while beautified.
इयर्ति वग्नुमिन्द्रियम|	sends forth a very mighty sound.
आ नः शुष्मं नर्षाह्यं वीरवन्तं पुरुस्प्र्हम|	pour on us soma with thy stream manconquering might which many crave.
पवस्व सोम धारया|	accompanied with hero sons.
पर सोमो अति धारया पवमानो असिष्यदत|	hither hath pavamana flowed soma flowed hither in a stream.
अभि दरोणान्यासदम|	to settle in the vats of wood.
अप्सु तवा मधुमत्तमं हरिं हिन्वन्त्यद्रिभिः|	to waters with the stones they drive thee tawnyhued most rich in sweets.
इन्दविन्द्राय पीतये|	o indu to be indras drink.
सुनोता मधुमत्तमं सोममिन्द्राय वज्रिणे|	for indra for the thunderer press the soma very rich in sweets.
चारुं शर्धाय मत्सरम|	lovely inspiriting for strength.
परो सय वह्निः पथ्याभिरस्यान दिवो न वर्ष्टिः पवमानोक्षाः|	this chariothorse hath moved along the pathways and pavamana flowed like rain from heaven.
सहस्रधारो असदन नयस्मे मातुरुपस्थे वन आच सोमः|	with us hath soma with a thousand currents sunk in the wood upon his mothers bosom.
राजा सिन्धूनामवसिष्ट वास रतस्य नावमारुहद रजिष्ठाम|	king he hath clothed him in the robe of rivers mounted the straightestgoing ship of order.
अप्सु दरप्सो वाव्र्धे शयेनजूतो दुह ईं पिता दुह ईं पितुर्जाम|	sped by the hawk the drop hath waxed in waters the father drains it drains the fathers offspring.
सिंहं नसन्त मध्वो अयासं हरिमरुषं दिवो अस्य पतिम|	they come to him red tawny lord of heaven the watchful guardian of the meath the lion.
शूरो युत्सु परथमः पर्छते गा अस्य चक्षसा परि पात्युक्षा|	first hero in the fight he seeks the cattle and with his eye the steer is our protector.
मधुप्र्ष्ठं घोरमयासमश्वं रथे युञ्जन्त्युरुचक्रर्ष्वम|	they harness to the broadwheeled car the mighty courser whose back bears meath unwearied awful.
सवसार ईं जामयो मर्जयन्ति सनाभयो वाजिनमूर्जयन्ति|	the twins the sisters brighten him and strengthenthese children of one damethe vigorous racer.
चतस्र ईं घर्तदुहः सचन्ते समाने अन्तर्धरुणे निषत्ताः|	four pouring out the holy oil attend him sitting together in the same container.
ता ईमर्षन्ति नमसा पुनानास्ता ईं विश्वतः परि षन्ति पूर्वीः|	to him they flow when purified with homage and still from every side are first about him.
विष्टम्भो दिवो धरुणः पर्थिव्या विश्वा उत कषितयो हस्ते अस्य|	he is the buttress of the heavens supporter of earth and in his hand are all the people.
असत त उत्सो गर्णते नियुत्वान मध्वो अंशुः पवतैन्द्रियाय|	be the teams lord a well to thee the singer cleansed is the sweet plants stalk for deed of glory.
वन्वन्नवातो अभि देववीतिमिन्द्राय सोम वर्त्रहा पवस्व|	fighting uninjured come where gods are feasted soma as vitraslayer flow for indra.
शग्धि महः पुरुश्चन्द्रस्य रायः सुवीर्यस्य पतयः सयाम|	vouchsafe us ample riches very splendid may we be masters of heroic vigour.
एते सोमास आशवो रथा इव पर वाजिनः|	these rapid somastreams have stirred themselves to motion like strong steeds.
सर्गाः सर्ष्टा अहेषत|	like cars like armies hurried forth.
एते वाता इवोरवः पर्जन्यस्येव वर्ष्टयः|	swift as wide winds they lightly move like rainstorms of parjanya like.
अग्नेरिव भरमा वर्था|	the flickering flames of burning fire.
एते पूता विपश्चितः सोमासो दध्याशिरः|	these soma juices blent with curds purified skilled in sacred hymns.
विपा वयानशुर्धियः|	have gained by song their heartsdesire.
एते मर्ष्टा अमर्त्याः सस्र्वांसो न शश्रमुः|	immortal cleansed these drops since first they flowed have never wearied fain.
इयक्षन्तः पथो रजः|	to reach the regions and their paths.
एते पर्ष्ठानि रोदसोर्विप्रयन्तो वयानशुः|	advancing they have travelled oer the ridges of the earth and heaven.
उतेदमुत्तमं रजः|	and this the highest realm of all.
तन्तुं तन्वानमुत्तममनु परवत आशत|	over the heights have they attained the highest thread that is spun out.
उतेदमुत्तमाय्यम|	and this which must be deemed most high.
तवं सोम पणिभ्य आ वसु गव्यानि धारयः|	thou soma boldest wealth in kine which thou hast seized from niggard churls.
ततं तन्तुमचिक्रदः|	thou calledst forth the outspun thread.
नानानं वा उ नो धियो वि वरतानि जनानाम|	we all have various thoughts and plans and diverse are the ways of men.
तक्षा रिष्टं रुतं भिषग बरह्मा सुन्वन्तमिछतीन्द्रायेन्दो परि सरव|	the brahman seeks the worshipper wright seeks the cracked and leech the maimed flow indu flow for indras sake.
जरतीभिरोषधीभिः पर्णेभिः शकुनानाम|	the smith with ripe and seasoned plants with feathers of the birds of air.
कार्मारो अश्मभिर्द्युभिर्हिरण्यवन्तमिछतीन्द्रायेन्दो परि सरव|	with stones and with enkindled flames seeks him who hath a store of gold flow indu flow for indras sake.
कारुरहं ततो भिषगुपलप्रक्षिणी नना|	a bard am i my dads a leech mammy lays corn upon the stones.
नानाधियोवसूयवोअनु गा इव तस्थिमेन्द्रायेन्दो परि सरव|	striving for wealth with varied plans we follow our desires like kine flow indu flow for indras sake.
अश्वो वोळ्हा सुखं रथं हसनामुपमन्त्रिणः|	the horse would draw an easy car gay hosts attract the laugh and jest.
शेपो रोमण्वन्तौ भेदौ वारिन मण्डूक इछतीन्द्रायेन्दो परि सरव|	the male desires his mates approach the frog is eager for the flood flow indu flow for indras sake.
अधि यदस्मिन वाजिनीव शुभ सपर्धन्ते धियः सूर्ये नविशः|	when beauties strive for him as for a charger then strive the songs like soldiers for the sunlight.
अपो वर्णानः पवते कवीयन वरजं न पशुवर्धनाय मन्म|	acting the sage he flows enrobed in waters and song as twere a stall that kine may prosper.
दविता वयूर्ण्वन्नम्र्तस्य धाम सवर्विदे भुवनानि परथन्त|	the worlds expand to hirn who from aforetime found light to spread the law of life eternal.
धियः पिन्वानाः सवसरे न गाव रतायन्तीरभि वावश्र इन्दुम|	the swelling songs like kine within the stable in deep devotion call aloud on indu.
परि यत कविः काव्या भरते शूरो न रथो भुवनानि विश्वा|	when the sage bears his holy wisdom round him like a car visiting all worlds the hero.
देवेषु यशो मर्ताय भूषन दक्षाय रायः पुरुभूषु नव्यः|	becoming fame mid gods unto the mortal wealth to the skilled worth praise mid the everpresent.
शरिये जातः शरिय आ निरियाय शरियं वयो जरित्र्भ्यो दधाति|	for glory born be hath come forth to glory he giveth life and glory to the singers.
शरियं वसाना अम्र्तत्वमायन भवन्ति सत्या समिथा मितद्रौ|	they clothed in glory have become immortal he measured in his course makes frays successful.
इषमूर्जमभ्यर्षाश्वं गामुरु जयोतिः कर्णुहि मत्सि देवान|	stream to us food and vigour kine and horses give us broad lights and fill thgods with rapture.
विश्वानि हि सुषहा तानि तुभ्यं पवमान बाधसेसोम शत्रून|	all ther are easy things for thee to master thou pavamana soma quellest foemen.
जनयन रोचना दिवो जनयन्नप्सु सूर्यम|	engendering the sun in floods engendering heavens lights greenhued.
वसानो गा अपोहरिः|	robed in the waters and the milk.
एष परत्नेन मन्मना देवो देवेभ्यस परि|	according to primeval plan this soma with his stream effused.
धारया पवते सुतः|	flows purely on a god for gods.
वाव्र्धानाय तूर्वये पवन्ते वाजसातये|	for him victorious waxen great the juices with a thousand powers.
सोमाः सहस्रपाजसः|	are purified for winning spoil.
दुहानः परत्नमित पयः पवित्रे परि षिच्यते|	shedding the ancient fluid he is poured into the cleansing sieve.
करन्दन देवानजीजनत|	he thundering hath produced the gods.
अभि विश्वानि वार्याभि देवान रताव्र्धः|	soma while purifying sends hither all things to be desired.
सोमः पुनानोर्षति|	he sends the gods who strengthen law.
गोमन नः सोम वीरवदश्वावद वाजवत सुतः|	soma effused pour on us wealth in kine in heroes steeds and spoil.
पवस्व बर्हतीरिषः|	send us abundant store of food.
आशुरर्ष बर्हन्मते परि परियेण धाम्ना|	flow on o thou of lofty thought flow swift in thy beloved form.
यत्र देवा इतिब्रवन|	saying i go where dwell the gods.
परिष्क्र्ण्वन्ननिष्क्र्तं जनाय यातयन्निषः|	preparing what is unprepared and bringing store of food to man.
वर्ष्टिन्दिवः परि सरव|	make thou the rain descend from heaven.
सुत एति पवित्र आ तविषिं दधान ओजसा|	with might bestowing power thejuice enters the purifying sieve.
विचक्षाणो विरोचयन|	farseeing sending forth its light.
अयं स यो दिवस परि रघुयामा पवित्र आ|	this is it which in rapid course hath with the rivers wave flowed down.
सिन्धोरूर्मा वयक्षरत|	from heaven upon the straining cloth.
आविवासन परावतो अथो अर्वावतः सुतः|	inviting him frorh far away and even from near at hand the juice.
इन्द्राय सिच्यतेमधु|	for indra is poured forth as meath.
समीचीना अनूषत हरिं हिन्वन्त्यद्रिभिः|	in union they have sung the hymn with stones they urge the tawny one.
योनाव रतस्य सीदत|	sit in the place of sacrifice.
एष वाजी हितो नर्भिर्विश्वविन मनसस पतिः|	urged by the men this vigorous steed lord of the mind omniscient.
अव्यो वारं वि धावति|	runs to the woollen strainingcloth.
एष पवित्रे अक्षरत सोमो देवेभ्यः सुतः|	within the filter hath he flowed this soma for the gods effused.
विश्वा धामान्याविशन|	entering all their essences.
एष देवः शुभायतेअधि योनावमर्त्यः|	he shines in beauty there this god immortal in his dwellingplace.
वर्त्रहा देववीतमः|	foeslayer dearest to the gods.
एष वर्षा कनिक्रदद दशभिर्जामिभिर्यतः|	directed by the sisters ten bellowing on his way this steer.
अभि दरोणानि धावति|	runs onward to the wooden vats.
एष सूर्यमरोचयत पवमानो विचर्षणिः|	this pavamana swiftand strong omniscient gave spleudour to.
विश्वा धामानि विश्ववित|	the sun and all his forms of light.
एष शुष्म्यदाभ्यः सोमः पुनानो अर्षति|	this soma being purified flows mighty and infallible.
देवावीरघशंसहा|	slayer of sinners dear togods.
असर्जि रथ्यो यथा पवित्रे चम्वोः सुतः|	forth from the mortar is the juice sent like a carhorse to the sieve.
कार्ष्मन वाजीन्यक्रमीत|	the steed steps forward to the goal.
स वह्निः सोम जाग्र्विः पवस्व देववीरति|	thus soma watchful bearing well cheering the gods flow past the sieve.
अभि कोशं मधुश्चुतम|	turned to the vat that drops with meath.
स नो जयोतींषि पूर्व्य पवमान वि रोचय|	excellent pavamana make the lights shine brightly out for us.
करत्वे दक्षायनो हिनु|	speed us to mental power and skill.
शुम्भमानो रतायुभिर्म्र्ज्यमानो गभस्त्योः|	he beautified by pious men and coming from their hands adorned.
पवते वारे अव्यये|	flows through the fleecy strainingcloth.
स विश्वा दाशुषे वसु सोमो दिव्यानि पार्थिवा|	may soma pour all treasures of the heavens the earth the firmament.
पवतामान्तरिक्ष्या|	upon the liberal worshipper.
आ दिवस पर्ष्ठमश्वयुर्गव्ययुः सोम रोहसि|	thou mountest to the height of heaven o soma seeking steeds and kine.
वीरयुः शवसस पते|	and seeking heroes lord of strength.
यो अत्य इव मर्ज्यते गोभिर्मदाय हर्यतः|	we will enrobe with sacred song the lovely one who as a steed.
तं गीर्भिर्वासयामसि|	is decked with milk for rapturous joy.
तं नो विश्वा अवस्युवो गिरः शुम्भन्ति पूर्वथा|	all songs of ours desiring grace adorn him in the ancient way.
इन्दुमिन्द्राय पीतये|	indu for indra for his drink.
पुनानो याति हर्यतः सोमो गीर्भिः परिष्क्र्तः|	soma flows on when purified beloved and adorned with songs.
विप्रस्य मेध्यातिथेः|	songs of the sage medhyātithi.
पवमान विदा रयिमस्मभ्यं सोम सुश्रियम|	o soma pavamana find exceeding glorious wealth for us.
इन्दो सहस्रवर्चसम|	wealth indu fraught with boundless might.
इन्दुरत्यो न वाजस्र्त कनिक्रन्ति पवित्र आ|	like courser racing to the prize indu the lover of the gods.
यदक्षारति देवयुः|	roars as he passes in the sieve.
पवस्व वाजसातये विप्रस्य गर्णतो वर्धे|	flow on thy way to win us strength to speed the sage who praises thee.
सोम रास्व सुवीर्यम|	soma bestow heroic power.
पर सवानासो रथा इवार्वन्तो न शरवस्यवः|	like cars that thunder on their way like coursers eager for renown.
सोमासो राये अक्रमुः|	have somadrops flowed forth for wealth.
हिन्वानासो रथा इव दधन्विरे गभस्त्योः|	forth have they rushed from holding hands like chariots that are urged to speed.
भरासः कारिणाम इव|	like joyful songs of singingmen.
राजानो न परशस्तिभिः सोमासो गोभिर अञ्जते|	the somas deck themselves with milk as kings are graced with eulogies.
यज्ञो न सप्त धात्र्भिः|	and with seven priests the sacrifice.
परि सुवानास इन्दवो मदाय बर्हणा गिरा|	pressed for the gladdening draught the drops flow forth abundantly with song.
सुता अर्षन्ति धारया|	the soma juices in a stream.
आपानासो विवस्वतो जनन्त उषसो भगम|	winning vivasvāns glory and producing mornings light the suns.
सूरा अण्वं वि तन्वते|	pass through the openings of the cloth.
अप दवारा मतीनाम परत्ना रण्वन्ति कारवः|	the singingmen of ancient time open the doors of sacred songs.
वर्ष्णो हरस आयवः|	men for the mighty to accept.
समीचीनास आसते होतारः सप्तजामयः|	combined in close society sit the seven priests the brotherhood.
पदम एकस्य पिप्रतः|	filling the station of the one.
नाभा नाभिं न आ ददे चक्षुश चित सूर्ये सचा|	he gives us kinship with the gods and with the sun unites our eye.
कवेर अपत्यम आ दुहे|	the sages ofrspring hath appeared.
अभि परिया दिवस पदम अध्वर्युभिर गुहा हितम|	the sun with his dear eye beholds that quarter of the heavens which priests.
सूरः पश्यति चक्षसा|	have placed within the sacred cell.
पर सोमासो विपश्चितोअपां न यन्त्यूर्मयः|	like waves of waters skilled in song the juices of the soma speed.
वनानि महिषा इव|	onward as buffaloes to woods.
अभि दरोणानि बभ्रवः शुक्रा रतस्य धारया|	with stream of sacrifice the brown bright drops have flowed with strength in store.
वाजं गोमन्तमक्षरन|	of kine into the wooden vats.
सुता इन्द्राय वायवे वरुणाय मरुद्भ्यः|	to indra vāyu varuṇa to viṣṇu and the maruts flow.
सोमा अर्षन्ति विष्णवे|	the drops of soma juice effused.
तिस्रो वाच उदीरते गावो मिमन्ति धेनवः|	three several words are uttered kine are owing cows who give their milk.
हरिरेति कनिक्रदत|	the tawnyhued goes bellowing on.
अभि बरह्मीरनूषत यह्वीरतस्य मातरः|	the young and sacred mothers of the holy rite have uttered praise.
मर्म्र्ज्यन्ते दिवः शिशुम|	they decorate the child of heaven.
रायः समुद्रांश्चतुरोअस्मभ्यं सोम विश्वतः|	from every side o soma for our profit pour thou forth four seas.
आ पवस्व सहस्रिणः|	filled full of riches thousandfold.
शर्यणावति सोममिन्द्रः पिबतु वर्त्रहा|	let vṛtraslaying indra drink soma by Śaryaṇāvāns side.
बलं दधान आत्मनि करिष्यन वीर्यं महदिन्द्रायेन्दो परि सरव|	storing up vigour in his heart prepared to do heroic deeds flow indu flow for indras sake.
आ पवस्व दिशां पत आर्जीकात सोम मीढ्वः|	lord of the quarters flow thou on boon soma from arjika land.
रतवाकेन सत्येन शरद्धया तपसा सुत इन्द्रायेन्दो परि सरव|	effused with ardour and with faith and the true hymn of sacrifice flow indu flow for indras sake.
पर्जन्यव्र्द्धं महिषं तं सूर्यस्य दुहिताभरत|	hither hath sūryas daughter brought the wild steer whom parjanya nursed.
तं गन्धर्वाः परत्यग्र्भ्णन तं सोमे रसमादधुरिन्द्रायेन्दोपरि सरव|	gandharvas have seized bold of him and in the soma laid the juice flow indu flow for indras sake.
रतं वदन्न्र्तद्युम्न सत्यं वदन सत्यकर्मन|	splendid by law declaring law truthspeaking truthful in thy works.
शरद्धां वदन सोम राजन धात्रा सोम परिष्क्र्त इन्द्रायेन्दो परि सरव|	enouncing faith king soma thou o soma whom thy maker decks flow indu flow for indras sake.
सत्यमुग्रस्य बर्हतः सं सरवन्ति संस्रवाः|	together flow the meeting streams of him the great and truly strong.
सं यन्ति रसिनो रसाः पुनानो बरह्मणा हर इन्द्रायेन्दो परि सरव|	the juices of the juicy meet made pure by prayer o goldenhued flow indu flow for indras sake.
यत्र बरह्मा पवमान छन्दस्यां वाचं वदन|	o pavamana where the priest as he recites the rhythmic prayer.
गराव्णा सोमे महीयते सोमेनानन्दं जनयन्निन्द्रायेन्दो परि सरव|	lords it oer soma with the stone with soma bringing forth delight flow indu flow for indras sake.
यत्र जयोतिरजस्रं यस्मिन लोके सवर्हितम|	o pavarnana place me in that deathless undecaying world.
तस्मिन मां धेहि पवमानाम्र्ते लोके अक्षित इन्द्रायेन्दो परि सरव|	wherein the light of heaven is set and everlasting lustre shines flow indu flow for indras sake.
यत्र राजा वैवस्वतो यत्रावरोधनं दिवः|	make me immortal in that realm where dwells the king vivasvāns son.
यत्रामूर्यह्वतीरापस्तत्र मामम्र्तं कर्धीन्द्रायेन्दो परि सरव|	where is the secret shrine of heaven where are those waters young and fresh flow indu flow for indras sake.
यत्रानुकामं चरणं तरिनाके तरिदिवे दिवः|	make me immortal in that realm where they move even as they list.
लोका यत्र जयोतिष्मन्तस्तत्र मामम्र्तं कर्धीन्द्रायेन्दो परि सरव|	in the third sphere of inmost heaven where lucid worlds are full of light flow indu flow for indras sake.
यत्र कामा निकामाश्च यत्र बरध्नस्य विष्टपम|	make me immortal in that realm of eager wish and strong desire.
सवधा च यत्र तर्प्तिश्च तत्र मामम्र्तं कर्धीन्द्रायेन्दो परिस्रव|	the region of the radiant moon where food and full delight are found flow indu flow for indras sake.
यत्रानन्दाश्च मोदाश्च मुदः परमुद आसते|	make me immortal in that realm where happiness and transports where.
कामस्य यत्राप्ताः कामास्तत्र मामम्र्तं कर्धीन्द्रायेन्दो परि सरव|	joys and felicities combine and longing wishes are fulfilled flow indu flow for indras sake.
पर्यू षु पर धन्व वाजसातये परि वर्त्राणि सक्षणिः|	oerpowering vṛtras forward run to win great strength.
दविषस्तरध्या रणया न ईयसे|	thou speedest to subdue like one exacting debts.
अनु हि तवा सुतं सोम मदामसि महे समर्यराज्ये|	in thee effused o soma we rejoice ourselves for great supremacy in fight.
वाजानभि पवमान पर गाहसे|	thou pavamana enterest into mighty deeds.
अजीजनो हि पवमान सूर्यं विधारे शक्मना पयः|	o pavamana thou didst generate the sun and spread the moisture out with power.
गोजीरया रंहमानः पुरन्ध्या|	hasting to us with plenty vivified with milk.
