अजीजनो अम्र्त मर्त्येष्वा रतस्य धर्मन्नम्र्तस्य चारुणः|	thou didst produce him deathless god mid mortal men for maintenance of law and lovely amṛta.
सदासरो वाजमछा सनिष्यदत|	thou evermore hast moved making strength flow to us.
अभ्यअभि हि शरवसा ततर्दिथोत्सं न कं चिज्जनपानमक्षितम|	all round about hast thou with glory pierced for us as twere a neverfailing well for men to drink.
शर्याभिर्न भरमाणो गभस्त्योः|	borne on thy way in fragments from the pressers arms.
आदीं के चित पश्यमानास आप्यं वसुरुचो दिव्या अभ्यनूषत|	then beautifully radiant certain heavenly ones have sung to him their kinship as they looked thereon.
वारं न देवः सविता वयूर्णुते|	and savitar the god opens as twere a stall.
तवे सोम परथमा वर्क्तबर्हिषो महे वाजाय शरवसे धियन्दधुः|	soma the men of old whose grass was trimmed addressed the hymn to thee for mighty strength and for renown.
स तवं नो वीर वीर्याय चोदय|	so hero urge us onward to heroic power.
दिवः पीयूषं पूर्व्यं यदुक्थ्यं महो गाहाद दिव आनिरधुक्षत|	they have drained forth from out the great depth of the sky the old primeval milk of heaven that claims the laud.
इन्द्रमभि जायमानं समस्वरन|	they lifted up their voice to indra athis birth.
अध यदिमे पवमान रोदसी इमा च विश्वा भुवनाभि मज्मना|	as long as thou o pavamana art above this earth and heaven and all existence in thy might.
यूथे न निष्ठा वर्षभो वि तिष्ठसे|	thou standest like a bull the chief amid the herd.
सोमः पुनानो अव्यये वारे शिशुर्न करीळन पवमानो अक्षाः|	in the sheeps wool hath soma pavamana flowed while they cleanse him like a playful infant.
सहस्रधारः शतवाज इन्दुः|	indu with hundred powers and hundred currents.
एष पुनानो मधुमान रतावेन्द्रायेन्दुः पवते सवादुरूर्मिः|	holy and sweet while purified this indu flows on a wave of pleasant taste to indra.
वाजसनिर्वरिवोविद वयोधाः|	strengthwinner treasurefinder life bestower.
स पवस्व सहमानः पर्तन्यून सेधन रक्षांस्यप दुर्गहाणि|	so flow thou on subduing our assailants chasing the demons hard to beencountered.
सवायुधः सासह्वान सोम शत्रून|	wellarmed and conquering our foes o soma.
पर ण इन्दो महे तन ऊर्मिं न बिभ्रदर्षसि|	indu to us for this great rite bearing as twere thy wave to gods.
अभि देवानयास्यः|	unwearied thou art flowing forqh.
मती जुष्टो धिया हितः सोमो हिन्वे परावति|	pleased with the hymn impelled by prayer soma is hurried far away.
विप्रस्य धारया कविः|	the wise one in the singers stream.
अयं देवेषु जाग्र्विः सुत एति पवित्र आ|	watchful among the gods this juice advances to the cleansing sieve.
सोमो याति विचर्षणिः|	soma most active travels on.
स नः पवस्व वाजयुश्चक्राणश्चारुमध्वरम|	flow onward seeking strength for us embellishing the sacrifice.
बर्हिष्माना विवासति|	the priest with trimmed grass calleth thee.
स नो भगाय वायवे विप्रवीरः सदाव्र्धः|	may soma ever bringing power to bhaga and to vāyu sage.
सोमो देवेष्वा यमत|	and hero lead us to the gods.
स नो अद्य वसुत्तये करतुविद गातुवित्तमः|	so to increase our wealth today inspirer best of furtherers.
वाजं जेषि शरवो बर्हत|	win for us strength and high renown.
आ दक्षिणा सर्ज्यते शुष्म्यासदं वेति दरुहो रक्षसः पाति जाग्र्विः|	the guerdon is bestowed the mighty takes his seat and everwatchful guards from fiend and evil sprite.
हरिरोपशं कर्णुते नभस पय उपस्तिरे चम्वोर्ब्रह्म निर्णिजे|	goldhued he makes the cloud his diadem the milk his carpet in both worlds and prayer his robe of state.
पर करिष्टिहेव शूष एति रोरुवदसुर्यं वर्णं नि रिणीते अस्य तम|	strong bellowing he goes like one who slays the folk he lets this hue of asuras flow off from him.
जहाति वव्रिं पितुरेति निष्क्र्तमुपप्रुतं कर्णुते निर्णिजं तना|	throws off his covering seeks his fathers meetingplace and thus makes for himself the bright robe he assumes.
अद्रिभिः सुतः पवते गभस्त्योर्व्र्षायते नभसा वेपते मती|	onward he flows from both the hands pressed out with stones excited by the prayer the water makes him wild.
स मोदते नसते साधते गिरा नेनिक्ते अप्सु यजते परीमणि|	he frolics and draws near completes his work with song and bathes in streams to satisfy the worshipper.
परि दयुक्षं सहसः पर्वताव्र्धं मध्वः सिञ्चन्ति हर्म्यस्य सक्षणिम|	they pour out meath around the master of the house celestial strengthener of the mountain that gives might.
आ यस्मिन गावः सुहुताद ऊधनि मूर्धंछ्रीणन्त्यग्रियं वरीमभिः|	in whom through his great powers oblationeating cows in their uplifted udder mix their choicest milk.
समी रथं न भुरिजोरहेषत दश सवसारो अदितेरुपस्थ आ|	they the ten sisters on the lap of aditi have sent him forward like a car from both the arms.
जिगादुप जरयति गोरपीच्यं पदं यदस्य मतुथा अजीजनन|	he wanders and comes near the cows mysterious place even the place which his inventions have produced.
शयेनो न योनिं सदनं धिया कर्तं हिरण्ययमासदं देव एषति|	like as a falcon to his home so speeds the god to his own golden wiselytashioned place to rest.
ए रिणन्ति बर्हिषि परियं गिराश्वो न देवानप्येति यज्ञियः|	with song they urge the darling to the sacred grass the holy one goes like a courser to the gods.
परा वयक्तो अरुषो दिवः कविर्व्र्षा तरिप्र्ष्ठो अनविष्टगा अभि|	from far away from heaven the redhued noted sage steer of the triple height hath sung unto the kine.
सहस्रणीतिर्यतिः परायती रेभो न पूर्वीरुषसो वि राजति|	with thousand guidings he leading this way and that shines as a singer splendidly through many a morn.
तवेषं रूपं कर्णुते वर्णो अस्य स यत्राशयत सम्र्ता सेधति सरिधः|	his covering assumes a radiant hue whereer he comes into the fight he drives the foe afar.
अप्सा याति सवधया दैव्यं जनं सं सुष्टुती नसते सं गोग्रया|	the winner of the floods with food he seeks the host of heaven he comes to praises glorified with milk.
उक्षेव यूथा परियन्नरावीदधि तविषीरधित सूर्यस्य|	like a bull roaming round the herds he bellows he hath assumed the brilliancy of sūrya.
दिव्यः सुपर्णोअव चक्षत कषां सोमः परि करतुना पश्यते जाः|	down to the earth hath looked the heavenly falcon soma with wisdom views all living creatures.
तं तवा नर्म्णानि बिभ्रतं सधस्थेषु महो दिवः|	with sacrifice we seek to thee kind cherisher of manly might.
चारुं सुक्र्त्ययेमहे|	in mansions of the lofty heavens.
संव्र्क्तध्र्ष्णुमुक्थ्यं महामहिव्रतं मदम|	gladdening crusher of the bold ruling with very mighty sway.
शतं पुरो रुरुक्षणिम|	destroyer of a hundred forts.
अतस्त्वा रयिमभि राजानं सुक्रतो दिवः|	hence sapient one the falcon strong of wing unwearied brought thee down.
सुपर्णो अव्यथिर्भरत|	lord over riches from the sky.
विश्वस्मा इत सवर्द्र्शे साधारणं रजस्तुरम|	that each may see the light the bird brought us the guard of law the friend.
गोपां रतस्य विर्भरत|	of all the speeder through the air.
अधा हिन्वान इन्द्रियं जयायो महित्वमानशे|	and now sent forth it hath attained to mighty power and majesty.
अभिष्टिक्र्द्विचर्षणिः|	most active ready to assist.
अया सोमः सुक्र्त्यया महश्चिदभ्यवर्धत|	great as he was soma hath gained strength by this high solemnity.
मन्दान उद्व्र्षायते|	joyous he riseth like a bull.
कर्तानीदस्य कर्त्वा चेतन्ते दस्युतर्हणा|	his task is done his crushings of the dasyus are made manifest.
रणा च धर्ष्णुश्चयते|	he sternly reckoneth their debts.
आत सोम इन्द्रियो रसो वज्रः सहस्रसा भुवत|	soon as his song of praise is born the soma indras juice becomes.
उक्थं यदस्य जायते|	a thousandwinning thunderbolt.
सवयं कविर्विधर्तरि विप्राय रत्नमिछति|	seer and sustainer he himself desireth riches for the sage.
यदी मर्म्र्ज्यते धियः|	when he embellisheth his songs.
सिषासतू रयीणां वाजेष्वर्वतामिव|	fain would they both win riches as in races of the steeds in war.
भरेषु जिग्युषामसि|	thou art upon the conquerors side.
अभि परियाणि पवते चनोहितो नामानि यह्वो अधि येषु वर्धते|	graciouslyminded he is flowing on his way to win dear names oer which the youthful one grows great.
आ सूर्यस्य बर्हतो बर्हन्नधि रथं विष्वञ्चमरुहद विचक्षणः|	the mighty and farseeing one hath mounted now the mighty sūryas car which moves to every side.
रतस्य जिह्वा पवते मधु परियं वक्ता पतिर्धियो अस्या अदाभ्यः|	the speaker unassailable master of this hymn the tongue of sacrifice pours forth the pleasant meath.
दधाति पुत्रः पित्रोरपीच्यं नाम तर्तीयमधि रोचने दिवः|	within the lustrous region of the heavens the son makes the third secret name of mother and of sire.
अव दयुतानः कलशानचिक्रदन नर्भिर्येमानः कोश आ हिरण्यये|	sending forth flashes he hath bellowed to the jars led by the men into the golden reservoir.
अभीं रतस्य दोहना अनूषताधि तरिप्र्ष्ठ उषसो वि राजति|	the milky streams of sacrifice have sung to him he of the triple height shines brightly through the morns.
अद्रिभिः सुतो मतिभिश्चनोहितः पररोचयन रोदसी मातराशुचिः|	pressed by the stones with hymns and graciously inclined illuminating both the parents heaven and earth.
रोमाण्यव्या समया वि धावति मधोर्धारा पिन्वमाना दिवेदिवे|	he flows in ordered season onward through the flee a current of sweet juice still swelling day by day.
परि सोम पर धन्वा सवस्तये नर्भिः पुनानो अभि वासयाशिरम|	flow onward soma flow to bring prosperity cleansed by the men invest thee with the milky draught.
ये ते मदा आहनसो विहायसस्तेभिरिन्द्रं चोदय दातवे मघम|	what gladdening drinks thou hast foaming exceeding strong even with these incite indra to give us wealth.
धर्ता दिवः पवते कर्त्व्यो रसो दक्षो देवानामनुमाद्यो नर्भिः|	on flows the potent juice sustainer of the heavens the strength of gods whom men must hail with shouts of joy.
हरिः सर्जानो अत्यो न सत्वभिर्व्र्था पाजांसि कर्णुते नदीष्वा|	the goldhued started like a courser by brave men impetuously winneth splendour in the streams.
शूरो न धत्त आयुधा गभस्त्योः सवः सिषासन रथिरो गविष्टिषु|	he takes his weapons like a hero in his hands fain to win light carborne in forays for the kine.
इन्द्रस्य शुष्ममीरयन्नपस्युभिरिन्दुर्हिन्वानो अज्यते मनीषिभिः|	indu while stimulating indias might is urged forward and balmed by sages skilful in their task.
इन्द्रस्य सोम पवमान ऊर्मिणा तविष्यमाणो जठरेष्वाविश|	soma as thou art purified with flowing wave exhibiting thy strength enter thou indras throat.
पर णः पिन्व विद्युदभ्रेव रोदसी धिया न वाजानुप मासि शश्वतः|	make both worlds stream for us as lightning doth the clouds mete out exhaustless powers for us as twere through song.
विश्वस्य राजा पवते सवर्द्र्श रतस्य धीतिं रषिषाळ अवीवशत|	onward he flows the king of all that sees the light the Ṛṣis lord hath raised the song of sacrifice.
यः सूर्यस्यासिरेण मर्ज्यते पिता मतीनामसमष्टकाव्यः|	even he who is adorned with sūryas arrowy beam father of hymns whose wisdom is beyond our reach.
वर्षेव यूथा परि कोशमर्षस्यपामुपस्थे वर्षभः कनिक्रदत|	like as a bull to herds thou flowest to the pail bellowing as a steer upon the waters lap.
स इन्द्राय पवसे मत्सरिन्तमो यथा जेषाम समिथे तवोतयः|	so best of cheerers thou for indra flowest on that we with thy protection may oercome in fight.
मन्द्रया सोम धारया वर्षा पवस्व देवयुः|	soma flow on with pleasant stream a bull devoted to the gods.
अव्यो वारेष्वस्मयुः|	our friend unto the woollen sieve.
अभि तयं मद्यं मदमिन्दविन्द्र इति कषर|	pour hitherward as indras self indu that gladdening stream of thine.
अभि वाजिनोर्वतः|	and send us coursers full of strength.
अभि तयं पूर्व्यं मदं सुवानो अर्ष पवित्र आ|	flow to the filter hitherward pouring that ancient gladdening juice.
अभि वाजमुत शरवः|	streaming forth power and high renown.
अनु दरप्सास इन्दव आपो न परवतासरन|	hither the sparkling drops have flowed like waters down a steep descent.
पुनाना इन्द्रमाशत|	they have reached indra purified.
यमत्यमिव वाजिनं मर्जन्ति योषणो दश|	whom having passed the filter ten dames cleanse as twere a vigorous steed.
वने करीळन्तमत्यविम|	while he disports him in the wood.
तं गोभिर्व्र्षणं रसं मदाय देववीतये|	the steerstrong juice with milk pour forth for feast and service of the gods.
सुतं भराय सं सर्ज|	to him who bears away the draught.
देवो देवाय धारयेन्द्राय पवते सुतः|	effused the god flows onward with his stream to indra to the god.
पयो यदस्य पीपयत|	so that his milk may strengthen him.
आत्मा यज्ञस्य रंह्या सुष्वाणः पवते सुतः|	soul of the sacrifice the juice effused flows quickly on he keeps.
परत्नंनि पाति काव्यम|	his ancient wisdom of a sage.
एवा पुनान इन्द्रयुर्मदं मदिष्ठ वीतये|	so pouring forth as indras friend strong drink best gladdener for the feast.
गुहा चिद दधिषे गिरः|	thou even in secret storest hymns.
पवित्रं ते विततं बरह्मणस पते परभुर्गात्राणि पर्येषिविश्वतः|	spread is thy cleansing filter brahmaṇaspati as prince thou enterest its limbs from every side.
अतप्ततनूर्न तदामो अश्नुते शर्तास इद वहन्तस्तत समाशत|	the raw whose mass hath not been heated gains not this they only which are dressed which bear attain to it.
तपोष पवित्रं विततं दिवस पदे शोचन्तो अस्य तन्तवो वयस्थिरन|	high in the seat of heaven is spread the scorchers sieve its threads are standing separate glittering with light.
अवन्त्यस्य पवीतारमाशवो दिवस पर्ष्ठमधितिष्ठन्ति चेतसा|	the swift ones favour him who purifieth this with consciousness they stand upon the height of heaven.
अरूरुचदुषसः पर्श्निरग्रिय उक्षा बिभर्ति भुवनानि वाजयुः|	the foremost spotted steer hath made the mornings shine and yearning after strength sustains all things that be.
मायाविनो ममिरे अस्य मायया नर्चक्षसः पितरो गर्भमा दधुः|	by his high wisdom have the mighty sages wrought the fathers who behold mankind laid down the germ.
गन्धर्व इत्था पदमस्य रक्षति पाति देवानां जनिमान्यद्भुतः|	gandharva verily protects his dwellingplace wondrous he guards the generations of the gods.
गर्भ्णाति रिपुं निधया निधापतिः सुक्र्त्तमा मधुनो भक्षमाशत|	lord of the snare he takes the foeman with the snare those who are most devout have gained a share of meath.
हविर्हविष्मो महि सद्म दैव्यं नभो वसानः परि यास्यध्वरम|	rich in oblations robed in cloud thou corapassest oblation sacrifice the mighty seat of gods.
राजा पवित्ररथो वाजमारुहः सहस्रभ्र्ष्टिर्जयसि शरवो बर्हत|	king on thy chariotsieve thou goest up to war and with a thousand weapons winnest lofty fame.
असावि सोमो अरुषो वर्षा हरी राजेव दस्मो अभि गा अचिक्रदत|	even as a king hath soma red and tawny bull been pressed the wondrous one hath bellowed to the kine.
पुनानो वारं पर्येत्यव्ययं शयेनो न योनिं घर्तवन्तमासदम|	while purified he passes through the filtering fleece to seat him hawklike on the place that drops with oil.
कविर्वेधस्या पर्येषि माहिनमत्यो न मर्ष्टो अभि वाजमर्षसि|	to glory goest thou sage with disposing skill like a groomed steed thou rusbest forward to the prize.
अपसेधन दुरिता सोम मर्ळय घर्तं वसानः परियासि निर्णिजम|	o soma be thou gracious driving off distress thou goest clothed in butter to a robe of state.
पर्जन्यः पिता महिषस्य पर्णिनो नाभा पर्थिव्या गिरिषुक्षयं दधे|	parjanya is the father of the mighty bird on mountains in earths centre hath he made his home.
सवसार आपो अभि गा उतासरन सं गरावभिर्नसते वीते अध्वरे|	the waters too have flowed the sisters to the kine he meets the pressingstones at the beloved rite.
जायेव पत्यावधि शेव मंहसे पज्राया गर्भ शर्णुहि बरवीमि ते|	thou givest pleasure as a wife delights her lord listen o child of pajri for to thee i speak.
अन्तर्वाणीषु पर चरा सु जीवसेअनिन्द्यो वर्जने सोम जाग्र्हि|	amid the holy songs go on that we may live in time of trouble soma watch thou free from blame.
यथा पूर्वेभ्यः शतसा अम्र्ध्रः सहस्रसाः पर्यया वाजमिन्दो|	as to the men of old thou camest indu unharmed to strengthen winning hundreds thousands.
एवा पवस्व सुविताय नव्यसे तव वरतमन्वापः सचन्ते|	so now for new felicity flow onward the waters follow as thy law ordaineth.
हिन्वन्ति सूरमुस्रयः सवसारो जामयस पतिम|	the glittering maids send sūra forth the glorious sisters closeallied.
महामिन्दुं महीयुवः|	send indu forth their mighty lord.
पवमान रुचारुचा देवो देवेभ्यस परि|	pervade o pavamana all our treasures with repeated light.
विश्वा वसून्याविश|	god coming hither from the gods.
आ पवमान सुष्टुतिं वर्ष्टिं देवेभ्यो दुवः|	pour on us pavamana rain as service and rain praise for gods.
इषे पवस्व संयतम|	pour all to be our nourishment.
वर्षा हयसि भानुना दयुमन्तं तवा हवामहे|	thou art a steer by lustre we o pavamana faithfully.
पवमान सवाध्यः|	call upon thee the splendid one.
आ पवस्व सुवीर्यं मन्दमानः सवायुध|	do thou rejoicing noblyarmed pour upon us heroic strength.
इहो षविन्दवा गहि|	o indu come thou bitherward.
यदद्भिः परिषिच्यसे मर्ज्यमानो गभस्त्योः|	when thou art cleansed with both the hands and dipped in waters with the wood.
दरुणा सधस्थमश्नुषे|	thou comest to the gatheringplace.
पर सोमाय वयश्ववत पवमानाय गायत|	sing forth your songs as vyaśva sang to soma pavamana to.
महे सहस्रचक्षसे|	the mighty one with thousand eyes.
यस्य वर्णं मधुश्चुतं हरिं हिन्वन्त्यद्रिभिः|	whose coloured sap they drive with stones the yellow meathdistilling juice.
इन्दुमिन्द्राय पीतये|	indu for indra for his drink.
तस्य ते वाजिनो वयं विश्वा धनानि जिग्युषः|	we seek to gain the friendly love of thee that strong and mighty one.
सखित्वमा वर्णीमहे|	of thee the winner of all wealth.
वर्षा पवस्व धारया मरुत्वते च मत्सरः|	flow onward with thy stream a steer inspiriting the maruts lord.
विश्वा दधान ओजसा|	winning all riches by thy might.
तं तवा धर्तारमोण्योः पवमान सवर्द्र्शम|	i send thee forth to battle from the press o pavamana strong.
हिन्वे वाजेषु वाजिनम|	sustainer looker on the light.
अया चित्तो विपानया हरिः पवस्व धारया|	acknowledged by this song of mine flow tawnycoloured with thy stream.
युजं वाजेषु चोदय|	incite to battle thine ally.
आ न इन्दो महीमिषं पवस्व विश्वदर्शतः|	o indu visible to all pour out for us abundant food.
अस्मभ्यं सोम गातुवित|	soma be thou our prosperer.
आ कलशा अनूषतेन्दो धाराभिरोजसा|	the pitchers indu with thy streams have sung aloud in vigorous might.
एन्द्रस्य पीतयेविश|	enter them and let indra drink.
यस्य ते मद्यं रसं तीव्रं दुहन्त्यद्रिभिः|	o thou whose potent gladdening juice they milk out with the stones flow on.
स पवस्वाभिमातिहा|	destroyer of our enemies.
राजा मेधाभिरीयते पवमानो मनावधि|	king pavamana is implored with holy songs on mans behalf.
अन्तरिक्षेण यातवे|	to travel through the firmament.
आ न इन्दो शतग्विनं गवां पोषं सवश्व्यम|	bring us o indu hundredfold increase of kine and noble steeds.
वहा भगत्तिमूतये|	the gift of fortune for our help.
आ नः सोम सहो जुवो रूपं न वर्चसे भर|	pressed for the banquet of the gods o soma bring us might and speed.
सुष्वाणो देववीतये|	like beauty for a brilliant show.
अर्षा सोम दयुमत्तमोअभि दरोणानि रोरुवत|	soma flow on exceeding bright with loud roar to the wooden vats.
सीदञ्छ्येनोन योनिमा|	falconlike resting in thine home.
अप्सा इन्द्राय वायवे वरुणाय मरुद्भ्यः|	soma the waterwinner flows to indra vāyu varuṇa.
सोमो अर्षति विष्णवे|	to viṣṇu and the marut host.
इषं तोकाय नो दधदस्मभ्यं सोम विश्वतः|	soma  bestowing food upon our progeny from every sides.
आ पवस्वसहस्रिणम|	pour on us riches thousandfold.
ये सोमासः परावति ये अर्वावति सुन्विरे|	the soma juices which have been expressed afar or near at hand.
ये वादः शर्यणावति|	or there on Śaryaṇāvāns bank.
य आर्जीकेषु कर्त्वसु ये मध्ये पस्त्यानाम|	those pressed among arjikas pressed among the active in mens homes.
ये वा जनेषुपञ्चसु|	or pressed among the races five.
ते नो वर्ष्टिं दिवस परि पवन्तामा सुवीर्यम|	may these celestial drops expressed pour forth upon us as they flow.
सुवाना देवास इन्दवः|	rain from the heavens apd hero strength.
पवते हर्यतो हरिर्ग्र्णानो जमदग्निना|	urged forward oer the oxhide flows the lovely one of tawny hue.
हिन्वानो गोरधित्वचि|	lauded by jamadagnis song.
पर शुक्रासो वयोजुवो हिन्वानासो न सप्तयः|	like horses urged to speed the drops bright stirring vital power when blent.
शरीणानाप्सु मर्ञ्जत|	with milk are beautified in streams.
तं तवा सुतेष्वाभुवो हिन्विरे देवतातये|	so they who toil with juices send thee forward for the gods repast.
स पवस्वानया रुचा|	so with this splendour flow thou on.
आ ते दक्षं मयोभुवं वह्निमद्या वर्णीमहे|	we choose today that chariotsteed of thine the strong that brings us bliss.
पान्तमापुरुस्प्र्हम|	the guardian the desire of all.
आ मन्द्रमा वरेण्यमा विप्रमा मनीषिणम|	the excellent the gladdener the sage with heart that understands.
पान्तमा पुरुस्प्र्हम|	the guardian the desire of all.
आ रयिमा सुचेतुनमा सुक्रतो तनूष्वा|	who for ourselves o thou most wise is wealth and fair intelligence.
पान्तमा पुरुस्प्र्हम|	the guardian the desire of all.
सखाय आ नि शीदत पुनानाय पर गायत|	sit down o friends and sing aloud to him who purifies himself.
शिशुं न यज्ञैः परि भूषत शरिये|	deck him for glory like a child with holy rites.
समी वत्सं न मात्र्भिः सर्जता गयसाधनम|	unite him bringing household wealth even as a calf with mother kine.
देवाव्यम्मदमभि दविशवसम|	him who hath double strength the god delighting juice.
पुनाता दक्षसाधनं यथा शर्धाय वीतये|	purify him who gives us power that he most blessed one may be.
यथा मित्राय वरुणाय शन्तमः|	a banquet for the troop mitra and varuṇa.
अस्मभ्यं तवा वसुविदमभि वाणीरनूषत|	voices have sung aloud to thee as finderout of wealth for us.
गोभिष टे वर्णमभि वासयामसि|	we clothe the hue thou wearest with a robe of milk.
स नो मदानां पत इन्दो देवप्सरा असि|	thou indu art the food of gods o sovran of all gladdening drinks.
सखेव सख्ये गातुवित्तमो भव|	as friend for friend be thou best finder of success.
सनेमि कर्ध्यस्मदा रक्षसं कं चिदत्रिणम|	drive utterly away from us each demon each voracious fiend.
अपादेवं दवयुमंहो युयोधि नः|	the godless and the false keep sorrow far away.
परि परिया दिवः कविर वयांसि नप्त्य्र हितः|	the sage of heaven whose heart is wise when laid between both hands and pressed.
सुवानो याति कविक्रतुः|	sends us delightful powers of life.
परपर कषयाय पन्यसे जनाय जुष्टो अद्रुहे|	on onward to a glorious home dear to the people void of guile.
वीत्य अर्ष चनिष्ठया|	with excellent enjoyment flow.
स सूनुर मातरा शुचिर जातो जाते अरोचयत|	he the bright son when born illumed his parents who had sprung to life.
महान मही रताव्र्धा|	great son great strengtheners of law.
स सप्त धीतिभिर हितो नद्य अजिन्वद अद्रुहः|	urged by the seven devotions he hath stirred the guileless rivers which.
या एकम अक्षि वाव्र्धुः|	have magnified the single eye.
ता अभि सन्तम अस्त्र्तम महे युवानम आ दधुः|	these helped to might theyouthful one high over all invincible.
इन्दुम इन्द्र तव वरते|	even indu indra in thy law.
अभि वह्निर अमर्त्यः सप्त पश्यति वावहिः|	the immortal courser good to draw looks down upon the seven the fount.
करिविर देवीर अतर्पयत|	hath satisfied the goddesses.
अवा कल्पेषु नः पुमस तमांसि सोम योध्या|	aid us in holy rites o man o pavamana drive away.
तानि पुनान जघनः|	dark shades that must be met in fight.
नू नव्यसे नवीयसे सूक्ताय साधया पथः|	make the paths ready for a hymn newer and newer evermore.
परत्नवद रोचया रुचः|	make the lights shine as erst they shone.
पवमान महि शरवो गाम अश्वं रासि वीरवत|	give pavamana high renown give kine and steeds and hero sons.
सना मेधां सना सवः|	win for us wisdom win the light.
पर ते धारा असश्चतो दिवो न यन्ति वर्ष्टयः|	thy streams that never fail or waste flow forth like showers of rain from heaven.
अछा वाजं सहस्रिणम|	to bring a thousand stores of strength.
अभि परियाणि काव्या विश्वा चक्षाणो अर्षति|	he flows beholding on his way all wellbeloved sacred lore.
हरिस्तुञ्जान आयुधा|	greentinted brandishing his arms.
स मर्म्र्जान आयुभिरिभो राजेव सुव्रतः|	he when the people deck him like a docile king of elephants.
शयेनो न वंसु षीदति|	sits as a falcon in the wood.
स नो विश्वा दिवो वसूतो पर्थिव्या अधि|	so bring thou hitherward to us indu while thou art purified.
पुनान इन्दवाभर|	all treasures both of heaven and earth.
सोमा अस्र्ग्रमाशवो मधोर्मदस्य धारया|	swift soma drops have been effused in streams of meath the gladdening drink.
अभि विश्वानिकाव्या|	for sacred lore of every kind.
अनु परत्नास आयवः पदं नवीयो अक्रमुः|	hither to newer restingplace the ancient living ones are come.
रुचे जनन्त सूर्यम|	they made the sun that he might shine.
आ पवमान नो भरार्यो अदाशुषो गयम|	o pavamana bring to us the unsacrificing foemans wealth.
कर्धि परजावतीरिषः|	and give us food with progeny.
अभि सोमास आयवः पवन्ते मद्यं मदम|	the living somas being cleansed diffuse exhilarating drink.
अभि कोशं मधुश्चुतम|	turned to the vat which drips with meath.
सोमो अर्षति धर्णसिर्दधान इन्द्रियं रसम|	soma gows on intelligent possessing sap and mighty strength.
सुवीरो अभिशस्तिपाः|	brave hero who repels the curse.
इन्द्राय सोम पवसे देवेभ्यः सधमाद्यः|	for indra soma thou art cleansed a feastcompanion for the gods.
इन्दो वाजं सिषाससि|	ndu thou fain wilt win us strength.
अस्य पीत्वा मदानामिन्द्रो वर्त्राण्यप्रति|	when he had drunken draughts of this indra smote down resistless foes.
जघान जघनच्च नु|	yea smote them and shall smite them still.
पर हिन्वानो जनिता रोदस्यो रथो न वाजं सनिष्यन्नयासीत|	urged on the father of the earth and heaven hath gone forth like a car to gather booty.
इन्द्रं गछन्नायुधा संशिशानो विश्वा वसु हस्तयोरादधानः|	going to indra sharpening his weapons and in his hand containing every treasure.
अभि तरिप्र्ष्ठं वर्षणं वयोधामाङगूषाणामवावशन्त वाणीः|	to him the tones of sacred song have sounded steer of the triple height the lifebestower.
वना वसानो वरुणो न सिन्धून वि रत्नधा दयते वार्याणि|	dwelling in wood as varuṇa in rivers lavishing treasure he distributes blessings.
शूरग्रामः सर्ववीरः सहावाञ जेता पवस्व सनिता धनानि|	great conqueror warnorgirt lord of all heroes flow on thy way as he who winneth riches.
तिग्मायुधः कषिप्रधन्वा समत्स्वषाळ्हः साह्वान्प्र्तनासु शत्रून|	with sharpened arms with swift bow never vanquished in battle vanquishing in fight the foemen.
उरुगव्यूतिरभयानि कर्ण्वन समीचीने आ पवस्वा पुरन्धी|	giving security lord of wide dominion send us both earth and heaven with all their fulness.
अपः सिषासन्नुषसः सवर्गाः सं चिक्रदो महो अस्मभ्यं वाजान|	striving to win the dawns the light the waters and cattle call to us abundant vigour.
मत्सि सोम वरुणं मत्सि मित्रं मत्सीन्द्रमिन्दो पवमान विष्णुम|	o soma gladden varuṇa and mitra cheer indu pavamana indra viṣṇu.
मत्सि शर्धो मारुतं मत्सि देवान मत्सि महामिन्द्रमिन्दो मदाय|	cheer thou the gods the company of maruts indu cheer mighty indra to rejoicing.
एवा राजेव करतुमानमेन विश्वा घनिघ्नद दुरिता पवस्व|	thus like a wise and potent king flow onward destroying with thy vigour all misfortunes.
इन्दो सूक्ताय वचसे वयो धा यूयं पात सवस्तिभिः सदा नः|	for our wellspoken hymn give life o indu do ye preserve us evermore with blessings.
पवस्व मधुमत्तम इन्द्राय सोम करतुवित्तमो मदः|	for indra flow thou soma on as gladdening juice most sweet intelligent.
महि दयुक्षतमो मदः|	great cheering dwelling most in heaven.
यस्य ते पीत्वा वर्षभो वर्षायतेअस्य पीता सवर्विदः|	thou of whom having drunk the steer acts like a steer drinking of this that finds the light.
स सुप्रकेतो अभ्यक्रमीदिशोअछा वाजं नैतशः|	he excellently wise is come to strengthening food to spoil and wealth like etaśa.
तवं हयन्ग दैव्या पवमान जनिमानि दयुमत्तमः|	for verily pavamana thou hast splendidest called all the generations of.
अम्र्तत्वाय घोषयः|	the gods to immortality.
येना नवग्वो दध्यन्नपोर्णुते येन विप्रास आपिरे|	by whom dadhyac navagva opens fastened doors by whom the sages gained their wish.
देवानां सुम्ने अम्र्तस्य चारुणो येन शरवांस्यानशुः|	by whom they won the fame of lovely amṛta in the felicity of gods.
एष सय धारया सुतोअव्यो वारेभिः पवते मदिन्तमः|	effused he floweth in a stream best rapturegiver in the long wool of the sheep.
करीळन्नूर्मिरपामिव|	sporting as twere the waters wave.
य उस्रिया अप्या अन्तरश्मनो निर्गा अक्र्न्तदोजसा|	he who from out the rocky cavern took with might the redmrefulgent watery cows.
अभिव्रजं तत्निषे गव्यमश्व्यं वर्मीव धर्ष्णवा रुज|	thou masterest the stable full of kine and steeds burst it brave lord like one in mail.
आ सोता परि षिञ्चताश्वं न सतोममप्तुरं रजस्तुरम|	press ye and pour him like a steed laudworthy speeding through the region and the flood.
वनर्क्षमुदप्रुतम|	who swims in water roan in wood.
सहस्रधारं वर्षभं पयोव्र्धं परियं देवाय जन्मने|	increaser of the water steer with thousand streams dear to the race of deities.
रतेन य रतजातो विवाव्र्धे राजा देव रतं बर्हत|	who born in law hath waxen mighty by the law king god and lofty ordinance.
अभि दयुम्नं बर्हद यश इषस पते दिदीहि देव देवयुः|	make splendid glory shine on us thou lord of strengthening food god as the friend of gods.
विकोशं मध्यमं युव|	unclose the fount of middle air.
आ वच्यस्व सुदक्ष चम्वोः सुतो विशां वह्निर्न विश्पतिः|	roll onward to the bowls o mighty one effused as prince supporter of the tribes.
वर्ष्टिं दिवः पवस्व रीतिमपां जिन्वा गविष्टये धियः|	pour on us rain from heaven send us the waters flow incite our thoughts to win the spoil.
एतमु तयं मदच्युतं सहस्रधारं वर्षभं दिवो दुहुः|	they have drained him the steer of heaven him with a thousand streams distilling rapturous joy.
विश्वा वसूनि बिभ्रतम|	him who brings all things excellent.
वर्षा वि जज्ञे जनयन्नमर्त्यः परतपञ जयोतिषा तमः|	the mighty one was born immortal giving life lightening darkness with his shine.
स सुष्टुतः कविभिर्निर्णिजं दधे तरिधात्वस्य दंससा|	wcllpraised by sages he hath by his wondrous power assumed the threefold as his robe.
स सुन्वे यो वसूनां यो रायामानेता य इळानाम|	effused is he who brings good things who brings us bounteous gifts and sweet refreshing food.
सोमोयः सुक्षितीनाम|	soma who brings us quiet homes.
यस्य न इन्द्रः पिबाद यस्य मरुतो यस्य वार्यमणा भगः|	he whom our indra and the marut host shall drink bhaga shall drink with aryarnan.
आ येन मित्रावरुणा करामह एन्द्रमवसे महे|	by whom we bring to us mitra and varuṇa and indra for our great defence.
इन्द्राय सोम पातवे नर्भिर्यतः सवायुधो मदिन्तमः|	soma for indras drink do thou led by the men wellwcaponcd and most gladdening.
पवस्व मधुमत्तमः|	flow on with greatest store of sweets.
इन्द्रस्य हार्दि सोमधानमा विश समुद्रमिव सिन्धवः|	enter the somaholder even indras heart as rivers pass into the sea.
जुष्टो मित्राय वरुणाय वायवे दिवो विष्टम्भ उत्तमः|	acceptable to mitra vāyu varuṇa the noblest pillar of the heavens.
पर गायत्रेण गायत पवमानं विचर्षणिम|	sing forth and laud with sacred song most active pavamana laud.
इन्दुं सहस्रचक्षसम|	indu who sees with thousand eyes.
तं तवा सहस्रचक्षसमथो सहस्रभर्णसम|	thee who hast thousand eyes to see bearer of thousand burthens they.
अति वारमपाविषुः|	have filtered through the fleecy cloth.
अति वारान पवमानो असिष्यदत कलशानभि धावति|	he pavamana hath streamed through the fleece then he runs into the jars.
इन्द्रस्य हार्द्याविशन|	finding his way to indras heart.
इन्द्रस्य सोम राधसे शं पवस्व विचर्षणे|	that indra may be bounteous flow most active soma for our weal.
परजावद रेता भर|	bring genial seed with progeny.
तरिरस्मै सप्त धेनवो दुदुह्रे सत्यामाशिरं पूर्व्ये वयोमनि|	the three times seven milchkine in the eastern heaven have for this soma poured the genuine milky draught.
चत्वार्यन्या भुवनानि निर्णिजे चारूणि चक्रे यद रतैरवर्धत|	four other beauteous creatures hath he made for his adornment when he waxed in strength through holy rites.
स भिक्षमाणो अम्र्तस्य चारुण उभे दयावा काव्येना वि शश्रथे|	longing for lovely amṛta by his wisdom he divided each apart from other earth and heaven.
तेजिष्ठा अपो मंहना परि वयत यदी देवस्य शरवसा सदो विदुः|	he gladly wrapped himself in the most lucid floods when through their glory they found the gods restingplace.
ते अस्य सन्तु केतवोअम्र्त्यवोअदाभ्यासो जनुषी उभे अनु|	may those his brilliant rays he ever free from death inviolate for both classes of created things.
येभिर्न्र्म्णा च देव्या च पुनत आदिद राजानं मनना अग्र्भ्णत|	rays wherewith powers of men and gods are purified yea even for this have sageswelcomed him as king.
स मर्ज्यमानो दशभिः सुकर्मभिः पर मध्यमासु मात्र्षुप्रमे सचा|	he while he is adorned by the ten skilful ones that he too in the midmost mothers may create.
वरतानि पानो अम्र्तस्व चारुण उभे नर्चक्षानु पश्यते विशौ|	while he is watching oer the lovely amṛtas ways looks on both races as beholder of mankind.
स मर्म्र्जान इन्द्रियाय धायस ओभे अन्ता रोदसी हर्षते हितः|	he while he is adorned to stream forth mighty strength rejoices in his place between the earth and heaven.
वर्षा शुष्मेण बाधते वि दुर्मतीरादेदिशानः शर्यहेव शुरुधः|	the steer dispels the evilhearted with his might aiming at offerings as an archer at the game.
स मातरा न दद्र्शान उस्रियो नानददेति मरुतामिव सवनः|	beholding as it were two mother cows the steer goes roaring on his way even as the maruts roar.
जानन्न्र्तं परथमं यत सवर्णरं परशस्तये कमव्र्णीत सुक्रतुः|	knowing eternal law the earliest light of heaven he passing wise was chosen out to tell it forth.
रुवति भीमो वर्षभस्तविष्यया शर्ङगे शिशानो हरिणीविचक्षणः|	the fearful bull is bellowing with violent might farsighted sharpening his yellowcoloured horns.
आ योनिं सोमः सुक्र्तं नि षीदति गव्ययीत्वग भवति निर्णिगव्ययी|	soma assumes his seat in the wellfashioned place the cowhide and the sheepskin are his ornament.
शुचिः पुनानस्तन्वमरेपसमव्ये हरिर्न्यधाविष्ट सानवि|	bright making pure his body free from spot and stain on the sheeps back the goldencoloured hath flowed down.
जुष्टो मित्राय वरुणाय वायवे तरिधातु मधु करियते सुकर्मभिः|	acceptable to mitra vāyu varuṇa he is prepared as threefold meal by skilful men.
पवस्व सोम देववीतये वर्षेन्द्रस्य हार्दि सोमधानमा विश|	flow on for the gods banquet soma as a steer and enter indras heart the somas reservoir.
पुरा नो बाधाद दुरिताति पारय कषेत्रविद धि दिश आहा विप्र्छते|	bear us beyond misfortune ere we be oppres sed the man who knows the land directs the man who asks.
हितो न सप्तिरभि वाजमर्षेन्द्रस्येन्दो जठरमा पवस्व|	urged like a carsteed flow to strength o soma indu flow onward to the throat of indra.
नावा न सिन्धुमति पर्षि विद्वाञ्छूरो न युध्यन्नव नो निद सपः|	skilled bear us past as in a boat oer water as battling hero save us from the foeman.
इन्द्रमछ सुता इमे वर्षणं यन्तु हरयः|	to indra to the mighty steer may these goldcoloured juices go.
शरुष्टी जातास इन्दवः सवर्विदः|	drops rapidly produced that find the light of heaven.
अयं भराय सानसिरिन्द्राय पवते सुतः|	effused this juice victorious flows for indra for his maintenance.
सोमो जैत्रस्यचेतति यथा विदे|	soma bethinks him of the conqueror as he knows.
अस्येदिन्द्रो मदेष्वा गराभं गर्भ्णीत सानसिम|	may indra in his raptures gain from him the grasp that gathers spoil.
वज्रंच वर्षणं भरत समप्सुजित|	and winning waters wield the steerstrong thunderbolt.
पर धन्वा सोम जाग्र्विरिन्द्रायेन्दो परि सरव|	flow vigilant for indra thou soma yea indu run thou on.
दयुमन्तं शुष्ममा भरा सवर्विदम|	bring hither splendid strength that finds the light of heaven.
इन्द्राय वर्षणं मदं पवस्व विश्वदर्शतः|	do thou allbeautiful purify for indras sake the mighty juice.
सहस्रयामा पथिक्र्द विचक्षणः|	pathmaker thou far seeing with a thousand ways.
अस्मभ्यं गातुवित्तमो देवेभ्यो मधुमत्तमः|	best finder of prosperity for us most rich in sweets for gods.
सहस्रं याहिपथिभिः कनिक्रदत|	proceed thou loudly roaring on a thousand paths.
पवस्व देववीतय इन्दो धाराभिरोजसा|	o indu with thy streams in might flow for the banquet of the gods.
आ कलशं मधुमान सोम नः सदः|	rich in meath soma in our beaker take thy place.
तव दरप्सा उदप्रुत इन्द्रं मदाय वाव्र्धुः|	thy drops that swim in water have exalted indra to delight.
तवां देवासो अम्र्ताय कं पपुः|	the gods have drunk thee up for immortality.
आ नः सुतास इन्दवः पुनाना धावता रयिम|	stream opulence to us ye drops of soma pressed and purified.
वर्ष्टिद्यावोरीत्यापः सवर्विदः|	pouring down rain from heaven in hoods and finding light.
सोमः पुनान ऊर्मिणाव्यो वारं वि धावति|	soma while filtered with his wave flows through the long wool of the sheep.
अग्रे वाचःपवमानः कनिक्रदत|	shouting while purified before the voice of song.
धीभिर्हिन्वन्ति वाजिनं वने करीळन्तमत्यविम|	with songs they send the mighty forth sporting in wood above the fleece.
अभि तरिप्र्ष्ठं मतयः समस्वरन|	our psalms have glorified him of the triple height.
असर्जि कलशानभि मीळ्हे सप्तिर्न वाजयुः|	into the jars hath he been loosed like an impetuous steed for war.
पुनानो वाचं जनयन्नसिष्यदत|	and lifting up his voice while filtered glided on.
पवते हर्यतो हरिरति हवरांसि रंह्या|	goldhued and lovely in his course througb tangles of the wool he flows.
अभ्यर्षन सतोत्र्भ्यो वीरवद यशः|	and pours heroic fame upon the worshippers.
अया पवस्व देवयुर्मधोर्धारा अस्र्क्षत|	flow thus a faithful votary the streams of meath have been effused.
रेभन पवित्रम्पर्येषि विश्वतः|	thou comest to the filter singing from each side.
कराणा शिशुर्महीनां हिन्वन्न्र्तस्य दीधितिम|	the child when blended with the streams speeding the plan of sacrifice.
विश्वापरि परिया भुवदध दविता|	surpasses all things that are dear yea from of old.
उप तरितस्य पाष्योरभक्त यद गुहा पदम|	the place near the two pressingstones of trita hath he occupied.
यज्ञस्य सप्त धामभिरध परियम|	secret and dear through seven lights of sacrifice.
तरीणि तरितस्य धारया पर्ष्ठेष्वेरया रयिम|	urge to three courses on the heights of trita riches in a stream.
मिमीते अस्य योजना वि सुक्रतुः|	he who is passing wise measures his courses out.
जज्ञानं सप्त मातरो वेधामशासत शरिये|	even at his birth the mothers seven taught him for glory like a sage.
अयं धरुवो रयीणां चिकेत यत|	so that he firm and sure hath set his mind on wealth.
अस्य वरते सजोषसो विश्वे देवासो अद्रुहः|	under his sway of one accord are all the guileless deities.
सपार्हा भवन्ति रन्तयो जुषन्त यत|	warriors to be envied they when they are pleased.
यमी गर्भं रताव्र्धो दर्शे चारुमजीजनन|	the babe whom they who strengthen law have generated fair to see.
कविं मंहिष्ठमध्वरे पुरुस्प्र्हम|	much longed for at the sacrifice most liberal sage.
समीचीने अभि तमना यह्वी रतस्य मातरा|	to him united of themselves come the young parents of the rite.
तन्वाना यज्ञमानुषग यदञ्जते|	when they adorn him duly weaving sacrifice.
करत्वा शुक्रेभिरक्षभिरणोरप वरजं दिवः|	with wisdom and with radiant eyes unbar to us the stall of heaven.
हिन्वन्न्र्तस्य दीधितिं पराध्वरे|	speeding at solemn rite the plan of holy law.
पर तु दरव परि कोशं नि षीद नर्भिः पुनानो अभि वाजमर्ष|	run onward to the reservoir and seat thee cleansed by the men speed forward to the battle.
अश्वं न तवा वाजिनं मर्जयन्तोअछा बर्ही रशनाभिर्नयन्ति|	making thee beauteous like an able courser forth to the sacred grass with reins they lead thee.
सवायुधः पवते देव इन्दुरशस्तिहा वर्जनं रक्षमाणः|	indu the wellarmed god is flowing onward who quells the curse and guards from treacherous onslaught.
पिता देवानां जनिता सुदक्षो विष्टम्भो दिवो धरुणः पर्थिव्याः|	father begetter of the gods most skilful the buttress of the heavens and earths supporter.
रषिर्विप्रः पुरेता जनानां रभुर्धीर उशना काव्येन|	Ṛṣi and sage the champion of the people cleft and sagacious uśanā in wisdom.
स चिद विवेद निहितं यदासामपीच्यं गुह्यं नाम गोनाम|	he hath discovered even their hidden nature the cows concealed and most mysterious title.
एष सय ते मधुमानिन्द्र सोमो वर्षा वर्ष्णे परि पवित्रे अक्षाः|	this thine own soma rich in meath o indra steer for the steer hath flowed into the filter.
सहस्रसाः शतसा भूरिदावा शश्वत्तमं बर्हिरा वाज्यस्थात|	the strong freegiver winning hundreds thousands hath reached the holy grass that never fails him.
एते सोमा अभि गव्या सहस्रा महे वाजायाम्र्ताय शरवांसि|	these somas are for wealth of countless cattle renown therefor and mighty strength immortal.
पवित्रेभिः पवमाना अस्र्ग्रञ्छ्रवस्यवो न पर्तनाजो अत्याः|	these have been sent forth urified by strainers like steeds who rusg to battle fain for glory.
परि हि षमा पुरुहूतो जनानां विश्वासरद भोजना पूयमानः|	he while he cleanses him invoked of many hath flowed to give the people all enjoyment.
अथा भर शयेनभ्र्त परयांसि रयिं तुञ्जानो अभि वाजमर्ष|	thou whom the falcon brought bring dainty viands bestir thyself and send us wealth and booty.
एष सुवानः परि सोमः पवित्रे सर्गो न सर्ष्टो अदधावदर्वा|	this soma pressed into the cleansing filter hath run as twere a host let loose the courser.
तिग्मे शिशानो महिषो न शर्ङगे गा गव्यन्नभिशूरो न सत्वा|	like a strong bull who whets his horns kpenpointed like a brave warrior in the fray for cattle.
एषा ययौ परमादन्तरद्रेः कूचित सतीरूर्वे गा विवेद|	he issued forth from out the loftiest mountain and found kine hidden somewhere in a stable.
दिवो न विद्युत सतनयन्त्यभ्रैः सोमस्य ते पवत इन्द्रधारा|	somas stream clears itself for thee o indra like lightning thundering through the clouds of heaven.
उत सम राशिं परि यासि गोनामिन्द्रेण सोम सरथं पुनानः|	cleansing thyselr and borne along with indra soma thou goest round the herd of cattle.
पूर्वीरिषो बर्हतीर्जीरदानो शिक्षा शचीवस्तव ता उपष्टुत|	may thy praise help us mighty one prompt giver to the full ample food which thou bestowest.
अभी नवन्ते अद्रुहः परियमिन्द्रस्य काम्यम|	the guileless ones are singing praise to indras well beloved friend.
वत्सं न पूर्व आयुनि जातं रिहन्ति मातरः|	as in the morning of its life the mothers lick the newborn calf.
पुनान इन्दवा भर सोम दविबर्हसं रयिम|	o indu while they cleanse thee bring o soma doublywaxing wealth.
तवं वसूनिपुष्यसि विश्वानि दाशुषो गर्हे|	thou in the worshippers abode causest all treasures to increase.
तवं धियं मनोयुजं सर्जा वर्ष्टिं न तन्यतुः|	set free the song which mind hath yoked even as thunder frees the rain.
तवं वसूनि पार्थिवा दिव्या च सोम पुष्यसि|	all treasures of the earth and heaven o soma thou dost multiply.
परि ते जिग्युषो यथा धारा सुतस्य धावति|	thy stream when thou art pressed runs on like some victorious warriors steed.
रंहमाणाव्यव्ययं वारं वाजीव सानसिः|	hastening onward through the fleece like a fierce horse who wins the prize.
करत्वे दक्षाय नः कवे पवस्व सोम धारया|	flow on sage soma with thy stream to give us mental power and strength.
इन्द्राय पातवे सुतो मित्राय वरुणाय च|	effused for indra for his drink for mitra and for varuṇa.
पवस्व वाजसातमः पवित्रे धारया सुतः|	flow to the filter with thy stream effused best winner thou of spoil.
इन्द्राय सोमविष्णवे देवेभ्यो मधुमत्तमः|	o soma as most rich in sweets for indra viṣṇu and the gods.
तवां रिहन्ति मातरो हरिं पवित्रे अद्रुहः|	the mothers void of guiles caress thee goldencoloured in the sieve.
वत्सं जातंन धेनवः पवमान विधर्मणि|	as cows o pavamana lick the newborn calf as law commands.
पवमान महि शरवश्चित्रेभिर्यासि रश्मिभिः|	thou pavamana movest on with wondrous rays to great renown.
शर्धन तमांसि जिघ्नसे विश्वानि दाशुषो गर्हे|	striving within the votarys house thou drivest all the glooms away.
तवं दयां च महिव्रत पर्थिवीं चाति जभ्रिषे|	lord of great sway thou liftest thee above the heavens above the earth.
परति दरापिममुञ्चथाः पवमान महित्वना|	thou pavamana hast assumed thy coat of mail in majesty.
पर सोमासो मदच्युतः शरवसे नो मघोनः|	the raptureshedding somadrops effused in our assembly have.
सुता विदथे अक्रमुः|	flowed forth to glorify our prince.
आदीं तरितस्य योषणो हरिं हिन्वन्त्यद्रिभिः|	then tritas maidens onward urge the tawnycoloured with the stones.
इन्दुमिन्द्राय पीतये|	indu for indra for his drink.
आदीं हंसो यथा गणं विश्वस्यावीवशन मतिम|	now like a swan he maketh all the company sing each his hymn.
अत्योन गोभिरज्यते|	he like a steed is bathed in milk.
उभे सोमावचाकशन मर्गो न तक्तो अर्षसि|	o soma viewing heaven and earth thou runncst like a darting deer.
सीदन्न्र्तस्य योनिमा|	set in the place of sacrifice.
अभि गावो अनूषत योषा जारमिव परियम|	the cows have sung with joy to him even as a woman to her love.
अगन्नाजिं यथा हितम|	he came as to a settled race.
अस्मे धेहि दयुमद यशो मघवद्भ्यश्च मह्यं च|	bestow illustrious fame on us both on our liberal lords and me.
सनिं मेधामुत शरवः|	glory intelligence and wealth.
शिशुर्न जातोअव चक्रदद वने सवर्यद वाज्यरुषः सिषासति|	born like a youngling he hath clamoured in the wood when he the red the strong would win the light of heaven.
दिवो रेतसा सचते पयोव्र्धा तमीमहे सुमती शर्म सप्रथः|	he comes with heavenly seed that makes the water swell him for widespreading shelter we implore with prayer.
दिवो य सकम्भो धरुणः सवातत आपूर्णो अंशुः पर्येतिविश्वतः|	a farextended pillar that supports the sky the somastalk filled full moves itself every way.
सेमे मही रोदसी यक्षदाव्र्ता समीचीने दाधार समिषः कविः|	he shall bring both these great worlds while the rite proceeds the sage holds these who move together and all food.
महि पसरः सुक्र्तं सोम्यं मधूर्वी गव्यूतिरदितेरतं यते|	wide space hath he who follows aditis right path and mighty wellmade food meath blent with soma juice.
ईशे यो वर्ष्टेरित उस्रियो वर्षापां नेता य इतूतिरगमियः|	he who from hence commands the rain steer of the kine leader of floods who helps us hence who claims our laud.
आत्मन्वन नभो दुह्यते घर्तं पय रतस्य नाभिरम्र्तं विजायते|	butter and milk are drawn from animated cloud thence amṛta is produced centre of sacrifice.
समीचीनाः सुदानवः परीणन्ति तं नरो हितमव मेहन्ति पेरवः|	hini the most bounteous ones ever united love him as ouir friend the men who make all swell rain down.
अरावीदंशुः सचमान ऊर्मिणा देवाव्यं मनुषे पिन्वतित्वचम|	the somastalk hath roared following with the wave he swells with sap for man the skin which gods enjoy.
दधाति गर्भमदितेरुपस्थ आ येन तोकं च तनयं च धामहे|	upon the lap of aditi he lays the germ by means whereof we gain children and progeny.
सहस्रधारेअव ता असश्चतस्त्र्तीये सन्तु रजसि परजावतीः|	in the third region which distils a thousand streams may the exhaustless ones descend with procreant power.
चतस्रो नाभो निहिता अवो दिवो हविर्भरन्त्यम्र्तं घर्तश्चुतः|	the kindred four have been sent downward from the heavens dropping with oil they bring amṛta and sacred gifts.
शवेतं रूपं कर्णुते यत सिषासति सोमो मीढ्वानसुरो वेद भूमनः|	soma assumes white colour when he strives to gain the bounteous asura knows full many a precious boon.
धिया शमी सचते सेमभि परवद दिवस कवन्धमव दर्षदुद्रिणम|	down the steep slope through song he comes to sacrifice and he will burst the waterholding cask of heaven.
अध शवेतं कलशं गोभिरक्तं कार्ष्मन्ना वाज्यक्रमीत ससवान|	yea to the shining milkanointed beaker as to his goal hath stepped the conquering courser.
आ हिन्विरे मनसा देवयन्तः कक्षीवते शतहिमाय गोनाम|	pioussouled men have sent their giffi of cattle unto kakṣīvān of the hundred winters.
अद्भिः सोम पप्र्चानस्य ते रसोअव्यो वारं वि पवमान धावति|	soma thy juice when thou art blended with the streams flows pavamana through the long wool of the sheep.
स मर्ज्यमानः कविभिर्मदिन्तम सवदस्वेन्द्राय पवमान पीतये|	so cleansed by sages o best giver of delight grow sweet for indra pavamana for his drink.
इन्द्राय सोम सुषुतः परि सरवापामीवा भवतु रक्षसा सह|	flow on to indra soma carefully effused let sickness stay afar together with the fiends.
मा ते रसस्य मत्सत दवयाविनो दरविणस्वन्त इह सन्त्विन्दवः|	let not the doubletongued delight them with thy juice here be thy flowing drops laden with opulence.
अस्मान समर्ये पवमान चोदय दक्षो देवानामसि हि परियो मदः|	o pavamana urge us forward in the fight thou art the vigour of the gods the wellloved drink.
जहि शत्रून्रभ्या भन्दनायतः पिबेन्द्र सोममव नो मर्धो जहि|	smite thou our enemies who raise the shout of joy indra drink soma juice and drive away our foes.
अदब्ध इन्दो पवसे मदिन्तम आत्मेन्द्रस्य भवसि धासिरुत्तमः|	unharmed best cheerer thou o indu flowest on thou even thou thyself art indras noblest food.
अभि सवरन्ति बहवो मनीषिणो राजानमस्य भुवनस्यनिंसते|	full many a wise man lifts to thee the song of praise and hails thee with a kiss as sovran of this world.
सहस्रणीथः शतधारो अद्भुत इन्द्रायेन्दुः पवते काम्यं मधु|	wondrous with hundred streams hymned in a thousand songs indu pours out for indra his delightrul meath.
जयन कषेत्रमभ्यर्षा जयन्नप उरुं नो गातुं कर्णु सोम मीढ्वः|	winning us land and waters flow thou hitherward rainer of bounties soma make broad way for us.
कनिक्रदत कलशे गोभिरज्यसे वयव्ययं समया वारमर्षसि|	roaring within the beaker thou art balmed with milk thou passest through the fleecy filter all at once.
मर्म्र्ज्यमानो अत्यो न सानसिरिन्द्रस्य सोम जठरे समक्षरः|	carefully cleansed and decked like a prizewinning steed o soma thou hast flowed down within indras throat.
सवादुः पवस्व दिव्याय जन्मने सवादुरिन्द्राय सुहवीतुनाम्ने|	flow onward sweet of flavour for the heavenly race for indra sweet whose name is easily invoked.
सवादुर्मित्राय वरुणाय वायवे बर्हस्पतये मधुमानदाभ्यः|	flow sweet for mitra varuṇa and vāyu rich in meath inviolable for bṛhaspati.
अत्यं मर्जन्ति कलशे दश कषिपः पर विप्राणां मतयो वाच ईरते|	ten rapid fingers deck the courser in the jar with hymns the holy singers send their voices forth.
पवमाना अभ्यर्षन्ति सुष्टुतिमेन्द्रं विशन्तिमदिरास इन्दवः|	the filtering juices hasten to their eulogy the drops that gladden find their way to indras heart.
पवमानो अभ्यर्षा सुवीर्यमुर्वीं गव्यूतिं महि शर्म सप्रथः|	while thou art purified pour on us hero strength great farextended shelter spacious pasturage.
माकिर्नो अस्य परिषूतिरीशतेन्दो जयेम तवयाधनंधनम|	let no oppression master this our holy work may we o indu gain all opulence through thee.
अधि दयामस्थाद वर्षभो विचक्षणोअरूरुचद वि दिवो रोचना कविः|	the steer who sees afar hath risen above the sky the sage hath caused the lights of heaven to give their shine.
राजा पवित्रमत्येति रोरुवद दिवः पीयूषन्दुहते नर्चक्षसः|	the king is passing through the filter with a roar they drain the milk of heaven from him who looks on men.
दिवो नाके मधुजिह्वा असश्चतो वेना दुहन्त्युक्षणं गिरिष्ठाम|	high in the vault of heaven unceasing honeytongued the loving ones drain out the mountainhaunting steer.
अप्सु दरप्सं वाव्र्धानं समुद्र आ सिन्धोरूर्मामधुमन्तं पवित्र आ|	the drop that hath grown great in waters in the lake meathrich in the streams wave and in the cleansing sieve.
नाके सुपर्णमुपपप्तिवांसं गिरो वेनानामक्र्पन्त पूर्वीः|	the loving ones besought with many voices the eagle who had flown away to heaven.
शिशुं रिहन्ति मतयः पनिप्नतं हिरण्ययं शकुनं कषामणि सथाम|	hymns kiss the youngling worthy of laudation resting on earth the bird of golden colour.
ऊर्ध्वो गन्धर्वो अधि नाके अस्थाद विश्वा रूपा परतिचक्षाणो अस्य|	high to heavens vault hath the gandharva risen beholding all his varied forms and figures.
भानुः शुक्रेण शोचिषा वयद्यौत परारूरुचद रोदसी मातरा शुचिः|	his ray hath shone abroad with gleaming splendour pure he hath lighted both the worlds the parents.
पवस्व देवमादनो विचर्षणिरप्सा इन्द्राय वरुणाय वायवे|	flow cheering gods most active winner of the flood for indra and for vāyu and for varuṇa.
कर्धी नो अद्य वरिवः सवस्तिमदुरुक्षितौ गर्णीहि दैव्यं जनम|	bestow on us today wide room with happiness and in tbine ample dwelling laud the host of heaven.
आ यस्तस्थौ भुवनान्यमर्त्यो विश्वानि सोमः परि तान्यर्षति|	he who hath come anear to creatures that have life immortal soma flows onward to all of them.
कर्ण्वन संच्र्तं विच्र्तमभिष्टय इन्दुः सिषक्त्युषसं न सूर्यः|	effecting for our aid both union and release indu like sūrya follows closely after dawn.
आ यो गोभिः सर्ज्यत ओषधीष्वा देवानां सुम्न इषयन्नुपावसुः|	he who is poured with milk he who within the plants hastes bringing treasure for the happiness of gods.
आ विद्युता पवते धारया सुत इन्द्रं सोमो मादयन दैव्यं जनम|	he poured forth in a stream flows with the lightnings flash soma who gladdens indra and the host of heaven.
एष सय सोमः पवते सहस्रजिद धिन्वानो वाचमिषिरामुषर्बुधम|	winner of thousands he this soma flows along raising a vigorous voice that wakens with the dawn.
इन्दुः समुद्रमुदियर्ति वायुभिरेन्द्रस्य हार्दिकलशेषु सीदति|	indu with winds drives on the ocean of the air he sinks within the jars he rests in indras heart.
अभि तयं गावः पयसा पयोव्र्धं सोमं शरीणन्ति मतिभिः सवर्विदम|	the kine with milk dress him who makes the milk increase soma amid the songs who finds the light of heaven.
धनंजयः पवते कर्त्व्यो रसो विप्रः कविःकाव्येना सवर्चनाः|	winner of wealth the effectual juice is flowing on singer and sage by wisdom dear as heaven itself.
पर त आशवः पवमान धीजवो मदा अर्षन्ति रघुजा इव तमना|	thy gladdening draughts o pavamana urged by song flow swiftly of themselves like sons of fleetfoot mares.
दिव्याः सुपर्णा मधुमन्त इन्दवो मदिन्तमासः परि कोशमासते|	the drops of soma juice those eagles of the heavens most cheering rich in meath rest in the reservoir.
पर ते मदासो मदिरास आशवोअस्र्क्षत रथ्यासो यथा पर्थक|	as rapid chariotsteeds so turned in several ways have thine exhilarating juices darted forth.
धेनुर्न वत्सं पयसाभि वज्रिणमिन्द्रमिन्दवो मधुमन्त ऊर्मयः|	somadrops rich in meath waves to the thunderarmed to indra like milchkine who seek their calf with milk.
अत्यो न हियानो अभि वाजमर्ष सवर्वित कोशं दिवो अद्रिमातरम|	like a steed urged to battle finder of the light speed onward to the cloudborn reservoir of heaven.
वर्षा पवित्रे अधि सानो अव्यये सोमः पुनान इन्द्रियाय धायसे|	a steer that oer the woolly surface seeks the sieve soma while purified for indras nourishment.
पर त आश्विनीः पवमान धीजुवो दिव्या अस्र्ग्रन पयसा धरीमणि|	fleet as swift steeds thy drops divine thoughtswift have been o pavamana poured with milk into the vat.
परान्तरषयः सथाविरीरस्र्क्षत ये तवा मर्जन्त्य रषिषाण वेधसः|	the Ṛṣis have poured in continuous soma drops ordainers who adorn thee friend whom Ṛṣis love.
विश्वा धामानि विश्वचक्ष रभ्वसः परभोस्ते सतः परियन्ति केतवः|	o thou who seest all things sovran as thou art and passing strong thy rays encompass all abodes.
वयानशिः पवसे सोम धर्मभिः पतिर्विश्वस्य भुवनस्य राजसि|	pervading with thy natural powers thou flowest on and as the whole worlds lord o soma thou art king.
उभयतः पवमानस्य रश्मयो धरुवस्य सतः परि यन्ति केतवः|	the beams of pavamana sent from earth and heaven his ensigns who is ever steadfast travel round.
यदी पवित्रे अधि मर्ज्यते हरिः सत्ता नि योना कलशेषु सीदति|	when on the sieve the goldenhued is cleansed he rests within the vats as one who seats him in his place.
यज्ञस्य केतुः पवते सवध्वरः सोमो देवानामुप याति निष्क्र्तम|	served with fair rites he flows ensign of sacrifice soma advances to the special place of gods.
सहस्रधारः परि कोशमर्षति वर्षा पवित्रमत्येति रोरुवत|	he speeds with thousand currents to the reservoir and passes through the filter bellowing as a bull.
राजा समुद्रं नद्यो वि गाहतेअपामूर्मिं सचते सिन्धुषु शरितः|	the sovran dips him in the seain and the streams and set in rivers with the waters wave moves on.
अध्यस्थात सानु पवमानो अव्ययं नाभा पर्थिव्या धरुणो महो दिवः|	high heavens sustainer at the central point of earth raised on the fleecy surface pavamana stands.
दिवो न सानु सतनयन्नचिक्रदद दयौश्च यस्य पर्थिवी च धर्मभिः|	he on whose high decree the heavens and earth depend nath roared and thundered like the summit of the sky.
इन्द्रस्य सख्यं पवते विवेविदत सोमः पुनानःकलशेषु सीदति|	soma flows on obtaining indras friendly love and as they purify him settles in the jars.
जयोतिर्यज्ञस्य पवते मधु परियं पिता देवानां जनिता विभूवसुः|	he light of sacrifice distils delicious meath most wealthy father and begetter of the gods.
दधाति रत्नं सवधयोरपीच्यं मदिन्तमो मत्सर इन्द्रियो रसः|	he gladdening best of cheerers juicehat indra loves enriches with mysterious treasure earth and heaven.
अभिक्रन्दन कलशं वाज्यर्षति पतिर्दिवः शतधारो विचक्षणः|	the vigorous and farseeing one the lord of heaven flows shouting to the beaker with his thousand streams.
हरिर्मित्रस्य सदनेषु सीदति मर्म्र्जानोअविभिःसिन्धुभिर्व्र्षा|	coloured like gold he rests in seats where mitra dwells the steer made beautiful by rivers and by sheep.
अग्रे सिन्धूनां पवमानो अर्षत्यग्रे वाचो अग्रियो गोषु गछति|	in forefront of the rivers pavamana speeds in forefront of the hymn foremost among the kine.
अग्रे वाजस्य भजते महाधनं सवायुधः सोत्र्भिः पूयते वर्षा|	he shares the mighty booty in the van of war the wellarmed steer is purified by worshippers.
अयं मतवाञ्छकुनो यथा हितोअव्ये ससार पवमान ऊर्मिणा|	this heedful pavamana like a bird sent forth hath with his wave flowed onward to the fleecy sieve.
तव करत्वा रोदसी अन्तरा कवे शुचिर्धिया पवते सोम इन्द्र ते|	o indra through thy wisdom b thy thought o sage soma flows bright and pure between the earth and heaven.
दरापिं वसानो यजतो दिविस्प्र्शमन्तरिक्षप्रा भुवनेष्वर्पितः|	he clad in mail that reaches heaven the holy one filling the firmament stationed amid the worlds.
सवर्जज्ञानो नभसाभ्यक्रमीत परत्नमस्य पितरमा विवासति|	knowing the realm of light hath come to us in rain he summons to himself his own primeval sire.
सो अस्य विशे महि शर्म यछति यो अस्य धाम परथमं वयानशे|	he who was first of all to penetrate his form bestowed upon his race wide shelter and defence.
पदं यदस्य परमे वयोमन्यतो विश्वा अभि संयाति संयतः|	from that high station which he hath in loftiest heaven he comes victorious to all encounters here.
परो अयासीदिन्दुरिन्द्रस्य निष्क्र्तं सखा सख्युर्न पर मिनाति संगिरम|	indu hath started for indras special place and slights not as a friend the promise of his friend.
मर्य इव युवतिभिः समर्षति सोमः कलशे शतयाम्ना पथा|	soma speeds onward like a youth to youtlitial maids and gains the beaker by a course of bundred paths.
पर वो धियो मन्द्रयुवो विपन्युवः पनस्युवः संवसनेष्वक्रमुः|	your songs exhilarating tuneful uttering praise are come into the placns where the people meet.
सोमं मनीषा अभ्यनूषत सतुभोअभि धेनवः पयसेमशिश्रयुः|	worshippers have exalted soma with their hymns and milch kine have come near to meet him with their milk.
आ नः सोम संयतं पिप्युशीमिषमिन्दो पवस्व पवमानोस्रिधम|	o soma indu while they cleanse thee pour on us accumulateds plentiful nutritious food.
या नो दोहते तरिरहन्नसश्चुषी कषुमद वाजवन मधुमद सुवीर्यम|	which ceaseless thrice a day shall yield us hero power enriched with store of nourishment and strength and meath.
वर्षा मतीनां पवते विचक्षणः सोमो अह्नः परतरीतोषसो दिवः|	farseeing soma flows the steer the lord of hymns the furtherer of day of morning and of heaven.
कराणा सिन्धूनां कलशानवीवशदिन्द्रस्य हार्द्याविशन मनीषिभिः|	mixt with the streams he caused the beakers to resound and with the singers aid they entered indras heart.
मनीषिभिः पवते पूर्व्यः कविर्न्र्भिर्यतः परि कोशानचिक्रदत|	on with the prudent singers flows the ancient sage and guided by the men hath roared about the vats.
तरितस्य नाम जनयन मधु कषरदिन्द्रस्य वायोः सख्याय कर्तवे|	producing tritas name may he pour forth the meath that vāyu and that indra may become his friends.
अयं पुनान उषसो वि रोचयदयं सिन्धुभ्यो अभवदु लोकक्र्त|	he being purified hath made the mornings shine this even this is he who gave the rivers room.
अयं तरिः सप्त दुदुहान आशिरं सोमो हर्दे पवते चारु मत्सरः|	he made the three times seven pour out the milky flow soma the cheerer yields whateer the heart finds sweet.
पवस्व सोम दिव्येषु धामसु सर्जान इन्दो कलशे पवित्र आ|	flow onward soma in thine own celestial forms flow indu poured within the beaker and the sieve.
सीदन्निन्द्रस्य जठरे कनिक्रदन नर्भिर्यतः सूर्यमारोहयो दिवि|	sinking into the throat of indra with a roar led by the men thou madest sūrya mount to heaven.
अद्रिभिः सुतः पवसे पवित्र आ इन्दविन्द्रस्य जठरेष्वाविशन|	pressed out with stones thou flowest onward to the sieve o indu entering the depths of indras throat.
तवं नर्चक्षा अभवो विचक्षण सोम गोत्रमङगिरोभ्योअव्र्णोरप|	farsighted soma now thou lookest on mankind thou didst unbar the cowstall for the aṅgirases.
तवां सोम पवमानं सवाध्योअनु विप्रासो अमदन्नवस्यवः|	in thee o soma while thou purifitedst thee highthoughted sages seeking favour have rejoiced.
तवां सुपर्ण आभरद दिवस परीन्दो विश्वाभिर्मतिभिः परिष्क्र्तम|	down from the heavens the falcon brought thee hitherward even thee o indu thee whom all our hymns adorn.
अव्ये पुनानं परि वार ऊर्मिणा हरिं नवन्ते अभि सप्त धेनवः|	seven milchkine glorify the tawnycoloured one while with his wave in wool he purifies himself.
अपामुपस्थे अध्यायवः कविं रतस्य योना महिषा अहेषत|	the living men the mighty have impelled the sage into the waters lap the place of sacrifice.
इन्दुः पुनानो अति गाहते मर्धो विश्वानि कर्ण्वन सुपथानि यज्यवे|	indu attaining purity plunges through the foe making ilis ways all easy for the pious man.
गाः कर्ण्वानो निर्णिजं हर्यतः कविरत्यो न करीळन परि वारमर्षति|	making the kine his mantle he the lovely sage runs like a sporting courser onward through the fleece.
असश्चतः शतधारा अभिश्रियो हरिं नवन्तेअव ता उदन्युवः|	the ceaseless watery fountains with their hundred streams sing as they hasten near to him the goldenhued.
कषिपो मर्जन्ति परि गोभिराव्र्तं तर्तीये पर्ष्ठे अधि रोचने दिवः|	him clad in robes of milk swift fingers beautify on the third height and in the luminous realm of heaven.
तवेमाः परजा दिव्यस्य रेतसस्त्वं विश्वस्य भुवनस्य राजसि|	these are thy generations of celestial seed thou art the sovran lord of all the world of life.
अथेदं विश्वं पवमान ते वशे तवमिन्दो परथमोधामधा असि|	this universe o pavamana owns thy sway thou indu art the first establisher of law.
तवं समुद्रो असि विश्ववित कवे तवेमाः पञ्च परदिशो विधर्मणि|	thou art the sea o sage who bringest alf to light under thy law are these five regions of the world.
तवं दयां च पर्थिवीं चाति जभ्रिषे तव जयोतींषि पवमान सूर्यः|	tlou reachest out beyond the earth beyond the heavens thine are the lights o pavamana thine the sun.
तवं पवित्रे रजसो विधर्मणि देवेभ्यः सोम पवमान पूयसे|	thou in the filter soma pavamana art purified to support the region for the gods.
तवामुशिजः परथमा अग्र्भ्णत तुभ्येमा विश्वा भुवनानि येमिरे|	the chief the longing ones have sought to hold thee fast and all these living creatures have been turned to thee.
पर रेभ एत्यति वारमव्ययं वर्षा वनेष्वव चक्रदद्धरिः|	onward the singer travels oer the fleecy sieve the tawny steer hath bellowed in the wooden vats.
सं धीतयो वावशाना अनूषत शिशुं रिहन्ति मतयः पनिप्नतम|	hymns have been sung aloud in resonant harmony and holy songs kiss him the child who claims our praise.
स सूर्यस्य रश्मिभिः परि वयत तन्तुं तन्वानस्त्रिव्र्तंयथा विदे|	he hath assumed the rays of sūrya for his robe spinning as he knows bow the triplytwisted thread.
नयन्न्र्तस्य परशिषो नवीयसीः पतिर्जनीनामुप याति निष्क्र्तम|	he guiding to the newest rules of holy law comes as the womens consort to the special place.
राजा सिन्धूनां पवते पतिर्दिव रतस्य याति पथिभिः कनिक्रदत|	on flows the king of rivers and the lord of heaven he follows with a shout the paths of holy law.
सहस्रधारः परि षिच्यते हरिः पुनानो वाचं जनयन्नुपावसुः|	the goldenhued is poured forth with his hundred streams wealthbringer lifting up his voice while purified.
पवमान मह्यर्णो वि धावसि सूरो न चित्रो अव्ययानि पव्यया|	fain to be cleansed thou pavamana pourest out like wondrous sūrya through the fleece an ample sea.
गभस्तिपूतो नर्भिरद्रिभिः सुतो महे वाजाय धन्याय धन्वसि|	purified with the hands pressed by the men with stones thou speedest on to mighty bootybringing war.
इषमूर्जं पवमानाभ्यर्षसि शयेनो न वंसु कलशेषुसीदसि|	thou pavamana sendest food and power in streams thou sittest in the beakers as a hawk on trees.
इन्द्राय मद्वा मद्यो मदः सुतो दिवो विष्टम्भ उपमो विचक्षणः|	for indra poured as cheering juice to make him glad as nearest and farseeing bearerup of heaven.
सप्त सवसारो अभि मातरः शिशुं नवं जज्ञानं जेन्यं विपश्चितम|	the sisters seven the mothers stand around the babe the noble newborn infant skilled in holy song.
अपां गन्धर्वं दिव्यं नर्चक्षसं सोमंविश्वस्य भुवनस्य राजसे|	gandharva of the floods divine beholding men soma that he may reign as king of all the world.
ईशान इमा भुवनानि वीयसे युजान इन्दो हरितः सुपर्ण्यः|	as sovran lord thereof thou passest through these worlds o indu harnessing thy tawny wellwinged mares.
तास्ते कषरन्तु मधुमद घर्तं पयस्तव वरते सोम तिष्ठन्तु कर्ष्टयः|	may they pour forth for thee milk and oil rich in sweets o soma let the folk abide in thy decree.
तवं नर्चक्षा असि सोम विश्वतः पवमान वर्षभ ता वि धावसि|	o soma thou beholdest men from every side o pavamana steer thou wanderest through these.
स नः पवस्व वसुमद धिरण्यवद वयं सयाम भुवनेषु जीवसे|	pour out upon us wealth in treasure and in gold may we have strength to live among the things that be.
गोवित पवस्व वसुविद धिरण्यविद रेतोधा इन्दो भुवनेष्वर्पितः|	winner of gold and goods and cattle flow thou on set as impregner indu mid the worlds of life.
तवं सुवीरो असि सोम विश्ववित तं तवा विप्रा उप गिरेम आसते|	rich in brave men art thou soma who winnest all these holy singers wait upon thee with the song.
उन मध्व ऊर्मिर्वनना अतिष्ठिपदपो वसानो महिषो वि गाहते|	the wave of flowing meath hath wakened up desires the steer enrobed in milk plunges into the streams.
राजा पवित्ररथो वाजमारुहत सहस्रभ्र्ष्टिर्जयति शरवो बर्हत|	borne on his chariotsieve the king hath risen to war and with a thousand rays hath won him high renown.
स भन्दना उदियर्ति परजावतीर्विश्वायुर्विश्वाः सुभरा अहर्दिवि|	dear to all life he sends triumphant praises forth abundant bringing offspring each succeeding day.
बरह्म परजावद रयिमश्वपस्त्यं पीत इन्दविन्द्रमस्मभ्यं याचतात|	from indra crave for us indu when thou art quaffed the blessing that gives children wealth that harbours steeds.
सो अग्रे अह्नां हरिर्हर्यतो मदः पर चेतसा चेतयते अनुद्युभिः|	when days begin the strong juice lovely goldenhued is recognized by wisdom more and more each day.
दवा जना यातयन्नन्तरीयते नरा च शंसं दैव्यं च धर्तरि|	he stirring both the races goes between the two the bearer of the word of men and word of gods.
अञ्जते वयञ्जते समञ्जते करतुं रिहन्ति मधुनाभ्यञ्जते|	they balm him balm him over balm him thoroughly caress the mighty strength and balm it with the meath.
सिन्धोरुच्छ्वासे पतयन्तमुक्षणं हिरण्यपावाः पशुमासु गर्भ्णते|	they seize the flying steer at the streams breathingplace cleansing with gold they grasp the animal herein.
विपश्चिते पवमानाय गायत मही न धारात्यन्धो अर्षति|	sing forth to pavamana skilled in holy song the juice is flowing onward like a mighty stream.
अहिर्न जूर्णामति सर्पति तवचमत्यो न करीळन्नसरद वर्षा हरिः|	heglideth like a serpent from his ancient skin and like a playful horse the tawny steer hath run.
अग्रेगो राजाप्यस्तविष्यते विमानो अह्नां भुवनेष्वर्पितः|	dweller in floods king foremost he displays his might set among living things as measurer of days.
हरिर्घ्र्तस्नुः सुद्र्शीको अर्णवो जयोतीरथः पवते राय ओक्यः|	distilling oil he flows fair billowy goldenhued borne on a car of light sharing one home with wealth.
असर्जि सकम्भो दिव उद्यतो मदः परि तरिधातुर्भुवनान्यर्षति|	loosed is the heavens support the uplifted cheering juice the triplymingled draught flows round into the worlds.
अंशुं रिहन्ति मतयः पनिप्नतं गिरा यदि निर्णिजं रग्मिणो ययुः|	the holy hymns caress the stalk that claims our praise when singers have approached his beauteous robe with song.
पर ते धारा अत्यण्वानि मेष्यः पुनानस्य संयतो यन्तिरंहयः|	thy strearns that flow forth rapidly collected run over the fine fleece of the sheep as thou art cleansed.
यद गोभिरिन्दो चम्वोः समज्यस आ सुवानः सोम कलशेषु सीदसि|	when indu thou art balmed with milk within the bowl thou sinkest in the jars o soma when expressed.
पवस्व सोम करतुविन न उक्थ्योअव्यो वारे परि धाव मधु परियम|	winner of power flow soma worthy of our laud run onward to the fleece as wellbeloved meath.
जहि विश्वान रक्षस इन्दो अत्रिणो बर्हद वदेम विदथेसुवीराः|	destroy o indu all voracious rākṣasas with brave sons in the assembly let our speech be bold.
एते सोमा अभि परियम इन्द्रस्य कामम अक्षरन|	obeying indras dear desire these soma juices have flowed forth.
वर्धन्तो अस्य वीर्यम|	increasing his heroic might.
पुनानासश चमूषदो गछन्तो वायुम अश्विना|	laid in the bowl pureflowing on to vāyu and the aśvins may.
ते नो धान्तु सुवीर्यम|	these give us great heroic strength.
इन्द्रस्य सोम राधसे पुनानो हार्दि चोदय|	soma as thou art purified incite to bounty indras heart.
रतस्य योनिम आसदम|	to sit in place of sacrifice.
मर्जन्ति तवा दश कषिपो हिन्वन्ति सप्त धीतयः|	the ten swift fingers deck thee forth seven ministers impel thee on.
अनु विप्रा अमादिषुः|	the sages have rejoiced in thee.
देवेभ्यस तवा मदाय कं सर्जानम अति मेष्यः|	when through the filter thou art poured we clothe thee with a robe of milk.
सं गोभिर वासयामसि|	to be a gladdening draught for gods.
पुनानः कलशेष्व आ वस्त्राण्य अरुषो हरिः|	when purified within the jars soma brightred and goldenhued.
परि गव्यान्य अव्यत|	hath clothed him with a robe of milk.
मघोन आ पवस्व नो जहि विश्वा अप दविषः|	flow on to us and make us rich drive all our enemies away.
इन्दो सखायम आ विश|	o indu flow into thy friend.
वर्ष्टिं दिवः परि सरव दयुम्नम पर्थिव्या अधि|	send down the rain from heaven a stream of opulence from earth give us.
सहो नः सोम पर्त्सु धाः|	o soma victory in war.
नर्चक्षसं तवा वयम इन्द्रपीतं सवर्विदम|	may we obtain thee indras drink who viewest men and findest light.
भक्षीमहि परजाम इषम|	gain thee and progeny and food.
पवस्व दक्षसाधनो देवेभ्यः पीतये हरे|	greenhued as one who giveth strength flow on for gods to drink a draught.
मरुद्भ्यो वायवे मदः|	for vāyu and the marut host.
पवमान धिया हितोअभि योनिं कनिक्रदत|	o pavamana sent by song roaring about thy dwellingplace.
धर्मणा वायुमा विश|	pass into vāyu as law bids.
सं देवैः शोभते वर्षा कविर्योनावधि परियः|	the steer shines with the deities dear sage in his appointed home.
वर्त्रहा देववीतमः|	foeslayer most beloved by gods.
विश्वा रूपाण्याविशन पुनानो याति हर्यतः|	taking each beauteous form he goes desirable while purified.
यत्राम्र्तास आसते|	thither where the immortals sit.
अरुषो जनयन गिरः सोमः पवत आयुषक|	to indra soma flows the red engendering song exceeding wise.
इन्द्रं गछन कविक्रतुः|	the visitor of living men.
आ पवस्व मदिन्तम पवित्रं धारया कवे|	flow best exhilarator sage flow to the filter in a stream.
अर्कस्य योनिमासदम|	to seat thee in the place of song.
पर राजा वाचं जनयन्नसिष्यददपो वसानो अभि गा इयक्षति|	raising his voice the king hath flowed upon his way invested with the waters he would win the kine.
गर्भ्णाति रिप्रमविरस्य तान्वा शुद्धो देवानामुप याति निष्क्र्तम|	the fleece retains his solid parts as though impure and bright and cleansed he seeks the special place of gods.
इन्द्राय सोम परि षिच्यसे नर्भिर्न्र्चक्षा ऊर्मिः कविरज्यसे वने|	thou soma art effused for indra by the men balmed in the wood as wave sage viewer of mankind.
पूर्वीर्हि ते सरुतयः सन्ति यातवे सहस्रमश्वा हरयश्चमूषदः|	full many are the paths whereon thou mayest go a thousand bay steeds hast thou resting in the bowls.
समुद्रिया अप्सरसो मनीषिणमासीना अन्तरभि सोममक्षरन|	apsarases who dwell in waters of the sea sitting within have flowed to soma wise of heart.
ता ईं हिन्वन्ति हर्म्यस्य सक्षणिं याचन्ते सुम्नं पवमानमक्षितम|	they urge the master of the house upon his way and to the eternal pavamana pray for bliss.
गोजिन नः सोमो रथजिद धिरण्यजित सवर्जिदब्जित पवते सहस्रजित|	soma flows on for us as winner of the kine winner of thousands cars water and light and gold.
यं देवासश्चक्रिरे पीतये मदं सवादिष्ठं दरप्समरुणं मयोभुवम|	he whom the gods have made a gladdening draught to drink the drop most sweet to taste wealbringing red of hue.
एतानि सोम पवमानो अस्मयुः सत्यानि कर्ण्वन दरविणान्यर्षसि|	soma as pavamana thou our faithful friend making for us these real treasures flowest on.
जहि शत्रुमन्तिके दूरके च य उर्वीं गव्यूतिमभयं च नस कर्धि|	slay thou the enemy both near andfar away grant us security and ample pasturage.
एते धावन्तीन्दवः सोमा इन्द्राय घर्ष्वयः|	to indra flow these running drops these somas frolicsome in mood.
मत्सरासःस्वर्विदः|	exhilarating finding light.
परव्र्ण्वन्तो अभियुजः सुष्वये वरिवोविदः|	driving off foes bestowing room upon the presser willingly.
सवयं सतोत्रे वयस्क्र्तः|	bringing their praiser vitalforce.
वर्था करीळन्त इन्दवः सधस्थमभ्येकमित|	lightly disporting them the drops flow to one common reservoir.
सिन्धोरूर्मा वयक्षरन|	and fall into the rivers wave.
एते विश्वानि वार्या पवमानास आशत|	these pavamanas have obtained all blessings much to be desired.
हिता न सप्तयो रथे|	like coursers harnessed to a car.
आस्मिन पिशङगमिन्दवो दधाता वेनमादिशे|	with view to us o somadrops bestow his manifold desire.
यो अस्मभ्यमरावा|	on him who yet hath given us naught.
रभुर्न रथ्यं नवं दधाता केतमादिशे|	bring us our wish with this design as a wright brings his newwrought wheel.
शुक्राः पवध्वमर्णसा|	flow pure and shining with the stream.
एत उ तये अवीवशन काष्ठां वाजिनो अक्रत|	these drops have cried with resonant voice like swift steeds they have run the course.
सतः परासाविषुर्मतिम|	and roused the good mans hymn to life.
परि पर धन्वेन्द्राय सोम सवादुर मित्राय पूष्णे भगाय|	pleasant to indras mitras pūṣans bhagas taste sped onward soma with thy flowing stream.
इन्द्रस ते सोम सुतस्य पेयाः करत्वे दक्षाय विश्वे च देवाः|	let indra drink o soma of thy juice for wisdom and all deities for strength.
एवाम्र्ताय महे कषयाय स शुक्रो अर्ष दिव्यः पीयूषः|	so flow thou on as bright celestial juice flow to the vast immortal dwellingplace.
पवस्व सोम महान समुद्रः पिता देवानां विश्वाभि धाम|	flow onward soma as a mighty sea as father of the gods to every form.
शुक्रः पवस्व देवेभ्यः सोम दिवे पर्थिव्यै शं च परजायै|	flow on o soma radiant for the gods and heaven and earth and bless our progeny.
दिवो धर्तासि शुक्रः पीयूषः सत्ये विधर्मन वाजी पवस्व|	thou bright juice art sustainer of the sky flow mighty in accordance with true law.
पवस्व सोम दयुम्नी सुधारो महाम अवीनाम अनु पूर्व्यः|	soma flow splendid with thy copious stream through the great fleece as in the olden time.
नर्भिर येमानो जज्ञानः पूतः कषरद विश्वानि मन्द्रः सवर्वित|	bom led by men joyous and purified let the lightfinder make all blessings flow.
इन्दुः पुनानः परजाम उराणः करद विश्वानि दरविणानि नः|	indu while cleansed keeping the people safe shall give us all possessions for our own.
पवस्व सोम करत्वे दक्षायाश्वो न निक्तो वाजी धनाय|	flow on for wisdom soma and for power as a strong courser bathed to win the prize.
तं ते सोतारो रसम मदाय पुनन्ति सोमम महे दयुम्नाय|	the pressers purify this juice of thine the soma for delight and lofty fame.
शिशुं जज्ञानं हरिम मर्जन्ति पवित्रे सोमं देवेभ्य इन्दुम|	they deck the goldhued infant newlyborn even soma indu in the sieve for gods.
इन्दुः पविष्ट चारुर मदायापाम उपस्थे कविर भगाय|	fair indu hath flowed on for rapturous joy sage for good fortune in the waters lap.
बिभर्ति चार्व इन्द्रस्य नाम येन विश्वानि वर्त्रा जघान|	he bears the beauteous name of indra that wherewith he overcame all demon foes.
पिबन्त्य अस्य विश्वे देवासो गोभिः शरीतस्य नर्भिः सुतस्य|	all deities are wont to drink of him pressed by the men and blent with milk and curds.
पर सुवानो अक्षाः सहस्रधारस तिरः पवित्रं वि वारम अव्यम|	he hath flowed forth with thousand streams effused flowed ihsough the filter and the sheeps long wool.
स वाज्य अक्षाः सहस्ररेता अद्भिर मर्जानो गोभिः शरीणानः|	with endless genial flow the strong hath run purified by the waters blent with milk.
पर सोम याहीन्द्रस्य कुक्षा नर्भिर येमानो अद्रिभिः सुतः|	pressed out with stones directed by the men go fortli o soma into indras throat.
असर्जि वाजी तिरः पवित्रम इन्द्राय सोमः सहस्रधारः|	the mighty soma with a thousand streams is poured to indra through the cleansing sieve.
अञ्जन्त्य एनम मध्वो रसेनेन्द्राय वर्ष्ण इन्दुम मदाय|	indu they balm with pleasant milky juice for indra for the steer for his delight.
देवेभ्यस तवा वर्था पाजसे ऽपो वसानं हरिम मर्जन्ति|	lightly for sheen they cleanse thee for the gods goldcoloured wearing water as thy robe.
इन्दुर इन्द्राय तोशते नि तोशते शरीणन्न उग्रो रिणन्न अपः|	indu to indra streams yea downward streams strong flowing to the floods and mingling there.
कनिक्रन्ति हरिरा सर्ज्यमानः सीदन वनस्य जठरे पुनानः|	loud neighs the tawny steed when started settling deep in the wooden vessel while they cleanse him.
नर्भिर्यतः कर्णुते निर्णिजं गा अतो मतीर्जनयतस्वधाभिः|	led by the men he takes the milk for raiment then shall he through his powers engender praisesongs.
हरिः सर्जानः पथ्यां रतस्येयर्ति वाचमरितेव नावम|	as one who rows drives on his boat he goldhued sends forth his voice loosed on the path of order.
देवो देवानां गुह्यानि नामाविष कर्णोति बर्हिषि परवाचे|	as god the secret names of gods he utters to be declared on sacred grass more widely.
अपामिवेदूर्मयस्तर्तुराणाः पर मनीषा ईरते सोममछ|	hastening onward like the waves of waters our holy hymns are pressing nigh to soma.
नमस्यन्तीरुप च यन्ति सं चा च विशन्त्युशतीरुशन्तम|	to him they come with lowly adoration and longing enter him who longs to meet them.
तं मर्म्र्जानं महिषं न सानावंशुं दुहन्त्युक्षणं गिरिष्ठाम|	they drain the stalk the steer who dwells on mountains even as a bull who decks him on the upland.
तं वावशानं मतयः सचन्ते तरितो बिभर्ति वरुणं समुद्रे|	hymns follow and attend him as he bellows trita bears varuṇa aloft in ocean.
इष्यन वाचमुपवक्तेव होतुः पुनान इन्दो वि षया मनीषाम|	sending thy voice out as director loosen the invokers thought o indu as they cleanse thee.
इन्द्रश्च यत कषयथः सौभगाय सुवीर्यस्य पतयःस्याम|	while thou and indra rule for our advantage may we be masters of heroic vigour.
पर देवमछा मधुमन्त इन्दवोअसिष्यदन्त गाव आ न धेनवः|	the drops of soma juice like cows who yield their milk have flowed forth rich in meath unto the shining one.
बर्हिषदो वचनावन्त ऊधभिः परिस्रुतमुस्रियानिर्णिजं धिरे|	and seated on the grass raising their voice assumed the milk the covering robe wherewith the udders stream.
स रोरुवदभि पूर्वा अचिक्रददुपारुहः शरथयन सवादतेहरिः|	he bellows with a roar arourd the highest twigs the tawny one is sweetened as he breaks them up.
तिरः पवित्रमप्रियन्नुरु जरयो नि शर्याणि दधते देव आ वरम|	then passing through the sieve into the ample room the god throws off the dregs according to his wish.
वि यो ममे यम्या संयती मदः साकंव्र्धा पयसा पिन्वदक्षिता|	the gladdening drink that measured out the meeting twins fills full with milk the eternal everwaxing pair.
मही अपारे रजसी विवेविददभिव्रजन्नक्षितं पाज आ ददे|	bringing to light the two great regions limitless moving above them he gained sheen that never fades.
स मातरा विचरन वाजयन्नपः पर मेधिरः सवधया पिन्वते पदम|	wandering through the parents strengthening the floods the sage makes his place swell with his own native might.
अंशुर्यवेन पिपिशे यतो नर्भिः सं जामिभिर्नसते रक्षते शिरः|	the stalk is mixed with grain he comes led by the men together with the sisters and preserves the head.
सं दक्षेण मनसा जायते कविरतस्य गर्भो निहितो यमा परः|	with energetic intellect the sage is born deposited as germ of law far from the twins.
यूना ह सन्ता परथमं वि जज्ञतुर्गुहा हितं जनिम नेममुद्यतम|	they being young at first showed visibly distinct the creature that is halfconcealed and halfexposed.
मन्द्रस्य रूपं विविदुर्मनीषिणः शयेनो यदन्धो अभरत परावतः|	the sages knew the form of him the gladdener what time the falcon brought the plant from far away.
तं मर्जयन्त सुव्र्धं नदीष्वा उशन्तमंशुं परियन्तं रग्मियम|	him who assures success they beautified in streams the stalk who yearned therefor mighty and meet for praise.
तवां मर्जन्ति दश योषणः सुतं सोम रषिभिर्मतिभिर्धीतिभिर्हितम|	together with the Ṛṣis with their prayers and hymns ten women deck thee soma friendly when effused.
अव्यो वारेभिरुत देवहूतिभिर्न्र्भिर्यतोवाजमा दर्षि सातये|	led by the men with invocations of the gods through the fleece thou hast given us strength to win the spoil.
परिप्रयन्तं वय्यं सुषंसदं सोमं मनीषा अभ्यनूषत सतुभः|	songs resonant with praise have celebrated him soma friend springing forth with his fair company.
यो धारया मधुमानूर्मिणा दिव इयर्ति वाचं रयिषाळ अमर्त्यः|	even him who rich in meath with undulating stream winnner of wealth immortal sends his voice from heaven.
अयं दिव इयर्ति विश्वमा रजः सोमः पुनानः कलशेषु सीदति|	he sends it into all the region forth from heaven soma while he is filtcred settles in the jars.
अद्भिर्गोभिर्म्र्ज्यते अद्रिभिः सुतः पुनान इन्दुर्वरिवो विदत परियम|	with milk and waters is he decked when pressed with stones indu when purified shall find sweet rest and room.
एवा नः सोम परिषिच्यमानो वयो दधच्चित्रतमं पवस्व|	even thus poured forth how on thy way o soma vouchsafing us most manifold lively vigour.
अद्वेषे दयावाप्र्थिवी हुवेम देवा धत्त रयिमस्मे सुवीरम|	we will invoke benevolent earth and heaven give us ye gods riches with noble heroes.
एष कविरभिष्टुतः पवित्रे अधि तोशते|	this sage exalted by our lauds flows to the purifying cloth.
पुनानो घनन्नप सरिधः|	scattering foes as he is cleansed.
एष इन्द्राय वायवे सवर्जित परि षिच्यते|	as giving power and winning light for indra and for vāyu he.
पवित्रे दक्षसाधनः|	is poured upon the filteringcloth.
एष नर्भिर्वि नीयते दिवो मूर्धा वर्षा सुतः|	the men conduct him soma steer omniscient and the head of heaven.
सोमो वनेषु विश्ववित|	effused into the vats of wood.
एष गव्युरचिक्रदत पवमानो हिरण्ययुः|	longing for kine longing for gold hath indu pavamana lowed.
इन्दुः सत्राजिदस्त्र्तः|	still conqueror never overcome.
एष सूर्येण हासते पवमानो अधि दयवि|	this pavamana gladdening draught drops on the filtering cloth and then.
पवित्रे मत्सरो मदः|	mounts up with sūrya to the sky.
एष शुष्म्यसिष्यददन्तरिक्षे वर्षा हरिः|	to indra in the firmament this mighty tawny steer hath flowed.
पुनान इन्दुरिन्द्रमा|	this indu being purified.
सना च सोम जेषि च पवमान महि शरवः|	o soma flowing on thy way win thou and conquer high renown.
अथा नो वस्यसस कर्धि|	and make us better than we are.
सना जयोतिः सना सवर्विश्वा च सोम सौभगा|	win thou the light win heavenly light and soma all felicities.
अथा|	and make us better than we are.
सना दक्षमुत करतुमप सोम मर्धो जहि|	win skilful strength and mental power o soma drive away our foes.
अथा|	and make us better than we are.
पवीतारः पुनीतन सोममिन्द्राय पातवे|	ye purifiers purify soma for indra for his drink.
अथा|	make thou us better than we are.
तवं सूर्ये न आ भज तव करत्वा तवोतिभिः|	give us our portion in the sun through thine own mental power and aids.
अथा|	and make us better than we are.
तव करत्वा तवोतिभिर्ज्योक पश्येम सूर्यम|	through thine own mental power and aid long may we look upon the sun.
अथा|	make thou us better than we are.
अभ्यर्ष सवायुध सोम दविबर्हसं रयिम|	wellweaponed soma pour to usa stream of riches doubly great.
अथा|	and make us better than we are.
अभ्यर्षानपच्युतो रयिं समत्सु सासहिः|	as one victorious unsubdued in battle pour forth wealth to us.
अथा|	and make us better than we are.
