तवां यज्ञैरवीव्र्धन पवमान विधर्मणि|	by worship pavamana men have strengthened thee to prop the law.
अथा|	make thou us better than we are.
रयिं नश्चित्रमश्विनमिन्दो विश्वायमा भर|	o indu bring us wealth in steeds manifold quickening all life.
अथा|	and mate us better than we are.
असर्जि वक्वा रथ्ये यथाजौ धिया मनोता परथमो मनीषी|	as for a chariotrace the skilful speaker chief sage inventor hath with song been started.
दश सवसारो अधि सानो अव्येअजन्ति वह्निं सदनान्यछ|	the sisters ten upon the fleecy summit drive on the carhorse to the resting places.
वीती जनस्य दिव्यस्य कव्यैरधि सुवानो नहुष्येभिरिन्दुः|	the drop of soma pressed by wise nahusyas becomes the banquet of the heavenly people.
पर यो नर्भिरम्र्तो मर्त्येभिर्मर्म्र्जानोअविभिर्गोभिरद्भिः|	indu by hands of mortal men made beauteous immortal with the sheep and cows and waters.
वर्षा वर्ष्ने रोरुवदंशुरस्मै पवमानो रुशदीर्ते पयोगोः|	steer roaring unto steer this pavamana this juice runs to the white milk of the milchcow.
सहस्रं रक्वा पथिभिर्वचोविदध्वस्मभिः सूरो अण्वं वि याति|	through thousand fine hairs goes the tuneful singer like sūra by his fair and open pathways.
रुजा दर्ळ्हा चिद रक्षसः सदांसि पुनान इन्द ऊर्णुहि विवाजान|	break down the strong seats even of the demons cleansing thee indu robd thyself in vigour.
वर्श्चोपरिष्टात तुजता वधेन ये अन्ति दूरादुपनायमेषाम|	rend with thy swift bolt coming from above them those who are near and those who yet are distant.
स परत्नवन नव्यसे विश्ववार सूक्ताय पथः कर्णुहि पराचः|	prepare the forward paths in ancient manner for the new bymn thou giver of all bounties.
ये दुःषहासो वनुषा बर्हन्तस्तांस्ते अश्याम पुरुक्र्त पुरुक्षो|	those which are high and hard for foes to conquer may we gain from thee active foodbestower.
एवा पुनानो अपः सवर्गा अस्मभ्यं तोका तनयानि भूरि|	so purifying thee vouchsafe us waters heavens light and cows offipring and many children.
शं नः कषेत्रमुरु जयोतींषि सोम जयों नः सूर्यन्द्र्शये रिरीहि|	give us health ample land and lights o soma and grant us long to look upon the sunshine.
एष पर कोशे मधुमानचिक्रददिन्द्रस्य वज्रो वपुषो वपुष्टरः|	more beauteous than the beautiful as indras bolt this soma rich in sweets hath clamoured in the vat.
अभीं रतस्य सुदुघा घर्तश्चुतो वाश्रा अर्षन्तिपयसेव धेनवः|	dropping with oil abundant streams of sacrifice flow unto him like milchkine lowing with their milk.
स पूर्व्यः पवते यं दिवस परि शयेनो मथायदिषितस्तिरो रजः|	on flows that ancient one whom hitherward from heaven sped through the region of the air the falcon snatched.
स मध्व आ युवते वेविजान इत कर्शानोरस्तुर्मनसाह बिभ्युषा|	he quivering with alarm and terrified in heart before bowarmed kṛśānu holdeth fast the sweet.
ते नः पूर्वास उपरास इन्दवो महे वाजाय धन्वन्तु गोमते|	may those first freshest drops of soma juice effused flow on their way to bring us mighty strength in kine.
ईक्षेण्यासो अह्यो न चारवो बरह्मबरह्म ये जुजुषुर्हविर हविः|	beauteous as serpents worthy to be looked upon they whom each sacred gift and all our prayers have pleased.
अयं नो विद्वान वनवद वनुष्यत इन्दुः सत्राचा मनसा पुरुष्टुतः|	may that muchlauded indu with a heart inclined to us wellknowing fight against our enemies.
इनस्य यः सदने गर्भमादधे गवामुरुब्जमभ्यर्षति वरजम|	he who hath brought the germ beside the strong ones seat moves onward to the widelyopcned stall of kine.
चक्रिर्दिवः पवते कर्त्व्यो रसो महानदब्धो वरुणो हुरुग्यते|	the active potent juice of heaven is flowing on great varuṇa whom the forward man can neer deceive.
असावि मित्रो वर्जनेषु यज्ञियोअत्यो न यूथे वर्षयुः कनिक्रदत|	mitra the holy hath been pressed for troubled times neighing like an impatient horse amid the herd.
सोमः पुनानो अर्षति सहस्रधारो अत्यविः|	passed through the fleece in thousand streams the soma purified flows on.
वायोरिन्द्रस्यनिष्क्र्तम|	to indras viyus special place.
पवमानमवस्यवो विप्रमभि पर गायत|	sing forth ye men who long for help to pavamana to the sage.
सुष्वाणं देववीतये|	effused to entertain the gods.
पवन्ते वाजसातये सोमाः सहस्रपाजसः|	the somadrops with thousand powers are purified for victory.
गर्णाना देववीतये|	hymned to become the feast of gods.
उत नो वाजसातये पवस्व बर्हतीरिषः|	yea as thou flowest bring great store of food that we may win the spoil.
दयुमदिन्दो सुवीर्यम|	indu bring splendid manly might.
ते नः सहस्रिणं रयिं पवन्तामा सुवीर्यम|	may they in flowing give us wealth in thousands and heroic power.
सुवाना देवास इन्दवः|	these godlike somadrops effused.
अत्या हियाना न हेत्र्भिरस्र्ग्रं वाजसातये|	like coursers by their drivers urged they were poured forth for victory.
वि वारमव्यमाशवः|	swift through the woollen strainingcloth.
वाश्रा अर्षन्तीन्दवोअभि वत्सं न धेनवः|	noisily flow the somadrops like milchkine lowing to their calves.
दधन्विरेगभस्त्योः|	they have run forth from both the hands.
जुष्ट इन्द्राय मत्सरः पवमान कनिक्रदत|	as gladdener whom indra loves o pavamana with a roar.
विश्वा अप दविषो जहि|	drive all our enemies away.
अपघ्नन्तो अराव्णः पवमानाः सवर्द्र्शः|	o pavamamas driving off the godless looking on the light.
योनाव रतस्य सीदत|	sit in the place of sacrifice.
यत सोम चित्रमुक्थ्यं दिव्यं पार्थिवं वसु|	o soma being purified bring us the wondrous treasure meet.
तन नः पुनान आ भर|	for lauds that is in earth and heaven.
युवं हि सथः सवर्पती इन्द्रश्च सोम गोपती|	for ye twain indra soma are lords of the light lords of the kine.
ईशानापिप्यतं धियः|	great rulers prosper ye our songs.
वर्षा पुनान आयुषु सतनयन्नधि बर्हिषि|	the tawny steer while cleansed among the living bellowing on the grass.
हरिः सन योनिमासदत|	hath sunk and settled in his home.
अवावशन्त धीतयो वर्षभस्याधि रेतसि|	over the steers productive flow the sacred songs were resonant.
सूनोर्वत्सस्यमातरः|	the mothers of the darling son.
कुविद वर्षण्यन्तीभ्यः पुनानो गर्भमादधत|	hath he not purified impregned the kine whb long to meet their lord.
याः शुक्रं दुहते पयः|	the kine who yield the shining milk.
उप शिक्षापतस्थुषो भियसमा धेहि शत्रुषु|	bring near us those who stand aloof strike fear into our enemies.
पवमानविदा रयिम|	o pavamana find us wealth.
नि शत्रोः सोम वर्ष्ण्यं नि शुष्मं नि वयस्तिर|	soma bring down the foemans might his vigorous strength and vital power.
दूरेवा सतो अन्ति वा|	whether he be afar or near.
समिद्धो विश्वतस पतिः पवमानो वि राजति|	enkindled pavamana lord sends forth his light on every side.
परीणन वर्षा कनिक्रदत|	in friendly show the bellowing bull.
तनूनपात पवमानः शर्ङगे शिशानो अर्षति|	he pavamana selfproduced speeds onward sharpening his horns.
अन्तरिक्षेण रारजत|	he glitters through the firmament.
ईळेन्यः पवमानो रयिर्वि राजति दयुमान|	brilliant like wealth adorable with splendour pavamana shines.
मधोर्धाराभिरोजसा|	mightily with the streams of meath.
बर्हिः पराचीनमोजसा पवमान सत्र्णन हरिः|	the tawny pavamana who strews from of old the grass with might.
देवेषु देव ईयते|	is worshipped god amid the gods.
उदातैर्जिहते बर्हद दवारो देवीर्हिरण्ययीः|	the golden the celestial doors are lifted with their frames on high.
पवमानेन सुष्टुताः|	by pavamana glorified.
सुशिल्पे बर्हती मही पवमानो वर्षण्यति|	with passion pavamana longs for the great lofty pair wellformed.
नक्तोषासा नदर्शते|	like beauteous maidens night and dawn.
उभा देवा नर्चक्षसा होतारा दैव्या हुवे|	both gods who look on men i call celestial heralds indras self.
पवमान इन्द्रोव्र्षा|	is pavamana yea the bull.
भारती पवमानस्य सरस्वतीळा मही|	this pavamanas sacrifice shall the three beauteous goddesses.
इमं नो यज्ञमा गमन तिस्रो देवीः सुपेशसः|	sarasvatī and bhāratī and iḷā mighty one attend.
तवष्टारमग्रजां गोपां पुरोयावानमा हुवे|	summon tvaṣṭar hither our protector champion earliestborn.
इन्दुरिन्द्रो वर्षा हरिः पवमानः परजापतिः|	indu is indra tawny steer pavamana is prajāpati.
वनस्पतिं पवमान मध्वा समङगधि धारया|	o pavamana with the meath in streams anoint vanaspati.
सहस्रवल्शं हरितं भराजमानं हिरण्ययम|	the evergreen the goldenhued refulgent with a thousand boughs.
विश्वे देवाः सवाहाक्र्तिं पवमानस्या गत|	come to the consecrating rite of pavamana all ye gods.
वायुर्ब्र्हस्पतिः सूर्योअग्निरिन्द्रः सजोषसः|	vāyu sūrya bṛhaspati indra and agni in accord.
पर ये गावो न भूर्णयस्त्वेषा अयासो अक्रमुः|	active and bright have they come forth impetuous in speed like bulls.
घनन्तः कर्ष्णामप तवचम|	driving the black skin far away.
सुवितस्य मनामहेअति सेतुं दुराव्यम|	quelling the riteless dasyu may we think upon the bridge of bliss.
साह्वांसो दस्युमव्रतम|	leaving the bridge of woe behind.
शर्ण्वे वर्ष्टेरिव सवनः पवमानस्य शुष्मिणः|	the mighty pavamanas roar is heard as twere the rush of rain.
चरन्तिविद्युतो दिवि|	lightnings are flashing to the sky.
आ पवस्व महीमिषं गोमदिन्दो हिरण्यवत|	pour out on us abundant food when thou art pressed o indu wealth.
अश्वावद वाजवत सुतः|	in kine and gold and steeds and spoil.
स पवस्व विचर्षण आ मही रोदसी पर्ण|	flow on thy way most active thou fill full the mighty heavens and earth.
उषाः सूर्यो न रश्मिभिः|	as dawn as sūrya with his beams.
परि णः शर्मयन्त्या धारया सोम विश्वतः|	on every side o soma flow round us with thy protecting stream.
सरा रसेव विष्टपम|	as rasā flows around the world.
परि सुवानो गिरिष्ठाः पवित्रे सोमो अक्षाः|	thou soma dweller on the hills effused hast flowed into the sieve.
मदेषु सर्वधा असि|	allbounteous art thou in carouse.
तवं विप्रस्त्वं कविर्मधु पर जातमन्धसः|	thou art a sacred bard a sage the meath is offipring of thy sap.
मदेषु|	allbountcous art thou in carouse.
तव विश्वे सजोषसो देवासः पीतिमाशत|	all deities of one accord have come that they may drink of thee.
मदेषु|	allbounteous art thou in carouse.
आ यो विश्वानि वार्या वसूनि हस्तयोर्दधे|	he who containeth in his hands all treasures much to be desired.
मदेषु|	allbounteous art thou in carouse.
य इमे रोदसी मही सं मातरेव दोहते|	who milketh out this mighty pair the earth and heaven like mother kine.
मदेषु|	allbounteous art thou in carouse.
परि यो रोदसी उभे सद्यो वाजेभिरर्षति|	who in a moment mightily floweth around these two worldhalvcs.
मदेषु|	allbounteous art thou in carouse.
स शुष्मी कलशेष्वा पुनानो अचिक्रदत|	the strong one being purified hath in the pitchers cried aloud.
मदेषु|	allbounteous art thou in carouse.
तमम्र्क्षन्त वाजिनमुपस्थे अदितेरधि|	the sages with the fingers art have dressed and decked that vigorous steed.
विप्रासो अण्व्याधिया|	upon the lap of aditi.
तं गावो अभ्यनूषत सहस्रधारमक्षितम|	the kine have called aloud to him exhaustless with a thousand streams.
इन्दुं धर्तारमा दिवः|	to indu who supporteth heaven.
तं वेधां मेधयाह्यन पवमानमधि दयवि|	him nourisher of many sage creative pavamana they.
धर्णसिं भूरिधायसम|	have sent by wisdom to the sky.
तमह्यन भुरिजोर्धिया संवसानं विवस्वतः|	him dweller with vivasvān they with use of both arms have sent forth.
पतिं वाचो अदाभ्यम|	the lord of speech infallible.
तं सानावधि जामयो हरिं हिन्वन्त्यद्रिभिः|	him green beloved many eyed the sisters with prosing stones.
हर्यतम्भूरिचक्षसम|	send down to ridges of the sieve.
तं तवा हिन्वन्ति वेधसः पवमान गिराव्र्धम|	o pavamana indu priests hurry thee on to indra thee.
इन्दविन्द्राय मत्सरम|	who aidest song and cheerest him.
परि परासिष्यदत कविः सिन्धोरूर्मावधि शरितः|	reposing on the rivers wave the sage hath widely flowed around.
कारं बिभ्रत पुरुस्प्र्हम|	bearing the hymn which many love.
गिरा यदी सबन्धवः पञ्च वराता अपस्यवः|	when the five kindred companies active in duty with the song.
परिष्क्र्ण्वन्ति धर्णसिम|	establish him the powerful.
आदस्य शुष्मिणो रसे विश्वे देवा अमत्सत|	then in his juice whose strength is great have all the gods rejoiced themselves.
यदी गोभिर्वसायते|	when he hath clothed him in the milk.
निरिणानो वि धावति जहच्छर्याणि तान्वा|	freeing himself he flows away leaving his bodys severed limbs.
अत्रा सं जिघ्नते युजा|	and meets his own companion here.
नप्तीभिर्यो विवस्वतः शुभ्रो न माम्र्जे युवा|	he by the daughters of the priest like a fair youth hath been adorned.
गाः कर्ण्वानो न निर्णिजम|	making the milk as twere his robe.
अति शरिती तिरश्चता गव्या जिगात्यण्व्या|	oer the fine fingers through desire of milk in winding course he goes.
वग्नुमियर्ति यं विदे|	and utters voice which he hath found.
अभि कषिपः समग्मत मर्जयन्तीरिषस पतिम|	the nimble fingers have approached adorning him the lord of strength.
पर्ष्ठा गर्भ्णत वाजिनः|	they grasp the vigorous coursers back.
परि दिव्यानि मर्म्र्शद विश्वानि सोम पार्थिवा|	comprising all the treasures that are in the heavens and on the earth.
वसूनि याह्यस्मयुः|	come soma as our faithful friend.
सरक्वे दरप्सस्य धमतः समस्वरन्न्र्तस्य योना समरन्तनाभयः|	they from the spouting drop have sounded at the rim naves speed together to the place of sacrifice.
तरीन स मूर्ध्नो असुरश्चक्र आरभे सत्यस्यनावः सुक्र्तमपीपरन|	that asura hath formed to seize three lofty heights the ships of truth have borne the pious man across.
सम्यक सम्यञ्चो महिषा अहेषत सिन्धोरूर्मावधि वेना अवीविपन|	the strong steers gathering have duly stirred themselvesand over the streams wave the friends sent forth the song.
मधोर्धाराभिर्जनयन्तो अर्कमित परियामिन्द्रस्य तन्वमवीव्र्धन|	engendering the hymn with flowing streams of meath indras dear body have they caused to wax in strength.
पवित्रवन्तः परि वाचमासते पितैषां परत्नो अभि रक्षति वरतम|	with sanctifying gear they sit around the song their ancient father guards their holy work from harm.
महः समुद्रं वरुणस्तिरो दधे धीरा इच्छेकुर्धरुणेष्वारभम|	varuṇa hath oerspread the mighty sea of air sages had power to hold him in sustaining floods.
सहस्रधारेअव ते समस्वरन दिवो नाके मधुजिह्वा असश्चतः|	sweettongued exhaustless they have sent their voices down togetlier in heavens vault that pours a thousand streams.
अस्य सपशो न नि मिषन्ति भूर्णयः पदेपदे पाशिनः सन्ति सेतवः|	his wildlyrestless warders never close an eye in every place are found the bonds that bind man last.
पितुर्मातुरध्या ये समस्वरन्न्र्चा शोचन्तः सन्दहन्तो अव्रतान|	oer sire and mother they have roared in unison bright with the verse of praise burning up riteless men.
इन्द्रद्विष्टामप धमन्ति मायया तवचमसिक्नीं भूमनो दिवस परि|	blowing away with supernatural might from earth and from the heavens the swarthy skin which indra hates.
परत्नान मानादध्या ये समस्वरञ्छ्लोकयन्त्रासो रभसस्य मन्तवः|	those which as guides of song and counsellors of speed were manifested from their ancient dwelling place.
अपानक्षासो बधिरा अहासत रतस्य पन्थां न तरन्ति दुष्क्र्तः|	from these the eyeless and the deaf have turned aside the wicked travel not the pathway of the law.
सहस्रधारे वितते पवित्र आ वाचं पुनन्ति कवयो मनीषिणः|	what time the filter with a thousand streams is stretched the thoughtful sages purify their song therein.
रुद्रास एषामिषिरासो अद्रुह सपशः सवञ्चः सुद्र्शो नर्चक्षसः|	brightcoloured are their spies vigorous void of guile excellent fair to see beholders of mankind.
रतस्य गोपा न दभाय सुक्रतुस्त्री ष पवित्रा हर्द्यन्तरा दधे|	guardian of law most wise he may not be deceived three purifiers hath he set within his heart.
विद्वान स विश्वा भुवनाभि पश्यत्यवाजुष्टान विध्यति कर्ते अव्रतान|	with wisdom he beholds all creatures that exist he drives into the pit the hated riteliess ones.
रतस्य तन्तुर्विततः पवित्र आ जिह्वाया अग्रे वरुणस्य मायया|	the thread of sacrifice spun in the cleansing sieve on varuṇas tonguetip by supernatural might.
धीराश्चित तत समिनक्षन्त आशतात्रा कर्तमव पदात्यप्रभुह|	this by their striving have the prudent ones attained he who hath not this power shall sink into the pit.
अस्र्ग्रम इन्दवः पथा धर्मन्न रतस्य सुश्रियः|	forth on their way the glorious drops have flowed for maintenance of law.
विदाना अस्य योजनम|	knowing this sacrifices course.
पर धारा मध्वो अग्रियो महीर अपो वि गाहते|	down in the mighty waters sinks the stream of meath most excellent.
हविर हविष्षु वन्द्यः|	oblation best of all in worth.
पर युजो वाचो अग्रियो वर्षाव चक्रदद वने|	about the holy place the steer true guileless noblest hath sent forth.
सद्माभि सत्यो अध्वरः|	continuous voices in the wood.
परि यत काव्या कविर नर्म्णा वसानो अर्षति|	when clothed in manly strength the sage flows in celestial wisdom round.
सवर वाजी सिषासति|	the strong would win the light of heaven.
पवमानो अभि सप्र्धो विशो राजेव सीदति|	when purified he sits as king above the hosts among his folk.
यद ईम रण्वन्ति वेधसः|	what time the sages bring him nigh.
अव्यो वारे परि परियो हरिर वनेषु सीदति|	dear goldencoloured in the fleece he sinks and settles in the wood.
रेभो वनुष्यते मती|	the singer shows his zeal in hymns.
स वायुम इन्द्रम अश्विना साकम मदेन गछति|	he goes to indra vāyu to the aśvins as his custom is.
रणा यो अस्य धर्मभिः|	with gladdening juice which gives them joy.
आ मित्रावरुणा भगम मध्वः पवन्त ऊर्मयः|	tle streams of pleasant soma flow to bhaga mitravaruṇa.
विदाना अस्य शक्मभिः|	wellknowing through his mighty powers.
अस्मभ्यं रोदसी रयिम मध्वो वाजस्य सातये|	heaven and earth riches of meath to win us wealth.
शरवो वसूनि सं जितम|	gain for us treasures and renown.
परि दयुक्षः सनद्रयिर्भरद वाजं नो अन्धसा|	wealthwinner dwelling in the sky bringing us vigour with the juice.
सुवानोर्ष पवित्र आ|	flow to the filter when effused.
तव परत्नेभिरध्वभिरव्यो वारे परि परियः|	so in thine ancient ways may he beloved with a thousand streams.
सहस्रधारो यात तना|	run oer the fleecy strainingcloth.
चरुर्न यस्तमीङखयेन्दो न दानमीङखय|	him who is like a caldron shake o indu shake thy gift to us.
वधैर्वधस्नवीङखय|	shake it armed warrior with thine arms.
नि शुष्ममिन्दवेषां पुरुहूत जनानाम|	indu invoked with many a prayer bring down the vigour of these men.
यो अस्मानादिदेशति|	of him who threatens us with war.
शतं न इन्द ऊतिभिः सहस्रं वा शुचीनाम|	indu wealthgiver with thine help pour out for us a hundred yea.
पवस्व मंहयद्रयिः|	a thousand of thy pure bright streams.
यवंयवं नो अन्धसा पुष्टमपुष्टं परि सरव|	pour on us with thy juice all kinds of corn each sort of nourishment.
सोम विश्वा च सौभगा|	and soma all felicities.
ईन्दो यथा तव सतवो यथा ते जातमन्धसः|	as thine o indu is the praise and thine what springeth from the juice.
नि बर्हिषि परिये सदः|	seat thee on the dear sacred grass.
उत नो गोविदश्ववित पवस्व सोमान्धसा|	and finding for us kine and steeds o soma with thy juice flow on.
मक्षूतमेभिरहभिः|	through days that fly most rapidly.
यो जिनाति न जीयते हन्ति शत्रुमभीत्य|	as one who conquers neer subdued attacks and stays the enemy.
स पवस्व सहस्रजित|	thus vanquisher of thousands flow.
अध्वर्यो अद्रिभिः सुतं सोमं पवित्र आ सर्ज|	adhvaryu on the filter pour the soma juice expressed with stones.
पुनीहीन्द्राय पातवे|	and make it pure for indras drink.
दिवः पीयूषमुत्तमं सोममिन्द्राय वज्रिणे|	pour out for indra thunderarmed the milk of heaven the somas juice.
सुनोता मधुमत्तमम|	most excellent most rich in sweets.
तव तय इन्दो अन्धसो देवा मधोर्व्यश्नते|	these gods and all the marut host indu enjoy this juice of thine.
पवमानस्य मरुतः|	this pavamanas flowing meath.
तवं हि सोम वर्धयन सुतो मदाय भूर्णये|	for soma thou hast been effused strengthening for the wild carouse.
वर्षन सतोतारमूतये|	o steer the singer for our help.
अभ्यर्ष विचक्षण पवित्रं धारया सुतः|	flow with thy stream farsighted one effused into the cleansing sieve.
अभि वाजमुत शरवः|	flow on to give us strength and fame.
इषुर्न धन्वन परति धीयते मतिर्वत्सो न मातुरुप सर्ज्यूधनि|	laid like an arrow on the bow the hymn hath been loosed like a young calf to the udder of its dam.
उरुधारेव दुहे अग्र आयत्यस्य वरतेष्वपि सोम इष्यते|	as one who cometh first with full stream she is milked the soma is impelled to this mans holy rites.
उपो मतिः पर्च्यते सिच्यते मधु मन्द्राजनी चोदते अन्तरासनि|	the thought is deeply fixed the savoury juice is shed the tongue with joyous sound is stirring in the mouth.
पवमानः सन्तनिः परघ्नतामिव मधुमान दरप्सः परि वारमर्षति|	and pavamana like the shout of combatants the drop rising in sweet juice is flowing through the fleece.
अव्ये वधूयुः पवते परि तवचि शरथ्नीते नप्तीरदितेरतं यते|	he flows about the sheepskin longing for a bride he looses aditis daughters for the worshipper.
हरिरक्रान यजतः संयतो मदो नर्म्णा शिशानो महिषो न शोभते|	the sacred drink hath come goldtinted wellrestrained like a strong bull he shines whetting his manly might.
उक्षा मिमाति परति यन्ति धेनवो देवस्य देवीरुप यन्ति निष्क्र्तम|	the bull is bellowing the cows are coming nigh the goddesses approach the gods own restingplace.
अत्यक्रमीदर्जुनं वारमव्ययमत्कं न निक्तम्परि सोमो अव्यत|	onward hath soma passed through the sheeps fair bright fleece and hath as twere endued a garment newly washed.
अम्र्क्तेन रुशता वाससा हरिरमर्त्यो निर्णिजानः परि वयत|	the goldenhued immortal newly bathed puts on a brightly shining vesture that is never harmed.
दिवस पर्ष्ठं बर्हणा निर्णिजे कर्तोपस्तरणं चम्वोर्नभस्मयम|	he made the ridge of heaven to be his radiant robe by sprinkling of the bowls from moisture of the sky.
सूर्यस्येव रश्मयो दरावयित्नवो मत्सरासः परसुपः साकमीरते|	even as the beams of sūrya urging men to speed that cheer and send to sleep together rush they forth.
तन्तुं ततं परि सर्गास आशवो नेन्द्राद रते पवते धाम किं चन|	these swift outpourings in long course of holy rites no form save only indra shows itself so pure.
सिन्धोरिव परवणे निम्न आशवो वर्षच्युता मदासो गातुमाशत|	as down the steep slope of a river to the vale drawn from the steer the swift strong draughts have found a way.
शं नो निवेशे दविपदे चतुष्पदेअस्मे वाजः सोम तिष्ठन्तु कर्ष्टयः|	well be it with the men and cattle in our home may powers o soma may the people stay with us.
आ नः पवस्व वसुमद धिरण्यवदश्वावद गोमद यवमत सुवीर्यम|	pour out upon us wealth in goods in gold in steeds in cattle and in corn and great heroic strength.
यूयं हि सोम पितरो मम सथन दिवो मूर्धानःप्रस्थिता वयस्क्र्तः|	ye soma are my fathers lifted up on high as heads of heaven and makers of the strength of life.
एते सोमाः पवमानास इन्द्रं रथा इव पर ययुः सातिमछ|	these pavamanas here these drops of soma to indra have sped forth like cars to booty.
सुताः पवित्रमति यन्त्यव्यं हित्वी वव्रिं हरितोव्र्ष्तिमछ|	effused they pass the cleansing fleece while goldhued they cast their covering off to pour the rain down.
इन्दविन्द्राय बर्हते पवस्व सुम्र्ळीको अनवद्यो रिशादाः|	o indu flow thou on for lofty indra flow blameless very gracious foedestroyer.
भरा चन्द्राणि गर्णते वसूनि देवैर्द्यावाप्र्थिवी परावतं नः|	bring splendid treasures to the man who lauds thee o heaven and earth with all the gods protect us.
पर सोमासः सवाध्यः पवमानासो अक्रमुः|	the somadrops benevolent come forth as they are purified.
रयिं कर्ण्वन्तिचेतनम|	bestowing wealth which all may see.
दिवस पर्थिव्या अधि भवेन्दो दयुम्नवर्धनः|	o indu high oer heaven and earth be thou increaser of our might.
भवा वाजानां पतिः|	the master of all strength be thou.
तुभ्यं वाता अभिप्रियस्तुभ्यमर्षन्ति सिन्धवः|	the winds are gracious in their love to thee the rivers flow to thee.
सोम वर्धन्ति ते महः|	soma they multiply thy power.
आ पयायस्व समेतु ते विश्वतः सोम वर्ष्ण्यम|	soma wax great from every side may vigorous powers unite in thee.
भवा वाजस्य संगथे|	be in the gatheringplace of strength.
तुभ्यं गावो घर्तं पयो बभ्रो दुदुह्रे अक्षितम|	for thee brownhued the kine have poured imperishable oil and milk.
वर्षिष्ठे अधि सानवि|	aloft on the sublimest height.
सवायुधस्य ते सतो भुवनस्य पते वयम|	friendship o indu we desire with thee who bearest noble arms.
इन्दो सखित्वमुश्मसि|	with thee o lord of all that is.
आ हर्यताय धर्ष्णवे धनुस्तन्वन्ति पौंस्यम|	they for the bold and lovely one ply manly vigour like a bow.
शुक्रांवयन्त्यसुराय निर्णिजं विपामग्रे महीयुवः|	joyous in front of songs they weave bright raiment for the lord divine.
अध कषपा परिष्क्र्तो वाजानभि पर गाहते|	and he made beautiful by night dips forward into strengthening food.
यदी विवस्वतो धियो हरिं हिन्वन्ति यातवे|	what time the sacrificers thoughts speed on his way the goldenhued.
तमस्य मर्जयामसि मदो य इन्द्रपातमः|	we cleanse this gladdening drink of his the juice which indra chiefly drinks.
यं गाव आसभिर्दधुः पुरा नूनं च सूरयः|	that which kine took into their mouths of old and princes take it now.
तं गाथया पुराण्या पुनानमभ्यनूषत|	to him while purifying they have raised the ancient psalm of praise.
उतो कर्पन्तधीतयो देवानां नाम बिभ्रतीः|	and sacred songs which bear the names of gods have supplicated him.
तमुक्षमाणमव्यये वारे पुनन्ति धर्णसिम|	they purify him as he drops courageous in the fleecy sieve.
दूतं न पूर्वचित्तय आ शासते मनीषिणः|	him they instruct as messenger to bear the sages morning prayer.
स पुनानो मदिन्तमः सोमश्चमूषु सीदति|	soma best cheerer takes his seat the while they cleanse him in the bowls.
पशौ न रेत आदधत पतिर्वचस्यते धियः|	he as it were impregns the cow and babbles on the lord of song.
स मर्ज्यते सुकर्मभिर्देवो देवेभ्यः सुतः|	he is effused and beautified a god for gods by skilful men.
विदे यदासु सन्ददिर्महीरपो वि गाहते|	he penetrates the mighty floods collecting all he knows therein.
सुत इन्दो पवित्र आ नर्भिर्यतो वि नीयसे|	pressed indu guided by the men thou art led to the cleaning sieve.
इन्द्राय मत्सरिन्तमश्चमूष्वा नि षीदसि|	thou yielding indra highest joy takest thy seat within the bowls.
उत ते शुष्मासो अस्थू रक्षो भिन्दन्तो अद्रिवः|	o thou with stones for arms thy powers crushing the fiends have raised themselves.
नुदस्व याः परिस्प्र्धः|	chase thou the foes who compass us.
अया निजघ्निरोजसा रथसंगे धने हिते|	thou conquerest thus with might when car meets car and when the prize is staked.
सतवा अबिभ्युषा हर्दा|	with fearless heart will i sing praise.
अस्य वरतानि नाध्र्षे पवमानस्य दूढ्या|	no one with evil thought assails this pavamanas holy laws.
रुज यस्त्वाप्र्तन्यति|	crush him who fain would fight with thee.
तं हिन्वन्ति मदच्युतं हरिं नदीषु वाजिनम|	for indra to the streams they drive the tawny rapturedropping steed.
इन्दुमिन्द्राय मत्सरम|	indu the bringer of delight.
पर सोमस्य पवमानस्योर्मय इन्द्रस्य यन्ति जठरं सुपेशसः|	onward to indras throat move beauteously adorned the waves of soma as he purifies himself.
दध्ना यदीमुन्नीता यशसा गवां दानाय शूरमुदमन्दिषुः सुताः|	when they brought forward with the lovely curd of kine effused have cheered the hero to bestow his gifts.
अछा हि सोमः कलशानसिष्यददत्यो न वोळ्हा रघुवर्तनिर्व्र्षा|	hither hath soma flowed unto the beakers like a chariothorse a stallion swift upon his way.
अथा देवानामुभयस्य जन्मनो विद्वानश्नोत्यमुत इतश्च यत|	thus knowing both the generations he obtains the rights and dues of gods from yonder and from hence.
आ नः सोम पवमानः किरा वस्विन्दो भव मघवा राधसो महः|	while thou art cleansed o soma scatter wealth on us indu bestow great bounty as a liberal prince.
शिक्षा वयोधो वसवे सु चेतुना मा नो गयमारे अस्मत परा सिचः|	giver of life with wisdom help to opulence strew not our home possessions far away from us.
आ नः पूषा पवमानः सुरातयो मित्रो गछन्तु वरुणः सजोषसः|	hither let pūṣan pavamana come to us varuṇa mitra bountiful of one accord.
बर्हस्पतिर्मरुतो वायुरश्विना तवष्टा सविता सुयमा सरस्वती|	the maruts aśvins vāyu and bṛhaspati savitar tvaṣṭar tractable sarasvatī.
उभे दयावाप्र्थिवी विश्वमिन्वे अर्यमा देवो अदितिर्विधाता|	both heaven and earth the allinvigorating pair vidhatar aditi and aryaman the god.
भगो नर्शंस उर्वन्तरिक्षं विश्वे देवाः पवमानंजुषन्त|	bhaga who blesses men the spacious firmamentlet all the gods in pavamana take delight.
पर सेनानीः शूरो अग्रे रथानां गव्यन्नेति हर्षते अस्य सेना|	in forefront of the cars forth goes the hero the leader winning spoil his host rejoices.
भद्रान कर्ण्वन्निन्द्रहवान सखिभ्य आ सोमो वस्त्रा रभसानि दत्ते|	soma endues his robes of lasting colours and blesses for his friends their calls on indra.
समस्य हरिं हरयो मर्जन्त्यश्वहयैरनिशितं नमोभिः|	men decked with gold adorn his golden tendril incessantly with steedimpelling homage.
आ तिष्ठति रथमिन्द्रस्य सखा विद्वानेना सुमतिं यात्यछ|	the friend of indra mounts his car wellknowing he comes thereon to meet the prayer we offer.
स नो देव देवताते पवस्व महे सोम पसरस इन्द्रपानः|	o god for service of the gods flow onward for food sublime as indras drink o soma.
कर्ण्वन्नपो वर्षयन दयामुतेमामुरोरा नो वरिवस्या पुनानः|	making the floods bedewing earth and heaven come from the vast comfort us while we cleanse thee.
अजीतयेअहतये पवस्व सवस्तये सर्वतातये बर्हते|	flow for prosperity and constant vigour flow on for happiness and high perfection.
तदुशन्ति विश्व इमे सखायस्तदहं वश्मि पवमान सोम|	this is the wish of these friends assembled this is my wish o soma pavamana.
सोमः पवते जनिता मतीनां जनिता दिवो जनिता पर्थिव्याः|	father of holy hymns soma flows onward the father of the earth father of heaven.
जनिताग्नेर्जनिता सूर्यस्य जनितेन्द्रस्य जनितोत विष्णोः|	father of agni sūryas generator the father who begat indra and viṣṇu.
बरह्मा देवानां पदवीः कवीनां रषिर्विप्राणां महिषोम्र्गाणाम|	brahman of gods the leader of the poets Ṛṣi of sages bull of savage creatures.
शयेनो गर्ध्राणां सवधितिर्वनानां सोमः पवित्रमत्येति रेभन|	falcon amid the vultures axe of forests over the cleansing sieve goes soma singing.
परावीविपद वाच ऊर्मिं न सिन्धुर्गिरः सोमः पवमानोमनीषाः|	he soma pavamana like a river hath stirred the wave of voice our songs and praises.
अन्तः पश्यन वर्जनेमावराण्या तिष्ठति वर्षभो गोषु जानन|	beholding these inferior powers in cattle he rests among them as a steer wellknowing.
स मत्सरः पर्त्सु वन्वन्नवातः सहस्ररेता अभि वाजमर्ष|	as gladdener warrior never harmed in battle with thousand genial streams pour strength and vigour.
इन्द्रायेन्दो पवमानो मनीष्यंशोरूर्मिमीरय गा इषण्यन|	as thoughtful pavamana urge o indu speeding the kine the plants wave on to indra.
परि परियः कलशे देववात इन्द्राय सोमो रण्यो मदाय|	dear grateful to the gods on to the beaker moves soma sweet to indra to delight him.
सहस्रधारः शतवाज इन्दुर्वाजी न सप्तिः समना जिगाति|	with hundred powers with thousand currents indu like a strong carhorse goes to the assembly.
स पूर्व्यो वसुविज्जायमानो मर्जानो अप्सु दुदुहानो अद्रौ|	born in old time as finderout of treasures drained with the stone decking himself in waters.
अभिशस्तिपा भुवनस्य राजा विदद गातुं बरह्मणे पूयमानः|	warding off curses king of all existence he shall find way for prayer the while they cleanse him.
तवया हि नः पितरः सोम पूर्वे कर्माणि चक्रुः पवमानधीराः|	for our sage fathers soma pavamana of old performed by thee their sacred duties.
वन्वन्नवातः परिधीन्रपोर्णु वीरेभिरश्वैर्मघवा भवा नः|	fighting unvanquished open the enclosures enrich us with large gifts of steeds and heroes.
यथापवथा मनवे वयोधा अमित्रहा वरिवोविद धविष्मान|	as thou didst flow for manu lifebestowing foequeller comforter rich in oblations.
एवा पवस्व दरविणं दधान इन्द्रे सं तिष्ठ जनयायुधानि|	even thus flow onward now conferring riches combine with indra and bring forth thy weapons.
पवस्व सोम मधुमान रतावापो वसानो अधि सानो अव्ये|	flow onward soma rich in sweets and holy enrobed in waters on the fleecy summit.
अव दरोणानि घर्तवान्ति सीद मदिन्तमो मत्सर इन्द्रपानः|	settle in vessels that are full of fatness as cheering and most gladdening drink for indra.
वर्ष्टिं दिवः शतधारः पवस्व सहस्रसा वाजयुर्देववीतौ|	pour hundredstreamed winner of thousands mighty at the gods banquet pour the rain of heaven.
सं सिन्धुभिः कलशे वावशानः समुस्रियाभिःप्रतिरन न आयुः|	while thou with rivers roarest in the beaker and blent with milk prolongest our existence.
एष सय सोमो मतिभिः पुनानोअत्यो न वाजी तरतीदरातीः|	purified with our holy hymns this soma oertakes malignities like some strong charger.
पयो न दुग्धमदितेरिषिरमुर्विव गातुः सुयमोन वोळहा|	like fresh milk poured by aditi like passage in ample room or like a docile carhorse.
सवायुधः सोत्र्भिः पूयमानोअभ्यर्ष गुह्यं चारु नाम|	cleansed by the pressers armed with noble weapons stream to us the fair secret name thou bearest.
अभि वाजं सप्तिरिव शरवस्याभि वायुमभि गा देवसोम|	pour booty like a horse for love of glory god soma send us kine and send us vāyu.
शिशुं जज्ञानं हर्यतं मर्जन्ति शुम्भन्ति वह्निं मरुतो गणेन|	they deck him at his birth the lovely infant the maruts with their troop adorn the carhorse.
कविर्गीर्भिः काव्येना कविः सन सोमः पवित्रमत्येति रेभन|	by songs a poet and a sage by wisdom soma joes singing through the cleansing filter.
रषिमना य रषिक्र्त सवर्षाः सहस्रणीथः पदवीः कवीनाम|	lightwinner Ṛṣimindcd Ṛṣimaker hymned in a thousand hymns leader of sages.
तर्तीयं धाम महिषः सिषासन सोमो विराजमनुराजति षटुप|	a steer who strives to gain his third form soma is like virāj resplendent as a singer.
चमूषच्छ्येनः शकुनो विभ्र्त्वा गोविन्दुर्द्रप्स आयुधानिबिभ्रत|	hawk seated in the bowls bird wideextended the banner seeking kine and wielding weapons.
अपामूर्मिं सचमानः समुद्रं तुरीयं धाममहिषो विवक्ति|	following close the sea the wave of waters the great bull tells his fourth form and declares it.
मर्यो न शुभ्रस्तन्वं मर्जानोअत्यो न सर्त्वा सनये धनानाम|	like a fair youth who decorates his body a courser rushing to the gain of riches.
वर्षेव यूथा परि कोशमर्षन कनिक्रदच्चम्वोराविवेश|	a steer to herds so flowing to the pitcher he with a roar hath passed into the beakers.
पवस्वेन्दो पवमानो महोभिः कनिक्रदत परि वाराण्यर्ष|	flow on with might as pavamana indu flow loudly roaring through the fleecy filter.
करीळञ्चम्वोरा विश पूयमान इन्द्रं ते रसो मदिरो ममत्तु|	enter the beakers sporting as they cleanse thee and let thy gladdening juice make indra joyful.
परास्य धारा बर्हतीरस्र्ग्रन्नक्तो गोभिः कलशाना विवेश|	his streams have been effused in all their fulness and he hath entered balmed with milk the goblets.
साम कर्ण्वन सामन्यो विपश्चित करन्दन्नेत्यभि सख्युर्न जामिम|	singing his psalm wellskilled in song a chanter be comes as twere to his friends sister roaring.
अपघ्नन्नेषि पवमान शत्रून परियां न जारो अभिगीत इन्दुः|	chasing our foes thou comest pavamana indu besting as lover to his darling.
सीदन वनेषु शकुनो न पत्वा सोमः पुनानः कलशेषु सत्ता|	as a bird flies and settles in the forest thus soma settles purified in goblets.
आ ते रुचः पवमानस्य सोम योषेव यन्ति सुदुघाः सुधाराः|	with full stream and abundant milk o soma thy beams come like a woman as they cleanse thee.
हरिरानीतः पुरुवारो अप्स्वचिक्रदत कलशे देवयूनाम|	he goldhued rich in boons brought to the waters hath roared within the goblet of the pious.
आ नः पवस्व धारया पवमान रयिं पर्थुम|	pour forth on us abundant wealth o pavamana with thy stream.
यया जयोतिर्विदासि नः|	wherewith thou mayest find us light.
इन्दो समुद्रमीङखय पवस्व विश्वमेजय|	o indu swayer of the sea shaker of all things flow thou on.
रायो धर्ता न ओजसा|	bearer of wealth to us with might.
तवया वीरेण वीरवोअभि षयाम पर्तन्यतः|	with thee for hero valiant one may we subdue our enemies.
कषरा णो अभि वार्यम|	let what is precious flow to us.
पर वाजमिन्दुरिष्यति सिषासन वाजसा रषिः|	indu arouses strength the sage who strives for victory winning power.
वरता विदान आयुधा|	discovering holy works and means.
तं गीर्भिर्वाचमीङखयं पुनानं वासयामसि|	mover of speech we robe him with our songs as he is purified.
सोमं जनस्य गोपतिम|	soma the guardian of the folk.
विश्वो यस्य वरते जनो दाधार धर्मणस पतेः|	on whose way lord of holy law most richi as he is purified.
पुनानस्य परभूवसोः|	the people all have set their hearts.
तवं सोमासि धारयुर्मन्द्र ओजिष्ठो अध्वरे|	thou soma hast a running stream joyous most strong at sacrifice.
पवस्व मंहयद्रयिः|	flow bounteously bestowing wealth.
तवं सुतो नर्मादनो दधन्वान मत्सरिन्तमः|	effused as cheerer of the men flowing best gladdener thou art.
इन्द्राय सूरिरन्धसा|	a prince to indra with thy juice.
तवं सुष्वाणो अद्रिभिरभ्यर्ष कनिक्रदत|	poured forth by pressingstones do thou with loud roar send us in a stream.
दयुमन्तं शुष्ममुत्तमम|	most excellent illustrious might.
इन्दुर्हिन्वानो अर्षति तिरो वाराण्यव्यया|	indu urged forward floweth through the fleecy cloth the tawny one.
हरिर्वाजमचिक्रदत|	with his loud roar hath brought as strength.
इन्दो वयव्यमर्षसि वि शरवांसि वि सौभगा|	indu thou flowest through the fleece bringing felicities and fame.
वि वाजांसोम गोमतः|	and soma spoil and wealth in kine.
आ न इन्दो शतग्विनं रयिं गोमन्तमश्विनम|	hither o indu bring us wealth in steeds and cattle hundredfold.
भरा सोम सहस्रिणम|	bring wealth o soma thousandfold.
पवमानास इन्दवस्तिरः पवित्रमाशवः|	in purifying through the sieve the rapid drops ofsoma juice.
इन्द्रं यामेभिराशत|	come nigh to indra in their course.
ककुहः सोम्यो रस इन्दुरिन्द्राय पूर्व्यः|	for indra floweth excellent indu the noblest soma juice.
आयुः पवत आयवे|	the living for the living one.
हिन्वन्ति सूरमुस्रयः पवमानं मधुश्चुतम|	the glittering maids send sūra forth they with their song have sung aloud.
अभि गिरा समस्वरन|	to pavamana dropping meath.
अविता नो अजाश्वः पूषा यामनियामनि|	may pūṣan drawn by goats be our protector and on all his paths.
आ भक्षत कन्यासु नः|	bestow on us our share of maids.
अयं सोमः कपर्दिने घर्तं न पवते मधु|	this soma flows like gladdening oil for him who wears the braided locks.
आ भक्षत कन्यासु नः|	he shall give us our share of maids.
अयं त आघ्र्णे सुतो घर्तं न पवते शुचि|	this soma juice o glowing god flows like pure oil effused for thee.
आ भक्षत कन्यासु नः|	he shall give us our share of maids.
वाचो जन्तुः कवीनां पवस्व सोम धारया|	flow onward soma in thy stream begetter of the sages speech.
देवेषु रत्नधा असि|	wealthgiver among gods art thou.
आ कलशेषु धावति शयेनो वर्म वि गाहते|	the falcon dips within the jars he wrapḥim in his robe and goes.
अभि दरोणा कनिक्रदत|	loud roaring to the vats of wood.
परि पर सोम ते रसोअसर्जि कलशे सुतः|	soma thy juice hath been effused and poured into the pitcher like.
शयेनो न तक्तोर्षति|	a rapid hawk it rushes on.
पवस्व सोम मन्दयन्निन्द्राय मधुमत्तमः|	for indra flow most rich in sweets o soma bringing him delight.
अस्र्ग्रन देववीतये वाजयन्तो रथा इव|	they were sent forth to feast the gods like chariots that display their strength.
ते सुतासो मदिन्तमाः शुक्रा वायुमस्र्क्षत|	brilliant best givers of delight these juices have sent vāyu forth.
गराव्णा तुन्नो अभिष्टुतः पवित्रं सोम गछसि|	bruised by the pressstones and extolled soma thou goest to the sieve.
दधत सतोत्रे सुवीर्यम|	giving the worshipper hero strength.
एष तुन्नो अभिष्टुतः पवित्रमति गाहते|	this juice bruised by the pressingstones and lauded passes through the sieve.
रक्षोहा वारमव्ययम|	slayer of demons through the fleece.
यदन्ति यच्च दूरके भयं विन्दति मामिह|	o pavamana drive away the danger whether near at hand.
पवमानवि तज्जहि|	or far remote that finds me here.
पवमानः सो अद्य नः पवित्रेण विचर्षणिः|	this day may pavamana cleanse us with his purifying power.
यः पोतास पुनातु नः|	most active purifying priest.
यत ते पवित्रमर्चिष्यग्ने विततमन्तरा|	o agni with the cleansing light diffused through all thy fiery glow.
बरह्म तेन पुनीहि नः|	purify thou this prayer of ours.
यत ते पवित्रमर्चिवदग्ने तेन पुनीहि नः|	cleanse us with thine own cleansing power o agni that is bright with flame.
बरह्मसवैः पुनीहि नः|	and by libations poured to thee.
उभाभ्यां देव सवितः पवित्रेण सवेन च|	savitar god by both of these libation purifying power.
मां पुनीहि विश्वतः|	purify me on every side.
तरिभिष टवं देव सवितर्वर्षिष्ठैः सोम धामभिः|	cleanse us god savitar with three o soma with sublimest forms.
अग्ने दक्षैः पुनीहि नः|	agni with forms of power and might.
पुनन्तु मां देवजनाः पुनन्तु वसवो धिया|	may the gods company make me clean and vasus make rue pure by song.
विश्वे देवाः पुनीत मा जातवेदः पुनीहि मा|	purify me ye general gods o jātavedas make me pure.
पर पयायस्व पर सयन्दस्व सोम विश्वेभिरंशुभिः|	fill thyself full of juice flow forth o soma thou with all thy stalks.
देवेभ्य उत्तमं हविः|	the best oblation to the gods.
उप परियं पनिप्नतं युवानमाहुतीव्र्धम|	we with our homage have approached the friend who seeks our wondering praise.
अगन्म बिभ्रतोनमः|	young strengthener of the solemn rite.
अलाय्यस्य परशुर्ननाश तमा पवस्व देव सोम|	lost is alayyas axe o soma god do thou send it back hither in thy flow.
आखुं चिदेव देव सोम|	even soma god if twere a mole.
यः पावमानीरध्येत्य रषिभिः सम्भ्र्तं रसम|	the man who reads the essence stored by saints the pavamani hymns.
सर्वंस पूतमश्नाति सवदितं मातरिश्वना|	tastes food completely purified made sweet by mātariśvans touch.
पावमानीर्यो अध्येत्य रषिभिः सम्भ्र्तं रसम|	whoever reads the essence stored by saints the pavamani hymns.
तस्मै सरस्वती दुहे कषीरं सर्पिर्मधूदकम|	sarasvatī draws forth for him water and butter milk and meath.
स पवस्व मदाय कं नर्चक्षा देववीतये|	flow thou who viewest men to give delight to entertain the gods.
इन्दविन्द्रायपीतये|	indu to indra for his drink.
स नो अर्षाभि दूत्यं तवमिन्द्राय तोशसे|	stream to thine embassy for us thou hastenest for indra to.
देवान सखिभ्य आ वरम|	the gods o better than our friends.
उत तवामरुणं वयं गोभिरञ्ज्मो मदाय कम|	we balm thee red of hue with milk to fit thee for the rapturous joy.
वि नो राये दुरो वर्धि|	unbar for us the doors of wealth.
अत्यू पवित्रमक्रमीद वाजी धुरं न यामनि|	he through the sieve hath passed as comes a courser to the pole to run.
इन्दुर्देवेषु पत्यते|	indu belongs unto the gods.
समी सखायो अस्वरन वने करीळन्तमत्यविम|	all friends have lauded him as he sports in the wood beyond the fleece.
इन्दुं नावा अनूषत|	singers have chanted indus praise.
तया पवस्व धारया यया पीतो विचक्षसे|	flow indu with that stream wherein steeped thou announcest to the man.
इन्दो सतोत्रे सुवीर्यम|	who worships thee heroic strength.
पवस्व देववीरति पवित्रं सोम रंह्या|	soma flow on inviting gods speed to the purifying cloth.
इन्द्रमिन्दो वर्षा विश|	pass into indra as a bull.
आ वच्यस्व महि पसरो वर्षेन्दो दयुम्नवत्तमः|	as mighty food speed hitherward indu as a most splendid steer.
आ योनिं धर्णसिः सदः|	sit in thy place as one with strength.
अधुक्षत परियं मधु धारा सुतस्य वेधसः|	the wellloved meath was made to flow the stream of the creative juice.
अपो वसिष्ट सुक्रतुः|	ne sage drew waters to himself.
महान्तं तवा महीरन्वापो अर्षन्ति सिन्धवः|	the mighty waters yea the floods accompany thee mighty one.
यद गोभिर्वासयिष्यसे|	when thou wilt clothe thee with the milk.
समुद्रो अप्सु माम्र्जे विष्टम्भो धरुणो दिवः|	the lake is brightened in the floods soma our friend heavens prop and stay.
सोमः पवित्रे अस्मयुः|	falls on the purifying cloth.
अचिक्रदद वर्षा हरिर्महान मित्रो न दर्शतः|	the tawny bull hath bellowed fair as mighty mitra to behold.
सं सूर्येण रोचते|	he shines together with the sun.
गिरस्त इन्द ओजसा मर्म्र्ज्यन्ते अपस्युवः|	songs indu active in their might are beautified for thee wherewith.
याभिर्मदाय शुम्भसे|	thou deckest thee for our delight.
तं तवा मदाय घर्ष्वय उ लोकक्र्त्नुमीमहे|	to thee who givest ample room we pray to win the joyous draught.
तव परशस्तयो महीः|	great are the praiseamp due to thee.
अस्मभ्यमिन्दविन्द्रयुर्मध्वः पवस्व धारया|	indu as indras friend on us pour with a stream of sweetness like.
पर्जन्यो वर्ष्टिमानिव|	parjanya sender of the rain.
गोषा इन्दो नर्षा अस्यश्वसा वाजसा उत|	winner of kine indu art thou winner of heroes steeds and strength.
आत्मा यज्ञस्य पूर्व्यः|	primeval soul of sacrifice.
साकमुक्षो मर्जयन्त सवसारो दश धीरस्य धीतयो धनुत्रीः|	ten sisters pouring out the rain together swiftmoving thinkers of the sage adorn him.
हरिः पर्यद्रवज्जाः सूर्यस्य दरोणं ननक्षे अत्यो न वाजी|	hither hath run the goldhued child of sūrya and reached the vat like a fleet vigorous courser.
सं मात्र्भिर्न शिशुर्वावशानो वर्षा दधन्वे पुरुवारोद्भिः|	even as a youngling crying to his mothers the bounteous steer hath flowed along to waters.
मर्यो न योषामभि निष्क्र्तं यन सं गछते कलश उस्रियाभिः|	as youth to damsel so with milk he hastens on to the chose meetingplace the beaker.
उत पर पिप्य ऊधरघ्न्याया इन्दुर्धाराभिः सचते सुमेधाः|	yea swollen is the udder of the milchcow thither in streams goes very sapient indu.
मूर्धानं गावः पयसा चमूष्वभि शरीणन्ति वसुभिर्न निक्तैः|	the kine make ready as with newwashed treasures the head and chief with milk within the vessels.
स नो देवेभिः पवमान रदेन्दो रयिमश्विनं वावशानः|	with all the gods o indu pavamana while thou art roaring send us wealth in horses.
रथिरायतामुशती पुरन्धिरस्मद्र्यगा दावने वसूनाम|	hither upon her car come willing plenty inclined to us to give us of her treasures.
नू नो रयिमुप मास्व नर्वन्तं पुनानो वाताप्यं विश्वश्चन्द्रम|	now unto us mete riches while they cleansethee allglorious swelling wealth with store of heroes.
पर वन्दितुरिन्दो तार्यायुः परातर्मक्षू धियावसुर्जगम्यात|	long be his life who worships thee o indu may he enriched with prayer come soon and early.
पर निम्नेनेव सिन्धवो घनन्तो वर्त्राणि भूर्णयः|	like rivers down a steep descent slaying the vṛtras full of zeal.
सोमा अस्र्ग्रमाशवः|	the rapid somastreams have flowed.
अभि सुवानास इन्दवो वर्ष्टयः पर्थिवीमिव|	the drops of soma juice effused fall like the rain upon the earth.
इन्द्रं सोमासो अक्षरन|	to indra flow the somastreams.
अत्यूर्मिर्मत्सरो मदः सोमः पवित्रे अर्षति|	with swelling wave the gladdening drink the soma flows intoṭhe sieve.
विघ्नन रक्षांसि देवयुः|	loving the gods and slaying fiends.
आ कलशेषु धावति पवित्रे परि षिच्यते|	it hastens to the pitchers poured upon the sieve it waxes strong.
उक्थैर्यज्ञेषुवर्धते|	at sacrifices through the lauds.
अति तरी सोम रोचना रोहन न भराजसे दिवम|	soma thou shinest mounting heaven as twere above lights triple realm.
इष्णन सूर्यं न चोदयः|	and moving secmst to speed the sun.
अभि विप्रा अनूषत मूर्धन यज्ञस्य कारवः|	to him the head of sacnfice singers and bards have sung their songs.
दधानाश्चक्षसि परियम|	offering what he loves to see.
तमु तवा वाजिनं नरो धीभिर्विप्रा अवस्यवः|	the men the sages with their hymns eager for help deck thee strong ampteed.
मर्जन्तिदेवतातये|	deck thee for service of the gods.
मधोर्धारामनु कषर तीव्रः सधस्थमासदः|	flow onward to the stream of meath rest efficacious in thy home.
चारुरताय पीतये|	fair to be drunk at sacrifice.
एष धिया यात्यण्व्य शूरो रथेभिराशुभिः|	through the fine fingers with the song this hero comes with rapid ears.
गछन्निन्द्रस्य निष्क्र्तम|	going to indras special place.
एष पुरू धियायते बर्हते देवतातये|	in holy thought he ponders much for the great worship of the gods.
यत्राम्र्तास आसते|	where the immortals have their seat.
एष हितो वि नीयतेअन्तः शुभ्रावता पथा|	like a good horse is he led out when on the path that shines with light.
यदी तुञ्जन्ति भूर्णयः|	the mettled steeds exert their strength.
एष शर्ङगाणि दोधुवच्छिशीते यूथ्यो वर्षा|	he brandishes his horns on high and whets them bull who leads the herd.
नर्म्णा दधान ओजसा|	doing with might heroic deeds.
एष रुक्मिभिरीयते वाजि शुभ्रेभिरंशुभिः|	he moves a vigorous steed adorned with beauteous rays of shining gold.
पतिः सिन्धूनां भवन|	becoming sovran of the streams.
एष वसूनि पिब्दना परुषा ययिवानति|	he over places rough to pass bringing rich treasures closely packed.
अव शादेषु गछति|	descends into the reservoirs.
एतं मर्जन्ति मर्ज्यमुप दरोणेष्वायवः|	men beautify him in the vats him worthy to be beautified.
परचक्राणं महीरिषः|	him who brings forth abundant food.
एतमु तयं दश कषिपो मर्जन्ति सप्त धीतयः|	him even him the fingers ten and the seven songs make beautiful.
सवायुधं मदिन्तमम|	wellweaponed best of gladdeners.
अस्य परत्नामनु दयुतं शुक्रं दुदुह्रे अह्रयः|	after his ancient splendour they the bold have drawn the bright milk from.
पयः सहस्रसां रषिम|	the sage who wins a thousand gifts.
अयं सूर्य इवोपद्र्गयं सरांसि धावति|	in aspect he is like the sun he runneth forward to the lakes.
सप्त परवता दिवम|	seven currents flowing through the sky.
अयं विश्वानि तिष्ठति पुनानो भुवनोपरि|	he shining in his splendour stands high over all things that exist.
सोमो देवो नसूर्यः|	soma a god as sūrya is.
परि णो देववीतये वाजानर्षसि गोमतः|	thou indu in thy brilliancy pourest on us as indras friend.
पुनान इन्दविन्द्रयुः|	wealth from the kine to feast the gods.
अस्य परेषा हेमना पूयमानो देवो देवेभिः समप्र्क्त रसम|	made pure by this mans urgent zeal and impulse the god hath to the gods his juice imparted.
सुतः पवित्रं पर्येति रेभन मितेव सद्म पशुमान्ति होता|	he goes effused and singing to the filter like priest to measured seats supplied with cattle.
भद्रा वस्त्रा समन्या वसानो महान कविर्निवचनानि शंसन|	robed in fair raiment meet to wear in battle a mighty sage pronouncing invocations.
आ वच्यस्व चम्वोः पूयमानो विचक्षणो जाग्र्विर्देववीतौ|	roll onward to the beakers as they cleanse thee farseeing at the feast of gods and watchful.
समु परियो मर्ज्यते सानो अव्ये यशस्तरो यशसां कषैतो अस्मे|	dear he is brightened on the fleecy summit a prince among us nobler than the noble.
अभि सवर धन्वा पूयमानो यूयं पात सवस्तिभिः सदा नः|	roar out as thou art purified run forward do ye preserve us evermore with blessings.
पर गायताभ्यर्चाम देवान सोमं हिनोत महते धनाय|	let us sing praises to the gods sing loudly send ye the soma forth for mighty riches.
सवादुः पवाते अति वारमव्यमा सीदाति कलशं देवयुर्नः|	let him flow sweetlyflavoured through the filter and let our pious one rest in the pitcher.
इन्दुर्देवानामुप सख्यमायन सहस्रधारः पवते मदाय|	winning the friendship of the deities indu flows in a thousand streams to make them joyful.
नर्भिः सतवानो अनु धाम पूर्वमगन्निन्द्रं महते सौभगाय|	praised by the men after the ancient statute he hath come nigh for our great bliss to indra.
सतोत्रे राये हरिरर्षा पुनान इन्द्रं मदो गछतु ते भराय|	flow goldhued cleansing thee to enrich the singer let thy juice go to indra to support him.
देवैर्याहि सरथं राधो अछा यूयं पात सवस्तिभिः सदा नः|	come nigh together with the gods for bounty do ye preserve us evermore with blessings.
पर काव्यमुशनेव बरुवाणो देवो देवानां जनिमा विवक्ति|	the god declares the deities generations like uśanā proclaiming lofty wisdom.
महिव्रतः शुचिबन्धुः पावकः पदा वराहो अभ्येति रेभन|	with brilliant kin farruling sanctifying the boar advances singing to the places.
पर हंसासस्त्र्पलं मन्युमछामादस्तं वर्षगणा अयासुः|	the swans the vrsaganas from anear us have brought their restless spirit to our dwelling.
आङगूष्यं पवमानं सखायो दुर्मर्षं साकं परवदन्ति वाणम|	friends come to pavamana meet for praises and sound in concert their resistless music.
स रंहत उरुगायस्य जूतिं वर्था करीळन्तं मिमते न गावः|	he follows the widestriders rapid movement cows low as twere to him who sports at pleasure.
परीणसं कर्णुते तिग्मश्र्ङगो दिवा हरिर्दद्र्शे नक्तं रज्रः|	he with the sharpened horns brings forth abundance the silvery shines by night by day the golden.
इन्दुर्वाजी पवते गोन्योघा इन्द्रे सोमः सह इन्वन मदाय|	strong indu bathed in milk flows on for indra soma exciting strength to make him joyful.
हन्ति रक्षो बाधते पर्यरातीर्वरिवः कर्ण्वन वर्जनस्य राजा|	he quells malignities and slays the demons the king of mighty power who brings us comfort.
अध धारया मध्वा पर्चानस्तिरो रोम पवते अद्रिदुग्धः|	then in a stream he flows milked out with pressstones mingled with sweetness through the fleecy filter.
इन्दुरिन्द्रस्य सख्यं जुषाणो देवो देवस्य मत्सरो मदाय|	indu rejoicing in the love of indra the god who gladdens for the gods enjoyment.
अभि परियाणि पवते पुनानो देवो देवान सवेन रसेन पर्ञ्चन|	as he is purified he pours out treasures a god bedewing gods with his own juices.
इन्दुर्धर्माण्य रतुथा वसानो दश कषिपो अव्यत सानो अव्ये|	indu hath wearing qualities by seasons on the raised fleece engaged the ten swift fingers.
वर्षा शोणो अभिकनिक्रदद गा नदयन्नेति पर्थिवीमुत दयाम|	the red bull bellowing to the kine advances causing the heavens and earth to roar and tbunder.
इन्द्रस्येव वग्नुरा शर्ण्व आजौ परचेतयन्नर्षति वाचमेमाम|	well is he beard like indras shout in battle letting this voice be known he hastens hither.
रसाय्यः पयसा पिन्वमान ईरयन्नेषि मधुमन्तमंशुम|	swelling with milk abounding in sweet flavours urging the meathrich plant thou goest onward.
पवमानः सन्तनिमेषि कर्ण्वन्निन्द्राय सोम परिषिच्यमानः|	raising a shout thou flowest as they cleanse thee when thou o soma art effused for indra.
एवा पवस्व मदिरो मदायोदग्राभस्य नमयन वधस्नैः|	so flow thou on inspiriting for rapture aiming deatbshafts at him who stays the waters.
परि वर्णं भरमाणो रुशन्तं गव्युर्नो अर्ष परि सोम सिक्तः|	flow to us wearing thy resplendent colour effused and eager for the kine o soma.
जुष्ट्वी न इन्दो सुपथा सुगान्युरौ पवस्व वरिवांसि कर्ण्वन|	pleased with us indu send us as thou flowest good easy paths in ample space and comforts.
घनेव विष्वग दुरितानि विघ्नन्नधि षणुना धन्व सानो अव्ये|	dispelling as twere with a club misfortunes run oer the height run oer the fleecy summit.
वर्ष्टिं नो अर्ष दिव्यां जिगत्नुमिळावतीं शंगयीं जीरदानुम|	pour on us rain celestial quickly streaming refreshing fraught with health and ready bounty.
सतुकेव वीता धन्वा विचिन्वन बन्धून्रिमानवरानिन्दो वायून|	flow indu send these winds thy lower kinsmen setting them free like locks of hair unbraided.
गरन्थिं न वि षय गरथितं पुनान रजुं च गातुं वर्जिनं च सोम|	part like a knotted tangle while they cleanse thee o soma righteous and unrighteous conduct.
अत्यो न करदो हरिरा सर्जानो मर्यो देव धन्व पस्त्यावान|	neigh like a tawny courser who is loosened come like a youth o god a housepossessor.
जुष्टो मदाय देवतात इन्दो परि षणुना धन्व सानो अव्ये|	for the gods service for delight o indu run oer the height run over the fleecy summit.
सहस्रधारः सुरभिरदब्धः परि सरव वाजसातौ नर्षह्ये|	with thousand streams inviolate sweetscented flow on for gain of strength that conquers heroes.
अरश्मानो येअरथा अयुक्ता अत्यासो न सस्र्जानास आजौ|	without a car without a rein to guide them unyoked like coursers started in the contest.
एते शुक्रासो धन्वन्ति सोमा देवासस्तानुप याता पिबध्यै|	these brilliant drops of soma juice run forward do ye o deities come nigh to drink them.
एवा न इन्दो अभि देववीतिं परि सरव नभो अर्णश्चमूषु|	so for our banquet of the gods o indu pour down the rain of heaven into the vessels.
सोमो अस्मभ्यं काम्यं बर्हन्तं रयिं ददातु वीरवन्तमुग्रम|	may soma grant us riches sought with longing mighty exceeding strong with store of heroes.
तक्षद यदी मनसो वेनतो वाग जयेष्ठस्य वा धर्मणि कषोरनीके|	what time the loving spirits word had formed him chief of all food by statute of the highest.
आदीमायन वरमा वावशाना जुष्टं पतिं कलशे गाव इन्दुम|	then loudly lowing came the cows to indu the chosen wellloved master in the beaker.
पर दानुदो दिव्यो दानुपिन्व रतं रताय पवते सुमेधाः|	the sage celestial liberal raining bounties pours as he flows the genuine for the truthful.
धर्मा भुवद वर्जन्यस्य राजा पर रश्मिभिर्दशभिर्भारि भूम|	the king shall be effectual strengths upholder he by the ten bright reins is mostly guided.
पवित्रेभिः पवमानो नर्चक्षा राजा देवानामुत मर्त्यानाम|	he who beholds mankind made pure with filters the king supreme of deities and mortals.
दविता भुवद रयिपती रयीणां रतं भरत सुभ्र्तं चार्विन्दुः|	from days of old is treasurelord of riches he indu cherishes fair wellkept order.
अर्वानिव शरवसे सातिमछेन्द्रस्य वायोरभि वीतिमर्ष|	haste like a steed to vittory for glory to indras and to vāyus entertainment.
स नः सहस्रा बर्हतीरिषो दा भवा सोम दरविणोवित पुनानः|	give us food ample thousandfold be soma the finderout of riches when they cleanse thee.
देवाव्यो नः परिषिच्यमानाः कषयं सुवीरं धन्वन्तु सोमाः|	effused by us let goddelighting somas bring as they flow a home with noble heroes.
आयज्यवः सुमतिं विश्ववारा होतारो न दिवियजो मन्द्रतमाः|	rich in all boons like priests acquiring favour the worshippers of heaven the best of cheerers.
एवा देव देवताते पवस्व महे सोम पसरसे देवपानः|	so god for service of the gods flow onward flow drink of gods for ample food o soma.
महश्चिद धि षमसि हिताः समर्ये कर्धि सुष्ठाने रोदसी पुनानः|	for we go forth to war against the mighty make heaven and earth well stablished by thy cleansing.
अश्वो नो करदो वर्षभिर्युजानः सिंहो न भीमो मनसो जवीयान|	thou yoked by strong men neighest like a courser swifter than thought is like an awful lion.
अर्वाचीनैः पथिभिर्ये रजिष्ठा आ पवस्व सौमनसं न इन्दो|	by paths directed hitherward the straightest send thou us happiness indu while they cleanse thee.
शतं धारा देवजाता अस्र्ग्रन सहस्रमेनाः कवयो मर्जन्ति|	sprung from the gods a hundred streams a thousand have been effused sages prepare and purge them.
इन्दो सनित्रं दिव आ पवस्व पुरेतासि महतो धनस्य|	bring us from heaven the means of winnning indu thou artforerunnner of abundant riches.
दिवो न सर्गा असस्र्ग्रमह्नां राजा न मित्रं पर मिनातिधीरः|	the streams of days were poured as twere from heaven the wise king doth not treat his friend unkindly.
पितुर्न पुत्रः करतुभिर्यतान आ पवस्व विशेस्या अजीतिम|	like a son following his fathers wishes grant to this family success and safety.
पर ते धारा मधुमतीरस्र्ग्रन वारान यत पूतो अत्येष्यव्यान|	now are thy streams poured forth with all their sweetness when purified thou goest through the filter.
पवमान पवसे धाम गोनां जज्ञानः सूर्यमपिन्वो अर्कैः|	the race of kine is thy gift pavarridna when born thou madest sūrya rich with brightness.
कनिक्रददनु पन्थां रतस्य शुक्रो वि भास्यम्र्तस्य धाम|	bright bellowing aiong the path of order thou shinest as the form of life eternal.
स इन्द्राय पवसे मत्सरवान हिन्वानो वाचं मतिभिः कवीनाम|	thou flowest on as gladdening drink for indra sending thy voice out with the hymns of sages.
दिव्यः सुपर्णोअव चक्षि सोम पिन्वन धाराः कर्मणा देववीतौ|	pouring out streams at the gods feast with service thou soma lookest down a heavenly eagle.
एन्दो विश कलशं सोमधानं करन्दन्निहि सूर्यस्योप रश्मिम|	enter the somaholding beaker indu and with a roar approach the ray of sarya.
तिस्रो वाच ईरयति पर वह्निरतस्य धीतिं बरह्मणो मनीषाम|	three are the voices that the courser utters he speaks the thought of prayer the law of order.
गावो यन्ति गोपतिं पर्छमानाः सोमं यन्ति मतयो वावशानाः|	to the cows master come the cows inquiring the hymns with eager longing come to soma.
सोमं गावो धेनवो वावशानाः सोमं विप्रा मतिभिः पर्छमानाः|	to soma come the cows the milchkine longing to soma sages with their hvmns inquiring.
सोमः सुतः पूयते अज्यमानः सोमे अर्कास्त्रिष्टुभिः सं नवन्ते|	soma effused is purified and blended our hymns and tṛṣṭup songs unite in soma.
एवा नः सोम परिषिच्यमान आ पवस्व पूयमानः सवस्ति|	thus soma as we pour thee into vessels while thou art purified flow for our welfare.
इन्द्रमा विश बर्हता रवेण वर्धया वाचं जनया पुरन्धिम|	pass into indra with a mighty roaring make the voice swell and generate abundance.
आ जाग्र्विर्विप्र रता मतीनां सोमः पुनानो असदच्चमूषु|	singer of true songs everwatchful soma hath settled in the ladles when they cleanse him.
सपन्ति यं मिथुनासो निकामा अध्वर्यवो रथिरासः सुहस्ताः|	him the adhvaryus paired and eager follow leaders of sacrifice and skilfulhanded.
स पुनान उप सूरे न धातोभे अप्रा रोदसी वि ष आवः|	cleansed near the sun as twere he as creator hath filled full heaven and earth and hath disclosed them.
परिया चिद यस्य परियसास ऊती स तू धनं कारिणेन पर यंसत|	he by whose dear help men gain all their wishes shall yield the precious meed as to a victor.
स वर्धिता वर्धनः पूयमानः सोमो मीढ्वानभि नो जयोतिषावीत|	he being cleansed the strengthener and increaser soma the bounteous helped us with his lustre.
येना नः पूर्वे पितरः पदज्ञाः सवर्विदो अभि गा अद्रिमुष्णन|	wherewith our sires of old who knew the footsteps found light and stole the cattle from the mountain.
अक्रान समुद्रः परथमे विधर्मञ जनयन परजा भुवनस्यराजा|	in the first vault of heaven loud roared the ocean king of all being generating creatures.
वर्षा पवित्रे अधि सानो अव्ये बर्हत सोमो वाव्र्धे सुवान इन्दुः|	steer in the filter on the fleecy summit soma the drop effused hath waxen mighty.
महत तत सोमो महिषश्चकारापां यद गर्भोअव्र्णीत देवान|	soma the steer in that as child of waters he chose the gods performed that great achievement.
अदधादिन्द्रे पवमान ओजोअजनयत सूर्ये जयोतिरिन्दुः|	he pavamana granted strength to indra he indu generated light in sūrya.
मत्सि वायुमिष्टये राधसे च मत्सि मित्रावरुणा पूयमानः|	make vāyu glad for furtherance and bounty cheer varuṇa and mitra as they cleanse thee.
मत्सि शर्धो मारुतं मत्सि देवान मत्सि दयावाप्र्थिवी देव सोम|	gladden the gods gladden the host of maruts make heaven and earth rejoice o god o soma.
रजुः पवस्व वर्जिनस्य हन्तापामीवां बाधमानो मर्धश्च|	flow onward righteous slayer of the wicked driving away our enemies and sickness.
अभिश्रीणन पयः पयसाभि गोनामिन्द्रस्य तवं तव वयं सखायः|	blending thy milk with milk which cows afford us we are thy friends thou art the friend of indra.
मध्वः सूदं पवस्व वस्व उत्सं वीरं च न आ पवस्वा भगं च|	pour us a fount of meath a spring of treasure send us a hero son and happy fortune.
सवदस्वेन्द्राय पवमान इन्दो रयिं च न आ पवस्वा समुद्रात|	be sweet to india when they cleanse thee indu and pour down riches on us from the ocean.
सोमः सुतो धारयात्यो न हित्वा सिन्धुर्न निम्नमभि वाज्यक्षाः|	strong soma pressed like an impetuous courser hath flowed in stream as a flood speeding downward.
आ योनिं वन्यमसदत पुनानः समिन्दुर्गोभिरसरत समद्भिः|	cleansed he hath settled in his wooden dwelling indu hath flowed with milk and with the waters.
एष सय ते पवत इन्द्र सोमश्चमूषु धीर उशते तवस्वान|	strong wise for thee who longest for his coming this soma here flows to the bowls o indra.
सवर्चक्षा रथिरः सत्यशुष्मः कामो न यो देवयतामसर्जि|	he chariotborne sunbright and truly potent was poured forth like the longing of the pious.
एष परत्नेन वयसा पुनानस्तिरो वर्पांसि दुहितुर्दधानः|	he purified with ancient vital vigour pervading all his daughters forms and figures.
वसानः शर्म तरिवरूथमप्सु होतेव याति समनेषुरेभन|	finding his threefold refuge in the waters goes singing as a priest to the assemblies.
नू नस्त्वं रथिरो देव सोम परि सरव चम्वोः पूयमानः|	now chariotborne flow unto us god soma as thou art purified flow to the saucers.
अप्सु सवादिष्ठो मधुमान रतावा देवो न यः सविता सत्यमन्मा|	sweetest in waters rich in meath and holy as savitar the god is truthfulminded.
अभि वायुं वीत्यर्षा गर्णानोअभि मित्रावरुणा पूयमानः|	to feast him flow mid song and hymn to vāyu flow purified to varuṇa and mitra.
अभी नरं धीजवनं रथेष्ठामभीन्द्रं वर्षणं वज्रबाहुम|	flow to the songinspiring carborne hero to mighty indra him who wields the thunder.
अभि वस्त्रा सुवसनान्यर्षाभि धेनूः सुदुघाः पूयमानः|	pour on us garments that shall clothe us meetly send purified miichkine abundant yielders.
अभि चन्द्रा भर्तवे नो हिरण्याभ्यश्वान रथिनो देव सोम|	god soma send us chariotdrawing horses that they may bring us treasures bright and golden.
अभी नो अर्ष दिव्या वसून्यभि विश्वा पार्थिवा पूयमानः|	send to us in a stream celestial riches send us when thou art cleansed what earth containeth.
अभि येन दरविणमश्नवामाभ्यर्षेयं जमदग्निवन्नः|	so that thereby we may acquire possessions and rsihood in jamadagnis manner.
अया पवा पवस्वैना वसूनि मांश्चत्व इन्दो सरसि पर धन्व|	pour forth this wealth with this purification flow onward to the yellow lake o indu.
बरध्नश्चिदत्र वातो न जातः पुरुमेधश्चित तकवे नरं दात|	here too the ruddy windswift full of wisdom shall give a son to him who cometh quickly.
उत न एना पवया पवस्वाधि शरुते शरवाय्यस्य तीर्थे|	flow on for us with this purification to the famed ford of thee whose due is glory.
षष्टिं सहस्रा नैगुतो वसूनि वर्क्षं न पक्वं धूनवद रणाय|	may the foequeller shake us down for triumph like a trees ripe fruit sixty thousand treasures.
महीमे अस्य वर्षनाम शूषे मांश्चत्वे वा पर्शने वा वधत्रे|	eagerly do we pray for those two exploits at the blue lake and prsana wrought in battle.
अस्वापयन निगुतः सनेहयच्चापामित्रानपाचितो अचेतः|	he sent our enemies to sleep and slew thern and turned away the foolish and unfriendly.
सं तरी पवित्रा विततान्येष्यन्वेकं धावसि पूयमानः|	thou comest unto three extended filters and hasteriest through each one as they cleanse thee.
असि भगो असि दात्रस्य दातासि मघवा मघवद्भ्य इन्दो|	thou art the giver of the gift a bhaga a maghavan for liberal lords o indu.
एष विश्ववित पवते मनीषी सोमो विश्वस्य भुवनस्य राजा|	this soma here the wise the allobtainer flows on his way as king of all existence.
दरप्सानीरयन विदथेष्विन्दुर्वि वारमव्यं समयाति याति|	driving the drops at our assemblies indu completely traverses the fleecy filter.
इन्दुं रिहन्ति महिषा अदब्धाः पदे रेभन्ति कवयो न गर्ध्राः|	the great inviolate are kissing indu and singing in his place like eager sages.
हिन्वन्ति धीरा दशभिः कषिपाभिः समञ्जते रूपमपां रसेन|	the wise men send him forth with ten swift fingers and balm his form with essence of the waters.
तवया वयं पवमानेन सोम भरे कर्तं वि चिनुयाम शश्वत|	soma may we with thee as pavamana pile up together all our spoil in battle.
तन नो मित्रो वरुणो मामहन्तामदितिः सिन्धुः पर्थिवीुत दयौः|	this boon vouchsafe us varuṇa and mitra and aditi and sindhu earth and heaven.
पर सुवानो धारया तनेन्दुर्हिन्वानो अर्षति|	the drop of soma juice effused flows onward with this stream impelled.
रुजद दर्ळ्हा वयोजसा|	rending strong places with its might.
सुत इन्द्राय वायवे वरुणाय मरुद्भ्यः|	poured forth to indra varuṇa to vāyu and the marut hosts.
सोमो अर्षति विष्णवे|	to viṣṇu flows the soma juice.
वर्षाणं वर्षभिर्यतं सुन्वन्ति सोममद्रिभिः|	with stones they press the soma forth the strong conducted by the strong.
दुहन्तिशक्मना पयः|	they milk the liquor out with skill.
भुवत तरितस्य मर्ज्यो भुवदिन्द्राय मत्सरः|	tis he whom trita must refine tis he who shall make indra glad.
सं रूपैरज्यते हरिः|	the tawny one is decked with tints.
अभीं रतस्य विष्टपं दुहते पर्श्निमातरः|	him do the sons of pṛśni milk the dwellingplace of sacrifice.
चारु परियतमं हविः|	oblation lovely and most dear.
समेनमह्रुता इमा गिरो अर्षन्ति सस्रुतः|	to him in one unitcd stream thse songs flow on straight forward he.
धेनूर्वाश्रोवीवशत|	loud voiced hath made the milchkine low.
पर ते सोतार ओण्यो रसं मदाय घर्ष्वय|	the pressers from the somapress send forth thy juice for rapturous joy.
सर्गो न तक्त्येतशः|	the speckled sap runs like a flood.
करत्वा दक्षस्य रथ्यमपो वसानमन्धसा|	with strength we follow through the sieve him who brings might and wins the kine.
गोषामण्वेषु सश्चिम|	enrobed in water with his juice.
अनप्तमप्सु दुष्टरं सोमं पवित्र आ सर्ज|	pour on the sieve the soma neer subdued in waters waterless.
पुनीहीन्द्राय पातवे|	and make it pure for indras drink.
पर पुनानस्य चेतसा सोमः पवित्रे अर्षति|	moved by the purifiers thought the soma flows into the sieve.
करत्वा सधस्थमासदत|	by wisdom it hath gained its home.
पर तवा नमोभिरिन्दव इन्द्र सोमा अस्र्क्षत|	with humble homage indra have the somadrops flowed forth to thee.
महे भरायकारिणः|	contending for the glorious prize.
पुनानो रूपे अव्यये विश्वा अर्षन्नभि शरियः|	purified in his fleecy garb attaining every beauty he.
शूरो न गोषु तिष्ठति|	stands herolike amid the kine.
दिवो न सानु पिप्युषी धारा सुतस्य वेधसः|	swelling as twere to heights of heaven the stream of the creative juice.
वर्था पवित्रे अर्षति|	falls lightly on the cleansing sieve.

अव्यो वारं वि धावसि|	thou wanderest through the cloth of wool.
पवस्व गोजिदश्वजिद विश्वजित सोम रण्यजित|	flow onward soma winning kine and steeds and all that gives delight.
परजावद रत्नमा भर|	bring hither wealth with progeny.
पवस्वाद्भ्यो अदाभ्यः पवस्वौषधीभ्यः|	flow onward from the waters flow inviolable from the plants.
पवस्व धिषणाभ्यः|	flow onward from the pressingboards.
तवं सोम पवमानो विश्वानि दुरिता तर|	soma as pavamana pass over all trouble and distress.
कविः सीद नि बर्हिषि|	sit on the sacred grass a sage.

इन्दो विश्वानभीदसि|	o indu thou art over all.

इन्दो सहस्रभर्णसं तुविद्युम्नं विभ्वासहम|	riches o indu thousandfold glorious conquering the great.
परि षय सुवानो अव्ययं रथे न वर्माव्यत|	effused he hath as on a car invested him in fleecy mail.
इन्दुरभिद्रुणा हितो हियानो धाराभिरक्षाः|	onward hath indu flowed in streams impelled surrounded by the wood.

धारा य ऊर्ध्वो अध्वरे भराजा नैति गव्ययुः|	he goes erect as seeking kine in stream with light to sacrifice.
स हि तवं देव शश्वते वसु मर्ताय दाशुषे|	for thou thyself o indu god to every mortal worshipper.
इन्दो सहस्रिणं रयिं शतात्मानं विवाससि|	attractest riches thousandfold made manifest in hundred forms.
वयं ते अस्य वर्त्रहन वसो वस्वः पुरुस्प्र्हः|	good vṛtraslayer may we be still nearest to this wealth of thine.
नि नेदिष्ठतमा इषः सयाम सुम्नस्याध्रिगो|	which many crave nearest to food and happiness resistless one.
दविर्यं पञ्च सवयशसं सवसारो अद्रिसंहतम|	whom bright with native splendour crushed between the pair of pressingstones.

यो देवान विश्वानित परि मदेन सह गछति|	who with exhilarating juice goes forth to all the deities.
अस्य वो हयवसा पान्तो दक्षसाधनम|	through longing for this sap of yours ye drink what brings ability.
यः सूरिषु शरवोब्र्हद दधे सवर्ण हर्यतः|	even him who dear as heavens own light gives to our princes high renown.
स वां यज्ञेषु मानवी इन्दुर्जनिष्ट रोदसी|	indu at holy rites produced you heaven and earth the friends of men.
देवो देवी गिरिष्ठा अस्रेधन तं तुविष्वणि|	hillhaunting god the goddesses they bruised him where the roar was loud.

तं सखायः पुरोरुचं यूयं वयं च सूरयः|	friends may the princes ye and we obtain this most resplendent one.

पवमानो अदाभ्यः|	inviolable as he flows.

पवमानःसिषासति|	is fain to win all precious boons.

पवमानःकनिक्रदत|	and roars as he is flowing on.

जयोतिर्जज्ञानमुक्थ्यम|	brought forth as light that merits laud.

धवस्रयोः पुरुषन्त्योरा सहस्राणि दद्महे|	we have accepted thousands from dhvasras and puruṣantis hands.
तरत स मन्दी धावति|	swift runs this giver of delight.
आ ययोस्त्रिंशतं तना सहस्राणि च दद्महे|	from whom we have accepted thus thousands and three times ten beside.
तरत समन्दी धावति|	swift runs this giver of delight.
तम उ नूनं तविषीमन्तम एषां सतुषे गणम मारुतं नव्यसीनाम|	now do i glorify their mighty cohort the company of these the youthful maruts.
य आश्वश्वा अमवद वहन्त उतेशिरे अम्र्तस्य सवराजः|	who ride impetuous on with rapid horses and radiant in themselves are lords of amṛta.
तवेषं गणं तवसं खादिहस्तं धुनिव्रतम मायिनं दातिवारम|	the mighty glittering band armbound with bracelets givers of bliss unmeasured in their greatness.
मयोभुवो ये अमिता महित्वा वन्दस्व विप्र तुविराधसो नॄन|	with magical powers bountiful everroaringthese liberal heroes venerate thou singer.
आ वो यन्तूदवाहासो अद्य वर्ष्टिं ये विश्वे मरुतो जुनन्ति|	this day may all your waterbringers maruts they who impel the falling rain approach us.
अयं यो अग्निर मरुतः समिद्ध एतं जुषध्वं कवयो युवानः|	this fire o maruts hath been duly kindled let it find favour with you youthful sages.
यूयं राजानम इर्यं जनाय विभ्वतष्टं जनयथा यजत्राः|	ye raise up for the folk an active ruler whom holy ones a masters hand hath fashioned.
युष्मद एति मुष्टिहा बाहुजूतो युष्मद सदश्वो मरुतः सुवीरः|	ye send the fighter hand to hand armmighty and the brave hero maruts with good horses.
अरा इवेद अचरमा अहेव परपर जायन्ते अकवा महोभिः|	they spring forth more and more strong in their glories like days like spokes where none are last in order.
पर्श्नेः पुत्रा उपमासो रभिष्ठाः सवया मत्या मरुतः सम मिमिक्षुः|	highest and mightiest are the sons of pṛśni firm to their own intention cling the maruts.
यत परायासिष्ट पर्षतीभिर अश्वैर वीळुपविभिर मरुतो रथेभिः|	when ye have hastened on with spotted coursers o maruts on your cars with strongwrought fellies.
कषोदन्त आपो रिणते वनान्य अवोस्रियो वर्षभः करन्दतु दयौः|	the waters are disturbed the woods are shattered let dyaus the red steer send his thunder downward.
परथिष्ट यामन पर्थिवी चिद एषाम भर्तेव गर्भं सवम इच छवो धुः|	even earth hath spread herself wide at their coming and they as husbands have with power impregned her.
वातान हय अश्वान धुर्य रयुयुज्रे वर्षं सवेदं चक्रिरे रुद्रियासः|	they to the pole have yoked the winds for coursers their sweat have they made rain these sons of rudra.
हये नरो मरुतो मर्ळता नस तुवीमघासो अम्र्ता रतज्ञाः|	ho maruts heroes skilled in law immortal be gracious unto us ye rich in treasures.
सत्यश्रुतः कवयो युवानो बर्हद्गिरयो बर्हद उक्षमाणाः|	ye hearers of the truth ye sage and youthful grown mighty dwelling on the lofty mountains.
पुरूरुणा चिद धय अस्त्य अवो नूनं वां वरुण|	even far and wide o varuṇa and mitra doth your grace extend.
मित्र वंसि वां सुमतिम|	may i obtain your kind goodwill.
ता वां सम्यग अद्रुह्वाणेषम अश्याम धायसे|	from you benignant gods may we gain fully food for sustenance.
वयं ते रुद्रा सयाम|	such o ye rudras my we be.
पातं नो रुद्रा पायुभिर उत तरायेथां सुत्रात्रा|	guard us o rudras with your guar4 save us ye skilled to save my we.
तुर्याम दस्यून तनूभिः|	subdue the dasyus we ourselves.
मा कस्याद्भुतक्रतू यक्षम भुजेमा तनूभिः|	or neer may we o wondrous strong enjoy anothers solemn feast.
मा शेषसा मा तनसा|	ourselves our sons or progeny.
अछा वद तवसं गीर्भिर आभि सतुहि पर्जन्यं नमसा विवास|	sing with these songs thy welcome to the mighty with adoration praise and call parjanya.
कनिक्रदद वर्षभो जीरदानू रेतो दधात्य ओषधीषु गर्भम|	the bull loud roaring swift to send his bounty lays in the plants the seed for germination.
वि वर्क्षान हन्त्य उत हन्ति रक्षसो विश्वम बिभाय भुवनम महावधात|	he smites the trees apart he slays the demons all life fears him who wields the mighty weapon.
उतानागा ईषते वर्ष्ण्यावतो यत पर्जन्य सतनयन हन्ति दुष्क्र्तः|	from him exceeding strong fices een the guiltless when thundering parjanya smites the wicked.
रथीव कशयाश्वां अभिक्षिपन्न आविर दूतान कर्णुते वर्ष्य्रं अह|	like a cardriver whipping on his horses he makes the messengers of rain spring forward.
दूरात सिंहस्य सतनथा उद ईरते यत पर्जन्यः कर्णुते वर्ष्यं नभः|	far off resounds the roaring of the lion what time parjanya fills the sky with raincloud.
पर वाता वान्ति पतयन्ति विद्युत उद ओषधीर जिहते पिन्वते सवः|	forth burst the winds down come the lightningflashes the plants shoot up the realm of light is streaming.
इरा विश्वस्मै भुवनाय जायते यत पर्जन्यः पर्थिवीं रेतसावति|	food springs abundant for all living creatures what time parjanya quickens earth with moisture.
यस्य वरते पर्थिवी नन्नमीति यस्य वरते शफवज जर्भुरीति|	thou at whose bidding earth bows low before thee at whose command hoofed cattle fly in terror.
यस्य वरत ओषधीर विश्वरूपाः स नः पर्जन्य महि शर्म यछ|	at whose behest the plants assume all colours even thou parjanya yield us great protection.
दिवो नो वर्ष्टिम मरुतो ररीध्वम पर पिन्वत वर्ष्णो अश्वस्य धाराः|	send down for us the rain of heaven ye maruts and let the stallions flood descend in torrents.
अर्वाङ एतेन सतनयित्नुनेह्य अपो निषिञ्चन्न असुरः पिता नः|	come hither with this thunder while thou pourest the waters down our heavenly lord and father.
अभि करन्द सतनय गर्भम आ धा उदन्वता परि दीया रथेन|	thunder and roar the germ of life deposit fly round us on thy chariot waterladen.
दर्तिं सु कर्ष विषितं नयञ्चं समा भवन्तूद्वतो निपादाः|	thine opened waterskin draw with thee downward and let the hollows and the heights be level.
महान्तं कोशम उद अचा नि षिञ्च सयन्दन्तां कुल्या विषिताः पुरस्तात|	lift up the mighty vessel pour down water and let the liberated streams rush forward.
घर्तेन दयावाप्र्थिवी वय उन्धि सुप्रपाणम भवत्व अघ्न्याभ्यः|	saturate both the earth and heaven with fatness and for the cows let there be drink abundant.
यत पर्जन्य कनिक्रदत सतनयन हंसि दुष्क्र्तः|	when thou with thunder and with roar parjanya smitest sinners down.
परतीदं विश्वम मोदते यत किं च पर्थिव्याम अधि|	this universe exults thereat yea all that is upon the earth.
अवर्षीर वर्षम उद उ षू गर्भायाकर धन्वान्य अत्येतवा उ|	thou hast poured down the rainflood now withhold it thou hast made desert places fit for travel.
अजीजन ओषधीर भोजनाय कम उत परजाभ्यो ऽविदो मनीषाम|	thou hast made herbs to grow for our enjoyment yea thou hast won thee praise from living creatures.
पर विश्वसामन्न अत्रिवद अर्चा पावकशोचिषे|	like atri viśvasāman sing to him of purifying light.
यो अध्वरेष्व ईड्यो होता मन्द्रतमो विशि|	who must be praised in holy rites the priest most welcome in the house.
नय अग्निं जातवेदसं दधाता देवम रत्विजम|	set jātavedas in his place agni the god and minister.
पर यज्ञ एत्व आनुषग अद्या देवव्यचस्तमः|	let sacrifice proceed today duly comprising all the gods.
चिकित्विन्मनसं तवा देवम मर्तास ऊतये|	all mortals come to thee for aid the god of most observant mind.
वरेण्यस्य ते ऽवस इयानासो अमन्महि|	of thine excelling favour we bethink us as we long for it.
अग्ने चिकिद्ध्य अस्य न इदं वचः सहस्य|	mark with attention this our speech o agni thou victorious one.
तं तवा सुशिप्र दम्पते सतोमैर वर्धन्त्य अत्रयो गीर्भिः शुम्भन्त्य अत्रयः|	thee strongjawed as the homesteads lord the atris with their lauds exalt the atris beautify with songs.
तवम अग्ने वरुणो जायसे यत तवम मित्रो भवसि यत समिद्धः|	thou at thy birth art varuṇa o agni when thou art kindled thou becomest mitra.
तवे विश्वे सहसस पुत्र देवास तवम इन्द्रो दाशुषे मर्त्याय|	in thee o son of strength all gods are centred indra art thou to man who brings oblation.
तवम अर्यमा भवसि यत कनीनां नाम सवधावन गुह्यम बिभर्षि|	aryaman art thou as regardeth maidens mysterious is thy name o selfsustainer.
अञ्जन्ति मित्रं सुधितं न गोभिर यद दम्पती समनसा कर्णोषि|	as a kind friend with streams of milk they balm thee what time thou makest wife and lord oneminded.
तव शरिये मरुतो मर्जयन्त रुद्र यत ते जनिम चारु चित्रम|	the maruts deck their beauty for thy glory yea rudra for thy birth fair brightlycoloured.
पदं यद विष्णोर उपमं निधायि तेन पासि गुह्यं नाम गोनाम|	that which was fixed as viṣṇus loftiest stationtherewith the secret of the cows thou guardest.
तव शरिया सुद्र्शो देव देवाः पुरू दधाना अम्र्तं सपन्त|	gods through thy glory god who art so lovely granting abundant gifts gained life immortal.
होतारम अग्निम मनुषो नि षेदुर दशस्यन्त उशिजः शंसम आयोः|	as their own priest have men established agni and serve him fain for praise from him who liveth.
न तवद धोता पूर्वो अग्ने यजीयान न काव्यैः परो अस्ति सवधावः|	there is no priest more skilled than thou in worship none selfsustainer pass thee in wisdom.
विशश च यस्या अतिथिर भवासि स यज्ञेन वनवद देव मर्तान|	the man within whose house as guest thou dwellest o god by sacrifice shall conquer mortals.
वयम अग्ने वनुयाम तवोता वसूयवो हविषा बुध्यमानाः|	aided by thee o agni may we conquer through our oblation fain for wealth awakened.
वयं समर्ये विदथेष्व अह्नां वयं राया सहसस पुत्र मर्तान|	may we in battle in the days assemblies o son of strength by riches conquer mortals.
यो न आगो अभ्य एनो भरात्य अधीद अघम अघशंसे दधात|	he shall bring evil on the evilplotter whoever turns against us sin and outrage.
जही चिकित्वो अभिशस्तिम एताम अग्ने यो नो मर्चयति दवयेन|	destroy this calumny of him o agni whoever injures us with doubledealing.
तवाम अस्या वयुषि देव पूर्वे दूतं कर्ण्वाना अयजन्त हव्यैः|	at this dawns flushing god our ancient fathers served thee with offerings making thee their envoy.
संस्थे यद अग्न ईयसे रयीणां देवो मर्तैर वसुभिर इध्यमानः|	when agni to the store of wealth thou goest a god enkindled with good things by mortals.
अव सप्र्धि पितरं योधि विद्वान पुत्रो यस ते सहसः सून ऊहे|	save thou who knowest draw thy father near thee who counts as thine own son o child of power.
कदा चिकित्वो अभि चक्षसे नो ऽगने कदां रतचिद यातयासे|	o sapient agni when wilt thou regard us when skilled in holy law wilt thou direct us.
भूरि नाम वन्दमानो दधाति पिता वसो यदि तज जोषयासे|	adoring thee he gives thee many a title when thou good lord acceptest this as father.
कुविद देवस्य सहसा चकानः सुम्नम अग्निर वनते वाव्र्धानः|	and doth not agni glad in strength of godhead gain splendid bliss when he hath waxen mighty.
तवम अङग जरितारं यविष्ठ विश्वान्य अग्ने दुरिताति पर्षि|	most youthful agni verily thou bearest thy praiser safely over all his troubles.
सतेना अद्र्श्रन रिपवो जनासो ऽजञातकेता वर्जिना अभूवन|	thieves have been seen by us and open foemen unknown have been the plottings of the wicked.
इमे यामासस तवद्रिग अभूवन वसवे वा तद इद आगो अवाचि|	to thee these eulogies have been directed or to the vasu hath this sin been spoken.
नाहायम अग्निर अभिशस्तये नो न रीषते वाव्र्धानः परा दात|	but this our agni flaming high shall never yield us to calumny to him who wrongs us.
तवाम अग्ने हविष्मन्तो देवम मर्तास ईळते|	bearing oblations mortal men o agni worship thee the god.
मन्ये तवा जातवेदसं स हव्या वक्ष्य आनुषक|	i deem thee jātavedas bear our offerings thou unceasingly.
अग्निर होता दास्वतः कषयस्य वर्क्तबर्हिषः|	in the mans home who offers gifts where grass is trimmed agni is priest.
सं यज्ञासश चरन्ति यं सं वाजासः शरवस्यवः|	to whom all sacrifices come and strengthenings that win renown.
उत सम यं शिशुं यथा नवं जनिष्टारणी|	whom as an infant newlyborn the kindlingsticks have brought to life.
धर्तारम मानुषीणां विशाम अग्निं सवध्वरम|	sustainer of the tribes of men skilled in wellordered sacrifice.
उत सम दुर्ग्र्भीयसे पुत्रो न हवार्याणाम|	yea very hard art thou to grasp like offspring of the wriggling snakes.
पुरू यो दग्धासि वनाग्ने पशुर न यवसे|	when thou consumest many woods like an ox agni in the mead.
अध सम यस्यार्चयः सम्यक संयन्ति धूमिनः|	whose flames when thou art sending forth the smoke completely reach the mark.
यद ईम अह तरितो दिव्य उप धमातेव धमति शिशीते धमातरी यथा|	when tṛta in the height of heaven like as a smelter fanneth thee een as a smelter sharpeneth thee.
तवाहम अग्न ऊतिभिर मित्रस्य च परशस्तिभिः|	o agni by thy succour and by mitras friendly furtherance.
दवेषोयुतो न दुरिता तुर्याम मर्त्यानाम|	may we averting hate subdue the wickedness of mortal men.
तं नो अग्ने अभी नरो रयिं सहस्व आ भर|	o agni to our heroes bring such riches thou victorious god.
स कषेपयत स पोषयद भुवद वाजस्य सातय उतैधि पर्त्सु नो वर्धे|	may he protect and nourish us and help in gaining strength be thou near us in fight for our success.
पर वो मित्राय गायत वरुणाय विपा गिरा|	sing forth unto your varuṇa and mitra with a song inspired.
महिक्षत्राव रतम बर्हत|	they mighty lords are lofty law.
सम्राजा या घर्तयोनी मित्रश चोभा वरुणश च|	full springs of fatness sovran kings mitra and varuṇa the twain.
देवा देवेषु परशस्ता|	gods glorified among the gods.
ता नः शक्तम पार्थिवस्य महो रायो दिव्यस्य|	so help ye us to riches great terrestrial and celestial wealth.
महि वां कषत्रं देवेषु|	vast is your sway among the gods.
