रतम रतेन सपन्तेषिरं दक्षम आशाते|	carefully tending law with law they have attained their vigorous might.
अद्रुहा देवौ वर्धेते|	the two gods wax devoid of guile.
वर्ष्टिद्यावा रीत्य्र्पेषस पती दानुमत्याः|	with rainy skies and streaming floods lords of the strength that bringeth gifts.
बर्हन्तं गर्तम आशाते|	a lofty seat have they attained.
अभ्य अवस्थाः पर जायन्ते पर वव्रेर वव्रिश चिकेत|	one state begets another state husk is made visible from husk.
उपस्थे मातुर वि चष्टे|	within his mothers side he speaks.
जुहुरे वि चितयन्तो ऽनिमिषं नर्म्णम पान्ति|	discerning have they offered gifts they guard the strength that never wastes.
आ दर्ळ्हाम पुरं विविशुः|	to a strong fort have they pressed in.
आ शवैत्रेयस्य जन्तवो दयुमद वर्धन्त कर्ष्टयः|	Śvaitreyas people all his men have gloriously increased in might.
निष्कग्रीवो बर्हदुक्थ एना मध्वा न वाजयुः|	a gold chain bṛhaduktha wears as through this soma seeking spoil.
परियं दुग्धं न काम्यम अजामि जाम्योः सचा|	i bring as twere the longedfor milk the dear milk of the sisterpair.
घर्मो न वाजजठरो ऽदब्धः शश्वतो दभः|	like to a caldron filled with food is he unconquered conquering all.
करीळन नो रश्म आ भुवः सम भस्मना वायुना वेविदानः|	beam of light come to us in sportive fashion finding thyself close to the wind that fans thee.
ता अस्य सन धर्षजो न तिग्माः सुसंशिता वक्ष्यो वक्षणेस्थाः|	these flames of his are wasting flames like arrows keenpointed sharpened on his breast.
वरुणं वो रिशादसम रचा मित्रं हवामहे|	you foemanslaying varuṇa and mitra we invoke with song.
परि वरजेव बाह्वोर जगन्वांसा सवर्णरम|	who as with penfold of your arms encompass round the realm of light.
ता बाहवा सुचेतुना पर यन्तम अस्मा अर्चते|	stretch out your arms with favouring love unto this man who singeth hymns.
शेवं हि जार्यं वां विश्वासु कषासु जोगुवे|	for in all places is sung forth your evergracious friendliness.
यन नूनम अश्यां गतिम मित्रस्य यायाम पथा|	that i may gain a refuge now may my steps be on mitras path.
अस्य परियस्य शर्मण्य अहिंसानस्य सश्चिरे|	men go protected in the charge of this dear friend who harms us not.
युवाभ्याम मित्रावरुणोपमं धेयाम रचा|	mitra and varuṇa from you may i by song win noblest meed.
यद ध कषये मघोनां सतोत्णां च सपूर्धसे|	that shall stir envy in the homes of wealthy chiefs and those who praise.
आ नो मित्र सुदीतिभिर वरुणश च सधस्थ आ|	with your fair splendours varuṇa and mitra to our gathering come.
सवे कषये मघोनां सखीनां च वर्धसे|	that in their homes the wealthy chiefs and they who are your friends may thrive.
युवं नो येषु वरुण कषत्रम बर्हच च बिभ्र्थः|	with those moreover among whom ye hold your high supremacy.
उरु णो वाजसातये कर्तं राये सवस्तये|	vouchsafe us room that we may win strength for prosperity and wealth.
उछन्त्याम मे यजता देवक्षत्रे रुशद्गवि|	when morning flushes holy ones in the gods realm where white cows shine.
सुतं सोमं न हस्तिभिर आ पड्भिर धावतं नरा बिभ्रताव अर्चनानसम|	supporting arcananas speed ye heroes with your active feet hither to my pressed soma juice.
अश्विनाव एह गछतं नासत्या मा वि वेनतम|	ye aśvins hither come to us nāsatyas be not disinclined.
हंसाव इव पततम आ सुतां उप|	fly hither like two swans unto the juice we shed.
अश्विना हरिणाव इव गौराव इवानु यवसम|	o aśvins like a pair of deer like two wild cattle to the mead.
हंसाव इव पततम आ सुतां उप|	fly hither like two swans unto the juice we shed.
अश्विना वाजिनीवसू जुषेथां यज्ञम इष्टये|	o aśvins rich in gifts accept our sacrifice to prosper it.
हंसाव इव पततम आ सुतां उप|	fly hither like two swans unto the juice we shed.
अत्रिर यद वाम अवरोहन्न रबीसम अजोहवीन नाधमानेव योषा|	as atri when descending to the cavern called on you loudly like a wailing woman.
शयेनस्य चिज जवसा नूतनेनागछतम अश्विना शंतमेन|	ye came to him o aśvins with the freshest and most auspicious fleetness of a falcon.
वि जिहीष्व वनस्पते योनिः सूष्यन्त्या इव|	tree part asunder like the side of her who bringeth forth a child.
शरुतम मे अश्विना हवं सप्तवध्रिं च मुञ्चतम|	ye aśvins listen to my call loose saptavadhri from his bonds.
भीताय नाधमानाय रषये सप्तवध्रये|	for saptavadhri for the seer affrighted when he wept and wailed.
मायाभिर अश्विना युवं वर्क्षं सं च वि चाचथः|	ye aśvins with your magic powers rent up the tree and shattered it.
यथा वातः पुष्करिणीं समिङगयति सर्वतः|	like as the wind on every side ruffles a pool of lotuses.
एवा ते गर्भ एजतु निरैतु दशमास्यः|	so stir in thee the babe unborn so may the tenmonth babe descend.
यथा वातो यथा वनं यथा समुद्र एजति|	like as the wind like as the wood like as the sea is set astir.
एवा तवं दशमास्य सहावेहि जरायुणा|	so also tenmonth babe descend together with the afterbirth.
दश मासाञ छशयानः कुमारो अधि मातरि|	the child who hath for ten months time been lying in his mothers side.
निरैतु जीवो अक्षतो जीवो जीवन्त्या अधि|	may he come forth alive unharmed yea living from the living dame.
पर व सपळ अक्रन सुविताय दावने ऽरचा दिवे पर पर्थिव्या रतम भरे|	your spy hath called to you to give prosperity i sing to heaven and earth and offer sacrifice.
उक्षन्ते अश्वान तरुषन्त आ रजो ऽनु सवम भानुं शरथयन्ते अर्णवैः|	they bathe their steeds and hasten through the firmament they spread abroad their radiance through the sea of cloud.
अमाद एषाम भियसा भूमिर एजति नौर न पूर्णा कषरति वयथिर यती|	earth shakes and reels in terror at their onward rush like a full ship which quivering lets the water in.
दूरेद्र्शो ये चितयन्त एमभिर अन्तर महे विदथे येतिरे नरः|	marked on their ways are they visible from afar the heroes press between in mighty armament.
गवाम इव शरियसे शर्ङगम उत्तमं सूर्यो न चक्षू रजसो विसर्जने|	as the exalted horn of bulls for splendid might as the suns eye set in the firmaments expanse.
अत्या इव सुभ्वश चारव सथन मर्या इव शरियसे चेतथा नरः|	like vigorous horses ye are beauteous to behold and for your glory show like bridegrooms o ye men.
को वो महान्ति महताम उद अश्नवत कस काव्या मरुतः को ह पौंस्या|	who o ye maruts may attain the mighty lore of you the mighty who may reach your manly deeds.
यूयं ह भूमिं किरणं न रेजथ पर यद भरध्वे सुविताय दावने|	ye verily make earth tremble like a ray of light what time ye bring your boons to give prosperity.
अश्वा इवेद अरुषासः सबन्धवः शूरा इव परयुधः परोत युयुधुः|	like steeds of ruddy colour scions of one race as foremost champions they have battled in the van.
मर्या इव सुव्र्धो वाव्र्धुर नरः सूर्यस्य चक्षुः पर मिनन्ति वर्ष्टिभिः|	the heroes have waxed strong like we1grown manly youths with floods of rain they make the suns eye fade away.
ते अज्येष्ठा अकनिष्ठास उद्भिदो ऽमध्यमासो महसा वि वाव्र्धुः|	having no eldest and no youngest in their band no middlomost preeminent they have waxed in might.
सुजातासो जनुषा पर्श्निमातरो दिवो मर्या आ नो अछा जिगातन|	these sons of pṛśni sprung of noble ancestry come hitberward to us ye bridegrooms of the sky.
वयो न ये शरेणीः पप्तुर ओजसान्तान दिवो बर्हतः सानुनस परि|	like birds of air they flew with might in lengthened lines from heavens high ridges to the borders of the sky.
अश्वास एषाम उभये यथा विदुः पर पर्वतस्य नभनूंर अचुच्यवुः|	the steeds who carry them as gods and mortals know have caused the waters of the mounuains to desgend.
मिमातु दयौर अदितिर वीतये नः सं दानुचित्रा उषसो यतन्ताम|	may dyaus the infinite roar for our banquet may dawns toil for us glittering with moisture.
आचुच्यवुर दिव्यं कोशम एत रषे रुद्रस्य मरुतो गर्णानाः|	lauded by thee these maruts sons o rudra o Ṛṣi have sent down the heavenly treasure.
ईळे अग्निं सववसं नमोभिर इह परसत्तो वि चयत कर्तं नः|	i laud with reverence the gracious agni here may he sit and part our meed among us.
रथैर इव पर भरे वाजयद्भिः परदक्षिणिन मरुतां सतोमम रध्याम|	as with spoilseeking cars i bring oblation turned rightward i will swell the maruts praisesong.
आ ये तस्थुः पर्षतीषु शरुतासु सुखेषु रुद्रा मरुतो रथेषु|	the maruts yea the rudras who have mounted their famous spotted deer and cars swiftmoving.
वना चिद उग्रा जिहते नि वो भिया पर्थिवी चिद रेजते पर्वतश चित|	before you fierce ones woods bow down in terror earth even the mountain trembles at your coming.
पर्वतश चिन महि वर्द्धो बिभाय दिवश चित सानु रेजत सवने वः|	though vast and tall the mountain is affrighted the height of heaven is shaken at your roaring.
यत करीळथ मरुत रष्टिमन्त आप इव सध्र्यञ्चो धवध्वे|	when armed with lances ye are sporting maruts and rush along together like the waters.
वरा इवेद रैवतासो हिरण्यैर अभि सवधाभिस तन्वः पिपिश्रे|	they like young suitors sons of wealthy houses have with their golden natures decked their bodies.
शरिये शरेयांसस तवसो रथेषु सत्रा महांसि चक्रिरे तनूषु|	strong on their cars the lordly ones for glory have set their splendours on their forms for ever.
अज्येष्ठासो अकनिष्ठास एते सम भरातरो वाव्र्धुः सौभगाय|	none being eldest none among them youngest as brothers they have grown to happy fortune.
युवा पिता सवपा रुद्र एषां सुदुघा पर्श्निः सुदिना मरुद्भ्यः|	may their sire rudra young and deft and pṛśni pouring much milk bring fair days to the maruts.
यद उत्तमे मरुतो मध्यमे वा यद वावमे सुभगासो दिवि षठ|	whether o blessed maruts ye be dwelling in highest midmost or in lowest heaven.
अतो नो रुद्रा उत वा नव अस्याग्ने वित्ताद धविषो यद यजाम|	thence o ye rudras and thou also agni notice the sacrificial food we offer.
अग्निश च यन मरुतो विश्ववेदसो दिवो वहध्व उत्तराद अधि षणुभिः|	o maruts lords of all when agni and when ye drive downward from sublimest heaven along the heights.
ते मन्दसाना धुनयो रिशादसो वामं धत्त यजमानाय सुन्वते|	shakers of all rejoicing slayers of the foe give riches to the somapressing worshipper.
अग्ने मरुद्भिः शुभयद्भिर रक्वभिः सोमम पिब मन्दसानो गणश्रिभिः|	o agni with the maruts as they gleam and sing gathered in troop rejoicing drink the soma juice.
पावकेभिर विश्वमिन्वेभिर आयुभिर वैश्वानर परदिवा केतुना सजूः|	with these the living ones who cleanse and further all joined with thy banner o vaiśvānara from of old.
कूष्ठो देवाव अश्विनाद्या दिवो मनावसू|	where in the heavens are ye today gods aśvins rich in constancy.
तच छरवथो वर्षण्वसू अत्रिर वाम आ विवासति|	hear this ye excellent as steers atri inviteth you to come.
कुह तया कुह नु शरुता दिवि देवा नासत्या|	where are they now where are the twain the famed nāsatyas gods in heaven.
कस्मिन्न आ यतथो जने को वां नदीनां सचा|	who is the man ye strive to reach who of your suppliants is with you.
कं याथः कं ह गछथः कम अछा युञ्जाथे रथम|	whom do ye visit whom approach to whom direct your harnessed car.
कस्य बरह्माणि रण्यथो वयं वाम उश्मसीष्टये|	with whose devotions are ye pleased we long for you to further us.
पौरं चिद धय उदप्रुतम पौर पौराय जिन्वथः|	ye strengtheners for paura stir the filler swimming in the flood.
यद ईं गर्भीततातये सिंहम इव दरुहस पदे|	advancing to be captured like a lion to the ambuscade.
पर चयवानाज जुजुरुषो वव्रिम अत्कं न मुञ्चथः|	ye from cyavana worn with age removed his skin as twere a robe.
युवा यदी कर्थः पुनर आ कामम रण्वे वध्वः|	so when ye made him young again he stirred the longing of a dame.
अस्ति हि वाम इह सतोता समसि वां संद्र्शि शरिये|	here is the man who lauds you both to see your glory are we here.
नू शरुतम म आ गतम अवोभिर वाजिनीवसू|	now bear me come with saving help ye who are rich in store of wealth.
को वाम अद्य पुरूणाम आ वव्ने मर्त्यानाम|	who among many mortal men this day hath won you to himself.
को विप्रो विप्रवाहसा को यज्ञैर वाजिनीवसू|	what bard accepters of the bard who rich in wealth with sacrifice.
आ वां रथो रथानां येष्ठो यात्व अश्विना|	o aśvins may your car approach most excellent of cars for speed.
पुरू चिद अस्मयुस तिर आङगूषो मर्त्येष्व आ|	through many regions may our praise pass onward among mortal men.
शम ऊ षु वाम मधूयुवास्माकम अस्तु चर्क्र्तिः|	may our laudation of you twain lovers of meath be sweet to you.
अर्वाचीना विचेतसा विभिः शयेनेव दीयतम|	fly hitherward ye wise of heart like falcons with your winged steeds.
अश्विना यद ध कर्हि चिच छुश्रूयातम इमं हवम|	o aśvins when at any time ye listen to this call of mine.
वस्वीर ऊ षु वाम भुजः पर्ञ्चन्ति सु वाम पर्चः|	for you is dainty food prepared they mix refreshing food for you.
सखायः सं वः सम्यञ्चम इषं सतोमं चाग्नये|	offer to agni o my friends your seemly food your seemly praise.
वर्षिष्ठाय कषितीनाम ऊर्जो नप्त्रे सहस्वते|	to him supremest oer the folk the son of strength the mighty lord.
कुत्रा चिद यस्य सम्र्तौ रण्वा नरो नर्षदने|	him in whose presence when they meet in full assembly men rejoice.
अर्हन्तश चिद यम इन्धते संजनयन्ति जन्तवः|	even him whom worthy ones inflame and living creatures bring to life.
सं यद इषो वनामहे सं हव्या मानुषाणाम|	when we present to him the food and sacrificial gifts of men.
उत दयुम्नस्य शवस रतस्य रश्मिम आ ददे|	he by the might of splendour grasps the holy ordinances rein.
स समा कर्णोति केतुम आ नक्तं चिद दूर आ सते|	he gives a signal in the night even to him who is afar.
पावको यद वनस्पतीन पर समा मिनात्य अजरः|	when he the bright unchanged by eld consumes the sovrans of the wood.
अव सम यस्य वेषणे सवेदम पथिषु जुह्वति|	he in whose service on the ways they offer up their drops of sweat.
अभीम अह सवजेन्यम भूमा पर्ष्ठेव रुरुहुः|	on him is their high kin have they mounted as ridges on the earth.
यम मर्त्यः पुरुस्प्र्हं विदद विश्वस्य धायसे|	whom sought of many mortal man hath found to be the stay of all.
पर सवादनम पितूनाम अस्ततातिं चिद आयवे|	he who gives flavour to our food the home of every man that lives.
स हि षमा धन्वाक्षितं दाता न दात्य आ पशुः|	even as a herd that crops the grass he shears the field and wilderness.
हिरिश्मश्रुः शुचिदन्न रभुर अनिभ्र्ष्टतविषिः|	with flashing teeth and beard of gold deft with his unabated might.
शुचिः षमा यस्मा अत्रिवत पर सवधितीव रीयते|	for him to whom bright as an axe he as to atri hath flashed forth.
सुषूर असूत माता कराणा यद आनशे भगम|	hath the wellbearing mother borne producing when her time is come.
आ यस ते सर्पिरासुते ऽगने शम अस्ति धायसे|	agni to whom the oil is shed by him thou lovest to support.
ऐषु दयुम्नम उत शरव आ चित्तम मर्त्येषु धाः|	bestow upon these mortals fame and splendour and intelligence.
इति चिन मन्युम अध्रिजस तवादातम आ पशुं ददे|	such zeal hath he resistless one he gained the cattle given by thee.
आद अग्ने अप्र्णतो ऽतरिः सासह्याद दस्यून इषः सासह्यान नॄन|	agni may atri overcome the dasyus who bestow no gifts subdue the men who give no food.
इन्द्रो रथाय परवतं कर्णोति यम अध्यस्थान मघवा वाजयन्तम|	maghavan indra turns his chariot downward the strengthdisplaying car which he hath mounted.
यूथेव पश्वो वय उनोति गोपा अरिष्टो याति परथमः सिषासन|	even as a herdsman driveth forth his cattle he goeth first uninjured fain for treasure.
आ पर दरव हरिवो मा वि वेनः पिशङगराते अभि नः सचस्व|	haste to us lord of bays be not ungracious visit us lover of goldhued oblation.
नहि तवद इन्द्र वस्यो अन्यद अस्त्य अमेनांश चिज जनिवतश चकर्थ|	there is naught else better than thou art indra een to the wifeless hast thou given spouses.
उद यत सहः सहस आजनिष्ट देदिष्ट इन्द्र इन्द्रियाणि विश्वा|	when out of strength arose the strength that conquers indra displayed all powers that he possesses.
पराचोदयत सुदुघा वव्रे अन्तर वि जयोतिषा संवव्र्त्वत तमो ऽवः|	forth from the cave he drove the milky mothers and with the light laid bare investing darkness.
अनवस ते रथम अश्वाय तक्षन तवष्टा वज्रम पुरुहूत दयुमन्तम|	anus have wrought a chariot for thy courser and tvaṣṭar muchinvoked thy bolt that glitters.
बरह्माण इन्द्रम महयन्तो अर्कैर अवर्धयन्न अहये हन्तवा उ|	the brahmans with their songs exalting indra increased his strength that he might slaughter ahi.
वर्ष्णे यत ते वर्षणो अर्कम अर्चान इन्द्र गरावाणो अदितिः सजोषाः|	when heroes sang their laud to thee the hero indra and stones and aditi accordant.
अनश्वासो ये पवयो ऽरथा इन्द्रेषिता अभ्य अवर्तन्त दस्यून|	without or steed or chariot were the fellies which sped by indra rolled upon the dasytis.
पर ते पूर्वाणि करणानि वोचम पर नूतना मघवन या चकर्थ|	i will declare thine exploits wrought aforetime and maghavan thy deeds of late achievement.
शक्तीवो यद विभरा रोदसी उभे जयन्न अपो मनवे दानुचित्राः|	when lord of might thou sunderedst earth and heaven winning for man the moistlygleaming waters.
तद इन नु ते करणं दस्म विप्राहिं यद घनन्न ओजो अत्रामिमीथाः|	this is thy deed een this wonderful singer that slaying ahi here thy strength thou showedst.
शुष्णस्य चित परि माया अग्र्भ्णाः परपित्वं यन्न अप दस्यूंर असेधः|	didst check and stay een gusnas wiles and magic and drawing nigh didst chase away the dasytis.
तवम अपो यदवे तुर्वशायारमयः सुदुघाः पार इन्द्र|	thou indra on the farther bank foryadu and turvaga didst stay the gushing waters.
उग्रम अयातम अवहो ह कुत्सं सं ह यद वाम उशनारन्त देवाः|	ye both assailed the fierce thou barest kutsa when gods and uśanā came to you together.
इन्द्राकुत्सा वहमाना रथेना वाम अत्या अपि कर्णे वहन्तु|	let the steeds bring you both indra and kutsa borne on the chariot within hearingdistance.
निः षीम अद्भ्यो धमथो निः षधस्थान मघोनो हर्दो वरथस तमांसि|	ye blew him from the waters from his dwelling and chased the darkness from the nobles spirit.
वातस्य युक्तान सुयुजश चिद अश्वान कविश चिद एषो अजगन्न अवस्युः|	even this sage hath come looking for succour even to vātas docile harnessed horses.
विश्वे ते अत्र मरुतः सखाय इन्द्र बरह्माणि तविषीम अवर्धन|	here are the maruts all thy dear companions prayers have increased thy power and might o indra.
सूरश चिद रथम परितक्म्यायाम पूर्वं करद उपरं जूजुवांसम|	when night was near its close he carried forward een the suns chariot backward in its running.
भरच चक्रम एतशः सं रिणाति पुरो दधत सनिष्यति करतुं नः|	etaga brought his wheel and firmly stays it setting it eastward he shall give us courage.
आयं जना अभिचक्षे जगामेन्द्रः सखायं सुतसोमम इछन|	this indra o ye men hath come to see you seeking a friend who hath expressed the soma.
वदन गरावाव वेदिम भरियाते यस्य जीरम अध्वर्यवश चरन्ति|	the creaking stone is laid upon the altar and the adhvaryus come to turn it quickly.
ये चाकनन्त चाकनन्त नू ते मर्ता अम्र्त मो ते अंह आरन|	let mortals who were happy still be happy let them not come to sorrow o immortal.
वावन्धि यज्यूंर उत तेषु धेह्य ओजो जनेषु येषु ते सयाम|	love thou the pious and to these thy peoplewith whom may we be numberedgive thou vigour.
पर शयावाश्व धर्ष्णुयार्चा मरुद्भिर रक्वभिः|	sing boldly forth Śyāvāśva with the maruts who are loud in song.
ये अद्रोघम अनुष्वधं शरवो मदन्ति यज्ञियाः|	who holy as their wont is joy in glory that is free from guile.
ते हि सथिरस्य शवसः सखायः सन्ति धर्ष्णुया|	for in their boldness they are friends of firm and sure heroic strength.
ते यामन्न आ धर्षद्विनस तमना पान्ति शश्वतः|	they in their course boldspirited guard all men of their own accord.
ते सयन्द्रासो नोक्षणो ऽति षकन्दन्ति शर्वरीः|	like steers in rapid motion they advance and overtake the nights.
मरुताम अधा महो दिवि कषमा च मन्महे|	and thus the maruts power in heaven and on the earth we celebrate.
मरुत्सु वो दधीमहि सतोमं यज्ञं च धर्ष्णुया|	with boldness to your maruts let us offer laud and sacrifice.
विश्वे ये मानुषा युगा पान्ति मर्त्यं रिषः|	who all through ages of mankind guard mortal man from injury.
अर्हन्तो ये सुदानवो नरो असामिशवसः|	praiseworthy givers of good gifts heroes with full and perfect strength.
पर यज्ञं यज्ञियेभ्यो दिवो अर्चा मरुद्भ्यः|	to maruts holy ones of heaven will i extol the sacrifice.
आ रुक्मैर आ युधा नर रष्वा रष्टीर अस्र्क्षत|	the lofty heroes cast their spears and weapons bright with gleaming gold.
अन्व एनां अह विद्युतो मरुतो जज्झतीर इव भानुर अर्त तमना दिवः|	after these maruts followed close like laughing lightning from the sky a splendour of its own accord.
ये वाव्र्धन्त पार्थिवा य उराव अन्तरिक्ष आ|	they who waxed mighty of the earth they who are in the wide midair.
वर्जने वा नदीनां सधस्थे वा महो दिवः|	or in the rivers compass or in the abode of ample heaven.
शर्धो मारुतम उच छंस सत्यशवसम रभ्वसम|	praise thou the maruts company the valorous and truly strong.
उत सम ते शुभे नरः पर सयन्द्रा युजत तमना|	the heroes hasting by themselves have yoked their deer for victory.
उत सम ते परुष्ण्याम ऊर्णा वसत शुन्ध्यवः|	fairgleaming on paruṣṇī they have clothed themselves in robes of wool.
उत पव्या रथानाम अद्रिम भिन्दन्त्य ओजसा|	and with their chariot tires they cleave the rock asunder in their might.
आपथयो विपथयो ऽनतस्पथा अनुपथाः|	whether as wanderers from the way or speeders on or to the path.
एतेभिर मह्यं नामभिर यज्ञं विष्टार ओहते|	under these names the spreading band tend well the sacrifice for me.
अधा नरो नय ओहते ऽधा नियुत ओहते|	to this the heroes well attend well do their teams attend to this.
अधा पारावता इति चित्रा रूपाणि दर्श्या|	visible are their varied forms behold they are paravatas.
छन्दस्तुभः कुभन्यव उत्सम आ कीरिणो नर्तुः|	hymnsinging seeking water they praising have danced about the spring.
ते मे के चिन न तायव ऊमा आसन दर्शि तविषे|	what are they unto me no thieves but helpers splendid to behold.
य रष्वा रष्टिविद्युतः कवयः सन्ति वेधसः|	sublime with lightnings for their spears sages and orderers are they.
तम रषे मारुतं गणं नमस्या रमया गिरा|	Ṛṣi adore that marut host and make them happy with thy song.
अछ रषे मारुतं गणं दाना मित्रं न योषणा|	Ṛṣi invite the marut band with offerings as a maid her friend.
दिवो वा धर्ष्णव ओजसा सतुता धीभिर इषण्यत|	from heaven too bold ones in your might haste hither glorified with songs.
नू मन्वान एषां देवां अछा न वक्षणा|	thinking of these now let him come as with the escort of the gods.
दाना सचेत सूरिभिर यामश्रुतेभिर अञ्जिभिः|	and with the splendid princes famed for rapid courses to the gifts.
पर ये मे बन्ध्वेषे गां वोचन्त सूरयः पर्श्निं वोचन्त मातरम|	princes who when i asked their kin named pṛśni as their mothercow.
अधा पितरम इष्मिणं रुद्रं वोचन्त शिक्वसः|	and the impetuous rudra they the mighty ones declared their sire.
सप्त मे सप्त शाकिन एकमएका शता ददुः|	the mighty ones the seven times seven have singly given me hundred gifts.
यमुनायाम अधि शरुतम उद राधो गव्यम मर्जे नि राधो अश्व्यम मर्जे|	i have obtained on yamuna famed wealth in kine and wealth in steeds.
अजातशत्रुम अजरा सवर्वत्य अनु सवधामिता दस्मम ईयते|	boundless and wasting not the heavenly food of gods goes to the foeless one doer of wondrous deeds.
सुनोतन पचत बरह्मवाहसे पुरुष्टुताय परतरं दधातन|	press out make ready offer gifts with special zeal to him whom many laud accepter of the prayer.
आ यः सोमेन जठरम अपिप्रतामन्दत मघवा मध्वो अन्धसः|	he who filled full his belly with the somas juice maghavan was delighted with the meaths sweet draught.
यद ईम मर्गाय हन्तवे महावधः सहस्रभ्र्ष्टिम उशना वधं यमत|	when uśanā that he might slay the monstrous beast gave him the mighty weapon with a thousand points.
यो अस्मै घरंस उत वा य ऊधनि सोमं सुनोति भवति दयुमां अह|	illustrious is the man whoever presseth out soma for him in sunshine or in cloud and rain.
अपाप शक्रस ततनुष्टिम ऊहति तनूशुभ्रम मघवा यः कवासखः|	the mighty maghavan who is the sages friend advanceth more and more his beauteous progeny.
यस्यावधीत पितरं यस्य मातरं यस्य शक्रो भरातरं नात ईषते|	the strong god doth not flee away from him whose sire whose mother or whose brother he hath done to death.
वेतीद व अस्य परयता यतंकरो न किल्बिषाद ईषते वस्व आकरः|	he the avenger seeketh this mans offered gifts this god the source of riches doth not flee from sin.
न पञ्चभिर दशभिर वष्ट्य आरभं नासुन्वता सचते पुष्यता चन|	he seeks no enterprise with five or ten to aid nor stays with him who pours no juice though prospering well.
जिनाति वेद अमुया हन्ति वा धुनिर आ देवयुम भजति गोमति वरजे|	the shaker conquers or slays in this way or that and to the pious gives a stable full of kine.
वित्वक्षणः सम्र्तौ चक्रमासजो ऽसुन्वतो विषुणः सुन्वतो वर्धः|	exceeding strong in war he stays the chariot wheel and hating him who pours not prospers him who pours.
इन्द्रो विश्वस्य दमिता विभीषणो यथावशं नयति दासम आर्यः|	indra the terrible tamer of every man as Ārya leads away the dāsa at his will.
सम ईम पणेर अजति भोजनम मुषे वि दाशुषे भजति सूनरं वसु|	he gathers up for plunder all the niggards gear excellent wealth he gives to him who offers gifts.
दुर्गे चन धरियते विश्व आ पुरु जनो यो अस्य तविषीम अचुक्रुधत|	not even in wide stronghold may all the folk stand firm who have provoked to anger his surpassing might.
सं यज जनौ सुधनौ विश्वशर्धसाव अवेद इन्द्रो मघवा गोषु शुभ्रिषु|	when indra maghavan hath marked two wealthy men fighting for beauteous cows with all their followers.
युजं हय अन्यम अक्र्त परवेपन्य उद ईं गव्यं सर्जते सत्वभिर धुनिः|	he who stirs all things takes one as his close ally and shaker with his heroes sends the kine to him.
सहस्रसाम आग्निवेशिं गर्णीषे शत्रिम अग्न उपमां केतुम अर्यः|	agni i laud the liberal agnivesi satri the type and standard of the pious.
तस्मा आपः संयतः पीपयन्त तस्मिन कषत्रम अमवत तवेषम अस्तु|	may the collected waters yield him plenty and his be powerful and bright dominion.
अछा वो अग्निम अवसे देवं गासि स नो वसुः|	i will sing near for grace your god agni for he is good to us.
रासत पुत्र रषूणाम रतावा पर्षति दविषः|	son of the brands may he give gifts and righteous save us from the foe.
स हि सत्यो यम पूर्वे चिद देवासश चिद यम ईधिरे|	for he is true whom men of old enkindled and the gods themselves.
होतारम मन्द्रजिह्वम इत सुदीतिभिर विभावसुम|	the priest with the delicious tongue rich with the light of glorious beams.
स नो धीती वरिष्ठया शरेष्ठया च सुमत्या|	with wisdom that surpasseth all with gracious will most excellent.
अग्ने रायो दिदीहि नः सुव्र्क्तिभिर वरेण्य|	o agni worthy of our choice shine wealth on us through hymns of praise.
अग्निर देवेषु राजत्य अग्निर मर्तेष्व आविशन|	agni is king for he extends to mortals and to gods alike.
अग्निर नो हव्यवाहनो ऽगनिं धीभिः सपर्यत|	agni is bearer of our gifts worship ye agni with your thoughts.
अग्निस तुविश्रवस्तमं तुविब्रह्माणम उत्तमम|	agni gives to the worshipper a son the best of mightiest fame.
अतूर्तं शरावयत्पतिम पुत्रं ददाति दाशुषे|	of deep devotion neer subdued bringer of glory to his sire.
अग्निर ददाति सत्पतिं सासाह यो युधा नर्भिः|	agni bestows the herolord who conquers with the men in fight.
अग्निर अत्यं रघुष्यदं जेतारम अपराजितम|	agni bestows the fleetfoot steed the victor never overcome.
यद वाहिष्ठं तद अग्नये बर्हद अर्च विभावसो|	the mightiest song is agnis shine on high thou who art rich in light.
महिषीव तवद रयिस तवद वाजा उद ईरते|	like the chief consort of a king riches and strength proceed from thee.
तव दयुमन्तो अर्चयो गरावेवोच्यते बर्हत|	resplendent are thy rays of light loud is thy voice like pressingstones.
उतो ते तन्यतुर यथा सवानो अर्त तमना दिवः|	yea of itself thy thunder goes forth like the roaring of the heaven.
एवां अग्निं वसूयवः सहसानं ववन्दिम|	thus seeking riches have we paid homage to agni conqueror.
स नो विश्वा अति दविषः पर्षन नावेव सुक्रतुः|	may he most wise as with a ship carry us over all our foes.
कद उ परियाय धाम्ने मनामहे सवक्षत्राय सवयशसे महे वयम|	what may we meditate for the beloved power mighty in native strength and glorious in itself.
आमेन्यस्य रजसो यद अभ्र आं अपो वर्णाना वितनोति मायिनी|	which as a magic energy seeking waters spreads even to theimmeasurable middle regions cloud.
ता अत्नत वयुनं वीरवक्षणं समान्या वर्तया विश्वम आ रजः|	oer all the region with their uniform advance these have spread out the lore that giveth heroes strength.
अपो अपाचीर अपरा अपेजते पर पूर्वाभिस तिरते देवयुर जनः|	back with their course reversed the others pass away the pious lengthens life with those that are before.
आ गरावभिर अहन्येभिर अक्तुभिर वरिष्ठं वज्रम आ जिघर्ति मायिनि|	with pressingstones and with the bright beams of the day he hurls his broadest bolt against the guileful one.
शतं वा यस्य परचरन सवे दमे संवर्तयन्तो वि च वर्तयन्न अहा|	even he whose hundred wander in his own abode driving the days afar and bringing them again.
ताम अस्य रीतिम परशोर इव परत्य अनीकम अख्यम भुजे अस्य वर्पसः|	i to enjoy the beauty of his form behold that rapid rush of his as twere an axes edge.
सचा यदि पितुमन्तम इव कषयं रत्नं दधाति भरहूतये विशे|	what time he gives the man who calls on him in fight wealth like a dwellinghouse filled full with store of food.
स जिह्वया चतुरनीक रञ्जते चारु वसानो वरुणो यतन्न अरिम|	fourfaced and nobly clad varuṇa urging on the pious to his task stirs himself with the tongue.
न तस्य विद्म पुरुषत्वता वयं यतो भगः सविता दाति वार्यम|	naught by our human nature do we know of him him from whom bhaga savitar bestows the boon.
आ भात्य अग्निर उषसाम अनीकम उद विप्राणां देवया वाचो अस्थुः|	agni the bright face of the dawns is shining the singers pious voices have ascended.
अर्वाञ्चा नूनं रथ्येह यातम पीपिवांसम अश्विना घर्मम अछ|	borne on your chariot aśvins turn you hither and come unto our full and rich libation.
न संस्क्र्तम पर मिमीतो गमिष्ठान्ति नूनम अश्विनोपस्तुतेह|	most frequent guests they scorn not what is ready even now the lauded aśvins are beside us.
दिवाभिपित्वे ऽवसागमिष्ठा परत्य अवर्तिं दाशुषे शम्भविष्ठा|	with promptest aid they come at morn and evening the worshippers most blessed guards from trouble.
उता यातं संगवे परातर अह्नो मध्यंदिन उदिता सूर्यस्य|	yea come at milkingtime at early morning at noon of day and when the sun is setting.
दिवा नक्तम अवसा शंतमेन नेदानीम पीतिर अश्विना ततान|	by day by night with favour most auspicious not only now the draught hath drawn the aśvins.
इदं हि वाम परदिवि सथानम ओक इमे गर्हा अश्विनेदं दुरोणम|	for this place aśvins was of old your dwelling these were your houses this your habitation.
आ नो दिवो बर्हतः पर्वताद आद्भ्यो यातम इषम ऊर्जं वहन्ता|	come to us from high heaven and from the mountain come from the waters bringing food and vigour.
सम अश्विनोर अवसा नूतनेन मयोभुवा सुप्रणीती गमेम|	may we obtain the aśvins newest favour and gain their healthbestowing happy guidance.
आ नो रयिं वहतम ओत वीरान आ विश्वान्य अम्र्ता सौभगानि|	bring riches hither unto us and heroes and all felicity and joy immortals.
महे नो अद्य बोधयोषो राये दिवित्मती|	o heavenly dawn awaken us to ample opulence today.
यथा चिन नो अबोधयः सत्यश्रवसि वाय्ये सुजाते अश्वसून्र्ते|	even as thou hast wakened us with satyasravas vayyas son highborn delightful with thy steeds.
या सुनीथे शौचद्रथे वय औछो दुहितर दिवः|	daughter of heaven thou dawnedst on sunitha sucadrathas son.
सा वय उछ सहीयसि सत्यश्रवसि वाय्ये सुजाते अश्वसून्र्ते|	so dawn thou on one mightier still on satyasravas vayyas son highborn delightful with thy steeds.
सा नो अद्याभरद्वसुर वय उछा दुहितर दिवः|	so bringing treasure dawn today on us thou daughter of the sky.
यो वय औछः सहीयसि सत्यश्रवसि वाय्ये सुजाते अश्वसून्र्ते|	as thou o mightier yet didst shine for satyatravas vayyas son highborn delightful with thy steeds.
अभि ये तवा विभावरि सतोमैर गर्णन्ति वह्नयः|	here round about thee are the priests who laud thee bright one with their hymns.
मघैर मघोनि सुश्रियो दामन्वन्तः सुरातयः सुजाते अश्वसून्र्ते|	and men with gifts o bounteous dame splendid with wealth and offering much highborn delightful with thy steeds.
यच चिद धि ते गणा इमे छदयन्ति मघत्तये|	whatever these thy bands perform to please thee or to win them wealth.
परि चिद वष्टयो दधुर ददतो राधो अह्रयं सुजाते अश्वसून्र्ते|	een fain they gird us round and give rich gifts which neer are reft away highborn delightful with thy steeds.
ऐषु धा वीरवद यश उषो मघोनि सूरिषु|	give to these wealthy patrons fame o affluent dawn with hero sons.
ये नो राधांस्य अह्रया मघवानो अरासत सुजाते अश्वसून्र्ते|	to these our princes who have brought rich gifts neer to be reft away highborn delightful with thy steeds.
तेभ्यो दयुम्नम बर्हद यश उषो मघोन्य आ वह|	bring lofty and resplendent fame o thou munificent dawn to these.
ये नो राधांस्य अश्व्या गव्या भजन्त सूरयः सुजाते अश्वसून्र्ते|	our wealthy patrons who bestow rich gifts on us of steeds and kine highborn delightful with thy steeds.
उत नो गोमतीर इष आ वहा दुहितर दिवः|	bring us o daughter of the sky subsistence in our herds of kine.
साकं सूर्यस्य रश्मिभिः शुक्रैः शोचद्भिर अर्चिभिः सुजाते अश्वसून्र्ते|	together with the sunbeams with the shine of pure refulgent flames highborn delightful with thy steeds.
वय उछा दुहितर दिवो मा चिरं तनुथा अपः|	o daughter of the sky shine forth delay not to perform thy task.
नेत तवा सतेनं यथा रिपुं तपाति सूरो अर्चिषा सुजाते अश्वसून्र्ते|	let not the sun with fervent heat consume thee like a robber foe highborn delightful with the steeds.
एतावद वेद उषस तवम भूयो वा दातुम अर्हसि|	so much and more exceedingly o dawn it suits thee to bestow.
या सतोत्र्भ्यो विभावर्य उछन्ती न परमीयसे सुजाते अश्वसून्र्ते|	thou radiant one who ceasest not to shine for those who sing thy praise highborn delightful with thy steeds.
हयो न विद्वां अयुजि सवयं धुरि तां वहामि परतरणीम अवस्युवम|	well knowing i have bound me horselike to the pole i carry that which bears as on and gives us help.
नास्या वश्मि विमुचं नाव्र्तम पुनर विद्वान पथः पुरेत रजु नेषति|	i seek for no release no turning back therefrom may he who knows the way the leader guide me straight.
अग्न इन्द्र वरुण मित्र देवाः शर्धः पर यन्त मारुतोत विष्णो|	o agni indra varuṇa and mitra give o ye gods and marut host and viṣṇu.
उभा नासत्या रुद्रो अध गनाः पूषा भगः सरस्वती जुषन्त|	may both nāsatyas rudra heavenly matrons pūṣan sarasvatī bhaga accept us.
इन्द्राग्नी मित्रावरुणादितिं सवः पर्थिवीं दयाम मरुतः पर्वतां अपः|	indra and agni mitra varuṇa aditi the waters mountains maruts sky and earth and heaven.
हुवे विष्णुम पूषणम बरह्मणस पतिम भगं नु शंसं सवितारम ऊतये|	viṣṇu i call pūṣan and brahmaṇaspati and bhaga samsa savitar that they may help.
उत नो विष्णुर उत वातो अस्रिधो दरविणोदा उत सोमो मयस करत|	may viṣṇu also and vāta who injures none and soma granter of possessions give us joy.
उत रभव उत राये नो अश्विनोत तवष्टोत विभ्वानु मंसते|	and may the Ṛbhus and the aśvins tvaṣṭar and vibhvan remember us so that we may have wealth.
उत तयन नो मारुतं शर्ध आ गमद दिविक्षयं यजतम बर्हिर आसदे|	so may the band of maruts dwelling in the sky the holy come to us to sit on sacred grass.
बर्हस्पतिः शर्म पूषोत नो यमद वरूथ्यं वरुणो मित्रो अर्यमा|	bṛhaspati and pūṣan grant us sure defence varuṇa mitra aryaman guard and shelter us.
उत तये नः पर्वतासः सुशस्तयः सुदीतयो नद्यस तरामणे भुवन|	and may the mountains famed in noble eulogies and the fairgleaming rivers keep us safe from harm.
भगो विभक्ता शवसावसा गमद उरुव्यचा अदितिः शरोतु मे हवम|	may bhaga the dispenser come with power and grace and farpervading aditi listen to my call.
देवानाम पत्नीर उशतीर अवन्तु नः परावन्तु नस तुजये वाजसातये|	may the gods spouses aid us of their own freewill aid us to offspring and the winning of the spoil.
याः पार्थिवासो या अपाम अपि वरते ता नो देवीः सुहवाः शर्म यछत|	grant us protection o ye gracious goddesses ye who are on the earth or in the waters realm.
उत गना वयन्तु देवपत्नीर इन्द्राण्य अग्नाय्य अश्विनी राट|	may the dames wives of gods enjoy our presents rat aśvini agnāyī and indrāṇī.
आ रोदसी वरुणानी शर्णोतु वयन्तु देवीर य रतुर जनीनाम|	may rodasī and varuṇānī hear us and goddesses come at the matrons season.
जनस्य गोपा अजनिष्ट जाग्र्विर अग्निः सुदक्षः सुविताय नव्यसे|	the watchful guardian of the people hath been born agni the very strong for fresh prosperity.
घर्तप्रतीको बर्हता दिविस्प्र्शा दयुमद वि भाति भरतेभ्यः शुचिः|	with oil upon his face with high heaventouching flame he shineth splendidly pure for the bharatas.
यज्ञस्य केतुम परथमम पुरोहितम अग्निं नरस तरिषधस्थे सम ईधिरे|	ensign of sacrifice the earliest householdpriest the men have kindled agni in his threefold seat.
इन्द्रेण देवैः सरथं स बर्हिषि सीदन नि होता यजथाय सुक्रतुः|	with indra and the gods together on the grass let the wise priest sit to complete the sacrifice.
असम्म्र्ष्टो जायसे मात्रोः शुचिर मन्द्रः कविर उद अतिष्ठो विवस्वतः|	pure  unadorned from thy two mothers art thou born thou camest from vivasvān as a charming sage.
घर्तेन तवावर्धयन्न अग्न आहुत धूमस ते केतुर अभवद दिवि शरितः|	with oil they strengthened thee o agni worshipped god thy banner was the smoke that mounted to the sky.
अग्निर नो यज्ञम उप वेतु साधुयाग्निं नरो वि भरन्ते गर्हेगर्हे|	may agni graciously come to our sacrifice the men bear agni here and there in every house.
अग्निर दूतो अभवद धव्यवाहनो ऽगनिं वर्णाना वर्णते कविक्रतुम|	he hath become an envoy bearer of our gifts electing agni men choose one exceeding wise.
तुभ्येदम अग्ने मधुमत्तमं वचस तुभ्यम मनीषा इयम अस्तु शं हर्दे|	for thee o agni is this sweetest prayer of mine dear to thy spirit be this product of my thought.
तवां गिरः सिन्धुम इवावनीर महीर आ पर्णन्ति शवसा वर्धयन्ति च|	as great streams fill the river so our song of praise fill thee and make thee yet more mighty in thy strength.
तवाम अग्ने अङगिरसो गुहा हितम अन्व अविन्दञ छिश्रियाणं वने वने|	o agni the aṅgirases discovered thee what time thou layest hidden fleeing back from wood to wood.
स जायसे मथ्यमानः सहो महत तवाम आहुः सहसस पुत्रम अङगिरः|	thou by attrition art produced as conquering might and men o aṅgiras call thee the son of strength.
बर्हद वयो हि भानवे ऽरचा देवायाग्नये|	great power is in the beam of light sing praise to agni to the god.
यम मित्रं न परशस्तिभिर मर्तासो दधिरे पुरः|	whom men have set in foremost place like mitra with their eulogies.
स हि दयुभिर जनानां होता दक्षस्य बाह्वोः|	he by the splendour of his arms is priest of every able man.
वि हव्यम अग्निर आनुषग भगो न वारम रण्वति|	agni conveys oblation straight and deals as bhaga deals his boons.
अस्य सतोमे मघोनः सख्ये वर्द्धशोचिषः|	all rests upon the laud and love of him the rich highflaming god.
विश्वा यस्मिन तुविष्वणि सम अर्ये शुष्मम आदधुः|	on whom loudroaring men have laid great strength as on a faithful friend.
अधा हय अग्न एषां सुवीर्यस्य मंहना|	so agni be the friend of these with liberal gift of hero strength.
तम इद यह्वं न रोदसी परि शरवो बभूवतुः|	yea heaven and earth have not surpassed this youthful one in glorious fame.
नू न एहि वार्यम अग्ने गर्णान आ भर|	o agni quickly come to us and glorified bring precious wealth.
ये वयं ये च सूरयः सवस्ति धामहे सचोतैधि पर्त्सु नो वर्धे|	so we and these our princes will assemble for the good of all be near in fight to prosper us.
दयुतद्यामानम बर्हतीम रतेन रतावरीम अरुणप्सुं विभातीम|	the singers welcome with their hymns and praises the goddess dawn who bringeth in the sunlight.
देवीम उषसं सवर आवहन्तीम परति विप्रासो मतिभिर जरन्ते|	sublime by law true to eternal order bright on her path redtinted farrefulgent.
एषा जनं दर्शता बोधयन्ती सुगान पथः कर्ण्वती यात्य अग्रे|	she comes in front fair rousing up the people making the pathways easy to be travelled.
बर्हद्रथा बर्हती विश्वमिन्वोषा जयोतिर यछत्य अग्रे अह्नाम|	high on her lofty chariot allimpelling dawn gives her splendour at the days beginning.
एषा गोभिर अरुणेभिर युजानास्रेधन्ती रयिम अप्रायु चक्रे|	she harnessing her car with purple oxen injuring none hath brought perpetual riches.
पथो रदन्ती सुविताय देवी पुरुष्टुता विश्ववारा वि भाति|	opening paths to happiness the goddess shines praised by all giver of every blessing.
एषा वयेनी भवति दविबर्हा आविष्क्र्ण्वाना तन्वम पुरस्तात|	with changing tints she gleams in double splendour while from the eastward she displays her body.
रतस्य पन्थाम अन्व एति साधु परजानतीव न दिशो मिनाति|	she travels perfectly the path of order nor fails to reach as one who knows the quarters.
एषा शुभ्रा न तन्वो विदानोर्ध्वेव सनाती दर्शये नो अस्थात|	as conscious that her limbs are bright with bathing she stands as twere erect that we may see her.
अप दवेषो बाधमाना तमांस्य उषा दिवो दुहिता जयोतिषागात|	driving away malignity and darkness dawn child of heaven hath come to us with lustre.
एषा परतीची दुहिता दिवो नॄन योषेव भद्रा नि रिणीते अप्सः|	the daughter of the sky like some chaste woman bends opposite to men her forehead downward.
वयूर्ण्वती दाशुषे वार्याणि पुनर जयोतिर युवतिः पूर्वथाकः|	the maid disclosing boons to him who worships hath brought again the daylight as aforetime.
अग्ने तवं नो अन्तम उत तराता शिवो भवा वरूथ्यः|	o agni be our nearest friend be thou a kind deliverer and a gracious friend.
वसुर अग्निर वसुश्रवा अछा नक्षि दयुमत्तमं रयिं दाः|	excellent agni come thou nigh to us and give us wealth most splendidly renowned.
स नो बोधि शरुधी हवम उरुष्या णो अघायतः समस्मात|	so hear us listen to this call of ours and keep us far from every sinful man.
तं तवा शोचिष्ठ दीदिवः सुम्नाय नूनम ईमहे सखिभ्यः|	to thee then o most bright o radiant god we come with prayer for happiness for our friends.
विदा दिवो विष्यन्न अद्रिम उक्थैर आयत्या उषसो अर्चिनो गुः|	bards of approaching dawn who know the heavens are come with hymns to throw the mountain open.
अपाव्र्त वरजिनीर उत सवर गाद वि दुरो मानुषीर देव आवः|	the sun hath risen and oped the stable portals the doors of men too hath the god thrown open.
वि सूर्यो अमतिं न शरियं साद ओर्वाद गवाम माता जानती गात|	sūrya hath spread his light as splendour hither came the cows mother conscious from the stable.
धन्वर्णसो नद्यः खादोर्णा सथूणेव सुमिता दरंहत दयौः|	to streams that flow with biting waves to deserts and heaven is stablished like a firmset pillar.
अस्मा उक्थाय पर्वतस्य गर्भो महीनां जनुषे पूर्व्याय|	this laud hath won the burden of the mountain to aid the ancient birth of mighty waters.
वि पर्वतो जिहीत साधत दयौर आविवासन्तो दसयन्त भूम|	the mountain parted heaven performed his office the worshippers were worn with constant serving.
सूक्तेभिर वो वचोभिर देवजुष्टैर इन्द्रा नव अग्नी अवसे हुवध्यै|	with hymns and godloved words will i invoke you indra and agni to obtain your favour.
उक्थेभिर हि षमा कवयः सुयज्ञा आविवासन्तो मरुतो यजन्ति|	for verily sages skilled in sacrificing worship the maruts and with lauds invite them.
एतो नव अद्य सुध्यो भवाम पर दुछुना मिनवामा वरीयः|	this day approach us may our thoughts be holy far from us let us cast away misfortune.
आरे दवेषांसि सनुतर दधामायाम पराञ्चो यजमानम अछ|	let us keep those who hate us at a distance and haste to meet the man who sacrifices.
एता धियं कर्णवामा सखायो ऽप या मातां रणुत वरजं गोः|	come let us carry out o friends the purpose wherewith the mother threw the cows stall open.
यया मनुर विशिशिप्रं जिगाय यया वणिग वङकुर आपा पुरीषम|	that wherewith manu conquered visisipra wherewith the wandering merchant gained heavens water.
अनूनोद अत्र हस्तयतो अद्रिर आर्चन येन दश मासो नवग्वाः|	here urged by hands loudly hath rung the pressstone wherewith navagvas through ten months sang praises.
रतं यती सरमा गा अविन्दद विश्वानि सत्याङगिराश चकार|	saramā went aright and found the cattle aṅgiras gave effect to all their labours.
विश्वे अस्या वयुषि माहिनायाः सं यद गोभिर अङगिरसो नवन्त|	when at the dawning of this mighty goddess aṅgirases all sang forth with the cattle.
उत्स आसाम परमे सधस्थ रतस्य पथा सरमा विदद गाः|	their spring is in the loftiest place of meetingsaramā found the kine by orders pathway.
आ सूर्यो यातु सप्ताश्वः कषेत्रं यद अस्योर्विया दीर्घयाथे|	borne by his coursers seven may sūrya visit the field that spreadeth wide for his long journey.
रघुः शयेनः पतयद अन्धो अछा युवा कविर दीदयद गोषु गछन|	down on the soma swooped the rapid falcon bright was the young sage moving mid his cattle.
आ सूर्यो अरुहच छुक्रम अर्णो ऽयुक्त यद धरितो वीतप्र्ष्ठाः|	sūrya hath mounted to the shining ocean when he hath yoked his fairbacked tawny horses.
उद्ना न नावम अनयन्त धीरा आश्र्ण्वतीर आपो अर्वाग अतिष्ठन|	the wise have drawn him like a ship through water the floods obedient have descended hither.
धियं वो अप्सु दधिषे सवर्षां ययातरन दश मासो नवग्वाः|	i lay upon the floods your hymn lightwinning wherewith navagvas their ten months completed.
अया धिया सयाम देवगोपा अया धिया तुतुर्यामात्य अंहः|	through this our hymn may we have gods to guard us through this our hymn pass safe beyond affliction.
आ रुद्रास इन्द्रवन्तः सजोषसो हिरण्यरथाः सुविताय गन्तन|	of one accord with indra o ye rudras come borne on your golden car for our prosperity.
इयं वो अस्मत परति हर्यते मतिस तर्ष्णजे न दिव उत्सा उदन्यवे|	an offering from us this hymn is brought to you as unto one who th irsts for water heavenly springs.
वाशीमन्त रष्टिमन्तो मनीषिणः सुधन्वान इषुमन्तो निषङगिणः|	armed with your daggers full of wisdom armed with spears armed with your quivers armed with arrows with good bows.
सवश्वा सथ सुरथाः पर्श्निमातरः सवायुधा मरुतो याथना शुभम|	good horses and good cars have ye o pṛśnis sons ye maruts with good weapons go to victory.
धूनुथ दयाम पर्वतान दाशुषे वसु नि वो वना जिहते यामनो भिया|	from hills and heaven ye shake wealth for the worshipper in terror at your coming low the woods bow down.
कोपयथ पर्थिवीम पर्श्निमातरः शुभे यद उग्राः पर्षतीर अयुग्ध्वम|	ye make the earth to tremble sons of pṛśni when for victory ye have yoked fierce ones your spotted deer.
वातत्विषो मरुतो वर्षनिर्णिजो यमा इव सुसद्र्शः सुपेशसः|	bright with the blasts of wind wrapped in their robes of rain like twins of noble aspect and of lovely form.
पिशङगाश्वा अरुणाश्वा अरेपसः परत्वक्षसो महिना दयौर इवोरवः|	the maruts spotless with steeds tawnyhued and red strong in their mightiness and spreading wide like heaven.
पुरुद्रप्सा अञ्जिमन्तः सुदानवस तवेषसंद्र्शो अनवभ्रराधसः|	rich in adornment rich in drops munificent bright in their aspect yielding bounties that endure.
सुजातासो जनुषा रुक्मवक्षसो दिवो अर्का अम्र्तं नाम भेजिरे|	noble by birth adorned with gold upon their breasts the singers of the sky have won immortal fame.
रष्टयो वो मरुतो अंसयोर अधि सह ओजो बाह्वोर वो बलं हितम|	borne on both shoulders o ye maruts are your spears within your arms is laid your energy and trength.
नर्म्णा शीर्षस्व आयुधा रथेषु वो विश्वा वः शरीर अधि तनूषु पिपिशे|	bold thoughts are in your heads your weapons in your cars all glorious majesty is moulded on your forms.
गोमद अश्वावद रथवत सुवीरं चन्द्रवद राधो मरुतो ददा नः|	vouchsafe to us o maruts splendid bounty in cattle and in steeds in cars and heroes.
परशस्तिं नः कर्णुत रुद्रियासो भक्षीय वो ऽवसो दैव्यस्य|	children of rudra give us high distinction may i enjoy your godlike help and favour.
हये नरो मरुतो मर्ळता नस तुवीमघासो अम्र्ता रतज्ञाः|	ho maruts heroes skilled in law immortal be gracious unto us ye rich in treasures.
सत्यश्रुतः कवयो युवानो बर्हद्गिरयो बर्हद उक्षमाणाः|	ye hearers of the truth ye sage and youthful grown mighty dwelling on the lofty mountains.
सम भानुना यतते सूर्यस्याजुह्वानो घर्तप्र्ष्ठः सवञ्चाः|	bedewed with holy oil and meetly worshipped the swift one vies with sūryas beam in splendour.
तस्मा अम्र्ध्रा उषसो वय उछान य इन्द्राय सुनवामेत्य आह|	for him may mornings dawn without cessation who saith let us press soma out for indra.
समिद्धाग्निर वनवत सतीर्णबर्हिर युक्तग्रावा सुतसोमो जराते|	with kindled fire and strewn grass let him worship and somapresser sing with stones adjusted.
गरावाणो यस्येषिरं वदन्त्य अयद अध्वर्युर हविषाव सिन्धुम|	and let the priest whose pressstones ring forth loudly go down with his oblation to the river.
वधूर इयम पतिम इछन्त्य एति य ईं वहाते महिषीम इषिराम|	this wife is coming near who loves her husband who carries to his home a vigorous consort.
आस्य शरवस्याद रथ आ च घोषात पुरू सहस्रा परि वर्तयाते|	here may his car seek fame here loudly thunder and his wheel make a thousand revolutions.
न स राजा वयथते यस्मिन्न इन्द्रस तीव्रं सोमम पिबति गोसखायम|	no troubles vex that king in whose home indra drinks the sharp soma juice with milk commingled.
आ सत्वनैर अजति हन्ति वर्त्रं कषेति कषितीः सुभगो नाम पुष्यन|	with heroes he drives near he slays the foeman blest cherishing that name he guards his people.
पुष्यात कषेमे अभि योगे भवात्य उभे वर्तौ संयती सं जयाति|	may he support in peace and win in battle he masters both the hosts that meet together.
परियः सूर्ये परियो अग्ना भवाति य इन्द्राय सुतसोमो ददाशत|	dear shall he be to sūrya dear to agni who with pressed soma offers gifts to india.
तत सवितुर वर्णीमहे वयं देवस्य भोजनम|	we crave of savitar the god this treasure much to be enjoyed.
शरेष्ठं सर्वधातमं तुरम भगस्य धीमहि|	the best allyielding conquering gift of bhaga we would gladly win.
अस्य हि सवयशस्तरं सवितुः कच चन परियम|	savitars own supremacy most glorious and beloved of all.
न मिनन्ति सवराज्यम|	no one diminisheth in aught.
स हि रत्नानि दाशुषे सुवाति सविता भगः|	for savitar who is bhaga shall send riches to his worshipper.
तम भागं चित्रम ईमहे|	that wondrous portion we implore.
अद्या नो देव सवितः परजावत सावीः सौभगम|	send us this day god savitar prosperity with progeny.
परा दुष्वप्न्यं सुव|	drive thou the evil dream away.
विश्वानि देव सवितर दुरितानि परा सुव|	savitar god send far away all sorrows and calamities.
यद भद्रं तन न आ सुव|	and send us only what is good.
अनागसो अदितये देवस्य सवितुः सवे|	sinless in sight of aditi through the god savitars influence.
विश्वा वामानि धीमहि|	may we obtain all lovely things.
आ विश्वदेवं सत्पतिं सूक्तैर अद्या वर्णीमहे|	we with our hymns this day elect the general god lord of the good.
सत्यसवं सवितारम|	savitar whose decrees are true.
य इमे उभे अहनी पुर एत्य अप्रयुछन|	he who for ever vigilant precedes these twain the day and night.
सवाधीर देवः सविता|	is savitar the thoughtful god.
य इमा विश्वा जातान्य आश्रावयति शलोकेन|	he who gives glory unto all these living creatures with the song.
पर च सुवाति सविता|	and brings them forth is savitar.
अनस्वन्ता सत्पतिर मामहे मे गावा चेतिष्ठो असुरो मघोनः|	the godlike hero famousest of nobles hath granted me two oxen with a wagon.
तरैव्र्ष्णो अग्ने दशभिः सहस्रैर वैश्वानर तर्यरुणश चिकेत|	trvrsans son tryaruna hath distinguished himself vaiśvānara agni with ten thousands.
यो मे शता च विंशतिं च गोनां हरी च युक्ता सुधुरा ददाति|	protect tryaruna as thou art waxing strong and art highly praised vaiśvānara agni.
वैश्वानर सुष्टुतो वाव्र्धानो ऽगने यछ तर्यरुणाय शर्म|	who granteth me a hundred kine and twenty and two bay horses good at draught and harnessed.
एवा ते अग्ने सुमतिं चकानो नविष्ठाय नवमं तरसदस्युः|	so trasadasyu served thee god most youthful craving thy favour for the ninth time agni.
यो मे गिरस तुविजातस्य पूर्वीर युक्तेनाभि तर्यरुणो गर्णाति|	tryaruya who with attentive spirit accepteth many a song from me the mighty.
यो म इति परवोचत्य अश्वमेधाय सूरये|	he who declares his wish to me to asvamedha to the prince.
ददद रचा सनिं यते ददन मेधाम रतायते|	pays him who with his verse seeks gain gives power to him who keeps the law.
यस्य मा परुषाः शतम उद्धर्षयन्त्य उक्षणः|	from whom a hundred oxen all of speckled hue delight my heart.
अश्वमेधस्य दानाः सोमा इव तर्य्र्शिरः|	the gifts of asvamedha like thricemingled draughts of soma juice.
इन्द्राग्नी शतदाव्न्य अश्वमेधे सुवीर्यम|	to asvamedha who bestows a hundred gifts grant hero power.
कषत्रं धारयतम बर्हद दिवि सूर्यम इवाजरम|	o indraagni lofty rule like the unwasting sun in heaven.
तवाम अग्ने वसुपतिं वसूनाम अभि पर मन्दे अध्वरेषु राजन|	o agni king and lord of wealth and treasures in thee is my delight at sacrifices.
तवया वाजं वाजयन्तो जयेमाभि षयाम पर्त्सुतीर मर्त्यानाम|	through thee may we obtain the strength we long for and overcome the fierce attacks of mortals.
हव्यवाळ अग्निर अजरः पिता नो विभुर विभावा सुद्र्शीको अस्मे|	agni eternal father offeringbearer fair to behold farreaching farrefulgent.
सुगार्हपत्याः सम इषो दिदीह्य अस्मद्र्यक सम मिमीहि शरवांसि|	from wellkept household fire beam food to feed us and measure out to us abundant glory.
विशां कविं विश्पतिम मानुषीणां शुचिम पावकं घर्तप्र्ष्ठम अग्निम|	the sage of men the lord of human races pure purifying agni balmed with butter.
नि होतारं विश्वविदं दधिध्वे स देवेषु वनते वार्याणि|	him the omniscient as your priest ye stablish he wins among the gods things worth the choosing.
जुषस्वाग्न इळया सजोषा यतमानो रश्मिभिः सूर्यस्य|	agni enjoy of one accord with iḷā striving in rivalry with beams of sūrya.
जुषस्व नः समिधं जातवेद आ च देवान हविरद्याय वक्षि|	enjoy o jātavedas this our fuel and bring the gods to us to taste oblations.
जुष्टो दमूना अतिथिर दुरोण इमं नो यज्ञम उप याहि विद्वान|	as dear housefriend guest welcome in the dwelling to this our sacrifice come thou who knowest.
विश्वा अग्ने अभियुजो विहत्या शत्रूयताम आ भरा भोजनानि|	and agni having scattered all assailants bring to us the possessions of our foemen.
वधेन दस्युम पर हि चातयस्व वयः कर्ण्वानस तन्वे सवायै|	drive thou away the dasyu with thy weapon as gaining vital power for thine own body.
पिपर्षि यत सहसस पुत्र देवान्त सो अग्ने पाहि नर्तम वाजे अस्मान|	o son of strength the gods thou satisfiest so in fight save us most heroic agni.
वयं ते अग्न उक्थैर विधेम वयं हव्यैः पावक भद्रशोचे|	may we o agni with our lauds adore thee and with our gifts fairbeaming purifier.
अस्मे रयिं विश्ववारं सम इन्वास्मे विश्वानि दरविणानि धेहि|	send to us wealth containing all things precious bestow upon us every sort of riches.
अस्माकम अग्ने अध्वरं जुषस्व सहसः सूनो तरिषधस्थ हव्यम|	son of strength agni dweller in three regions accept our sacrifice and our oblation.
वयं देवेषु सुक्र्तः सयाम शर्मणा नस तरिवरूथेन पाहि|	among the gods may we be counted pious protect us with a triplyguarding shelter.
विश्वानि नो दुर्गहा जातवेदः सिन्धुं न नावा दुरिताति पर्षि|	over all woes and dangers jātavedas bear us as in a boat across a river.
अग्ने अत्रिवन नमसा गर्णानो ऽसमाकम बोध्य अविता तनूनाम|	praised with our homage even as atri praised thee o agni be the guardian of our bodies.
यस तवा हर्दा कीरिणा मन्यमानो ऽमर्त्यम मर्त्यो जोहवीमि|	as i remembering thee with grateful spirit a mortal call with might on thee immortal.
जातवेदो यशो अस्मासु धेहि परजाभिर अग्ने अम्र्तत्वम अश्याम|	vouchsafe us high renown o jātavedas and may i be immortal by my children.
यस्मै तवं सुक्र्ते जातवेद उलोकम अग्ने कर्णवः सयोनम|	the pious man o jātavedas agni to whom thou grantest ample room and pleasure.
अश्विनं स पुत्र्णं वीरवन्तं गोमन्तं रयिं नशते सवस्ति|	gaineth abundant wealth with sons and horses with heroes and with kine for his wellbeing.
पर शंतमा वरुणं दीधिती गीर मित्रम भगम अदितिं नूनम अश्याः|	now may our sweetest song with deep devotion reach varuṇa mitra aditi and bhaga.
पर्षद्योनिः पञ्चहोता शर्णोत्व अतूर्तपन्था असुरो मयोभुः|	may the five priests lord dwelling in oblations blissgiving asura hear whose paths are open.
परति मे सतोमम अदितिर जग्र्भ्यात सूनुं न माता हर्द्यं सुशेवम|	may aditi welcome even as a mother her dear heartgladdening son my song that lauds her.
बरह्म परियं देवहितं यद अस्त्य अहम मित्रे वरुणे यन मयोभु|	the prayer they love blissgiving godappointed i offer unto varuṇa and mitra.
उद ईरय कवितमं कवीनाम उनत्तैनम अभि मध्वा घर्तेन|	in spirit him the sagest of the sages with sacrificial oil and meath bedew him.
स नो वसूनि परयता हितानि चन्द्राणि देवः सविता सुवाति|	so then let him god savitar provide us excellent ready and resplendent treasures.
सम इन्द्र णो मनसा नेषि गोभिः सं सूरिभिर हरिवः सं सवस्ति|	with willing mind indra vouchsafe us cattle prosperity lord of bays and pious patrons.
सम बरह्मणा देवहितं यद अस्ति सं देवानां सुमत्या यज्ञियानाम|	and with the sacred prayer by gods appointed give us the holy deities lovingkindness.
देवो भगः सविता रायो अंश इन्द्रो वर्त्रस्य संजितो धनानाम|	god bhaga savitar who deals forth riches indra and they who conquer vṛtras treasures.
रभुक्षा वाज उत वा पुरंधिर अवन्तु नो अम्र्तासस तुरासः|	and vāja and Ṛbhukṣan and purandhi the mighty and immortal ones protect us.
मरुत्वतो अप्रतीतस्य जिष्णोर अजूर्यतः पर बरवामा कर्तानि|	let us declare his deeds the undecaying unrivalled victor whom the maruts follow.
न ते पूर्वे मघवन नापरासो न वीर्यं नूतनः कश चनाप|	none of old times o maghavan nor later none of these days hath reached thy hero prowess.
उप सतुहि परथमं रत्नधेयम बर्हस्पतिं सनितारं धनानाम|	praise him the chief who gives the boon of riches bṛhaspati distributor of treasures.
यः शंसते सतुवते शम्भविष्ठः पुरूवसुर आगमज जोहुवानम|	who blessing most the man who sings and praises comes with abundant wealth to his invoker.
तवोतिभिः सचमाना अरिष्टा बर्हस्पते मघवानः सुवीराः|	tended bṛhaspati with thy protections the princes are unharmed and girt by heroes.
ये अश्वदा उत वा सन्ति गोदा ये वस्त्रदाः सुभगास तेषु रायः|	wealth that brings bliss is found among the givers of horses and of cattle and of raiment.
विसर्माणं कर्णुहि वित्तम एषां ये भुञ्जते अप्र्णन्तो न उक्थैः|	make their wealth flee who through our hymns enjoying their riches yield us not an ample guerdon.
अपव्रतान परसवे वाव्र्धानान बरह्मद्विषः सूर्याद यावयस्व|	far from the sun keep those who hate devotion the godless prospering in their vocation.
य ओहते रक्षसो देववीताव अचक्रेभिस तम मरुतो नि यात|	with wheelless chariots drive down him o maruts who at the feasts of gods regards the demons.
यो वः शमीं शशमानस्य निन्दात तुछ्यान कामान करते सिष्विदानः|	may he though bathed in sweat form empty wishes who blames his sacred rite who toils to serve you.
तम उ षटुहि यः सविषुः सुधन्वा यो विश्वस्य कषयति भेषजस्य|	praise him whose bow is strong and sure his arrow him who is lord of every balm that bealeth.
यक्ष्वा महे सौमनसाय रुद्रं नमोभिर देवम असुरं दुवस्य|	worship thou rudra for his great good favour adore the asura god with salutations.
दमूनसो अपसो ये सुहस्ता वर्ष्णः पत्नीर नद्यो विभ्वतष्टाः|	may the housefriends the cunninghanded artists may the steers wives the streams carved out by vibhvan.
सरस्वती बर्हद्दिवोत राका दशस्यन्तीर वरिवस्यन्तु शुभ्राः|	and may the fair ones honour and befriend us sarasvatī brhaddiva and rākā.
पर सू महे सुशरणाय मेधां गिरम भरे नव्यसीं जायमानाम|	my newest song thought that now springs within me i offer to the great the sure protector.
य आहना दुहितुर वक्षणासु रूपा मिनानो अक्र्णोद इदं नः|	who made for us this all in fond love laying each varied form within his daughters bosom.
पर सुष्टुति सतनयन्तं रुवन्तम इळस पतिं जरितर नूनम अश्याः|	now even now may thy fair praise o singer attain idaspati who roars and thunders.
यो अब्दिमां उदनिमां इयर्ति पर विद्युता रोदसी उक्षमाणः|	who rich in clouds and waters with his lightning speeds forth bedewing both the earth and heaven.
एष सतोमो मारुतं शर्धो अछा रुद्रस्य सूनूंर युवन्यूंर उद अश्याः|	may this my laud attain the troop of maruts those who are youths in act the sons of rudra.
कामो राये हवते मा सवस्त्य उप सतुहि पर्षदश्वां अयासः|	the wish calls me to riches and wellbeing praise the unwearied ones whose steeds are dappled.
परैष सतोमः पर्थिवीम अन्तरिक्षं वनस्पतींर ओषधी राये अश्याः|	may this my laud reach earth and airs midregion and forest trees and plants to win me riches.
देवोदेवः सुहवो भूतु मह्यम मा नो माता पर्थिवी दुर्मतौ धात|	may every deity be swift to listen and mother earth with no ill thought regard me.
उरौ देवा अनिबाधे सयाम|	gods may we dwell in free untroubled bliss.
सम अश्विनोर अवसा नूतनेन मयोभुवा सुप्रणीती गमेम|	may we obtain the aśvins newest favour and gain their healthbestowing happy guidance.
आ नो रयिं वहतम ओत वीरान आ विश्वान्य अम्र्ता सौभगानि|	bring riches hither unto us and heroes and all felicity and joy immortals.
समिद्धो अग्निर दिवि शोचिर अश्रेत परत्यङङ उषसम उर्विया वि भाति|	agni inflamed hath sent to heaven his lustre he shines forth widely turning unto morning.
एति पराची विश्ववारा नमोभिर देवां ईळाना हविषा घर्ताची|	eastward the ladle goes that brings all blessing praising the godswith homage and oblation.
समिध्यमानो अम्र्तस्य राजसि हविष कर्ण्वन्तं सचसे सवस्तये|	enkindled thou art king of the immortal world him who brings offerings thou attendest for his weal.
विश्वं स धत्ते दरविणं यम इन्वस्य आतिथ्यम अग्ने नि च धत्त इत पुरः|	he whom thou urgest on makes all possessions his he sets before thee agni gifts that guests may claim.
अग्ने शर्ध महते सौभगाय तव दयुम्नान्य उत्तमानि सन्तु|	show thyself strong for mighty bliss o agni most excellent be thine effulgent splendours.
सं जास्पत्यं सुयमम आ कर्णुष्व शत्रूयताम अभि तिष्ठा महांसि|	make easy to maintain our household lordship and overcome the might of those who hate us.
समिद्धस्य परमहसो ऽगने वन्दे तव शरियम|	thy glory agni i adore kindled exalted in thy strength.
वर्षभो दयुम्नवां असि सम अध्वरेष्व इध्यसे|	a steer of brilliant splendour thou art lighted well at sacred rites.
समिद्धो अग्न आहुत देवान यक्षि सवध्वर|	agni invoked and kindled serve the gods thou skilled in sacrifice.
तवं हि हव्यवाळ असि|	for thou art bearer of our gifts.
आ जुहोता दुवस्यताग्निम परयत्य अध्वरे|	invoke and worship agni while the sacrificial rite proceeds.
वर्णीध्वं हव्यवाहनम|	for offeringbearer choose ye him.
इन्द्राग्नी यम अवथ उभा वाजेषु मर्त्यम|	the mortal man whom ye the twain indra and agni help in fight.
दर्ळ्हा चित स पर भेदति दयुम्ना वाणीर इव तरितः|	breaks through een stronglyguarded wealth as tṛta burst his way through reeds.
या पर्तनासु दुष्टरा या वाजेषु शरवाय्या|	the twain invincible in war worthy to be renowned in frays.
या पञ्च चर्षणीर अभॄन्द्राग्नी ता हवामहे|	lords of the fivefold people these indra and agni we invoke.
तयोर इद अमवच छवस तिग्मा दिद्युन मघोनोः|	impetuous is their strength and keen the lightning of the mighty pair.
परति दरुणा गभस्त्योर गवां वर्त्रघ्न एषते|	which from their arms speeds with the car to vṛtras slayer for the kine.
ता वाम एषे रथानाम इन्द्राग्नी हवामहे|	indra and agni we invoke you both as such to send your cars.
पती तुरस्य राधसो विद्वांसा गिर्वणस्तमा|	lords of quickcoming bounty ye who know chief lovers of the song.
ता वर्धन्ताव अनु दयून मर्ताय देवाव अदभा|	these who give increase day by day gods without guile for mortal man.
अर्हन्ता चित पुरो दधे ऽंशेव देवाव अर्वते|	worthy themselves i honour most two gods as partners for my horse.
एवेन्द्राग्निभ्याम अहावि हव्यं शूष्यं घर्तं न पूतम अद्रिभिः|	the strengthbestowing offering thus to indraagni hath been paid as butter purified by stones.
ता सूरिषु शरवो बर्हद रयिं गर्णत्सु दिध्र्तम इषं गर्णत्सु दिध्र्तम|	deal to our princes high renown deal wealth to those who sing your praise deal food to those who sing your praise.
आ धेनवः पयसा तूर्ण्यर्था अमर्धन्तीर उप नो यन्तु मध्वा|	may the milchcows who hasten to their object come harmless unto us with liquid sweetness.
महो राये बर्हतीः सप्त विप्रो मयोभुवो जरिता जोहवीति|	the singer lauding calls for ample riches the seven mighty ones who bring enjoyment.
आ सुष्टुती नमसा वर्तयध्यै दयावा वाजाय पर्थिवी अम्र्ध्रे|	with reverence and fair praise will i bring hither for sake of strength exhaustless earth and heaven.
पिता माता मधुवचाः सुहस्ता भरेभरे नो यशसाव अविष्टाम|	father and mother sweetof speech fairhanded may they farfamed in every fight protect us.
अध्वर्यवश चक्र्वांसो मधूनि पर वायवे भरत चारु शुक्रम|	adhvaryus make the sweet libations ready and bring the beautiful bright juice to vāyu.
होतेव नः परथमः पाह्य अस्य देव मध्वो ररिमा ते मदाय|	god as our priest be thou the first to drink it we give thee of the mead to make thee joyful.
दश कषिपो युञ्जते बाहू अद्रिं सोमस्य या शमितारा सुहस्ता|	two armsthe somas dexterous immo latorsand the ten fingers set and fix the pressstone.
मध्वो रसं सुगभस्तिर गिरिष्ठां चनिश्चदद दुदुहे शुक्रम अंशुः|	the stalk hath poured fair with its spreading branches the meads bright glittering juice that dwells on mountains.
असावि ते जुजुषाणाय सोमः करत्वे दक्षाय बर्हते मदाय|	the soma hath been pressed for thee its lover to give thee power and might and high enjoyment.
हरी रथे सुधुरा योगे अर्वाग इन्द्र परिया कर्णुहि हूयमानः|	invoked turn hither in thy car o indra at need thy two welltrained and dear bay horses.
आ नो महीम अरमतिं सजोषा गनां देवीं नमसा रातहव्याम|	bring by godtraversed paths accordant agni the great aramati celestial lady.
मधोर मदाय बर्हतीम रतज्ञाम आग्ने वह पथिभिर देवयानैः|	exalted worshipped with our gifts and homage who knoweth holy law to drink sweet soma.
अञ्जन्ति यम परथयन्तो न विप्रा वपावन्तं नाग्निना तपन्तः|	as on his fathers lap the son the darling so on the fire is set the sacred caldron.
पितुर न पुत्र उपसि परेष्ठ आ घर्मो अग्निम रतयन्न असादि|	which holy singers deck as if extending and heating that which holds the fatty membrane.
अछा मही बर्हती शंतमा गीर दूतो न गन्त्व अश्विना हुवध्यै|	hither as herald to invite the aśvins come the great lofty song most sweet and pleasant.
मयोभुवा सरथा यातम अर्वाग गन्तं निधिं धुरम आणिर न नाभिम|	come in one car joygivers to the banquet like the bolt binding pole and nave come hither.
पर तव्यसो नमक्तिं तुरस्याहम पूष्ण उत वायोर अदिक्षि|	i have declared this speech of adoration to mightiest pūṣan and victorious vāyu.
या राधसा चोदितारा मतीनां या वाजस्य दरविणोदा उत तमन|	who by their bounty are the hymns inspirers and of themselves give power as a possession.
आ नामभिर मरुतो वक्षि विश्वान आ रूपेभिर जातवेदो हुवानः|	invoked by us bring hither jatavedas the maruts all under their names and figures.
यज्ञं गिरो जरितुः सुष्टुतिं च विश्वे गन्त मरुतो विश्व ऊती|	come to the sacrifice with aid all maruts all to the songs and praises of the singer.
आ नो दिवो बर्हतः पर्वताद आ सरस्वती यजता गन्तु यज्ञम|	from high heaven may sarasvatī the holy visit our sacrifice and from the mountain.
हवं देवी जुजुषाणा घर्ताची शग्मां नो वाचम उशती शर्णोतु|	eager propitious may the balmy goddess hear our effectual speech our invocation.
आ वेधसं नीलप्र्ष्ठम बर्हन्तम बर्हस्पतिं सदने सादयध्वम|	set in his seat the god whose back is dusky bṛhaspati the lofty the disposer.
सादद्योनिं दम आ दीदिवांसं हिरण्यवर्णम अरुषं सपेम|	him let us worship set within the dwelling the red the goldenhued the allresplendent.
आ धर्णसिर बर्हद्दिवो रराणो विश्वेभिर गन्त्व ओमभिर हुवानः|	may the sustainer high in heaven come hither the bounteous one invoked with all his favours.
गना वसान ओषधीर अम्र्ध्रस तरिधातुश्र्ङगो वर्षभो वयोधाः|	dweller with dames divine with plants unwearied the steer with triple horn the lifebestower.
मातुष पदे परमे शुक्र आयोर विपन्यवो रास्पिरासो अग्मन|	the tuneful eloquent priests of him who liveth have sought the mothers bright and loftiest station.
सुशेव्यं नमसा रातहव्याः शिशुम मर्जन्त्य आयवो न वासे|	as living men with offered gifts and homage they deck the most auspicious child to clothe him.
बर्हद वयो बर्हते तुभ्यम अग्ने धियाजुरो मिथुनासः सचन्त|	agni great vital power is thine the mighty pairs waxing old in their devotion seek thee.
देवोदेवः सुहवो भूतु मह्यम मा नो माता पर्थिवी दुर्मतौ धात|	may every deity be swift to listen and mother earth with no ill thought regard me.
उरौ देवा अनिबाधे सयाम|	gods may we dwell in free untroubled bliss.
सम अश्विनोर अवसा नूतनेन मयोभुवा सुप्रणीती गमेम|	may we obtain the aśvins newest favour and gain their healthbestowing happy guidance.
आ नो रयिं वहतम ओत वीरान आ विश्वान्य अम्र्ता सौभगानि|	bring riches hither unto us and heroes and all felicity and joy immortals.
पराग्नये बर्हते यज्ञियाय रतस्य वर्ष्णे असुराय मन्म|	to agni lofty asura meet for worship steer of eternal law my prayer i offer.
घर्तं न यज्ञ आस्य सुपूतं गिरम भरे वर्षभाय परतीचीम|	i bring my song directed to the mighty like pure oil for his mouth at sacrifices.
रतं चिकित्व रतम इच चिकिद्ध्य रतस्य धारा अनु तर्न्धि पूर्वीः|	mark the law thou who knowest yea observe it send forth the full streams of eternal order.
नाहं यातुं सहसा न दवयेन रतं सपाम्य अरुषस्य वर्ष्णः|	i use no sorcery with might or falsehood the sacred law of the red steer i follow.
कया नो अग्न रतयन्न रतेन भुवो नवेदा उचथस्य नव्यः|	how hast thou follower of the law eternal become the knower of a new song agni.
वेदा मे देव रतुपा रतूनां नाहम पतिं सनितुर अस्य रायः|	the god the guardian of the seasons knows me the lord of him who won this wealth i know not.
के ते अग्ने रिपवे बन्धनासः के पायवः सनिषन्त दयुमन्तः|	who agni in alliance with thy foeman what splendid helpers won for them their riches.
के धासिम अग्ने अन्र्तस्य पान्ति क आसतो वचसः सन्ति गोपाः|	agni who guard the dwellingplace of falsehood who are protectors of the speech of liars.
सखायस ते विषुणा अग्न एते शिवासः सन्तो अशिवा अभूवन|	agni those friends of thine have turned them from thee gracious of old they have become ungracious.
अधूर्षत सवयम एते वचोभिर रजूयते वर्जिनानि बरुवन्तः|	they have deceived themselves by their own speeches uttering wicked words against the righteous.
यस ते अग्ने नमसा यज्ञम ईट्ट रतं स पात्य अरुषस्य वर्ष्णः|	he who pays sacrifice to thee with homage o agni keeps the red steers law eternal.
तस्य कषयः पर्थुर आ साधुर एतु परसर्स्राणस्य नहुषस्य शेषः|	wide is his dwelling may the noble offspring of nahuṣa who wandered forth come hither.
अग्ने पावक रोचिषा मन्द्रया देव जिह्वया|	o agni holy and divine with splendour and thy pleasant tongue.
आ देवान वक्षि यक्षि च|	bring hither and adore the gods.
तं तवा घर्तस्नव ईमहे चित्रभानो सवर्द्र्शम|	we pray thee thou who droppest oil brightrayed who lookest on the sun.
देवां आ वीतये वह|	bring the gods hither to the feast.
वीतिहोत्रं तवा कवे दयुमन्तं सम इधीमहि|	we have enkindled thee o sage bright caller of the gods to feast.
अग्ने बर्हन्तम अध्वरे|	o agni great in sacrifice.
अग्ने विश्वेभिर आ गहि देवेभिर हव्यदातये|	o agni come with all the gods come to our sacrificial gift.
होतारं तवा वर्णीमहे|	we choose thee as invoking priest.
यजमानाय सुन्वत आग्ने सुवीर्यं वह|	bring agni to the worshipper who pours the juice heroic strength.
देवैर आ सत्सि बर्हिषि|	sit with the gods upon the grass.
समिधानः सहस्रजिद अग्ने धर्माणि पुष्यसि|	victor of thousands agni thou enkindled cherishest the laws.
देवानां दूत उक्थ्यः|	laudworthy envoy of the gods.
नय अग्निं जातवेदसं होत्रवाहं यविष्ठ्यम|	set agni jātavedas down the bearer of our sacred gifts.
दधाता देवम रत्विजम|	mostyouthful god and minister.
पर यज्ञ एत्व आनुषग अद्या देवव्यचस्तमः|	duly proceed our sacrifice comprising all the gods today.
सत्र्णीत बर्हिर आसदे|	strew holy grass to be their seat.
एदम मरुतो अश्विना मित्रः सीदन्तु वरुणः|	so may the maruts sit thereon the aśvins mitra varuṇa.
देवासः सर्वया विशा|	the gods with all their company.
के षठा नरः शरेष्ठतमा य एकएक आयय|	o heroes lordliest of all who are ye that have singly come.
परमस्याः परावतः|	forth from a region most remote.
कव वो ऽशवाः कव्र्भीशवः कथं शेक कथा यय|	where are your horses where the reins how came ye how had ye the power.
पर्ष्ठे सदो नसोर यमः|	rein was on nose and seat on back.
जघने चोद एषां वि सक्थानि नरो यमुः|	the whip is laid upon the flank the heroes stretch their thighs apart.
पुत्रक्र्थे न जनयः|	like women when the babe is born.
परा वीरास एतन मर्यासो भद्रजानयः|	go ye o heroes far away ye bridegrooms with a lovely spouse.
अग्नितपो यथासथ|	that ye may warm you at the fire.
सनत साश्व्यम पशुम उत गव्यं शतावयम|	may she gain cattle for her meed hundreds of sheep and steeds and kine.
शयावाश्वस्तुताय या दोर वीरायोपबर्ब्र्हत|	who threw embracing arms around the hero whom gyavaiva praised.
उत तवा सत्री शशीयसी पुंसो भवति वस्यसी|	yea many a woman is more firm and better than the man who turns.
अदेवत्राद अराधसः|	away from gods andoffers not.
वि या जानाति जसुरिं वि तर्ष्यन्तं वि कामिनम|	she who discerns the weak and worn the man who thirsts and is in want.
देवत्रा कर्णुते मनः|	she sets her mind upon the gods.
उत घा नेमो अस्तुतः पुमां इति बरुवे पणिः|	and yet full many a one unpraised mean niggard is entitled man.
स वैरदेय इत समः|	only in weregild is he such.
उत मे ऽरपद युवतिर ममन्दुषी परति शयावाय वर्तनिम|	and she the young the joyousspirited divulged the path to Śyāva yea to me.
वि रोहिता पुरुमीळ्हाय येमतुर विप्राय दीर्घयशसे|	two red steeds carried me to purumīlhas side that sage of farextended fame.
यो मे धेनूनां शतं वैददश्विर यथा ददत|	him who like vaidadasvi like taranta hath bestowed on me.
तरन्त इव मंहना|	a hundred cows in liberal gift.
य ईं वहन्त आशुभिः पिबन्तो मदिरम मधु|	they who are borne by rapid steeds drinking the meath that gives delight.
अत्र शरवांसि दधिरे|	they have attained high glories here.
येषां शरियाधि रोदसी विभ्राजन्ते रथेष्व आ|	they by whose splendour both the worlds are overspread they shine on cars.
दिवि रुक्म इवोपरि|	as the gold gleams above in heaven.
युवा स मारुतो गणस तवेषरथो अनेद्यः|	that marut band is ever young borne on bright cars unblamable.
शुभंयावाप्रतिष्कुतः|	moving to victory checked by none.
को वेद नूनम एषां यत्रा मदन्ति धूतयः|	who knoweth verily of these where the allshakers take delight.
रतजाता अरेपसः|	born spotless after sacred law.
यूयम मर्तं विपन्यवः परणेतार इत्था धिया|	guides are ye lovers of the song to mortal man through holy hymn.
शरोतारो यामहूतिषु|	and hearers when he cries for help.
ते नो वसूनि काम्या पुरुश्चन्द्रा रिशादसः|	do ye destroyers of the foe worshipful and exceeding bright.
आ यज्ञियासो वव्र्त्तन|	send down the treasures that we crave.
एतम मे सतोमम ऊर्म्ये दार्भ्याय परा वह|	ourmya bear thou far away to darbhya this my hymn of praise.
गिरो देवि रथीर इव|	songs goddess as if chariotborne.
उत मे वोचताद इति सुतसोमे रथवीतौ|	from me to rathaviti say when he hath pressed the soma juice.
न कामो अप वेति मे|	the wish i had departeth not.
एष कषेति रथवीतिर मघवा गोमतीर अनु|	this wealthy rathaviti dwells among the people rich in kine.
पर्वतेष्व अपश्रितः|	among the mountains far withdrawn.
पर शर्धाय मारुताय सवभानव इमां वाचम अनजा पर्वतच्युते|	this hymn will i make for the marut host who bright in native splendour cast the mountains down.
घर्मस्तुभे दिव आ पर्ष्ठयज्वने दयुम्नश्रवसे महि नर्म्णम अर्चत|	sing the great strength of those illustrious in renown who stay the heat who sacrifice on heights of heaven.
पर वो मरुतस तविषा उदन्यवो वयोव्र्धो अश्वयुजः परिज्रयः|	o maruts rich in water strengtheners of life are your strong bands with harnessed steeds that wander far.
सं विद्युता दधति वाशति तरितः सवरन्त्य आपो ऽवना परिज्रयः|	trita roars out at him who aims the lightningflash the waters sweeping round are thundering on their way.
विद्युन्महसो नरो अश्मदिद्यवो वातत्विषो मरुतः पर्वतच्युतः|	they gleam with lightning heroes casters of the stone windrapid maruts overthrowers of the bills.
अब्दया चिन मुहुर आ हरादुनीव्र्त सतनयदमा रभसा उदोजसः|	oft through desire to rain coming with storm of hail roaring in onset violent and exceeding strong.
वय अक्तून रुद्रा वय अहानि शिक्वसो वय अन्तरिक्षं वि रजांसि धूतयः|	when mighty rudras through the nights and through the days when through the sky and realms of air shakers of all.
वि यद अज्रां अजथ नाव ईं यथा वि दुर्गाणि मरुतो नाह रिष्यथ|	when over the broad fields ye drive along like ships een to strongholds ye come maruts but are not harmed.
तद वीर्यं वो मरुतो महित्वनं दीर्घं ततान सूर्यो न योजनम|	maruts this hero strength and majesty of yours hath like the sun extended oer a lengthened way.
एता न यामे अग्र्भीतशोचिषो ऽनश्वदां यन नय अयातना गिरिम|	when in your course like deer with splendour unsubdued ye bowed the hill that gives imperishable rain.
अभ्राजि शर्धो मरुतो यद अर्णसम मोषथा वर्क्षं कपनेव वेधसः|	bright shone your host ye sages maruts when ye smote the waving tree as when the worm consumeth it.
अध समा नो अरमतिं सजोषसश चक्षुर इव यन्तम अनु नेषथा सुगम|	accordant as the eye guides him who walks have ye led our devotion onward by an easy path.
न स जीयते मरुतो न हन्यते न सरेधति न वयथते न रिष्यति|	never is he o maruts slain or overcome never doth he decay neer is distressed or harmed.
नास्य राय उप दस्यन्ति नोतय रषिं वा यं राजानं वा सुषूदथ|	his treasures his resources never waste away whom whether he be prince or Ṛṣi ye direct.
नियुत्वन्तो गरामजितो यथा नरो ऽरयमणो न मरुतः कबन्धिनः|	with harnessed team like heroes overcoming troops the friendly maruts laden with their watercasks.
पिन्वन्त्य उत्सं यद इनासो अस्वरन वय उन्दन्ति पर्थिवीम मध्वो अन्धसा|	let the spring flow and when impetuous they roar they inundate the earth with floods of pleasant meath.
परवत्वतीयम पर्थिवी मरुद्भ्यः परवत्वती दयौर भवति परयद्भ्यः|	free for the maruts is the earth with sloping ways free for the rushing ones is heaven with steep descents.
परवत्वतीः पथ्य्र अन्तरिक्ष्याः परवत्वन्तः पर्वता जीरदानवः|	the paths of airs midregion are precipitous precipitous the mountains with their running streams.
यन मरुतः सभरसः सवर्णरः सूर्य उदिते मदथा दिवो नरः|	when as the sun hath risen up ye take delight o bounteous radiant maruts heroes of the sky.
न वो ऽशवाः शरथयन्ताह सिस्रतः सद्यो अस्याध्वनः पारम अश्नुथ|	your coursers weary not when speeding onṭheir way and rapidly ye reach the end of this your path.
अंसेषु व रष्टयः पत्सु खादयो वक्षस्सु रुक्मा मरुतो रथे शुभः|	lances are on your shoulders anklets on your feet gold chains are on your breasts gems maruts on your car.
अग्निभ्राजसो विद्युतो गभस्त्योः शिप्राः शीर्षसु वितता हिरण्ययीः|	lightnings aglow with flame are flashing in your hands and visors wroughtof gold are laid upon your heads.
तं नाकम अर्यो अग्र्भीतशोचिषं रुशत पिप्पलम मरुतो वि धूनुथ|	maruts in eager stir ye shake the vault of heaven splendid beyond conception for its shining fruit.
सम अच्यन्त वर्जनातित्विषन्त यत सवरन्ति घोषं विततम रतायवः|	they gathered when they let their deeds of might flash forth the pious ones send forth a farresounding shout.
युष्मादत्तस्य मरुतो विचेतसो रायः सयाम रथ्यो वयस्वतः|	sage maruts may we be the drivers of the car of riches ful i of life that have been given by you.
न यो युछति तिष्यो यथा दिवो ऽसमे रारन्त मरुतः सहस्रिणम|	o maruts let that wealth in thousands dwell with us which never vanishes like tisya from the sky.
यूयं रयिम मरुत सपार्हवीरं यूयम रषिम अवथ सामविप्रम|	maruts ye further wealth with longedfor heroes further the Ṛṣi skilled in chanted verses.
यूयम अर्वन्तम भरताय वाजं यूयं धत्थ राजानं शरुष्टिमन्तम|	ye give the bhārata as his strength a charger and ye bestow a king who quickly listens.
तद वो यामि दरविणं सद्यूतयो येना सवर ण ततनाम नॄंर अभि|	of you most swift to succour i solicit wealth wherewith we may spread forth mid men like as the sun.
इदं सु मे मरुतो हर्यता वचो यस्य तरेम तरसा शतं हिमाः|	accept o maruts graciously this hymn of mine that we may live a hundred winters through its power.
अग्न ओजिष्ठम आ भर दयुम्नम अस्मभ्यम अध्रिगो|	bring us most mighty splendour thou agni resistless on thy way.
पर नो राया परीणसा रत्सि वाजाय पन्थाम|	with overflowing store of wealth mark out for us a path to strength.
तवं नो अग्ने अद्भुत करत्वा दक्षस्य मंहना|	ours art thou wondrous agni by wisdom and bounteousness of power.
तवे असुर्यम आरुहत कराणा मित्रो न यज्ञियः|	the might of asuras rests on thee like mitra worshipful in act.
तवं नो अग्न एषां गयम पुष्टिं च वर्धय|	agni increase our means of life increase the house and home of these.
ये सतोमेभिः पर सूरयो नरो मघान्य आनशुः|	the men the princes who have won great riches through our hymns of praise.
ये अग्ने चन्द्र ते गिरः शुम्भन्त्य अश्वराधसः|	bright agni they who deck their songs for thee have horses as their meed.
शुष्मेभिः शुष्मिणो नरो दिवश चिद येषाम बर्हत सुकीर्तिर बोधति तमना|	the men are mighty in their might they whose high laud as that of heaven awakes thee of its own accord.
तव तये अग्ने अर्चयो भराजन्तो यन्ति धर्ष्णुया|	o agni those resplendent flames of thine go valorously forth.
परिज्मानो न विद्युतः सवानो रथो न वाजयुः|	like lightnings flashing round us like a rattling car that seeks the spoil.
नू नो अग्न ऊतये सबाधसश च रातये|	now agni come to succour us let priests draw nigh to offer gifts.
अस्माकासश च सूरयो विश्वा आशास तरीषणि|	and let the patrons of our rites subdue all regions of the earth.
तवं नो अग्ने अङगिर सतुत सतवान आ भर|	bring to us agni aṅgiras lauded of old and lauded now.
होतर विभ्वासहं रयिं सतोत्र्भ्य सतवसे च न उतैधि पर्त्सु नो वर्धे|	invoker wealth to quell the strong that singers may extol thee be near us in fight for our success.
यस ते साधिष्ठो ऽवस इन्द्र करतुष टम आ भर|	indra for our assistance bring that most effectual power of thine.
अस्मभ्यं चर्षणीसहं सस्निं वाजेषु दुष्टरम|	which conquers men for us and wins the spoil invincible in fight.
यद इन्द्र ते चतस्रो यच छूर सन्ति तिस्रः|	indra whatever aids be thine four be they or o hero three.
यद वा पञ्च कषितीनाम अवस तत सु न आ भर|	or those of the five tribes of men bring quickly all that help to us.
आ ते ऽवो वरेण्यं वर्षन्तमस्य हूमहे|	the aid most excellent of thee the mightiest hitherward we call.
वर्षजूतिर हि जज्ञिष आभूभिर इन्द्र तुर्वणिः|	for thou wast born with hero might conquering indra with the strong.
वर्षा हय असि राधसे जज्ञिषे वर्ष्णि ते शवः|	mighty to prosper us wast thou born and mighty is the strength thou hast.
सवक्षत्रं ते धर्षन मनः सत्राहम इन्द्र पौंस्यम|	in native power thy soul is firm thy valour indra slays a host.
तवं तम इन्द्र मर्त्यम अमित्रयन्तम अद्रिवः|	o Śatakratu lord of strength o indra caster of the stone.
सर्वरथा शतक्रतो नि याहि शवसस पते|	with all thy chariots force assail the man who shows himself thy foe.
तवाम इद वर्त्रहन्तम जनासो वर्क्तबर्हिषः|	for mightiest vṛtraslayer thee fierce foremost among many folk.
उग्रम पूर्वीषु पूर्व्यं हवन्ते वाजसातये|	whose sacred grass is trimmed invite to battle where the spoil is won.
अस्माकम इन्द्र दुष्टरम पुरोयावानम आजिषु|	indra do thou protect our car that mingles foremost in the fights.
सयावानं धनेधने वाजयन्तम अवा रथम|	that bears its part in every fray invincible and seeking spoil.
अस्माकम इन्द्रेहि नो रथम अवा पुरंध्या|	come to us indra and protect our car with thine intelligence.
वयं शविष्ठ वार्यं दिवि शरवो दधीमहि दिवि सतोमम मनामहे|	may we o mightiest one obtain excellent fame at break of day and meditate our hymn at dawn.
आ यज्ञैर देव मर्त्य इत्था तव्यांसम ऊतये|	god may a mortal call the strong hither with solemn rites to aid.
अग्निं कर्ते सवध्वरे पूरुर ईळीतावसे|	a man call agni to protect when sacrifice is well prepared.
अस्य हि सवयशस्तर आसा विधर्मन मन्यसे|	near him thou seemest mightier still in native glory set to hold.
तं नाकं चित्रशोचिषम मन्द्रम परो मनीषया|	apart yon flamehued vault of heaven lovely beyond the thought of man.
अस्य वासा उ अर्चिषा य आयुक्त तुजा गिरा|	yea this is by the light of him whom powerful song hath bound to act.
दिवो न यस्य रेतसा बर्हच छोचन्त्य अर्चयः|	whose beams of splendour flash on high as though they sprang from heavenly seed.
अस्य करत्वा विचेतसो दस्मस्य वसु रथ आ|	wealth loads the wonderworkers car through his the very wise ones power.
अधा विश्वासु हव्यो ऽगनिर विक्षु पर शस्यते|	then meet to be invoked among all tribes is agni glorified.
