स यामन्न आ मघवा मर्त्याय बरह्मण्यते सुष्वये वरिवो धात|	that maghavan brings comfort in the foray to the religious man who pours libations.
तम इन नरो वि हवयन्ते समीके रिरिक्वांसस तन्वः कर्ण्वत तराम|	him verily the men invoke in combat risking their lives they make him their protector.
मिथो यत तयागम उभयासो अग्मन नरस तोकस्य तनयस्य सातौ|	when heroes foe to foe give up their bodies fighting each side for children and their offspring.
करतूयन्ति कषितयो योग उग्राशुषाणासो मिथो अर्णसातौ|	strong god the folk at need put forth their vigour striving together in the whirl of battle.
सं यद विशो ऽवव्र्त्रन्त युध्मा आद इन नेम इन्द्रयन्ते अभीके|	when warrior bands encounter one another some in the grapple quit themselves like indra.
आद इद ध नेम इन्द्रियं यजन्त आद इत पक्तिः पुरोळाशं रिरिच्यात|	hence many a one worships the might of indra hence let the brew succeed the mealoblation.
आद इत सोमो वि पप्र्च्याद असुष्वीन आद इज जुजोष वर्षभं यजध्यै|	hence let the soma banish those who pour not even hence i joy to pay the strong one worship.
कर्णोत्य अस्मै वरिवो य इत्थेन्द्राय सोमम उशते सुनोति|	indra gives comfort to the man who truly presses for him who longs for it the soma.
सध्रीचीनेन मनसाविवेनन तम इत सखायं कर्णुते समत्सु|	not disaffected with devoted spirit this man he takes to be his friend in battles.
य इन्द्राय सुनवत सोमम अद्य पचात पक्तीर उत भर्ज्जाति धानाः|	he who this day for indra presses soma prepares the brew and fries the grains of barley.
परति मनायोर उचथानि हर्यन तस्मिन दधद वर्षणं शुष्मम इन्द्रः|	loving the hymns of that devoted servant to him may indra give heroic vigour.
यदा समर्यं वय अचेद रघावा दीर्घं यद आजिम अभ्य अख्यद अर्यः|	when the impetuous chief hath sought the conflict and the lord looked upon the longdrawn battle.
अचिक्रदद वर्षणम पत्न्य अछा दुरोण आ निशितं सोमसुद्भिः|	the matron calls to the strong god whom pressers of soma have encouraged in the dwelling.
भूयसा वस्नम अचरत कनीयो ऽविक्रीतो अकानिषम पुनर यन|	he bid a small price for a thing of value i was content returning still unpurchased.
स भूयसा कनीयो नारिरेचीद दीना दक्षा वि दुहन्ति पर वाणम|	he heightened not his insufficient offer simple and clever both milk out the udder.
क इमं दशभिर ममेन्द्रं करीणाति धेनुभिः|	who for ten milchkine purchaseth from me this indra who is mine.
यदा वर्त्राणि जङघनद अथैनम मे पुनर ददत|	when he hath slain the vṛtras let the buyer give him back to me.
नू षटुत इन्द्र नू गर्णान इषं जरित्रे नद्यो न पीपेः|	now indra lauded glorified with praises let wealth swell high like rivers for the singer.
अकारि ते हरिवो बरह्म नव्यं धिया सयाम रथ्यः सदासाः|	for thee a new hymn lord of bays is fashioned may we carborne through song be victors ever.
अग्ने तम अद्याश्वं न सतोमैः करतुं न भद्रं हर्दिस्प्र्शम|	this day with praises agni we bring thee that which thou lovest.
रध्यामा त ओहैः|	right judgment like a horse with our devotions.
अधा हय अग्ने करतोर भद्रस्य दक्षस्य साधोः|	for thou hast ever been the cardriver agni of noble.
रथीर रतस्य बर्हतो बभूथ|	strength lofty sacrifice and rightful judgment.
एभिर नो अर्कैर भवा नो अर्वाङ सवर ण जयोतिः|	through these our praises come thou to meet us bright as the sunlight.
अग्ने विश्वेभिः सुमना अनीकैः|	o agni well disposed with all thine aspects.
आभिष टे अद्य गीर्भिर गर्णन्तो ऽगने दाशेम|	now may we serve thee singing these lauds this day to thee agni.
पर ते दिवो न सतनयन्ति शुष्माः|	loud as the voice of heaven thy blasts are roaring.
तव सवादिष्ठाग्ने संद्र्ष्टिर इदा चिद अह्न इदा चिद अक्तोः|	just at this time of the day and the night thy look is the sweetest.
शरिये रुक्मो न रोचत उपाके|	it shineth near us even as gold for glory.
घर्तं न पूतं तनूर अरेपाः शुचि हिरण्यम|	spotless thy body brilliant as gold like clarified butter.
तत ते रुक्मो न रोचत सवधावः|	this gleams like gold on thee o self dependent.
कर्तं चिद धि षमा सनेमि दवेषो ऽगन इनोषि मर्तात|	all hate and mischief yea if committed agni thou turnest.
इत्था यजमानाद रतावः|	holy one from the man who rightly worships.
शिवा नः सख्या सन्तु भरात्राग्ने देवेषु युष्मे|	agni with you gods prosperous be our friendships and kinships.
सा नो नाभिः सदने सस्मिन्न ऊधन|	be this our bond here by this place thine altar.
कषेत्रस्य पतिना वयं हितेनेव जयामसि|	we through the master of the field even as through a friend obtain.
गाम अश्वम पोषयित्न्व आ स नो मर्ळातीद्र्शे|	what nourisheth our kine and steeds in such may he be good to us.
कषेत्रस्य पते मधुमन्तम ऊर्मिं धेनुर इव पयो अस्मासु धुक्ष्व|	as the cow yieldeth milk pour for us freely lord of the field the wave that beareth sweetness.
मधुश्चुतं घर्तम इव सुपूतम रतस्य नः पतयो मर्ळयन्तु|	distilling meath wellpurified like butter and let the lords of holy law be gracious.
मधुमतीर ओषधीर दयाव आपो मधुमन नो भवत्व अन्तरिक्षम|	sweet be the plants for us the heavens the waters and full of sweets for us be airs midregion.
कषेत्रस्य पतिर मधुमान नो अस्त्व अरिष्यन्तो अन्व एनं चरेम|	may the fields lord for us be full of sweetness and may we follow after him uninjured.
शुनं वाहाः शुनं नरः शुनं कर्षतु लाङगलम|	happily work our steers and men may the plough furrow happily.
शुनं वरत्रा बध्यन्तां शुनम अष्ट्राम उद इङगय|	happily be the traces bound happily may he ply the goad.
शुनासीराव इमां वाचं जुषेथां यद दिवि चक्रथुः पयः|	Śuna and sīra welcome ye this laud and with the milk which ye have made in heaven.
तेनेमाम उप सिञ्चतम|	bedew ye both this earth of ours.
अर्वाची सुभगे भव सीते वन्दामहे तवा|	auspicious sītā come thou near we venerate and worship thee.
यथा नः सुभगाससि यथा नः सुफलाससि|	that thou mayst bless and prosper us and bring us fruits abundantly.
इन्द्रः सीतां नि गर्ह्णातु ताम पूषानु यछतु|	may indra press the furrow down may pūṣan guide its course aright.
सा नः पयस्वती दुहाम उत्तरामउत्तरां समाम|	may she as rich in milk be drained for us through each succeeding year.
शुनं नः फाला वि कर्षन्तु भूमिं शुनं कीनाशा अभि यन्तु वाहैः|	happily let the shares turn up the ploughland happily go the ploughers with the oxen.
शुनम पर्जन्यो मधुना पयोभिः शुनासीरा शुनम अस्मासु धत्तम|	with meath and milk parjanya make us happy grant us prosperity Śuna and sīra.
इन्द्रा को वां वरुणा सुम्नम आप सतोमो हविष्मां अम्र्तो न होता|	what laud o indravaruṇa with oblation hath like the immortal priest obtained your favour.
यो वां हर्दि करतुमां अस्मद उक्तः पस्पर्शद इन्द्रावरुणा नमस्वान|	hath our effectual laud addressed with homage touched you o indravaruṇa in spirit.
इन्द्रा ह यो वरुणा चक्र आपी देवौ मर्तः सख्याय परयस्वान|	he who with dainty food hath won you indra and varuṇa gods as his allies to friendship.
स हन्ति वर्त्रा समिथेषु शत्रून अवोभिर वा महद्भिः स पर शर्ण्वे|	slayeth the vṛtras and his foes in battles and through your mighty favours is made famous.
इन्द्रा ह रत्नं वरुणा धेष्ठेत्था नर्भ्यः शशमानेभ्यस ता|	indra and varuṇa are most liberal givers of treasure to the men who toil to serve them.
यदी सखाया सख्याय सोमैः सुतेभिः सुप्रयसा मादयैते|	when they as friends inclined to friendship honoured with dainty food delight in flowing soma.
इन्द्रा युवं वरुणा दिद्युम अस्मिन्न ओजिष्ठम उग्रा नि वधिष्टं वज्रम|	indra and varuṇa ye hurl o mighty on him your strongest flashing bolt of thunder.
यो नो दुरेवो वर्कतिर दभीतिस तस्मिन मिमाथाम अभिभूत्य ओजः|	who treats us ill the robber and oppressor measure on him your overwhelming vigour.
इन्द्रा युवं वरुणा भूतम अस्या धियः परेतारा वर्षभेव धेनोः|	o indravaruṇa be ye the lovers of this my song as steers who love the milchcow.
सा नो दुहीयद यवसेव गत्वी सहस्रधारा पयसा मही गौः|	milk may it yield us as gone forth to pasture the great cow pouring out her thousand rivers.
तोके हिते तनय उर्वरासु सूरो दर्शीके वर्षणश च पौंस्ये|	for fertile fields for worthy sons and grandsons for the suns beauty and for steerlike vigour.
इन्द्रा नो अत्र वरुणा सयाताम अवोभिर दस्मा परितक्म्यायाम|	may indravaruṇa with gracious favours work marvels for us in the stress of battle.
युवाम इद धय अवसे पूर्व्याय परि परभूती गविषः सवापी|	for you as princes for your ancient kindness good comrades of the man who seeks for booty.
वर्णीमहे सख्याय परियाय शूरा मंहिष्ठा पितरेव शम्भू|	we choose to us for the dear bond of friendship most liberal heroes bringing bliss like parents.
ता वां धियो ऽवसे वाजयन्तीर आजिं न जग्मुर युवयूः सुदानू|	showing their strength these hymns for grace freegivers i have gone to you devoted as to battle.
शरिये न गाव उप सोमम अस्थुर इन्द्रं गिरो वरुणम मे मनीषाः|	for glory have they gone as milk to soma to indravaruṇa my thoughts and praises.
इमा इन्द्रं वरुणम मे मनीषा अग्मन्न उप दरविणम इछमानाः|	to indra and to varuṇa desirous of gaining wealth have these my thoughts proceeded.
उपेम अस्थुर जोष्टार इव वस्वो रघ्वीर इव शरवसो भिक्षमाणाः|	they have come nigh to you as treasurelovers like mares fleetfooted eager for the glory.
अश्व्यस्य तमना रथ्यस्य पुष्टेर नित्यस्य रायः पतयः सयाम|	may we ourselves be lords of during riches of ample sustenance for car and hones.
ता चक्राणा ऊतिभिर नव्यसीभिर अस्मत्रा रायो नियुतः सचन्ताम|	so may the twain who work with newest succours bring yoked teams hitherward to us and riches.
आ नो बर्हन्ता बर्हतीभिर ऊती इन्द्र यातं वरुण वाजसातौ|	come with your mighty succours o ye mighty come indravaruṇa to us in battle.
यद दिद्यवः पर्तनासु परक्रीळान तस्य वां सयाम सनितार आजेः|	what time the flashing arrows play in combat may we through you be winners in the contest.
एवा तवाम इन्द्र वज्रिन्न अत्र विश्वे देवासः सुहवास ऊमाः|	thee verily o thunderwielding indra all the gods here the helpers swift to listen.
महाम उभे रोदसी वर्द्धम रष्वं निर एकम इद वर्णते वर्त्रहत्ये|	and both the worlds elected thee the mighty high waxen strong alone to slaughter vṛtra.
अवास्र्जन्त जिव्रयो न देवा भुवः सम्राळ इन्द्र सत्ययोनिः|	the gods as worn witheld relaxed their efforts thou indra born of truth wast sovran ruler.
अहन्न अहिम परिशयानम अर्णः पर वर्तनीर अरदो विश्वधेनाः|	thou slewest ahi who besieged the waters and duggest out their allsupporting channels.
अत्र्प्णुवन्तं वियतम अबुध्यम अबुध्यमानं सुषुपाणम इन्द्र|	the insatiate one extended hard to waken who slumbered in perpetual sleep o indra.
सप्त परति परवत आशयानम अहिं वज्रेण वि रिणा अपर्वन|	the dragon stretched against the seven prone rivers where no joint was thou rentest with thy thunder.
अक्षोदयच छवसा कषाम बुध्नं वार ण वातस तविषीभिर इन्द्रः|	indra with might shook earth and her foundation as the wind stirs the water with its fury.
दर्ळ्हान्य औभ्नाद उशमान ओजो ऽवाभिनत ककुभः पर्वतानाम|	striving with strength he burst the firm asunder and tore away the summits of the mountains.
अभि पर दद्रुर जनयो न गर्भं रथा इव पर ययुः साकम अद्रयः|	they ran to thee as mothers to their offspring the clouds like chariots hastened forth together.
अतर्पयो विस्र्त उब्ज ऊर्मीन तवं वर्तां अरिणा इन्द्र सिन्धून|	thou didst refresh the streams and force the billows thou indra settest free obstructed rivers.
तवम महीम अवनिं विश्वधेनां तुर्वीतये वय्याय कषरन्तीम|	thou for the sake of vayya and turvīti didst stay the great stream flowing allsustaining.
अरमयो नमसैजद अर्णः सुतरणां अक्र्णोर इन्द्र सिन्धून|	yea at their prayer didst check the rushing river and make the floods easy to cross o indra.
पराग्रुवो नभन्वो न वक्वा धवस्रा अपिन्वद युवतीर रतज्ञाः|	he let the young maids skilled in law unwedded like fountains bubbling flow forth streaming onward.
धन्वान्य अज्रां अप्र्णक तर्षाणां अधोग इन्द्र सतर्यो दंसुपत्नीः|	he inundated thirsty plains and deserts and milked the dry cows of the mighty master.
पूर्वीर उषसः शरदश च गूर्ता वर्त्रं जघन्वां अस्र्जद वि सिन्धून|	through many a morn and many a lovely autumn having slain vṛtra he set free the rivers.
परिष्ठिता अत्र्णद बद्बधानाः सीरा इन्द्रः सरवितवे पर्थिव्या|	indra hath set at liberty to wander on earth the streams encompassed pressed together.
वम्रीभिः पुत्रम अग्रुवो अदानं निवेशनाद धरिव आ जभर्थ|	lord of bay steeds thou broughtest from the anthill the unwedded damsels son whom ants were eating.
वय अन्धो अख्यद अहिम आददानो निर भूद उखछित सम अरन्त पर्व|	the blind saw clearly as he grasped the serpent rose brake the jar his joints again united.
पर ते पूर्वाणि करणानि विप्राविद्वां आह विदुषे करांसि|	to the wise man o sage and sovran ruler the man who knoweth all thine ancient exploits.
यथायथा वर्ष्ण्यानि सवगूर्तापांसि राजन नर्याविवेषीः|	hath told these deeds of might as thou hast wrought them great acts spontaneous and to mans advantage.
नू षटुत इन्द्र नू गर्णान इषं जरित्रे नद्यो न पीपेः|	now indra lauded glorified with praises let powers swell high like rivers for the singer.
अकारि ते हरिवो बरह्म नव्यं धिया सयाम रथ्यः सदासाः|	for thee a new hymn lord of bays is fashioned may we carborne through song be victors ever.
आ तू न इन्द्र वर्त्रहन्न अस्माकम अर्धम आ गहि|	o thou who slewest vṛtra come o indra hither to our side.
महान महीभिर ऊतिभिः|	mighty one with thy mighty aids.
भर्मिश चिद घासि तूतुजिर आ चित्र चित्रिणीष्व आ|	swift and impetuous art thou wondrous amid the welldressed folk.
चित्रं कर्णोष्य ऊतये|	thou doest marvels for our help.
दभ्रेभिश चिच छशीयांसं हंसि वराधन्तम ओजसा|	even with the weak thou smitest down him.
सखिभिर ये तवे सचा|	who is stronger with thy strength.
वयम इन्द्र तवे सचा वयं तवाभि नोनुमः|	the mighty with the friends thou hast.
अस्मांअस्मां इद उद अव|	o indra we are close to thee to thee we sing aloud our songs.
स नश चित्राभिर अद्रिवो ऽनवद्याभिर ऊतिभिः|	help and defend us even us.
अनाध्र्ष्टाभिर आ गहि|	as such o caster of the stone come with thy succours wonderful.
भूयामो षु तवावतः सखाय इन्द्र गोमतः|	blameless and irresistible.
युजो वाजाय घर्ष्वये|	may we be friends of one like thee o indra with the wealth of kine.
तवं हय एक ईशिष इन्द्र वाजस्य गोमतः|	comrades for lively energy.
स नो यन्धि महीम इषम|	for thou o indra art alone the lord of strength that comes from kine.
न तवा वरन्ते अन्यथा यद दित्ससि सतुतो मघम|	so grant thou us abundant food.
सतोत्र्भ्य इन्द्र गिर्वणः|	they turn thee not another way when lauded lover of the song.
अभि तवा गोतमा गिरानूषत पर दावने|	thou wilt give wealth to those who praise.
इन्द्र वाजाय घर्ष्वये|	the gotamas have sung their song of praise to thee that thou mayst give.
पर ते वोचाम वीर्या या मन्दसान आरुजः|	indra for lively energy.
पुरो दासीर अभीत्य|	we will declare thy hero deeds what dāsa forts thou brakest down.
ता ते गर्णन्ति वेधसो यानि चकर्थ पौंस्या|	attacking them in rapturous joy.
सुतेष्व इन्द्र गिर्वणः|	the sages sing those manly deeds which indra lover of the song.
अवीव्र्धन्त गोतमा इन्द्र तवे सतोमवाहसः|	thou wroughtest when the soma flowed.
ऐषु धा वीरवद यशः|	indra the gotamas who bring thee praises have grown strong by thee.
यच चिद धि शश्वताम असीन्द्र साधारणस तवम|	give them renown with hero sons.
तं तवा वयं हवामहे|	for indra verily thou art the general treasure even of all.
अर्वाचीनो वसो भवास्मे सु मत्स्वान्धसः|	thee therefore do we invocate.
सोमानाम इन्द्र सोमपाः|	excellent indra turn to us glad thee among us with the juice.
अस्माकं तवा मतीनाम आ सतोम इन्द्र यछतु|	of somas somadrinker thou.
अर्वाग आ वर्तया हरी|	may praise from us who think qn thee o indra bring thee near to us.
पुरोळाशं च नो घसो जोषयासे गिरश च नः|	turn thy two bay steeds hitherward.
वधूयुर इव योषणाम|	eat of our sacrificial cake rejoice thee in the songs we sing.
सहस्रं वयतीनां युक्तानाम इन्द्रम ईमहे|	even as a lover in his bride.
शतं सोमस्य खार्यः|	to india for a thousand steeds welltrained and fleet of foot we pray.
सहस्रा ते शता वयं गवाम आ चयावयामसि|	and hundred jars of soma juice.
अस्मत्रा राध एतु ते|	we make a hundred of thy kine yea and a thousand hasten nigh.
दश ते कलशानां हिरण्यानाम अधीमहि|	so let thy bounty come to us.
भूरिदा असि वर्त्रहन|	we have obtained a gift from thee ten waterewers wrought of gold.
भूरिदा भूरि देहि नो मा दभ्रम भूर्य आ भर|	thou vṛtraslayer givest much.
भूरि घेद इन्द्र दित्ससि|	a bounteous giver give us much bring much and not a trifling gift.
भूरिदा हय असि शरुतः पुरुत्रा शूर वर्त्रहन|	much indra wilt thou fain bestow.
आ नो भजस्व राधसि|	o vṛtraslayer thou art famed in many a place as bountiful.
पर ते बभ्रू विचक्षण शंसामि गोषणो नपात|	hero thy bounty let us share.
माभ्यां गा अनु शिश्रथः|	i praise thy pair of tawny steeds wise son of him who giveth kine.
कनीनकेव विद्रधे नवे दरुपदे अर्भके|	terrify not the cows with these.
बभ्रू यामेषु शोभेते|	like two slight images of girls unrobed upon a newwrought post.
अरम म उस्रयाम्णे ऽरम अनुस्रयाम्णे|	so shine the bay steeds in their course.
बभ्रू यामेष्व अस्रिधा|	for me the bays are ready when i start or start not with the dawn innocuous in the ways they take.
वायो शुक्रो अयामि ते मध्वो अग्रं दिविष्टिषु|	vāyu the bright is offered thee best of the meath at holy rites.
आ याहि सोमपीतये सपार्हो देव नियुत्वता|	come thou to drink the soma juice god longedfor on thy teamdrawn car.
इन्द्रश च वायव एषां सोमानाम पीतिम अर्हथः|	o vāyu thou and indra are meet drinkers of these somadraughts.
युवां हि यन्तीन्दवो निम्नम आपो न सध्र्यक|	for unto you the drops proceed as waters gather to the vale.
वायव इन्द्रश च शुष्मिणा सरथं शवसस पती|	o indravāyu mighty twain speeding together lords of strength.
नियुत्वन्ता न ऊतय आ यातं सोमपीतये|	come to our succour with your team that ye may drink the soma juice.
या वां सन्ति पुरुस्प्र्हो नियुतो दाशुषे नरा|	the longedfor teams which ye possess o heroes for the worshipper.
अस्मे ता यज्ञवाहसेन्द्रवायू नि यछतम|	turn to us indravāyu ye to whom the sacrifice is paid.
यन न इन्द्रो जुजुषे यच च वष्टि तन नो महान करति शुष्म्य आ चित|	that gift of ours which indra loves and welcomes even that he makes for us the great and strong one.
बरह्म सतोमम मघवा सोमम उक्था यो अश्मानं शवसा बिभ्रद एति|	he who comes wielding in his might the thunder maghavan gives prayer praise and laud and soma.
वर्षा वर्षन्धिं चतुरश्रिम अस्यन्न उग्रो बाहुभ्यां नर्तमः शचीवान|	bull hurler of the fouredged rainproducer with both his arms strong mighty most heroic.
शरिये परुष्णीम उषमाण ऊर्णां यस्याः पर्वाणि सख्याय विव्ये|	wearing as wool paruṣṇī for adornment whose joints for sake of friendship he hath covered.
यो देवो देवतमो जायमानो महो वाजेभिर महद्भिश च शुष्मैः|	god who of all the gods was born divinest endowed with ample strength and mighty powers.
दधानो वज्रम बाह्वोर उशन्तं दयाम अमेन रेजयत पर भूम|	and bearing in his arms the yearning thunder with violent rush caused heaven and earth to tremble.
विश्वा रोधांसि परवतश च पूर्वीर दयौर रष्वाज जनिमन रेजत कषाः|	before the high god at his birth heaven trembled earth many floods and all the precipices.
आ मातरा भरति शुष्म्य आ गोर नर्वत परिज्मन नोनुवन्त वाताः|	the strong one bringeth nigh the bulls two parents loud sing the winds like men in airs midregion.
ता तू त इन्द्र महतो महानि विश्वेष्व इत सवनेषु परवाच्या|	these are thy great deeds indra thine the mighty deeds to be told aloud at all libations.
यच छूर धर्ष्णो धर्षता दध्र्ष्वान अहिं वज्रेण शवसाविवेषीः|	that thou o hero bold and boldly daring didst with thy bolt by strength destroy the dragon.
ता तू ते सत्या तुविन्र्म्ण विश्वा पर धेनवः सिस्रते वर्ष्ण ऊध्नः|	true are all these thy deeds o most heroic the milchkine issued from the streaming udder.
अधा ह तवद वर्षमणो भियानाः पर सिन्धवो जवसा चक्रमन्त|	in fear of thee o thou of manly spirit the rivers swiftly set themselves in motion.
अत्राह ते हरिवस ता उ देवीर अवोभिर इन्द्र सतवन्त सवसारः|	with joy o indra lord of tawny coursers the sisters then these goddesses extolled thee.
यत सीम अनु पर मुचो बद्बधाना दीर्घाम अनु परसितिं सयन्दयध्यै|	when thou didst give the prisoned ones their freedom to wander at their will in long succession.
पिपीळे अंशुर मद्यो न सिन्धुर आ तवा शमी शशमानस्य शक्तिः|	pressed is the gladdening stalk as twere a river so let the rite the toilers power attract thee.
अस्मद्र्यक छुशुचानस्य यम्या आशुर न रश्मिं तुव्योजसं गोः|	to usward of the bright one as the courser strains his exceedingly strong leather bridle.
अस्मे वर्षिष्ठा कर्णुहि जयेष्ठा नर्म्णानि सत्रा सहुरे सहांसि|	ever by us perform thy most heroic thine highest best victorious deeds o victor.
अस्मभ्यं वर्त्रा सुहनानि रन्धि जहि वधर वनुषो मर्त्यस्य|	for us make vṛtras easy to be conquered destroy the weapon of our mortal foeman.
अस्माकम इत सु शर्णुहि तवम इन्द्रास्मभ्यं चित्रां उप माहि वाजान|	graciously listen to our prayer o indra and strength of varied sort bestow thou on us.
अस्मभ्यं विश्वा इषणः पुरंधीर अस्माकं सु मघवन बोधि गोदाः|	send to us all intelligence arid wisdom o maghavan be he who gives us cattle.
नू षटुत इन्द्र नू गर्णान इषं जरित्रे नद्यो न पीपेः|	now indra lauded glorified with praises let wealth swell high like rivers to the singer.
अकारि ते हरिवो बरह्म नव्यं धिया सयाम रथ्यः सदासाः|	for thee a new hymn lord of bays is fashioned may we carborne through song be victors ever.
तद देवस्य सवितुर वार्यम महद वर्णीमहे असुरस्य परचेतसः|	of savitar the god the sapient asura we crave this great gift which is worthy of our choice.
छर्दिर येन दाशुषे यछति तमना तन नो महां उद अयान देवो अक्तुभिः|	wherewith he freely grants his worshiper defence this with his rays the great god hath vouchsafed to us.
दिवो धर्ता भुवनस्य परजापतिः पिशङगं दरापिम परति मुञ्चते कविः|	sustainer of the heaven lord of the whole worlds life the sage he putteth on his goldencoloured mail.
विचक्षणः परथयन्न आप्र्णन्न उर्व अजीजनत सविता सुम्नम उक्थ्यम|	clearsighted spreading far filling the spacious realm savitar hath brought forth bliss that deserveth laud.
आप्रा रजांसि दिव्यानि पार्थिवा शलोकं देवः कर्णुते सवाय धर्मणे|	he hath filled full the regions of the heaven and earth the god for his own strengthening waketh up the hymn.
पर बाहू अस्राक सविता सवीमनि निवेशयन परसुवन्न अक्तुभिर जगत|	savitar hath stretched out his arms to cherish life producing with his rays and lulling all that moves.
अदाभ्यो भुवनानि परचाकशद वरतानि देवः सविताभि रक्षते|	lighting all living creatures neer to be deceived savitar god protects each holy ordinance.
परास्राग बाहू भुवनस्य परजाभ्यो धर्तव्रतो महो अज्मस्य राजति|	he hath stretched out his arms to all the folk of earth and with his laws observed rules his own mighty course.
तरिर अन्तरिक्षं सविता महित्वना तरी रजांसि परिभुस तरीणि रोचना|	savitar thrice surrounding with his mightiness midair three regions and the triple sphere of light.
तिस्रो दिवः पर्थिवीस तिस्र इन्वति तरिभिर वरतैर अभि नो रक्षति तमना|	sets the three heavens in motion and the threefold earth and willingly protects us with his triple law.
बर्हत्सुम्नः परसवीता निवेशनो जगत सथातुर उभयस्य यो वशी|	most gracious god who brings to life and lulls to rest he who controls the world what moves not and what moves.
स नो देवः सविता शर्म यछत्व अस्मे कषयाय तरिवरूथम अंहसः|	may he vouchsafe us sheltersavitar the godfor tranquil life with triple bar against distress.
आगन देव रतुभिर वर्धतु कषयं दधातु नः सविता सुप्रजाम इषम|	with the years seasons hath savitar god come nigh may he prosper our home give food and noble sons.
स नः कषपाभिर अहभिश च जिन्वतु परजावन्तं रयिम अस्मे सम इन्वतु|	may he invigorate us through the days and nights and may he send us opulence with progeny.
को अद्य नर्यो देवकाम उशन्न इन्द्रस्य सख्यं जुजोष|	what friend of man godloving hath delighted yearning therefor this day in indras friendship.
को वा महे ऽवसे पार्याय समिद्धे अग्नौ सुतसोम ईट्टे|	who with enkindled flame and flowing soma laudeth him for his great protecting favour.
को नानाम वचसा सोम्याय मनायुर वा भवति वस्त उस्राः|	who hath with prayer bowed to the somalover what pious man endues the beams of morning.
क इन्द्रस्य युज्यं कः सखित्वं को भरात्रं वष्टि कवये क ऊती|	who seeks bond friendship brotherhood with indra who hath recourse unto the sage for succour.
को देवानाम अवो अद्या वर्णीते क आदित्यां अदितिं जयोतिर ईट्टे|	who claims today the deities protection asks aditi for light or the Ādityas.
कस्याश्विनाव इन्द्रो अग्निः सुतस्यांशोः पिबन्ति मनसाविवेनम|	of whose pressed stalk of soma drink the aśvins indra and agni wellinclined in spirit.
तस्मा अग्निर भारतः शर्म यंसज जयोक पश्यात सूर्यम उच्चरन्तम|	to him shall agni bhārata give shelter long shall he look upon the sun uprising.
य इन्द्राय सुनवामेत्य आह नरे नर्याय नर्तमाय नर्णाम|	who sayeth let us press the juice for indra mans friend the hero manliest of heroes.
न तं जिनन्ति बहवो न दभ्रा उर्व अस्मा अदितिः शर्म यंसत|	him neither few men overcome nor many to him shall aditi give spacious shelter.
परियः सुक्र्त परिय इन्द्रे मनायुः परियः सुप्रावीः परियो अस्य सोमी|	dear is the pious the devout to indra dear is the zealous dear the somabringer.
सुप्राव्यः पराशुषाळ एष वीरः सुष्वेः पक्तिं कर्णुते केवलेन्द्रः|	this hero curbs the mighty for the zealous the pressers brew indra possesses solely.
नासुष्वेर आपिर न सखा न जामिर दुष्प्राव्यो ऽवहन्तेद अवाचः|	no brother kin or friend to him who pours not destroyer of the dumb who would resist him.
न रेवता पणिना सख्यम इन्द्रो ऽसुन्वता सुतपाः सं गर्णीते|	not with the wealthy churl who pours no soma doth indra somadrinker bind alliance.
आस्य वेदः खिदति हन्ति नग्नं वि सुष्वये पक्तये केवलो भूत|	he draws away his wealth and slays him naked own friend to him who offers for oblation.
इन्द्रम परे ऽवरे मध्यमास इन्द्रं यान्तो ऽवसितास इन्द्रम|	highest and lowest men who stand between diem going returning dwelling in contentment.
इन्द्रं कषियन्त उत युध्यमाना इन्द्रं नरो वाजयन्तो हवन्ते|	those who show forth their strength when urged to battlethese are the men who call for aid on indra.
परेष्ठं वो अतिथिं सतुषे मित्रमिव परियम|	songlover like a charioteer come songs to thee when soma flows.
अग्निं रथं न वेद्यम|	o indra they have called to thee as motherkine unto their calves.
कविमिव परचेतसं यं देवासो अध दविता|	bright juices bitherward have sped thee indra lover of the song.
नि मर्त्येष्वादधुः|	drink indra of this flowing sap in every house tis set for thee.
तवं यविष्ठ दाशुषो नॄन पाहि शर्णुधी गिरः|	drink soma to inspirit thee juice indra which the falcon brought.
रक्षा तोकमुत तमना|	for thou art king and sovran lord of all the families of men.
कया ते अग्ने अङगिर ऊर्जो नपादुपस्तुतिम|	o indra hear tirascis call the call of him who serveth thee.
वराय देव मन्यवे|	satisfy him with wealth of kine and valiant offspring great art thou.
दाशेम कस्य मनसा यज्ञस्य सहसो यहो|	for he o indra hath produced for thee the newest gladdening song.
कदु वोच इदंनमः|	a hymn that springs from careful thought ancient and full of sacred truth.
अधा तवं हि नस करो विश्वा अस्मभ्यं सुक्षितीः|	that indra will we laud whom songs and hymns of praise have magnified.
वाजद्रविणसो गिरः|	striving to win we celebrate his many deeds of hero might.
कस्य नूनं परीणसो धियो जिन्वसि दम्पते|	come now and let us glorify pure indra with pure sāma hymns.
गोषाता यस्यते गिरः|	let the pure milky draught delight him strengthened by pure songs of praise.
तं मर्जयन्त सुक्रतुं पुरोयावानमाजिषु|	o indra come thou pure to us with pure assistance pure thyself.
सवेषु कषयेषुवाजिनम|	pure send thou riches down to us and meet for soma pure be glad.
कषेति कषेमेभिः साधुभिर्नकिर्यं घनन्ति हन्ति यः|	o indra pure vouchsafe us wealth and pure enrich the worshipper.
अग्ने सुवीर एधते|	pure thou dost strike the vṛtras dead and strivest pure to win the spoil.
इन्द्राग्नी युवं सु नः सहन्ता दासथो रयिम|	indra and agni surely ye as conquerors will give us wealth.
येन दर्ळ्हा समत्स्वा वीळु चित साहिषीमह्यग्निर्वनेव वात इन नभन्तामन्यके समे|	whereby in fight we may oercome that which is strong and firmly fixed as agni burns the woods with wind let all the others die away.
नहि वां वव्रयामहेअथेन्द्रमिद यजामहे शविष्ठं नर्णां नरम|	we set no snares to tangle you indra we worship and adore hero of heroes mightiest.
स नः कदा चिदर्वता गमदा वाजसातयेगमदा मेधसातये नभन्तामन्यके समे|	once may he come unto us with his steed come unto us to win us strength and to complete the sacrifice.
ता हि मध्यं भराणामिन्द्राग्नी अधिक्षितः|	for famous indraagni ye are dwellers in the midst of frays.
ता उ कवित्वना कवी पर्छ्यमाना सखीयते सं धीतमश्नुतं नरा नभन्तामन्यके समे|	sages in wisdom ye are knit to him who seeketh you as friends heroes bestow on him his wish.
अभ्यर्च नभाकवदिन्द्राग्नी यजसा गिरा|	nabhākalike with sacred song indras and agnis praise i sing.
ययोर्विश्वमिदं जगदियं दयौः पर्थिवी मह्युपस्थे बिभ्र्तो वसु नभन्तामन्यके समे|	theirs to whom all this world belongs this heaven and this mighty earth which bear rich treasure in their lap.
पर बरह्माणि नभाकवदिन्द्राग्निभ्यामिरज्यत|	to indra and to agni send your prayers as was nabhākas wont.
या सप्तबुध्नमर्णवं जिह्मबारमपोर्णुत इन्द्र ईशान ओजसा नभन्तामन्यके समे|	who oped with sideway opening the sea with its foundations sevenindra all powerful in his might.
अपि वर्श्च पुराणवद वरततेरिव गुष्पितमोजो दासस्य दम्भय|	tear thou asunder as of old like tangles of a creeping plant.
वयं तदस्य सम्भ्र्तं वस्विन्द्रेण वि भजेमहि नभन्तामन्यके समे|	demolish thou the dāsas might may we with indras help divide the treasure he hath gathered up.
यदिन्द्राग्नी जना इमे विह्वयन्ते तना गिरा|	what time with this same song these men call indraagni sundry ways.
अस्माकेभिर्न्र्भिर्वयं सासह्याम पर्तन्यतो वनुयाम वनुष्यतो नभन्तामन्यके समे|	may we with our own heroes quell those who provoke us to the fight and conquer those who strive with us.
या नु शवेताववो दिव उच्चरात उप दयुभिः|	the two refulgent with their beams rise and come downward from the sky.
इन्द्राग्न्योरनु वरतमुहाना यन्ति सिन्धवो यान सीं बन्धादमुञ्चतां नभन्तामन्यके समे|	by indras and by agnis hest flowing away the rivers run which they released from their restraint.
पूर्वीष ट इन्द्रोपमातयः पूर्वीरुत परशस्तयः सूनोहिन्वस्य हरिवः|	o indra many are thine aids many thy ways of guiding us.
वस्वो वीरस्याप्र्चो या नु साधन्त नो धियो नभन्तामन्यके समे|	lord of the bay steeds hinvas son to a good hero come our prayers which soon shall have accomplishment.
तं शिशीता सुव्र्क्तिभिस्त्वेषं सत्वानं रग्मियम|	inspire him with your holy hymns the hero bright and glorious.
उतो नुचिद य ओजसा शुष्णस्याण्डानि भेदति जेषत सवर्वतीरपो नभन्तामन्यके समे|	him who with might demolisheth even the brood of Śuṣṇa and winneth for us the heavenly streams.
तं शिशीता सवध्वरं सत्यं सत्वानं रत्वियम|	inspire him worshipped with fair rites the glorious hero truly brave.
उतो नुचिद य ओहत आण्डा शुष्णस्य भेदत्यजैः सवर्वतीरपो नभन्तामन्यके समे|	he brake in pieces Śuṣṇas brood who still expected not the stroke and won for us the heavenly streams let all the others die away.
एवेन्द्राग्निभ्यां पित्र्वन नवीयो मन्धात्र्वदङगिरस्वदवाचि|	thus have we sung anew to indraagni as sang our sires aṅgirases and mandhātar.
तरिधातुना शर्मणा पातमस्मान वयं सयाम पतयो रयीणाम|	guard us with triple shelter and preserve us may we be masters of a store of riches.
वयं घ तवा सुतावन्त आपो न वर्क्तबर्हिषः|	we compass thee like waters we whose grass is trimmed and soma pressed.
पवित्रस्यप्रस्रवणेषु वर्त्रहन परि सतोतार आसते|	here where the filter pours its stream thy worshippers round thee o vṛtraslayer sit.
सवरन्ति तवा सुते नरो वसो निरेक उक्थिनः|	men vasu by the soma with lauds call thee to the foremost place.
कदा सुतं तर्षाण ओक आ गम इन्द्र सवब्दीव वंसगः|	when comest thou athirst unto the juice as home o indra like a bellowing bull.
कण्वेभिर्ध्र्ष्णवा धर्षद वाजं दर्षि सहस्रिणम|	boldly bold hero bring us spoil in thousands for the kaṇvas sake.
पिशङगरूपं मघवन विचर्षणे मक्षू गोमन्तमीमहे|	o active maghavan with eager prayer we crave the yellowhued with store ol kine.
पाहि गायान्धसो मद इन्द्राय मेध्यातिथे|	medhyātithi to indra sing drink of the juice to make thee glad.
यः सम्मिश्लोहर्योर्यः सुते सचा वज्री रथो हिरण्ययः|	closeknit to his bay steeds boltarmed beside the juice is he his chariot is of gold.
यः सुषव्यः सुदक्षिण इनो यः सुक्रतुर्ग्र्णे|	he who is praised as strong of hand both right and left most wise and hold.
य आकरः सहस्रा यः शतामघ इन्द्रो यः पूर्भिदारितः|	indra who rich in hundreds gathers thousands up honoured as breakerdown of forts.
यो धर्षितो योअव्र्तो यो अस्ति शमश्रुषु शरितः|	the bold of heart whom none provokes who stands in bearded confidence.
विभूतद्युम्नश्च्यवनः पुरुष्टुतः करत्वा गौरिव शाकिनः|	muchlauded very glorious overthrowing foes strong helper like a bull with might.
क ईं वेद सुते सचा पिबन्तं कद वयो दधे|	who knows what vital ower he wins drinking beside the flowing juice.
अयं यःपुरो विभिनत्त्योजसा मन्दानः शिप्र्यन्धसः|	this is the fairchecked god who joying in the draught breaks down the castles in his strength.
दाना मर्गो न वारणः पुरुत्रा चरथं दधे|	as a wild elephant rushes on this way and that way mad with heat.
नकिष टवा नि यमदा सुते गमो महांश्चरस्योजसा|	none may compel thee yet come hither to the draught thou movest mighty in thy power.
य उग्रः सन्ननिष्ट्र्त सथिरो रणाय संस्क्र्तः|	when he the mighty neer oerthrown steadfast made ready for the fight.
यदि सतोतुर्मघवा शर्णवद धवं नेन्द्रो योषत्या गमत|	when indra maghavan lists to his praisers call he will not stand aloof but come.
सत्यमित्था वर्षेदसि वर्षजूतिर्नोअव्र्तः|	yea verily thou art a bull with a bulls rush whom none may stay.
वर्षा हयुग्र शर्ण्विषे परावति वर्षो अर्वावति शरुतः|	thou mighty one art celebrated as a bull famed as a bull both near and far.
वर्षणस्ते अभीशवो वर्षा कशा हिरण्ययी|	thy reins are very bulls in strength bulls strength is in thy golden whip.
वर्षा रथो मघवन वर्षणा हरी वर्षा तवं सतक्रतो|	thy car o maghavan thy bays are strong as bulls thou Śatakratu art a bull.
वर्षा सोता सुनोतु ते वर्षन्न्र्जीपिन्ना भर|	let the strong presser press for thee bring hither thou straightrushing bull.
वर्षा दधन्वे वर्षणं नदीष्वा तुभ्यं सथातर्हरीणाम|	the mighty makes the mighty run in flowing streams for thee whom thy bay horses bear.
एन्द्र याहि पीतये मधु शविष्ठ सोम्यम|	come thou most potent indra come to drink the savoury soma juice.
नायमछा मघवा शर्णवद गिरो बरह्मोक्था च सुक्रतुः|	maghavan very wise will quickly come to hear the songs the prayer the hymns of praise.
वहन्तु तवा रथेष्ठामा हरयो रथयुजः|	when thou hast mounted on thy car let thy yoked bay steeds carry thee.
तिरश्चिदर्यं सवनानि वर्त्रहन्नन्येषां या शतक्रतो|	past other mens libations lord of hundred powers thee vṛtraslayer thee our friend.
अस्माकमद्यान्तमं सतोमं धिष्व महामह|	o thou most lofty one accept our laud as nearest to thine heart.
अस्माकं ते सवना सन्तु शन्तमा मदाय दयुक्ष सोमपाः|	may our libations be most sweet to make thee glad o somadrinker heavenly lord.
नहि षस्तव नो मम शास्त्रे अन्यस्य रण्यति|	neither in thy decree nor mine but in anothers he delights.
यो अस्मान्वीर आनयत|	the man who brought us unto this.
इन्द्रश्चिद घा तदब्रवीत सत्रिया अशास्यं मनः|	indra himself hath said the mind of woman brooks not discipline.
उतो अह करतुं रघुम|	her intellect hath little weight.
सप्ती चिद घा मदच्युता मिथुना वहतो रथम|	his pair of horses rushing on in their wild transport draw his car.
एवेद धूर्व्र्ष्ण उत्तरा|	highlifted is the stallions yoke.
अधः पश्यस्व मोपरि सन्तरां पादकौ हर|	cast down thine eyes and look not up more closely set thy feet let none.
मा ते कषप्लकौ दर्शन सत्री हि बरह्मा बभूविथ|	see what thy garment veils for thou a brahman hast become a dame.
ईळिष्वा हि परतीव्यं यजस्व जातवेदसम|	worship thou jātavedas pray to him who willingly accepts.
चरिष्णुधूममग्र्भीतशोचिषम|	whose smoke wanders at will and none may grasp his flame.
दामानं विश्वचर्षणेअग्निं विश्वमनो गिरा|	thou all mens friend visvamanas exaltest agni with thy song.
उत सतुषे विष्पर्धसो रथानाम|	the giver and his flames with which no cars contend.
येषामाबाध रग्मिय इषः पर्क्षश्च निग्रभे|	whose resolute assault to win vigour and food deserves our praise.
उपविदावह्निर्विन्दते वसु|	through whose discovering power the priest obtaineth wealth.
उदस्य शोचिरस्थाद दीदियुषो वयजरम|	up springs the imperishable flame the flame of the refulgent one.
तपुर्जम्भस्य सुद्युतो गणश्रियः|	most bright with glowing jaws and glory in his train.
उदु तिष्ठ सवध्वर सतवानो देव्या कर्पा|	skilled in fair sacrifice extolled arise in godlike loveliness.
अभिख्या भासा बर्हता शुशुक्वनिः|	shining with lofty splendour with effulgent light.
अग्ने याहि सुशस्तिभिर्हव्या जुह्वान आनुषक|	called straight to our oblations come o agni through our eulogies.
यथा दूतो बभूथ हव्यवाहनः|	as thou hast been our envoy bearing up our gifts.
अग्निं वः पूर्व्यं हुवे होतारं चर्षणीनाम|	i call your agni from of old invoking priest of living men.
तमया वाचा गर्णे तमु व सतुषे|	him with this song i laud and magnify for you.
यज्ञेभिरद्भुतक्रतुं यं कर्पा सूदयन्त इत|	whom wondrous wise they animate with solemn rites and his fair form.
मित्रं न जने सुधितं रतावनि|	kind as a friend to men who keep the holy law.
रतावानं रतायवो यज्ञस्य साधनं गिरा|	him true to law who perfecteth the sacrifice lawloving ones.
उपो एनं जुजुषुर्नमसस पदे|	ye with your song have gratified in the place of prayer.
अछा नो अङगिरस्तमं यज्ञासो यन्तु संयतः|	may all our sacrifices go to him the truest aṅgiras.
होता यो अस्ति विक्ष्वा यशस्तमः|	who is among mankind the most illustrious priest.
अग्ने तव तये अजरेन्धानासो बर्हद भाः|	imperishable agni thine are all these high enkindled lights.
अश्वा इव वर्षणस्तविषीयवः|	like horses and like stallions showing forth their strength.
स तवं न ऊर्जां पते रयिं रास्व सुवीर्यम|	so give us lord of power and might riches combined with hero strength.
पराव नस्तोके तनये समत्स्वा|	and guard us with our sons and grand sons in our frays.
यद वा उ विश्पतिः शितः सुप्रीतो मनुषो विसि|	soon as the eager lord of men is friendly unto mantis race.
विश्वेदग्निः परति रक्षांसि सेधति|	agni averteth from us all the demon host.
शरुष्ट्यग्ने नवस्य मे सतोमस्य वीर विश्पते|	o hero agni lord of men on hearing this new laud of mine.
नि मायिनस्तपुष रक्षसो दह|	burn down the rākṣasas enchanters with thy flame.
न तस्य मायया चन रिपुरीशीत मर्त्यः|	no mortal foe can eer prevail by arts of magic over him.
यो अग्नये ददाश हव्यदातिभिः|	who serveth agni well with sacrificial gifts.
वयश्वस्त्वा वसुविदमुक्षण्युरप्रीणाद रषिः|	vyaśva the sage who sought the bull hath won thee finder of good things.
महो रयेतमु तवा समिधीमहि|	as such may we enkindle thee for ample wealth.
उशना कव्यस्त्वा नि होतारमसादयत|	uśanā kāvya stablished thee o agni as invoking priest.
आयजिं तवा मनवेजातवेदसम|	thee jātavedas sacrificing priest for man.
विश्वे हि तवा सजोषसो देवासो दूतमक्रत|	all deities of one accord appointed thee their messenger.
शरुष्टी देव परथमो यज्ञियो भुवः|	thou god through hearing hadst first claim to sacrifice.
इमं घा वीरो अम्र्तं दूतं कर्ण्वीत मर्त्यः|	him may the mortal hero make his own immortal messenger.
पावकंक्र्ष्णवर्तनिं विहायसम|	farspreading purifier him whose path is black.
तं हुवेम यतस्रुचः सुभासं शुक्रशोचिषम|	with lifted ladles let us call him splendid with his brilliant flame.
विशामग्निमजरं परत्नमीड्यम|	mens ancient agni wasting not adorable.
यो अस्मै हव्यदातिभिराहुतिं मर्तोअविधत|	the man who pays the worship due to him with sacrificial gifts.
भूरि पोषंस धत्ते वीरवद यशः|	obtains both plenteous nourishment and hero fame.
परथमं जातवेदसमग्निं यज्ञेषु पूर्व्यम|	to jātavedas agni chief in sacrifices first of all.
परति सरुगेति नमसा हविष्मती|	with homage goes the ladle rich with sacred gifts.
आभिर्विधेमाग्नये जयेष्ठाभिर्व्यश्ववत|	even as vyatya did may we with these most high and liberal hymns.
मंहिष्ठाभिर्मतिभिः शुक्रशोचिषे|	pay worship unto agni of the splendid flame.
नूनमर्च विहायसे सतोमेभिः सथूरयूपवत|	now sing as sthurayupa sang with lands to him who spreadeth far.
रषे वैयश्वदम्यायाग्नये|	to agni of the home o Ṛṣi vyaśvas son.
अतिथिं मानुषाणां सूनुं वनस्पतीनाम|	as welcome guest of human kind as offspring of the forest kings.
विप्रा अग्निमवसे परत्नमीळते|	the sages worship ancient agni for his aid.
महो विश्वानभि षतोअभि हव्यानि मानुषा|	for mens oblations brought to him who is the mighty lord of all.
अग्ने नि षत्सि नमसाधि बर्हिषि|	sit agni mid our homage on the sacred grass.
वंस्वा नो वार्या पुरु वंस्व रायः पुरुस्प्र्हः|	grant us abundant treasures grant the opulence which many crave.
सुवीर्यस्य परजावतो यशस्वतः|	with store of heroes progeny and high renown.
तवं वरो सुषाम्णेअग्ने जनाय चोदय|	agni most youthful of the gods send evermore the gift of wealth.
सदा वसो रातिं यविष्ठ शश्वते|	unto varosusaman and to all his folk.
तवं हि सुप्रतूरसि तवं नो गोमतीरिषः|	a mighty conqueror art thou o agni so disclose to us.
महो रायः सातिमग्ने अपा वर्धि|	food in our herds of kine and gain of ample wealth.
अग्ने तवं यशा अस्या मित्रावरुणा वह|	thou agni art a glorious god bring hither mitra varuṇa.
रतावाना सम्राजा पूतदक्षसा|	imperial sovrans holyminded true to law.
यदिन्द्र परागपागुदं नयग वा हूयसे नर्भिः|	though indra thou art called by men eastward and westward north and south.
सिमा पुरू नर्षूतो अस्यानवेअसि परशर्ध तुर्वशे|	thou chiefly art with Ānava and turvaśa brave champion i urged by men to come.
यद वा रुमे रुशमे शयावके कर्प इन्द्र मादयसे सचा|	or indra when with ruma ruśama Śyāvaka and kṛpa thou rejoicest thee.
कण्वासस्त्वा बरह्मभि सतोमवाहस इन्द्रा यछन्त्या गहि|	still do the kaṇvas bringing praises with their prayers o indra draw thee hither come.
यथा गौरो अपा कर्तं तर्ष्यन्नेत्यवेरिणम|	even as the wildbull when he thirsts goes to the deserts watery pool.
आपित्वे नः परपित्वे तूयमा गहि कण्वेषु सु सचा पिब|	come hither quickly both at morning and at eve and with the kaṇvas drink thy fill.
मन्दन्तु तवा मघवन्निन्द्रेन्दवो राधोदेयाय सुन्वते|	may the drops gladden thee rich indra and obtain bounty for him who pours the juice.
आमुष्या सोममपिबश्चमू सुतं जयेष्ठं तद दधिषे सहः|	soma pressed in the mortar didst thou take and drink and hence hast won surpassing might.
पर चक्रे सहसा सहो बभञ्ज मन्युमोजसा|	with mightier strength he conquered strength with energy he crushed their wrath.
विश्वे त इन्द्र पर्तनायवो यहो नि वर्क्षा इव येमिरे|	o indra strong in youth all those who sought the fray bent and bowed down to thee like trees.
सहस्रेणेव सचते यवीयुधा यस्त आनळ उपस्तुतिं पुत्रं परावर्गं कर्णुते सुवीर्ये दाश्नोति नमौक्तिभिः|	he who wins promise of thine aid goes girt as with a thousand mighty men of war.
मा भेम मा शरमिष्मोग्रस्य सख्ये तव|	he makes his son preeminent in hero might he serves with reverential prayer.
महत ते वर्ष्णो अभिचक्ष्यं कर्तं पश्येम तुर्वशं यदुम|	with thee the mighty for our friend we will not fear or feel fatigue.
सव्यामनु सफिग्यं वावसे वर्षा न दानो अस्य रोषति|	may we see turvaśa and yadu thy great deed o hero must be glorified.
मध्वा सम्प्र्क्ताः सारघेण धेनवस्तूयमेहि दरवा पिब|	on his left hip the hero hath reclined himself the proffered feast offends him not.
अश्वी रथी सुरूप इद गोमानिदिन्द्र ते सखा|	the milk is blended with the honey of the bee quickly come hither baste and drink.
शवात्रभजा वयसा सचते सदा चन्द्रो याति सभामुप|	indra thy friend is fair of form and rich in horses cars and kine.
रश्यो न तर्ष्यन्नवपानमा गहि पिबा सोमं वशाननु|	he evermore hath food accompanied by wealth and radiant joins the company.
निमेघमानो मघवन दिवेदिव ओजिष्ठं दधिषे सहः|	come like a thirsty antelope to the drinkingplace drink soma to thy hearts desire.
अध्वर्यो दरावया तवं सोममिन्द्रः पिपासति|	raining it down o maghavan day after day thou gainest thy surpassing might.
उप नूनंयुयुजे वर्षणा हरी आ च जगाम वर्त्रहा|	priest let the soma juice flow forth for indra longs to drink thereof.
सवयं चित स मन्यते दाशुरिर्जनो यत्रा सोमस्य तर्म्पसि|	he even now hath yoked his vigorous bay steeds the vṛtraslayer hath come near.
इदं ते अन्नं युज्यं समुक्षितं तस्येहि पर दरवा पिब|	the man with whom thou fillcst thee with soma deems himself a pious worshipper.
रथेष्ठायाध्वर्यवः सोममिन्द्राय सोतन|	this thine appropriate food is here poured out for thee come hasten forward drink of it.
अधि बरध्नस्याद्रयो वि चक्षते सुन्वन्तो दाश्वध्वरम|	press out the soma juice ye priests for indra borne upon his car.
उप बरध्नं वावाता वर्षणा हरी इन्द्रमपसु वक्षतः|	the pressingstones speak loud of indra while they shed the juice which offered honours him.
अर्वाञ्चं तवा सप्तयोअध्वरश्रियो वहन्तु सवनेदुप|	to the brown juice may his dear vigorous bay steeds bring indra to our holy task.
पर पूषणं वर्णीमहे युज्याय पुरूवसुम|	hither let thy carsteeds who seek the sacrifice bring thee to our drinkofferings.
स शक्र शिक्ष पुरुहूत नो धिया तुजे राये विमोचन|	pūṣan the lord of ample wealth for firm alliance we elect.
सं नः शिशीहि भुरिजोरिव कषुरं रास्व रायो विमोचन|	may he with wisdom Śakra looser muchinvoked aid us to riches and to seed.
तवे तन नः सुवेदमुस्रियं वसु यं तवं हिनोषि मर्त्यम|	sharpen us like a razor in the barbers hands send riches thou who settest free.
वेमि तवा पूषन्न्र्ञ्जसे वेमि सतोतव आघ्र्णे|	easy to find with thee are treasures of the dawn for mortal man whom thou dost speed.
न तस्य वेम्यरणं हि तद वसो सतुषे पज्राय साम्ने|	pūṣan i long to win thy love i long to praise thee radiant god.
परा गावो यवसं कच्चिदाघ्र्णे नित्यं रेक्णो अमर्त्य|	excellent lord tis strange tome no wish have i to sing the psalm that pajra sings.
अस्माकं पूषन्नविता शिवो भव मंहिष्ठो वाजसातये|	my kine o radiant god seek pasture where they will my during wealth immortal one.
सथूरं राधः शताश्वं कुरुङगस्य दिविष्टिषु|	be our protector pūṣan be most liberal lord propitious to our gathering strength.
राज्ञस्त्वेषस्य सुभगस्य रातिषु तुर्वशेष्वमन्महि|	rich was the gift kurunga gave a hundred steeds at morning rites.
धीभिः सातानि काण्वस्य वाजिनः परियमेधैरभिद्युभिः|	among the gifts of turvaśas we thought of him the opulent the splendid king.
षष्टिं सहस्रानु निर्मजामजे निर्यूथानि गवां रषिः|	what by his morning songs kaṇva the powerful hath with the priyamedhas gained.
वर्क्षाश्चिन मे अभिपित्वे अरारणुः|	the herds of sixty thousand pure and spotless kine have i the Ṛṣi driven away.
गां भजन्त मेहनाश्वं भजन्त मेहन|	the very trees were joyful at my coming kine they obtained in plenty steeds in plenty.
नहि वो अस्त्यर्भको देवासो न कुमारकः|	not one of you ye gods is small none of you is a feeble child.
विश्वे सतोमहान्त इत|	all of you verily are great.
इति सतुतासो असथा रिशादसो ये सथ तरयश्च तरिंशच्च|	thus be ye lauded ye destroyers of the foe ye threeandthirty deities.
मनोर्देवा यज्ञियासः|	the gods of man the holy ones.
ते नस्त्राध्वं तेअवत त उ नो अधि वोचत|	as such defend and succour us with benedictions speak to us.
मा नः पथः पित्र्यान मानवादधि दूरं नैष्ट परावतः|	lead us not from our fathers and from manus path into the distance far away.
ये देवास इह सथन विश्वे वैश्वानरा उत|	ye deities who stay with us and all ye gods of all mankind.
अस्मभ्यं शर्म सप्रथो गवेअश्वाय यछत|	give us your wide protection give shelter for cattle and for steed.
पर सम्राजं चर्षणीनामिन्द्रं सतोता नव्यं गीर्भिः|	praise indra whom our songs must laud sole sovran of mankind the chief.
नरं नर्षाहं मंहिष्ठम|	most liberal who controlleth men.
यस्मिन्नुक्थानि रण्यन्ति विश्वानि च शरवस्या|	in whom the hymns of praise delight and all the glorygiving songs.
अपामवोन समुद्रे|	like the floods longing for the sea.
तं सुष्टुत्या विवासे जयेष्ठराजं भरे कर्त्नुम|	him i invite with eulogy best king effective in the fight.
महो वाजिनं सनिभ्यः|	strong for the gain of mighty spoil.
यस्यानूना गभीरा मदा उरवस्तरुत्राः|	whose perfect ecstasies are wide profound victorious and give.
हर्षुमन्तःशूरसातौ|	joy in the field where heroes win.
तमिद धनेषु हितेष्वधिवाकाय हवन्ते|	him when the spoils of war are staked men call to be their advocate.
येषामिन्द्रस्ते जयन्ति|	they who have indra win the day.
तमिच्च्यौत्नैरार्यन्ति तं कर्तेभिश्चर्षणयः|	men honour him with stirring songs and magnify with solemn rites.
एषैन्द्रो वरिवस्क्र्त|	indra is he who giveth case.
इन्द्रो बरह्मेन्द्र रषिरिन्द्रः पुरू पुरुहूतः|	indra is priest and Ṛṣi he is much invoked by many men.
महान महीभिः शचीभिः|	and mighty by his mighty powers.
स सतोम्यः स हव्यः सत्यः सत्वा तुविकूर्मिः|	meet to be lauded and invoked true hero with his deeds of might.
एकश्चित्सन्नभिभूतिः|	victorious even when alone.
तमर्केभिस्तं सामभिस्तं गायत्रैश्चर्षणयः|	the men the people magnify that indra with their slina songs.
इन्द्रं वर्धन्ति कषितयः|	with hymns and sacred eulogies.
परणेतारं वस्यो अछा कर्तारं जयोतिः समत्सु|	him who advances them to wealth sends light to lead them in the war.
सासह्वांसं युधामित्रान|	and quells their foemen in the fray.
स नः पप्रिः पारयाति सवस्ति नावा पुरुहूतः|	may he the saviour muchinvoked may indra bear us in a ship.
इन्द्रो विश्वा अति दविषः|	safely beyond all enemies.
स तवं न इन्द्र वाजेभिर्दशस्या च गातुया च|	as such o indra honour us with gifts of booty further us.
अछा चनः सुम्नं नेषि|	and lead us to felicity.
सवादोरभक्षि वयसः सुमेधाः सवाध्यो वरिवोवित्तरस्य|	wisely have i enjoyed the savoury viand religiousthoughted best to find out treasure.
विश्वे यं देवा उत मर्त्यासो मधु बरुवन्तो अभि संचरन्ति|	the food to which all deities and mortals calling it meath gather themselves together.
अन्तश्च परागा अदितिर्भवास्यवयाता हरसो दैव्यस्य|	tlou shalt be aditi as thou hast entered within appeaser of celestial anger.
इन्दविन्द्रस्य सख्यं जुषाणः शरौष्टीव धुरमनु राय रध्याः|	indu enjoying indras friendship bring usas a swift steed the carforward to riches.
अपाम सोममम्र्ता अभूमागन्म जयोतिरविदाम देवान|	we have drunk soma and become immortal we have attained the light the gods discovered.
किं नूनमस्मान कर्णवदरातिः किमु धूर्तिरम्र्त मर्त्यस्य|	now what may foemans malice do to harm us what o immortal mortal mans deception.
शं नो भव हर्द आ पीत इन्दो पितेव सोम सूनवे सुशेवः|	absorbed into the heart be sweet o indu as a kind father to his son o soma.
सखेव सख्य उरुशंस धीरः पर ण आयुर्जीवसे सोमतारीः|	as a wise friend to friend do thou wideruler o soma lengthen out our days for living.
इमे मा पीता यशस उरुष्यवो रथं न गावः समनाहपर्वसु|	these glorious drops that give me freedom have i drunk closely they knit my joints as straps secure a car.
ते मा रक्षन्तु विस्रसश्चरित्रादुत मा सरामाद्यवयन्त्विन्दवः|	let them protect my foot from slipping on the way yea let the drops i drink preserve me from disease.
अग्निं न मा मथितं सं दिदीपः पर चक्षय कर्णुहि वस्यसो नः|	make me shine bright like fire produced by friction give us a clearer sight and make us better.
अथा हि ते मद आ सोम मन्ये रेवानिव पर चरापुष्टिमछ|	for in carouse i think of thee o soma shall i as a rich man attain to comfort.
इषिरेण ते मनसा सुतस्य भक्षीमहि पित्र्यस्येव रायः|	may we enjoy with an enlivened spirit the juice thou givest like ancestral riches.
सोम राजन पर ण आयूंषि तारीरहानीव सूर्यो वासराणि|	o soma king prolong thou our existence as sūrya makes the shining days grow longer.
सोम राजन मर्ळया नः सवस्ति तव समसि वरत्यास्तस्य विद्धि|	king soma favour us and make us prosper we are thy devotees of this be mindful.
अलर्ति दक्ष उत मन्युरिन्दो मा नो अर्यो अनुकामं परादाः|	spirit and power are fresh in us o indu give us not up unto our foemans pleasure.
तवं हि नस्तन्वः सोम गोपा गात्रेगात्रे निषसत्था नर्चक्षाः|	for thou hast settled in each joint o soma aim of mens eyes and guardian of our bodies.
यत ते वयं परमिनाम वरतानि स नो मर्ळ सुषखादेव वस्यः|	when we offend against thine holy statutes as a kind friend god best of all be gracious.
रदूदरेण साख्या सचेय यो मा न रिष्येद धर्यश्व पीतः|	may i be with the friend whose heart is tender who lord of bays when quaffed will never harm me.
अयं यः सोमो नयधाय्यस्मे तस्मा इन्द्रं परतिरमेम्यायुः|	this soma now deposited within me for this i pray for longer life to indra.
अप तया अस्थुरनिरा अमीवा निरत्रसन तमिषीचीरभैषुः|	our maladies have lost their strength and vanished they feared and passed away into the darkness.
आ सोमो अस्मानरुहद विहाया अगन्म यत्र परतिरन्त आयुः|	soma hath risen in us exceeding mighty and we are come where men prolong existence.
यो न इन्दुः पितरो हर्त्सु पीतोअमर्त्यो मर्त्यानाविवेश|	fathers that indu which our hearts have drunken immortal in himself hath entered mortals.
तस्मै सोमाय हविषा विधेम मर्ळीके अस्य सुमतौ सयाम|	so let us serve this soma with oblation and rest securely in his grace and favour.
तवं सोम पित्र्भिः संविदानोअनु दयावाप्र्थिवी आ ततन्थ|	associate with the fathers thou o soma hast spread thyself abroad through earth and heaven.
तस्मै त इन्दो हविषा विधेम वयं सयाम पतयो रयीणाम|	so with oblation let us serve thee indu and so let us become the lords of riches.
तरातारो देवा अधि वोचता नो मा नो निद्रा ईशत मोत जल्पिः|	give us your blessing o ye gods preservers never may sleep or idle talk control us.
वयं सोमस्य विश्वह परियासः सुवीरासो विदथमावदेम|	but evermore may we as friends of soma speak to the synod with brave sons around us.
तवं नः सोम विश्वतो वयोधास्त्वं सवर्विदा विशा नर्चक्षाः|	on all sides soma thou art our lifegiver aim of all eyes lightfinder come within us.
तवं न इन्द ऊतिभिः सजोषाः पाहि पश्चातादुत वा पुरस्तात|	indu of one accord with thy protections both from behind and from before preserve us.
यदिन्द्र परागपागुदं नयग वा हूयसे नर्भिः|	not to forsake me i invoke this indra girt by maruts.
आ याहि तूयमाशुभिः|	lord of magic power who rules with might.
यद वा परस्रवणे दिवो मादयासे सवर्णरे|	this indra with his marut friends clave into pieces vṛtras bead.
यद वा समुद्रेन्धसः|	with hundredknotted thunderbolt.
आ तवा गीर्भिर्महामुरुं हुवे गामिव भोजसे|	indra with marut friends grown strong hath rent asunder vṛtra and.
इन्द्र सोमस्य पीतये|	released the waters of the sea.
आ त इन्द्र महिमानं हरयो देव ते महः|	this is that indra who begirt by maruts won the light of heaven.
रथे वहन्तु बिभ्रतः|	that he might drink the soma juice.
इन्द्र गर्णीष उ सतुषे महानुग्र ईशानक्र्त|	mighty impetuous begirt by maruts him who loudly roars.
एहि नः सुतं पिब|	indra we invocate with songs.
सुतावन्तस्त्वा वयं परयस्वन्तो हवामहे|	indra begirt by maruts we invoke after the ancient plan.
इदं नो बर्हिरासदे|	that he may drink the soma juice.
यच्चिद धि शश्वतामसीन्द्र साधारणस्त्वम|	o liberal indra marutgirt muchlauded Śatakratu drink.
तं तवा वयं हवामहे|	the soma at this sacrifice.
इदं ते सोम्यं मध्वधुक्षन्नद्रिभिर्नरः|	to thee o indra marutgirt these soma juices thunderer.
जुषाण इन्द्र तत पिब|	are offered from the heart with lauds.
विश्वानर्यो विपश्चितोअति खयस्तूयमा गहि|	drink indra with thy marut friends pressed soma at the morning rites.
अस्मे धेहिश्रवो बर्हत|	whetting thy thunderbolt with strength.
दाता मे पर्षतीनां राजा हिरण्यवीनाम|	arising in thy might thy jaws thou shookest indra having quaffed.
मा देवा मघवा रिषत|	the soma which the mortar pressed.
सहस्रे पर्षतीनामधि शचन्द्रं बर्हत पर्थु|	indra both worlds complained to thee when uttering thy fearful roar.
शुक्रं हिरण्यमा ददे|	what time thou smotest dasyus dead.
नपातो दुर्गहस्य मे सहस्रेण सुराधसः|	from indra have i measured out a song eightfooted with nine parts.
शरवो देवेष्वक्रत|	delicate faithful to the law.
तं वभि पर गायत पुरुहूतं पुरुष्टुतम|	sing forth to him whom many men invoke to him whom many laud.
इन्द्रं गीर्भिस्तविषमा विवासत|	invite the powerful indra with your songs of praise.
यस्य दविबर्हसो बर्हत सहो दाधार रोदसी|	whose lofty mightfor doubly strong is hesupports the heavens and earth.
गिरीन्रज्रानपः सवर्व्र्षत्वना|	and hills and plains and floods and light with manly power.
स राजसि पुरुष्टुत एको वर्त्राणि जिघ्नसे|	such praised by many thou art king alone thou smitest vṛtras dead.
इन्द्र जैत्रा शरवस्या च यन्तवे|	to gain o indra spoils of war and high renown.
तं ते मदं गर्णीमसि वर्षणं पर्त्सु सासहिम|	we sing this strong and wild delight of thine which conquers in the fray.
उ लोकक्र्त्नुमद्रिवो हरिश्रियम|	which caster of the stone gives room and shines like gold.
येन जयोतींष्यायवे मनवे च विवेदिथ|	wherewith thou also foundest lights for Āyu and for manus sake.
मन्दानो अस्य बर्हिषो वि राजसि|	now joying in this sacred grass thou beamest forth.
तदद्या चित त उक्थिनोअनु षटुवन्ति पूर्वथा|	this day too singers of the hymn praise as of old this might of thine.
वर्षपत्नीरपो जया दिवेदिवे|	win thou the waters day by day thralls of the strong.
तव तयदिन्द्रियं बर्हत तव शुष्ममुत करतुम|	that lofty indrapower of thine thy strength and thine intelligence.
वज्रं शिशाति धिषणा वरेण्यम|	thy thunderbolt for which we long the wish makes keen.
तव दयौरिन्द्र पौंस्यं पर्थिवी वर्धति शरवः|	o indra heaven and earth augment thy manly power and thy renown.
तवामापः पर्वतासश्च हिन्विरे|	the waters and thy mountains stir and urge thee on.
तवां विष्णुर्ब्र्हन कषयो मित्रो गर्णाति वरुणः|	viṣṇu the lofty ruling power varuṇa mitra sing thy praise.
तवांशर्धो मदत्यनु मारुतम|	in thee the marut3 company have great delight.
तवं वर्षा जनानां मंहिष्ठ इन्द्र जज्ञिषे|	o indra thou wast born the lord of men most liberal of thy gifts.
सत्रा विश्वा सवपत्यानि दधिषे|	excellent deeds for evermore are all thine own.
सत्रा तवं पुरुष्टुत एको वर्त्राणि तोशसे|	ever alone o highlypraised thou sendest vṛtras to their rest.
नान्य इन्द्रात्करणं भूय इन्वति|	none else than indra executes the mighty deed.
यदिन्द्र मन्मशस्त्वा नाना हवन्त ऊतये|	though here and there in varied hymns indra men call on thee for aid.
अस्माकेभिर्न्र्भिरत्रा सवर्जय|	still with our heroes fight and win the light of heaven.
अरं कषयाय नो महे विश्वा रूपाण्याविशन|	already have all forms of him entered our spacious dwellingplace.
इन्द्रं जैत्राय हर्षया शचीपतिम|	for victory stir thou indra up the lord of might.
आ नो विश्वाभिरूतिभिरश्विना गछतं युवम|	with all the succours that are yours o aśvins hither come to us.
दस्रा हिरण्यवर्तनी पिबतं सोम्यं मधु|	wonderful borne on paths of gold drink ye the meath with soma juice.
आ नूनं यातमश्विना रथेन सूर्यत्वचा|	come now ye aśvins on your car decked with a sunbright canopy.
भुजी हिरण्यपेशसा कवी गम्भीरचेतसा|	bountiful with your golden forms sages with depth of intellect.
आ यातं नहुषस पर्यान्तरिक्षात सुव्र्क्तिभिः|	come hither from the nahusas come drawn by pure hymns from midair.
पिबाथोश्विना मधु कण्वानां सवने सुतम|	o aśvins drink the savoury juice shed in the kaṇvas sacrifice.
आ नो यातं दिवस पर्यान्तरिक्षादधप्रिया|	come to us hither from the heavens come from midair wellloved by us.
पुत्रः कण्वस्य वामिह सुषाव सोम्यं मधु|	here kaṇvas son hath pressed for you the pleasant meath of soma juice.
आ नो यातमुपश्रुत्यश्विना सोमपीतये|	come aśvins to give car to us to drink the soma aśvins come.
सवाहा सतोमस्य वर्धना पर कवी धीतिभिर्नरा|	hail strengtheners of the praisesong speed onward ye heroes with your thoughts.
यच्चिद धि वां पुर रषयो जुहूरेअवसे नरा|	as heroes in the olden time the Ṛṣis called you to their aid.
आ यातमश्विना गतमुपेमां सुष्टुतिं मम|	so now o aśvins come to us come near to this mine eulogy.
दिवश्चिद रोचनादध्या नो गन्तं सवर्विदा|	even from the luminous sphere of heaven come to us ye who find the light.
धीभिर्वत्सप्रचेतसा सतोमेभिर्हवनश्रुता|	carers for vatsa through our prayers and lauds o yewho hearour call.
किमन्ये पर्यासतेअस्मत सतोमेभिरश्विना|	do others more than we adore the aśvins with their hymns of praise.
पुत्रः कण्वस्य वां रषिर्गीर्भिर्वत्सो अवीव्र्धत|	the Ṛṣi vatsa kaṇvas son hath magnified you with his songs.
आ वां विप्र इहावसेअह्वत सतोमेभिरश्विना|	the holy singer with his hymns hath called you aśvins hitherward.
अरिप्रा वर्त्रहन्तमा ता नो भूतं मयोभुवा|	best vṛtraslayers free from stain as such bring us felicity.
आ यद वां योषणा रथमतिष्ठद वाजिनीवसू|	what time ye lords of ample wealth the lady mounted on your car.
विश्वान्यश्विना युवं पर धीतान्यगछतम|	then o ye aśvins ye attained all wishes that your hearts desired.
अतः सहस्रनिर्णिजा रथेना यातमश्विना|	come thence o aśvins on your car that hath a thousand ornaments.
वत्सो वां मधुमद वचोअशंसीत काव्यः कविः|	vatsa the sage the sages son hath sung a song of sweets to you.
पुरुमन्द्रा पुरूवसू मनोतरा रयीणाम|	cheerers of many rich in goods discoverers of opulence.
सतोमं मे अश्विनाविममभि वह्नी अनूषाताम|	the aśvins riders through the sky have welcomed this my song of praise.
आ नो विश्वान्यश्विना धत्तं राधांस्यह्रया|	o aśvins grant us all rich gifts wherewith no man mav interfere.
कर्तं न रत्वियावतो मा नो रीरधतं निदे|	make us observe the stated times give us not over to reproach.
यन नास्त्या परावति यद वा सथो अध्यम्बरे|	whether nāsatyas ye be nigh or whether ye be far away.
अतः सहस्रनिर्णिजा रथेना यातमश्विना|	come thence o aśvins on your car that hath a thousand ornaments.
यो वां नासत्याव रषिर्गीर्भिर्वत्सो अवीव्र्धत|	vatsa the Ṛṣi with his songs nāsatyas hath exalted you.
तस्मै सहस्रनिर्णिजमिषं धत्तं घर्तश्चुतम|	grant him rich food distilling oil graced with a thousand ornaments.
परास्मा ऊर्जं घर्तश्चुतमश्विना यछतं युवम|	bestow on him o aśvins food that strengthens and that drops with oil.
यो वां सुम्नाय तुष्टवद वसूयाद दानुनस पती|	on him who praises you for bliss and lords of bounty prays for wealth.
आ नो गन्तं रिशादसेमं सतोमं पुरुभुजा|	come to us ye who slay the foe lords of rich treasure to this hymn.
कर्तं नः सुश्रियो नरेमा दातमभिष्टये|	o heroes give us high renown and these good things of earth for help.
आ वां विश्वाभिरूतिभिः परियमेधा अहूषत|	the priyamedhas have invoked you with all succours that are yours.
राजन्तावध्वराणामश्विना यामहूतिषु|	you aśvins lords of solemn rites with calls entreating you to come.
आ नो गन्तं मयोभुवाश्विना शम्भुवा युवम|	come to us aśvins ye who bring felicity auspicious ones.
यो वां विपन्यू धीतिभिर्गीर्भिर्वत्सो अवीव्र्धत|	to vatsa who with prayer and hymn lovers of song hath honoured you.
याभिः कण्वं मेधातिथिं याभिर्वशं दशव्रजम|	aid us o heroes for those hymns for which ye helped gosarya erst.
याभिर्गोशर्यमावतं ताभिर्नोअवतं नरा|	gave vaśa dasavraja aid and kaṇva and medhatithi.
याभिर्नरा तरसदस्युमावतं कर्त्व्ये धने|	and favoured trasadasyu ye heroes in spoildeciding fray.
ताभिः षवस्मानश्विना परावतं वाजसातये|	for these o aśvins graciously assist us in acquiring strength.
पर वां सतोमाः सुव्र्क्तयो गिरो वर्धन्त्वश्विना|	o aśvins may pure hymns of ours and songs and praises honour you.
पुरुत्रा वर्त्रहन्तमा ता नो भूतं पुरुस्प्र्हा|	best slayers everywhere of foes as such we fondly yearn for you.
तरीणि पदान्यश्विनोराविः सान्ति गुहा परः|	three places of the aśvins erst concealed are made apparent now.
कवी रतस्य पत्मभिरर्वाग जीवेभ्यस परि|	both sages with the flight of law come hither unto those who live.
पिबा सुतस्य रसिनो मत्स्वा न इन्द्र गोमतः|	drink indra of the savoury juice and cheer thee with our milky draught.
आपिर्नो बोधिसधमाद्यो वर्धेअस्मानवन्तु ते धियः|	be for our weal our friend and sharer of the feast and let thy wisdom guard us well.
भूयाम ते सुमतौ वाजिनो वयं मा न सतरभिमातये|	in thy kind grace and favour may we still be strong expose us not to foes attack.
अस्माञ्चित्राभिरवतादभिष्टिभिरा नः सुम्नेषु यामय|	with manifold assistance guard and succour us and bring us to felicity.
इमा उ तवा पुरूवसो गिरो वर्धन्तु या मम|	may these my songs of praise exalt thee lord who hast abundant wealth.
पावकवर्णाःशुचयो विपश्चितोअभि सतोमैरनूषत|	men skilled in holy hymns pure with the hues of fire have sung them with their lauds to thee.
अयं सहस्रं रषिभिः सहस्क्र्तः समुद्र इव पप्रथे|	he with his might enhanced by Ṛṣis thousandfold hath like an ocean spread himself.
सत्यः सो अस्य महिमा गर्णे शवो यज्ञेषु विप्रराज्ये|	his majesty is praised as true at solemn rites his power where holy singers rule.
इन्द्रमिद देवतातय इन्द्रं परयत्यध्वरे|	indra for worship of the gods indra while sacrifice proceeds.
इन्द्रं समीकेवनिनो हवामह इन्द्रं धनस्य सातये|	indra as worshippers in battleshock we call indra that we may win the spoil.
इन्द्रो मह्ना रोदसी पप्रथच्छव इन्द्रः सूर्यमरोचयत|	with might hath indra spread out heaven and earth with power hath indra lighted up the sun.
इन्द्रे ह विश्वा भुवनानि येमिर इन्द्रे सुवानास इन्दवः|	in indra are all creatures closely held in him meet the distilling somadrops.
अभि तवा पूर्वपीतय इन्द्र सतोमेभिरायवः|	men with their lauds are urging thee indra to drink the soma first.
समीचीनासर्भवः समस्वरन रुद्रा गर्नन्त पूर्व्यम|	the Ṛbhus in accord have lifted up their voice and rudras sung thee as the first.
अस्येदिन्द्रो वाव्र्धे वर्ष्ण्यं शवो मदे सुतस्य विष्णवि|	indra increased his manly strength at sacrifice in the wild rapture of this juice.
अद्या तमस्य महिमानमायवोअनु षटुवन्ति पूर्वथा|	and living men today even as of old sing forth their praises to his majesty.
तत तवा यामि सुवीर्यं तद बरह्म पूर्वचित्तये|	i crave of thee that hero strength that thou mayst first regard this prayer.
येना यतिभ्यो भर्गवे धने हिते येन परस्कण्वमाविथ|	wherewith thou holpest bhṛgu and the yatis and praskaṇva when the prize was staked.
येना समुद्रमस्र्जो महीरपस्तदिन्द्र वर्ष्णि ते शवः|	wherewith thou sentest mighty waters to the sea that indra is thy manly strength.
सद्यः सो अस्य महिमा न संनशे यं कषोणीरनुचक्रदे|	for ever unattainable is this power of him to whom the worlds have cried aloud.
शग्धी न इन्द्र यत तवा रयिं यामि सुवीर्यम|	help us o indra when we pray to thee for wealth and hero might.
शग्धि वाजाय परथमं सिषासते शग्धि सतोमाय पूर्व्य|	first help thou on to strength the man who strives to win and aid our laud o ancient one.
शग्धी नो अस्य यद ध पौरमाविथ धिय इन्द्र सिषासतः|	help for us indra as thou holpest paura once this mans devotions bent on gain.
शग्धि यथा रुशमं शयावकं कर्पमिन्द्र परावः सवर्णरम|	help as thou gavest ruśama and Śyāvaka and svarṇara and kṛpa aid.
कन नव्यो अतसीनां तुरो गर्णीत मर्त्यः|	what newest of imploring prayers shall then the zealous mortal sing.
नही नवस्य महिमानमिन्द्रियं सवर्ग्र्णन्त आनशुः|	for have not they who laud his might and indrapower won for themselves the light of heaven.
कदु सतुवन्त रतयन्त देवत रषिः को विप्र ओहते|	when shall they keep the law and praise thee mid the gods who counts as Ṛṣi and as sage.
कदा हवं मघवन्निन्द्र सुन्वतः कदु सतुवत आ गमः|	when ever wilt thou indra maghavan come nigh to pressers or to praisers call.
उदु तये मधुमत्तमा गिर सतोमास ईरते|	these songs of ours exceeding sweet these hymns of praise ascend to thee.
सत्राजितो धनसा अक्षितोतयो वाजयन्तो रथा इव|	like everconquering chariots that display their strength gain wealth and give unfailing aid.
कण्वा इव भर्गवः सूर्या इव विश्वमिद धीतमानशुः|	the bhṛgus are like suns like kaṇvas and have gained all that their thoughts were bent upon.
इन्द्रं सतोमेभिर्महयन्त आयवः परियमेधासो अस्वरन|	the living men of priyamedhas race have sung exalting indra with their lauds.
युक्ष्वा हि वर्त्रहन्तम हरी इन्द्र परावतः|	best slayer of the vṛtras yoke thy bay steeds indra from afar.
अर्वाचीनो मघवन सोमपीतय उग्र रष्वेभिरा गहि|	come with the high ones hither maghavan to us mighty to drink the soma juice.
इमे हि ते कारवो वावशुर्धिया विप्रासो मेधसातये|	for these the bards and singers have cried out to thee with prayer to gain the sacrifice.
सत्वं नो मघवन्निन्द्र गिर्वणो वेनो न शर्णुधी हवम|	as such o maghavan indra who lovest song even as a lover bear my call.
निरिन्द्र बर्हतीभ्यो वर्त्रं धनुभ्यो अस्फुरः|	thou from the lofty plains above o indra hurledst vṛtra down.
निरर्बुदस्य मर्गयस्य मायिनो निः पर्वतस्य गा आजः|	thou dravest forth the kine of guileful mṛgaya and arbuda from the mountains hold.
निरग्नयो रुरुचुर्निरु सूर्यो निः सोम इन्द्रियो रसः|	bright were the flaming fires the sun gave forth his shine and soma indras juice shone clear.
निरन्तरिक्षादधमो महामहिं कर्षे तदिन्द्र पौंस्यम|	indra thou blewest the great dragon from the air men must regard that valorous deed.
यं मे दुरिन्द्रो मरुतः पाकस्थामा कौरयाणः|	the fairest courser of them all who runneth on as twere to heaven.
विश्वेषां तमना शोभिष्ठमुपेव दिवि धावमानम|	which indra and the maruts gave and pākasthāman kaurayāṇ.
रोहितं मे पाकस्थामा सुधुरं कक्ष्यप्राम|	to me hath pākasthāman given a ruddy horse good at the pole.
अदाद रायो विबोधनम|	filling is girth and rousing wealth.
यस्मा अन्ये दश परति धुरं वहन्ति वह्नयः|	compared with whom no other ten strong coursers harnessed to the pole.
अस्तं वयो न तुग्र्यम|	bear tugrya to his dwelling place.
आत्मा पितुस्तनूर्वास ओजोदा अभ्यञ्जनम|	raiment is body food is life and healing ointment giveth strength.
तुरीयमिद रोहितस्य पाकस्थामानं भोजं दातारमब्रवम|	as the freehanded giver of the ruddy steed i have named pākasthāman fourth.
इदं वसो सुतमन्धः पिबा सुपूर्णमुदरम|	here is the soma juice expressed o vasu drink till thou art full.
अनाभयिन ररिमा ते|	undaunted god we give it thee.
नर्भिर्धूतः सुतो अश्नैरव्यो वारैः परिपूतः|	washed by the men pressed out with stones strained through the filter made of wool.
अश्वोन निक्तो नदीषु|	tis like a courser bathed in stream.
तं ते यवं यथा गोभिः सवादुमकर्म शरीणन्तः|	this juice have we made sweet for thee like barley blending it with milk.
इन्द्र तवास्मिन सधमादे|	indra i call thee to our feast.
इन्द्र इत सोमपा एक इन्द्रः सुतपा विश्वायुः|	beloved of all indra alone drinks up the flowing soma juice.
अन्तर्देवान मर्त्यांश्च|	among the gods and mortal men.
न यं शुक्रो न दुराशीर्न तर्प्रा उरुव्यचसम|	the friend whom not the brillianthued the badlymixt or bitter draught.
अपस्प्र्ण्वते सुहार्दम|	repels the farextending god.
गोभिर्यदीमन्ये अस्मन मर्गं न वरा मर्गयन्ते|	while other men than we with milk chase him as hunters chase a deer.
अभित्सरन्ति धेनुभिः|	and with their kine inveigle him.
तरय इन्द्रस्य सोमाः सुतासः सन्तु देवस्य|	for him for indra for the god be pressed three draughts of soma juice.
सवे कषये सुतपाव्नः|	in the juicedrinkers own abode.
तरयः कोशासः शचोतन्ति तिस्रश्चम्वः सुपूर्णाः|	three reservoirs exude their drops filled are three beakers to the brim.
समाने अधि भार्मन|	all for one offering to the god.
शुचिरसि पुरुनिष्ठाः कषीरैर्मध्यत आशीर्तः|	pure art thou set in many a place and blended in the midst with milk.
दध्ना मन्दिष्ठः शूरस्य|	and curd to cheer the hero best.
इमे त इन्द्र सोमास्तीव्रा अस्मे सुतासः|	here indra are thy somadraughts pressed out by us the strong the pure.
शुक्रा आशिरंयाचन्ते|	they crave admixture of the milk.
तानाशिरं पुरोळाशमिन्द्रेमं सोमं शरीणीहि|	o indra pour in milk prepare the cake and mix the somadraught.
रेवन्तं हि तवा शर्णोमि|	i hear them say that thou art rich.
हर्त्सु पीतासो युध्यन्ते दुर्मदासो न सुरायाम|	quaffed juices fight within the breast the drunken praise not by their wine.
ऊधर्न नग्ना जरन्ते|	the naked praise not when it rains.
रेवानिद रेवत सतोता सयात तवावतो मघोनः|	rich be the praiser of one rich munificent and famed like thee.
परेदु हरिवः शरुतस्य|	high rank be his o lord of bays.
उक्थं चन शस्यमानमगोररिरा चिकेत|	foe of the man who adds no milk he heeds not any chanted hymn.
न गायत्रंगीयमानम|	or holy psalm that may he sung.
मा न इन्द्र पीयत्नवे मा शर्धते परा दाः|	give us not indra as a prey unto the scornful or the proud.
शिक्षा शचीवः शचीभिः|	help mighty one with power and might.
वयमु तवा तदिदर्था इन्द्र तवायन्तः सखायः|	this even this o indra we implore as thy devoted friends.
कण्वाुक्थेभिर्जरन्ते|	the kaṇvas praise thee with their hymns.
न घेमन्यदा पपन वज्रिन्नपसो नविष्टौ|	naught else o thunderer have i praised in the skilled singers eulogy.
तवेदु सतोमं चिकेत|	on thy land only have i thought.
इछन्ति देवाः सुन्वन्तं न सवप्नाय सप्र्हयन्ति|	the gods seek him who presses out the soma they desire not sleep.
यन्ति परमादमतन्द्राः|	they punish sloth unweariedly.
ओ षु पर याहि वाजेभिर्मा हर्णीथा अभ्यस्मान|	come hither swift with gifts of wealth  be not thou angry with uslike.
महानिव युवजानिः|	a great man with a youthful bride.
मो षवद्य दुर्हणावान सायं करदारे अस्मत|	let him not wrathful with us spend the evening far from us today.
अश्रीर इव जामाता|	like some unpleasant soninlaw.
विद्मा हयस्य वीरस्य भूरिदावरीं सुमतिम|	for well we know this heros love most liberal of the boons he gives.
तरिषु जातस्य मनांसि|	his plans whom the three worlds display.
आ तू षिञ्च कण्वमन्तं न घा विद्म शवसानात|	pour forth the gift which kaṇvas bring for none more glorious do we know.
यशस्तरं शतमूतेः|	than the strong lord with countless aids.
जयेष्ठेन सोतरिन्द्राय सोमं वीराय शक्राय|	o presser offer soma first to indra hero Śakra him.
भरा पिबन नर्याय|	the friend of man that he may drink.
यो वेदिष्ठो अव्यथिष्वश्वावन्तं जरित्र्भ्यः|	who in untroubled ways is best provider for his worshippers.
वाजं सतोत्र्भ्यो गोमन्तम|	of strength in horses and in kine.
पन्यमपन्यमित सोतार आ धावत मद्याय|	pressers for him blend soma juice each draught most excellent for him.
सोमं वीरय शूरय|	the brave the hero for his joy.
पाता वर्त्रहा सुतमा घा गमन नारे अस्मत|	the vṛtraslayer drinks the juice may he who gives a hundred aids.
नि यमते शतमूतिः|	approach nor stay afar from us.
एह हरी बरह्मयुजा शग्मा वक्षतः सखायम|	may the strong bay steeds yoked by prayer bring hither unto us our friend.
गीर्भिःश्रुतं गिर्वणसम|	lover of song renowned by songs.
सवादवः सोमा आ याहि शरीताः सोमा आ याहि|	sweet are the soma juices come blent are the soma juices come.
शिप्रिन्न्र्षीवः शचीवो नायमछा सधमादम|	Ṛṣilike mighty fair of cheek come hither quickly to the feast.
सतुतश्च यास्त्वा वर्धन्ति महे राधसे नर्म्णाय|	and lauds which strengthen thee for great bounty and valour and exalt.
इन्द्रकारिणं वर्धन्तः|	indra who doeth glorious deeds.
गिरश्च यास्ते गिर्वाह उक्था च तुभ्यं तानि|	and songs to thee who lovest song and all those hymns addressed to thee.
सत्रा दधिरे शवांसि|	these evermore confirm thy might.
एवेदेष तुविकूर्मिर्वाजानेको वज्रहस्तः|	thus he sole doer of great deeds whose hand holds thunder gives us strength.
सनदम्र्क्तोदयते|	he who hath never been subdued.
हन्त वर्त्रं दक्षिणेनेन्द्रः पुरु पुरुहूतः|	vṛtra he slays with his right hand even indra great with mighty power.
महान महीभिः शचिभिः|	and muchinvoked in many a place.
यस्मिन विश्वाश्चर्षणय उत चयौत्ना जरयांसि च|	he upon whom all men depend all regions all achievements he.
अनु घेन मन्दी मघोनः|	takes pleasure in our wealthy chiefs.
एष एतानि चकारेन्द्रो विश्वा योअति शर्ण्वे|	all this hath he accomplished yea indra most gloriously renowned.
वाजदावा मघोनाम|	who gives our wealthy princes strength.
परभर्ता रथं गव्यन्तमपाकच्चिद यमवति|	who drives his chariot seeking spoil from afar to him he loves.
इनो वसुस हि वोळ्हा|	for swift is he to bring men wealth.
सनिता विप्रो अर्वद्भिर्हन्ता वर्त्रं नर्भिः शूरः|	the sage who winning spoil with steeds slays vṛtra hero with the men.
सत्योअविता विधन्तम|	his servants faithful succourer.
यजध्वैनं परियमेधा इन्द्रं सत्राचा मनसा|	o priyamedhas worship with collected mind this indra whom.
यो भूत सोमैः सत्यमद्वा|	the soma hath full well inspired.
गाथश्रवसं सत्पतिं शरवस्कामं पुरुत्मानम|	ye kaṇvas sing the mighty one lord of the brave who loves renown.
कण्वासोगात वाजिनम|	allpresent glorified by song.
य रते चिद गास पदेभ्यो दात सखा नर्भ्यः शचीवान|	strong friend who with no trace of feet restores the cattle to the men.
येस्मिन काममश्रियन|	who rest their wish and hope on him.
इत्था धीवन्तमद्रिवः काण्वं मेध्यातिथिम|	shaped as a ram stonehurler i once thou camest hither to the son.
मेषो भूतोऽभि यन्नयः|	of kaṇva wise medhyātithi.
शिक्षा विभिन्दो अस्मै चत्वार्ययुता ददत|	vibhindu thou hast helped this man giving him thousands four times ten.
अष्टा परः सहस्रा|	and afterward eight thousand more.
उत सु तये पयोव्र्धा माकी रणस्य नप्त्या|	and these twain pouring streams of milk creative daughters of delight.
जनित्वनाय मामहे|	for wedlock sake i glorify.
तं गूर्धया सवर्णरं देवासो देवमरतिं दधन्विरे|	sing praise to hiin the lord of light the gods have made the god to be their messenger.
देवत्रा हव्यमोहिरे|	and sent oblation to gods.
विभूतरातिं विप्र चित्रशोचिषमग्निमीळिष्व यन्तुरम|	agni the bounteous giver bright with varied flames laud thou o singer sobhari.
अस्य मेधस्य सोम्यस्य सोभरे परेमध्वराय पूर्व्यम|	him who controls this sacred food with soma blent who hath first claim to sacrifice.
यजिष्ठं तवा वव्र्महे देवं देवत्रा होतारममर्त्यम|	thee have we chosen skilftillest in sacrifice immortal priest among the gods.
अस्य यज्ञस्य सुक्रतुम|	wise finisher of this holy rite.
ऊर्जो नपातं सुभगं सुदीदितिमग्निं शरेष्ठशोचिषम|	the son of strength the blessed brightly shining one agni whose light is excellent.
स नो मित्रस्य वरुणस्य सो अपामा सुम्नं यक्षते दिवि|	may be by sacrifice win us in heaven the grace of mitra varuṇa and the floods.
यः समिधा य आहुती यो वेदेन ददाश मर्तो अग्नये|	the mortal who hath ministered to agni with oblation fuel ritual lore.
यो नमसा सवध्वरः|	and reverence skilled in sacrifice.
तस्येदर्वन्तो रंहयन्त आशवस्तस्य दयुम्नितमं यशः|	verily swift to run are his fleetfooted steeds and most resplendent fame is his.
न तमंहो देवक्र्तं कुतश्चन न मर्त्यक्र्तं नशत|	no trouble caused by gods or wrought by mortal man from any side oertaketh him.
सवग्नयो वो अग्निभिः सयाम सूनो सहस ऊर्जां पते|	may we by thine own fires be well supplied with fire o son of strength o lord of might.
सुवीरस्त्वमस्मयुः|	thou as our friend hast worthy men.
परशंसमानो अतिथिर्न मित्रियोअग्नी रथो न वेद्यः|	agni who praises like a guest of friendly mind is as a car that brings us gear.
तवे कषेमासो अपि सन्ति साधवस्त्वं राजा रयीणाम|	also in thee is found perfect security thou art the sovran lord of wealth.
सो अद्धा दाश्वध्वरोअग्ने मर्तः सुभग स परशंस्यः|	that man moreover merits praise who brings auspicious agni sacrificial gifts.
स धीभिरस्तु सनिता|	may he win riches by his thoughts.
यस्य तवमूर्ध्वो अध्वराय तिष्ठसि कषयद्वीरः स साधते|	he for whose sacrifice thou standest up erect is prosperous and rules oer men.
सो अर्वद्भिः सनिता स विपन्युभिः स शूरैः सनिता कर्तम|	he wins with coursers and with singers killed in song with heroes he obtains the prize.
यस्याग्निर्वपुर्ग्र्हे सतोमं चनो दधीत विश्ववार्यः|	he in whose dwelling agni is chief ornament and alldesired loves his laud well.
हव्या वा वेविषद विषः|	and zealously tends his offerings.
विप्रस्य वा सतुवतः सहसो यहो मक्षूतमस्य रातिषु|	his or the lauding sages word his son of strength who is most prompt with sacred gifts.
अवोदेवमुपरिमर्त्यं कर्धि वसो विविदुषो वचः|	set thou beneath the gods vasu above mankind the speech of the intelligent.
यो अग्निं हव्यदातिभिर्नमोभिर्वा सुदक्षमाविवासति|	he who with sacrificial gifts or homage bringeth very skilful agni nigh.
गिरा वाजिरशोचिषम|	or him who flashes fast with song.
समिधा यो निशिती दाशददितिं धामभिरस्य मर्त्यः|	the mortal who with blazing fuel as his laws command adores the perfect god.
विश्वेत स धीभिः सुभगो जनानति दयुम्नैरुद्न इव तारिषत|	blest with his thoughts in splendour shall exceed all men as though he overpassed the floods.
तदग्ने दयुम्नमा भर यत सासहत सदने कं चिदत्रिणम|	give us the splendour agni which may overcome each greedy fiend in our abode.
मन्युं जनस्य दूढ्यः|	the wrath of evilhearted folk.
येन चष्टे वरुणो मित्रो अर्यमा येन नासत्या भगः|	that wherewith mitra varuṇa and aryaman the aśvins bhaga give us light.
वयं तत ते शवसा गातुवित्तमा इन्द्रत्वोता विधेमहि|	that may we by thy power finding best furtherance worship o indra helped by thee.
ते घेदग्ने सवाध्यो ये तवा विप्र निदधिरे नर्चक्षसम|	o agni most devout are they the sages who have set thee sage exceeding wise.
विप्रासो देव सुक्रतुम|	o god for men to look upon.
त इद वेदिं सुभग त आहुतिं ते सोतुं चक्रिरे दिवि|	who have arranged thine altar blessed god at morn brought thine oblation pressed the juice.
तैद वाजेभिर्जिग्युर्महद धनं ये तवे कामं नयेरिरे|	they by their deeds of strength have won diem mighty wealth who have set all their hope in thee.
भद्रो नो अग्निराहुतो भद्रा रातिः सुभग भद्रो अध्वरः|	may agni worshipped bring us bliss may the gift blessed one and sacrifice bring bliss.
भद्रा उत परशस्तयः|	yea may our praises bring us bliss.
भद्रं मनः कर्णुष्व वर्त्रतूर्ये येना समत्सु सासहः|	show forth the mind that brings success in war with fiends wherewith thou conquerest in fight.
अव सथिरा तनुहि भूरि शर्धतां वनेमा ते अभिष्टिभिः|	bring down the many firm hopes of our enemies and let us vanquish with thine aid.
ईळे गिरा मनुर्हितं यं देवा दूतमरतिं नयेरिरे|	i praise with song the friend of man whom gods sent down to be herald and messenger.
यजिष्ठं हव्यवाहनम|	best worshipper bearer of our gifts.
तिग्मजम्भाय तरुणाय राजते परयो गायस्यग्नये|	thou unto sharptoothed agni young and radiant god proclaimest with thy song the feast.
यः पिंशते सून्र्ताभिः सुवीर्यमग्निर्घ्र्तेभिराहुतः|	agni who for our sweet strains moulds heroic strength when sacred oil is offered him.
यदी घर्तेभिराहुतो वाशीमग्निर्भरत उच्चाव च|	while served with sacrificial oil now upward and now downward agni moves his sword.
असुर इव निर्णिजम|	as doth the asura his robe.
यो हव्यान्यैरयता मनुर्हितो देव आसा सुगन्धिना|	the god the friend of man who bears our gifts to heaven the god with his sweetsmelling mouth.
विवासते वार्याणि सवध्वरो होता देवो अमर्त्यः|	distributes skilled in sacrifice his precious things invoking priest immortal god.
यदग्ने मर्त्यस्त्वं सयामहं मित्रमहो अमर्त्यः|	son of strength agni if thou wert the mortal bright as mitra i worshipped with our gifts.
सहसः सूनवाहुत|	and i were the immortal god.
न तवा रासीयाभिशस्तये वसो न पापत्वाय सन्त्य|	i would not give thee up vasu to calumny or misery o bounteous one.
न मे सतोतामतीवा न दुर्हितः सयादग्ने न पापया|	my worshipper should feel no hunger or distress nor agni should he live in sin.
पितुर्न पुत्रः सुभ्र्तो दुरोण आ देवानेतु पर णो हविः|	like a son cherished in his fathers houi§e let our oblation rise unto the gods.
तवाहमग्न ऊतिभिर्नेदिष्ठाभिः सचेय जोषमा वसो|	with thine immediate aid may i excellent agni ever gain my wish.
सदा देवस्य मर्त्यः|	a mortal with a god to help.
तव करत्वा सनेयं तव रातिभिरग्ने तव परशस्तिभिः|	o agni by thy wisdom by thy bounties by thy leading may i gather wealth.
तवामिदाहुः परमतिं वसो ममाग्ने हर्षस्व दातवे|	excellent agni thou art called my providence delight thou to be liberal.
पर सो अग्ने तवोतिभिः सुवीराभिस्तिरते वाजभर्मभिः|	agni he conquers by thine aid that brings him store of noble heroes and great strength.
यस्य तवं सख्यमावरः|	whose bond of friendship is thy choice.
