तव दरप्सो नीलवान वाश रत्विय इन्धानः सिष्णवा ददे|	thy spark is black and crackling kindled in due time o bounteous it is taken up.
तवं महीनामुषसामसि परियः कषपो वस्तुषु राजसि|	thou art the dear friend of the mighty mornings thou shinest in glimmerings of the night.
तमागन्म सोभरयः सहस्रमुष्कं सवभिष्टिमवसे|	we sobharis have come to him for succour who is good to help with thousand powers.
सम्राजं तरासदस्यवम|	the sovran trasadasyus friend.
यस्य ते अग्ने अन्ये अग्नय उपक्षितो वया इव|	o agni thou on whom all other fires depend as branches on the parent stem.
विपो न दयुम्ना नि युवे जनानां तव कषत्राणि वर्धयन|	i make the treasures of the folk like songs mine own while i exalt thy sovran might.
यमादित्यासो अद्रुहः पारं नयथ मर्त्यम|	the mortal whom Ādityas ye guilelew lead to the farther bank.
मघोनां विश्वेषां सुदानवः|	of all the princes bounteous ones.
यूयं राजानः कं चिच्चर्षणीसहः कषयन्तं मानुषाननु|	whoeer he be manruling kings the regent of the race of men.
वयं ते वो वरुण मित्रार्यमन सयामेद रतस्य रथ्यः|	may we o mitra varuṇa and aryaman like him be furtherers of your law.
अदान मे पौरुकुत्स्यः पञ्चाशतं तरसदस्युर्वधूनाम|	a gift of fifty female slaves hath trasadasyu given me purukutsas son.
मंहिष्ठो अर्यः सत्पतिः|	most liberal kind lord of the brave.
उत मे परयियोर्वयियोः सुवास्त्वा अधि तुग्वनि|	and Śyāva too for me led forth a strong steed at suvastus ford.
तिसॄणांसप्ततीनां शयावः परणेता भुवद वसुर्दियानां पतिः|	a herd of three times seventy kine good lord of gifts he gave to me.
इमे विप्रस्य वेधसोअग्नेरस्त्र्तयज्वनः|	these songs of mine go forth as lauds of agni the disposing sage.
गिरः सतोमास ईरते|	whose worshipper is neer oerthrown.
अस्मै ते परतिहर्यते जातवेदो विचर्षणे|	wise agni jātavedas i beget a song of praise for thee.
अग्ने जनामि सुष्टुतिम|	who willingly receivest it.
आरोका इव घेदह तिग्मा अग्ने तव तविषः|	thy sharpened flames o agni like the gleams of light that glitter through.
दद्भिर्वनानि बप्सति|	devour the forests with their teeth.
हरयो धूमकेतवो वातजूता उप दयवि|	goldcoloured bannered with the smoke urged by the wind aloft to heaven.
यतन्ते वर्थगग्नयः|	rise lightly borne the flames of fire.
एते तये वर्थगग्नय इद्धासः समद्र्क्षत|	these lightly kindled fiery flames are all around made visible.
उषसामिव केतवः|	even as the gleanings of the dawns.
कर्ष्णा रजांसि पत्सुतः परयाणे जातवेदसः|	as jātavedas speeds along the dust is black beneath his feet.
अग्निर्यद रोधति कषमि|	when agni spreads upon the earth.
धासिं कर्ण्वान ओषधीर्बप्सदग्निर्न वायति|	making the plants his nourishment agni devours and wearies not.
पुनर्यन तरुणीरपि|	seeking the tender shrubs again.
जिह्वाभिरह नन्नमदर्चिषा जञ्जणाभवन|	bending him down with all his tongues he flickers with his fiery glow.
अग्निर्वनेषु रोचते|	splendid is agni in the woods.
अप्स्वग्ने सधिष टव सौशधीरनु रुध्यसे|	agni thine home is in the floods into the plants thou forcest way.
गर्भे सञ्जायसे पुनः|	and as their child art born anew.
उदग्ने तव तद घर्तादर्ची रोचत आहुतम|	worshipped with offerings shines thy flame o agni from the sacred oil.
निंसानं जुह्वो मुखे|	with kisses on the ladles mouth.
उक्षान्नाय वशान्नाय सोमप्र्ष्ठाय वेधसे|	let us serve agni with our hymns disposer fed on ox and cow.
सतोमैर्विधेमाग्नये|	who bears the soma on his back.
उत तवा नमसा वयं होतर्वरेण्यक्रतो|	yea thee o agni do we seek with homage and with fuel priest.
अग्ने समिद्भिरीमहे|	whose wisdom is most excellent.
उत तवा भर्गुवच्छुचे मनुष्वदग्न आहुत|	o worshipped with oblations pure agni we call on thee as erst.
अङगिरस्वद धवामहे|	did bhṛgu manus aṅgiras.
तवं हयग्ने अग्निना विप्रो विप्रेण सन सता|	for thou o agni by the fire sage by the sage good by the good.
सखा सख्या समिध्यसे|	friend by the friend art lighted up.
स तवं विप्राय दाशुषे रयिं देहि सहस्रिणम|	so wealth in thousands food with store of heroes give thou to the sage.
अग्ने वीरवतीमिषम|	o agni to the worshipper.
अग्ने भरातः सहस्क्र्त रोहिदश्व शुचिव्रत|	o agni brother made by strength lord of red steeds and brilliant sway.
इमं सतोमंजुषस्व मे|	take pleasure in this laud of mine.
उत तवाग्ने मम सतुतो वाश्राय परतिहर्यते|	my praises agni go to thee as the cows seek the stall to meet.
गोष्ठं गाव इवाशत|	the lowing calf that longs for milk.
तुभ्यं ता अङगिरस्तम विश्वाः सुक्षितयः पर्थक|	agni best aṅgiras to thee all people who have pleasant homes.
अग्ने कामाय येमिरे|	apart have turned as to their wish.
अग्निं धीभिर्मनीषिणो मेधिरासो विपश्चितः|	the sages skilled in holy song and thinkers with their thoughts have urged.
अद्मसद्याय हिन्विरे|	agni to share the sacred feast.
तं तवामज्मेषु वाजिनं तन्वाना अग्ने अध्वरम|	so agni unto thee the priest invoker strong in forays pray.
वह्निंहोतारमीळते|	those who spin out the sacrifice.
पुरुत्रा हि सद्रंं असि विशो विश्वा अनु परभुः|	in many a place the same in look art thou a prince oer all the tribes.
समत्सुत्वा हवामहे|	in battles we invoke thine aid.
तमीळिष्व य आहुतोअग्निर्विभ्राजते घर्तैः|	pray thou to agni pray to him who blazes served with sacred oil.
इमं नःश्र्णवद धवम|	let him give ear to this our call.
तं तवा वयं हवामहे शर्ण्वन्तं जातवेदसम|	we call on thee as such as one who hears as jātavedas one.
अग्ने घनन्तमप दविषः|	agni who beats away our foes.
विशां राजानमद्भुतमध्यक्षं धर्मणामिमम|	i pray to agni king of men the wonderful the president.
अग्निमीळे स उ शरवत|	of holy laws may he give ear.
अग्निं विश्वायुवेपसं मर्यं न वाजिनं हितम|	him like a bridegroom him who stirs all people like a noble horse.
सप्तिं न वाजयामसि|	like a fleet steed we instigate.
घनन मर्ध्राण्यप दविषो दहन रक्षांसि विश्वहा|	slaying things deadly burning up foes rākṣasas on every side.
अग्नेतिग्मेन दीदिहि|	shine agni with thy sharpened flame.
यं तवा जनास इन्धते मनुष्वदङगिरस्तम|	thou whom the people kindle even as manus did best aṅgiras.
अग्ने स बोधिमे वचः|	o agni mark thou this my speech.
यदग्ने दिविजा अस्यप्सुजा वा सहस्क्र्त|	o agni made by strength be thou born in the heavens or born in floods.
तं तवा गीर्भिर्हवामहे|	as such we call on thee with songs.
तुभ्यं घेत ते जना इमे विश्वाः सुक्षितयः पर्थक|	yea all the people all the folk who have good dwellings each apart.
धासिं हिन्वन्त्यत्तवे|	send food for thee to eat thereof.
ते घेदग्ने सवाध्योअहा विश्वा नर्चक्षसः|	o agni so may we devout gazed at by men throughout our days.
तरन्तः सयाम दुर्गहा|	pass lightly over all distress.
अग्निं मन्द्रं पुरुप्रियं शीरं पावकशोचिषम|	we venerate with cheerful hearts the cheerful agni dear to all.
हर्द्भिर्मन्द्रेभिरीमहे|	burning with purifying flame.
स तवमग्ने विभावसुः सर्जन सूर्यो न रश्मिभिः|	so thou o agni rich in light beaming like sūrya with thy rays.
शर्धन तमांसि जिघ्नसे|	boldly demolishest the gloom.
तत ते सहस्व ईमहे दात्रं यन नोपदस्यति|	we pray to thee for this thy gift victor the gift that faileth not.
तवदग्ने वार्यं वसु|	o agni choicest wealth from thee.
यज्ञस्य हि सथ रत्विजा सस्नी वाजेषु कर्मसु|	ye twain are priests of sacrifice winners in war and holy works.
इन्द्राग्नीतस्य बोधतम|	indra and agni mark this well.
तोशासा रथयावाना वर्त्रहणापराजिता|	ye bounteous riders on the car ye vṛtraslayers unsubdued.
इन्द्राग्नी तस्य बोधतम|	indra and agni mark this well.
इदं वां मदिरं मध्वधुक्षन्नद्रिभिर्नरः|	the men with pressingstones have pressed this meath of yours which gives delight.
इन्द्राग्नी तस्य बोधतम|	indra and agni mark this well.
जुषेथां यज्ञमिष्टये सुतं सोमं सधस्तुती|	accept our sacrifice for weal sharers of praise the soma shed.
इन्द्राग्नी आ गतं नरा|	indra and agni heroes come.
इमा जुषेथां सवना येभिर्हव्यान्यूहथुः|	be pleased with these libations which attract you to our sacred gifts.
इन्द्राग्नीा गतं नरा|	indra and agni heroes come.
इमां गायत्रवर्तनिं जुषेथां सुष्टुतिं मम|	accept this eulogy of mine whose model is the gāyatrī.
इन्द्राग्नी आ गतं नरा|	indra and agni heroes come.
परातर्यावभिरा गतं देवेभिर्जेन्यावसू|	come with the earlyfaring gods ye who are lords of genuine wealth.
इन्द्राग्नी सोमपीतये|	indraagni to the somadraught.
शयावाश्वस्य सुन्वतोअत्रीणां शर्णुतं हवम|	hear ye the call of atris hear Śyāvāśva as he sheds the juice.
इन्द्राग्नीसोमपीतये|	indraagni to the somadraught.
एवा वामह्व ऊतये यथाहुवन्त मेधिराः|	thus have i called you to our aid as sages called on you of old.
इन्द्रग्नी सोमपीतये|	indraagni to the soma draught.
आहं सरस्वतीवतोरिन्द्राग्न्योरवो वर्णे|	indras and agnis grace i claim sarasvatīs associates.
याभ्यां गायत्रं रच्यते|	to whom this psalm of praise is sung.
इन्द्रः सुतेषु सोमेषु करतुं पुनीत उक्थ्यम|	indra when soma juices flow makes his mind pure and meet for lauds.
विदे वर्धस्यदक्षसो महान हि षः|	he gains the power that brings success for great is he.
स परथमे वयोमनि देवानां सदने वर्धः|	in heavens first region in the seat of gods is he who brings success.
सुपारः सुश्रवस्तमः समप्सुजित|	most glorious prompt to save who wins the waterfloods.
तमह्वे वाजसातय इन्द्रं भराय शुष्मिणम|	him to win strength have i invoked even indra mighty for the fray.
भवा नःसुम्ने अन्तमः सखा वर्धे|	be thou most near to us for bliss a friend to aid.
इयं त इन्द्र गिर्वणो रातिः कषरति सुन्वतः|	indra song lover here for thee the worshippers libation flows.
मन्दानो अस्य बर्हिषो वि राजसि|	rejoicing in this sacred grass thou shinest forth.
नूनं तदिन्द्र दद्धि नो यत तवा सुन्वन्त ईमहे|	even now o indra give us that which pressing juice we crave of thee.
रयिं नश्चित्रमा भरा सवर्विदम|	bring us wealth manifold which finds the light of heaven.
सतोता यत ते विचर्षणिरतिप्रशर्धयद गिरः|	what time the zealous worshipper hath boldly sung his songs to thee.
वया इवानु रोहते जुषन्त यत|	like branches of a tree upgrows what they desire.
परत्नवज्जनया गिरः शर्णुधी जरितुर्हवम|	generate songs even as of old give car unto the singers call.
मदेमदे ववक्षिथा सुक्र्त्वने|	thou for the pious hast grown great at each carouse.
करीळन्त्यस्य सून्र्ता आपो न परवता यतीः|	sweet strains that glorify him play like waters speeding down a slope.
अया धिया य उच्यते पतिर्दिवः|	yea him who in this song is called the lord of heaven.
उतो पतिर्य उच्यते कर्ष्टीनामेक इद वशी|	yea who alone is called the lord the single ruler of the folk.
नमोव्र्धैरवस्युभिः सुते रण|	by worshippers seeking aid may he joy in the draught.
सतुहि शरुतं विपश्चितं हरी यस्य परसक्षिणा|	praise him the glorious skilled in song lord of the two victorious bays.
गन्तारा दाशुषो गर्हं नमस्विनः|	they seek the worshippers abode who bows in prayer.
तूतुजानो महेमतेअश्वेभिः परुषितप्सुभिः|	put forth thy strength with dappled steeds come thou of mighty intellect.
आ याहि यज्ञमाशुभिः शमिद धि ते|	with swift steeds to the sacrifice for tis thy joy.
इन्द्र शविष्ठ सत्पते रयिं गर्णत्सु धारय|	grant wealth to those who praise thee lord of heroes mightiest indra give.
शरवः सूरिभ्यो अम्र्तं वसुत्वनम|	our princes everlasting fame and opulence.
हवे तवा सूर उदिते हवे मध्यन्दिने दिवः|	i call thee when the sun is risen i call thee at the noon of day.
जुषाण इन्द्र सप्तिभिर्न आ गहि|	with thy carhorses indra come wellpleased to us.
आ तू गहि पर तु दरव मत्स्वा सुतस्य गोमतः|	speed forward hither come to us rejoice thee in the milky draught.
तन्तुं तनुष्व पूर्व्यं यथा विदे|	spin out the thread of ancient time as well is known.
यच्छक्रासि परावति यदर्वावति वर्त्रहन|	if Śakra vṛtraslayer thou be far away or near to us.
यद वा समुद्रे अन्धसोअवितेदसि|	or in the sea thou art the guard of soma juice.
इन्द्रं वर्धन्तु नो गिर इन्द्रं सुतास इन्दवः|	let songs we sing and somadrops expressed by us make indra strong.
इन्द्रे हविष्मतीर्विशो अराणिषुः|	the tribes who bring oblations find delight in him.
तमिद विप्रा अवस्यवः परवत्वतीभिरूतिभिः|	him sages longing for his aid with offerings brought in eager haste.
इन्द्रं कषोणीरवर्धयन वया इव|	him even as branches all mankind have made to grow.
तरिकद्रुकेषु चेतनं देवासो यज्ञमत्नत|	at the trkadrukas the gods span sacrifice that stirred the mind.
तमिद वर्धन्तुनो गिरः सदाव्र्धम|	may our songs strengthen him who still hath strengthened us.
सतोता यत ते अनुव्रत उक्थान्य रतुथा दधे|	when true to duty at due times the worshipper offers lauds to thee.
शुचिः पावक उच्यते सो अद्भुतः|	they call him purifier pure and wonderful.
तदिद रुद्रस्य चेतति यह्वं परत्नेषु धामसु|	that mind of rudra fresh and strong moves conscious in the ancient ways.
मनो यत्रावि तद दधुर्विचेतसः|	with reference whereto the wise have ordered this.
यदि मे सख्यमावर इमस्य पाह्यन्धसः|	if thou elect to be my friend drink of this sacrificial juice.
येन विश्वा अति दविषो अतारिम|	by help whereof we may subdue all enemies.
कदा त इन्द्र गिर्वण सतोता भवाति शन्तमः|	o indra lover of the song when shall thy praiser be most blest.
कदा नो गव्ये अश्व्ये वसौ दधः|	when wilt thou grant us wealth in herds of kine and steeds.
उत ते सुष्टुता हरी वर्षणा वहतो रथम|	and thy two highiylauded bays strong stallions draw thy car who art.
अजुर्यस्य मदिन्तमं यमीमहे|	untouched by age most gladdening car for which we pray.
तमीमहे पुरुष्टुतं यह्वं परत्नाभिरूतिभिः|	with ancient offerings we implore the young and strong whom many praise.
नि बर्हिषि परिये सददध दविता|	he from of old hath sat upon dear sacred grass.
वर्धस्वा सु पुरुष्टुत रषिष्टुताभिरूतिभिः|	wax miglity thou whom many laud for aids which Ṛṣis have extolled.
धुक्षस्वपिप्युषीमिषमवा च नः|	pour down for us abundant food and guard us well.
इन्द्र तवमवितेदसीत्था सतुवतो अद्रिवः|	o indra caster of the stone thou helpest him who praises thee.
रतादियर्मि ते धियं मनोयुजम|	from sacrifice i send to thee a mindyoked hymn.
इह तया सधमाद्य युजानः सोमपीतये|	here yoking for the somadraught these horses sharers of thy feast.
हरी इन्द्र परतद्वसू अभि सवर|	thy bay steeds indra fraught with weal tb consent to come.
अभि सवरन्तु ये तव रुद्रासः सक्षत शरियम|	attendants on thy glory let the rudras roar assent to thee.
उतो मरुत्वतीर्विशो अभि परयः|	and all the marut companies come tothe feast.
इमा अस्य परतूर्तयः पदं जुषन्त यद दिवि|	these his victorious followers bold in the heavens the place they love.
नाभा यज्ञस्य सं दधुर्यथा विदे|	leagued in the heart of sacrifice as well we know.
अयं दीर्घाय चक्षसे पराचि परयत्यध्वरे|	that we may long behold the light what time the ordered rite proceeds.
मिमीते यज्ञमानुषग विचक्ष्य|	he duly measures as he views the sacrifice.
वर्षायमिन्द्र ते रथ उतो ते वर्षणा हरी|	o indra strong is this thy car and strong are these bay steeds of thine.
वर्षा तवंशतक्रतो वर्षा हवः|	o Śatakratu thou art strong strong is our call.
वर्षा गरावा वर्षा मदो वर्षा सोमो अयं सुतः|	strong is the pressstone strong thy joy strong is the flowing soma juice.
वर्षायज्ञो यमिन्वसि वर्षा हवः|	strong is the rite thou furtherest strong is our call.
वर्षा तवा वर्षणं हुवे वज्रिञ्चित्राभिरुतिभिः|	as strong i call on thee the strong o thunderer with thy thousand aids.
वावन्थ हि परतिष्टुतिं वर्षा हवः|	for thou hast won the hymn of praise strong is our call.
आ गन्ता मा रिषण्यत परस्थावानो माप सथाता समन्यवः|	let none swift travellers check you come hither likespirited stay not far away.
सथिरा चिन नमयिष्णवः|	ye benders even of what is firm.
वीळुपविभिर्मरुत रभुक्षण आ रुद्रासः सुदीतिभिः|	maruts Ṛbhukṣans rudras come ye with your cars strongfellied and exceeding bright.
इषा नो अद्या गता पुरुस्प्र्हो यज्ञमा सोभरीयवः|	come ye for whom we long with food to sacrifice come ye with love to sobbari.
विद्मा हि रुद्रियाणां शुष्ममुग्रं मरुतां शिमीवताम|	for well we know the vigorous might of rudras sons the martits who are passing strong.
विष्णोरेषस्य मीळ्हुषाम|	swift viṣṇus band who send the rain.
वि दवीपानि पापतन तिष्ठद दुछुनोभे युजन्त रोदसी|	islands are bursting forth and misery is stayed the heaven and earth are joined in one.
पर धन्वान्यैरत शुभ्रखादयो यदेजथ सवभानवः|	decked with bright rings ye spread the broad expanses out when ye self luminous stirred yourselves.
अच्युता चिद वो अज्मन्ना नानदति पर्वतासो वनस्पतिः|	even things immovable shake and reel the mountains and the forest trees at your approach.
भूमिर्यामेषु रेजते|	and the earth trembles as ye come.
अमाय वो मरुतो यातवे दयौर्जिहीत उत्तरा बर्हत|	to lend free course o maruts to your furious rush heaven high and higher still gives way.
यत्रा नरो देदिशते तनूष्वा तवक्षांसि बाह्वोजसः|	where they the heroes mighty with their arms display their gleaming omaments on their forms.
सवधामनु शरियं नरो महि तवेषा अमवन्तो वर्षप्सवः|	after their godlike nature they the bull like heroes dazzling and impetuous wear.
वहन्ते अह्रुतप्सवः|	great splendour as they show erect.
गोभिर्वाणो अज्यते सोभरीणां रथे कोशे हिरण्यये|	the pivot of the sobharis chariot within the golden box is balmed with milk.
गोबन्धवः सुजातास इषे भुजे महान्तो नः सपरसे नु|	may they the wellborn mighty kindred of the cow aid us to food and to delight.
परति वो वर्षदञ्जयो वर्ष्णे शर्धाय मारुताय भरध्वम|	bring ye who sprinkle balmy drops oblations to your vigorous marut company.
हव्या वर्षप्रयाव्णे|	to those whose leader is the bull.
वर्षणश्वेन मरुतो वर्षप्सुना रथेन वर्षनाभिना|	come hither o ye mares on your stronghorsed car solid in look with solid naves.
आ शयेनासो न पक्षिणो वर्था नरो हव्या नो वीतये गत|	lightly like winged falcons o ye heroes come come to enjoy our ofrerings.
समानमञ्ज्येषां वि भराजन्ते रुक्मासो अधि बाहुषु|	their decoration is the same their omaments of gold are bright upon their arms.
दविद्युतत्य रष्टयः|	their lances glitter splendidly.
त उग्रासो वर्षण उग्रबाहवो नकिष टनूषु येतिरे|	they toil not to defend their bodies from attack strong heroes with their mighty arms.
सथिरा धन्वान्यायुधा रथेषु वोअनीकेष्वधि शरियः|	strong are your bows and strong the weapons in your cars and glory sits on every face.
येषामर्णो न सप्रथो नाम तवेषं शश्वतामेकमिद्भुजे|	whose name extendeth like a sea alone resplendent so that all have joy in it.
वयो न पित्र्यं सहः|	and lifepower like ancestral might.
तान वन्दस्व मरुतस्तानुप सतुहि तेषां हि धुनीनाम|	pay honour to these maruts and sing praise to them for of the wheelspokes of the car.
अराणां न चरमस्तदेषां दाना मह्ना तदेषाम|	of these loud roarers none is last this is their power this moves them to give mighty gifts.
सुभगः स व ऊतिष्वास पूर्वासु मरुतो वयुष्टिषु|	blest by your favouring help was he o maruts at the earlier flushings of the morn.
योवा नूनमुतासति|	and even now shall he be blest.
यस्य वा यूयं परति वाजिनो नर आ हव्या वीतये गथ|	the strong man to whose sacrifice o heroes ye approach that ye may taste thereof.
अभि ष दयुम्नैरुत वाजसातिभिः सुम्ना वो धूतयो नशत|	with glories and with war that winneth spoil shall gain great bliss ye shakers of the world.
यथा रुद्रस्य सूनवो दिवो वशन्त्यसुरस्य वेधसः|	even as rudras sons the brood of the creator dyaus the asura desire.
युवानस्तथेदसत|	o youthful ones so shall it be.
ये चार्हन्ति मरुतः सुदानवः समन मीळ्हुषश्चरन्ति ये|	and these the bounteous worthy of the maruts who move onward pouring down the rain.
अतश्चिदा न उप वस्यसा हर्दा युवान आ वव्र्ध्वम|	even for their sake o youthful ones with kindest heart take us to you to be your own.
यून ऊ षु नविष्ठया वर्ष्णः पावकानभि सोभरे गिरा|	o sobhari with newest song sing out unto the youthful purifying bulls.
गाय गा इव चर्क्र्षत|	even as a plougher to his steers.
साहा ये सन्ति मुष्टिहेव हव्यो विश्वासु पर्त्सु होत्र्षु|	who like a celebrated boxer overcome the challengers in every fight.
वर्ष्णश्चन्द्रान न सुश्रवस्तमान गिरा वन्दस्व मरुतो अह|	they who like shining bulls are most illustrioushonour those maruts with thy song.
गावश्चिद घा समन्यवः सजात्येन मरुतः सबन्धवः|	allied by common ancestry ye maruts even the cows alike in energy.
रिहते ककुभो मिथः|	lick all by turns each others head.
मर्तश्चिद वो नर्तवो रुक्मवक्षस उप भरात्र्त्वमायति|	even mortal man ye dancers breast adorned with gold attains to brotherhood with you.
अधिनो गात मरुतः सदा हि व आपित्वमस्ति निध्रुवि|	mark ye and notice us o maruts evermore your friendship is secured to us.
मरुतो मारुतस्य न आ भेषजस्य वहता सुदानवः|	o maruts rich in noble gifts bring us a portion of the maruts medicine.
यूयंसखायः सप्तयः|	ye coursers who are friends to us.
याभिः सिन्धुमवथ याभिस्तूर्वथ याभिर्दशस्यथाक्रिविम|	haters of those who serve you not blissbringers bring us bliss with those auspicious aids.
मयो नो भूतोतिभिर्मयोभुवः शिवाभिरसचद्विषः|	wherewith ye are victorious and guard sindhu well and succour krvi in his need.
यत सिन्धौ यदसिक्न्यां यत समुद्रेषु मरुतः सुबर्हिषः|	maruts who rest on fair trimmed grass what balm soever sindhu or asikni hath.
यत पर्वतेषु भेषजम|	or mountains or the seas contain.
विश्वं पश्यन्तो बिभ्र्था तनूष्वा तेना नो अधि वोचत|	ye carry on your bodies ye who see it all so bless us graciously therewith.
कषमा रपो मरुत आतुरस्य न इष्कर्ता विह्रुतं पुनः|	cast maruts to the ground our sick mans malady replace the dislocated limb.
ता वां विश्वस्य गोपा देवा देवेषु यज्ञिय|	i worship you who guard this all gods holiest among the gods.
रतावाना यजसे पुतदक्षसा|	you faithful to the law whose power is sanctified.
मित्रा तना न रथ्या वरुणो यश्च सुक्रतुः|	so too like charioteers are they mitra and sapient varuṇa.
सनात सुजाता तनया धर्तव्रता|	sons highborn from of old whose holy laws stand fast.
ता माता विश्ववेदसासुर्याय परमहसा|	these twain possessors of all wealth most glorious for supremest sway.
महि जजानादितिरतावरी|	aditi mighty mother true to law brought forth.
महान्ता मित्रावरुणा सम्राजा देवावसुरा|	great varuṇa and mitra gods asuras and imperial lords.
रतावानाव्र्तमा घोषतो बर्हत|	true to eternal law proclaim the high decree.
नपाता शवसो महः सूनू दक्षस्य सुक्रतु|	the offspring of a lofty power dakṣas two sons exceeding strong.
सर्प्रदानू इषो वास्त्वधि कषितः|	who lords of flowing rain dwell in the place of food.
सं या दानूनि येमथुर्दिव्याः पार्थिवीरिषः|	ye who have gathered up your gifts celestial and terrestrial food.
नभस्वतीरा वां चरन्तु वर्ष्टयः|	let your rain come to us fraught with the mist of heaven.
अधि या बर्हतो दिवोअभि यूथेव पश्यतः|	the twain who from the lofty sky seem to look down on herds below.
रतावाना सम्राजा नमसे हिता|	holy imperial lords are set to be revered.
रतावाना नि षेदतुः साम्राज्याय सुक्रतू|	they true to law exceeding strong have sat them down for savran rule.
धर्तव्रता कषत्रिया कषत्रमशतुः|	princes whose laws stand fast they have obtained their sway.
अक्ष्णश्चिद गातुवित्तरनुल्बणेन चक्षसा|	pathfinders even better than the eye with unobstructed sight.
नि चिन मिषन्ता निचिरा नि चिक्यतुः|	even when they close their lids observant they perceive.
उत नो देव्यदितिरुरुष्यतां नासत्या|	so may the goddess aditi may the nāsatyas guard us well.
उरुष्यन्तु मरुतो वर्द्धशवसः|	the martits guard us wellendowed with mighty strength.
ते नो नावमुरुष्यत दिवा नक्तं सुदानवः|	do ye o bounteous gods protect our dwelling lace by day and night.
अरिष्यन्तो निपायुभिः सचेमहि|	with you for our defenders may we go unharmed.
अघ्नते विष्णवे वयमरिष्यन्तः सुदानवे|	may we unharmed serve bountiful viṣṇu the god who slayeth none.
शरुधि सवयावन सिन्धो पूर्वचित्तये|	selfmoving sindhu hear and be the first to mark.
तद वार्यं वर्णीमहे वरिष्ठं गोपयत्यम|	this sure protection we elect desirable and reaching far.
मित्रो यत पान्ति वरुणो यदर्यमा|	which mitra varuṇa and aryaman afford.
उत नः सिन्धुरपां तन मरुतस्तदश्विना|	and may the sindhu of the floods the maruts and the asvin pair.
इन्द्रो विष्णुर्मीढ्वांसः सजोषसः|	boon indra and boon viṣṇu have one mind with us.
ते हि षमा वनुषो नरोअभिमातिं कयस्य चित|	because these warring heroes stay the enmity of every foe.
तिग्मं नक्षोदः परतिघ्नन्ति भूर्णयः|	as the fierce waterflood repels the furious ones.
अयमेक इत्था पुरूरु चष्टे वि विष्पतिः|	here this one god the lord of men looks forth exceeding far and wide.
तस्य वरतान्यनु वश्चरमसि|	and we for your advantage keep his holy laws.
अनु पूर्वाण्योक्या साम्राज्यस्य सश्चिम|	we keep the old accustomed laws the statutes of supremacy.
मित्रस्य वरता वरुणस्य दिर्घश्रुत|	the iongknown laws of mitra and of varuṇa.
परि यो रश्मिना दिवोअन्तान ममे पर्थिव्याः|	he who hath measured with his ray the boundaries of heaven and earth.
उभे आ पप्रौरोदसी महित्वा|	and with his majesty hath filled the two worlds full.
उदु षय शरणे दिवो जयोतिरयंस्त सूर्यः|	sūrya hath spread his light aloft up to the region of the sky.
अग्निर्न शुक्रः समिधान आहुतः|	like agni all aflame when gifts are offered him.
वचो दीर्घप्रसद्मनीशे वाजस्य गोमतः|	with him who sits afar the word is lord of food that comes from kine.
ईशे हि पित्वोऽविषस्य दावने|	controller of the gift of unempoisoned food.
तत सूर्यं रोदसी उभे दोषा वस्तोरुप बरुवे|	so unto sūrya heaven and earth at morning and at eve i speak.
भोजेष्वस्मानभ्युच्चरा सदा|	bringing enjoyments ever rise thou up for us.
रज्रमुक्षण्यायने रजतं हरयाणे|	from uksanyayana a bay from harayana a white steed.
रथं युक्तमसनाम सुषामणि|	and from susaman we obtained a hamessed car.
ता मे अश्व्यानां हरीणां नितोशना|	these two shall bring me further gain of troops of tawnycoloured steeds.
उतो नु कर्त्व्यानां नर्वाहसा|	the carriers shall they be of active men of war.
समदभीषू कशावन्ता विप्रा नविष्ठया मती|	and the two sages have i gained who hold the reins and bear the whip.
महो वाजिनावर्वन्ता सचासनम|	and the two great strong coursers with my newest song.
उभयं शर्णवच्च न इन्द्रो अर्वागिदं वचः|	prepare oblation let him come and let the minister serve again.
सत्राच्यामघवा सोमपीतये धिया शविष्ठ आ गमत|	who knows the ordering thereof.
तं हि सवराजं वर्षभं तमोजसे धिषणे निष्टतक्षतुः|	rejoicing in his friendship let the priest be seated over man.
उतोपमानां परथमो नि षीदसि सोमकामं हि ते मनः|	beside the shoot of active power.
आ वर्षस्व पुरूवसो सुतस्येन्द्रान्धसः|	him glowing bright beyond all thought they seek among the race of man.
विद्मा हि तवा हरिवः पर्त्सु सासहिमध्र्ष्टं चिद दध्र्ष्वणिम|	with him for tongue they seize the food.
अप्रामिसत्य मघवन तथेदसदिन्द्र करत्वा यथा वशः|	he hath inflamed the twofold plain lifegiving he hath climbed the wood.
सनेम वाजं तव शिप्रिन्नवसा मक्षू चिद यन्तो अद्रिवः|	and with his tongue hath struck the rock.
शग्ध्यू षु शचीपत इन्द्र विश्वाभिरूतिभिः|	wandering here the radiant calf finds none to fetter him and seeks.
भगंन हि तवा यशसं वसुविदमनु शूर चरामसि|	the mother to declare his praise.
पौरो अश्वस्य पुरुक्र्द गवामस्युत्सो देव हिरण्ययः|	and now that great and mighty team the team of horses that are his.
नकिर्हि दानं परिमर्धिषत तवे यदयद यामि तदा भर|	and traces of his car are seen.
तवं हयेहि चेरवे विदा भगं वसुत्तये|	the seven milk a single cow the two set other five to work.
उद वाव्र्षस्व मघवन गविष्टय उदिन्द्राश्वमिष्टये|	on the streams loudresounding bank.
तवं पुरू सहस्राणि शतानि च यूथा दानाय मंहसे|	entreated by vivasvāns ten indra cast down the waterjar.
आ पुरन्दरं चक्र्म विप्रवचस इन्द्रं गायन्तोअवसे|	with threefold hammer from the sky.
अविप्रो वा यदविधद विप्रो वेन्द्र ते वचः|	three times the newlykindled flame proceeds around the sacrifice.
स पर ममन्दत्त्वाया शतक्रतो पराचामन्यो अहंसन|	the priests anoint it with the meath.
उग्रबाहुर्म्रक्षक्र्त्वा पुरन्दरो यदि मे शर्णवद धवम|	with reverence they drain the fount that circles with its wheel above.
वसूयवो वसुपतिं शतक्रतुं सतोमैरिन्द्रं हवामहे|	exhaustless with the mouth below.
न पापासो मनामहे नारायासो न जळ्हवः|	the pressingstones are set at work the meath is poured into the tank.
यदिन नविन्द्रं वर्षणं सचा सुते सखायं कर्णवामहै|	at the outshedding of the fount.
उग्रं युयुज्म पर्तनासु सासहिं रणकातिमदाभ्यम|	ye cows protect the fount the two mighty ones bless the sacrifice.
वेदा भर्मं चित सनिता रथीतमो वाजिनं यमिदू नशत|	the handles twain are wrought of gold.
यत इन्द्र भयामहे ततो नो अभयं कर्धि|	pour on the juice the ornament which reaches both the heaven and earth.
मघवञ्छग्धितव तन न ऊतिभिर्वि दविषो वि मर्धो जहि|	supply the liquid to the bull.
तवं हि राधस्पते राधसो महः कषयस्यासि विधतः|	these know their own abidingplace like calves beside the mother cows.
तं तवा वयं मघवन्निन्द्र गिर्वणः सुतावन्तो हवामहे|	they meet together with their kin.
इन्द्र सपळ उत वर्त्रहा परस्पा नो वरेण्यः|	devouring in their greedy jaws they make sustaining food in heaven.
स नो रक्षिषच्चरमं स मध्यमं स पश्चात पातु नः पुरः|	to indra agni light and prayer.
तवं नः पश्चादधरादुत्तरात पुर इन्द्र नि पाहि विश्वतः|	the pious one milked out rich food sustenance dealt in portions seven.
आरे अस्मत कर्णुहि दैव्यं भयमारे हेतीरदेवीः|	together with the suns seven rays.
अद्याद्या शवःशव इन्द्र तरास्व परे च नः|	i took some soma when the sun rose up o mitra varuṇa.
विश्वा च नोजरितॄन सत्पते अहा दिवा नक्तं च रक्षिषः|	that is the sick mans medicine.
परभङगी शूरो मघवा तुवीमघः सम्मिष्लो विर्याय कम|	from where oblations must be laid which is the wellbeloveds home.
उभा ते बाहू वर्षणा शतक्रतो नि या वज्रं मिमिक्षतुः|	he with his tongue hath compassed heaven.
ये तरिंशति तरयस परो देवासो बर्हिरासदन|	the thirty gods and three besides whose seat hath been the sacred grass.
विदन्नहद्वितासनन|	from time of old have found and gained.
वरुणो मित्रो अर्यमा समद्रातिषाचो अग्नयः|	varuṇa mitra aryaman agnis with consorts sending boons.
पत्नीवन्तो वषट्क्र्ताः|	to whom our vaṣaṭ is addressed.
ते नो गोपा अपाच्यास्त उदक त इत्था नयक|	these are our guardians in the west and northward here and in the south.
पुरस्तात सर्वया विशा|	and on the cast with all the tribe.
यथा वशन्ति देवास्तथेदसत तदेषां नकिरा मिनत|	even as the gods desire so verily shall it be none minisheth this power of theirs.
अरावा चन मर्त्यः|	no demon and no mortal.
सप्तानां सप्त रष्टयः सप्त दयुम्नान्येषाम|	the seven carry seven spears seven are the splendours they possess.
सप्तो अधि शरियो धिरे|	and seven the glories they assume.
पर यद वस्त्रिष्टुभमिषं मरुतो विप्रो अक्षरत|	o maruts when the sage hath poured the tṛṣṭup forth as food for you.
वि पर्वतेषु राजथ|	ye shine amid the mountainclouds.
यदङग तविषीयवो यामं शुभ्रा अचिध्वम|	when bright ones fain to show your might ye have determined on your course.
नि पर्वता अहासत|	the mountainclouds have bent them down.
उदीरयन्त वायुभिर्वाश्रासः पर्श्निमातरः|	loud roaring with the winds the sons of pṛśni have upraised themselves.
धुक्षन्तपिप्युशीमिषम|	they have poured out the streaming food.
वपन्ति मरुतो मिहं पर वेपयन्ति पर्वतान|	the maruts spread the mist abroad and make mountains rock and reel.
यद यामं यान्ति वायुभिः|	when with the winds they go their way.
नि यद यामाय वो गिरिर्नि सिन्धवो विधर्मणे|	what time the rivers and the hills before your coming bowed them down.
महे शुष्माय येमिरे|	so to sustain your mighty force.
युष्मानु नक्तमूतये युष्मान दिवा हवामहे|	we call on you for aid by night on you for succour in the day.
युष्मान परयत्यध्वरे|	on you while sacrifice proceeds.
उदु तये अरुणप्सवश्चित्रा यामेभिरीरते|	these verily wondrous red of hue speed on their courses with a roar.
वाश्रा अधिष्णुना दिवः|	over the ridges of the sky.
सर्जन्ति रश्मिमोजसा पन्थां सूर्याय यातवे|	with might they drop the loosened rein so that the sun may run his course.
ते भानुभिर्वि तस्थिरे|	and spread themselves with beams of light.
इमां मे मरुतो गिरमिमं सतोमं रभुक्षणः|	accept ye maruts this my song accept ye this mine hymn of praise.
इमं मे वनता हवम|	accept Ṛbhukṣans this my call.
तरीणि सरांसि पर्श्नयो दुदुह्रे वज्रिणे मधु|	the dappled cows have poured three lakes meath for the thunderwielding god.
उत्सं कवन्धमुद्रिणम|	from the great cask the watery cloud.
मरुतो यद ध वो दिवः सुम्नायन्तो हवामहे|	o maruts quickly come to us when longing for felicity.
आ तू न उपगन्तन|	we call you hither from the sky.
यूयं हि षठा सुदानवो रुद्रा रभुक्षणो दमे|	for rudras and Ṛbhukṣans ye most bountiful are in the house.
उत परचेतसो मदे|	wise when the gladdening draught is drunk.
आ नो रयिं मदच्युतं पुरुक्षुं विश्वधायसम|	o maruts send us down from heaven riches distilling rapturous joy.
इयर्ता मरुतो दिवः|	with plenteous food sustaining all.
अधीव यद गिरीणां यामं शुभ्रा अचिध्वम|	when bright ones hither from the hills ye have resolved to take your way.
सुवानैर्मन्दध्व इन्दुभिः|	ye revel in the drops effused.
एतावतश्चिदेषां सुम्नं भिक्षेत मर्त्यः|	man should solicit with his lauds happiness which belongs to them.
अदाभ्यस्य मन्मभिः|	so great a band invincible.
ये दरप्सा इव रोदसी धमन्त्यनु वर्ष्टिभिः|	they who like fiery sparks with showers of rain blow through the heaven and earth.
उत्सं दुहन्तो अक्षितम|	milking the spring that never fails.
उदु सवानेभिरीरत उद रथैरुदु वायुभिः|	with chariots and tumultuous roar with tempests and with hymns of praise.
उत सतोमैः पर्श्निमातरः|	the sons of pṛśni hurry forth.
येनाव तुर्वशं यदुं येन कण्वं धनस्प्र्तम|	for wealth we think of that whereby ye aided yadu turvaśa.
राये सु तस्य धीमहि|	and kanva who obtained the spoil.
इमा उ वः सुदानवो घर्तं न पिप्युषीरिषः|	may these our viands bounteous ones i that flow in streams like holy oil.
वर्धान काण्वस्य मन्मभिः|	with kaṇvas hymns increase your might.
कव नूनं सुदानवो मदथा वर्क्तबर्हिषः|	where bounteous lords for whom the grass is trimmed are ye rejoicing now.
बरह्मा को वःसपर्यति|	what brahman is adoring you.
नहि षम यद ध वः पुरा सतोमेभिर्व्र्क्तबर्हिषः|	is it not there where ye of old supplied with sacred grass for lauds.
शर्धान रतस्य जिन्वथ|	inspired the strong in sacrifice.
समु तये महतीरपः सं कषोणी समु सूर्यम|	they brought together both the worlds the mighty waters and the sun.
सं वज्रं पर्वशो दधुः|	and joint by joint the thunderbolt.
वि वर्त्रं पर्वशो ययुर्वि पर्वतानराजिनः|	they sundered vṛtra limb from limb and split the gloomy mountainclouds.
चक्राणा वर्ष्णि पौंस्यम|	performing a heroic deed.
अनु तरितस्य युध्यतः शुष्ममावन्नुत करतुम|	they reinforced the power and strength of trita as he fought and helped.
अन्विन्द्रं वर्त्रतूर्ये|	indra in battle with the foe.
विद्युद्धस्ता अभिद्यवः शिप्राः शीर्षन हिरण्ययीः|	they deck themselves for glory bright celestial lightning in their hands.
शुभ्रा वयञ्जत शरिये|	and helms of gold upon their heads.
उशना यत परावत उक्ष्णो रन्ध्रमयातन|	when eagerly ye from far away came to the cavern of the bull.
दयौर्न चक्रदद भिया|	he bellowed in his fear like heaven.
आ नो मखस्य दावनेअश्वैर्हिरण्यपाणिभिः|	borne by your goldenfooted steeds o gods come hither to receive.
देवास उप गन्तन|	the sacrifice we offer you.
यदेषां पर्षती रथे परष्टिर्वहति रोहितः|	when the red leader draws along their spotted deer yoked to the car.
यान्ति शुभ्रा रिणन्नपः|	the bright ones come and shed the rain.
सुषोमे शर्यणावत्यार्जीके पस्त्यावति|	susoma saryakiavan and arjika full of homes have they.
ययुर्निचक्रया नरः|	these heroes sought with downward car.
कदा गछाथ मरुत इत्था विप्रं हवमानम|	when maruts ye come to him the singer who invokes you thus.
मार्डीकेभिर्नाधमानम|	with favours to your suppliant.
कद ध नूनं कधप्रियो यदिन्द्रमजहातन|	what now where have ye still a friend since ye left indra all alone.
को वः सखित्व ओहते|	who counteth on your friendship now.
सहो षु णो वज्रहस्तैः कण्वासो अग्निं मरुद्भिः|	the kaṇvas sing forth agnis praise together with our maruts who.
सतुषेहिरण्यवाशीभिः|	wield thunder and wear swords of gold.
ओ षु वर्ष्णः परयज्यूना नव्यसे सुविताय|	hither for new felicity may i attract the impetuous ones.
वव्र्त्यां चित्रवाजान|	the heroes with their wondrous strength.
गिरयश्चिन नि जिहते पर्शानासो मन्यमानाः|	before them sink the very hills deerning themseives abysses yea.
पर्वताश्चिन नि येमिरे|	even the mountains bend them down.
आक्ष्णयावानो वहन्त्यन्तरिक्षेण पततः|	steeds flying on their tortuous path through midair carry them and give.
धातारः सतुवते वयः|	the man who lauds them strength and life.
अग्निर्हि जानि पूर्व्यश्छन्दो न सूरो अर्चिषा|	agni was born the first of all like sūrya lovely with his light.
ते भानुभिर्वि तस्थिरे|	with lustre these have spread abroad.
वयमु तवामपूर्व्य सथूरं न कच्चिद भरन्तोअवस्यवः|	we call on thee o matchless one we seeking help possessing nothing firm ourselves.
वाजे चित्रं हवामहे|	call on thee wonderful in fight.
उप तवा कर्मन्नूतये स नो युवोग्रश्चक्राम यो धर्षत|	on thee for aid in sacrifice this youth of ours the bold the mighty hath gonse forth.
तवामिद धयवितारं वव्र्महे सखाय इन्द्र सानसिम|	we therefore we thy friends indra havie chosen thee freegiver as our guardian god.
आ याहीम इन्दवोअश्वपते गोपत उर्वरापते|	come hither for the drops are here o lord of cornlands lord of horses lord of kine.
सोमं सोमपते पिब|	drink thou the soma somas lord.
वयं हि तवा बन्धुमन्तमबन्धवो विप्रास इन्द्र येमिम|	for we the kinless singers have drawn hither thee o indra who hast numerous kin.
या ते धामानि वर्षभ तेभिरा गहि विश्वेभिः सोमपीतये|	with all the forms thou hast comic thou of bulllike strength come near to drink the soma juice.
सीदन्तस्ते वयो यथा गोश्रीते मधौ मदिरे विवक्षणे|	sitting like birds beside thy meath mingled with milk that gladdeneth and exalteth thee.
अभि तवामिन्द्र नोनुमः|	indra to thee we sing aloud.
अछा च तवैना नमसा वदामसि किं मुहुश्चिद वि दीधयः|	we speak to thee with this our reverential prayer why art thou pondering yet awhile.
सन्ति कामासो हरिवो ददिष टवं समो वयं सन्ति नो धियः|	here are our wishes thou art liberal lord of bays we and our hymns are present here.
नूत्ना इदिन्द्र ते वयमूती अभूम नहि नू ते अद्रिवः|	for not in recent times alone o indra thunderarmed have we obtained thine aid.
विद्मा पुरा परीणसः|	of old we knew thy plenteous wealth.
विद्मा सखित्वमुत शूर भोज्यमा ते ता वज्रिन्नीमहे|	hero we knew thy friendship and thy rich rewards these thunderer now we crave of thee.
उतो समस्मिन्ना शिशीहि नो वसो वाजे सुशिप्र गोमति|	o vasu for all wealth that cometh of the kine sharpen our powers fairvisored god.
यो न इदमइदं पुरा पर वस्य आनिनाय तमु व सतुषे|	him who of old hath brought to us this and that blessing him i magnify for you.
सखाय इन्द्रमूतये|	even indra o my friends for help.
हर्यश्वं सत्पतिं चर्षणीसहं स हि षमा यो अमन्दत|	borne by bay steeds the lord of heroes ruling men for it is he who takes delight.
आ तु नः स वयति गव्यमश्व्यं सतोत्र्भ्यो मघवा शतम|	may maghavan bestow on us his worshippers hundreds of cattle and of steeds.
तवया ह सविद युजा वयं परति शवसन्तं वर्षभ बरुवीमहि|	hero may we with thee for friend withstand the man who pants against us in his wrath.
संस्थे जनस्य गोमतः|	in fight with people rich in kine.
जयेम कारे पुरुहूत कारिणोअभि तिष्ठेम दूढ्यः|	may we be victors in the singers battlesong and meet the wicked much invoked.
नर्भिर्व्र्त्रं हन्याम शूशुयाम चावेरिन्द्र पर णो धियः|	with heroes smite the foeman and show forth our strength o indra further thou our thoughts.
अभ्रात्र्व्यो अना तवमनापिरिन्द्र जनुषा सनादसि|	o indra from all ancient time rivalless ever and companionless art thou.
युधेदापित्वमिछसे|	thou seekest comradeship in war.
नकी रेवन्तं सख्याय विन्दसे पीयन्ति ते सुराश्वः|	thou findest not the wealthy man to be thy friend those scorn thee who are flown with wine.
यदा कर्णोषि नदनुं समूहस्यादित पितेव हूयसे|	what time thou thunderest and gatherest then thou even as a father art invoked.
मा ते अमाजुरो यथा मूरास इन्द्र सख्ये तवावतः|	o indra let us not like fools who waste their lives at home with friendship such as thine.
नि षदाम सचा सुते|	sit idly by the pouredout juice.
मा ते गोदत्र निरराम राधस इन्द्र मा ते गर्हामहि|	giver of kine may we not miss thy gracious gifts let us not rob thee of thine own.
दर्ळ्हा चिदर्यः पर मर्शाभ्या भर न ते दामान आदभे|	strip even the strong places of the foe and bring thy gifts can never be made vain.
इन्द्रो वा घेदियन मघं सरस्वती वा सुभगा ददिर्वसु|	indra or blest sarasvatī alone bestows such wealth treasure so great or thou.
तवं वा चित्र दाशुषे|	o citra on the worshipper.
चित्र इद राजा राजका इदन्यके यके सरस्वतीमनु|	citra is king and only kinglings are the rest who dwell beside sarasvatī.
पर्जन्य इव ततनद धि वर्ष्ट्या सहस्रमयुता ददत|	he like parjanya with his rain hath spread himself with thousand yea with myriad gifts.
य इन्द्र सोमपातमो मदः शविष्ठ चेतति|	joy mightiest indra known and marked sprung most from somadraughts wherewith.
येना हंसि नयत्रिणं तमीमहे|	thou smitest down the greedy fiend for that we long.
येना दशग्वमध्रिगुं वेपयन्तं सवर्णरम|	wherewith thou bolpest adhrigu the great daśagva and the god.
येना समुद्रमाविथा तमीमहे|	who stirs the sunlight and the sea for that we long.
येन सिन्धुं महीरपो रथानिव परचोदयः|	wherewith thou dravest forth like cars sindhu and all the mighty floods.
पन्थां रतस्य यातवे तमीमहे|	to go the way ordained by law for that we long.
इमं सतोममभिष्टये घर्तं न पूतमद्रिवः|	accept this laud for aid made pure like oil thou caster of the stone.
येना नुसद्य ओजसा ववक्षिथ|	whereby even in a moment thou hast waxen great.
इमं जुषस्व गिर्वणः समुद्र इव पिन्वते|	be pleased songlover with this song it flows abundant like the sea.
इन्द्र विश्वाभिरूतिभिर्ववक्षिथ|	indra with all thy succours thou hast waxen great.
यो नो देवः परावतः सखित्वनाय मामहे|	the god who from afar hath sent gifts to maintain our friendships bond.
दिवो न वर्ष्टिं परथयन ववक्षिथ|	thou spreading them like rain from heaven hast waxen great.
ववक्षुरस्य केतवो उत वज्रो गभस्त्योः|	the beams that mark him have grown strong the thunder rests between his arms.
यत सूर्यो न रोदसी अवर्धयत|	when like the sun he hath increased both heaven and earth.
यदि परव्र्द्ध सत्पते सहस्रं महिषानघः|	when mighty lord of heroes thou didst cat a thousand buffaloes.
आदित त इन्द्रियं महि पर वाव्र्धे|	then grew and waxed exceeding great thine indrapower.
इन्द्रः सूर्यस्य रश्मिभिर्न्यर्शसानमोषति|	indra consumeth with the rays of sūrya the malicious man.
अग्निर्वनेव सासहिः पर वाव्र्धे|	like agni conquering the woods he hath grown strong.
इयं त रत्वियावती धीतिरेति नवीयसी|	this newest thought of ours that suits the time approaches unto thee.
सपर्यन्ती पुरुप्रिया मिमीत इत|	serving beloved in many a place it metes and marks.
गर्भो यज्ञस्य देवयुः करतुं पुनीत आनुषक|	the pious germ of sacrifice directly purifies the soul.
सतोमैरिन्द्रस्य वाव्र्धे मिमीत इत|	by indras lauds it waxes great it metes and marks.
सनिर्मित्रस्य पप्रथ इन्द्रः सोमस्य पीतये|	indra who wins the friend hath spread himself to drink the somadraught.
पराची वाशीव सुन्वते मिमीत इत|	like worshippers dilating praise it metes and marks.
यं विप्रा उक्थवाहसोअभिप्रमन्दुरायवः|	he whom the sages living men have gladdened offering up their hymns.
घर्तं न पिप्य आसन्य रतस्य यत|	hath swelled like oil of sacrifice in agnis mouth.
उत सवराजे अदिति सतोममिन्द्राय जीजनत|	aditi also hath brought forth a hymn for indra sovran lord.
पुरुप्रशस्तमूतय रतस्य यत|	the work of sacrifice for help is glorified.
अभि वह्नय ऊतयेअनूषत परशस्तये|	the ministering priests have sung their songs for aid and eulogy.
न देव विव्रता हरी रतस्य यत|	god thy bays turn not from the rite which law ordains.
यत सोममिन्द्र विष्णवि यद वा घ तरित आप्त्ये|	if indra thou drink soma by viṣṇus or tṛta Āptyas side.
यद वा मरुत्सु मन्दसे समिन्दुभिः|	or with the maruts take delight in flowing drops.
यद वा शक्र परावति समुद्रे अधि मन्दसे|	or Śakra if thou gladden thee afar or in the sea of air.
अस्माकमित सुते रणा समिन्दुभिः|	rejoice thee in this juice of ours in flowing drops.
यद वासि सुन्वतो वर्धो यजमानस्य सत्पते|	or lord of heroes if thou aid the worshipper who shed the juice.
उक्थे वा यस्यरण्यसि समिन्दुभिः|	or him whose laud delights thee and his flowing drops.
देवंदेवं वोअवस इन्द्रमइन्द्रं गर्णीषणि|	to magnify the god the god indra yea indra for your help.
अधा यज्ञाय तुर्वणे वयानशुः|	and promptly end the sacrificethis have they gained.
यज्ञेभिर्यज्ञवाहसं सोमेभिः सोमपातमम|	with worship him whom men adore with soma him who drinks it most.
होत्राभिरिन्द्रं वाव्र्धुर्व्यानशुः|	indra with lauds have they increasedthis have they gained.
महीरस्य परणीतयः पूर्वीरुत परशस्तयः|	his leadings are with power and might and his instructions manifold.
विश्वा वसूनि दाशुषे वयानशुः|	he gives the worshipper all wealth this have they gained.
इन्द्रं वर्त्राय हन्तवे देवासो दधिरे पुरः|	for slaying vṛtra have the gods set indra in the foremost place.
इन्द्रं वाणीरनूषता समोजसे|	indra the choral bands have sung for vigorous strength.
महान्तं महिना वयं सतोमेभिर्हवनश्रुतम|	we to the mighty with our might with lauds to him who hears our call.
अर्कैरभिप्र णोनुमः समोजसे|	with holy hymns have sung aloud for vigorous strength.
न यं विविक्तो रोदसी नान्तरिक्षाणि वज्रिणम|	not earth nor heaven nor firmaments contain the thunderwielding god.
अमादिदस्य तित्विषे समोजसः|	they shake before his violent rush and vigorous strength.
यदिन्द्र पर्तनाज्ये देवास्त्वा दधिरे पुरः|	what time the gods o indra get thee foremost in the furious fight.
आदित ते हर्यता हरी ववक्षतुः|	then thy two beautiful bay steeds carried thee on.
यदा वर्त्रं नदीव्र्तं शवसा वज्रिन्नवधीः|	when vṛtra stayer of the floods thou siest thundeicr with might.
आदित ते|	then thy two beautiful bay steeds carried thee on.
यदा ते विष्णुरोजसा तरीणि पदा विचक्रमे|	when viṣṇu through thine energy strode wide those three great steps of his.
आदित ते|	then thy two beautiful bay steeds carried thee on.
यदा ते हर्यता हरी वाव्र्धाते दिवेदिवे|	when thy two beautiful bay steeds grew great and greater day by day.
आदित ते विश्वा भुवनानि येमिरे|	even then all creatures that had life bowed down to thee.
यदा ते मारुतीर्विशस्तुभ्यमिन्द्र नियेमिरे|	when indra all the marut folk humbly submitted them to thee.
आ इत ते व|	even then all creatures that had life bowed down to thee.
यदा सूर्यममुं दिवि शुक्रं जयोतिरधारयः|	when yonder sun that brilliant light thou settest in the heaven above.
आदित्ते व|	even then all creatures that had life bowed down to thee.
इमां त इन्द्र सुष्टुतिं विप्र इयर्ति धीतिभिः|	to thee o indra with this thought the sage lifts up this eulogy.
जामिं पदेव पिप्रतीं पराध्वरे|	akin and leading as on foot to sacrifice.
यदस्य धामनि परिये समीचीनासो अस्वरन|	when in thine own dear dwelling all gathered have lifted up the voice.
नाभा यज्ञस्य दोहना पराध्वरे|	milkstreams at worships central spot for sacrifice.
सुवीर्यं सवश्व्यं सुगव्यं इन्द्र दद्धि नः|	as priest o indra give us wealth in brave men and good steeds ana kine.
होतेव पूर्वचित्तये पराध्वरे|	that we may first remember thee for sacrifice.
यत सथो दीर्घप्रसद्मनि यद वादो रोचने दिवः|	whether ye travel far away or dwell in yonder light of heaven.
यद वा समुद्रे अध्याक्र्ते गर्हेअत आ यातमश्विना|	or in a mansion that is built above the sea come thence ye aśvins hitherward.
यद वा यज्ञं मनवे सम्मिमिक्षथुरेवेत काण्वस्य बोधतम|	or if for manuye prepared the sacrifice remember also kaṇvas son.
बर्हस्पतिं विश्वान देवानहं हुव इन्द्राविष्णू अश्विनावाशुहेषसा|	i call bṛhaspati indra viṣṇu all the gods the aśvins borne by rapid steeds.
तया नवश्विना हुवे सुदंससा गर्भे कर्ता|	those aśvins i invoke who work marvels brought hither to receive.
ययोरस्ति परणः सख्यं देवेष्वध्याप्यम|	with whom our friendship is most famed and kinship passing that of gods.
ययोरधि पर यज्ञा असूरे सन्ति सूरयः|	on whom the solemn rites depend whose worshippers rise without the sun.
ता यज्ञस्याध्वरस्य परचेतसा सवधाभिर्या पिबतः सोम्यं मधु|	these who foreknow the holy work of sacrifice and by their godhead drink the sweets of soma juice.
यदद्याश्विनावपाग यत पराक सथो वाजिनीवसू|	whether ye lords of ample wealth now linger in the cast or west.
यद दरुह्यव्यनवि तुर्वशे यदौ हुवे वामथ मा गतम|	with druhyu or with anu yadu turvaga i call you hither come to me.
यदन्तरिक्षे पतथः पुरुभुजा यद वेमे रोदसी अनु|	lords of great riches whether through the firmament ye fly or speed through heaven and earth.
यद्वा सवधाभिरधितिष्ठथो रथमत आ यातमश्विना|	or with your godlike natures stand upon your cars come thence o aśvins hitherward.
बभ्रुरेको विषुणः सूनरो युवाञ्ज्यङकते हिरण्ययम|	one is a youth brown active manifold he decks the golden one with ornament.
योनिमेक आ ससाद दयोतनोअन्तर्देवेषु मेधिरः|	another luminous occupies the place of sacritice sage among the gods.
वाशीमेको बिभर्ति हस्त आयसीमन्तर्देवेषु निध्रुविः|	one brandishes in his hand an iron knife firm in his seat amid the deities.
वज्रमेको बिभर्ति हस्त आहितं तेन वर्त्राणि जिघ्नते|	another holds the thunderbolt wherewith he slays the vṛtras resting in his hand.
तिग्ममेको बिभर्ति हस्त आयुधं शुचिरुग्रो जलाषभेषजः|	another bears a pointed weapon bright is he and strong with healing medicines.
पथ एकः पीपाय तस्करो यथा एष वेद निधीनाम|	another thieflike watches well the ways and knows the places where the treasures lie.
तरीण्येक उरुगायो वि चक्रमे यत्र देवासो मदन्ति|	another with his mighty stride hath made his three steps thither where the gods rejoice.
विभिर्द्वा चरत एकया सह पर परवासेव वसतः|	two with one dame ride on with winged steeds and journey forth like travellers on their way.
सदो दवा चक्राते उपमा दिवि सम्राजा सर्पिरासुती|	two highest in the heavens have set their seat worshipped with holy oil imperial kings.
अर्चन्त एके महि साम मन्वत तेन सूर्यमरोचयन|	some singing lauds conceived the sāmahymn great hymn whereby they caused the sun to shine.
तवमग्ने वरतपा असि देव आ मर्त्येष्वा|	thou agni god mid mortal men art guard of sacred rites thou art.
तवं यज्ञेष्वीड्यः|	to be adored at sacrifice.
तवमसि परशस्यो विदथेषु सहन्त्य|	o mighty agni thou must be glorified at our festivals.
अग्ने रथीरध्वराणाम|	bearing our offerings to the gods.
स तवमस्मदप दविषो युयोधि जातवेदः|	o jātavedas agni fight and drive our foes afar from us.
अदेवीरग्ने अरातीः|	themand their godless enmities.
अन्ति चित सन्तमह यज्ञं मर्तस्य रिपोः|	thou jātavedas seekest not the worship of a hostile man.
नोप वेषि जातवेदः|	however nigh itbe to thee.
मर्ता अमर्त्यस्य ते भूरि नाम मनामहे|	we sages mortals as we are adore the mighty name oof thee.
विप्रासो जातवेदसः|	immortal jātavedas name.
विप्रं विप्रासोअवसे देवं मर्तास ऊतये|	sages we call the sage to help mortals we call the god to aid.
अग्निं गीर्भिर्हवामहे|	we call on agni with our songs.
आ ते वत्सो मनो यमत परमाच्चित सधस्थात|	may vatsa draw thy mind away even from thy loftiest dwellingplace.
अग्ने तवां कामया गिरा|	agni with song that yearns for thee.
पुरुत्रा हि सद्रंं असि विशो विश्वा अनु परभुः|	thou art the same in many a place mid all the people thou art lord.
समत्सुत्वा हवामहे|	in fray and fightt we call on thee.
समत्स्वग्निमवसे वाजयन्तो हवामहे|	when we are seeking strength we call agni to help us in the strife.
वाजेषु चित्रराधसम|	the giver of rich gifts in war.
परत्नो हि कमीड्यो अध्वरेषु सनाच्च होता नव्यश्च सत्सि|	ancient adorablie at sacrifices priest from of old meet for our praise thou sittest.
सवां चाग्ने तन्वं पिप्रयस्वास्मभ्यं च सौभगमा यजस्व|	fill full and satisfy thy body agni and win us happiness by offering worship.
अस्तभ्नाद दयामसुरो विश्ववेदा अमिमीत वरिमाणं पर्थिव्याः|	lord of all wealth the asura propped the heavens and measured out the broad earths wide expanses.
आसीदद विश्वा भुवनानि सम्राड विश्वेत तानि वरुणस्य वरतानि|	he king supreme approached all living creatures all these are varuṇas holy operations.
एवा वन्दस्व वरुणं बर्हन्तं नमस्या धीरमम्र्तस्य गोपाम|	so humbly worship varuṇa the mighty revere the wise guard of world immortal.
स नः शर्म तरिवरूथं वि यंसत पातं नो दयावाप्र्थिवी उपस्थे|	may he vouchsafe us triplybarred protection o earth and heaven within your lap preserve us.
इमां धियं शिक्षमाणस्य देव करतुं दक्षं वरुण सं शिशाधि|	sharpen this song of him who strives his utmost sharpen god varuṇa his strength and insight.
ययाति विश्वा दुरिता तरेम सुतर्माणमधि नावं रुहेम|	may we ascend the ship that bears us safely whereby we may pass over all misfortune.
आ वां गरावाणो अश्विना धीभिर्विप्रा अचुच्यवुः|	aśvins with songs the singer stones have made you hasten hitherward.
नासत्या सोमपीतये नभन्तामन्यके समे|	nāsatyas to the somadraught let all the others die away.
यथा वामत्रिरश्विना गीर्भिर्विप्रो अजोहवीत|	as the sage atri with his hymns o aśvins called you eagerly.
नासत्यासोमपीतये नभन्तामन्यके समे|	nāsatyas to the somadraught let all the others die away.
एवा वामह्व ऊतये यथाहुवन्त मेधिराः|	so have i called you to our aid even as the wise have called of old.
नासत्या सोमपीतये नभन्तामन्यके समे|	nāsatyas to the somadraught let all the others die away.
इदं ह नूनमेषां सुम्नं भिक्षेत मर्त्यः|	now let the mortal offer prayer to win the unexampled grace.
आदित्यानामपूर्व्यं सवीमनि|	of these Ādityas and their aid to cherish life.
अनर्वाणो हयेषां पन्था आदित्यानाम|	for not an enemy molests the paths which these Ādityas tread.
अदब्धाः सन्ति पायवः सुगेव्र्धः|	infallible guards they strengthen us in happiness.
तत सु नः सविता भगो वरुणो मित्रो अर्यमा|	now soon may bhaga savitar varuṇa mitra aryaman.
शर्म यछन्तु सप्रथो यदीमहे|	give us the shelter widely spread which we implore.
देवेभिर्देव्यदितेअरिष्टभर्मन्ना गहि|	with gods come thou whose fostering care none checks o goddesss aditi.
समत सूरिभिः पुरुप्रिये सुशर्मभिः|	come dear to many with the lords who guard us well.
ते हि पुत्रासो अदितेर्विदुर्द्वेषांसि योतवे|	for well these sons of aditi know to keep enmities aloof.
अंहोश्चिदुरुचक्रयोअनेहसः|	unrivalled giving ample room they save from woe.
अदितिर्नो दिवा पशुमदितिर्नक्तमद्वयाः|	aditi guard our herd by day aditi free from guile by night.
अदितिः पात्वंहसः सदाव्र्धा|	aditi ever strengthening save us from grief.
उत सया नो दिवा मतिरदितिरूत्या गमत|	and in the day our hymn is this may aditi come nigh to help.
सा शन्ताति मयस करदप सरिधः|	with lovingkindness bring us weal and chase our foes.
उत तया दैव्या भिषजा शं नः करतो अश्विना|	and may the aśvins the divine pair of physicians send us health.
युयुयातामितो रपो अप सरिधः|	may they remove iniquity and chase our foes.
शमग्निरग्निभिः करच्छं नस्तपतु सूर्यः|	may agni bless us with his fires and sūrya warm us pleasantly.
शं वातो वात्वरपा अप सरिधः|	may the pure wind breathe sweet on us and chase our foes.
अपामीवामप सरिधमप सेधत दुर्मतिम|	drive ye disease and strife away drive ye away malignity.
आदित्यासो युयोतना नो अंहसः|	Ādityas keep us ever far from sore distress.
युयोता शरुमस्मदानादित्यास उतामतिम|	remove from us the arrow keep famine Ādityas far away.
रधग दवेषःक्र्णुत विश्ववेदसः|	keep enmities afar from us lords of all wealth.
तत सु नः शर्म यछतादित्या यन मुमोचति|	now o Ādityas grant to us the shelter that lets man go free.
एनस्वन्तं चिदेनसः सुदानवः|	yea even the sinner from his sin ye bounteous gods.
यो नः कश्चिद रिरिक्षति रक्षस्त्वेन मर्त्यः|	whatever mortal with the powe r of demons fain would injure us.
सवैः षेवै रिरिषीष्ट युर्जनः|	may he impetuous suffer harm by his own deeds.
समित तमघमश्नवद दुःशंसं मर्त्यं रिपुम|	may sin oertake our human foe the man who speaketh evil thing.
यो अस्मत्रा दुर्हणावानुप दवयुः|	him who would cause our misery whose heart is false.
पाकत्रा सथन देवा हर्त्सु जानीथ मर्त्यम|	gods ye are with the simple ones ye know each mortal in your hearts.
उप दवयुं चाद्वयुं च वसवः|	ye vasus well discriminate the false and true.
आ शर्म पर्वतानामोतापां वर्णीमहे|	fain would we have the sheltering aid of mountains and of waterfloods.
दयावाक्षामारे अस्मद रपस कर्तम|	keep far from us iniquity o heaven and earth.
ते नो भद्रेण शर्मणा युष्माकं नावा वसवः|	so with auspicious sheltering aid do ye o vasus carry us.
अति विश्वानि दुरिता पिपर्तन|	beyond all trouble and distress borne in your ship.
तुचे तनाय तत सु नो दराघीय आयुर्जीवसे|	Ādityas ye most mighty ones grant to our children and their seed.
आदित्यासःसुमहसः कर्णोतन|	extended term of life that they may live long days.
यज्ञो हीळो वो अन्तर आदित्या अस्ति मर्ळत|	sacrifice o Ādityas is your inward monitor be kind.
युष्मे इद वो अपि षमसि सजात्ये|	for in the bond of kindred we are bound to you.
बर्हद वरूथं मरुतां देवं तरातारमश्विना|	the maruts high protecting aid the aśvins and the god who saves.
मित्रमीमहे वरुणं सवस्तये|	mitra and varuṇa for weal we supplicate.
अनेहो मित्रार्यमन नर्वद वरुण शंस्यम|	grant us a home with triple guard aryaman mitra varuṇa.
तरिवरूथं मरुतो यन्त नश्छर्दिः|	unthreatened maruts meet for praise and filled with men.
ये चिद धि मर्त्युबन्धव आदित्या मनवः समसि|	and as we human beings o Ādityas are akin to death.
पर सू नायुर्जीवसे तिरेतन|	graciously lengthen ye our lives that we may live.
मा चिदन्यद वि शंसत सखायो मा रिषण्यत|	glorify naught besides o friends so shall no sorrow trouble you.
इन्द्रमित्स्तोता वर्षणं सचा सुते मुहुरुक्था च शंसत|	praise only mighty indra when the juice is shed and say your lauds repeatedly.
अवक्रक्षिणं वर्षभं यथाजुरं गां न चर्षणीसहम|	even him eternal like a bull who rushes down mens conqueror bounteous like a cow.
विद्वेषणं संवननोभयंकरं मंहिष्ठमुभयाविनम|	him who is cause of both of enmity and peace to both sides most munificent.
यच्चिद धि तवा जना इमे नाना हवन्त ऊतये|	although these men in sundry ways invoke thee to obtain thine aid.
अस्माकं बरह्मेदमिन्द्र भूतु तेअह विश्वा च वर्धनम|	be this our prayer addressed o indra unto thee thine exaltation every day.
वि तर्तूर्यन्ते मघवन विपश्चितोअर्यो विपो जनानाम|	those skilled in song o maghavan among these men oercome with might the foemans songs.
उप करमस्व पुरुरूपमा भर वाजं नेदिष्ठमूतये|	come hither bring us strength in many a varied form most near that it may succour us.
महे चन तवामद्रिवः परा शुल्काय देयाम|	o caster of the stone i would not sell thee for a mighty price.
न सहस्रायनायुताय वज्रिवो न शताय शतामघ|	not for a thousand thunderer nor ten thousand nor a hundred lord of countless wealth.
वस्यानिन्द्रासि मे पितुरुत भरातुरभुञ्जतः|	o indra thou art more to me than sire or niggard brother is.
माता चमे छदयथः समा वसो वसुत्वनाय राधसे|	thou and my mother o good lord appear alike to give me wealth abundantly.
कवेयथ कवेदसि पुरुत्रा चिद धि ते मनः|	where art thou whither art thou gone for many a place attracts thy mind.
अलर्षि युध्म खजक्र्त पुरन्दर पर गायत्रा अगासिषुः|	haste warrior fortdestroyer lord of battles din haste holy songs have sounded forth.
परास्मै गायत्रमर्चत वावातुर्यः पुरन्दरः|	sing out the psalm to him who breaks down castles for his faithful friend.
याभिःकाण्वस्योप बर्हिरासदं यासद वज्री भिनत पुरः|	verses to bring the thunderer to destroy the forts and sit on kaṇvas sacred grass.
ये ते सन्ति दशग्विनः शतिनो ये सहस्रिणः|	the horses which are thine in tens in hundreds yea in thousands thine.
अश्वासो येते वर्षणो रघुद्रुवस्तेभिर्नस्तूयमा गहि|	even those vigorous steeds fleetfooted in the course with those come quickly near to us.
आ तवद्य सबर्दुघां हुवे गायत्रवेपसम|	this day i call sabardughā who animates the holy song.
इन्द्रं धेनुंसुदुघामन्यामिषमुरुधारामरंक्र्तम|	indra the richlyyielding milchcow who provides unfailing food in ample stream.
यत तुदत सूर एतशं वङकू वातस्य पर्णिना|	when sūra wounded etaśa with vātas rolling winged car.
वहत कुत्समार्जुनेयं शतक्रतुः तसरद गन्धर्वमस्त्र्तम|	indra bore kutsa Ārjuneya off and mocked gandharva the unconquered one.
य रते चिदभिश्रिषः पुरा जत्रुभ्य आत्र्दः|	he without ligature before making incision in the neck.
सन्धातासन्धिं मघवा पुरूवसुरिष्कर्ता विह्रुतं पुनः|	closed up the wound again most wealthy maghavan who maketh whole the injured part.
मा भूम निष्ट्या इवेन्द्र तवदरणा इव|	may we be never cast aside and strangers as it were to thee.
वनानि न परजहितान्यद्रिवो दुरोषासो अमन्महि|	we thunderwielding indra count ourselves as trees rejected and unfit to burn.
अमन्महीदनाशवोअनुग्रासश्च वर्त्रहन|	o vṛtraslayer we were thought slow and unready for the fray.
सक्र्त सु ते महता शूर राधसानु सतोमं मुदीमहि|	yet once in thy great bounty may we have delight o hero after praising thee.
यदि सतोमं मम शरवदस्माकमिन्द्रमिन्दवः|	if he will listen to my laud then may out somadrops that flow.
तिरः पवित्रं सस्र्वांस आशवो मन्दन्तु तुग्र्याव्र्धः|	rapidly through the strainer gladden indra drops due to the tugryas strengthener.
आ तवद्य सधस्तुतिं वावातुः सख्युरा गहि|	come now unto the common laud of thee and of thy faithful friend.
उपस्तुतिर्मघोनां पर तवावत्वधा ते वश्मि सुष्टुतिम|	so may our wealthy nobles praise give joy to thee fain would i sing thine eulogy.
सोता हि सोममद्रिभिरेमेनमप्सु धावत|	press out the soma with the stones and in the waters wash it clean.
गव्या वस्त्रेव वासयन्त इन नरो निर्धुक्षन वक्षणाभ्यः|	the men investing it with raiment made of milk shall milk it forth from out the stems.
अध जमो अध वा दिवो बर्हतो रोचनादधि|	whether thou come from earth or from the lustre of the lofty heaven.
अया वर्धस्व तन्वा गिरा ममा जाता सुक्रतो पर्ण|	wax stronger in thy body through my song of praise fill full all creatures o most wise.
इन्द्राय सु मदिन्तमं सोमं सोता वरेण्यम|	for india press the soma out most gladdening and most excellent.
शक्र एणं पीपयद विश्वया धिया हिन्वानं न वाजयुम|	may Śakra make it swell sent forth with every prayer and asking as it were for strength.
मा तवा सोमस्य गल्दया सदा याचन्नहं गिरा|	let me not still beseeching thee with earnest song at soma rites.
भूर्णिं मर्गं न सवनेषु चुक्रुधं क ईशानं न याचिषत|	anger thee like some wild beast who would not beseech him who hath power to grant his prayer.
मदेनेषितं मदमुग्रमुग्रेण शवसा|	the draught made swift with rapturous joy effectual with its mighty strength.
विश्वेषां तरुतारं मदच्युतं मदे हि षमा ददाति नः|	allconquering distilling transport let him drink for he in ecstasy gives us gifts.
शेवारे वार्या पुरु देवो मर्ताय दाशुषे|	where bliss is not may he allpraised god whom the pious glorify.
स सुन्वते चस्तुवते च रासते विश्वगूर्तो अरिष्टुतः|	bestow great wealth upon the mortal worshipper who sheds the juice and praises him.
एन्द्र याहि मत्स्व चित्रेण देव राधसा|	come indra and rejoice thyself o god in manifold affluence.
सरो न परास्युदरं सपीतिभिरा सोमेभिरुरु सफिरम|	thou fillest like a lake thy vast capacious bulk with soma and with draughts besides.
आ तवा सहस्रमा शतं युक्ता रथे हिरण्यये|	a thousand and a hundred steeds are harnessed to thy golden car.
बरह्मयुजो हरय इन्द्र केशिनो वहन्तु सोमपीतये|	so may the longmaned bays yoked by devotion bring indra to drink the soma juice.
आ तवा रथे हिरण्यये हरी मयूरशेप्या|	yoked to thy chariot wrought of gold may thy two bays with peacock tails.
शितिप्र्ष्ठा वहतां मध्वो अन्धसो विवक्षणस्य पीतये|	convey thee hither steeds with their white backs to quaff sweet juice that makes us eloquent.
पिबा तवस्य गिर्वणः सुतस्य पूर्वपा इव|	so drink thou lover of the song as the first drinker of this juice.
परिष्क्र्तस्य रसिन इयमासुतिश्चारुर्मदाय पत्यते|	this the outpouring of the savoury sap prepared is good and meet to gladden thee.
य एको अस्ति दंसना महानुग्रो अभि वरतैः|	he who alone by wondrous deed is mighty strong by holy works.
गमत स शिप्री न स योषदा गमद धवं न परि वर्जति|	may he come fair of cheek may he not stay afar but come and turn not from our call.
तवं पुरं चरिष्ण्वं वधैः शुष्णस्य सं पिणक|	Śuṣṇas quick moving castle thou hast crushed to pieces with thy bolts.
तवम्भा अनु चरो अध दविता यदिन्द्र हव्यो भुवः|	thou indra from of old hast followed after light since we have had thee to invoke.
मम तवा सूर उदिते मम मध्यन्दिने दिवः|	my praises when the sun hath risen my praises at the time of noon.
मम परपित्वेपिशर्वरे वसवा सतोमासो अव्र्त्सत|	my praises at the coming of the gloom of night o vasu have gone forth to thee.
सतुहि सतुहीदेते घा ते मंहिष्ठासो मघोनाम|	praise yea praise him of princes these are the most liberal of their gifts.
निन्दिताश्वः परपथी परमज्या मघस्य मेध्यातिथे|	these paramajyā ninditāśva prapathī most bounteous o medhyātithi.
आ यदश्वान वनन्वतः शरद्धयाहं रथे रुहम|	when to the car by faith i yoked the horses longing for the way.
उतवामस्य वसुनश्चिकेतति यो अस्ति याद्वः पशुः|	for skilled is yadus son in dealing precious wealth he who is rich in herds of kine.
य रज्रा मह्यं मामहे सह तवचा हिरण्यया|	may he who gave me two brown steeds together with their cloths of gold.
एष विश्वान्यभ्यस्तु सौभगासङगस्य सवनद्रथः|	may he Āsaṅgas son svanadratha obtain all joy and high felicities.
अध पलायोगिरति दासदन्यानासङगो अग्ने दशभिः सहस्रैः|	playogas son Āsaṅga by ten thousand o agni hath surpassed the rest in giving.
अधोक्षणो दश मह्यं रुशन्तो नळा इव सरसो निरतिष्ठन|	for me ten brighthued oxen have come forward like lotusstalks from out a lake upstanding.
अन्वस्य सथूरं दद्र्शे पुरस्तादनस्थ ऊरुरवरम्बमाणः|	what time her husbands perfect restoration to his lost strength and manhood was apparent.
शश्वती नार्यभिचक्ष्याह सुभद्रमर्य भोजनं बिभर्षि|	his consort Śaśvatī with joy addressed him now art thou well my lord and shalt be happy.
अग्निनेन्द्रेण वरुणेन विष्णुनादित्यै रुद्रैर्वसुभिः सचाभुवा|	with agni and with indra viṣṇu varuṇa with the Ādityas rudras vasus closely leagued.
सजोषसा उषसा सूर्येण च सोमं पिबतमश्विना|	accordant of one mind with sūrya and with dawn o aśvins drink the soma juice.
विश्वाभिर्धीभिर्भुवनेन वाजिना दिवा पर्थिव्याद्रिभिः सचाभुवा|	with all the holy thoughts all being mighty ones in close alliance wil the mountains heaven and earth.
सजोषसा उषसा|	accordant of one mind with sūrya and with dawn o aśvins drink the soma juice.
विश्वैर्देवैस्त्रिभिरेकादशैरिहाद्भिर्मरुद्भिर्भ्र्गुभिः सचाभुवा|	with all the deities three times eleven here in close alliance with the maruts bhṛgus floods.
सजोषसा उषसा|	accordant of one mind with sūrya and with dawn o aśvins drink the soma juice.
जुषेथां यज्ञं बोधतं हवस्य मे विश्वेह देवौ सवनाव गछतम|	accept the sacrifice attend to this my call come nigh o ye twain gods to all libations here.
सजोषसा उषसा सूर्येण चेषं नो वोळ्हमश्विना|	accordant of one mind with sūrya and with dawn o aśvins bring us strengthening food.
सतोमं जुषेथां युवशेव कन्यनां विश्वेह देवौ सवनाव गछतम|	accept our praisesong as a youth accepts a maid come nigh o ye twain gods to all libations here.
सजोषसा उषसा सूर्येन चेषं|	accordant of one mind with sūrya and with dawn o aśvins bring us strengthening food.
गिरो जुषेथामध्वरं जुषेथां विश्वेह देवौ सवनाव गछतम|	accept the songs we sing accept the solemn rite come nigh o ye twain gods to all libations here.
सजोषसा उषसा सूर्येण चेषं|	accordant of one mind with sūrya and with dawn o aśvins bring us strengthening food.
हारिद्रवेव पतथो वनेदुप सोमं सुतं महिषेवाव गछथः|	ye fly as starlings fly unto the forest trees like buffaloes ye seek the soma we have shed.
सजोषसा उषसा सूर्येण च तरिर्वर्तिर्यातमश्विना|	accordant of one mind with sūrya and with dawn come thrice o aśvins to our home.
हंसाविव पतथो अध्वगाविव सोमं सुतं महिषेवाव गछथः|	ye fly like swans like those who travel on their way like buffaloes ye seek the soma we have shed.
सजोषसा उषसा सूर्येण च तरिर|	accordant of one mind with sūrya and with dawn come thrice o aśvins to our home.
शयेनाविव पतथो हव्यदातये सोमं सुतं महिषेवाव गछथः|	ye fly to our oblation like a pair of hawks like buffaloes ye seek the soma we have shed.
सजोषसा उषसा सूर्येण च तरिर|	accordant of one mind with sūrya and with dawn come thrice o aśvins to our home.
पिबतं च तर्प्णुतं चा च गछतं परजां च धत्तं दरविणं च धत्तम|	come hitherward and drink and satisfy yourselves bestow upon us progeny and affluence.
सजोषसा उषसा सूर्येण चोर्जं नो धत्तमश्विना|	accordant of one mind with sūrya and with dawn o aśvins grant us vigorous strength.
जयतं च पर सतुतं च पर चावतं परजां च धत्तं दरविणं च धत्तम|	conquer your foes protect us praise your worshippers bestow upon us progeny and affluence.
सजोषसा उषसा सूर्येण चोर्जं|	accordant of one mind with sūrya and with dawn o aśvins grant us vigorous strength.
हतं च शत्रून यततं च मित्रिणः परजां च धत्तं दरविणं च धत्तम|	slay enemies animate men whom ye befriend bestow upon us progeny and affluence.
सजोषसा उषसा सूर्येण चोर्जं|	accordant of one mind with sūrya and with dawn o aśvins grant us vigorous strength.
मित्रावरुणवन्ता उत धर्मवन्ता मरुत्वन्ता जरितुर्गछथो हवम|	with mitra varuṇa dharma and the maruts in your company approach unto your praisers call.
सजोषसा उषसा सूर्येण चादित्यैर्यातमश्विना|	accordant of one mind with sūrya and with dawn and with the Ādityas aśvins come.
अङगिरस्वन्ता उत विष्णुवन्ता मरुत्वन्ता जरितुर्गछथो हवम|	with viṣṇu and the aṅgirases attending you and with the maruts come unto your praisers call.
सजोषसा उषसा सूर्येण चादित्यैर|	accordant of one mind with sūrya and with dawn and with the Ādityas aśvins come.
रभुमन्ता वर्षणा वाजवन्ता मरुत्वन्ता जरितुर्गछथो हवम|	with Ṛbhus and with vājas o ye mighty ones leagued with the maruts come ye to your praisers call.
सजोषसा उषसा सूर्येण चादित्यैर|	accordant of one mind with sūrya and with dawn and with the Ādityas aśvins come.
बरह्म जिन्वतमुत जिन्वतं धियो हतं रक्षांसि सेधतममीवाः|	give spirit to our prayer and animate our thoughts slay ye the rākṣasas and drive away disease.
सजोषसा उषसा सूर्येण च सोमं सुन्वतो अश्विना|	accordant of one mind with sūrya and with dawn the pressers soma aśvins drink.
कषत्रं जिन्वतमुत जिन्वतं नॄन हतं रक्षाण्सि सेधतममीवाः|	strengthen the ruling power strengthen the men of war slay ye the rākṣasas and drive away disease.
सजोषसा उषसा सूर्येण च सोमं|	accordant of one mind with sūrya and with dawn the pressers soma aśvins drink.
धेनूर्जिन्वतमुत जिन्वतं विशो हतं रक्षांसि सेधतममीवाः|	give strength unto the milchkine give the people strength slay ye the rākṣasas and drive away disease.
सजोषसा उषसा सूर्येण च सोमं|	accordant of one mind with sūrya and with dawn the pressers soma aśvins drink.
अत्रेरिव शर्णुतं पूर्व्यस्तुतिं शयावाश्वस्य सुन्वतो मदच्युता|	as ye heard atris earliest eulogy so hear Śyāvāśva somapresser ye who reel in joy.
सजोषसा उषसा सूर्येन चाश्विना तिरोह्न्यम|	accordant of one mind with sūrya and with dawn drink juice o aśvins three days old.
सर्गानिव सर्जतं सुष्टुतीरुप शयावाश्वस्य सुन्वतो मदच्युता|	further like running streams Śyāvāśvas eulogies who presses out the soma ye who reel in joy.
सजोषसा उषसा सूर्येण चाश्विना|	accordant of one mind with sūrya and with dawn drink juice o aśvins three days old.
रश्मीन्रिव यछतमध्वरानुप शयावाश्वस्य सुन्वतो मदच्युता|	seize as ye grasp the reins Śyāvāśvas solemn rites who presses out the soma ye who reel in joy.
सजोषसा उषसा सूर्येण चाश्विना|	accordant of one mind with sūrya and with dawn drink juice o aśvins three days old.
अर्वाग रथं नि यछतं पिबतं सोम्यं मधु|	drive down your chariot hitherward drink ye the somas savoury juice.
आ यातमश्विना गतमवस्युर्वामहं हुवे धत्तं रत्नानि दाशुषे|	approach ye aśvins come to us i call you eager for your aid grant treasures to the worshipper.
नमोवाके परस्थिते अध्वरे नरा विवक्षणस्य पीतये|	when sacrifice which tells our reverence hath begun heroes to drink the gushing juice.
आ यातं|	approach ye aśvins come to us i call you eager for your aid grant treasures to the worshipper.
सवाहाक्र्तस्य तर्म्पतं सुतस्य देवावन्धसः|	sate you with consecrated drink with juice effused ye deities.
आ यातं|	approach ye aśvins come to us i call you eager for your aid grant treasures to the worshipper.
अग्निरुक्थे पुरोहितो गरावाणो बर्हिरध्वरे|	cheif priest is agni at the laud as stones and grass at sacrifice.
रचा यामि मरुतो बरह्मणस पतिं देवानवो वरेण्यम|	with song i seek the maruts brahmaṇaspati gods for help much to be desired.
आ पशुं गासि पर्थिवीं वनस्पतीनुषासा नक्तमोषधीः|	i sing to cattle and to earth to trees to dawns to night to plants.
विश्वे च नो वसवो विश्ववेदसो धीनां भूत परावितारः|	o all ye vasus ye possessors of all wealth be ye the furtherers of our thoughts.
पर सू न एत्वध्वरोअग्ना देवेषु पूर्व्यः|	forth go with agni to the gods our sacrifice of ancient use.
आदित्येषु पर वरुणे धर्तव्रते मरुत्सु विश्वभानुषु|	to the Ādityas varuṇa whose law stands fast and the alllightening marut troop.
विश्वे हि षमा मनवे विश्ववेदसो भुवन वर्धे रिशादसः|	lords of all wealth may they be strengtheners of man destroyers of his enemies.
अरिष्टेभिः पायुभिर्विश्ववेदसो यन्ता नोअव्र्कं छर्दिः|	lords of all wealth do ye with guards which none may harm preserve our dwelling free from foes.
आ नो अद्य समनसो गन्ता विश्वे सजोषसः|	come to us with one mind today come to us all with one accord.
रचा गिरा मरुतो देव्यदिते सदने पस्त्ये महि|	maruts with holy song and goddess aditi mighty one to our house and home.
अभि परिया मरुतो या वो अश्व्या हव्या मित्र परयाथन|	send us delightful things ye maruts on your steeds come ye o mitra to our gifts.
आबर्हिरिन्द्रो वरुणस्तुरा नर आदित्यासो सदन्तु नः|	let indra varuṇa and the Ādityas sit swift heroes on our sacred grass.
वयं वो वर्क्तबर्हिषो हितप्रयस आनुषक|	we who have trimmed the grass for you and set the banquet in array.
सुतसोमासो वरुण हवामहे मनुष्वदिद्धाग्नयः|	and pressed the soma call you varuina like men with sacrificial fires aflame.
आ पर यात मरुतो विष्णो अश्विना पूषन माकीनया धिया|	o maruts visinu aśvins pūṣan haste away with minds turned hitherward to me.
इन्द्र आ यातु परथमः सनिष्युभिर्व्र्षा यो वर्त्रहा गर्णे|	let the strong indra famed as vṛtras slayer come first with the winners of the spoil.
वि नो देवासो अद्रुहोअछिद्रं शर्म यछत|	ye guileless gods bestow on us a refuge strong on every side.
न यद दूराद वसवो नू चिदन्तितो वरूथमादधर्षति|	a sure protection vasus unassailable from near at hand or from afar.
अस्ति हि वः सजात्यं रिशादसो देवासो अस्त्याप्यम|	kinship have i with you and close alliance o ye gods destroyers of our foes.
पर णः पूर्वस्मै सुविताय वोचत मक्षू सुम्नाय नव्यसे|	call us to our prosperity of former days and soon to new klicity.
इदा हि व उपस्तुतिमिदा वामस्य भक्तये|	for now have i sent forth to you that i may win a fair reward.
उप वो विश्ववेदसो नमस्युरानस्र्क्ष्यन्यामिव|	lords of all wealth with homage this my song of praise like a milchcow that faileth not.
उदु षय वः सविता सुप्रणीतयोअस्थादूर्ध्वो वरेण्यः|	excellent savitar hath mounted up on high for you ye sure and careful guides.
नि दविपादश्चतुष्पादो अर्थिनोअविश्रन पतयिष्णवः|	bipeds and quadrupeds with several hopes and aims and birds have settled to their tasks.
देवंदेवं वोअवसे देवंदेवमभिष्टये|	singing their praise with godlike thought let us invoke each god for grace.
देवंदेवं हुवेम वाजसातये गर्णन्तो देव्या धिया|	each god to bring you help each god to strengthen you.
देवासो हि षमा मनवे समन्यवो विश्वे साकं सरातयः|	for of one spirit are the gods with mortal man cosharers all of gracious gifts.
ते नो अद्य ते अपरं तुचे तु नो भवन्तु वरिवोविदः|	may they increase our strength hereafter and today providing case and ample room.
पर वः शंसाम्यद्रुहः संस्थ उपस्तुतीनाम|	i laud you o ye guileless gods here where we meet to render praise.
न तं धूर्तिर्वरुण मित्र मर्त्यं यो वो धामभ्योअविधत|	none varuṇa and mitra harins the mortal man who honours and obeys your laws.
पर स कषयं तिरते वि महीरिषो यो वो वराय दाशति|	he makes his house endure he gathers plenteous food who pays obedience to your will.
पर परजाभिर्जायते धर्मणस पर्यरिष्टः सर्व एधते|	born in his sons anew he spreads as law commands and prospers every way unharmed.
रते स विन्दते युधः सुगेभिर्यात्यध्वनः|	een without war he gathers wealth and goes hisway on pleasant paths.
अर्यमा मित्रोवरुणः सरातयो यं तरायन्ते सजोषसः|	whom mitra varuṇa and aryaman protect sharing the giftof one accord.
अज्रे चिदस्मै कर्णुथा नयञ्चनं दुर्गे चिदा सुसरणम|	een on the plain for him ye make a sloping path an easy way where road is none.
एषा चिदस्मादशनिः परो नु सास्रेधन्ती वि नश्यतु|	and far away from him the ineffectual shaft must vanish shot at him in vain.
यदद्य सूर्य उद्यति परियक्षत्रा रतं दध|	if ye appoint the rite today kind rulers when the sun ascends.
यन निम्रुचि परबुधि विश्ववेदसो यद वा मध्यन्दिने दिवः|	lords of all wealth at sunset or at wakingtime or be it at the noon of day.
यद वाभिपित्वे असुरा रतं यते छर्दिर्येम वि दाशुषे|	or asuras when ye have sheltered the worshipper who goes to sacrifice at eve.
वयं तद वो वसवो विश्ववेदस उप सथेयाम मध्य आ|	may we o vasus ye possessors of all wealth come then into the midst of you.
यदद्य सूर उदिते यन मध्यन्दिन आतुचि|	if ye today at sunrise or at noon or in the gloom of eve.
वामं धत्थ मनवे विश्ववेदसो जुह्वानाय परचेतसे|	lords of all riches give fair treasure to the man the wise man who hath sacrificed.
वयं तद वः सम्राज आ वर्णीमहे पुत्रो न बहुपाय्यम|	then we imperial rulers claim of you this boon your wide protection as a son.
अश्याम तदादित्या जुह्वतो हविर्येन वस्योअनशामहै|	may we Ādityas offering holy gifts obtain that which shall bring us greater bliss.
समिधाग्निं दुवस्यत घर्तैर्बोधयतातिथिम|	pay service unto agni with your fuel rouse your guest with oil.
आस्मिन हव्याजुहोतन|	in him present your offerings.
अग्ने सतोमं जुषस्व मे वर्धस्वानेन मन्मना|	agni do thou accept my laud be magnified by this my song.
परति सूक्तानि हर्य नः|	welcome my sweetlyspoken words.
अग्निं दूतं पुरो दधे हव्यवाहमुप बरुवे|	agni envoy i place in front the oblationbearer i address.
देवाना सादयादिह|	here let him seat the deities.
उत ते बर्हन्तो अर्चयः समिधानस्य दीदिवः|	agni the lofty flames of thee enkindled have gone up on high.
अग्ने शुक्रासीरते|	thy bright flames thou refulgent one.
उप तवा जुह्वो मम घर्ताचीर्यन्तु हर्यत|	beloved let my ladles full of sacred oil come near to thee.
अग्ने हव्या जुषस्व नः|	agni accept our offerings.
मन्द्रं होतारं रत्विजं चित्रभानुं विभावसुम|	i worship agnimay he hearthe cheerful the invoker priest.
अग्निमीळे स उ शरवत|	of varied splendour rich in light.
परत्नं होतारमीड्यं जुष्टमग्निं कविक्रतुम|	ancient invoker meet for praise beloved agni wise and strong.
अध्वराणामभिश्रियम|	the visitant of solemn rites.
जुषानो अङगिरस्तमेमा हव्यान्यानुषक|	agni best aṅgiras accept straightway these offerings and guide.
अग्ने यज्ञं नयर्तुथा|	the seasonable sacrifice.
समिधान उ सन्त्य शुक्रशोच इहा वह|	excellent god with brilliant flames enkindled bring thou hitherward.
चिकित्वान दैव्यं जनम|	knowing the way the heavenly host.
विप्रं होतारमद्रुहं धूमकेतुं विभावसुम|	him sage and herald void of guile ensign of sacrifices him.
यज्ञानां केतुमीमहे|	smokebannered rich in light we seek.
अग्ने नि पाहि नस्त्वं परति षम देव रीषतः|	o agni be our guardian thou god against those who injure us.
भिन्धि दवेषः सहस्क्र्त|	destroy our foes thou son of strength.
अग्निः परत्नेन मन्मना शुम्भानस्तन्वं सवाम|	making his body beautiful agni the sage hath waxen by.
कविर्विप्रेण वाव्र्धे|	the singer and his ancient hymn.
ऊर्जो नपातमा हुवेअग्निं पावकशोचिषम|	i invocate the child of strength agni with purifying flame.
अस्मिन यज्ञे सवध्वरे|	at this wellordered sacrifice.
स नो मित्रमहस्त्वमग्ने शुक्रेण सोचिषा|	so agni rich in many friends with fiery splendour seat thyself.
देवैरा सत्सिबर्हिषि|	with gods upon our sacred grass.
यो अग्निं तन्वो दमे देवं मर्तः सपर्यति|	the mortal man who serves the god agni within his own abode.
तस्मा इद दीदयद वसु|	for him he causes wealth to shine.
अग्निर्मूर्धा दिवः ककुत पतिः पर्थिव्या अयम|	agni is head and height of heaven the master of the earth is he.
अपां रेतांसि जिन्वति|	he quickeneth the waters seed.
उदग्ने शुचयस्तव शुक्रा भराजन्त ईरते|	upward o agni rise thy flames pure and resplendent blazing high.
तव जयोतींष्यर्चयः|	thy lustres fair effulgences.
ईषिषे वार्यस्य हि दात्रस्याग्ने सवर्पतिः|	for agni thou as lord of light rulest oer choicest gifts may i.
सतोता सयां तव शर्मणि|	thy singer find defence in thee.
तवामग्ने मनीषिणस्त्वां हिन्वन्ति चित्तिभिः|	o agni they who understand stir thee to action with their thoughts.
तवां वर्धन्तु नो गिरः|	so let our songs enhance thy might.
अदब्धस्य सवधावतो दूतस्य रेभतः सदा|	we ever claim the friendship of agni the singing messenger.
अग्नेः सख्यं वर्णीमहे|	of godlike nature void of guile.
अग्निः शुचिव्रततमः शुचिर्विप्रः शुचिः कविः|	agni who bears most holy sway the holy singer holy sage.
शुचीरोचत आहुतः|	shines holy when we worship him.
उत तवा धीतयो मम गिरो वर्धन्तु विश्वहा|	yea let my meditations let my songs exalt thee evermore.
अग्ने सख्यस्य बोधि नः|	think agni of our friendly bond.
यदग्ने सयामहं तवं तवं वा घा सया अहम|	if i were thou and thou wert i o agni every prayer of thine.
सयुष टे सत्या इहाशिषः|	should have its due fulfilment here.
वसुर्वसुपतिर्हि कमस्यग्ने विभावसुः|	for excellent and lord of wealth art thou o agni rich in light.
सयाम ते सुमतावपि|	may we enjoy thy favouring grace.
अग्ने धर्तव्रताय ते समुद्रायेव सिन्धवः|	agni to thee whose laws stand fast our resonant songs of praise speed forth.
गिरो वाश्रासीरते|	as rivers hasten to the sea.
युवानं विश्पतिं कविं विश्वादं पुरुवेपसम|	agni the youthful lord of men who stirreth much and eateth all.
अग्निं शुम्भामि मन्मभिः|	the sage i glorify with hymns.
यज्ञानां रथ्ये वयं तिग्मजम्भाय वीळवे|	to agni let us haste with lauds the guide of sacrificial rites.
सतोमैरिषेमाग्नये|	armed with sharp teeth the mighty one.
अयमग्ने तवे अपि जरिता भूतु सन्त्य|	and let this man good agni be with thee the singer of thy praise.
तस्मै पावक मर्ळय|	be gracious holy one to him.
धीरो हयस्यद्मसद विप्रो न जाग्र्विः सदा|	for thou art sharer of our feast wise ever watchful as a sage.
अग्ने दीदयसि दयवि|	agni thou shinest in the sky.
पुराग्ने दुरितेभ्यः पुरा मर्ध्रेभ्यः कवे|	o agni sage before our foes before misfortunes fall on us.
पर ण आयुर्वसो तिर|	excellent lord prolong our lives.
युवोरु षू रथं हुवे सधस्तुत्याय सुरिषु|	i call your chariot to receive united praise mid princely men.
अतुर्तदक्षाव्र्षणा वर्षण्वसू|	strong gods who pour down wealth of never vanquished might.
युवं वरो सुषाम्णे महे तने नासत्या|	ye to varosusaman come nāsatyas for this glorious rite.
अवोभिर्यथो वर्षण वर्षण्वसू|	with your protecting aid strong gods who pour down wealth.
ता वामद्य हवामहे हव्येभिर्वजिनीवसू|	so with oblations we invoke you rich in ample wealth today.
पूर्वीरिष इषयन्तावति कषपः|	when night hath passed o ye who send us plenteous food.
आ वां वाहिष्ठो अश्विना रथो यातु शरुतो नर|	o aśvins heroes let your car famed best to travel come to us.
उप सतोमान तुरस्य दर्शथः शरिये|	and for his glory mark your zealous servants lauds.
जुहुराणा चिदश्विना मन्येथां वर्षण्वसू|	aśvins who send us precious gifts even when offended think of him.
युवं हि रुद्रा पर्षथो अति दविषः|	for ye o rudras lead us safe beyond our foes.
दस्रा हि विश्वमानुषं मक्षूभिः परिदीयथः|	for wonderworkers with fleet steeds ye fly completely round this all.
धियंजिन्वा मधुवर्णा शुभस पती|	stirring our thoughts ye lords of splendour honeyhued.
